verse_text: Abraham suan David tapa Jesu Khrist khang ciamtehna:
Isaac pa Abraham, Jacob pa Isaac, Judah le a sanggam pasalte pa Jacob,
A zi Tamar tawh a neih a tapa Perez le Zerah pa Judah, Hezron pa Perez, Ram pa Hezron,
Amminadab pa Ram Nahshon pa Amminadab, Salmon pa Nahshon,
A zi Rahab tawh a neih a tapa Boaz pa Salmon, A zi Ruth tawh a neih a tapa Obed pa Boaz, Jesse pa Obed,
Kumpi David pa Jesse, Uriah zi a hi ngei tawh a neih a tapa Solomon pa David,
Rehoboam pa Solomon, Abijah pa Rehoboam, Asa pa Abijah,
Jehoshaphat pa Asa, Joram pa Jehoshaphat, Uzziah pa Joram,
Jotham pa Uzziah, Ahaz pa Jotham, Hezekiah pa Ahaz,
Manasseh pa Hezekiah, Amon pa Manasseh, Josiah pa Amon,
Babylon khua pi-a a saltan lai-ua a neih Jeconiaha le a sanggam pasal teng pa Josiah
Babylon a, a saltan khit uh ciang in: Shealtiel pa Jeconiah, Zerubbabel pa Shealtiel,
Abiud pa Zerubbabel, Eliakim pa Abiud, Azor pa Eliakim,
Zadok pa Azor, Akim pa Zadok, Eliud pa Akim,
Eleazar pa Eliud, Matthan pa Eleazar, Jacob pa Matthan,
Joseph pa Jacob hi-a, Joseph zi Mary sung panin Khrist kici Jesu a suak hi.
Hih bangin Abraham pan David dong khang sawm le li, David pan Babylon a saltan dong khang sawm le li hi-a, saltan khit pan Khrist dong khang sawm le li ahi hi.
Jesu Khrist suahzia hih bang ahi hi. A nu Mary, Joseph tawh kiteng dinga kidongsa ahi hi. Amau gel a kigawm ma-un Khasiangtho in Mary a gaiisak hi.
A pasal Joseph, mi lungsim dik hi-a, mi lakah daisak nuam loin maksim ding a sawm hi.
Ahi hangin tua banga a ngaihsut laitakin Topa vansawltak khat a mang sungah kilanga, “David tapa Joseph aw, Mary paii nau pen Khasiangtho pan ahi manin amah na tenpih ding lauthawng kei in.
Tapa khat a nei ding hi; tua tapa in ama mite a mawhna uh panin honkhia ding ahi manin a min Jesu na phuak in,” a ci hi.
Kamsangpa tungtawna Topa gensa a tangtun nadingin hihte khempeuh a piang ahi hi.
"Tua nungak bit gaii-in tapa khat nei dinga, ama min Immanuel kici ding hi” d a khiatna in, “Eite tawh Pasian om khawm” cihna ahi hi.
Joseph a khanlawh ciangin Topa vansawltak thupiak bangin manga, Mary a tenpih hi.
Ahi hangin tapa a suah matengin a luppih kei hi. A suah ciangin a min Jesu a phuak hi.
Kumpi Herod uk hun laitakin Judea gam-a Bethlehem ah Jesu a suah khit ciangin nisuahna lam pan Jerusalem ah Mipiltea a tung uh hi.
Amaute in, “A suakkhinsab Jew-te kumpipa koi-ah om hiam? Nisuahna lamah ama aksi ka mu zo uh a, a bia dingin kong pai uh hi,” ci-in a dong uh hi.
Kumpi Herod in hih thu a zak ciangin a lungzing hi. Jerusalem a mi khempeuh in zong a lungzinpih uh hi.
Mipite’ siampi makaite khempeuh le thukham siate a kaihkhop khit ciangin, “Khristc suah nading koi lai ahi hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
Amaute in, “Judea gam-a Bethlehem ah suak ding hi. Ahang in, kamsangpa in hih bangin na gelh khin hi:
"Judah gam-a om Bethlehem aw, ka mi Israel-te a cing dingin nang sung pan ukpa khat piang ding ahi manind Judah gam-ukte sungah nang a neupen na hi kei hi.” ci hi,” ci-in a dawng uh hi.
Tua ciangin Herod in Mipilte samsim a, aksi kilat hun lian amaute tung pan a theikhia hi.
Amaute Bethlehem ah sawlin, “Pai unla, tua naupang va limzon un. Kei zong pai-in amah ka biak theih nadingin na muh phetun hong ko pah un,” ci-in a vaikhak hi.
Amaute in kumpipa vaikhakna a zak khit uh ciangin a paikhia leuleu uh hi. Nisuahnae lama a muhsa uh aksi, naupang omna tung santakah a khawl mateng amau mai-ah a na paipai hi.
Amaute in aksi a muh uh ciangin a lungdam mahmah uh hi.
Tua inn a tun uh ciangin naungek le a nu Mary mu uh a, kunin a bia uh hi. A goute uh suahkhia-in letsong in kham, gimnamtui le paknamtui kha a pia uh hi.
Herod kiangah amaute a pai kik loh nadingun mang sunga kivauhilhsa bangin lamtuam tawnin a gamuah a ciah uh hi.

Amaute a ciah khit uh ciangin Joseph mang sungah Topa vansawltak khat a kilang hi. Amah in, “Tho inla naungek le a nu Egypt ah taipih in. Herod in naungek thah dingin zong ding ahi manin, kong hilh kik mateng tua lai-ah va om un,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah tho-a azan azanin naungek le a nu paipih in Egypt ah a tai uh hi.
Herod sih khit dong tua gamah va om uh hi. Kamsangpa tungtawna Topa genna: “Egypt gam pan ka tapa ka samkhia hi.”f cih thu a tangtunna ahi hi.

Mipilte in amah a khem lam a theih ciangin Herod lungham a, Mipilte tung pana a theihsa hun tawh kituakin seh a, Bethlehem le akim apam khuate-a pasalno kum nih le a nuaisiah khempeuh thah dingin thu a pia hi.
Tua ciangin kamsangpa Jeremiah genkholhna:
"Ramah gamah nakpi-a dahna le, kahna awging kiza hi. Rachel in a tate a kahkah hangin khat beek om nawn lo a hi manin kihehnem zo lo hi,”g cih thu a tangtunna ahi hi.
Herod a sih khit ciangin Joseph mang sungah Topa vansawltak khat kilanga,
"Tho in, naupang thah sawmte si khin ta ahi manin naupang le a nu paipih inla Israel gamah pai ta un,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah tho-a, naupang le a nu tawh Israel gamah a ciah uh hi.
Ahi hangin Archelaus in a pa Herod za luah in Judea gam uk hi, cih thu a zak ciangin tua gamah a pai ngam kei hi. A manga kivauhilhsa bangin Galilee gamah kihem a,
Nazareth kici khua-ah a va teng hi. Tua bangin: “Amah Nazareth mi kici ding hi,” ci-a kamsangpa tungtawna kigensa thu a tangtung hi.
Tua hun lai-in Baptize-pa John va pai- a,
"Kisik un. Vantung gam hong nai ta hi,” ci-in Judea gama Gamlakah thu a hilh hi.
Kamsangpa Isaiah tungtawna kigen: “Gamlak a kikopa aw in, ‘Topa ading lampi na sialkhol un, ama lampite na tangsak un,’”a a cih in hih pa ahi hi.
John in kala-oh mul kigan puan silhin savun kawnggakin a kawng a gak hi. Kauphe le gamlak khuaizu anin a nei hi.
Jerusalem, Judea gam sung khempeuh le Jordan kual bup pana mite ama kiangah a pai uh hi.
Amaute in a mawhnate uh pulak uh a, amah in Jordan Gun ah a baptise hi.
A baptisena phual-ah Pharisee-te le Sadducee-te tampi a pai John in a muh ciangin, “No mualtan suante! Hong tung ding Pasian thangpaihna pana taikhia dingin kua in hong vauhilh ahi hiam?
Kisikna tawh kilawm gah na gah un.
‘Abraham ka pa uh hi’ a ci thei dingin kingaihsun kei un. Pasian in hih suangte Abraham tate suaksak thei hi, cih kong hilh hi.
Sing phungah hei om khin ta hi. Gah hoih a gah lo kung peuhmah kiphukin meikhuk ah kikhul ding hi.

"Na kisikna hangun tui-inb kong baptize hi. Ahi hangin kei nunga hong pai ding pa, kei sangin a vanglianzaw hi; ama khedap tawi ding nangawnin ka kilawm kei hi. Amah in note Khasiangtho le mei-in hong baptize ding hi.
Amah in buhhah-ciangka tawi-in, ama buh phual hahsiang dinga, atak teng a sal sungah koihin, asi teng a mit ngei lo mei sungah a khul ding hi,” ci-in a hilh hi.
Tua hunin John kibaptisesak dingin Galilee pan Jordan ah Jesu va pai hi.
Ahi hangin John in, “Nang kei nong baptise ding hizaw napi, nang hong kibaptisesak dingin kei hong zuan zawsop na hi hiam?” ci-in a kho hi.
Jesu in, “Ahi ding bang hisak in; thumaan khempeuh i tangtunsak ding kilawm hi,” ci-in a dawng hi. Tua ciangin John in a mang hi.
Jesu a kibaptise phetin tuilak pan a paito hi. Tua hun lianin van kihong a, vakhu bangin Pasian Kha kum sukin, ama tunga khawl a mu hi.
Tua laitakin, “Hih in ka it ka Tapa ahi hi. Ama tungah ka lung a kim mahmah hi,” ci-in vantung pan aw khat a ging hi.
Tua ciangin dawimangpa zia-etna thuak dingin Kha in Jesu gamlakah a pi hi.
Sun sawmli le zan sawmli an a tan khit ciangin a gil kial hi.
Tua zia-etpa a kiangah va pai-a, “Nang Pasian Tapa na hileh hih suangte anlum suaksak in,” a ci hi.
Jesu in, “Mite anlum bek tawh nungta hi loin Pasian kam sung pana pusuak thu khempeuh tawh a nungta hizaw hi,’a ci-in kigelhhi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Tua ciangin dawimangpa in amah khuapi siangtho ah paipih-a, biakinnpi khum a sang penna ah a dingsak hi.

Dawimangpa in, “Nang Pasian Tapa na hileh tuaksuk dih in. Ahang in: ‘Amah in nang hangin ama vansawltakte thu pia dinga, na khepekte suang tawh a kisukkhak loh nadingin a khut uh tawh hong domto ding uh hi,’b ci-in kigelh hi,” a ci hi.
Jesu in, “‘Na Topa Pasian na zia-et kei in,’c ci-in zong kigelh hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Tua khit ciangin dawimangpa in amah mual sangpi dawnah paipih leuleu a, leitunga om kumpi-gam khempeuh le a thupinate a lak hi.
Amah in, “Kunin kei nong biak leh hihte khempeuh nang kong pia ding hi,” a ci hi.
Jesu in, “Satan, paikhiamang in! ‘Na Topa Pasian bia inla, ama na bek sem in,’d ci-in kigelh hi,” a cih san hi.
Tua ciangin dawimangpa in amah paisan a, vansawltakte hong pai-in Jesu a don uh hi.
Jesu in John thongkiatna thu a zak ciangin Galilee ah a ciah kik hi.
Nazareth nusia in Zebulun le Naphtali gamhuam tuilipi gei khata om Capernaum ah pai-in a teng hi.
Hih in kamsang pa Isaiah tungtawna kigenkholsa:
"Zebulun gam le Naphtali gam, Jordan gun dunga tuipi zuatna lampi, Gentile-te tenna Galilee ah,
khuamial sunga teng mite in, khuavak lianpi a mu zo uh hi; sihna liim gam sunga teng mite tungah khuavak tang khin ta hi.”e cih thu a tangtun nading ahi hi.
Tua huna kipanin Jesu in, “Vantung gam hong nai zo ahi manin kisik un,” ci-in thuhilh a kipan hi.
Galilee Tuipi gei-a Jesu a pai laitakin Peter kici Simon le a nau Andrew-te unau a mu hi. Amaute nga bengte ahi manun tuilipi sungah len a khuh laitak uh ahi hi.
Jesu in, “Hong pai unla kei hong zui un. Mihing mante kong suaksak ding hi,” a ci hi.
Amau zong a lente uh nusia in amah a zuipah uh hi.
Tua pan a paikhiat ciangin unau dang nih, Zebedee tapa, James le a sang gampa John-te a mu hi. Amaute in a pa uh Zebedee tawh len puahin gunkuang sungah a om uh hi. Jesu in amaute a sam hi.
Amaute in zong gunkuang le a pa uh nusia pah uh a amah a zui uh hi.
Galilee gam sung tengah Jesu pai kawikawi a, synagogue-te ah thu hilhin, vantung gam lungdamna thuthak hilh-a, cina luna khempeuh a damsak hi.
Syria gam sung tengah ama thu a kizel hi. Natna tuamtuam a veite, a na valvalte, dawilutte, sibup natna veite le pumzawte khempeuh Jesu kiangah paipih uh a, amah in a damsak hi.
Galilee gam, Decapolisf, Jerusalem, Judea le Jordan gungal gama mihonte in amah a zui uh hi.
Jesu in mihonte a muh ciangin mualpangah paito-in a tu hi. Nungzuite ama kiangah va pai uh a,
amaute thu hilh ding kipanin:
"Kha-a gentheite thupha ngah ahi hi, ahang in, vangtung gam amau aa ahi hi.
A dahte thupha ngah ahi hi, ahang in, amaute a kihehnem ding hi.
Lungnemte thupha ngah ahi hi, ahang in, amaute in leitung a luah ding uh hi.
Thumaanna hanga gilkial dangtakte thupha ngah ahi hi, ahang in, amaute kitaiisak ding hi.
Mi lainat siamte thupha ngah ahi hi, ahang in, amaute lainatna kingahsak ding hi.
Lungsim siangthote thupha ngah ahi hi, ahang in, amaute in Pasian a mu ding uh hi.
Kilemna a bawlte thupha ngah ahi hi, ahang in, amaute Pasian tate kici ding hi.
Thumaanna hanga kibawlsiate thupha ngah ahi hi, ahang in, vantung kumpi-gam amau aa ahi hi."
"Keima hangin engkona, bawlsiatna le zuauthu tawh gitlohna nam khempeuh a hong kingawh ciangin thupha ngah na hi uh hi.
Note ma-a kamsangte zong tua mah bangin bawlsia uh ahi manin lungdamin kipak un, bang hang hiam cih leh vantung ah no ading pahtakman a lian hi.
"Note leitung ci na hi uh hi. Ahi hangin ci a alna mang leh bangci ki-alkiksak thei ding ahi hiam? Buakhia a mite tuatcil ding longal a hoihna om lo hi:
"Note leitung khuavak na hi uh hi. Mualtunga om khuapi a kiliah thei kei hi.
Mite in meivak a vak uh ciangin kuang a khuh kei uh hi. A khuh sangsikin inn sunga omte khempeuh in khua a muh theih nadingin meivak tunna tungah kikoih zaw hi.
Tua mah bangin mite in na gamtatna hoihte uh a muh ciangin vantunga om na Pa uh a phat nadingun na khuavak uh mite mai-ah na tangsak un.
"Thukham ahi zongin, Kamsangte thu ahi zongin a beisak dinga hong pai hi, ci-in hong ngaihsun kei un; tuate a beisak dinga hong pai hi loin, a tang tungsak dinga hong pai ka hizaw hi.
Thutak kong geninah, van le lei a manthan masiah Thukham khempeuh a tangtun kim khit mateng, laimal neupen ahi-a sutvom ciau khat ahi zongin a mangthang kei ding hi.

Hih thupiakte lak pan a neu pen palsatin, tua banga palsat ding midangte a hilh peuhpeuh vantung gamah a neu pen kici ding hi. Ahi hangin hih thupiakte zui-a, midangte a hilh peuhpeuh vantung gamah alian kici ding hi.
Ken kong geninah, note thumaanna in Pharisee-te le thukham siate aa a khup zawh kei leh vantung gamah na lut peuhmah kei ding uh hi.
"Tanglai mite kiangah, ‘Tual that kei in;a tual that peuhmah in thukhenna a thuak ding hi,’ a kici thu na zaksa uh ahi hi.

Ahi hangin ken kong geninah, a sanggamb tunga a hehte peuhmah in thukhenna a thuak ding hi. Tua banah a sanggamte tunga, ‘Raca,c ’ a ci peuhmah in Sanhedrin-te thusitna a thuak ding hi. Ahi hangin, ‘Nang mihai!’ a ci peuhmah in hell meipi a thuak ding lauhuai hi.
"Tua ahi ciangin biaknatau ah biakna na piak laitakin na sanggam pa in na tungah lungkimlohna nei hi, ci-a na phawk leh,
biaknatau mai-ah na piak nate nusia phot in. Pai inla na sanggampa tawh va kilem phot in; tua khit ciangin pai-in na biakna pia pan in.

"Thukhenna mun hong tun na lawmpa tawh kilem mengmeng in. Na paikhawm laitak un kilem zawh nading hanciam in. Tua hi kei leh thukhenpa tungah hong pia dinga, thukhenpa in bupa khut sungah hong pia-in thong sung hong kidenna kha ding hi.
Thutak kong geninah, na liausumd na piak khit kiuhkeuh mateng na suakta kei ding hi.
"‘Ang kawm kei in,’e a kici thu na zaksa uh ahi hi.
Ahi hangin ken kong geninah, mi khatpeuh in lunggulhluatna tawh numei khatpeuh a et leh ama lungtang sungah amah tawh angkawm khin ahi hi.
Na taklam mittang in hong khialhsak leh khelkhia inla paimang in. Na pumpi kimin hell sunga hong kipaih sangin na pumpi na khat a hem ding nang adingin hoihzaw hi.
Na taklam khut in hong khialhsak leh sattan inla paimang in. Na pumpi kimin hell sungah na lut angin na pumpi hiang khat a hem ding, nang adingin hoihzaw hi.
"‘Zi ma peuhmah in makna lai pia ta hen,’f a kici thu a omsa ahi hi.
Ahi hangin ken kong geninah, ang kikawmsanna hang longal, a zi a ma peuhmah in a zi angkawmsak a suak hi. A kimasa numei a tenpih peuhmah angkawm a suak hi. Lk 16:18
"Tua ciang leuleu-in tanglai mite kiangah, ‘Ciampel kei in; Topa tawh na kiciamnate tangtun in,’ a kici thu na zaksa uh ahi hi.
Ahi hangin ken kong geninah, tomlo peuhmah kei un: vantung, Pasian tokhom ahi manin tomlawhna-in zang kei un;
leitung, Pasian khengakna ahi manin tomlawhna-in zang kei un; Jerusalem, Kumpi Lianpa khuapi a hi manin tomlawhna-in zang kei un.
Na samzang khat nangawn vomsak, kangsak thei lo na hi manin na lutang zong tomlawhna-in zang kei un.
A hite, ‘Himah,’ a hilote, ‘Hikei,’ ci lel un. Tua bansiah peuhmah gilopa kiang pana hong pai ahi hi.
"‘Mittang tangin mittang, ha tangin ha,’g a kici thu na zaksa uh ahi hi.
Ahi hangin ken kong geninah, migilopa na nang kei un. Na pang taklam hong bet leh alang lam zong na dawh in.
Na puan-ak hong deihgawh mana thusia hong zongte, na puantualpi zong na piakbeh in.
Zawhthawh thu-a tai khat hong paipihte, tai nih dong na zui in.
Hong ngente na pia inla, hong leitawite nungngat san kei in.
"‘Na vengteh it inla, na galte mudah in,’ a kici thu na zaksa uh ahi hi.
Ahi hangin ken kong geninah, na galtei na it un; hong bawlsiate ading thu na ngetsak un.
Tua hileh vantunga na Pa uh tate na suak thei ding uh hi. Amah in miphate le misiate tungah ni tangsak a, thumaante le thumaan lote tungah guah a zusak hi.
Hong itte bek na it uh leh bang pahtakman ngah ding na hi uh hiam? Siahdongte nangawn in tua bangin hih uh hi lo ahi hiam?
Na sanggamte bek uh na muak uh leh midangte sangin a hoihzaw na bawl uh bang om ding ahi hiam? Lawkite nangawn in tua bangin hih uh hi lo ahi hiam?
Tua ahi ciangin vantunga om na Pa uh a hoihkim bangin note zong na hoihkim un.
“Note in thumaanna nasepte na sep uh ciangin mihing muh ding utna tawh mite mai-ah sem kei un. Tua bangin na sep uh leh vantunga om na Pa uh tung pan pahtakman na ngah kei ding uh hi.

"Tua ahi ciangin a tasamte na piak uh ciangin kineihsiamte in mite pahtawi ding a ut manun synagogue-te sung le lamdungah pengkul mutin, a tangko uh bangin na hih kei un. Thutak kong geninah, amaute in pahtakman a cingin a ngah zo uh hi.
Ahi hangin note in a kitasamte na piak uh ciangin na taklam khut hihna, na veilam khut theisak kei un.
Tua ciangin a sima kihihte a mu na Pa un note pahtakman hong pia ding hi.

"Note in thu na nget uh ciangin kineihsiamte bangin na hih kei un. Amaute in mite muh theihtheih dingin synagogue-te sung le lamkabom khawngah dinsa in a ngen nuam se uh hi. Thutak kong geninah, amaute in pahtakman a cingin a ngah zo uh hi.
Note in thu na nget uh ciangin na inndei sunguah pai unla, kong khakin a kimu thei lo na Pa uh kiangah na ngen un. Tua ciangin a sima kihihte a mu na Pa un note pahtakman hong pia ding hi.
Note in thu na nget uh ciangin kammal tampi kizang leh kingah diak ding ci-a a ngaihsun lawkite bangin na guitam kei un.
Na Pa un na nget ma un na kisapnate uh thei ahi manin, amaute bangin na hi kei un.
Note in hih bangin thu na ngen un: “‘Vantunga om kote Pa aw, nangma min kisiangthosak ta hen;
na gam hong tung ta hen, vantungah na deihna a kihih bangin, leitung ah zong kihih ta hen.
Ka nisim an uh tu ni-in ko hong pia in.
Ko tunga hong bate ka maisak uh bangin, kote leibate hong maisak ta in.
Zia-etna sungah hong pi kenla, gilopa panin hong hukhia in.’a ci un.
Ahang in, no tunga hong mawhte na maisak uh leh vantunga om na Pa un no zong hong maisak ding hi.
Ahi hangin mite mawhna na maisak kei uh leh note mawhnate na Pa un hong maisak lo ding hi.

"Note in an na tan uh ciangin, an a tan lam uh mite a lah nop manun a maitang uh a kilamdangsak kineihsiamte bangin na mai uh mualsak kei un. Thutak kong geninah, amaute in pahtakman a cingin ngah zo uh hi.
Ahi hangin note in an na tan uh ciangin na sam uh sathau nilh unla na mai uh phiat un.
Tua hileh an na tan lam uh mi mai-ah kilang lo dinga, a kimu lo na Pa uh maitang bekah kilang ding hi. Tua ciangin a sima kihihte a mu na Pa un note pahtakman hong pia ding hi.
"Nget le kekseu in a siatsak theihna le gutate in luh a, a guk theihna mun hih leitungah na goute uh khol kei un.
Nget le kekseu in a siatsak theih lohna le gutate in luh a, a guk theih lohna mun vantungah na goute uh khol un.
Ahang in, na goute uh omna munah na lungsim uh zong om ding hi.
"Mittang in pumpi meivak ahi hi. Na mit a hoih leh na pumpi tung khempeuh a vak ding hi.
Ahi hangin na mit a siat leh na pumpi tung khempeuh a mial ding hi. No sunga om khuavak, khuamial ahileh bangzah in a mial tazen tam!
"Kuamah in tonih na semkhawm thei lo hi. Khat itin khat a mudah hiam, khat belin a khat a simmawh hiam, khat zawsang hi ding hi. Note in Pasian nasep le sum nasep na thuahkhawm thei kei ding uh hi.

"Hong hilh tektek ka hi, na nuntak nading, na nek na dawn ding ahi zongin na pumpi uh ading, na silh na ten ding uh bangmah lunghimawh kei un. An sangin nuntakna thupizaw hi lo ahi hiam? Puansilh sangin pumpi thupizaw hi lo ahi hiam?
Huih laka leng vasate en dih un; tuate in vawh lah vawh lo, at lah at lo, ansal ah zong khol lo napi vantunga om na Pa un tuate a vak hi. Vasate sangin note manphazaw tham hi lo na hi uh hiam?
A lunghimawh manin a nuntak hun nai khat sung bek a sotto thei note lakah kua om ahi hiam?b
"Bang hangin na silh na ten ding uh lunghimawh na hi uh hiam? Gamlak a unok kungte ngaihsun dih un. Na sem loin khau lah a khek kei uh hi.
Ahi hangin Solomon nangawn a thupina na khempeuh tawh a kizep laitakin hih unok pak khat zahin zong a kizem zo kei hi, cih kong gen hi.
Upna neu mite aw, tu ni-in hih lai-ah om a, zing ciangin mei-a kikhul ding gamlak lopa kung khat Pasian in tua zahin zem ahileh note, puan hong silhsak zawtham lo ding ahi hiam?
Tua ahi ciangin, ‘Bang i ne tam? Bang i dawn tam? Bang i silh tam?’ ci-in lunghimawh kei un.
Lawkite in hih nate khempeuh nakpi in a zong uh hi. Hih nate na kisap lam uh vantunga om na Pa un a thei hi.
Ahi hangin Pasian kumpigam le ama thumaanna zong masa un. Tua hileh hih nate khempeuh hong piathuah ding hi.
Tua ahi manin zingciang ading lung himawh kei un; zingciang, amah le amah kilunghimawh na ding hi. Ni khat in ama buaina khop nei ciat hi.
“Midangte tungah thu khen kei un. Na khen uh leh no tungah zong thu hong kikhen ding hi.
Midangte tunga na khen bangun no tungah zong hong kikhen dinga, no zat tehna mah tawh no aa zong hong kitehsak ding hi.
"Nang mittanga singpek ngaihsun loin bang hanga na sanggampa mita singatvui them en na hi hiam?
Nang mittang ah singpek om napi na sanggampa kiangah, ‘Na mit-a ninthem hong lakkhiatsak ning,’ bangci cih thei na hi hiam?
Kineihsiampa aw, nang mit-a singpek lakhia masa in, tua hileh na sanggampa mit-a na lakkhiat ding ninthem na telmuh pan ding hi.
"A siangtho nate ui pia kei un. Vok mai-ah na kep manphate uh pai kei un. Tua banga na hih uh leh a tuatcil gawp khit uh ciangin kihei-in note hong balnen ding uh hi.
"Ngen un hong kipia ding hi; zong un na mu ding uh hi; kiu un kongkhak hong kihon ding hi.
Ahang in, a ngen khempeuh in a ngah uh hi; a zongte in a mu hi; a kiute ading kongkhak kihon ding hi.
Note lakah a tapa in anlum a nget ciangin suang a pia ding kua om ahi hiam?
Ahikeh ngasa a nget ciangin gul a pia ding kua om ahi hiam?
Tua ahileh note migilo hi napi, na tate uh na hoih piak ding thei na hi uh leh vantunga om na Pa un a ngente na hoih pia nuam zawtham lo ding ahi hiam!
Na khempeuh ah no tunga hong kibawl ding na deih bangun midangte tungah bawl un. Hih in Thukham le kamsangte thu khempeuh huam khin hi.
"Kong kawcik ah lut un. Ahang in, siatna a tun kongpi tanzau-in lampi zai-a mi tampi a lut hi.
Ahi hangin nuntakna a tun kongpi neu a, lampi kawcik in mi tawmcik bek a lut hi.
"Kamsang zuaute hangin na kigalging un. Amaute tuuvun silhin note kiangah hong pai uh hi; ahi hangin amaute sunglam, ngia hangsan ahi hi.
Amaute a gah un na khentel thei ding uh hi. Lingkung panin lenggah kilo ngei ahi hiam? Thangling kung panin theigah kilo ngei ahi hiam?
Tua mah bangin kung hoih in gah hoih gah a, kung hoih lo in gah hoih lo a gah hi.
A kung hoih in gah hoih lo gah thei lo a, tua mah bangin a kung hoih lo in gah hoih gah thei lo hi.
Gah hoih a gah lo singkung peuhmah kiphukin meikhukah kikhul hi.
Tua bangin amaute a gah panun na khentel thei ding uh hi.
‘Topa, Topa’ hong ci khempeuh vantung gamah a lut kim kei ding hi. Ahi hangin vantunga om ka Pa deihna banga gamtate bek a lut ding hi.
Tua ni ciangin mi tampi in ka kiangah, ‘Topa, Topa, nangma minin thu hilh hi lo ka hi uh hiam; nangma minin dawite hawlkhia in, nalamdang tampi bawl hi lo ka hi uh hiam?’ hong ci ding uh hi.
Tua ciangin, ‘Note kong thei ngei kei hi. Gitlohna a bawlte aw, kei kiang pan taikhia un!’ teltakin ka ci ding hi.
"Tua hi-a hih ka thute za-a, a zuipahte peuhmah suangpi tunga inn lam mipilpa tawh kibang hi.
Guah zu in tui khang a, huih nungin tua inn a nawk hi. Ahi zongin suangpi tunga bulkip nei ahi manin tua inn a puk kei hi.
Ka thute za napi, a zuipah lote sehnel tunga inn lam mihaipa tawh kibang hi.
Guah zu-a tui khangin, huih nunga tua inn a nawk ciangin pukgawp hi,” a ci hi.
Hih thu teng a gen khit ciangin mihonte in Jesu thuhilhnate lamdang a sa uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in thukham siate bang hi loin thuneipa khat bangin a hilh hi.
Mualpang pan Jesu a paisuk ciangin mihon tampi in amah zui uh hi.
Miphaka khat va pai-a a mai-ah khukdinin, “Topa aw, ut peuh lecin nong siangsak thei hi,” a ci hi.
Jesu in a khut zanin tuapa lawnga, “Ka ut hi. Siang ta in!” a ci hi. Thakhatin a phak natna a damb pah hi.
Tua ciangin Jesu in ama kiangah, “Kuama kiangah gen kei in. Ahi hangin pai-in siampipa kiangah va kilak inla amaute tunga teci panna-in Moses thupiak bangin biakna na pia in,” a ci hi.
Capernaum ah Jesu a lut ciangin ama kiangah zakhat-uk bupa va pai-in huhna a ngen hi.
"Topa aw, ka nasempa pumzawtin lumcip-a, a gim mahmah hi,” a ci hi.
Jesu in, “Hong pai-in ka damsak ding hi,” a ci hi.
Zakhat-ukpa in, “Topa aw, ka inn sungah nang kong lutsak ding kilawm lo hi. Kammal khat gen ziau lecin ka nasempa dam ding hi.

Kei mahmah zong thuneihna nuai-a om mi ka hi-a, keima nuai-ah galkapte a om hi. Khat kiangah, ‘Pai in,’ ka cihleh pai-a, adang khat kiangah, ‘Hong pai in,’ ka cihleh hong pai hi. Ka nasempa kiangah, ‘Hih sem in,’ ka cih ciangin a sem hi,” a ci hi.
Jesu in hih thu a zak ciangin lamdang sa a, amah a zuite kiangah, “Thutak kong geninah, Israel-te lakah hih zah-a lian upna a nei khat beek ka mu nai kei hi.
Ken kong cihinah, ni suahna le nitumna pan mi tampi hong pai-in vantung gam pawipi-ah Abraham, Isaac le Jacob-te tawh a tukhawm ding uh hi.
Ahi hangin kumpi-gam mite ahi uh leh kahna le hagawina a omna mun khuamial lakah kipaii ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Jesu in zakhat-ukpa kiangah, “Pai in. A piang dinga na up bangin piang ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua hun lianin a nasempa a dam hi.
Peter inn sungah Jesu a lut ciangin Peter sungnu nattuna lupna-a lum a mu hi.
Jesu in a khut lawnsaka, nattun a dam hi. Amah tho in zin a do hi.
Nitak lam ciangin dawilut mi tampite ama kiangah paipih uh a, kammal khat tawh dawite hawlkhia in cina khempeuh a damsak hi.
Hih in kamsangpa Isaiah tunga genkholhna: “I zawngkhalnate amah in la-a, i natnate a pua hi,”c cih thu a tangtunna ahi hi.
Jesu in a kima mihonpite a muh ciangin tuili galkhat lama pai dingin thu a pia hi.
Tua laitakin thukham siapa khat va pai-a, “Sia aw, na paina peuhpeuh ah kong zui ding hi,” a ci hi.
Jesu in, “Ngiate in kua nei a, huihlak vasate in bu nei uh hi. Ahi hangin Mihing Tapa in a lutang ngak nading mun a nei kei hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Nungzui dang khat in, “Topa aw, va ciahin ka pa va vui masa phot leng,” a ci hi.
Ahi hangin Jesu in, “Ka nung hong zui in, misite in amau misite na vui uh hen,” ci-in a gen hi.
Tua ciangin amah gunkuang sungah tuanga, a nungzuite in a zui uh hi.
Theih kholh lohin tui tungah huihpi nasiatakin kinuai a, tuihualte in gunkuang a zialnelh hi. Ahi hangin Jesu a ihmu lai hi.
Nungzuite pai-in, “Topa, hong honkhia in! Tui ka kia petmah uh hi!” ci-in a phong uh hi.
Amah in, “No upna neute aw, bang dinga tua zah a lau lawmlawm na hi uh hiam?” ci-in a dawng hi. Tua ciangin amah tho a huih le tuihualte a tai ciangin a daipah dikdek hi.
Tua mite in lamdang sa mahmah uh a, “Hih pa bangci mi hiam? Huih le tuihual nangawn in a thu a mang tazen a!” a kici uh hi.
A galkhat lam Gadarenesd kualah Jesu a tun ciangin hanlak, panin dawilut mi nih paikhia-in na dawntuah uh hi. Amaute ngongtat lua uh ahi manin tua lai tawn ngam kuamah a om kei hi.
Amaute in, “Pasian Tapa aw, ko bang cih hong sawm na hi hiam? A kisehsa hun a tun ma-in kote bawlsia dinga hih lai-a hong pai na hi hiam?” ci-in a kiko uh hi.
Tua pan a gamla simah vok honpi khat a gamta hi.
Dawite in Jesu kiangah, “Ko nong hawlkhiat leh vokte sungah hong lutsak tapeuh in,” ci-in a ngen uh hi.
Jesu in amaute kiangah, “Pai un!” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amaute pusuak in vokte sungah a lut uh hi. Vok honte kensang pan tuili sungah tuaksukin a si khin uh hi.
Vok cingte khuapi sungah tai uh a, dawilutte gel tunga thupiang le hih thu teng a ko uh hi.
Tua ciangin Jesu dawn dingin khuazangpi in a kuankhia uh hi. Amah a muh uh ciangin amaute in tua kual a nusiat nadingin a thum uh hi.
Gunkuang tungah Jesu tuanga galkahin ama khua a tung hi.

Mi pawlkhat in pumzaw khat zawngin ama kiangah va paipih uh a, phek tungah a sial uh hi. Jesu in amau upna a muh ciangin pumzawpa kiangah, “Ka tapa aw, lungkhauh in; na mawhnate kimaisak zo hi,” a ci hi. 4:13; Jn 16:33
Hih thu ah, thukham siate pawlkhat in, “Hih pa in Pasian a gendai hi,” a ci uh hi.
Jesu in amau ngaihsutna thei ahi ciangin, “Bang hangin na lungsim uhah thusia ngaihsun na hi uh hiam?
‘Na mawhnate kimaisak zo hi,’ cih ding baihzaw ahi hiam? ‘Tho inla pai in,’ cih ding baihzaw ahi hiam?
Ahi hangin Mihing Tapa in hih leitungah mawhnate maisak theihna thu nei hi, cih na theih nadingun....” a cih khit ciangin pumzawpa kiangah, “Tho in, na phek la inla ciah in,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin cinapa thoin a innah a ciah hi.
Mihonpite in hih thu a muh uh ciangin lamdang a sa mahmah uh a, hih bang thuneihna mihingte tunga a pia Pasian a phat uh hi.
Tua lai pan Jesu pai lai-a siahdonna bukno-a tu Matthew kici mi khat a mu hi. Ama kiangah, “Kei hong zui in,” a cih ciangin Matthew dingto in a zui hi.
Matthew innah Jesu in nitak-an a nek laitakin siahdongte tampitak le mawhneite tampi va pai uh a, Jesu le nungzuite tawh ankuang a um khawm uh hi.
Pharisee-te in hih a muh ciangin, “Na siapa un bang hangin siahdongte le mawhneite tawh ankuang umkhawm ahi hiam?” ci-in a nungzuite a dong uh hi.
Jesu in hih thu a zak ciangin, “Siavuan kisam cidamte hi loin cinate hizaw hi.
Pai unla,a Kei lunggulh biakpiakna hi loin lainatna hizaw hi,’ a kici bang gennopna hiam, va sin un. Ahang in, mi thumaante sam dinga hong pai hi loin mawhneite sam dinga hong pai ka hi hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin John nungzuite va pai uh a, “Ko le Pharisee-te in an ka tang uh hi, bang hangin na nungzuite in tang lo uh hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi.
Jesu in, “Zineipa tawh a omkhawm kimlai bangci in mopawi simte dah thei ding uh ahi hiam? Zineipa amau kiang pan a kilakkhiat hun hong tung ding hi. Tua ciangin amaute in an a tang ding uh hi.
"Kuamah in puanthakin puanlui a thuap ngei kei hi. Puanthakin puanlui kithuap leh puanlui kaikekin a kek beh zaw ding hi.

Kuamah in savun-um lui sungah lenggahzu thak thun ngei lo hi. Tua bangin kithun leh savun-um kitamin lenggahzu bua dinga savun-um a kisia ding hi. Savun-um thak sungah lenggahzu thak a kithun ciangin a nihin sia lo a, kikembit thei hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Hih thu a gen laitakin ukpa khat va pai-a amai-ah khukdinin, “Ka tanu tu mahmah in si hi. Ahi hangin hong pai-in ama tungah na khut nga lecin hing ding hi,” a ci hi.
Jesu dingto-in amah a zui hi. A nungzuite in zong a zui uh hi.
Tua laitakin kum sawm le nih hul siluang natna a vei numei khat Jesu nunglamah pai-a, a puantualpi mongtep a lawng hi.
Amah in, “A puantualpi lawngkha peuh leng ka dam ding hi,” a kici hi.
Jesu kihei-in tuanu a mu hi. Jesu in, “Ka tanu aw, lungkhauh in. Na upna in nang hong damsak zo hi,” a ci hi. Tua hun lianin tua numei a dampah hi.
Ukpa innah Jesu a tun ciangin tamngai mutte le mipi gamlum a mu hi.
Amaute kiangah, “Na kihemkhia dih un. Numeino a si hi lo hi; a ihmu ahi hi,” a ci hi. Ahi hangin amaute in amah a nuihsan uh hi.
Mihonpite a kipusuahsak khit ciangin Jesu tuma numeino khut a let leh numeino a thoto hi.
Hih thu tua kual tengah a kizel hi.
Tua panin Jesu a paikhiat ciangin mittaw nih in ama nung zui a, “David Tapa aw, kote hong lainat in!” ci-in a galsap uh hi.

Amah inn sungah a lut khit ciangin tua mittawte gel a kiangah va pai uh hi. Amah in, “Hih bang hih thei dingin nong um uh hiam?” ci-in amaute a dong hi. Amaute in, “Kong um uh hi, Topa aw,” ci-in a dawng uh hi.
Tua ciangin amaute mit lawnsak a, “Na up uh bangin note tungah kihih ta hen,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin khua a mu thei uh hi. Jesu in amaute kiangah, “Hih thu kuamah theisak kei un,” ci-in khauhtakin a kham hi.
Ahi hangin tua kual bupah amaute paikhia in hih thu a thehzak uh hi.
Amaute a paikhiat laitakun, dawilut-a, a pau thei lo mi khat Jesu kiangah a paipih uh hi.
Dawi a kihawlkhiat khit ciangin tua a pau thei lo pa a pau thei hi. Mihonpite in lamdang sa uh a, “Israel gamah hih bang thu a kimu ngei nai kei hi,” a ci uh hi.
Ahi hangin Pharisee-te in, “Dawite kumpitapa suangin dawite a hawlkhia hi,” a ci uh hi.
Khuapi le khuaneu khempeuh ah Jesu pai kawikawi a, amaute synagogue-te ah vantung gam tawh kisai lungdamna thu hilhin natna satna namkim a damsak hi.
Amah in mihonpite a muh ciangin a cing om lo tuute bangin cimawh le lungnuam loin om uh ahi manin amaute a khuatuah hi.
Tua ciangin a nungzuite kiangah, “An lak ding tampi om a, ahi hangin nasem ding mi tawm hi.
Tua ahi ciangin lo sungah an la ding mi tampi hong sawl nadingin an la Topa kiangah ngen un,” a ci hi.
Amah in a nungzui sawm le nihte samin kha gilotea a hawlkhiat theih nading uh le natna satna namkim a damsak theih nadingun thuneihna a pia hi.
Hihte, sawltakpi sawm-le-nihte min ahi hi: Amasa penin Simon (Peter kici) le a sanggampa Andrew; Zebedee tapa James le a saggampa John;
Philip le Bartholomew; Thomas le siah dong Matthew; Alphaeus tapa James le Thaddaeus;
Zealot pawl-a Simon le Jesu lehhekpa Judas Iscariot-te ahi hi.
Jesu in sawm-le-nihte thu hilhin hih bangin a sawlkhia hi: “Gentile-te lakah pai kei unla Samaria-te khua ah zong lut kei un.
Israel tuu mangthangte lak bekah pai un.
Na pai kawmun, ‘Vantung gam hong nai ta hi,’ cih thupuak va hilh un.
Cinate damsak unla misite thosak un. Miphakteb siangsak unla, dawite hawlkhia un. Man nei lo-a na ngah bangun man nei loin na pia un.
Na kawnggak sung uhah kham, ngun le sumsante khat beek vom kei un.
Na khualzinna uhah thung-ip ahi zongin puantungsilh val ahi zongin khedap le ciangkhutte keng kei un. Ahang in, nasemte in a nekkhop ding uh ngah na ding uh hi.
Khuapi ahikeh khuaneu khat peuh peuhah na lut uh ciangin zintun nadinga kilawm mi zong unla, na ciah mateng uh tuapa innah om un.
Tua innah na lut uh ciangin hopih masa un.
Tua innah nopna a tung dinga kilawm ahileh na piak uh nopna om ta hen; a kilawm lo ahileh na piak uh nopna no tungah hong kileh kik ta hen.
Note hong sang lo, na thu uh a ngai nuam lo khua le innte na nusiat uh ciangin na khepek-ua leivuite na singkhia un.
Thutak kong geninah, thukhen ni ciangin tua khua thuak nading sangin Sodom le Gomorrah thuakna a zangzaw ding hi.
"Ngiate lakah tuute bangin note kong sawlkhia hi. Tua ahi ciangin gul bangin na pilvang unla, vakhu bangin na cinghkam un.
Ahi hangin mite lakah na kigalging un; amaute in tualsung vaihawmte khutah note hong puak ding uh a, amaute synagogue-te sungah note hong sat ding uh hi.
Keima hangin gam-ukte le kumpite mai-ah hong puak ding uh a, tuate tung le Gentile-te tungah ka teci na hi ding uh hi.
Ahi hangin note hong mat uh ciangin bang ka gen ding hiam, bang ka ci gen ding hiam, ci-in lunghimawh kei un. Tua hun ciangin na gen ding uh hong kihilh ding hi.
Ahang in, no a gen hi loin no tungtawnin na Pa uh’ Kha in a gen ding hi.
"Sungkhat suak unau khat le khat ahi zongin, pata ahi zongin, sih nading dongin a kilehhek ding uh hi. Nu le pa-te langah tate pang ding uh a, thatsak ding uh hi.
Keima hangin mi khempeuh in note hong mudah ding uh hi. Ahi hangin a tawp donga kipte kihonkhia ding hi.
Mun khatah bawlsiatna na thuak uh leh a mundang khatah na tai un. Thutak kong geninah, Mihing Tapa hong pai ma-in Israel gam khuapite na sikkim man kei ding uh hi.
"Sang naupangte a siate sangin siamzaw lo-a, nasemte a pu sangin a lianzaw kei hi.
Sang naupangte a siapa a bata nasemte a pu a bat nak leh phazo hi. Inn sunga pa pen Beelzebubc a kicih leh a innkuanpihte kinak cih ngel ve!
"Tua ahi ciangin amaute na kihta kei un. A kilakkhia lo dinga kiselcip bangmah a om kei hi; a kitheikhia lo dinga ki-imcip zong bangmah a om kei hi.
Khuamial sunga note kong hilhte khuavak sungah gen un. Na bil-ua hong kihuausimte innkhum pan na tangko un.
Pumpi a thah hangin kha a that thei lote kihta kei un. Kha le pumpi meili sunga a siasak thei pa na kihta zaw un.
Kawlgit nih in dangkasand khat man lel hi lo ahi hiam? Ahi zongin na Pa uh deihna ahikeh tuate khat nangawn zong lei-ah a mawk kiat kei ding hi.
Na lu ua samzang khempeuh zong kisim khin hi.
Tua ahi ciangin lau kei un; Kawlgit tampi sangin na manphazaw uh hi.
"Mite mai-a kei hong gumte peuh mah vantunga om ka Pa mai-ah kei zong ka gum ding hi.
Mite mai-a hong kitheihmawhbawlte peuhmah vantunga om ka Pa mai-ah ka kitheihmawhbawl ding hi.
"Leitungah kilemna puak dingin hong pai hi, ci-in na vawh kha kei un. Kilemna puak dinga hong pai ka hi kei-a namsau khah dinga hong pai ka hizaw hi.
" ‘A pa langah tapa pangsak ding, a nu langah tanu pangsak ding, a teknu langah monu pangsak ding –
mi khat gal ama innkuanpihte mah a hisak dinga’e hong pai ka hi hi.
"Kei sangin a nu a pa a itzawte peuhmah kei adingin a cin kei hi. Kei sangin a tanu, a tapate a itzawte peuhmah kei adingin a cin kei hi.
Ama singlamteh kisuana ka nung hong zui lote peuhmah kei adingin a cin kei hi.
Ama nuntakna a hu nuamte peuhmah in taan dinga keima hanga a nuntakna a taan peuhmah in a nuntakna a hu ding hi.
"No hong sangte, kei hong sang hi-a, kei hong sangte, kei hong sawlpa a sang ahi hi.
Kamsangpa, kamsang ahi mana a sang peuhmah in kamsangpa pahtakman a ngah ding hi. Thumaan mipa, mi thumaan ahi mana a sang peuhmah in thumaan mipa pahtakman a ngah ding hi.
Thutak kong geninah, hih naupangnote lakah khat peuhpeuh keima nungzui ahi mana tuisik hai khat a suah peuhmah in ama pahtakman a taan peuhmah kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Jesu in a nungzui sawm le nihte a thuhilh khit ciangin tua lai pan Galileea gama khuapite ah thugen ding le thuhilh dingin a paisuak lai hi.
John in thong sung pan Khrist nasepna a zak ciangin a nungzuite sawl a,
"Hong pai ding pa mah na hi hiam. Midang khatpeuh ka na lamen lai ding uh hiam?” ci-in a dongsak hi.
Jesu in, “Note ciah kik unla na zaksa uh le na muhsa uh thu teng John kiangah va ko un:
Mittawte in khua mu a, khebaite lam pai-in, miphakteb damsiang uh a, bilngongte in khua za hi; misite kithosakin, mizawngte kiangah lung damna thu kigen hi.
Kei hanga a pukmang lo mi thupha ngah ahi hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
John nungzuite a dinkhiat laitakun Jesu in mihonpite kiangah John thu hih bangin a gen hi: “Bang en dingin gamlakah pai na hi uh hiam? Huih muta huang pumpeng en ding na hi uh hiam?
Ahikeh bang en dinga paikhia na hi uh hiam? Puan hoih silhte en dinga paikhia na hi uh hiam? Hi lo hi. Puan hoih silhte kumpite inn sungah om uh hi.
Tua ahileh bang en dingin paikhia na hi uh hiam? Kamsangpa en dingin maw? Hi mah hi, ken kong geninah, kamsangpa sangin a lianzaw hi.
‘Ka thu puapa na mai-ah ka sawl dinga, amah in nangma mai-ah na lampi ding a sialkhol ding hi,’c ci-a kigelhpa hih pa ahi hi.
Thutak kong geninah, numei sung pana suakte lakah Baptize-pa John sanga lianzaw kuamah a khangkhia nai kei hi. Ahi zongin vantung gam ah a neupen nangawn amah sangin lianzaw hi.
Baptize-pa John hun-a kipan tu dong thahat thu-in vantung gam in ma kek a, mihatte in a lenkip hi.
Ahang in, Kamsangte khempeuh le Thukham in, John hun dong thu na gen khol zo hi.
Na san nop uh leh amah, hong pai ding pa Elijah ahi hi.
Bil nei peuh in za ta hen.
"Hih khang mite bang tawh ka genteh ding hiam? Sumzuakna munah tu a:
"‘Tamngai kong mutsak uh hangin na lam kei uh hi; dahla ka sak uh hangin lah, na kap kei uh hi,’ ci-a kigal to naupangte tawh kibang uh hi.
Ahang in, ne lo dawn loin John hong pai-a, ‘Dawi lawmnei pa hi,’ a ci uh hi.
Mihing Tapa hong pai ciangin ne-in dawna, ‘An hai zu hai pa, siahdongte le “Mawhneite” lawmpa hi,’ a ci zel uh hi. Ahi hangin pilna ahileh a sepnate in amaan ahina a lak hi.
Tua ciangin nalamdang a tam pen a bawlna khuapite kisik lo uh ahi manin Jesu in mawhpaih a,

"Korazin aw, gimna nak thuak na nicia! Bethsaida aw, gimna nak thuak na nicia! No sunga kibawl nalamdangte Tyre le Sidon khuate ah kibawl hileh amaute in sawtpi in, ippi puan silhin, vut kibuakin a kisik zo ta ding uh hi.
Ahi hangin ken kong geninah, thukhen ni ciangin no thuak ding sangin Tyre le Sidon-te thuakna zangzaw ding hi.

Nang Capernaum aw, vanlai dongin hong kilaamto ding ahi hiam? Hi peuhmah lo hi, a thuk pennad mun dongin na kiasuk ding hi. Nang sunga kibawl nalamdangte Sodom ah kibawl kha hileh tuni dong tua khuapi kip lai ding hi.
Ahi hangin thukhen ni cianga nang thuak ding sangin Sodom thuakna zangzaw ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua hun laitakin Jesu in, “Leitung le vantung Topa, Pa aw, mipilte le misiamte tungah hih thute na im a, naupangnote tungah lakkhia na hi manin nang kong phat hi.
Hihi Pa aw, hih in nangma deihna ahi hi.
"Ka Pa in na khempeuh kei hong ap zo hi. Pa longal kuamah in Tapa a thei kei hi. Tapa le Tapa in amah a lah theih nadinga a teel mite longal in Pa a thei kei uh hi.
"Vangik pua a gim mite khempeuh aw, ka kiangah hong pai ta un; tawldamna kong pia ding hi.
Keima hakkol kisuan unla kei kiangah kisin ta un. Ahang in, keimah lungsim nem le lungsim ki niamkhiat mi ka hi hi, na hinna un tawldamna a ngah ding hi.
Ahang in, ka hakkol nuam in ka van zong a zang hi.
Tua hun lai Sabbath ni khat buhlei tawnin Jesu a pai hi. A nungzuite a gil uh kial a, buhvui zutin a ne uh hi.
Pharisee-te in a muh uh ciangin ama kiangah, “En dih in! Na nungzuite Sabbath ni-in thukham tawh kituak loin a gamta uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Jesu in, “David le a pawlte in a gilkial laitakun bang hih uh cih sim ngei lo na hi uh hiam?
Pasian inn sungah lutin amau ading ahi lo, siampite ading beka kisiangsaksa anlumte a ne uh hi.
Ahikeh siampite in biakinnpi sungah Sabbath ni a tan loh uh hangin mawhpeng hi veve uh hi, cih Thukham sungah sim kha ngei lo na hi uh hiam?
Biakinnpi sanga lianzaw khata hih lai-ah a om hi, cih kong gen hi.
‘Kei lunggulh in biakpiakna hi loin lainatna hizaw hi.’b cih thu a khiatna thei khin hi le uh cin a mawhpengte na mawhpaih kei ding uh hi.
Mihing Tapa, Sabbath ni Topa ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Tua mun pan paikhia-a amaute synagogue sungah a lut hi.
Tua lai-ah a khut langkhat a tem mi khat a om hi. Amaute in Jesu mawhna a zon nop manun, “Sabbath ni-in cina damsak ding thukham tawh a kituak hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi.
Jesu in amaute kiangah, “Note lakah khatpeuh in tuu khat nei in, tua tuu Sabbath ni-in kawhawm ah kia zenzen leh, lakhia lo ding na hi uh hiam?
Tuu sangin mihing bangzahin manphazaw ahi hiam! Tua ahi ciangin Sabbath ni-in a hoih bawl ding thukham tawh kituak hi,” a ci hi.
Tua khit ciangin amah in khuttempa kiangah, “Na khut zan in,” ci-in a sawl hi. Amah in a khut a zan leh a langkhat mah bangin a sa dim a, a damsiang kiuhkeuh hi.
Ahi hangin Pharisee-te paikhia uh a, Jesu thah theih nading zia a geelsim uh hi.
Jesu in hih thu thei-a tua mun pan a kihemkhia hi. Mi tampi in a mah zui uh a, cinate khempeuh damsak in,
amah kua hiam cih a gen loh nadingun a kham hi.
Hih in kamsangpa Isaiah tungtawna kigen:
"Ka it ka lung hong kimsak, ka teel ka nasempa hih lai-ah om hi; ama tungah ka Kha ka koih dinga, minamte tungah thutang a tangko ding hi.
Amah in kuamah tawng lo, kiko lo dinga, kongzing lakah kuamah in ama aw a za kei ding hi.
Thutang a gualzawhsak mateng, satliamsa pumpeng kuaitan lo dinga, mei kuang liakliak a sumit kei ding hi.
Minamte in a lametna uh ama minah a nga ding uh hi,”c cih thu a tangtun nading ahi hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in mittaw-a pauthei lo, dawilut mi khat ama kiangah va puak uh a, tuapa in khua mu thei a, a pau theih nading in Jesu in a na damsak hi.
Mite khempeuh in lamdang sa uh a, “Hih pa David Tapa ahi kha thei tam?” a ci uh hi.
Ahi hangin hih thu Pharisee-te in a zak uh ciangin, “Hih pa in dawite kumpitapa Beelzebubd bek suangin dawite a hawlkhia hi,” a ci uh hi.
Jesu in amaute ngaihsutna thei-a, amaute kiangah, “Amah le amah ki langpanga kikhenthang gam a sia ding hi;amah le amah kilangpanga ki khenthang khuapi ahi a, innkuan ahi zongin a kip kei ding hi.
Satan in Satan hawlkhia leh amah le amah a kilem lo ahi hi. Tua hileh ama gam bangci kip thei ding ahi hiam?
Ken Beelzebub suangin dawite hawlkhia ka hileh na mite un kua suangin tuate hawlkhia ahi uh hiam? Tua ahi ciangin amaute no tungah thukhente a suak ding uh hi.
Ahi hangin Pasian Kha suanga hawlkhia ka hileh note tungah Pasian gam hong tung zo hi.
"Tua tham loin mi khatpeuh in mihatpa hencip masa loin tuapa inn sungah lutin a neihsa bangci puak khiatsak thei ding ahi hiam? A hencip khit ciangin a inn luh thei pan ding hi.
"Kei hong koppih lote kei langa pang ahi hi. Kei hong kaihkhoppih lote a thehthang ahi hi.
Tua ahi ciangin ken kong geninah, mawhna le Pasian gen daina khempeuh kimaisak zo dinga, ahi hangin langpanga Kha gendaina a kimaisak zo kei ding hi.
Mihing Tapa a langgente peuhmah kimaisak dinga, ahi hangin Khasiangtho a langgen peuhmah tu khang ahi zongin, hong tung ding khang ahi zongin a kimaisak kei ding hi.
"Singkung a gah in kikhentel thei ahi manin a kung na hoihsak un, tua hileh gah hoih a gah ding hi; a kung na hoihsak kei un, tua hileh gah hoih lo a gah ding hi.
No mualtan suante aw, migilo note in bangci in thu hoih gen thei ding na hi uh hiam? Ahang in, lungsim a dimlet ciangin kamah pusuak pan hi.
Mi hoih in a sunga a kholsa na hoihte pusuah a, migilo in a sunga a kholsa na hoih lote a pusuah hi.
Ahi hangin mite in amau motpaunasate uh tawh kisai-in thukhen ni ciangin a telin a gen ding uh hi.
Ahang in, nomau kammalte tawh kizui-in note na mawhpeng ding uh a, nomau kam malte tawh kizui-in note hong kimawhpaih ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Pharisee-te le thukham siate kimkhat in ama kiangah, “Sia aw, nang khut panin lim lamdang khat ka mu nuam uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Jesu in, “A tatsia le angkawm hat no tu khang mite in lah lim lamdang nong ngen tazen ua! Kamsangpa Jonah lim longal lim dang hong kilak kei ding hi.
Ahang in, ngapi gil sungah Jonah sun thum le zan thum a om mah bangin Mihing Tapa zong lei sungah sun thum le zan thum a om ding hi.

Thukhen ni ciangin hih khang mite langah Nineveh a mite ding ding uh a, a mawhpaih ding uh hi. A hang in, Jonah thuhilhna hangin amaute a kisik uh hi. Tu-in hih lai-ah Jonah sanga lianzaw mi khate a om hi.

Thukhen ni ciangin hih khang mite langah Leitaw-lam Kumpinu dingin a mawhpaih ding hi. Ahang in, tua Kumpinu, Solomon pilna ngai dingin leimong panin a pai hi. Tu-in Solomon sanga lianzaw hih lai-ah a om hi.
"Mi khat sung pan kha gilof khat pusuak-a, a khawl nading a keuna mun zongin a vak kawikawi hangin a mu kei hi.
Tua ciangin, ‘Ka nusiatsa innah ciah kik ning,’ ci hi. A tun kik ciangin tua inn awng a, kiphiat siangin a kipuah sinsen a mu hi.

Tua ciangin amah pai-a amah sanga tatsiazaw adang kha sagihte zawnin, tua lai-ah a va teng uh hi. Tua mipa omdan nunung in a masa sangin a siazaw hi. Hih a tatsia khang mite zong tua mah bang ahi ding uh hi.
Jesu in mihonpite kiangah thu a hilh laitakin amah hopih nuamin a nu le a sanggamte inn pua-ah ding uh hi.
Mi khat in, “Na nu le na sanggamte nang hong hopih nuamin inn pua-ah ding uh hi,”g ci-in a gen hi.
Amah in, “Ka nu kua hi-a, ka sang gamte kua ahi hiam?” a cih khit ciangin
a nungzuite kawka, “Ka nute ka saggamte hih lai-ate ahi hi.
Ahang in, vantung a om ka Pa deihna a hih peuhpeuh ka sanggam-nu, ka saggampa le ka nu ahi hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Tua ni mah in tua inn pan Jesu paikhia a, tuilipi gei-ah a tu hi.
A kimkotah mi tam lua ahi manin amah gunkuang sungah pai-in a tu hi. Mihonte a hileh tuigei ah a ding uh hi.
Amah in gentehnate-in na tampi gena: “Lokhopa khat ama khaici vawh dingin a kuankhia hi.
Khaici a theh ciangin pawlkhat lam-dungah tu-a vasate pai-in a nemang uh hi.
Pawlkhatte leitak tam lohna mun suang lakah a tu hi. Leitak dai ahi manin popah sam hi.
Ahi hangin ni a san ciangin ankungte kangdulh a, zung kha lo ahi manin a vulpah hi.
Pawlkhat ling lakah tu-a a po tei hangin lingkung in a depgawp hi.
A dang pawlkhat pen lei hoihna ah tu-in, a kivawh zah za khat, azah sawmguk, azah sawmthum a gahkhia hi.
Bil nei peuh in za ta hen,” a ci hi.
Ama kiangah nungzuite va pai uh a, “Bang hangin gentehnate tawh mite hilh na hi hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi.
Amah in, “Vantung gam thusimte theih theihna no tungah hong kipiak hangin amaute tungah a kipia kei hi.
A nei peuhpeuh kipiakbeh ding a, tampitak a nei ding hi. A nei lo peuhmah tung panin a neihsa nangawn kilakkhiatsak ding hi.
Hih thu hangin amaute kiangah gentehnate ka gen hi: “Amaute in en napi a mutel thei kei uh hi; amaute in ngai napi zatel thei loin a theitel thei kei uh hi.
Amaute tungah kamsangpa Isaiah in: ‘“Note in na zak ngitnget uh hangin, na theitel ngei kei ding uh hi; na muh ngitnget uh hangin na mutel ngei kei ding uh hi.

Hih mite lungtang kheeng lua ahi manin; a bil uh tawh za mialmial in, a mit uh si uh hi. Tua hi kei leh a mit-un mu-in a bil uh tawh za-in a lungtang uh tawh theitel in kihei ding uh a, amaute ka damsak kha ding hi,’a ci-a a genkholhna tangtung hi.
"Note na hi uh leh na mitun mu thei na hi manun na mit uh thupha ngah hi-a; na bilun za thei na hi manun na bil uh thupha ngah ahi hi.
Thutak kong geninah, kamsangte le mi thumaan tampite in na muhte uh a muh nop uh hangin mu lo uh a, na zakte uh a zak nop uh hangin a za kei uh hi.
"Tua ahileh khaici vawhpa tawh gentehna bang cihnopna hiam, cih na ngai un:
Mi khatpeuh in vantung gam thu a zak hangin a theihtel kei leh, gilopa pai-in a lungtang sunga kivawhsate a sutkhia hi. Hih khaici pen lamdunga tute ahi hi.
Suang laka tute ahileh thu a zak ciangin lungdamin thakhatin a sangpahte ahi hi.
Ahi hangin zung kha lo ahi manin tawmvei sung bek a hing zo hi. Thu hangin lungmanna ahi zongin bawlsiatna ahi zongin a tun ciangin pukmang pah hi.
Ling laka tute ahileh thu za napi hih leitung nuntak nading lunghimawhna le hauhna’ khemna in depgawp a gah a gah lote ahi hi.
Ahi hangin lei hoihna-a tute ahileh thu a zak uh ciangin a theitel pah mipa ahi hi. Tuate a kivawh zah za khat, azah sawmguk, azah sawmthum a gahpa ahi hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Jesu in gentehna dang khat gen a: “Vantung gam pen ama lo sunga khaici hoih a vawh mi khat tawh kibang hi.
Ahi hangin mi ihmut kalin a galpa va pai-a buh kivawhna ah tahum a vawh khit ciangin a paikhia hi.
Buh poto in a vuih ciangin tahumte zong a kilang hi.
"Lo nei pa kiangah nasemte pai uh a, ‘Pu aw, na lo sungah khaici hoih vawh hi lo na hi hiam! Hih tahumte koi pana hong piang ahi hiam?’ ci uh hi.
"Amah in, ‘Hih in galpa hih ahi hi,’ ci-in dawng hi. “A nasemte in, ‘Pai-in va botkhia le ung na phal hiam?’ ci-in dong uh hi.
"‘Tahumte bot le uh cin buh tawh botkhawm kha ding na hi manun ka phal kei hi.

Anlak hun mateng pokhawm tadih hen. Tua hun ciangin anlate kiangah: Tahumte khawm masa unla khultum dingin a lomlomin hen un; tua ciangin buh teng kaikhawm unla, ka sal sungah na koih un,’ ka ci ding hi,” a ci hi.
Jesu in amaute tungah gentehna dang khat gena: “Vantung gam in mi khatin a lo sungah a cin ankam tang tawh kibang hi.

Tua ankam tang, khaici khempeuh lak pan a neu pen hangin a khan ciangin huan ankungte khempeuh lakah a lian pen ahi hi; kungpi a suah ciangin vana vasate pai-in a hiangte tungah a tuang uh hi,” a ci hi.
Jesu in gentehna dang khat genbeh lai-a: “Vantung gam in, numei khat in a mekman buhnel lompib khat a tawkkim zo-a kisawh silngo tawh kibang hi,” a ci hi.
Jesu in mihonpite kiangah hih thute khempeuh gentehna tawh a hilh hi. Gentehna zang loin amaute kiangah bangmah a gen kei hi.
Hih in kamsangpa tungtawna kigen: “Gentehnate zangin ka kamka dinga, leitung piansak cil-a kipan a ki-imcip thute ka genkhia ding hi,”c cih thu a tangtunna ahi hi.
Tua ciangin mihonpite nusia in inn sungah a lut hi. Nungzuite a kiangah va pai uh a, “Lo sunga tahumte tawh gentehna hong hilhcian dih in,” a ci uh hi.
Jesu in, “Khaici hoih a vawhpa, Mihing Tapa ahi hi.
Lo sung pen leitung hi-a khaici hoih in kumpi-gam tapate cihna ahi hi. Tahum ahileh gilopa tate cihna ahi hi.
Tua tahum tangte a vawh galpa in dawimangpa ahi hi. An lak hun in tu khang bei hun hi-a anlate in vansawltakte ahi hi.
"Tahumte kibotin mei-ah a kikhul mah bangin, tu khanghun a bei ciangin zong tua mah bang ahi ding hi.
Mihing Tapa in ama vansawltakte sawlkhia dinga, a gam sungah mawhna a piangsak na khempeuh le gitlohna a hihte khempeuh a botkhiasak ding hi.
Tua vansawltakte in amaute a sa mahmah mei-am khukpi sungah a khul ding uh hi. Tua munah kahna le hagawina a om ding hi.
A thumaante ahileh tua hun ciangin amau Pa gam sungah ni bangin a tang ding uh hi. Bil nei peuh in za ta hen.
"Vantung gam in lo lai-a kisel gou tawh kibang hi. Mi khat in tua gou a muh ciangin sel-a, lungdamin ciaha, a neih khempeuh a zuak khit ciangin tua lo a lei hi.
"Khat leuleu ah vantung gam in kepmanpha hoih a zong sumbukpa tawh kibang hi.
Tam a man mahmah kep manpha khat a muh ciangin ciah kika, a neih khempeuh a zuak khit ciangin tua kepmanpha a lei hi.
"Khatvei leuleu, vantung gam in, tui sunga a kikhuh ciangin ngasa namkim a awk len tawh kibang hi.
Len dima ngasa a awk khit ciangin ngasa bengte in tui gei-ah a kaikhia uh hi. Tua ciangin amaute tu uh a, ngasa hoih teng khawmin bawm sungah koih uh a, a hoih lo teng a pai uh hi.
Tu khanghun a bei ciangin hih bang ahi ding hi: Vansawltakte hong pai-in mi thumaante lak pan a tatsia mite khenkhia ding uh a,
a sa mahmah mei-am khukpi sungah a khul ding uh hi. Tua mun ah kahna le hagawina a om ding hi” a ci hi.
Jesu in, “Hih thu teng na theitel uh hiam?” ci-in a dong hi. Amaute in, “Theitel mah ung,” ci-in a dawng uh hi.
Amah in amaute kiangah, “Tua ahi ciangin vantung gam thu tawh kisai-a lam a kilaksa thukham siate khempeuh, ama sumkholna pana a gou a lui le a thak a pusuahkhia inn neipa tawh kibang hi,” a ci hi.
Jesu in hih gentehna teng a gen khit ciangin tua mun panin a paikhia hi.
Ama khua a tun ciangin synagogue sungah mite thuhilh kipana, amaute in lamdang a sa uh hi. Amaute in, “Hih pilna le hih bang nalamdang bawl theihna vangte hih pa in koi pana a ngah ahi hiam?
Khutsiampa tapa hi lo ahi hiam? Anu min Mary hi-a James, Joseph, Simon le Judas-te ama sanggam hilo ahi hiam?
A sanggam numeite ei tawh tengkhawm hilo ahi hiam? Tua ahileh hih pa in, hihte khempeuh koi pana a ngah hiam?” ci-in a kidong uh hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in amah a phunsan uh hi. Ahi hangin Jesu in amaute kiangah, “Kamsangpa in ama khua sung le ama inn sung bekah pahtawina a ngah kei hi,” a ci hi.
Tua hi-a amaute uplahna hangin Jesu in tua lai-ah nalamdang tampi a bawl kei hi.
Tua hun laitakin gam-ukpa Herod in Jesu thu a kigenna a za hi.
Tua ciangin a sawltakte kiangah, “Hih pa, Baptize-pa John ahi hi. A sisa hong tho kik hi ngel ding hi! Tua hanga amah in nalamdang bawl theihna vang nei hi,” a ci hi.
Herod in a naupa Philip zi Herodia hangin John mana a hen khit ciangin thong sungah a khum hi.
Tua pen John in Herod kiangah, “Tuanu na tenpih ding thukham tawh kituak peuhmah lo hi,” a cih hang ahi hi.
Herod in amah a thah nop hangin mipite in amah kamsangin ngaihsun uh ahi manin mipite a kihta hi.
Herod suah ni pawi-in amau et dingin Herodia tanu a lam hi. Herod a lungkim lua ahi manin,
kiciam a tuanu nget peuhpeuh piak dingin a kamciam hi.
A nu hilhtawm bangin, “Baptize-pa John lutang kuangdai khatin hong pia in,” ci-in a ngen hi.
Kumpipa lungdong a, ahi hangin a kiciamnasa le a lenglate hangin tuanu ngetna banga piak ding le
thong sunga John ngawng tan dingin thu a pia hi.
Ama lutang kuangin hong kitawi-a numeino kipia hi; amah in a nu a piasawn hi.
John nungzuite pai uh a. a luang la in a vui uh hi. Tua ciangin pai uh a Jesu a ko uh hi.
Jesu in tua thupiang teng a zak ciangin gunkuangin tuanga gamdaih na mun lamah a kihemkhia hi. Hih thu a zak uh ciangin khuapite panin mihonte khe-in va pai uh a, a nung a zui uh hi.
Jesu a kumkhiat ciangin mihonte mu a, amaute khuatuah in a cinate uh a damsak hi.
Nitak lam neh ta ahi ciangin a nungzuite a kiangah va pai uh a, “Hih lai lah gamtawng hi-a ni lah niam lua ta hi. Khuate ah pai-in a an ding uh lei dingin mihonte ciahsak in,” a ci uh hi.
Jesu in, “Amaute paikhiat kul lo hi. A nek ding uh bang khatpeuh pia un,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Amaute in, “Anlum nga le ngasa nih bek ka nei uh hi,” ci-in a dawng uh hi.
Amah in, “Tuate hiah hong la dih un,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin mipite lopa tungah a tusak uh hi. Tua anlum nga le ngasate gel la-a vantung lam ento in, lungdam a koh khit ciangin anlumte a balkham hi. Tua ciangin nungzuite pia a, nungzuite in mipite lakah a hawm uh hi.
Amaute khempeuh in ne uh a, a kham pikpek uh hi. Nungzuite in a khamvalte uh a neng a themin a top uh leh bawmta sawm-le-nih tak a pha hi.
Tua an nete numei le naupang simloh pasal tulnga bang a pha hi.
Jesu in a nungzuite thakhatin gun kuangah tuangsak a, ama maiah galkah sakin mihonpite a ciahsak hi.
Mihonpite a ciahsak khit ciangin a mah kia thungen dingin mualtung ah a paito hi. Nitak ciangin amah kia tua lai ah a om hi.
Ahi hangin gunkuang pen tuigei panin gamlaa simna tung ta a, huih in lehmut ahi manin tuihualte in a satsat hi.
Zingsang vil lina sungin Jesu a mau lam zuanin tui tungah a pai hi.
Nungzuite in amah tui tungah a pai a muh uh ciangin a lau mahmah uh hi. Amaute in, “Hua lai-ah sikha,” ci-in lau lua in nakpi in a awng uh hi.
Ahi hangin amaute kiangah Jesu in, “Lau kei un! Keimah ka hi hi. Hong kihta kei un,” a cipah hi.
Peter in, “Topa nang na hileh, kei zong na kiang zuanin tui tungah kong pai nading thu hong pia in,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Jesu in, “Hong pai ou,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin gunkuang panin Peter tuakkhia a, Jesu lam zuanin tui tungah a pai hi.
Ahi hangin huihpi a muh ciangin lau-in tumsuk dektak a, “Topa hong hon ou,” ci-in a awng khia zal hi.
Jesu in a khutin manphei pah a, “Upna neupa aw, bang hangin lunghei nei se na hi hiam?” a ci hi.
Gunkuang sung a tun uh ciangin huih nung a dai kiuhkeuh hi.
Gunkuang sunga om teng in, “Pasian Tapa na hi takpi hi,” ci-in Jesu a bia uh hi.
Amaute galkah uh a Gennesaret a tung uh hi.
Tua lai-a mite in Jesu a hilam a theihtel uh ciangin a kima khua khempeuhah thu a zasak uh hi. Mite in amau cinate paipih uh a,
a puantualpi mong a lawnsak nadingin a thum uh hi. Amah a lawng khempeuh a damsiang hi.
Tua ciangin Jerusalem panin Pharisee-te le thukham siate pawl khat va pai uh a Jesu kiangah,
"Bang hangin na nungzuite in upate tangngeina palsat uh ahi hiam? An a nek ma-un a khut uh a sil kei uh hi!” ci-in a dong uh hi.
Jesu in, “No zong tangngeina na zuih nop manun bang hangin Pasian thupiak palsat na hi uh hiam?
Ahang in, Pasian in, ‘Na nu le na pa pahtawi in,a a nu le a pa a hamsiatte kithat pelmawh ding hi,’b ci hi.
Ahi hangin note in, mi khatpeuh in a nu le a pa-te kiangah, ‘Kei tung pana na ngah ding uh huhna peuhmah, Pasian tungah letsong a kipia ahi hi. A cihleh
a pa a pahtawi kul lo hi,’c na ci uh hi. Tua bang tangngeina na kiplet manun Pasian thu na phiat mang uh hi.
No kineih siamte! Isaiah in note tawh kisai-a a genkholhna:
‘Hih mite in a muk uh tawh kei hong pahtawi uh a, ahi hangin a lungtang uh kei panin gamla hi.
Amaute in a mawkna-in kei hong bia uh a, a thuhilhnate uh mihing bawltawm ngeina ahi hi,’d a cih a man mahmah hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Jesu in mihonpite a kiangah sam a, “Ngai unla theitel un.
Mite kam sunga a tumsukte in mi a ‘ninsak’ kei hi. Kam sung pana pusuakte in mi a ‘ninsak’ hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin nungzuite in ama kiangah va nai uh a, “Pharisee-te in hih thu a zak uh ciangin a lungkim loh lam uh na thei hiam?” ci-in amah a dong uh hi.
Amah in, “Vantunga ka Pa in a suan loh kung peuhmah a zungin kibotkhia ding hi.
Amaute thudon dah lel un; amaute, mittaw lamhilhtee ahi uh hi. Mittaw khat in mittaw dang khat makaih leh a nih un kawhawm sungah kiakhawm ding uh hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Peter in, “Tua gentehna kote hong hilhcian dih in,” a ci hi.
Jesu in amaute kiangah, “Tua zahin lungmawl lai zawzen na hi uh hiam?
Kam sunga tumte, gilpi sungah tumsuk a, tua ciangin pumpi pualamah a pu suakkhia hi, cih thei lo na hi uh hiam?
Kam sung pana pusuakkhiate ahileh lungtang pana piang hi-a tuate in mi a ‘ninsak hi.
Lungtang pana piangte: ngaihsut khel, tualthahna, angkawmna, numei le pasal paktatna, guktakna, zuau teci panna le gensiatna-te ahi hi.
Hihte in mi a ‘ninsak’ hi, ahi hangin khut sil lo-a an nek in amah a ‘ninsak’ kei hi,” a ci hi.
Jesu in tua mun nusia in, Tyre le Sidon kual lamah a kihem to hi.
Tua kimnai panin Canaan numei khat va pai a, “Topa David Tapa aw, kei hong lainat in! Ka tanu sungah dawi luta, a gim lua mahmah hi,” ci-in a kiko hi.
Jesu in kam khat zong a dawng kei hi. Tua ciangin nungzuite a kiangah pai uh a, “Tuanu in i nungah hong zui-in hong gal sapsap ahi manin hawlkhia in,” ci-in Jesu a kun uh hi.
Amah in, “Kei, Israel tuu mangte kiang bekah hong kisawl ahi hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Tua numei pai-in a mai ah khukdina, “Topa aw, hong huh tapeuh in!” a ci hi.
Amah in, “Tate nek anlum laksakin a uite uh piak ding kilawm lo hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Tua numei in, “Himah hi, Topa aw, ahi hangin uite in zong a topa sabuai pana kia annengte a ne uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Jesu in, “Numei aw, upna lian na nei hi! Nong nget bangin kong pia hi,” ci-in a dawng hi. Tua hun lianin a tanu a dampah hi.
Tua mun nusia in Galilee Tuipi dungah Jesu a pai hi. Tua ciangin mualpang ah kahto in a tu hi.
Mihon tampi ama kiangah pai-in mittawte, khebaite, a poite, a pautheilote le cina dang tampi va paipih uh a, a khe phungah a nga uh hi. Jesu in amaute a damsiangsak hi.
Tua mite in, a pautheilote pau thei a, a poite dam kikin, khebaite lam pai thei a, mittawte in khua a muh theih a muh uh ciangin lamdang a sa uh hi. Tua ciangin Israel-te Pasian a phat uh hi.

Jesu in nungzuite a kiangah sam a, “Hih mite ka khuatuah hi. Ka kiangah a om zawh uh ni thumtak pha ta a, a nek ding uh bangmah a nei kei uh hi. Gilkial pi in ka ciahsak nuam kei hi; tua bangin ciah le uh phukhong vei in pukgawp ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
A nungzuite in, “Hih bang gamtawngah mihon hih zahta vak nading an koi pan kingah thei ding hiam?” ci-in a dawng uh hi.
Jesu in, “Anlum bangzah na nei uh hiam?” ci-in a dot ciangin, “Lum sagih le ngasa tawmkha om lai hi,” ci-in a dawng uh hi.
Amah in mihonpite leitual ah a tusak hi.
Tua ciangin tua anlum sagih le ngasate la a, lungdam a koh khit ciangin balkhamin a nungzuite a pia hi. Nungzuite in mipite a piasawn uh hi.
Mipite in ne uh a, a kham pikpek uh hi. Nungzuite in khamval teng athem anengin a top uh leh bawm sagihtak a pha hi.
Tua an nete numei naupang sim loh tulli a pha hi.
Jesu in mihonpite a ciahkhiatsak khit ciangin gunkuang ah tuangin Magadan kim nai lam zuanin a pai hi.
Pharisee-te le Sadducee-te Jesu kiangah pai uh a, vantung pan lim khat ngetna tawh amah a zia-et uh hi.
Amah in,a “Nitakin, ‘Meiisan a suah ciangin khuapha ding hi,’ na ci uh a,
zingsangin, ‘Meiisan suak a khua a nim ciangin huihpi nungin guahpi zu ding hi,’ na ci uh hi. Van maitang pianzia na khiat theih uh hangin hun lahna limte na thei thei kei uh hi.
A tatkhel le angkawmhat hih khang mite in lim lamdang a zon uh hangin Jonah lim longal adang khat beek a kilak kei ding hi,” ci-in a dawng hi. Tua ciangin Jesu in amaute nusia in a paikhia hi.
Tuilipi a kantan laitakun nungzuite in an a pua mangngilh uh hi.
Jesu in amaute kiangah, “Pilvang unla, Pharisee-te le Sadducee-te silngo panin kikem un,” a ci hi.
Amaute in, “Anlum khat beek i puak loh hang hi,” ci-in a kikum uh hi.
Jesu in amaute kikupna a theih ciangin, “Upna neute aw, bang hangin anlum om loh thu kikum tazen na hi uh hiam!
Theitel nai lo lailai na hi uh hiam? Mi tul nga ading anlum nga le a val bawm bangzah na kaikhawm uh cih phawk nawn lo na hi uh hiam?
Ahikeh mi tulli adingin lum sagih le a val bawm bangzah na kaikhawm uh cih phawk nawn lo na hi uh hiam?
Bangci-a an thu gen ka hi loh lam theitel lo na hi uh hiam? Ahi hangin Pharisee-te le Sadducee-te silngo panin na kikem un,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin anlum bawl cianga kizang silngo gen hi loin Pharisee-te le Sadducee-te hilhna pana kikep ding gen ahilam a theitel pan uh hi.
Caesarea Philipi kuala Jesu a pai ciangin a nungzuite kiangah, “Mite in Mihing Tapa kua hi, a ci uh hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
Amaute in, “Mi pawlkhat in, ‘Baptize-pa John hi; pawlkhatte in Elijah hi; pawlkhat leuleu in, Jerimiah hiam, kamsang khatpeuh hiam, hi ding hi,’ hong ci uh hi,” ci-in a dawng uh hi.
"Tua ahileh no e leh? Kei kua hi nong ci uh hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
Simon Peter in, “Nang, a nungta Pasian Tapa, Khristb na hi hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Jesu in, “Jonah tapa Simon aw, thupha ngah na hi hi; ahang in, hih in mihing hong laak hi loin vantung a om ka Pa hong laak ahi hi.
Tua hi a, nang Peterc na hi hi. Hih suangpi tungah ka pawlpi ka phut dinga Gawtmund kongpite in a zo zo kei ding uh hi.e
Vantung gam tawhtangte nang kong pia ding hi. Leitung a na hen peuhpeuh vantungah kihen dingaf, leitung a na phel peuhpeuh vantungah kiphel dingg hi,” a ci kik hi.
Tua ciangin Jesu in amah Khrist ahilam kuamah a hilh loh nadingun a nungzuite a vauhilh hi.

Jerusalem ah Jesu pai-in upate, siampi makaite le thukham siate khutah tampi thuak pelmawh dinga, pel loin amah kithatin, a ni thum ni ciangin kihingkiksak ding hi, cih thute tua hun pana kipan a nungzuite a hilhcian hi.
Peter in amah tang paikhiatpih in tai a, “Topa, hi ngei mahmah lo e! Hih thu nang tungah tung ngei peuhmah lo ding hi!” a ci hi.
Jesu kihei a Peter kiangah, “Satan ka nunglamah kihem in! Kei adingin kimuk-tukna na hi hi. Pasian thute ngaihsun loin mihing thute na ngaihsun hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Jesu in a nungzuite kiangah, “Mi khatpeuh in ka nung hong zuih ding leh amah le amah kinialin, ama singlamteh kisuanin hong zuih pelmawh kul hi.
Ahang in, ama nuntaknah a honkhia nuamte in taan dinga, ahi hangin kei hanga ama nuntakna a taante in, nuntakna a ngah ding hi.
Mi khatpeuh in leitung buppi a neih hangin a hinna tanlawh leh ama adingin bang phatuam ding ahi hiam? Ahikeh mi khatpeuh in ama kha bang tawh khek thei ding ahi hiam?
Ahang in, Mihing Tapa ama vansawl takte tawh a Pa minthanna kengin hong pai ding hi. Tua ciangin mi khempeuh in amau sepna tawh kizui-in pahtakman a sang ciat ding uh hi.
Thutak kong geninah, hih lai-a ding mi pawlkhat in, Mihing Tapa ama kumpi-gam tawh hong pai, a muh matengun sihna a ciamkha kei ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Niguk khit ciangin Jesu in Peter, James le James sanggampa John-te zawnin mualsang tungah a kahtohpih hi.
Tua lai-ah amaute mitmuhin a pum piandan a kikhel hi. Amai ni bangin tanga, a puante khuavak bangin a leng hi.
Tua khit phetin amaute mai-ah Moses le Elijah kilang a, Jesu tawh a kiho uh hi.
Peter in Jesu kiangah, “Topa, hih lai-ah i om nuam mahmah hi. Nong awi leh, buk thum—nang ading khat, Moses ading khat, Elijah ading khat, hong lamsak ning,” a ci hi.
Tua banga a pau laitakin meiingo khat in amaute tuama, tua meii lak panin, “Hih in, ka it ka Tapa ahi hi, ama tungah ka lung a kim mahmah hi; ama thu na ngai ta un!” ci-in aw khat a ging hi.
Nungzuite in hih awging a zak uh ciangin lau uh a, lei ah a khupbawh uh hi.
Ahi hangin Jesu pai-in amaute lawnga, “Tho un, lau kei un,” a ci hi.
Amaute a khuadak uh leh Jesu longal kuamah a mu kei uh hi.
Amaute mualtung pan a paisuk kawmkawmun Jesu in amaute kiangah, “Mihing Tapa misi pan a thawh mateng, na muhsate uh kuama kiangah gen peuhmah kei un,” a ci hi.
Nungzuite in, “Tua ahileh thukham siate in, ‘Elijah hong pai masa pelmawh ding hi,’ ci-in bang hangin hilh uh ahi hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi.
Jesu in dawnga, “A taktakin, Elijah hong pai-a na khempeuh a bawlpha ding hi.

Ahi hangin ken kong geninah, Elijah hong pai khin zo napi amaute in amah a thei kei uh hi. Ama tungah amau ut bangin a bawl uh hi. Tua mah bangin Mihing Tapa in amaute khutlum a thuak ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Jesu in Baptize-pa John tawh kisai-in a gen ahilam nungzuite in a theitel pan uh hi.
Mihonpite lakah amaute a pai laitakun mi khat in Jesu va naih a, a mai ah a khukdin hi.
Amah in, “Topa aw, ka tapa lainat in. Amah sibupbupin, gim mahmah hi. Mei sung khawng tui sung khawngah puk zelzel hi.
Na nungzuite kiangah ka paipih hangin a damsak thei kei uh hi.” a ci hi.
Jesu in, “Thu um lo-a a lehtat khang mite aw, note tawh bang tan vei om khawmin bang tan vei hong dawhdawh zo ding ka hi hiam? Tua naupang ka kiangah hong paipih un,” a ci hi.
Jesu in tua dawi a tai ciangin naupang sung panin paikhia-a, tua hun lianin naupang a damsiang pah hi.
Tua ciangin Jesu kiangah nungzuite va paituam uh a, “Bang hanga ko hawlkhia thei lo ka hi uh hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi.

Amah in, “Na upna uh a neu luat hang ahi hi. Thutak kong geninah, upna ankam tang cia-a neu khat na neih uh leh hih mualpi kiangah, ‘Hih mun pan hua lai-ah kisuankhia in,’ ci le uh cin kisuankhia ding hi. No adingin a hi thei lo bangmah a om kei ding hi.
Ahi hangin thungetna le antanna longal in hih bangte a hisak thei kei hi,”a a ci hi.
Amaute Galilee a tunkuan uh ciangin amaute kiangah, “Mite khutah Mihing Tapa kilehhek ding hi.
Amaute in amah that ding uh a, a ni thum ni ciangin kihingkiksak ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin nungzuite a dah lua mahmah uh hi.
Jesu le a nungzuite Capernaum a tun khit uh ciangin siah drachma nih dongte Peter kiangah va pai uh a, “Na siapa un biakinnpi siah pia lo hiam?”b ci-in a dong uh hi.

Amah in, “Pia mah hi,” a ci hi. Inn sungah Peter a lut ciangin Jesu in na hopih masa a, “Simon aw, nang bang na ci ngaihsut hiam? Leitung kumpite in mangmu le siah kua tungah dong uh ahi hiam? Amau tate tung hiam? Midangte tung ahi hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
Peter in, “Midangte tungah a dong hi,” ci-in a dawng hi. Jesu in, “Tua bang ahileh tate a peng hi.

Ahi hangin amaute i lungkimsak nadingin tuilipi ah va pai inla, ngathang va siah in. Na mat masakpen a kam phen lecin drachma tang li man sumtang khat na mu ding hi. Hong tawi inla, kei le nang siah dingin amaute pia in,” a ci hi.
Tua hun laitakin Jesu kiangah nungzuite va pai uh a, “Vantung gamah kua lian pen ahi hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi.
Amah in naupang neu khat samin amaute lakah a dingsak hi.
Tua ciangin amah in, “Thutak kong geninah, note kikhela naupangno na bat kei uh leh vantung gam sungah na lut ngei kei ding uh hi.
Tua ahi ciangin hih naupangno banga a ki niamkhiat peuhpeuh vantung gam ah a lianpen ahi hi.
Tua ciangin keima min hangin hih bang naupangno khat a sangte peuhmah, kei hong sang ahi hi.
"Ahi hangin kei hong um hih naupangnote khat peuhpeuh mawhna a bawlsak a om leh a ngawngah angawina suang lianpi khihin tuipi thuk sungah tuakin tummang leh ama adingin a hoihzaw ding hi.
Mite mawhna a bawlsakte hangin hih leitung in gimna nak thuak na zen in cia! Tua bang a piang pelmawh ding ahi hi; ahi hangin mawhna bawl nadinga kizang mite in gimna nak thuak na zen in cia!
Na khut a hi a na khe ahi zongin mawhna hong bawlsak penpen sattan inla paimang in. Khut kim khe kimin tawntung meikhuk ah hong kikhul sangin, khutbui khebui-in nuntakna ah na lut ding hoihzaw hi.
Na mittang in mawhna hong bawlsak leh khelkhia inla paimang in. Mittang kimin meili sungah hong kikhul sangin mit lang khat bek tawh nuntakna ah na lut ding hoihzaw hi.
"Hih naupangnote khat beek na simmawh kha kei in. Ahang in, vantunga om amau vansawltakte in, vantunga ka Pa maitang a mu ngitnget uh hi.a
Mihing Tapa, a mangb te hon dinga hong pai ahi hi.
"Bang na ci ngaihsut uh hiam? Mi khat in tuu za khat nei henla, tuate lakah khat gammang leh, a om lai sawm kua le kuate mual tungah nusia-in, tua a gammang tuu pen zong lo ding ahi hiam?
Thutak kong geninah, tua a gammang tuu a muh kik ciangin a gammang lo tuu sawm kua le kuate sangin, tua tuu khat hangin a lungdam zaw ding hi.
Tua mah bangin hih naupangte khat nangawn a manthan ding vantunga om na Pa un a phal kei hi.
"Nangc tungah na sanggampa hong mawh leh pai-in nogel bek omkhawmin ama khialhna na lak in. Na thu hong man leh nang lamah na sanggampa na zo hi.
Ahi hangin na thu hong man nop kei leh ‘teci nih hiam thum hiam a om ciangin thu khempeuh thukip suak’d ahi manin midang khat hiam nih hiam zawnin na pai kik in.
Amaute thu a man nop kei lai leh pawlpi na ko in; pawlpite thu a man nop kei lailai leh, lawkipa ahikeh siah dongpa bang lelin na koih in.
"Thutak kong geninah, leitungah na hen peuhpeuh vantungah kihen dingae, lei tungah na phel peuhpeuh vantungah kiphel dingf hi.
"Kong genbeh lai-inah, leitungah note nih kithukima na nget peuhpeuh uh vantunga om ka Pa in hong pia ding hi.
Ahang in, keima minin nih le thum a kikhop leh amaute tawh tua munah ka om hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Jesu kiangah Peter va pai a, “Topa aw, ka sanggam khat ka tungah hong mawh leh bangzah vei ciang ka maisak ding hiam? Sagih vei ciang dong hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
Jesu in, “Sagih vei ciang bek hi lo, sawm sagih mun sagihg vei ciang dong maisak in, kong ci hi.
"Tua hi-a vantung gam in ama na semte sum ciamtehna a sittel nuam kumpipa tawh kibang hi.
Tua sum ciamtehna a sittel ciangin talenth tulsawm a bapa ama kiangah a paipih uh hi.
A sum bat pia zo lo ahi manin a leiba loh nadingin a zi a tate le a neihsa khempeuh zuak dingin a pu in thu a pia hi.
"Tua nasempa a pu mai-ah khukdin in, ‘Hong thuak keikai lai in. A vekpi-in kong loh ding hi,’ ci-in a thum hi.
Tua ciangin a pu in amah hehpih a, a leiba khempeuh maisak in a khah hi.
"Ahi hangin tua nasempa a paikhiat ciangin ama tunga denariii zakhat a ba a naseppihte khat a mu hi. Amah pumbawh in a gawl meka, ‘Nong sum bat hong loh meng in,’ ci-in a siik hi.
"A lawmpa zong khukdin a, ‘Hong thuak keikai lai in; kong loh na ding hi,’ ci-in a thum hi.
"Ahi hangin a ut kei hi. A ut sangsikin paikhia-a a leiba teng a loh khit matengin tuapa thong sungah a khum hi.
Nasem dangte in tua thu teng a muh uh ciangin lungdong mahmah uh a, pai-in thu piang teng khempeuh a pu uh a ko uh hi.
"Tua ciang a pu in inn sungah tua nasempa sama, ‘Nasem tatsiapa aw, nong thum manin na leiba teng kong maisak hi.
Nang kong lainat bang tektekin na naseppihpa tungah na hih ding hi lo hiam?’ ci hi.
A pu heh lua ahi manin a bat khempeuh a loh khit matengin tua nasempa a kigawt dingin thong ukte khut sungah a pia hi.
"No zong na lungsim takpi uh tawh na sanggamte uh mawhna na maisak kei uh leh vantunga om ka Pa in hih bangin note tung ciatah hong hih ding hi,” a ci hi.
Jesu in hih thu teng a gen khit ciangin Galilee gam nusia in Jordan gal khat lam Judea kualah a pai hi.
Mihon tampi in amah zui uh a, tua munah amaute a damsak hi.
Amah zia-et dingin Pharisee-te pawlkhat va pai uh a, “Thu khat peuhpeuh hangin pasal in a zi a mak ding thukham tawh a kituak hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi.
Jesu in, “‘A kipatcilin Piangsakpa in numei le pasal a bawl hi,’a cih thu leh
‘Hih thu hangin pasal in a nu a pa nusia in a zi tawh kigawm dinga, amau gel sa khat a suak ding uh hi,’b cih thute sim ngei lo na hi uh hiam?
Tua hi-a amaute nih hi loin khat ahi hi, tua ahi ciangin Pasian in a gawmsate mihing in khen kei ta hen,” a ci hi.
Amaute in, “Tua ahileh, ‘Mikhat in a zi a makna lai pia henla, a zi nawkiksak ta hen,’ ci-in bang hangin Moses in thu pia ahi hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi.
Jesu in, “Note na lungtang uh khauh lua ahi manin, zi na mak theih nadingun Moses in phalna hong pia hi. Ahi hangin a cila kipan hih bang a hi kei hi.
Ken kong geninah, ang kikawmsanna hang longal a zi ma a numei dang a tenpih peuhmah, angkawm a suak hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Nungzuite in ama kiangah, “Nupa kal thu hih bang ding ahileh kuamah kitenpih loh ding hoihzaw hi,” a ci uh hi.
Jesu in, “Amau tunga kipiasate simloh kuamah in hih thuhilhna a sang thei kei ding uh hi.

Ahang in, mi pawlkhatte gehsa in a suak uh hi; pawlkhatte ahileh mite geh ahi hi; adang pawlkhatte in vantung gam hangin kuamah a tenpihc kei uh hi. Hih thu a sang thei peuh in san ding ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amaute tungah khut ngasak ding le amau ading thu a ngensak dingin Jesu kiangah naupangnote a kipaipih hi. Ahi hangin nungzuite in tua a paipihte a tai uh hi.
Jesu in, “Naupangnote ka kiangah hong paisak un. Amaute dal kei un. Vantung gam i cih, hih bangte aa ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Amaute tungah a khutte a ngak khit ciangin tua mun pan a paikhia hi.
Tua laitakin Jesu kiangah mi khat va pai a, “Sia aw, nuntak tawntungna ka ngah theih nadingin a hoih bang ka sem ding hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
Jesu in, “A hoih thu bang hangin kei hong dong na hi hiam? Mi hoih Khat bek a om hi. Nuntakna na ngah nop leh thupiakte zui in,” a ci hi.
Tua mipa in, “Koite hiam?” ci-in a dong hi. Jesu in, “‘Tual that kei in; angkawm kei in; gu kei in; zuau teci pang kei in;
na nu na pa pahtawi in;d nang le nang na ki-it bangin na vengte it in,’”e a ci hi.
Tua khangnopa in, “Hih teng ka zuih zawhsa ahi hi. Bang ka sam lai hiam?” a ci hi.

Jesu in, “Na hoihkim nop leh pai-in, na neihsa khempeuh zuak inla mizawngte na pia in. Tua hileh vantungah gou na nei ding hi. Tua khit ciangin hong pai inla ka nung hong zui in,” ci-in a dawng kik hi.
Khangnopa in hih thu a zak ciangin hau mahmah ahi manin lungsi dedu-in a paikhia hi.
Tua ciangin Jesu in nungzuite kiangah, “Thutak kong geninah, mihaute vantung gam a lut zawh nading a haksa mahmah hi.
Kong gen kik inah mihau khat Pasian gam a lut ding sangin Kala-oh khat phim bilvangah a thawl ding baihzaw ding hi,” a ci hi.
Nungzuite in hih thu a zak uh ciangin lamdang sa mahmah uh a, “Tua himawk leh kua kihonkhia zo peuhmah ding hiam?” a ci uh hi.
Jesu in amaute en a, “Hih thu mihing in hih thei lo hi. Ahi hangin Pasian in na khempeuh hih thei hi,” a ci uh hi.
Peter in, “Kote in na khempeuh nusia in nang kong zui uh hi! Tua ahileh ko bang ka lemlawh ding uh hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.

Jesu in amaute kiangah, “Thutak kong geninah, na khempeuh a kibawl thak hun, Mihing Tapa ama kumpi tokhom minthang tungah a tut ciangin keima nung hong zui note zong kumpi tokhom sawm le nih tungah tuin, Israel mi beh sawm le nihte tungah thu na khen ding uh hi.
Keima hangin a inn, a lo, a sanggamnu, a sanggampa, a nuf, a pa le a tate a nusia peuhmah in, a zah zakhat ngahin nuntak tawntungna zong a luah ding hi.
Ahi hangin a masate tampi nunung ding uh a, a nunungte tampi a masa ding uh hi.
"Vantung gam in, ama lenggui lo a nasem ding mi cial dingin zing tunga kuankhia lo-neipa tawh kibang hi.
Nitha denarii khat piak dingin a thukim khit uh ciangin a lenggui lo ah a kuansak hi.
"Nai thumna pawl ciangin amah paikhia a, sumzuakna muna bangmah sem lo-a ding mawkmawk midangte a mu hi.
Amaute kiangah, ‘No zong pai unla ka lenggui lo ah na va sem un; thaman a kituak zah kong pia ding hi,’ ci hi.
Tua ciangin amaute a kuan uh hi. “Nai gukna pawl le nai kuana pawl ciangin paikhia leuleu a, tua mah bangina hih hi.

Nai sawm le khatna pawl a sat ciangin paikhia kik leuleu a, a ding mawkmawk mi pawlkhat a mu lai hi. Amaute kiangah, ‘Bang hangin bangmah sem loin sun nilohin ding mawkmawk na hi uh hiam?’ ci-in dong hi.
"Amaute in, ‘Kuamah in ko hong cial lo hi,’ ci-in dawng uh hi. “Amah in amaute kiangah, ‘No zong pai unla ka lenggui lo ah na va sem un,’ ci hi.
"Nitak lam ciangin loneipa in a sum kempa kiangah, ‘Na sem teng sam inla a kicial nunung pente pan panin a masa pente dong a thaman uh pia in,’ ci hi.
"Nai sawm le khat pawla kicial nasemte pai uh a, denarii khat ciat a ngah uh hi.
A kicial masate a pai uh ciangin a tamzaw ngah dingin a kilamen uh hi. Ahi zongin denarii khat ciat mah ngah veve uh hi.
Tua banga a ngah uh ciangin loneipa a phunsan uh hi.
‘Hih na cial nunung pente in nai khat sung bek na sem napi, nisa thuaka na hampi teng a sem kote tawh nong kikimsak hi,’ ci-in gen uh hi.
"Ahi hangin loneipa in tua nasemte laka khat kiangah, ‘Lawm aw, nang tungah a kilawm lo-a ka tatna a om kei hi. Denarii khat thalawh ding na thukimsa hi lo ahi hiam?
Na sum la inla ciah in. Ka cial nunung penpa zong nang kong piak zah mah ka pia nuam hi.
Keima sum ka ut bangin zek thei hi lo ka hi hiam? Ahikeh ka citnate hong haza na hi hiam?’ ci hi.
"Tua ahi ciangin a nunungte masa dinga a masate a nunung ding hi,” a ci hi.
Jerusalem ah Jesu a pai toh laitakin nungzui sawm le nihte tuam tonpih a, amaute kiangah,
"Jerusalem ah i paito dinga, siampi makaite le thukham siate tungah Mihing Tapa kilehhek ding hi. Amaute in amah mawhpaihin sihna thuaksak ding uh hi.
Tua ciangin selpho ding, sat ding le kilhlup dingin Gentile-te khutah amah a piakhia ding uh hi. A ni thum ni ciangin kihing kiksak ding hi!” ci-in a gen hi.
Tua ciangin Jesu kiangah Zebedee tapate nu, a tapate tawh va pai-in khukdina, a angvan ding a ngen hi.
Jesu in, “Bang deih na hi hiam?” ci-in a dong hi. Amah in, “Na gam sungah hih ka tapate gel khat na taklamah khat na veilamah a tut theih nadingun thu hong pia in,” a ci hi.
Jesu in amaute kiangah, “Nong nget uh na thei kei uh hi. Ka dawn ding hai na dawn thei ding uh hiam?” a ci hi. Amaute in, “Ka dawn thei ding uh hi,” ci-in a dawng uh hi.

Jesu in amaute kiangah, “Kei hai panin na dawn takpi ding uh hi. Ahi hangin ka taklam ahi a, ka veilam ahi zongin kei piak theih ahi kei hi. Ka Pa in tua munte ah a tu dinga a sehkholhsate ading bek ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Nungzui sawmte in hih thu a zak uh ciangin tua unau nihte tungah a lungkim kei uh hi.
Jesu in a vekun sama, “Gentile-te a gam-ukte uh, a nuai-ate tungah kiliansak uh a, a uliante uh amau tungah kithuneisak uh hi.
Note tua bang na hi kei uh hi. Note lakah a lian nuam peuhmah na nasem uh hi ding hi.
Note lakah mapi ahi nuam peuhmah na sila uh hi pelmawh ding hi.
Mihing Tapa, midangte ama na a semsak dinga hong pai hi lo, midangte ading nasem ding le mi tampi tat nadinga ama nuntakna a pia dingin hong pai ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Jesu le a nungzuite in Jericho a nusiat uh ciangin mi tampi in amah a zui uh hi.
