Lamgei-a tu mittaw nih in Jesu in tua lai tawn cih a zak uh ciangin, “Topa David Tapa aw, kote hong lainat in!” ci-in a kiko uh hi.
Mihonpite in amaute tai-in daitaka a om nadingun a gen uh hi. Ahi hangin amaute in, “Topa David Tapa aw, kote hong lainat in,” ci-in a kinak ko semsem uh hi.
Jesu khawlin amaute sama, “Bang kong hihsak ding deih na hi uh hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
Amaute in, “Topa aw, khua ka mu thei nuam uh hi,” ci-in a dawng uh hi.
Jesu in amaute khuatuah mahmah a, a mit uh a lawnsak hi. Amaute in khua mu theipah lian uh a, a nung a zui uh hi.
Amaute Jerusalem zuanin pai uh a, Olive Vum tunga om Bethpage a tun uh ciangin Jesu in a nungzuite nih a mapaisak hi.
Jesu in amaute kiangah, “Mai-a khuaah pai le uh cin laapi khat a kikhihsa-a om na mu pah ding uh hi; a no zong a gei-ah om ding hi. A nuta in sut unla hong paipih un.
Mi khatpeuh in bang khatpeuh hong cih leh, Topa in a deihna om hi; hong puak kikpah ding hi,’ ci-un,” ci-in a sawl hi.
Kamsangpa tungtawna kigen:

"En un, na kumpipa uh, lungsim niam tawh, laapi tung le, a kituang nai lo laano, laapi ta laano tungah, tuangin note kiangah hong pai hi,’ ci-in Zion Tanu kiangah na gen in,”a cih thu a tangtunna-in hih thu a piang ahi hi.
Nungzuite pai uh a, Jesu hilh bangin a hih uh hi.
Laapi le laano paipih uh a, a tungah a puantualpite uh phahin Jesu in tuate a tutphah hi.
Mihonpite in a puantualpite uh lampi ah a phah uh hi. Pawlkhatte in singhiangte khiakin lampi ah a phah uh hi.
A nung le a mai-a pai mihonpite in, “David Tapa tungah Hosanna!b “Topa mina hong paipa in thupha a ngah hi!”c “A sang penna munah Hosanna!”d ci-in a awng uh hi.
Jerusalem ah Jesu a lut ciangin khuazangpi-in linglawng henhan uh a, “Hih pa kua ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
Mihonpite in, “Galilee gam Nazareth pana kamsangpa Jesu hi,” ci-in a dawng uh hi.
Biakinnpi huang sungah Jesu lut a, tua lai-a sumleite le sumzuakte khempeuh a hawlkhia hi. Sumkhengte sabuaite le vakhuzuakte tutphahsaute a sawn thalsak hi.
Amaute kiangah, “‘Ka inn, thungetna inn kici ding hi,’e ci-in ‘kigelh’ hi. Ahi hangin note in ‘misuamte kuapi’f na suaksak uh hi,” a ci hi.
Biakinnpi-a ama kiangah mittawte le khelbaite va pai uh a, amaute a damsak hi.
Ahi hangin siampi makaite le thukham siate in, a nalamdang bawlte mu uh a biakinnpi huang sungah, “David Tapa tungah Hosanna,” ci-a naupangte otna a zak uh ciangin a lungkim kei uh hi.

Amaute in, “Hih naupangte gen na za hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi. Jesu in, “Za mah ing, ‘Naupangnote le naungekte muk pan phatna a ginkhiat ding, nangma sehkholhsa ahi hi,’g cih thu sim ngei lo na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amaute nusia-in tua khuapi panin Bethany ah pai-a tua lai-ah a giak hi.
Zingsang tungin khuapi zuana a ciah kik leh a gil kial hi.
Lampi gei-ah theikung khat a muh ciangin a zuan to hi. Ahi hangin theikung tungah a teh longal bangmah a mu kei hi. Tua ciangin, “Gah nawn peuhmah kei in!” a cih leh thei kung a dinggaw pah hi.
Nungzuite in hih a muh uh ciangin lamdang a sa uh hi. Amaute in, “Bangci a theikung dinggaw pah mawk ahi hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi.

Jesu in, “Thutak kong geninah, lunghei loin upna na neih nak uh leh theikung tunga kihih bang hih thei bek tham loin hih mualpi kiangah, ‘Pai inla tuipi sungah nang le nang kipai in,’ ci le uh cin, na cih bangun piang ding hi.
Na up nak uh leh thungetna-a na nget peuhpeuh uh na ngah ding uh hi,” a ci hi.

Biakinnpi tualah Jesu luta thu a hilh laitakin siampi makaite le mipite’ upate a kiangah va pai uh hi. Amaute in, “Bang thuneihna tawh hihte hih na hi hiam? Hih thuneihna kua hong piak hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi.
Jesu in, “Kei zong khat kong dong ding hi. Nong dawn uh leh bang thuneihna tawh hihte hih ka hi hiam, cih kong gen ding hi.
John baptisena koi pana hong kipan ahi hiam? Vantung pan hiam, mihing tung pan hiam?” a ci hi. “‘Vantung pan hi,’ ci leng, ‘Tua ahileh bang hangin amah um lo na hi uh hiam?’ hong ci ding hi.
‘Mihing tung pan hi,’ ci leng lah John pen kamsang khatin sang uh ahi manin mipite i kihta zel hi,” ci-in amaute a kikum uh hi.
"Tua ahi ciangin, “Ka thei kei uh hi,” ci-in a dawng uh hi. Tua ciangin Jesu in, “Ken zong bang thuneihna tawh hihte ka hih cih kong gen kei ding hi.
"Bang na ci ngaihsut uh hiam? Tapa nih a nei mi khat a om hi. Khat kiangah pai masa a, ‘Ka ta aw, tu ni-in lenggui lo ah va kuan inla na va sem in,’ ci-in sawl hi.
"A tapa in, ‘Kuan kei ning,’ ci hi. Ahi hangin a den ciangin a lungsim khela a kuan hi.
"Tua ciangin a tapa dang khat kiangah pai-a tua mah bangin a sawl hi. A tapa in, ‘Pa aw, va kuan ning,’ ci napi a kuan kei hi.

"Tua nihte kua zaw in a pa deihna bangin hih ahi hiam?” a ci hi. Amaute in, “Amasa pen in,” a ci uh hi. Jesu in amaute kiangah, “Thutak kong geninah, siahdongte le numei kizuakte in vantung gam hong lutsan ding uh hi ta hi.
Note kiangah thumaanna lampi lak dingin John hong pai hangin na um kei uh a, ahi zongin siahdongte le numei kizuakte in a um uh hi. Hih thu na muh khit ciang nangawnun kisikin na um tuan kei uh hi.

"Gentehna dang khat na ngai un: Lenggui a cing loneipa khat a om hi. Amah in a kimkotah dai kai-a, lengtui sukna khuk khat to-in tausang khat a dawh hi. Tua khit ciangin a lenggui lo, lokho pawlkhat a khawhlawhsak hi. Tua ciangin khual a zinsan hi.
A lak hun a tun ciangin lenggah khawm dingin lo-khawh-lawhte kiangah a nasemte a sawl hi.
"Lo-khawhlawhte in nasemte man uh a, khat sat, adang khat thatin, a thumna a deng uh hi.
Tua ciangin a sawl masakte sangin nasem tamzaw a paisak hi. Lo-khawhlawhte in tuate zong a masate mah bangin a bawl uh hi.
A tawpkhakna ah, ‘Ka tapa na zahtak buang ding uh hi,’ ci-in a tapa a paisak hi.
"Ahi hangin lo-khawhlawhte in tua a tapa a muh uh ciangin, ‘Hih pa a innluahpa ahi hi. Hong pai un, amah thatin a luah ding teng tang ni,’ kici uh hi.
Tua ciangin amah manin dai pua-ah kaikhia uh a, a that uh hi.
"Tua ahi ciangin loneipa a pai ciangin tua lo-khawhlawhte bang a ci bawl ding hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
Amaute in, “Siatna khukah tua migentheite tun dinga, an lak ciangin loneipa tan ding zah a pia ding lo-khawhlawh dangte a khosak ding hi,” ci-in a dawng uh hi.
Jesu in amaute kiangah, “Laisiangtho sungah: “‘Inn lamten a nilkhiat suang, inntungkhum suang a suak hi;h hih thu Topa hih hi-a, eite mitmuh in a piandang hi,’i cih thu sim ngei lo na hi uh hiam?
"Tua ahi ciangin ken kong geninah, note kiang pan Pasian gam kilakhia dinga, ama gah a gahsak ding mite khutah kipia ding hi.
Hih suang tunga a puk peuhmah kitamzan dinga, ahi hangin hih suang in a delhkhakte peuhmah a zancim ding hi,”j a ci hi.
Siampi makaite le Pharisee-te in Jesu gentehnate a zak uh ciangin amau a genna ahilam a thei uh hi.
Amah mat theih nading lampi zong uh a, ahi hangin mipite in Jesu kamsangin sang uh ahi manin mihonpite a kihta uh hi.
Jesu in gentehnate zangin amaute tungah gen kik a:
"Vantung gam in, a tapa ading mopawi bawl kumpipa tawh kibang hi.
A khohsate sam dingin a nasemte a sawl hangin a khohsate a hawh nuam kei uh hi.
"Tua ciangin nasem dangte sawlbeh a, ‘Nitak-an min khin ta hi: Ka bawngtalte le ka bawng vakthaute kigo zo a, na khempeuh kiman ta hi. Mopawi hong siim ta un,’ ci-in a khohsate kiangah a gensak hi.
"Ahi hangin amaute in awlmawh lo uh a, khat in lo kuansan in, adang khat in a sumbukah paisan hi.
Tua lo teng in a nasemte man uh a, bawlsia in a that uh hi.
Kumpipa a lungso hi. A galkapte sawla, tua tualthatte thatsakin a khuapi uh a haltumsak hi.
"Tua ciangin a nasemte kiangah, ‘Mopawi ankuang kilui ta hi. Ahi hangin ka khohsate lah hong hawh dingin a kilawm kei hi.
Kongzing lakah va pai unla, na muh peuhpeuh uh hong sam un,’ ci-in sawl hi.
Tua ciangin nasemte kongzing tengah pai kawikawi uh a, misia mipha a muh peuhpeuh uh a khawm uh hi. Tua ciangin mopawi bawlna innpi dimin a kisamte a om uh hi.
"Ahi hangin a kisamte en dingin kumpipa a tum ciangin mopi puan silh lo mi khat a mu hi.
Amah in tuapa kiangah, ‘Lawm aw, mopi puan silh lopi-in hih lai-ah bangci lut theih na hi hiam?’ ci-in dong hi. Tuapa in a gen ding a thei kei hi.
"Tua ciangin kumpipa in a sawltakte kiangah, ‘A khut a khe hen unla, kahna le hagawina a omna mun pualam khua mialna-ah paikhia un,’ ci-in a sawl hi.
"A kisamte tampi ahi hangin a kiteelte tawmkha ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Pharisee-te paikhia uh a, ama kammalte pan a awk theih nadingin a geel uh hi.

Amaute in a nungzuite uh le Herod pawlte a kiangah a sawl uh hi. Tuate in, “Sia aw, mi thutak khat na hi-a, Pasian thutak tawh kituakin na hilh cih kong thei uh hi. Amaute hina en lo na hi manin kuama thu-in na gamta kei hi.
Tua hi-a Caesar tungah siah piak tuak hiam, piak tuak lo, cih na ngaihsutna hong gen dih in,” ci-in a dong uh hi.
Ahi hangin Jesu in amaute ngimna khel a theih ciangin, “No kineihsiamte aw, bang hangin kei hong thangsiah na hi uh hiam?
Siah-a kipia sumtang hong lak dih un,” a ci hi. Amaute in denarii tang khat a lak uh hi.
Tua ciangin Jesu in, “Hih kua lim hi-a hih kua min ahi hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
Amaute in, “Caesar aa ahi hi,” a ci uh hi. Tua ciangin amah in amaute kiangah, “Caesar aa-te Caesar pia unla, Pasian aa-te Pasian na pia un,” a ci hi.
Amaute in hih thu a zak uh ciang- in lamdang a sa uh hi. Tua ciangin amah nusia in a paikhia uh hi.
Tua ni mah in: Thawhkikna om lo hi, a ci Sadducee-te Jesu kiangah thu dong dingin va pai uh hi.
Amaute in, “Sia aw, Moses in, ‘Ta nei man lo-a si pisal khatpeuh a om leh a sanggampa in a u zi luah henla, ta neihsak hen,’ ci-in gen hi.
Tu-in ko lakah unau pasal sagih a om hi. A u pen in zi nei-a, ta nei man loin si ahi manin a sanggampa adingin a zi a nusiat hi.
Tua bangin a nihna, a thumna, a banbanin a sagihna dong a kibangin hi suksuk hi.
A tawp khakna ah tua numei si hi.
Tua ahileh tua numei in, unau pasal sagihte tenpih kim ahi ciangin, thawhkik hun teh amah kua pen zi hi ding hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi.
Jesu in, “Note in Laisiangtho ahi zongin, Pasian vangliatna ahi zongin thei lo na hi manun na khial uh hi.
Thawhkik ni ciangin mopina le mo khakna a om kei ding hi; mite, vantungah vansawltakte bang ding uh hi.
Ahi hangin misite thawhkikna tawh kisai-in Pasian in note kianga a gen,
‘Keimah in Abraham’ Pasian, Issac’ Pasian le Jacob’ Pasian ka hi hi’a cih thu sim ngei lo na hi uh hiam? Amah in a site Pasian hi lo, a hingte Pasian ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Mihonpite in hih thu a zak uh ciangin a thuhilhna lamdang a sa uh hi.
Jesu in Sadducee-te a daihsak lam Pharisee-te in a theih uh ciangin a kikaikhawm uh hi.
Amaute lakah thukham a thei mahmah khat in a zia-etna in,
"Sia aw, Thukham lakah koi pen thupiak lianpen ahi hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
Jesu in, “Na Topa Pasian na lungsim khempeuh, na hinna khempeuh le na ngaihsutna khempeuh tawh it in.’b
Hih thupiak a masapen le a lianpen ahi hi.
A nihna in, ‘Nang le nang na ki-it bangin na vengpa it in,’ cih ahi hi.c
Thukham le Kamsangte thu khempeuh, hih thupiak nihte tung pana mengkhia ahi hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Pharisee-te a kikhopkhawm laitak un Jesu in amaute kiangah,
"Khristd bangin na ngaihsun uh hiam? Amah kua tapa ahi hiam?” ci-in a dong hi. Amaute in, “David tapa ahi hi,” a ci uh hi.
Amah in amaute kiangah, “Tua ahileh bangci a David in Kha tawh thu genin amah ‘Topa’ ci thei ahi hiam?
"‘Topa in ka Topa kiangah: Na galte khempeuh na khenuai ah ka koih matengin ka taklamah na tu-in,’”e na ci hi.
Tua hi-a amah David in Topa ci ahileh ama tapa bangci hi thei ding ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
A dawng kik thei khat bek om lo uh a, tua ni-a kipan kuamah in bangmah a dong ngam nawn kei uh hi.
Tua ciangin mihonpite le a nungzuite kiangah Jesu in,
"Moses tutphahah thukham siate le Pharisee-te a tu uh hi.
Tua ahi ciang in amau thu na mang unla, amau hong gen khempeuh na hih un. Ahi hangin amaute in a hilh bangun hih lo uh ahi manin amau hih bangin na hih kei un.
Amaute in vangik pipi lomhenin mite liangko ah suan uh hi. Ahi hangin tuate khin nadingin a khutme nangawn uh a tangsak nuam kei uh hi.
"Amaute hih peuhmah mite muh ding deihin a hih uh hi: Amaute in a phylact-tea uh liansak in, a thunget puante uh a mongtep a sausak uh hi.
Pawi bawlna ah a kipahtawi mun le synagogue-te sunga tutna thupipente ah tu nuam diak uh hi.
Vanzuakna munte ah pibawl ding le ‘Rabbi’ ci-a mite sap ding a ut se uh hi.
"Ahi zongin note ‘Rabbi’ a kici ding na hi kei uh hi. To khat bek nei na hi manun na vekun unau khat na hi uh hi.
Vantunga om Pa khat bek nei na hi manun, leitungah kuamah ‘pa’ na ci kei un.
Sia khat na nei uh a, amah Khristb ahi manin ‘sia’ cih ding kuamah na om kei uh hi.
Note lakah a lianpen note nasem hi ding hi.
Ahang in, amah leh amah a kitawisangte kiniamsak dinga, amah le amah a kiniamsakte kitawisang ding hi.
"No kineihsiam thukham siate le Pharisee-te, gimna nak thuak na nu cia! Note in mite mai ah vantung gam kongkhak na khak uh hi. No lah lut loin a lut nuamte lah na lutsak kei uh hi.c

No kineihsiam thukham siate le Pharisee-te gimna nak thuak na nu cia! Note in meigongte innte na netum uh a, mi theih dingin thu sau pipi na ngen uh hi. Tua ahi manin note a nasiazaw in hong kigawt ding hi.

"No kineihsiam thukham siate le Pharisee-te gimna nak thuak na nu cia! Note in mi khat na khel zawh nadingun leitung le tuitungah na zin kawikawi uh hi. Amah hong kikhel ciangin no zah nihvei-in hell tapa na suaksak uh hi.

"No mittaw lamhilhte, gimna nak thuak na nucia! Note in, ‘Mi khatpeuh biakinnpi-in a kitomlawh leh phamawh lo hi. Ahi hangin biakinnpi sunga khamte-in a kitomlawh leh ama kiciamna in amah a hen hi,’ na ci uh hi.
No mittaw mihaite aw! Tua khamte thupizaw ahi hiam? Ahi kei leh tua khamte a siangthosak biakinnpi thupizaw ahi hiam?
‘Mi khatpeuh biakna-tau-in a kitomlawh hangin pha mawh lo hi. Ahi zongin biakna-tau tunga om nate tomlawhna-a a zang peuhmah ama kiciamna in a hen hi,’ na ci uh hi.
No mittawte aw! Biakna-tau tunga nate le tua nate a siangthosak biakna-tau koi thupizaw ahi hiam?
Tua ahi manin biakna-tau-a tomlopa tua biakna-tau le a tunga om nate khempeuhin a tomlo suak hi.
Biakinnpi-a tomlo mi, tua sunga tengpa tawh tomlo a suak hi.
Vantung tawh a tomlote Pasian tokhom le a tunga tupa-in a tomlo suak hi.

"No kineihsiam thukham siate le Pharisee-te, gimna nak thuak na nu cia! Note in na masalate uh, mint, dill le cummin-te, sawmah khat na pia uh hi. Ahi hangin thukham tawh kisai-a a thupizaw, thutangna, lainatna le muanhuainate na thudon kei uh hi. Amasa thudon lo tuan loin a nunungte na hih ding uh ahi hi.
No mittaw lamhilhte aw! Note in thovai om loh nadingin tui na khaih uh hangin kala-ohe na nawmvalh uh hi.
"No kineihsiam thukham siate le Pharisee-te, gimna nak thuak na nu cia! Note in hai le kuangte a pualam na silsiang uh a, ahi hangin a sungah duhgawlna le angsung khualna tawh kidim hi.
Pharisee mittawte aw! Hai le kuang a sunglam silsiang masa un. Tua ciangin a pualam a siang ding hi.
"No kineihsiam thukham siate le Pharisee-te, gimna nak thuak na nu cia! Note, a pualam etlawm napi a sungah misi guh le nin kihhuai khempeuh a dim a kanga kizut hante tawh na kibang uh hi.
Tua mah bangin mite muhna ah na pualam uh a thumaan a bat hangin na sung uh kineihsiamna le kheltatna tawh a dim hi.
"No kineihsiam thukham siate le Pharisee-te, gimna nak thuak na nu cia! Note in kamsangte han bawlsak in, a dikte aa na zem uh hi.
Tua ciangin, ‘I pu i pa-te khan lai-in eite om hi lehang kamsangte a sisan suah amaute lakah kihel buang kei ni,’ na ci uh hi.
Tuaci-in kamsangte a thatte suan le khak na hihna uh no le no in na langsak uh hi.
Tua ahileh na pu na pa-te uh mawhna tehna dimsak vet ve ua!
"No gulte! No gul gilo mualtan suante! Note meili sung tun nading mawhpaihna pan bangci suahtak thei ding na hi uh hiam?

Tua ahi ciangin note kiangah kamsangte, mipilte le siate kong sawl hi. Amaute pawlkhat thatin, pawlkhatte na kilhcip ding uh hi. Adangte synagogue-te sungah na sat ding uh a, khuapi khat pan khuapi khatah na delh kawi kawi ding uh hi.
Tua bangin mi thumaan Abel sisan-a kipan biakinnpi le biakna-tau kikala na thah uh Berakiah tapa Zechariah sisan dong, leitunga mi thumaante sisan khempeuh no tungah hong tu ding hi.
Thutak kong geninah, hihte khempeuh hih khang mite tungah a tung ding hi.

"Jerusalem aw, Jerusalem, kamsangte thata, na kianga hong kisawlte suang tawh a deng note, akpi in a note a kha nuai-ah a khop bangin na tate ka kaihkhop ding bangzah vei lunggulh ta ka hi hiam, ahi hangin na ut kei uh hi.
En un, na inn uh a hawmmangsa in kinusia hi.
Ken kong geninah, ‘Topa mina hong paipa in thupha a ngah hi’ na cih matengun kei nong mu kik nawn kei ding uh hi,d” a ci hi.
Biakinnpi nusia-in Jesu a paikhiat laitakin tua innte ensak dingin nungzuite a kiangah a pai uh hi.
Jesu in, “Hihte khempeuh na mu uh hiam? Thutak kong geninah, hih taka suang khat tungah suang dang khat beek a kiciang om loin, a vekpi in a kicimmang kiuhkeuh ding hi,” a ci hi.

Olive Vum tungah Jesu a tut laitakin a nungzuite ama kiangah a paisim uh hi. Amaute in “Hih thu cik cianga piang dinga, nong pai kik nading le khanghun bei nading lim bang hi ding hiam, hong hilh in,” a ci uh hi.
Jesu in, “Note kuamah in hong khem zawh loh nadingin na kigalging un.
Keima minin mi tampi hong pai ding uh a, ‘Keimah, Khrista ka hi hi,’ ci-in mi tampi khem ding uh hi.
Galthu le galthuthangte na za ding uh hi; ahi hangin na patau nai peuhmah kei un. Tua thute a piang pelmawh ding mah ahi hi. Ahi hangin a beina hi nai lo hi.
Minam khat le minam khat kido dinga, gam khat le gam khat a kido ding uh hi. Mun tuamtuamah kialpi tung dinga, zin a ling ding hi.
Hihte khempeuh nausuahnat kipatna ahi hi.
"Tua ciangin note bawlsiat ding le thah dingin hong kipiakhia dinga, keima hangin minam khempeuh in note hong mudah ding uh hi.
Tua hun ciangin mi tampitak in upna taisan dinga, khat le khat kimudah in kilehhek ding uh hi.
Kamsang-zuau tampi hong kilangin mi tampi a khem ding uh hi.
Tatsiatna khang ding ahi manin mi tampite ki-itna a kiam ding hi.
Ahi hangin a bei donga kipte in hotkhiatna a ngah ding uh hi.
Tua ciangin mi namkim tungah teci ahi dingin leitung buppi ah kumpi-gam lungdamna-thu kihilh dinga tua khit ciangin beina a tung ding hi.
"Tua hi-a kamsangpa Daniel tung tawna kigensa, mun siangtho ah ‘a hawm mangsak kihhuaina’b a din na muh uh ciangin—a simte in theitel ta hen.
Judea gama omte mualte tungah tai uh hen.
A innkhum tunga omte kuamah inn sungah na khatpeuh la dingin kumsuk kei hen.
Lo-a omte kuamah puantualpi la dingin ciah kik kei hen.
Naupaiite le naungek nei numeite adingin tua nite mulkimhuai lua na’n cia!
Na galtai hun uh phalbi lai le Sabbath ni tawh a kituah loh nadingin thu na ngen un.
Ahang in, leitung piancil a kipan tu hun dong tuazah a om ngei lo le a om ngei nawn lo ding lungdonna hong tung ding hi.
Tua nite kitomsak lo hileh kuamah a suakta zo kei ding hi. Ahi hangin a kiteel mite cihna-in tua nite kitomsak ding hi.
Tua hun ciangin note kiangah mi khatpeuh in, ‘En un, hih lai-ah Khrist om hi! Ahikeh ‘Hua lai-ah om hi,’ hong cih leh um kei un.
Ahang in, Khrist-zuaute le kamsang-zuaute hong kilang ding uh a, ahi thei hileh telsate nangawn a khem nadingun lim le na lamdang lianpipite bawl ding uh hi.
Thei ta un, hih thute a hun ma-in kong hilh hi.
"Tua ahi ciangin note kiangah mi khatpeuh in, ‘Hua gamlakah amah om hi,’ hong cihleh paikhia kei un; ahikeh ‘Inndei sungah amah om hi,’ hong cihleh um kei un.
Ahang in, khuaphelep in nisuahna pan nitumna dong a tanzal bangin Mihing Tapa hong pai ciangin tua bang hi ding hi.
Gan siluang omna peuhpeuh ah musanete a kikhawm ding uh hi.
"Tua lungdonnite khit phetin, ‘ni kimialsak dinga, kha a tang nawn kei ding hi; van panin aksite kiasuk dinga, vana om nate kiling ding hi’c

"Tua hun ciangin vanah Mihing Tapa lim hong kilang dinga, leitung a om minam khempeuh a kap ding uh hi. Vangliatna le minthanna lianpi tawh Mihing Tapa vana meii tungah tuanga hong pai amaute in a mu ding uh hi.
Amah in ngaihtakin pengkul-a sapna tawh tonin a vansawltak-te a sawlkhia ding hi. Amaute in van mong khat pan mong khat dong huih lite panin a teelsa mite a kaikhawm ding uh hi.
"Tu-in hih thute theikung panin na sin un; a hiang menga, a teh a sel ciangin khuakhal nai ta hi, cih na thei uh hi.
Tua mah bangin hih nate na muh uh ciangin tua thud kongbiang dongin hong nai ta hi, cih na thei un.
Thutak kong geninah, hih thute khempeuh a tun khit mateng hih khange mite a bei kei ding uh hi.
Van le lei a mangthang ding hi; ahi hangin ka thute a mangthang ngei kei ding hi.
"A ni le a hun kuamah in a thei kei hi; vana om vansawltakte nangawn in a thei kei uh hi. Tapaf in zong thei lo a, ahi hangin Pa bek in a thei hi.
Mihing tapa hong pai ding, Noah hun lai mah bang hi ding hi.
Tuiciin a tun ma-in gunkuangpi sungah Noah a lut ni dongin mite in ne-in, dawnin, mopi mokha-in a om uh hi.
Tui khanga, amaute a lakmang hun mateng bang thu piang ding cih a thei kei uh hi. Mihing Tapa hong pai ciangin zong tua mah bang hi ding hi.
Lo khokhawm mi nih, khat kila-in khat kinusia ding hi.
An gawi khawm numei nihte khat kila-in khat kinusia ding hi.
"Tua ahi ciangin na Topa uh hong pai ding hun thei lo na hi manun na kigalging un.
Ahi hangin note in hih thu na theitel un: Inn neipa in zan lai bang hunin gutate pai ding hiam, cih theikhol hileh na kigalging dinga, a inn a kiluhsak kei ding hi.
Tua hi-a na lamet loh laitakun Mihing Tapa hong pai ding ahi manin kigingsa in om den un.
"Tua ahileh ama inn sunga nasem dangte ukin, amaute a hunhunin an a pia dinga a pu in a koih a muanhuai a pil nasempa kua ahi hiam?
A pu a ciah kik ciangin tua banga a sep laitak a tuah nasempa a hampha ding hi.
Thutak kong geninah, a pu in tuapa a neihsa khempeuh a saisak ding hi.
Ahi hangin tua nasempa mi tatsia khat hi henla, ‘Ka pu sawt veipi hong tam ding hi,’ ci-in
a naseppihte satin, zu khamkhamte tawh ne-in dawnkhawm leh a,
tua nasempa a pu a upmawhloh ni le a khuadon loh hun laitakin tung leh,
tua nasempa a pu in atnenin, kahna le hagawina a omna munah kineihsiamte tawh a koihkhawm ding hi.
"Tua hun ciangin vantung gam in a meivakte uh kengin zineipa dawn dinga kuankhia nungak bit sawmte tawh kibang ding hi.
Tuate lakah nga hai-a nga a pil hi.
Tua a hai teng in meivak keng napi, meitui a keng kei uh hi.
A pilte in ahileh a meivak uh leh thawl sungah meitui a keng uh hi.
Zineipa tung hak lua ahi manin a vekun ihmut suakin a ihmu uh hi.
"Zankim laitakin, ‘Zineipa hong tung ta hi! Pai-in dawn un!’ ci-in kitangko hi.
"Tua ciangin nungak bitte a vekun khanglo uh a, a meivak uh a puah tek uh hi.
Nungak hai teng in a pilte kiangah, ‘Ka meivak uh mit hi, na meitui uh hong hawm un,’ ci-in ngen uh hi.
"Nungak pilte in, ‘I vek adingin kicing lo ding ahi manin kong hawm zo kei ding uh hi. Tua sangin, pai-in meitui zuakte kiangah no ading va lei un,’ ci uh hi.
"Tua bangin meitui lei dinga a pai kalun, zineipa a tung hi. A kigingkholsa nungakte, zineipa tawh mopawi-ah lutkhawm uh hi. Tua ciangin kong kikhak hi.
"Tua nung ciangin adangte zong pai uh a, ‘Pu aw! Pu aw, kote kong hong hon in!’ ci uh hi.
"Ahi hangin amah in, ‘Thutak kong geninah, note kong thei kei hi,’ ci-in dawng hi.
"Tua ahi manin a ni, a hun thei lo na hi manun na kigingkhol un.
"Tua ciang leuleu-in, mi khatin a nasemte sama, a neihsa teng amaute khutah a kepsak khit ciangin khual a zinkhia mipa tawh kibang ding hi.
Amau hihtheihna ciat tawh kizui-in, nasem khat tungah talenta nga, a dang khat tungah talent nih, adang khat tungah talent khat tua bangin a pia ciat hi. Tua khit ciangin khual a zinsan hi.
Talent nga a ngah pa paikhia pah a, summet bawlin a met talent nga a ngah hi.
Tua mah bangin talent nih a ngah pa in zong a met talent nih mah a ngah hi.
Ahi hangin talent khat a ngah pa paikhia-in lei to-a, a pu sum a phum hi.
"Hun sawtpi khit ciangin tua nasemte’ pu ciah kika, amaute sum kepna thu teng a sittel hi.
Talent nga a ngah pa in adang nga hong tawi thuah a, ‘Pu aw, kei muanga nong kepsak talent nga ahi hi. En in, hih lai-ah a met nga ka ngah hi,’ ci hi.
"A pu in, ‘A hoih a muanhuai nasempa aw, pha hi! Na tawmkha tungah na muanhuai hi; na tampi kong uksak ding hi. Hong pai inla na pu tawh lungdam khawm in!’ ci hi.
"Talent nih a ngah pa zong va pai a, ‘Pu aw, kei muanga nong kepsak talent nih ahi hi. En in, a met nih ka ngah hi,’ ci hi.
"A pu in, ‘A hoih, a muanhuai na sempa aw, pha hi! Na tawmkha tungah na muanhuai hi; na tampi kong uksak ding hi. Hong pai inla na pu tawh lungdam khawm in!’ ci hi.
"Tua ciangin talent khat a ngah pa va pai a, ‘Pu aw, nang mi genhak na hi hi, na vawh lohna munah na at a, khaici na theh lohna munah a kaikhawmpa na hilam ka thei hi.
Tua ahi ciangin kong kihta a paikhia-in na talent lei sungah ka sel hi. En in, nang aa teng mah ahi hi,’ ci hi.
"A pu in, ‘A tatsia, a thadah na sempa aw! Ka vawh lohna munah atin, khaici ka theh lohna munah ka kaihkhop lam thei takpi na hi hiam?
Tua ahileh kong ciah kik cianga a met le a sumpi ka ngah kik theih nadingin bang dinga ka sum, sumsinte na ap lo na hi hiam.
"Tua talent khat ama tung pan lakhia unla, talent sawm neipa na pia un.
Ahang in, a nei peuhmah kipiabeh dinga, tampitak a nei ding hi. A nei lo peuhmah a neihsun nangawn a kilakkhiatsak ding hi.
Kimanna nei lo tua nasempa, kah-na le hagawina a omna mun pualam khuamialna ah paikhia un,’ ci hi.
"Mihing Tapa Vansawltakte khempeuh tawh ama minthanna tawh hong pai ciangin, vantung minthanna kumpi tokhom tungah hong tu ding hi.
Ama mai-ah mi namkim khempeuh kikhawm dinga, tuucingpa in tuu le keel a tuam khen mah bangin mite a tuamkhen ding hi.
Tuute a taklamah koihin keelte a veilamah a koih ding hi.
"Tua hun ciangin Kumpipa in a taklama omte kiangah, ‘Ka Pa in thupha hong piaksate aw, hong pai un; leipiansak cil-a kipan no adinga kibawlsa na luah ding uh gam hong luah un.
Ahang in, ka gilkial laitakin ka nek ding nong pia uh a, ka dangtak laitakin ka dawn ding nong pia uh hi. Mikhual ka hi laitakin zin nong do uh hi.
Puan ka neih loh laitakin nong silhsak uh hi. Ka cinat laitakin nong khoi uh a, ka thong kiat laitakin nong veh uh hi,’ ci ding hi.
"Tua ciangin a thumaante in, ‘Topa aw, na gilkial laitak cikin hong mu-a, hong vakin, na dangtak laitak na dawn ding hong pia ka hi uh hiam?
Mikhual na hi laitak cikin hong mu-a, zin hong do ka hi uh hiam? Puan na neih loh laitak cikin hong mu-a, puan hong silhsak ka hi uh hiam?
Na cinat laitak ahi a, na thongkiat laitak ahi zongin cikin hong mu-a, hong veh ka hi uh hiam?’ ci ding uh hi.
"Kumpipa in, ‘Thutak kong gen-inah, hih ka sanggamte a neupen khat adinga na bawlte khempeuh uh kei adinga hong bawl na hi uh hi,’ ci-in dawng ding hi.
"Tua khit ciangin a veilam a omte kiangah, ‘Hamsiatna a thuakte aw, kei kiang pan taikhia un, dawimangpa le ama vansawltakte adinga kibawlsa tawntung meikuang sungah pai un.
Ahang in, ka gilkial laitakin ka nek ding bangmah nong pia kei uh hi.
Mikhual ka hi laitakin zin nong do kei uh hi. Puan ka kisap laitakin nong silhsak kei uh hi. Ka cinat laitak ahi zongin ka thongkiat laitak ahi zongin nong khoi kei uh hi,’ ci ding hi.

"Amaute in zong, ‘Topa aw, na gilkial laitak, na dangtak laitak, puan na neih loh laitak, mikhual na hi laitak, na cinat laitak le na thongkiat laitak cikin hong mu-a, hong don lo ka hi uh hiam?’ ci-in dawng ding uh hi.
"Amah in, ‘Thutak kong geninah, hihte a neu pen khat adinga na bawl loh khempeuh uh, kei adinga hong bawl lo na hi uh hi,’ ci kik ding hi.
"Tua ciangin amaute tawntung gawtna ah pai ding uh a, a thumaante ahi uh leh tawntung nuntakna ah a pai ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Jesu in hih thu teng a gen khit ciangin a nungzuite kiangah,
"Na theihsa bangun tu zawh ni nih khit ciangin Paisan pawi hong tung dinga - Mihing Tapa kilhcip dingin kipia ding hi,” ci-in a gen hi.
Tua ciangin Caiaphas kici tulpipa innpi-ah siampi makaite le mipite’ upate a kikhawm uh hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in Jesu mansim a thahlup ding a sawmsim uh hi.
Ahi hangin, “Mipite hong so kha ding ahi ciangin Pawi sungah hih kei ni,” a ci uh hi.
Bethany a Simon kici Miphakpa innah Jesu a om laitakin,
a manpha mahmah sathau namtui suangngo thawl khat tawi-in numei khat ama kiangah a pai hi. Sabuai tungah kingama a om laitakin tuanu in a lutungah a sathau namtui a buak hi.
Nungzuite in a muh uh ciangin a lungkim kei uh hi. Amaute in, “Pammaih lel hi lo hiam?
Hih sathau namtui man tampi-in zuakin a sum mizawngte piak tuak zaw hi,” a ci uh hi.
Jesu in a theih ciangin amaute kiangah, “Hih nu bang dinga buaisak na hi uh hiam? Amah in kei tungah a kilawm na hoih khat a hih khin hi.
Mizawngte tawh note na omkhawm den ding uh a, ahi hangin kei tawh na omkhawm den kei ding uh hi.
Ka pumpi sathau nam-tui hong buah ciangin kei kivui nading a bawlkhol ahi hi.
Thutak kong geninah, hih lungdamna-thu a kihilhna leitung mun khempeuh ah amah a kiphawk gige nadingin ama hihsa thu zong a kigen ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciaingin sawm-le-nihte lakah khat - Judas Iscariot kici pa siampi makaite kiangah va pai a,
"Amah note khutah hong pia leng, kei bang nong pia ding uh hiam?” ci-in a dong hi. Tua ciangin amaute in sumtang sawm thum a sehkhia uh hi.
Tua huna kipan Judas in amaute khutah Jesu a piak theih nading hun hoih a ngak gige hi.
Silngo sawh loh Anlum Pawi ni masa pen ni-in Jesu kiangah nungzuite va pai uh a, “Paisan-pawi an nek nading koi lai-ah na bawlkhol le ung na deih hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi.
Amah in, “Khuapi sunga mi khat kiangah, ‘Siapa in: “A kisehsa ka hun tung dek ta hi. Ka nungzuite tawh na innah Paisan-pawi kong bawl ding uh hi, ci hi,’ va ci un,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Tua ciangin nungzuite in Jesu cih bangin Paisan-pawi bawl nading a bawlkhol uh hi.
A nitak ciangin, Sawm-le-nihte le Jesu sabuai ah a kingam uh hi.
Amaute in an a nek laitakun Jesu in, “Thutak kong geninah, note lakah khat in kei hong lehhek ding hi,” a ci hi.
Amaute dah mahmah uh a, a ban banin ama kiangah, “Kei hi buang kei ning maw Topa?” a ci ciat uh hi.
Jesu in, “Kei tawh ankuang a sawk khawmpa in kei hong lehhek ding hi.
Ama thu a kigelhsa bangin Mihing Tapa a pai ding hi. Ahi hangin Mihing Tapa a lehhekpa in gimna nak thuak na zen in cia! A piang vet lo hileh ama adingin hoih zaw ding hi ven,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah lehhek ding pa Judas in, “Kei hi buang kei ning maw Rabbi?” a ci hi. Jesu in, “Hihi, nang na hi hi,”a ci-in a dawng hi.
Amaute in an a nek laitakun, Jesu in anlum la a, lungdam koin balkhama, a nungzuite pia-in, “Hih ka pumpi ahi hi, la unla ne un,” a ci hi.
Tua khit ciangin hai la a, lungdam koin, amaute pia-a, “Hih hai-in dawn kim ciat un.
Mi tampi mawh mai nadinga kibuakhia, thukhunnab ka sisan ahi hi.
Ken kong geninah, ka Pa gam sungah note tawh a thaka ka dawn khawm mateng, tu-a kipan lenggahzu ka dawn nawn kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Amaute in biakna la a sak khit uh ciangin Olive Vum ah a pai uh hi.
Tua ciangin Jesu in amaute kiangah: “‘Tuucingpa ka sat dinga, tuuhonte a kithehthang ding hi,’c ci-a kigelhsa bangin tu zan mahmah in kei hangin na vekun na puk ding uh hi.
Ahi hangin ka thawh kik khit ciangin note mai-ah Gililee gamah ka na pai ding hi,” ci-in a gen hi.
Peter in, “Nang hangin mi khempeuh a puk zongin kei ka puk ngei kei ding hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Jesu in, “Thutak kong geninah, tu zan mahmah ak khuan ma-in thumvei nong kitheihmawhbawl ding hi,” a ci kik hi.
Ahi hangin Peter in, “Nang tawh sihkhawm nading ahi zongin kong kitheihmawhbawl ngei kei ding hi,” a ci teitei hi. Tua mah bangin nungzui dangte in zong a ci ciat uh hi.
Tua khit ciangin Jesu a nung zuite tawh Gethsemane kici munah pai uh a, amaute kiangah, “Hua lai-ah pai-a thu ka nget kalin hih lai-ah na tu un,” a ci hi.
Amah in Peter le Zebedee tapate gel tonpih a, tua ciangin amah dah lua-in a lungmang hi.
Tua ciangin amaute kiangah, “Dah luatna in sih nading zah dongin hong zen hi. Hih lai-ah na om unla, kei tawh kigalging khawm un,” a ci hi.
Tawmkha pai lai-in lei-ah boka, “Pa aw, ahi theih leh hih hai tawh hong kipelhsak in. Ahi zongin kei deih bang hi loin nangma deihna bang hizaw hen,” ci-in thu a ngen hi.
Tua ciangin nungzuite kiangah pai kika, amaute a na ihmu khin uh hi. Jesu in Peter kiangah, “Note in nai khat sung nangawn hong kigalginpih zo lo na hi uh hiam?
Khem na na thuak loh nadingun thungenin kigalging un. A kha a ut hangin pumpi thanem hi,” a ci hi.
Amah a nihveina va pai kika, “Pa aw, hih hai kei dawn loh a kipelh thei lo ahileh, nangma deihna bang hi ta hen,” ci-in thu a ngen hi.
Amaute ihmut suak lua uh ahi manin amah a pai kik ciangin a ihmut laitak uh a tuak leuleu hi.
Tua ciangin amaute nusia-in paikhia leuleu a, a nget ngei mah a thumveina a ngen hi.
Tua khit ciangin nungzuite kiangah pai kik-a, “Note ihmu lailai in tawlnga lailai na hi uh hiam? En un, Mihing Tapa mawhneite khut sungah a kilehhek hun naita hi.
Tho un, pai ta ni! Kei hong lehhekpa hih lai-ah hong pai ta hi!” a ci hi.
Tua banga a paupau laitakin, Sawm le nihte lakah khat Judas a tung hi. Amah tawh, siampi makaite le mipite’ upate in a sawl, namsau le khetbuk tawi mihonpi tawh a tonkhawm hi.
Tua a lehhekpa in, “Ka nap penpen Jesu hi ding hi; tuapa man pah un,” ci-in amaute tawh lim a kilahkholhsa bangin
Jesu kiangah Judas paipah a, “Rabbi dam maw!” ci-in amah a nam hi.
Jesu in, “Lawm aw, hih dinga nong paina hih in,”d ci-in a dawng hi. Tua ciangin mihonte in Jesu nehphei uh a, lencipin a man uh hi.
Tua laitakin Jesu pawlte khat in ama namsau mana, dokin tulpipa nasempa sat-a, a bil a satkhia hi.
Jesu in ama kiangah; “Na namsau a paii ah siat in. Namsau zangte namsau mah in si ding hi.
Ka Pa ko thei lo dingin hong ngaihsun na hi uh hiam? Ko leng ka deih banga ka zat theih ding van sawltak legionb sawm le nih sanga tamzawte thakhatin hong puakpah ding hi.
Tua bang hileh hih bang tektekin piang ding hi, ci-a Laisiangtho gensa bangci tangtun thei ding ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua laitakin Jesu in mihonpite kiang ah, “Kei man dinga namsau le khetbuk tawh nong kuan uh, kumpi langpangte makai ka hi hiam? Nisimin biakinnpi tualte ah thu ka hilh laitakin nong man kei uh hi.
Ahi hangin kamsangte gelhsate a tangtun theih nadingin hih bang teng a piang ahi hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin nungzuite khempeuh amah nusia-in a tai uh hi.
Jesu a mante in thukham siate le upate omkhawmna mun tulpi Caiaphas inn a tun uh hi.
Ahi hangin Peter in tulpipa inntual dong kihal simsimin Jesu a zui hi. Bang thu piang ding hiam, cih thei nuamin inntual ah lut-a a cingte tawh a va tukhawm hi.
Siampi makaite le Sanhedrin buppi in Jesu a thah theih nadingun a langah zuau teci a zong uh hi.
Zuau teci pang tampi a pai uh hangin thu-a santak ding thukho a mu zo kei uh hi. A tawpna ah nih va pai uh a,
"Hih pa in, ‘Pasian biakinnpi susia in nithum sungin ka lam kik thei ding hi,’ ci hi,” ci-in teci a pang uh hi.
Tua ciangin tulpipa dingin Jesu kiangah, “Dawng lo ding na hi hiam? Na lang khata hihte teci pannate bangci bang ahi hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
Ahi hangin Jesu a dai dide hi. Tulpipa in ama kiangah, “Nang Pasian Tapa Khriste na hi hiam hong gen in, ci-in a nungta Pasian ah tomlo-in nang kong sawl hi,” a ci hi.

Jesu in, “Himah ing, na cih bangin ka hi hi. Ahi hangin note khempeuh kiangah kong gen hi: Mailam hunah Mihing Tapa, Thahat Pa’ taklamah tu-in meii tungah hong tuangsuk na mu ding uh hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Tua ciangin tulpipa in a puansilhte balkeka, “Pasian a gendai zo hi! Teci dang kul nawn ding ahi hiam? En un, Pasian a gendaina kam na za zo uh hi.
Bang na ci ngaihsut uh hiam?” a ci hi. Amaute in, “Amah sihsak taak hi,” ci-in a dawng uh hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in a maitang cilphih uh a, a khuttum uh tawh a tum uh hi. Adangte in a pang bengin,
"Khrist aw, nang kua’n hong su hiam, hong gen dih in,” a ci uh hi.
Inntual ah Peter a tut laitakin nasem numei khat a kiangah va pai-in, “Nang zong Galilee mi Jesu tawh na kipawl hi,” va ci hi.
Ahi hangin amah in, “Na thu gente ka thei kei hi,” ci-in amaute khempeuh mai ah a nial hi.
Tua ciangin inntualkong lam manawhin a pai leh numei dang khat in amah mu-a, mipite kiangah, “Hih pa Nazareth mi Jesu tawh kipawl hi,” a ci hi.
Amah in, “Tua mipa ka thei kei hi,” ci-in tomlo-in a nial kik hi,
Tawlkhat khit ciangin tua lai-a dingte Peter kiangah va pai uh a, “Ama pawlte lakah khat na hi taktak hi; na aw suah in zong kithei hi,” a va ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin amah le amah kihamsiat-in, “Tuapa ka thei peuhmah kei hi!” ci-in amaute mai-ah a kiciam hi. Tua khit phetin ak a khuang hi.
Tua ciangin, “Akkhuan ma-in kei thum vei nong kitheihmawhbawl ding hi,” ci-a Jesu gen Peter in a phawk hi. Tua ciangin amah a pualamah pusuak a, kah cihtakin a kap hi.
Zingsang tungin siampi ma-kaite le mipite’ upate khempeuh in Jesu, thah dingin a khensat uh hi.
Amaute in amah henin paikhiatpih uh a, ukpipa Pilate khutah a pia uh hi.
Amah lehhekpa Judas in Jesu a kimawhpaih lam a muh ciangin mawh kisa in dah lua ahi manin siampi makaite le upate kiangah ngun tang sawmthum va pia kik-a,
"Ka mawh zo hi; mawhpeng sisan ka lehhek zo hi,” a ci hi. Amaute in, “Tua leh ko bang kisai ahi hiam? Tua pen nangma thu hi hen,” ci-in a dawng uh hi.
Tua ciangin Judas in a sumte biakinnpi sungah lawnin a paisan hi. Tua khit ciangin amah paikhia a, amah le amah a gui-awk hi.
Siampite in sumtangte tawm uh a, “Hih sum sisan man ahi manin sumkholna sunga koih ding thukham tawh kilehbulh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ahi ciangin amaute in tua sum, gamdang mite kivuina mun dingin belseekpa lo leina-a zat dingin a khensat uh hi.
Tua hangin tua mun, tuni dong Sisan Lo, kici hi.
Tua hunin, kamsangpa Jeremiah gensa: “Israel mipite in ama man ding a ciangtansa bangin, amaute in sumtang sawmthum la uh a,
Topa in kei hong thupiak bangin bellei lakna mun lei nadingin tua sumte a zang uh hi,”a cih thu a tangtung hi.
Tua hun laitakin ukpipa mai-ah Jesu a ding hi. Ukpipa in ama kiangah, “Nang Jew-te kumpipa na hi hiam?” ci-in a dong hi. Jesu in, “Hi mah hi, na cih bangin ka hi hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Siampi makaite le upate in amah a mawhsak uh ciangin amah’n a dawng kik kei hi.
Tua ciangin Pilate in, “Amaute in nang langa a teci pannate uh za lo na hi hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
Ahi hangin Jesu in dawng lo a, amau mawhmatnate khat beek nangawn a dawng kik peuhmah kei hi. Tua pen ukpipa in lamdang a sa mahmah hi.
Tua lai-in Pawi kibawl hunin mipite teel thongkia khat ta khahkhiat ding, ukpipa ngeina ahi hi.
Tua laitakin Barabbas kici a gilo-a minthang thongkia khat a om hi.
Tua ahi ciangin mihonpite a kikhop uh ciangin Pilate in amaute kiangah, “Barabbas le Khrist kici Jesu kua zaw khah leng na deih uh hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
Ahang in, amaute in Jesu a hazat manun ama khutah pia uh ahilam a thei hi.
Pilate a thukhenna tokhom ah a tut laitakin a zi in, “Tua mawhpengpa bangmah na cih kha kei in; ama hangin tuni-in ka mangin tampitak ka thuak hi,” ci-in thu a khak hi.
Ahi hangin in, Barabbas khaha, Jesu thah dinga a nget nadingun siampi makaite le upate in mihonpite a thuzawh uh hi.
Ukpipa in, “Kua zaw hong khahkhia leng na deih uh hiam?” ci-in a dong hi. Amaute in, “Barabbas,” a ci uh hi.
Pilate in, “Tua ahileh Khrist kici Jesu bang ka cih ding hiam?” ci-in a dong hi. Amaute in a vekpi un, “Amah kilhlum in!” ci-in a dawng uh hi.
Pilate in, “Bang hang in? Amah’n bang tatkhialhna nei ahi hiam?” ci-in a dong hi. Ahi hangin amaute in, “Amah kilhlum in,” ci-in a ngaihzaw-in a kiko uh hi.
Pilate in a cih nading thei lo tham loin mipite so dinga kipan a muh ciangin tui la-in mihonpite mai-ah a khut sil-a, “Hih pa sisan tawh kisai-in ka mawhpeng hi. Nomau thuthu hi ta hen,” a ci hi.
Mipite khempeuh in, “Ama sisan kote tung le ka suan ka khakte uh tungah tu ta hen!” ci-in a dawng uh hi.
Tua ciangin amaute kiangah Barabbas a khahkhia hi. Ahi hangin Jesu a satsak khit ciangin kilhlup dingin amaute khutah a pia hi.
Tua ciangin ukpipa galkapte in ukpipa innpi ah Jesu paipih uh a, galkap company buppi a kimah a umcihsak uh hi.
Amaute in Jesu puan hawkkhiatsakin kumpi puan dupsan khat silhsak uh a,
ling tawh kumpi lukhu khat phanin a lutungah a khusak uh hi. A taklam khutah ciangkhut khat tawisak uh a, a mai-ah khukdinin, “Jew-te kumpipa aw, khansawt in,” ci-in a zahko uh hi.
Amah cilphihin, a ciangkhut la kik uh a, a lutang a satsat mai uh hi.
Amah a zahko khit uh ciangin a kumpi puan suahkhiat sak uh a, ama puan a silhsak kik uh hi. Tua khit ciangin kilhlup dingin amah a paikhiatpih uh hi.
Amaute a paikhiat laitakun Simon kici Cyrene pana mi khat tuak uh a, zawhthawh thu-in singlamteh a puasak uh hi.
Amaute Golgotha (Luguh mun cihna) kici mun a tung uh hi.
Tua lai-ah a khaa tawh kihel lenggahzu a pia uh hi. Ahi hangin a ciap ciangin a dawn nuam kei hi.
Singlamteh tungah Jesu a kilh khit uh ciangin amaute in ai saninb ama puan a hawm uh hi.
Tua ciangin amaute tu-in amah a vil uh hi.
Amaute in: HIH JEW-TE KUMPIPA, JESU HI, ci-in a mawhmatna uh lai, a lutung sanah a suang uh hi.
Misuamte nih a taklam khat, a veilam khat, singlamteh ah a kilh uh hi.
Tua lai a tawnte in amah engko uh a lupeisanin,
"Biakinnpi susia-a ni thum sunga lam kik zo ding pa aw, nang le nang kihonkhia in! Pasian Tapa na hileh singlamteh tung pan hong kumsuk in!” a ci uh hi.
Tua mah bangin siampi makaite, thukham siate le upate in amah a zahko uh hi.
Amaute in, “Amah in midangte honkhia zo napi, amah le amah kihonkhia zo lo pi! Amah Israel-te kumpipa hi ven! Tu laitakin singlamteh tung pan hong kumsuk leh amah um ni.
Amah’n Pasian a muang hi. ‘Pasian Tapa ka hi;’ a cih buangin Pasian in a ut leh amah tu-in hon ta hen,” a ci uh hi.
Tua mah bangin amah tawh kikhai khawm misuamte in zong a eng koko uh hi.
Tua gam bupah nai gukna-a kipan nai kuana dong khim a zing hi.
Nai kua hun pawlin Jesu in, “Eloi, Eloi, c lama sabachthani?” ci-in nakpi in a kiko hi. A khiatna, “Ka Pasian, ka Paisan aw, bang hangin kei hong paisan na hi hiam?”d cihna ahi hi.
Tua lai-a ding mi pawlkhat in hih a cih a zak uh ciangin, “Amah’n Elijah sam hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua khit phetin amaute lakah khat va tai a tuihup a va la hi. Lenggahzu thuk sungah tuihup a diah khit ciangin, ciang dawnah koihin Jesu dawn dingin a pia hi.
Ahi hangin adangte in, “Bangmah cih dah dih in; amah honkhia dingin Elijah hong pai hiam en phot dih ni,” a ci uh hi.
Jesu nakpi in a kiko khit ciangin a kha a khah hi.
Tua hun lianin biakinnpi puanzak alu pan ataw dong kikekin phel nih a suak hi. Lei kilokin suangtumpite kitamkham hi.
Hante kihonga, a sisa misiangthote luang tampi hing kikin a tho hi.
Amaute han panin pusuakkhia uh a, Jesu thawhkik khit ciangin khuapi siangtho sungah pai-in mi tampi kiangah a kilang uh hi.
Jesu luang a cingte le zakhat-ukpa in, zinling le thupiang teng a muh uh ciangin lau mahmah uh a, “Pasian Tapae lah a hi takpi a!” a ci uh hi.
A gamla sim pana a galvil numei tampi tua lai-ah a om uh hi. Amaute, Jesu kisapnate a hihsak dingin Galilee pana amah a zuite ahi uh hi.
Tuate lakah Mary Magdalene, James le Joseph-te nu Mary le Zebedee tate’ nu a om uh hi.
Nitak lam ciangin Jesu nungzui a suak khin Joseph min nei mihau khat Arimathea panin va pai hi.
Amah Pilate kiangah pai-a Jesu luang a nget ciangin, amah piak dingin Pilate in thu a pia hi.
Joseph in siluang la a, saihadial puan siangtho-in a tun khit ciangin,
amah mah in suangpi a khuak han thak sungah a sial hi. Tua han kongvang suangtumpi khatin a huk khit ciangin a paikhia hi.
Mary Magdalene le Mary dang khat han galsan takah a tu uh hi.
Kiginkholh Ni khit a zingciang in Pilate kiangah siampi makaite le Pharisee-te a pai uh hi.
Amaute in, “Pu aw, tua mikhempa in a nuntak lai-in, ni thum khit ciangin ka tho kik ding hi,’ a cih ka phawk gige uh hi.

Tua ahi ciangin a ni thum ni dong tua han, bangmah a kicih loh nadingin thu pia in. Tua hi kei leh a nungzuite pai-in a luang gu ding uh a, amah misi pan tho zo hi, ci-in mite kiangah gen kha ding uh hi. Tua hileh hong khem masak sangin hong khem nunung a nasiazaw lai ding hi,” a ci uh hi.
Pilate in, “A cing mi khat paipih un. Pai unla na theih bangun tua han a muanhuai theithei dingin na bawl un,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amaute pai uh a, han kongvang khakna suang tungah seal in ciamteh uh a, a bit nadingin a cingsak uh hi.
Sabbath ni khit nipikal ni masa pen ni, phalvak tungin Mary Magdalen le adang Mary-te han hawh dingin a pai uh hi.
Ziin nakpi-in a ling hi; Topa vansawltak khat, van panin paisuk a, tua hanah pai-in han kongvang khakna suang likkhia-in, a tungah a tu hi.
Ama mel khuaphelep banga, a puante vuk bangin a pak hi.
Han cingte in amah kihta mahmah uh ahi manin liingin a si tawh kibang uh hi.
Vansawltak in numeite kiangah, “Lau kei un, a kikilhlum Jesu a zong na hilam uh ka thei hi.
Amah hih lai-ah om lo hi; a gensa bang tektekin tho kik zo hi. Hong pai-in a kisialna mun hong en un.

Tua khit ciangin pai mengmeng unla a nungzuite kiangah, ‘Amah misi pan tho kik khina, note mai-ah Gililee ah a pai hi. Tua lai-ah amah na mu ding uh hi,’ ci-in va gen un. Tu-in no kong hilh khin hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin tua numeite lau le lungdam mahmah thuahin a nungzuite kiangah tua thu gen dingin han panin manlangtakin a tai uh hi.
Jesu in amaute thakhatin na dawntuah a, “Dam maw,” ci-in a hopih hi. Amaute ama kiangah pai uh a, a khete kawi-in a bia uh hi.
Tua ciangin Jesu in amaute kiangah, “Lau kei un. Pai unla, ka sanggamte Galilee a pai dingin na sawl un; tua lai-ah kei hong mu ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Numeite lampi ah a pai laitakun, han cingte pawlkhat khuapi sungah pai uh a, thu piang khempeuh siampi makaite kiangah a ko uh hi.
Siampi makaite le upate a kisuktuah khit uh ciangin ngaihsutna khat a geel uh hi. Galkapte sum tampi pia uh a,
"‘Zan laitakin a nungzuite hong pai uh a, ka ihmut kalun a luang a gumang uh hi,’ ci un.
Hih thukohna gam ukpipa kiang a tun leh kote in amah ka na lungkimsak ding uh a, na buai loh nadingun kong hu ding uh hi,” ci-in a sawl uh hi.
Tua ciangin galkapte in sumte sang uh a, a hilh bangbangun a hih uh hi. Tua hi-a tuni ciang dong Jew-te lakah hih thu a kigen kawikawi hi.
Tua ciangin nungzui sawm-le-khatte Galilee ah pai uh a, Jesu in amaute pai nadinga a genna mun mual tungah a pai uh hi.
Amaute in amah a muh uh ciangin a bia uh hi. Ahi hangin pawlkhat a lunghei nei lai uh hi.
Tua ciangin amaute kiangah Jesu pai a, “Vantung le leitungah thuneihna khempeuh kei hong kipia khin hi.
Tua ahi manin pai unla, minamte khempeuh nungzui na suaksak un; Pa, Tapa le Khasiangtho minina na baptise unla,
kong thupiak khempeuh a zuih nadingun na hilh un. Khanghun a bei tektek dong a tawntungin note kong ompih taktak ding hi,” a ci hi.
Pasian Tapaa Jesu Khrist tawh kisai lungdamna-thu a kipatna.
Kamsangpa Isaiah lai sungah: “Na lampi a sialkhol dingin, ka thupuakpa na mai-ah ka sawl ding hi,”b
"Gamlak-a kikopa aw in ‘Topa ading lampi sialkhol unla, ama lampi na tangsak un,’”c ci-in kigelh hi.
Tua bangin John in sehnel-gam kual sungah baptise in mawhnate maisak nading kisikna tawh kisai baptisena thu hilh in a pai hi.
Judea gam sung teng le Jerusalem a mite khempeuh ama kiangah a pai uh hi. A mawhnate uh pulak uh a, amah in Jordan Gun sungah a baptise hi.
John in kala-oh mul tawh kibawl puan silhin savun kawnggak a gak hi. Kauphe le gamlak khuaizu an in a nei hi.
Ama thupuak hih ahi hi: “Ka nungah kei sanga vanglianzaw khat hong pai ding hi. Kun in ama khedap khaute sut ding nangawnin ka kilawm kei hi.
Kei in note tui ind kong baptize hi. Ahi hangin amah in note Khasiangtho in hong baptize ding hi.”
Tua hunin Galilee gam Nazareth panin Jesu pai-a, Jordan gun sungah John a kibaptisesak hi.
Tui lakpanin Jesu a paikhiat toh laitakin van kihong a, ama tungah vakhu bangin Kha a kumsuk a mu hi.
Tua laitakin vantung panin aw khat ginga, “Nang, ka it ka Tapa na hi hi; nang tungah ka lungkim mahmah hi,” a ci hi.
Thakhatin Kha in amah sehnelgamah sawlpah a,
Satan zia-etna thuakin ni sawmli sung a om hi. Gamsate tawh amah omkhawm a, vansawltakte in a don uh hi.
John thong a kiat khit ciangin Pasian lungdamna thuthak tangko in Galilee gam sungah Jesu va pai hi.
Amah in, “A hun hong tung zo hi. Pasian gam hong nai ta hi. Kisik unla thupha um un!” a ci hi.
Galilee Tuipi gei-a Jesu a pai laitakin nga beng mi ahi Simon le a sanggampa Andrew-te in tui sungah len a khuh laitak uh a mu hi.
Jesu in, “Hong pai unla kei hong zui un. Mi a mante kong suaksak ding hi,” a ci hi.
Amau zong a lente uh nusia pah in amah a zui uh hi.
Tua pan tawmkha a pai lai leh Zebedee tapa James le a sanggampa John, a lente uh puaha gunkuang sunga om a mu hi.
Amah in amaute sampah a, amau zong a pa uh Zebedee le sumthalawhte gunkuang sungah nusia-in amah a zui uh hi.
Amaute Capernaum ah pai uh a, Sabbath ni a tun ciangin synagogue ah Jesu lutin thuhilh a kipan hi.
Thukham siate bang hi loin thuneipa khat bangin a hilh manin mite in a thuhilh zia lamdang a sa mahmah uh hi.
Tua laitakin synagogue sungah kha giloe a lut mi khat in,
"Nazareth mi Jesu aw, kote bang hong cih nuam na hi hiam? Kote susia dingin hong pai na hi hiam? Nang kua na hiam cih kong thei hi - Pasian Mi Siangtho na hi hi!” ci-in a kiko hi.
Jesu in khauhtakin, “Pau ken! Ama sung pan paikhia in!” a ci hi.
Kha gilo in tua mipa a pumlinsak gawp khit ciangin kiko zekzak kawmin a paikhia hi.

Mite in lamdang sa mahmah uh a, “Hih in bang ahi hiam? Thuneihna tawh thuhilhna thak khat hilh mawk! Kha gilote thu a piak ciang nangawnin amaute in a mang tazen uh hi,” ci-in khat le khat a kidong uh hi.
Galilee kual bupah ama thu a kizel khinpah hi.
Synagogue pan amaute a paikhiat khit phetun James le John tawh Simon le Andrew-te innah a hawh uh hi.
Simon sungnu nattun a lupna-a lum ahilam amaute in Jesu kiangah a gen uh hi.
Tua ciangin ama kiangah Jesu pai-a, a khut lenin a phongto hi. A nattun dam a, amaute a zindo hi.
Tua nitak, ni a tum khit ciangin mite in cinate le dawilutte khempeuh Jesu kiangah a puak uh hi.
Khuazangpi in kongkhak kiangah kikhawm uh a,
natna tuamtuam a vei mi tampi Jesu in a damsak hi. Amah in dawi tampi zong hawlkhia a, tua dawite in amah kua hiam cih thei uh ahi manin Jesu in amaute pau ding a phal kei hi.
Zingkhangpi phalvak ma-in Jesu tho a, tua inn panin gamdaihna munah pai-in tua lai-ah thu a ngen hi.
Simon le a pawlte amah zong dingin a pai uh hi.
Amah a muh uh ciangin, “Mi khempeuh in nang hong zong uh hi lo hiam!” ci-in a ko uh hi.
Jesu in, “Thu hilh dinga hong pai ka hi manin hih khuate khatpeuhah thuhilh dingin paikhia ni” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah Galilee gam sung tengah zin kawikawi a, synagogue-te ah thu hilhin dawite a hawlkhia hi.
Miphakf khat a kiangah va pai a, khukdinin, “Ut peuh lecin nong siangsak thei hi,” ci-in a thum hi.
Khuatuahna tawh Jesu kidimin, a khut zana, tuapa lawngin, “Ka ut hi. Siang ta in!” a ci hi.
Tua khit phetin a phak natna in amah nusia-a, a damsiang hi.
Jesu in vauhilhna khauh tawh amah sawlkhiapah a,
"Hih thu kuamah hilh peuhmah kei in. Ahi hangin pai inla siampipa kiangah va kilak in; amaute tungah teci pang na suah nadingin na sian nading a Moses thupiak biakpiakna na pia in,” a ci hi.

Tuapa in tua banga a hih sangsikin paikhia-a genthang in tua thu a kizelsak hi. Tua hangin khuapi sungah Jesu a langtangin lut thei nawn lo-a, a pualam kuama om lohna munmun ah a om kawikawi hi. Tua hi napi mun khempeuh panin mihonte ama kiangah a pai veve uh hi.
Ni tawmvei khit Capernaum ah Jesu a lut kik ciangin inn tung kik hi, cih thu mite in a za uh hi.
Inn pua nangawnah om nading om lo zah dongin mi tampi va kikhawm uh a, amah in amaute kiangah thu a hilh hi.
Mi pawlkhat va pai uh a, mi li in a zawn pumzaw khat a kiangah a paipih uh hi.
Mihonpite hangin Jesu kiang a tut theih loh manun Jesu tung santak innkhum phelkhia in vangsak uh a, tua ciangin a zawna phekin pumzawpa a khaisuk uh hi.
Jesu in amaute upna a muh ciangin pumzawpa kiangah, “Tapa aw, na mawhnate kimaisak zo hi,” a ci hi.
Tua lai-a tu thukham siate pawlkhat in,”
Bang hangin hih pa tua bangin pau ahi hiam? Amah in Pasian a gendai hi! Pasian longal kua in mawhna maisak thei ahi hiam!” ci-in a ngaihsun uh hi.
Amaute lungsim sunga a ngaihsutna uh Jesu in a kha-in theipah ahi manin amaute kiangah, “Hih thute bang hangin ngaihsun na hi uh hiam?
Pumzawpa kiangah, ‘Na mawhnate kimaisak zo hi,’ cih ding le, ‘Tho in, na phek la-in pai in,’ cih ding koi baihzaw ahi hiam?
Ahi hangin Mihing Tapa in hih leitungah mawh maisak theih nading thu nei hi, cih na theih nadingun...,” a cih khit ciangin pumzawpa kiangah,
"Tho in, na phek la inla innah ciah in, kong ci hi,” a ci hi.
Amah tho a, a phek la-in amaute khempeuh muhin a paikhia hi. Mi khempeuh in lamdang mahmah sa uh a, “Hih bang peuhmah mu ngei nai kei hang maw!” kici-in Pasian a phat uh hi.
Khatvei tuilipi gei-ah Jesu a pai leuleu hi. Mihon tampi ama kiangah va pai uh a, amah in amaute thu a hilh hi.
Amah a pai kawikawi laitakin Alphaeus tapa Levi, siahdonna bukno sunga tu a mu hi. Jesu in, “Kei hong zui in,” a cih ciangin Levi dingto in a zui hi.
Levi innah Jesu in nitak-an a nek laitakin mi tampi in a nung zui ahi manin siahdongte tampi le “mawhneite” in amah le a nungzuite tawh a nekhawm uh hi.

Thukham sia ahi Pharisee-te in “mawhneite” le siahdongte tawh an a nekkhawm a muh uh ciangin, “Amah in bang hangin siahdongte le “mawhneite” tawh ankuang umkhawm ahi hiam?” ci-in a nungzuite kiangah a dong uh hi.
Jesu in hih thu a zak ciangin amaute kiangah, “Siavuan kisam cidamte hi loin cinate hizaw hi. A thumaante sam dinga hong pai ka hi kei a, mawhneite sam dinga hong pai ka hi hi,” a ci hi.

John nungzuite le Pharisee-te in an a tang uh hi. Jesu kiangah mi pawlkhat va pai uh a, “John nungzuite le Pharisee-te nungzuite in an tang napi bang hangin nang nungzuite in an tang lo uh hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi.
Jesu in, “Zineipa tawh a omkhawm kimlai bangci in mopawi simte in an tang thei ding uh hiam? Zineipa tawh a omkhawm lai tengun an a tang thei kei ding uh hi.
Ahi hangin amaute kiang pan zineipa a kilakkhiat hun hong tung ding hi. Tua ni ciangin amaute in an a tang ding uh hi.
"Kuamah in a ton nai lo puanbekin puanlui a thuap ngei kei hi. A thuap leh tua puanthak them in puanlui kaikekin a kek semsem ding hi.

Savun-um lui sungah lenggahzu thak kuamah in a thun ngei kei hi. Tua bangin thun leh lenggahzu in savun-um phukham dinga, lenggahzu le savun-um a kisia khawm ding hi. Tua bang hi lo zaw in, savun-um thak sungah lenggahzu thak thun zaw hi,” a ci hi.
Sabbath ni khat Jesu buhlei tawnin a pai hi. Nungzuite in a pai kawmkawmun buhvuite a zut uh hi.
Pharisee-te in a kiangah, “En in, bang hangin amaute Sabbath ni-in thukham tawh kituak loin gamta uh hiam?” a ci uh hi.
Amah in, “David le a pawlte in a gilkial laitak uh le a kisap laitakun bang hih uh cih sim ngei nai lo na hi.uh hiam?
Tulpi Abiathar hunlai-in Pasian inn sungah amah luta, siampite bekin a nek theih a ki-apsa anlum ne-in, a pawlte zong a pia hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Tua ciangin amah in amaute kiangah, “Mite adingin Sabbath kibawl hi-a Sabbath ni adingin mite a kibawl kei hi.
Tua hi-a Mihing Tapa, Sabbath ni Topa nangawn ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Khatvei synagogue ah a pai leh a khut teem mi khat a na om hi.
Amaute lakah pawlkhat in Jesu a mawhmat nading uh zongin, tua mipa Sabbath ni-in a damsak kha hiam, ci-in a vil gige uh hi.
Jesu in khutteem pa kiangah, “Mi khempeuh mai-ah ding dih in,” ci-in a sawl hi.

Tua ciangin Jesu in amaute kiangah, “Sabbath ni-in a sia hih ding le a pha hih ding, nuntakna hot ding le thah ding, koi pen thukham tawh kituakzaw hiam?” ci-in a dong hi. Ahi hangin amaute a dai khipkhep uh hi.
Amah hehin akim apam en-a, amaute lungkhauhna hangin lungdong ngeungau-a khutteempa kiangah, “Na khut zan in,” ci-in a sawl hi. Amah in a khut a zan leh, a sa dim kikin a damsiang kiuhkeuh hi.
Tua ciangin Pharisee-te paikhia uh a, Jesu a thah theih nadingun Herod pawlte tawh a geelsim uh hi.
Jesu a nungzuite tawh tuilipi lamah kihemkhia uh a Galilee panin mihon tampi in a zui uh hi.
Amaute in ama hihte khempeuh a zak uh ciangin Judea, Jerusalem, Idumea le Jordan gungal kual teng le Tyre le Sidon kima gamte panin mi tampi in amah a zuan uh hi.
Mihonpite in amah a nehcip gawp khak loh nadingin gunkuang khat kigingsa-a a koih nadingun Jesu in a nungzuite kiangah a gen hi.
Ahang in, amah in mi tampi damsak khin ahi manin a cina laite in amah lawng nuamin mailam a phu tentan uh hi.
Amah kha gilotea in a muh peuhpeuh uh ciangin a mai-ah bokin, “Pasian Tapa na hi hi,” ci-in a kiko uh hi.
Ahi hangin amah kua hiam, cih a gen loh nadingun amaute thukhauh a pia hi.
Jesu mualtung lamah kahto a, ama deihte a kiangah samin amaute in amah a zuan uh hi.
Amah in sawm-le-nihte sehkhia-a, sawltakpi,b ci-in a minvawh hi. Tua in amaute ama kiangah a om theih nading, thu hilh ding le
dawite hawlkhiat theihna thuneihna nei-a a sawlkhiat theih nading ahi hi.
A sehkhiat sawm le nihte hih teng ahi hi: Simon (Peter min a phuah);
Zebedee tapa James le a sanggampa John (Vanging Tapate cih nopna in amau unau Boanerges, ci-a min a phuah);
Andrew, Philip, Bartholomew, Matthew, Thomas, Alphaeus tapa James, Thaddaeus, Zealot pawl-a Simon
le amah lehhekpa Judas Iskariot-te ahi hi.
Tua ciangin Jesu inn khatah luta mihonpite va kikhawm leuleu uh ahi manin amah le a nungzuite in an nangawn a ne thei kei uh hi.
A innkuanpihte in hih thu a zak uh ciangin, “Amah a lungmawk ahi hi,” ci-in a kemcing dingin a pai uh hi.
Jerusalem pana paisuk thukham siate in, “Ama sungah Beelzebubc lut hi! Amah in dawite kumpitapa suangin dawite a hawlkhia hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ahi ciangin Jesu in amaute samin gentehnate zangin amaute kiangah thu gen a, “Bangci bangin Satan in Satan hawlkhia thei ding ahi hiam?
Amah le amah kilangpanga a kikhenthang kumpi-gam a kip kei hi.
Amah le amah kilangpanga kikhenthang innkuan a kip kei ding hi.
Tua ahi ciaingin Satan, amah le amah kilangpangin kikhenthang leh a kip kei ding hi; ama beina a tung ta hi.
A taktak in mi khatpeuh in mihatpa hencip masa loin tuapa inn sungah lutin a neihsa bangci puakkhiatsak thei ding ahi hiam? A hencip khit ciangin a inn a luh thei pan ding hi.
Thutak kong geninah, mite mawhnate khempeuh le Pasian gen dainate khempeuh kimaisak ding hi.
Ahi hangin Khasiangtho a gendai peuhmah a kimaisak ngei kei ding hi; amah tawntung khialhna ah a mawh hi,” a ci hi.
Amaute in, “Amah in kha gilo nei hi,” a cihna uh hangin amah in hih thu a gen hi.
Tua ciangin Jesu nu le a sanggamte a tung uh hi. Amaute innpua ah ding uh a, amah sam dingin inn sungah mi khat a sawl uh hi.
A kimkotah mihonpi tu uh a, amaute in ama kiangah, “Na nu le na sanggamte nang hong zongin inn pua-ah om uh hi,” ci-in a hilh uh hi.
Amah in, “Ka nu kua hi a, ka sanggamte kua ahi hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
Tua ciangin amah in a kimkot-a tute en a, “Hih lai-ah ka nu le ka sanggamte a om uh hi!
Pasian deihna a hih peuhpeuh ka sanggampa, ka sanggamnu le ka nu ahi uh hi,” a ci hi.
Hun dang khatin Jesu in tuilipi gei-ah thuhilh a kipan hi. Ama kimkota kikhawm mi tam lua ahi manin tuilipi tunga gunkuang sungah kahin a tu hi. Mipite ahileh tui gei sehtak tungah a tu uh hi.
Amah in amaute gentehnate tawh na tampi hilh a:
"Ngai un! Lokhopa khat ama khaici vawh dingin a kuankhia hi.
Khaici a vawh ciangin pawlkhat lamdung-ah tu-a, vasate pai-in tawmin a nemang uh hi.
Pawlkhatte leitak tam lohna mun, suang lakah a tu hi. Leitak dai ahi manin popah sam hi.
Ahi hangin ni a san ciangin ankungte kangdulh a, zung kha zo lo ahi manin vulpah hi.
Adang pawlkhatte ling lakah tu-a, lingkungte khangin ankungte depgawp ahi manin gah a gah zo kei hi.
Adang pawlkhatte leuleu lei hoihna ah a tu hi. Ankung po-a, khangtoin, a kivawh zah sawmthum, sawmguk tham lo zakhat nangawn a gahkhia hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Jesu in, “Bil nei peuh in za ta hen,” a ci hi.
Amah kia a om laitakin, Sawm-le-nihte le ama kima om adangte in tua gentehna thute, amah a dong uh hi.
Amah in amaute kiangah, “Note tungah Pasian gam thusim hong kipia zo hi. Ahi hangin a pualama omte gentehnate tawh ka hilhna pen,

"‘Amaute in mu ngitnget napi, mutel ngei lo ding uh a, za ngitnget napi, a theitel ngei kei ding uh hi; tua hi kei leh amaute lunghei in, kimaisak kha ding hi!’a cih a tangtun nading ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Jesu in amaute kiangah, “Hih gentehna theitel lo na hi uh hiam? Tua ahileh gentehna khatpeuh bangci theihtel thei ding na hi uh hiam?
Lokhopa in thu a vawh hi.
Mi pawlkhatte thu kivawhna lamdung a tu khaici tawh kibang uh hi. Tua thu a zak phetun Satan va pai-a amaute sunga kivawhsa thu a lak mangsak hi.
Adangte, suang laka tu khaici tawh kibangin thu ngai uh a, lungdamin a sangpah uh hi.
Ahi hangin zung kha lo ahi manin tawmvei sung bek a hing zo hi. Thu hangin lungmanna ahi zongin bawlsiatna ahi zongin a tun ciangin a pukmang pah uh hi.
Adangte leuleu, ling laka tu khaici kivawh tawh kibang uh hi; thu ngai uh a,
ahi hangin leitung nuntak nading lunghimawh nate, hauhna’ khemna-te le nadangte lunggulhna lutin, thu depgawp a, gah a gahsak kei hi.
A dangte lei hoihna-a tu khaici tawh kibang uh hi; thu ngai-in sang uh a, a kivawh zah sawmthum, sawmguk tham lo za khat nangawn a gahkhia uh hi,” a ci hi.
Amah in amaute kiangah, “Note in kuangkum nuai peuh lupna nuai peuh a koih dingin meivak keng na hi uh hiam? A tunna tungah tungzaw hi lo na hi uh hiam?
Ahang in, a ki-imcip peuhmah a kigenkhia ding cihnopna hi-a, a kiselcip peuhmah a kipholak ding cihnopna ahi hi.
Zak nading bil nei peuh in za ta hen,” a ci hi.
Amah in, “Na zakte uh limtakin ngaihsun un. Midangte aa na tehna uh tawh no aa zong hong kitehsak tham loin a tamzaw in hong kiteh kik ding hi.
A nei peuhmah a kipia beh ding hi; a nei lo peuhmah a neihsun nangawn a kilak khiatsak ding hi,” a ci lai hi.
Amah in, “Pasian gam pianzia hih bang ahi hi: Mi khat in leitungah khaici a vawh hi.
Amah in khaici pianzia a theih loh hangin a sun a zan, a ihmut kal ahi zongin, a hah sung ahi zongin khaici po in na khang hi.
Lei in ama thu-in gah a gahsak hi. A masa penin a kung, tua khit ciangin a vui, tua khit ciangin a vui sungah atak a piangsak hi.
Buh a min phetin an lak hun tung ta ahi manin phiaukawi tawh a at hi,” zong a ci lai hi.
Amah in, “Pasian gam pianzia bang tawh kibang ci ding i hi hiam? Bang gentehna zangin telgen ding i hi hiam?
Pasian gam in lei sunga na tuh khaici neupen ankam tang tawh kibang hi.
Ahi zongin a kituh ciangin khangto-a, huan ankungte khempeuh lakah a lian pen suakin vana vasate a lim belin a tuan theih-na zahin a hiangte lian hi,” ci-in a gen leuleu hi.
Jesu in amaute theihcian theih zahzah tua tawh a kibang gentehna tampite zangin amaute thu a hilh hi.
Amah in gentehna zang loin amaute bangmah a hilh kei hi. Ahi hangin a nungzuite bek tawh a omkhawm ciangin na khempeuh a hilhcian hi.
Tua ni nitak lam ciangin amah in a nungzuite kiangah, “Galkhat lamah pai ni,” a ci hi.
Mihonpite nusia-in, amaute in gunkuang sunga a om bangbangin a paipih uh hi. Gunkuang dangte tawh zong a ton uh hi.
Huih le guah nasiatakin kinuai-a, tuihualte in gunkuang vatin gunkuang a tuum dektak hi.
Gunkuang nunglamah lukham khamin Jesu a ihmu hi. Nungzuite in amah phong uh a, “Sia aw, tui kia le ung phamawh sa lo na hiam?” a ci uh hi.
Amah tho a huih tai-in tuihualte kiangah, “Dai un! Tang kei un!” a ci hi. Tua ciangin huih nung khawla, tui sippahin a dai dide hi.
Amah in a nungzuite kiangah, “Bang dinga tua ci lau lawmlawm na hi uh hiam? Upna nei nai lo lailai na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi.
Amaute lau lua mahmah uh a, “Hihpa kua hiam? Huih le tuihualte nangawn in a thu mang tazen hi!” a kici uh hi.
Amaute tuilipi kantanin Gerasenesa kual lamah a pai uh hi.
Gunkuang pan Jesu a tuahkhiat ciangin, amah a dawntuah dingin kha gilob a lut mi khat hankhuk lak pan a paikhia hi.
Hih mipa hankhuk laka teng hi-a, kuamah in sikkhau nangawn tawh a hen zo nawn kei hi.
A khut le a khete a sikkhainiang bottatin a khe-a sikkolte a sutan hi. Amah a thazawh zo dinga hat kuamah a om kei hi.
A sun a zanin hankhuk lak le mual tungah awng-a, amah le amah suang tawh a kikui keh hi.
Jesu a galmuh ciangin tai-in a mai-ah a khukdin hi.
Tuapa in, “A Sang Pen Pasian Tapa Jesu aw, kei bang hong cih nuam na hiam? Kei hong bawlsia lo dingin Pasian tungah kiciam in!” ci-in a aw neih zahin a awng hi.
Ahang in, Jesu in ama kiangah, “Kha gilo aw, hih pa sung pan paikhia in,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Jesu in ama kiangah, “Na min bang hiam?” ci-in a dong hi. “Tampi pha ka hi manun, ka min Legionb hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Tua ciangin tua kuam pana amaute a hawlkhiat loh nadingin Jesu kiangah tuapa in a ngen kikkik hi.
A kianga mual pangah vok hon tampi a gamta hi.
Dawite in Jesu kiangah, “Vokte lakah hong sawl inla tuate sungah hong lutsak in,” ci-in a thum uh hi.
Amah in amaute phalna pia-a, tua ciangin kha gilote paikhia-in vokte sungah a lut uh hi. Vok honte tul nih bang pha a, kensang pan tuili sungah tuaksukin tui a kia khin uh hi.
Vok cingte tai-in khuapi le khua neu ah hih thu a koh uh ciangin bang thu piang hiam cih en dingin mi tampi a kuankhia uh hi.
Amaute Jesu kiang a tun uh ciangin dawi legion khat a lutna pa, tua lai-ah tu-in puan silha, a lungsim pila om a muh uh ciangin a lau uh hi.
Tua thu a musate in dawi lutpa tunga piangte le vokte thu zong mite kiangah a gen uh hi.
Tua ciangin mipite in Jesu in amau kual a nusiat nadingin a thum uh hi.
Gunkuang ah Jesu a kah laitakin tua dawilut ngei pa in amah a zuih nadingin a thum hi.
Jesu in phal loin, “Na innah ciah inla, Topa in nang tungah bangzahtak bawla, nang bangzahtakin hong lainat cih thu na innkuanpihte kiangah gen in,” a ci hi.
Tua ahi ciangin tuapa paikhia a, ama adingin Jesu in bangzahtak bawl cih thu Decapolisc ah a gen hi. Mite khempeuh in lamdang a sa mahmah uh hi.
Gunkuang tuangin tuipi gal khatah Jesu a galkah ciangin mihon tampite a kimah va kikhawm uh hi. Tuilipi gei-ah a om laitakin
synagogue ukte lakah Jairus min nei khat, tua lai-ah va pai hi. Jesu a muh ciangin a khephungah bok-a,
"Ka tanu si dekdek hi. Nong hehpihna-in cidama a nuntak nadingin hong pai inla, ama tungah na khut hong ngaksak in,” ci-in a thum ngutngut hi.
Tua ciangin Jesu in amah a zui hi. Mihon tampi in ama nung zui uh a, a kimah a nehcih uh hi.
Tua laitakin kum sawm-le-nih sung siluang natna a thuak khat a om hi.
Siavuan tampi in a bawl sungin gim mahmah a, a neihsa khempeuh a bei khin hi. Ahi zongin noptuam tuan loin a nasia semsem zaw hi.
Amah in Jesu thu a zak ciangin mihonpite lakah Jesu nunglam panin zuana, a puantualpi a lawng hi.
Ahang in, tuanu in, “A puan lawngkha peuh leng ka dam ding hi,” ci-in a ngaihsun hi.
Tua khit phetin a siluang kangpah a, a thuakna pan a suahtak lam a pumpi panin a kiphawk hi.
Jesu in ama tung panin vang paikhia cih a phawk pah hi. Mihonpi lakah amah kihei kawikawi a, “Ka puansilhte hong lawnsak kua hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
A nungzuite in, “Hong nehcih mihon pite mu napi in, ‘Kuan hong lawng hiam,’ ci-in bang dinga dong lai na hi hiam?” ci-in a dawng uh hi.
Ahi hangin Jesu in a lawng kua hiam cih thei nuamin a kimkot a enen hi.
Tua ciangin ama natna hanga ama tunga thupiang a thei tua numei lau-a ling kawmin va pai-a, Jesu khephungah bokin ahi bang teng a gen hi.
Amah in tuanu kiangah, “Ka tanu aw, na upna in nang hong damsak zo hi. Lungnuamin ciah inla, na thuakna pan suakta in,” a ci hi.
Jesu a paupau laitakin synagogue ukpa Jairus inn panin mi pawl khat va pai uh hi. Amaute in, “Na tanu si ta hi. Siapa buaisak kul nawn ding hiam?” a ci uh hi.
Jesu in a mau thugente thudon loin Jew-te synagogue ukpa kiangah, “Lau kei in; um lel in,” ci-in a gen hi.
Amah in Peter, James le James sanggampa John-te simloh adang kua mah a kizuisak kei hi.
Jew-te synagogue ukpa’ inn a tun uh ciangin mite nakpi-in kapa taamloin a buai ngeingai Jesu in a mu hi.
Amah inn sungah lutin amaute kiangah, “Bang hangin hih bangin taamlo-a buai ngeingai na hi uh hiam? Naupangno a si hi lo hi; a ihmu hi,” a ci hi.
Ahi hangin amaute in amah a nuihsan uh hi. Amah in amaute a pusuahsak khit ciangin numeino omna ah numeinof nu le a pa le a tonpih a nungzuite a lutpih hi.
Tua numeino a khutin len a, “Talitha koum!” (“Numeino aw, nang tungah kong ci hi tho in,!” a cihnopna) a ci hi.
Tua khit phetin numeino (amah kum sawm-le-nih pha ta) thotoin a vak kawikawi hi. Amaute in hih thu lamdang a sa mahmah uh hi.
Amah in hih thu kuamah a theihsak loh nadingun amaute thukhauh pia-a, numeino nek dingin bang khatpeuh a piak dingun a sawl hi.
Tua mun nusia in Jesu le a nungzuite ama tenna khua ah a pai uh hi.

Sabbath a tun ciangin synagogue sungah thuhilh kipana, ama thugen a za mi tampi in lamdang a sa uh hi. Amaute in, “Hih mipa in hih nate koi pana a ngah ahi hiam? Nalamdangte nangawn a bawl theih nadingin ama tunga kipia hih pilna bang ahi hiam?

Khutsiampa hi lo ahi hiam? Mary tapa hi-a, James, Josepha, Judas le Simon-te sanggampa hi lo ahi hiam? A saggam numeite ei tawh teng khawm uh hi lo ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi. Tua ciangin ama tungah amaute a lungkim kei uh hi.
Jesu in amaute kiangah, “Kamsangpa ama khua sung, ama tanau-te lak le ama inn sung bekah a kipahtawi kei hi,” a ci hi.
Tua lai-ah amah in mi cina tawmkhatte tungah a khut nga-in a damsak lohngal nalamdang khat beek a bawl thei kei hi.
Amah in amaute uplahna lamdang a sa hi. Tua ciangin Jesu, khua khat pan khua khatah thuhilhin a vak kawikawi hi.
Sawm-le-nihte ama kiangah sama, kha giloteb tungah thuneihna pia-in nihta nihta-in a sawlkhia hi.
Amah in amaute a lamlahna hih bang ahi hi: “Na khualzinna ua na zat dingun ciangkhut longal an ahi zongin, thung-ip ahi zongin, kawnggak sungah sum ahi zongin bangmah pua kei un.
Khedap bulh unla ahi hangin puantuangsilh keng thuah kei un.
Inn khatpeuh ah na lut uh ciangin tua khua na nusiat mateng uh tua inn ah tam suak un.
Note hong ngai lo, na thu uh a ngai nuam lo munte na nusiat uh ciangin amaute langa teci panna-in na khepek ua leivuite singkhia un,” a ci hi.
Amaute paikhia uh a, mite a kisik nadingin thu a hilh uh hi.
Amaute in dawi tampi hawlkhia uh a, cina tampite sathau nilhin a damsak uh hi.

Jesu min kithei khawk khin ta ahi manin Kumpi Herod in zong hih thu a za hi. Mi pawlkhatin,c “Baptize-pa John misisa tho kika, tua hangin amah in nalamdang bawl theihna vangliatna nei ahi hi,” a ci uh hi.
Adangte in, “Amah Elijah hi,” a ci uh hi. Pawlkhatte leuleu in, “Tang lai-a kamsangte banga kamsangpa khat ahi hi,” a ci uh hi.
Ahi hangin Herod in hih thu a zak ciangin, “A ngawng ka tanpa John misisa tho kik hi!” a ci hi.
Ahang in, John mat dingin Herod mahmah in thu pia-in hensak-a thong sungah a khumsak hi. A nau pa Philip zi a suh nu Herodia hangin hih banga a hih ahi hi.
John in Herod kiangah, “Na sanggampa zi na suh thukham tawh kituak het lo hi,” a cici khin zo hi.
Tua ahi ciangin Herodia in John hua-in a that nuam hi. Ahi hangin tuanu in amah a that thei kei hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh John mi thumaan le misiangtho khat ahilam Herod in thei ahi manin amah kihta in a hu hi. Herod in John thu a zak ciangin amkham mahmahd napi ama thugen a ngai nuam hi.
A nunungna-ah a hun hoih khat a om hi. Herod in a suah ni-in ama uliante le galkapmangte le Galilee makaite an a vak hi.
Herodia’ tanu sungtumin lama, tuanu in Herod le a nitak-an nekpih lenglate a lungkimsak hi. Kumpipa in numeino kiangah, “Na deih peuhpeuh hong ngen in, kong pia ding hi,” a ci hi.
Amah kiciama, “Ka kumpi gam phel khat dong nong nget peuhpeuh kong pia ding hi,” ci-in a kamciam hi.
Tuanu paikhia-in a nu kiangah, “Bang ngen ding ka hi hiam?” a ci hi. Amah in, “Baptize-pa John’ lutang,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Kumpipa kiangah numeino manlangin paipah a, “Tu mahmah in kuangdai-in Baptize-pa John lutang nong piak ding ka deih hi,” ci-in a ngen hi.
Kumpipa lungdong lua mahmah a, ahi hangin ama kamciamsa le a nitak-an nekpih a lenglate hangin tuanu a nial nuam kei hi.
Tua ciangin amah in John lutang a paipih nading thupiakna tawh mithatpa khat a sawlpah hi. Tua mipa pai-in thong sunga om John ngawng tana,
ama lutang kuangdai-in a puak kik hi. Amah in numeino pia-a tuanu in a nu a pia hi.
John nungzuite in hih thu a zak uh ciangin pai uh a, a luang la-in han sung khatah a sial uh hi.
Jesu kimkotah sawltakpite va ki khawm uh a, amau hihsa le a hilhsate uh a ko uh hi.
Tua ciangin mipite a ciah le a kuan a tam luat manin an nek hun ding nangawn nei lo uh a, amaute kiangah, “Gamdaihna mun khatah no kia bek in hong zui unla, tawlnga un,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amau guak gamtawng khatah gunkuang khatin a pai uh hi.
Ahi hangin amaute paikhiat a mute in thei uh a, khua khempeuh panin khe-in tai uh a, amaute tun ma-in a na tung uh hi.
Jesu lei-ah a tun ciangin mihonpi tampi a mu hi. Amah in amaute khuatuah hi, bang hang hiam cih leh amaute a cingpa om lo tuuhon tawh kibang uh hi. Tua ciangin amaute thu tampi a hilh hi.
Tua hunlaitak nitak lam ahi hi. Tua ciangin a nungzuite a kiangah va pai uh a amaute in, “Hih tak gamtawng hi-a khuanung lua mahmah ta hi.
Hih kima khuata khuaneute ah pai-in a nek ding uh an a lei theih nadingun mipite ciahsak ta in,” a ci uh hi.

Ahi hangin amah in, “Note in a nek ding uh khatpeuh pia un,” a ci hi. Amaute in ama kiangah, “Tuabang hileh pasal khat, kha giat thamane tak bei ding hi! Kote pai-in tua zah tawh an va lei-in amaute nek ding, pia ding ka hi uh hiam?” a ci uh hi.
Amah in, “Anlum bangzah na nei uh hiam? Pai-in va en dih un,”a ci hi. Amaute in a et khit uh ciangin, “Lum nga le ngasa nih om hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin Jesu in mipite lopa hing tungah a pawlpawlin a tusak hi.
Tua ahi ciangin amaute a zaza, a sawm nganga-in a tu ciptep uh hi.

Tua anlum nga le ngasate gel la-a, vantung lam ento-in lungdam a koh khit ciangin anlumte a balkham hi. Tua ciangin mipite a lui dingun a nungzuite a pia hi. Amaute khempeuh lakah ngasate gel zong a hawm hi.
Amaute in ne uh a, a kham pikpek uh hi.
Nungzuite in anlum le ngasa athem aneng bawmta sawm-le- nih a tawm uh hi.
Tua an nete pasal cingteng tul nga a pha hi.
Tua khit phetin Jesu in nungzuite gunkuang sungah tuangsaka, ama mai Bethsaida ah paisakin mihonpite a ciahsak hi.
Amaute paisan-a, amah thungen dingin mual tungah a pai hi.
Nitak ciangin tuilipi laizangah gun kuang om a, amah ahileh lei lakah a om hi.
Huih in gunkuang lehmut ahi manin nungzuite in gunkuang nakpi-a a hot uh a mu hi. Zan vil lina pawlin amaute lam zuanin tuilipi tungah Jesu a pai hi. Amaute kheng dektak a,
ahi hangin amah tuilipi tunga pai a muh uh ciangin sikha sa in a kikokhia uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh a vekun amah mu uh a, a lau mahmah uh hi. Jesu in amaute kiangah, “Lau kei un! Keimah ka hi hi. Hong kihta kei un,” a cipah hi.
Tua ciangin amaute tawh gunkuang tungah kahto a, huih nung a dai kiuhkeuh hi.
Amaute in anlum ngate thu theitel lo uh ahi manin lamdang lua mahmah a sa uh hi, amaute lungtang kikhauhsak hi.
Amaute galkah uh a, Gennesaret a tun uh ciangin tua lai-ah a gunkuang uh a khih uh hi.
Gunkuang pan a pusuah phetun, mipite in Jesu mel a theitel uh hi.
Mipite tua kual khempeuhah tai kawi kawi uh a, cinate phek tawh zawngin, amah om hi ci-a a zakna peuhpeuhuah a paipih uh hi.

Khuapite khuaneute le gamsung khuate ahi zongin ama paina peuhpeuhah cinate paipih uh a, sum zuakna munte ah a na koih uh hi. Ama puantualpi mongtep ciang beek a lawnsak theih nadingin thum uh a, amah a lawngte khempeuh a dam uh hi.
Jerusalem panin Pharisee-te le thukham siate pawlkhat Jesu kiang ah va kikhawm uh a,
a nungzuite pawlkhat in ngeina banga “siang lo”—tua pen biakna ngeina a silsiang loh khut tawh an a nek laitak uh a mu uh hi.
(Pharisee-te le Jew-te khempeuh in upate tang ngeinate a kipletna un a ngeina bangin khut sil masa loin an a ne kei uh hi.
Sum zuakna mun pan a ciah uh ciangin kisil masa loin an a ne kei uh hi. Tua ciangin haite, tuivotbeelte le niangbeelte sawpsiangna-a kipan tang ngeina adang tampi a tang uh hi.a)
Tua ahi ciangin Pharisee-te le thukham siate in, “Bang hangin na nungzuite in khut sianglo tawh an a nek uh sangin upate tang ngeina bangin gamta zaw lo uh ahi hiam?” ci-in Jesu a dong uh hi.
Amah in, “No kineihsiamte tawh kisai-a Isaiah in a genkholh hih banga kigelhsa: “‘Hih mite in a muk uh tawh kei hong pahtawi uh a, ahi hangin a lungtang uh kei tawh kigamla hi.
A mawkna in kei hong bia uh a, a thuhilhte uh mihing bawltawm ngeina ahi hi,’b a cih man mahmah hi.
"Note in Pasian thupiakte na paikhia uh a, mihingte tang ngeinate na len tentan uh hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Tua ciangin amah in amaute kiangah, “Na tang ngeinate uh na tanc theih nadingun Pasian thupiakte nawlkhin dan na siam uh hi!
Moses in, ‘Na nu na pa pahtawi in.d A nu a pa a hamsiat mi peuhmah thah ding ahi hi,’e ci hi.
Ahi hangin note in, mi khatpeuh in a nu a pa-te khatpeuh kiangah, ‘Kei tung pana na ngah ding uh huhnate Corban (Pasian a ki-apsa letsong) hi ta hi,’ na ci uh a,
tua ciangin a nute a pate ading bangmah na hihsak nawn kei uh hi.
Tua bangin note na kipiaksawn uh na tang ngeinate uh zangin Pasian thu bangmah lo na suaksak uh hi. Tua banah tua bangin na tampi na hih uh hi,” a ci hi.
Jesu in mihonpite sam leuleu a, “Na vekpi un ngai unla hih thu theitel un.
A pualam pana mihing sunga tumsuk, bangmah in amah a ‘nin’ suaksak thei lo hi. Mihing sung pana pusuakte in amah a ‘nin’f suaksak zaw hi.
Zak nading bil nei peuh in za ta hen,”g a ci hi.
Mihonpite nusia in inn sungah a lut ciangin a nungzuite in hih gentehna thu ama kiangah a dong uh hi.
Amah in, “Tua zahin lungmawl zawzen na hi uh hiam? Pua lam panin mihing sunga tumsuk khatpeuh in amah a ‘nin’ suaksak thei lo ahilam thei lo na hi uh hiam?

Ahang in, a lungtang sungah tumsuk loin gilpi sungah tumsuk a, tua ciangin pumpi pualamah a pusuak khia hi,” a ci hi. (Jesu in hih banga a gen ciangin ante khempeuh ‘siang’ hi ci-a a pulakkhia ahi hi.)
A thugen zom lai-a: “Mihing sung pana pusuak in amah a ‘nin’ suaksak hi.
Ahang in, a sunglam mihing lungtang panin ngaihsutna khel, numei pasal paktatna, guktakna, tualthahna, angkawmna,
huaihamna, etsatna, zuau tatna, thangtatna enna, gensiatna, kiphatsakna le hainate a pusuakkhia hi.
Hih gitlohnate khempeuh a sung lam pana pusuakkhia hi-a, mihing a ‘nin’ suaksak hi,” a ci hi.
Jesu in tua mun nusia a, Tyreh kimnai-ah a pai hi. Amah inn khatah luta, ama omsim lam kuama theih ding deih lo napi a ki-im zo kei hi.
A taktakin, a tanu sunga kha giloi a lut nupi khat in ama thu a zak khit phetin va pai-a, a khe phungah a bok hi.
Tuanu, Syria gam Phoenicia a suak Greek mi ahi hi. Tuanu in a tanu sunga dawi a hawlkhiatsak nadingin Jesu kiangah a thum hi.
Amah in tuanu kiangah. “Tate an nek kim lai laksakin uite piak ding kilawm lo ahi manin, tate in a duh zahzah uh ne masa phot uh hen,” a ci hi.
Tuanu in, “Himah hi, Topa aw, ahi hangin sabuai nuai-a uite in zong naupangte annengte a ne uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah in tuanu kiangah, “Tuaci banga nong dawn manin na ciah thei hi; dawi in na tanu a nusia zo hi,” a ci hi.
Tuanu ciaha, a sung pana dawi a paikhia khin, lupna tunga lum a tanuno a mu hi.
Tua ciangin Jesu in Tyre kimnai teng nusia-a, Sidon kantanin Galilee tuipi ah pai-a tua ciangin Decapolisj kualah a paisuk hi.
Tua lai-ah mi pawlkhat in bilngong-a pau-awk pasal khat va paipih uh a, tuapa tungah a khut a ngak nadingin ama kiangah a thum hi.
Jesu in tuapa mihonpite lak panin a tang paikhiatpih khit ciangin a khutmete tuapa bil sungah a khum suk hi. Tua ciangin a cil phih a tuapa leii a lawng hi.
Vantung lam ento a nakpi-in khuisa-a tuapa kiangah, “Ephatha!” (“Kihong ta hen!” cihna) a ci hi.
Tua laitakin tua mipa bilte kihonga, a leiigui kikolin siangtakin a pau thei sensen hi.
Kuama tungah a gen loh nadingun Jesu in amaute thu a pia hi. Ahi hangin tua banga thu a piak semsem ciangin amaute in tua thu a gen semsem uh hi.
Mipite in lamdang sa lua mahmah uh a, “Amah in na khempeuh a hoihin bawl khin zo hi. Amah in bilngongte khua zasakin, a pau thei lote nangawn a pausak hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua hunlaitakin mihonpi dang khat va kikhawm uh hi. Amaute in nek ding bangmah nei lo uh ahi ciangin Jesu in a nungzuite sama,
"Hih mite ka khuatuah hi. Kei kianga hong om zawh uh ni thum tak pha khin ta-a, a nek ding uh bangmah a nei kei uh hi.
Gil kialpi in innah ciahsak leng pawlkhatte gamlapi pana hong pai uh ahi manin lamkalah phuk-hong vei-in puk ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
A nungzuite in, “Ahi ta zongin gamsung hi bangah mihon hizah ta vak nading an koi pan kingah thei ding ahi hiam?” ci-in a dawng uh hi.
Jesu in, “Anlum bangzah na nei uh hiam?” ci-in a dot ciangin, “Sagih,” ci-in a dawng uh hi.
Amah in mihonpite leitual ah a tusak hi. Tua anlum sagihte la-a, lungdam a koh khit ciangin balkhama mipite a lui dingun a nungzuite pia-a, amaute in mipite a lui uh hi.
Amaute in ngasa neu tawmkha zong a nei uh hi; amah in tuate hangin zong lungdam a koh khit ciangin a hawmkhia dingin nungzuite a sawl hi.
