Mipite in ne uh a, a kham pikpek uh hi. An khamval teng nungzuite in a neng a themin a top uh leh bawm sagih dimtak a pha hi.
Tua lai-ah pasal tulli bang a om hi. Jesu in amaute a ciahkhiatsak khit ciangin
a nungzuite tawh gunkuangah tuangin Dalmanutha kual lam a zuan hi.
Pharisee-te va pai-in Jesu kiangah thu a dong uh hi. Amah a zia-etna un, amaute in vantung panin lim khat a ngen uh hi.
Amah nakpi in khuisa-a, “Bang hangin hih khang mite in lim lamdang ngen uh ahi hiam? Thutak kong geninah, amaute tungah lim bangmah a kilak kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Jesu in amaute nusia in gunkuangah tuang kika, a galkhat lamah a galkah hi.
Nungzuite in gunkuang sunga a neihsa uh anlum khat longal an puak ding a mangngilh uh hi.
Jesu in amaute kiangah, “Pilvang un, Pharisee-te le Herod silngo panin na kidawm un,” ci-in a vauhilh hi.
"An i neih loh hang hi,” ci-in amaute khat le khat a kikum uh hi.

Jesu in amaute kikupna a theih ciangin, “Bang hangin note, na an neih loh uh kikum tazen na hi uh hiam? Tu dongin mu nai lo, theitel nailo lailai na hi uh hiam? Na lungtang uh kikhauhsak lai ahi hiam?
Mit nei napi in mu lo a, bil nei napi in za lo na hi uh hiam? Hih thu phawk lo lailai na hi uh hiam?
Mi tulnga adingin anlum nga ka balkhap lai-in athem aneng na topte uh bawm dim bangzah pha ahi hiam, na phawk lai uh hiam?” a ci hi. “Sawm-le-nih,” ci-in a dawng uh hi.
"Mi tulli ading anlum sagih ka balkhap lai-in athem aneng na topte uh, bawm dim bangzah pha ahi hiam?” ci-in a dot ciangin, amaute in, “Sagih,” ci-in a dawng uh hi.
Jesu in amaute kiangah, “Theitel nai lo na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi.
Amaute Bethsaida a tun uh ciangin mi pawlkhat in mittaw khat va paipih uh a, Jesu in a lawn nadingin a thum uh hi.
Amah in mittawpa a khutin kai-a, khuanawl ah a paikhiatpih hi. Jesu in tuapa mitte a cil phih-a a tungah a khutte a ngak khit ciangin, “Na khatpeuh na mu thei hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
Amah khuadak a, “Mite ka mu hi; amaute singkung lampai bang uh hi,” a ci hi.
Jesu in a khutte tuapa mitte ah a nga kik hi. Tua ciangin a mit kihongin khua mu thei-in na khempeuh siang sinsenin a mu hi.
Jesu in, “Khua sungah lut kei in,” a ci-in amah a ciahsak hi.
Jesu le a nungzuite, Caesarea le Philipi kima khuaneute a tun dong uh a pai uh hi. Lam a pai laitakun amaute kiangah, “Mite in kei kua hi, hong ci uh hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
Amaute in, “Kimkhat in Baptize-pa John hi; adangte in Elijah hi; pawlkhatte leuleu in kamsangte lakah khat hi, hong ci uh hi,” ci-in a dawng uh hi.
"No e leh, kei kua hi nong ci uh hiam?” ci-in a dong kik hi. Peter in, “Nang tua Khrist na hi hi,”b ci-in a dawng hi.
Jesu in ama thu kuamah a hilh loh nadingun amaute a vauhilh hi.

Tua ciangin Mihing Tapa in tampi thuak pelmawh dinga, upate, siampi makaite le thukham siate in amah nolh ding uh a, pel loin amah kithatin ni thum khit ciangin a tho kik ding hi, cih thu amaute hilh a kipan hi.
Amah in hih thu teltakin gena, tua ciangin Peter in amah tang paikhiatpih in a tai hi.
Ahi hangin Jesu kihei-a, a nungzuite enin Peter tai a, “Satan aw, ka nungah kihem in! Pasian thute ngaihsun loin mihing thute na ngaihsun hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin a nungzuite le mihonpite ama kiangah sama, “Mi khatpeuh in ka nung hong zuih nop leh pel loin amah le mah kinialin, ama singlamteh kisuanin hong zui ding hi.
Ahang in, a nuntaknac a honkhia nuam peuh in taan dinga, ahi hangin kei hang le lungdamna-thu hangin ama nuntakna a taan peuhmah in a nuntakna a honkhia ding hi.
Mi khatin leitung buppi a neih hangin a hinna taan leh bang phatuam ding ahi hiam?
Ahi kei leh mi khatin ama hinna bang tawh khek thei ding ahi hiam?
Hih angkawm le mawhdim khang mite hunah keimah le ka thu a zumpihte, Mihing Tapa in a Pa minthanna-in ama vansawltak siang thote tawh hong pai ciangin amaute a zumpih ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah in amaute kiangah, “Thutak kong geninah, vangliatna tawh Pasian gam hong tung, hih lai-a ding mi kimkhat in a muh matengun sihna a ciam kei ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Niguk khit ciangin Jesu in Peter, James le John tonpih in mualsang tungah kahpih to a, tua lai-ah amauteng bek a om uh hi. Tua lai-ah amauteng bek mitmuhin a mel a kikhel hi.
Ama puansilhte leitunga, a kipaksak thei penpen sangin pak zaw-a a leng daldal hi.
Tua laitakin amaute mai-ah Elijah le Moses kilanga, Jesu tawh a kiho uh hi.
Peter in Jesu kiangah, “Rabbi, hih lai-a i om nuam mahmah hi. Nang ading khat, Moses ading khat, Elijah ading khat, buk thum lam ni,” a ci hi.
(Amah in a gen ding thei lo hi, amaute a lau mahmah uh hi.)
Tua ciangin meii lompi khat kai-in amaute tuama, tua meii lak panin aw khat in, “Hih in, ka it ka Tapa ahi hi. Ama thu na ngai un,” a ci hi.
Tua khit phetin a kimkot uh a et uh leh Jesu longal kuamah dang a mu nawn kei uh hi.
Amaute mualtung pan a kumsuk kawmkawmun Mihing Tapa misi pan a thawh kik mateng a muhte uh kuama kiangah a gen loh nadingun Jesu in amaute thu a pia hi.
Amaute in hih thu amauteng theih in koih uh a “misi pan tho kik” cih bang cihnopna hiam cih a kikum uh hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in, “Bang hangin thukham siate in, Elijah hong pai masa pelmawh ding hi, ci-in gen uh ahi hiam?” ci-in amah a dong uh hi.
Jesu in, “A taktakin Elijah hong pai masa takpi mah a na khempeuh bawlpha mah hi. Tua ahileh Mihing Tapa in nak thuak mahmah dinga a kinolh ding hi, cih thu bang hangin kigelh ahi hiam?
Ahi hangin ken kong cihinah, Elijah hong pai khin zo a, ama thu a kigelhsa bangin amau ut bangin ama tungah bawl khin zo uh hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Nungzui dangte kiangah amaute a tun uh ciangin amaute kimah mihon tampi na oma, thukham siate tawh thu a kinialnial uh a mu uh hi.
Tua lai-a om mite khempeuh in Jesu a muh phetun lamdang sa lua uh a, amah dawntuah dingin a tai uh hi.
Amah in, “Amaute tawh bang thu kinialnial na hi uh hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
Mihonpite lakah khat in, “Sia aw, ka tapa sungah kha khat lutin pausak thei lo-a na kiangah kong paipih hi.

A dawi in a mat peuhpeuh ciangin leilak a denna hi. A kam panin cilphuan bua-a, a ha gawi-in gawcip hi. Na nungzuite kiangah tua kha a hawlkhiat nadingun ka nget hangin a hawlkhia thei kei uh hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Jesu in, “Thu um lo khangmite aw, no tawh bang tan om khawm lai ding ka hi hiam? Bang tanvei hong thuak zo ding ka hi hiam? Tua pasalno ka kiangah hong paipih un,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in amah a paipih uh hi. Tua kha in Jesu a muh phetin tua naupang a kisatgawpsak hi. Amah lei lakah pukin kipum khuka, a cilphuan a bua hi.
Jesu in, “A hicih zawh bang tanvei sawt khin hiam?” ci-in tua pasalno’ pa a dong hi. Amah in, “A neu tunga kipan ahi hi.
Tua kha in amah that nuamin mei sung khawng, tui sung khawng ah sawnpai zel hi. Ahi zongin nang na hih theih leh hong hehpih inla, hong huh in,” a ci hi.
Jesu in, “‘Na hih theih leh e’? A um mi adingin na khempeuh hi thei hi,” a ci hi.
Tua pasalno’ pa in zong, “Ka um hi; ka uplahna ka zawh nadingin hong huh in!” a cikhia pah hi.

Tua munah mihonpite hong tai uh Jesu in a muh ciangin tua kha giloa a tai hi. Amah in, “Nang a bilngong, a pauthei lo kha aw, ama sung pan paikhia inla, lut kik nawn peuhmah kei in, ci-in thu kong pia hi,” a ci hi.
Tua kha ku zelzal a, tua pasalno kisatsak vanvanin tua khit ciangin a paikhia hi. Tua pasalno misisa tawh kibang lua ahi manin mi tampi in, “Si ta ei!” a ci uh hi.
Ahi hangin Jesu in tuapa khut lenin a phottoh leh amah a ding to hi.
Inn sungah Jesu a tum khit ciangin a nungzuite in, “Bang hangin kote in hawlkhia thei lo ka hi uh hiam?” ci-in a dong sim uh hi.
Amah in, “Hih bangte pawl, thungetnab bek tawh paikhia thei hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Amaute in tua mun nusia in Galilee a kantan uh hi. Jesu in amau omna kuama theih ding a deih kei hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in, “Mihing Tapa, mite khut sungah kilehhek ding hi. Amaute in amah that ding uh a, ni thum khit ciangin amah tho ding hi,” ci-in a nungzuite a hilh hi.
Ahi hangin amaute in ama cihnopna theitel lo uh a, tua thu tawh kisai lah a dong ngam kei uh hi.
Amaute Capernaum a tung uh hi. Inn sungah a om laitakun, “Lampi-a na kisel uh bang ahi hiam?” ci-in amaute a dong hi.
Ahi hangin lampi-a a kisel uh kua lianpen hiam, cih thu tawh kisai ahi manin a dai uh hi.
Jesu tusuk in Sawm-le-nihte sam a, “Mi khatpeuh a masakpen nop leh a nunung penpen le adang teng’ nasem ahi pelmawh kul hi,” a ci hi.
Amah in naupangno khat kai-a amaute lakah a dingsak hi. Amah in tua naupangno tawi-in amaute kiangah,
"Keima min hangin hih bang naupangno khat a sang peuhmah kei hong sang ahi hi. Kei hong sang peuhmah, keimah hong sang hi loin kei hong sawlpa a sang ahi hi,” a ci hi.
John in, “Sia aw, mi khatin nang minin dawite a hawlkhiat ka mu uh a, ei mi hi lo ahi manin a hih nawn loh nadingin ka kho uh hi,” a ci hi.
Jesu in, “Tuapa kho kei un, kuamah in keima minin nalamdang a bawl khit phetin kei hong siatgen pah thei lo ding hi.
Ahang in, ei hong langpang lo peuh ei aa ahi hi.
Thutak kong geninah, Khrist pawl na hi manun kei min hanga tuisik hai khat hong suah peuhpeuh pahtakman ngah loin a om peuhmah kei ding hi.
Kei hong um hih naupang no khatpeuh mawhna a bawlsak a om leh a ngawngah angawina suang lianpi khihin tuipi sungah kipai leh ama adingin hoihzaw ding hi.
Na khut in mawhna hong bawlsak leh sattan in.
Khut kimin, amaute than a sihlohna, mei a mit lohna muna meilipi khukah hong kikhul sangin khut buisa-in nuntakna ah lut lecin nang adingin a hoihzaw hi.c
Na khe in mawhna hong bawlsak leh sattan in
Khe kimin, amaute than a sihlohna mei a mit lohna mund meilipi khukah hong kipaih sangin khe buisa-in nuntakna ah lut lecin nang ading a hoihzaw hi.
Na mittang hangin mawhna na bawl leh khelkhia in. Mittang kimin meilipi khukah hong kipaih sangin mit langkhat bek tawh Pasian gamah lut lecin nang adingin a hoihzaw hi.
Tua meilipi khukah “ ‘amaute than nangawn si lo-a, mei zong a mit ngei kei hi,’e
Mi khempeuh cisawh bangin mei tawh kisawh ding hi.
"Ci a lim hangin a alna mang leh bangci alkiksak thei ding na hi hiam? Note zong ci alin al unla, khat le khat na kilem un,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Jesu tua mun nusia in Jordan gal khat lam Judea kualah a pai hi. Ama kiangah mihonte va pai leuleu uh a, a hih ngei bangin amaute thu a hilh hi.
Pharisee-te pawlkhat va pai uh a, a zia-etna un, “Mikhat in zi a mak ding thukham tawh a kituak hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi.
Amah in, “Moses in note bang thu hong pia ahi hiam?” ci-in a dawng hi.
Amaute in, “Mi khatin a zi a makna lai pia-a, a zi a nawkiksak theih nading Moses in a phal hi,” a ci uh hi.
Jesu in, “Na lungtang uh khauh lua ahi manin Moses in hih thukham note adingin a gelh ahi hi.
Ahi hangin Pasian in na khempeuh a piansak cilin amaute ‘numei le pasal-in a bawl hi.’a
‘Hih thu hangin pasal in a nu a pa nusia-in a zi tawh kigawm dinga,b
amaute gel sakhat a suak ding uh hi.’c Tua ahi ciangin amaute nih hi nawn loin khat ahi hi.
Tua ahi manin Pasian gawmsate mihing in khen kei ta hen,” a ci hi.
Amaute inn sungah a om kik uh ciangin, nungzuite in hih thu Jesu a dong uh hi.
Amah in, “Ama zi ma-a, numei dang khat a tenpih peuhmah a zi angkawmsan ahi hi.
Tua ciangin numei khat in a pasal ma-a pasal dang khat a tenpih leh tua numei angkawm a suak hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Jesu lawn dingin mipite in nau pangnote ama kiangah a paipih uh leh, nungzuite in amaute a na tai uh hi.
Jesu in a muh ciangin a lungkim kei hi. Amah in amaute kiangah, “Naupangnote ka kiangah hong paisak un, amaute dal kei un. Ahang in, Pasian gam i cih hih bangte aa ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Thutak kong geninah, naupangno banga Pasian gam a sang lo peuhmah, tua sungah a lut ngei kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah in naupangnote a khutin tawi-a, a tunguah a khutte nga in amaute thupha a pia hi.
Jesu a paikhiat laitakin ama kiangah mi khat va tai-a, a mai ah khukdinin, “A hoih siapa aw, nuntak tawntungna ka luah nadingin bang ka hih ding kul hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
Jesu in, “Bang hangin kei hoih hong ci na hi hiam? Pasian bek longal mi hoih khat beek a om kei hi.
‘Tual that kei in, ang kawm kei in, gu kei in, zuau teci pang kei in, khem kei in, na nu na pa pahtawi in,’d kici thupiakte na theihsa ahi hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Tuapa in, “Sia aw, tuate khempeuh ka neu tunga kipan ka zuihsa ahi hi,” a ci hi.

Jesu in amah enin it a, “Na khat na kisam lai hi. Pai-in, na neihsa khempeuh zuak inla mizawngte pia in. Tua hileh vantungah gou na nei ding hi. Tua khit ciangin hong pai inla kei hong zui in,” a ci hi.
Hih thu hangin tuapa a mai a mual hi. Amah hau mahmah ahi manin lungsi dedu in a paikhia hi.
Jesu in a kim teng en kawikawi a, a nungzuite kiangah, “A haute Pasian gam a lut nading haksa na zen e!” a ci hi.
Nungzuite in Jesu thugente lamdang a sa mahmah uh hi. Ahi hangin Jesu in, “Tate aw, Pasian gam lut nading haksa mahmah si!e
Mihau khat Pasian gam a lut ding sangin phim bilvang ah kala-oh thawl ding a baihzaw hi,” a ci hi.
Nungzuite in lamdang sa semsem uh a, “Tua hileh kua kihonkhia thei peuhmah ding hiam?” ci-in khat le khat a kikum uh hi.
Jesu in amaute en a, “Mihing adingin ahi thei lo mah ahi hi; ahi hangin Pasian adingin tua bang hi lo hi. Pasian adingin na khempeuh hi thei hi,” a ci hi.
Peter in ama kiangah, “Kote in na khempeuh nusia in nang kong zui uh hi,” a ci hi.
Jesu in “Thutak kong geninah, keima hang le lungdamna-thu hangin a inn, a sanggampate, a sanggamnute, a nu, a pa, a tate le a lote a nusia peuhmah in,
tu khanghunin a zah zakhat (innte, sanggampate, sanggamnute, nute, tate le lote—tuate tawh bawlsiatnate) le hong tung ding khanghunin nuntak tawntungna a ngah ding a kipelh kei ding hi.
Ahi hangin a masate tampi nunung ding uh a, a nunungte a masa ding uh hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Jesu mapi in amaute Jerusalem manawhin a pai laitakun nungzuite in lamdang vat sa uh a, amau zuite ahileh a lau uh hi. Amah in Sawm-le-nihte paipih tuamin ama tunga piang dingte a hilh hi.
Amah in, “Jerusalem dong i pai dinga, siampi makaite le thukham siate tungah Mihing Tapa a kilehhek ding hi. Amaute in amah thah dingin mawhpaih ding uh a, Gentile-te khut ah amah piakhia ding uh hi.
Amaute in amah zahko-in, cilphih in, satin, a that ding uh hi. Tua zawh ni thum ciangin amah a tho kik ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Zebedee tapate James le John a kiangah va pai uh hi. Amaute in, “Sia aw, kong nget peuhpeuh uh hong hihsak dingin kong deih uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Amah in, “Bang hong hihsak leng na deih uh hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
Amaute in, “Na minthanna na ngah ciangin kote gel na taklam khat na veilam khat hong tusak in,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Jesu in, “Nong nget uh na thei kei uh hi. Ka dawn ding hai dawn thei ding na hi uh hiam? Ahikeh kei kibaptise nading baptisena ah na kibaptise thei ding uh hiam?” a ci hi.
Amaute in, “Ka hih thei ding uh hi,” ci-in a dawng uh hi. Jesu in amaute kiangah, “Ka dawn ding hai na dawn takpi ding uh a, kei kibaptisena tua kibaptisena ah na kibaptise takpi ding uh hi.
Ahi hangin ka taklam ahikeh ka veilam a tu ding kei hong piak theih hi lo hi. Tua munte ah a tu dinga a kiseh kholsa mite bek tu ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Nungzui sawmte in hih thu a zak uh ciangin James le John tungah a lungkim kei uh hi.
Jesu in amaute samkhawm a, “Gentile-te tungah gam-uka ki ngaih sunte, amau tungah kiliansak uh a, a uliante uh amau tungah kithuneisak uh hi, cih na thei uh hi.
Note tua bang na hi kei uh hi. Tua bang na hi sangsik-un note lakah a lian nuam peuhmah na nasem uh suakin,
a masa pen ahi nuam peuh, mi khempeuh sila ahi pelmawh kul hi.
Ahang in, Mihing Tapa nangawn ama na midangte a semsak ding hi loin, midangte na a sem ding le mi tampi tat nadingin ama nuntakna pia dinga hong pai ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amaute Jericho a tung uh hi. Jesu le a nungzuite in mihon tampi tawh tua khuapi a nusiat laitakun mittaw khat Bartimaeus (tua pen, Timaeus Tapa) khut dawh-a ngenin lam gei ah a na tu hi.
Amah in Nazareth mi Jesu ahi lam a zak ciangin, “David Tapa Jesu aw, kei hong lainat in,” ci-in a kiko hi.
Mi tampi in amah tai uh a, daitaka a om nadingin a gen uh hi. Ahi hangin tuapa in, “David Tapa aw, kei hong lainat in!” ci-in a kiko semsem hi.
Jesu khawl a, “Amah sam un,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amaute in mittawpa kiangah, “Lung nuam in! Ding in! Amah in nang hong sam hi,” ci-in a galsap uh hi.
Amah in a puantualpi paikhia pahin dingto-a Jesu kiangah a pai hi.
Jesu in, “Bang kong hihsak ding deih na hi hiam?” ci-in amah a dong hi. Tua mittawpa in, “Rabbi aw, khua ka mu thei nuam hi,” a ci hi.
Jesu in, “Pai ta in, na upna in nang hong damsak zo hi,” a ci hi. Tua khit phetin amah in khua mu thei pah lian a, lampi ah Jesu a zui hi.
Amaute Jerusalem zuana a pai laitak, Olive Vum panga om Bethphage le Bethany a tun uh ciangin Jesu in a nungzuite nih a mapaisak hi.
Amah in amaute kiangah “Na mai-ua khua ah pai le uh cin na lut phetun kuama tuan ngei nai lohna laano khat a kikhih na mu ding uh hi. Sut unla hong paipih un.
Mi khatpeuh in, ‘Bang hangin hih banga hih na hi uh hiam?’ ci-a hong dot leh, ‘Topa in a deihna om hi; hong puak kik pah ding hi,’ ci un,” ci-in a sawl hi.
Amaute pai uh a inntual kong pualam kongzinga kikhih laano khat a mu uh hi. Amaute in a sut laitakun
tua lai-a ding mi pawlkhat in, “Bang dinga tua laano sut na hi uh hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi.
Amau gel in Jesu hilhsa bangin a dawn uh ciangin tua mite in amaute a paisak uh hi.
Tua laano Jesu kiang a tunpih uh ciangin a tungah a puantualpite uh phah uh a, amah a tungah a tu hi.
Mi tampi in a puantualpite uh lampi ah a phah uh hi. Pawlkhat in gamlak singhiangte khiakin lampi ah a phah uh hi.
A nung le a mai-a pai mihonpite in, “Hosanna!”a “Topa min-a hong pai pa in thupha a ngah hi!”b
"Hong tung ding i pa David kumpi gam in thupha a ngah hi!” “A sangpenna munah Hosanna!” ci-in a awng uh hi.
Jerusalem ah Jesu lutin biakinnpi ah a pai hi. Amah in na khempeuh en kawikawi a, ahi hangin khuanung lua ta ahi manin Sawm-le-nihte tawh Bethany ah a pai uh hi.
A zing ciangin Bethany nusia-a a pai laitakin Jesu a gil kial hi.
Theikung a teh pha khat a galmuh ciangin, a gah kha hiam cih en dingin a va pai hi. Thei gah hun hi lo ahi manin thei phung a tun ciangin a teh simloh bangmah a om kei hi.
Tua ciangin amah in theikung kiangah, “Kuamah in na gah ne ngei nawn kei ta hen,” a ci hi. A nungzuite in tua a cih a za uh hi.
Jerusalem a tun uh ciangin biakinnpi huangah Jesu lut-a, tua lai-a sum lei sum zuakte a hawlkhia hi. Sum khengte sabuaite le vakhu zuakte tutphahsaute sawnthalsak gawpin,
biakinntualte ah sumbuk van paipih ding kuamah a phal kei hi.
Amah in amaute hilh a, “ ‘Ka inn, minamte khempeuh thungetna inn kici ding hi,’c ci-in kigelh hi lo ahi hiam? Ahi hang-in note in ‘misuamte kua’d na suaksak tazen uh hi,” a ci hi.

Siampi makaite le thukham siate in hih thu a zak uh ciangin Jesu a thah theih nading uh lampi a zong uh hi. Ahang in, mihonpite khempeuh in ama thuhilhna lamdang sa mahmah uh ahi manin amaute in amah a kihta uh hi.
Nitak lam ciangin amautee khuapi pualamah a paikhia uh hi.
A zingsang ciangin amaute a pai laitakun tua theikung a zunga kipan a dinggaw-a om a mu uh hi.
Peter in phawka Jesu kiangah, “Rabbi aw, en in! Na hamsiat theikung dinggaw hi!” a ci hi.
Jesu in, “Pasian muangf un.
Thutak kong geninah, mi khatpeuh in hih mualpi kiangah, ‘Pai inla tuipi sungah kipai in,’ ci-in lunghei loin a cih bang piang ding hi, ci-a a up leh ama cih bang tektekin a piang ding hi.
Tua ahi manin ken kong geninah, na nget peuhpeuh uh ka ngah khin hi, ci-a na up uh leh na ngah ding uh hi.
Thungena na din laitakin mi khatpeuh tungah lungkimlohna na neih leh vantunga om na Pa in na mawhnateg hong maisak theih nadingin tuapa na maisak in.
Ahi zongin na maisak kei uh leh vantunga om na Pa un no mawhnate hong maisak lo ding hi,”h ci-in a dawng hi.
Amaute Jerusalem tung kik uh a, biakinnpi tualte ah Jesu a vak kawikawi laitakin siampi makaite, thukham siate le upate ama kiangah a pai uh hi.
Amaute in, “Bang thuneihna tawh hihte hih na hiam? Hihte hih nading thuneihna kua in hong pia hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi.
Jesu in, “Kei zong khat kong dong ding hi. Hong dawng un; tua ciangin ken zong bang thu neihna tawh hihte hih ka hi hiam, cih kong gen ding hi.
John baptisena koi pana hong pai ahi hiam? Vantung pan hiam, mihing tung pan hiam? Hong gen dih un!” ci-in a dawng hi.e
Amaute kikum uh a, “Vantung pan hi,’ ci leng, ‘Tua ahileh bang hangin amah um lo na hi uh hiam?’ hong ci ding hi.
Ahi hangin ‘Mihing tung pan hi,’ ci leng lah..., (John pen mi khempeuh in kamsang taktakin sang uh ahi manin amaute in mipite a kihta uh hi.)” a ci uh hi..
Tua ciangin amaute in, “Ka thei kei uh hi,” ci-in Jesu a dawng uh hi. Jesu in, “Kei zong bang thuneihna tawh hihte ka hih cih kong gen kei ding hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin amah in amaute kiangah gentehnate zangin thu gen a: “Lenggui a ciing mi khat a om hi. A kimkotah dai kai-a, lengtui sukna khat toin, tausang khat a dawh hi. Tua khit ciangin a lenggui lo lokho pawlkhat khawhlawhsakin khual a zinsan hi.
A lak hun a tun ciangin lenggah khawm dingin lo-khawhlawhte kiangah a nasemte khat a sawl hi.
Ahi hangin amaute in tuapa na man uh a, satgawpin a guak ciahsak uh hi.
Tua ciangin amah in tuate kiangah nasem dang khat a sawl kik hi. Amaute in hih pa lu sat sakin a zahlaksak ngi-ingei uh hi.
Amah in zong nasem dang khat sawl kik leuleu a, amaute in tuapa a that uh hi. Nasem adang tampi a sawl hangin amaute in pawlkhat satin, adangte a that uh hi.
"Amah in a sawl theih ding a it a tapa khat a nei lai hi. A tawpkhakna ah, ‘Ka tapa zahtak buang ding uh hi,’ ci-in a tapa a paisak hi.
"Ahi hangin lo-khawhlawhte in, ‘Hih pa a gouluahpa ahi hi; hong pai un amah that ni, a luah ding teng ei aa suakpah ding hi,’ kici uh hi.
Tua ciangin amah manin that uh a, daipua lamah a paikhia uh hi.
"Tua bangin hileh lenggui lo neipa in bang a cih ding hiam? Amah hong pai-in lo-khawhlawhte thatin ama lo midangte a pia ding hi.
Hih Laisiangtho thu: “‘Inn lamte nilkhiat suang inntungkhuma suang a suak hi;
hih thu Topa hih hi a, eite mitmuh in piandang hi,’b cih sim ngei lo na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi.
Hih gentehna amaute a langgenna ahilam thei uh ahi manin amah mat nading lampi a zong uh hi. Ahi hangin amaute in mihonpite kihta uh a, tua ciangin amah nusia-in a paimang uh hi.
Tua nung ciangin amaute in ama thugenin amah a mat theih nadingun Pharisee-te le Herod pawlte Jesu kiangah a paisak uh hi.

Amaute va pai-in ama kiangah, “Sia aw, nang mi thutak khat na hi lam ka thei uh hi. Kuamah maivil nei lo na hi manin, kuama thu-in na gamta kei a, Pasian thutak tawh kizui-in na hilh hi. Tua hi-a Caesar tungah siah piak tuak hiam, piak tuak lo hiam?

Pia ding ka hi uh hiam, pia lo ding ka hi uh hiam?” a ci uh hi. Ahi hangin Jesu in amaute a kineih a hina thei-a, “Bang hangin kei hong thangsiah na hi uh hiam? Denarius khat hong la unla hong veelsak dih un,” a ci hi.
Amaute in tua sumtang a paipih uh ciangin amaute kiangah, “Hih kua lim hi-a hih kua min ahi hiam?” ci-in a dong hi. Amaute in, “Caesar aa ahi hi,” ci-in a dawng uh hi.
Tua ciangin Jesu in amaute kiangah, “Caesar aa te Caesar na pia unla, Pasian aa te Pasian na pia un,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amaute in amah lamdang a sa mahmah uh hi.
Tua khit ciangin thawhkikna om lo hi, a ci Sadducee-te thu dong dingin Jesu kiangah a pai uh hi.
Amaute in, “Sia aw, Moses in, ‘Ta nei man loin a zi a sihsan pasal khatpeuh a om leh a sanggampa in tua meigongnu tenpihin a sanggampa ading tate neihsak hen,’ ci-in ko adingin na gelh hi.
Tu-in unau pasal sagih a om hi. A u pen in zi nei a, ta nei man loin a si hi. A nihna pa in
tua meigongnu tenpih a, ahi hangin amah zong ta nei man lo mah in a si hi. A thumna pa zong tua mah bang ahi hi.
A taktak in tua unau sagihte khat beek in ta a nei man kei uh hi. A tawpkhakna ah tua numei zong a si hi.
Tua ahileh tua numei in unau pasal sagih teng tenpih kim ahi ciangin thawhkikc ciangin amah kua pen zi hi ding hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi.
Jesu in, “Note in Laisiangtho ahi zongin, Pasian vang ahi zongin thei lo na hi manun khial hi lo na hi uh hiam?
Misite a thawh kik ciangin mopina le mokhakna a om kei ding hi. Amaute vana vansawltakte a bang ding uh hi.
Misite thawhkikna tawh kisai-in Pasian in, Moses kiangah, ‘Abraham’ Pasian, Isaac’ Pasian le Jacob’ Pasian ka hi hi,’d ci-a sawlbawk laka a genna thu Moses laibu sungah sim ngei lo na hi uh hiam?
Amah a site Pasian hi loin a nungtate Pasian ahi hi. Note nakpi takin na khial uh hi!” ci-in a dawng hi.

Tua laitakin thukham siate lakah khat va pai-a amaute kam kinialna a za hi. Jesu in amaute hoihtakin a dawn theih lam tuapa in a theih ciangin, “Thupiakte khempeuh lakah koi a thupi pen ahi hiam?” ci-in amah a dong hi.
Jesu in, “A thupi penpen hih ahi hi: ‘Israel aw, ngai dih in i Topa eite Pasian in Topa khat ahi hi.e
Na Topa Pasian, na lungtang khempeuh, na hinna khempeuh, na lungsim khempeuh le na thahatna khempeuh tawh it in.’f
A nihna hih ahi hi: ‘Nang le nang na ki-it bangin na vengte it in.’g Hihte gel sanga lianzaw thupiak khat beek a om kei hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Tuapa in, “Sia aw, na gente ahi takpi ahi hi. Pasian khat bek hi-a, amah longal Pasian dang a om kei hi, na cih a man hi.

Na lungtang khempeuh, na theihna khempeuh le na thahatna khempeuh tawh amah it ding le nang le nang na ki-it banga na vengte na it ding pen meihal biakna buppi le biakpiaknate sangin thupizaw mah hi,” ci-in a dawng kik hi.
Jesu in tuapa in pilna tawh dawng cih a theih ciangin ama kiangah, “Nang Pasian gam tawh na kigamla kei hi,” a ci hi. Tua-a kipan kuamah in thu dang a dong ngam nawn kei uh hi.
Biakinntualte ah Jesu in thu a hilh laitakin, “Khrist h pen David Tapa hi, ci-in bangci a thukham siate in gen thei uh ahi hiam?
David mahmah in: “Topa in ka Topa kiangah: ‘Na galte khempeuh na khe nuai-ah ka koih matengin ka taklamah na tu in’” ci-in Khasiangtho in na pulakkhia khin hi.i
“Amah pen David mahmah in ‘Topa’ ci ahileh bangci in ama tapa hi thei ding hiam?” ci-in a dong hi. Mihon tampite in lungkimtakin ama thugen a ngai uh hi.
Tua bang a hilh kawmin Jesu in, “Thukham siate panin na kikem un. Amaute puantual deldal silhin vak kawikawi nuam uh a, vanzuakna munte ah pibawl ding a ut uh hi.
Synagogue-te sunga tutna thupi pente ah tu nuam diakin, pawite ah pahtawina munte ah a tu nuam uh hi.
Amaute in meigongte inn netum uh a, kineih khemin sauvei pipi thu a ngen uh hi. Tua bang mite a nasia penin kigawt ding hi,” a ci hi.
Sumpi khiatna mun mai-ah Jesu tu-in mihonpite in biakinnpi sumkholna sunga amau sumpi a khiat uh a vil hi. Sumhau tampi in sum tampipi a khia uh hi.
Ahi hangin azawng meigongnu khat va pai-a sumj tawmkha bek a man sumsank tangneu nih a khia hi.
Jesu in a nungzuite ama kiangah sama, “Thutak kong geninah, hih a zawng meigongnu in midang teng khempeuh sangin sumkholna ah tam a khia zaw hi.
Amaute in a hauhna lak panun a pia uh hi; tuanu in ahileh a zawnsa pipi-in ama kivak nadinga a neih khempeuh a khia hi,” a ci hi.
Biakinnpi pan Jesu a paikhiat laitakin a nungzuite khat in ama kiangah, “Siapa en dih ve! Hih suangtumte gol thei tabuang a! Hih innte thupi thei ngemngam mahmah hi!” a ci hi.
Jesu in, “Hih inn liante khempeuh na mu hiam? Suang khat tungah suang dang khat beek a kiciangsa-in a kinusia kei ding hi; a vekpi in a kicimmang ding hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Biakinnpi tawh a kigalsai Olive Vum tungah Jesu a tut laitakin Peter, James, John le Andrew-te in,
"Hihte cik cianga piang ding ahi hiam? Tua teng a tangtun kim nading bang lim hong hi ding hiam hong hilh in,” ci-in a dong sim uh hi.
Jesu in amaute kiangah, “Note kuamah in hong khem zawh loh nadingin kikem un.
Keima minin mi tampi hong pai ding uh a, ‘Keimah in amah ka hi hi’ ci teltalin mi tampi a khem ding uh hi.
Galthu le galthuthang na zak uh ciangin na patau nai kei un. Tua bangte a piang pelmawh ding mah ahi hi. Ahi hangin hun beina hi nai lo hi.
Mi nam khat le nam khat kido dinga, gam khat le gam khat a kido ding uh hi. Mun tuamtuam ah zin lingin kialpi a tung ding hi. Hihte khempeuh nausuahnat kipatna ahi hi.
Note kigingsa in om pelmawh un. Tualsung vaihawmte khutah note hong ap ding uh a, synagogue-te sungah hong sat ding uh hi. Keima hangin gam-ukte le kumpite mai-ah teci in na ding ding uh hi.
Minamte khempeuh tungah lungdamna-thu kihilh masa pelmawh ding hi.

Note hong kimanin thu hong kisit peuhpeuh ciangin, bang ka gen ding hiam, ci-in ama-in lunghimawh khol kei un. A gen ding no hi loin Khasiangtho hizaw ding ahi manin tua huna hong kipia peuhpeuh na gen lel un.
"Unau khat le khat ahi zongin, pa in a ta ahi zongin, sih nading dongin a kilehhek ding uh hi. A nu a pa-te langah tate pang ding uh a, a thatsak ding uh hi.
Keima hangin mi khempeuh in note hong mudah ding uh hi. Ahi zongin a bei dongin a kipte kihonkhia ding hi.
"Note in ‘a hawmmangsak kihhuaina’a ab kisai loh na munah a ding na muh uh ciangin—a simte in theitel ta hen—Judea gama omte mual tungah tai uh hen.
A innkhuma omte kuamah kumsuk kei hen. Ahikeh inn sunga na khatpeuh la dingin lut kei hen.
Lo-a om kuamah a puantual-pi la dingin ciah kei hen.
Nau paiite le naungek nei numeite adingin tua nite a mulkimhuai lua ding hi!
Hih hun phalbi sunga a tun loh nadingin thu na ngen un.
Ahang in, Pasian in leitung a piansak cil-a kipan tu hun dong tua zah a om ngei lo le a om ngei nawn lo ding lungdonna nite ahi ding hi.
Topa in tua nite tomsak lo hileh kuamah a suakta zo kei ding hi. Ahi hangin amah in a teelsa teltuamte hangin tua nite a tomsak khin zo hi.
Tua hun ciangin mi khatpeuh in note kiangah, ‘En un, hih lai-ah Khristc om hi!’ ahikeh, ‘Hua lai-ah om hi!’ hong cih leh um kei un.
Ahang in, Khrist zuaute le kamsang zuaute hong kilang ding uh a, hi thei hi leh teelsate nangawn a khem nadingun limte le nalamdangte a bawl ding uh hi.
Tua ahi ciangin kigingsa in om un; na khempeuh a pian ma-in kong genkhol hi.
"Ahi hangin tua lungdon nite khit ciangin, “ ‘ni kimialsak dinga, kha a tang nawn kei ding hi;
van panin aksite kiasuk dinga, van-a om nate kilingsak ding hi.’d
"Tua hunin mite in Mihing Tapa a vanglianpi le a minthanna tawh meii lakah a paisuk a mu ding uh hi.
Tua ciangin amah in ama vansawltakte sawl dinga, lei kiu lite pan, leimongte panin van mongte dongin a teelsa mite a kaikhawm ding hi.
"Tu-in hih thute theikung panin na sin un: A hiang menga a teh a sel phetin khuakhal hong nai ta hi, cih na thei uh hi.
Tua mah bangin hih nate a piang na muh ciangun kongbiang mahmah dong hong nai ta hi, cih na thei un.
Thutak kong genin-ah, hih thute khempeuh a tun khit mateng hih khange mite a bei kei ding uh hi.
Van le lei a mangthang ding hi; ahi zongin ka thu a mangthang ngei kei ding hi.
"A ni ahi zongin a hun ahi zongin kuamah in a thei kei hi; vantunga vansawltakte nangawn in a thei kei uh hi; Tapa in zong thei lo a, ahi zongin Pa khat bek in a thei hi.
Kigingsa-in om un! Kigalging un!f Tua hun cik ciangin hong tung ding cih na thei kei uh hi.
Tua in khual zinkhia mi khat tawh kibang hi. Amah in a nasemte khutah a inn ap a, amau sep ding ciat sehsakin, kongcingpa kiangah a vil gige ding a vaikhak hi.
"Tua ahi ciangin inn neipa a tun kik ding hun—nitak hi ding hiam, zankim laitak hi ding hiam, akkhuan hi ding hiam, phalvak ciang hi ding hiam, cih thei lo na hi manun na vil gige un.
Amah thakhatin hong tung vat leh ihmusa a na om laitak uh kituaksak kei un.
Note kianga kong cih bangin a kuamahpeuh kiangah: ‘Vil un!’ ka ci hi,” a ci hi.
Tu-in Paisan-pawi le Silngo-sawhloh Anlum Pawi ding ni nih bekin a sap laitakin, siampi makaite le thukham siate in, Jesu mansima thahlup theih nading lampi a zong uh hi.
Amaute in, “Mipite hong so kha ding ahi ciangin Pawi sungin hih kei ni,” a ci uh hi.

Bethany a Miphak Simon kici pa inn-a sabuai tungah Jesu kingama a om laitakin a manpha mahmah nard kia kibawl sathau namtui suangngo thawl khat tawi-in numei khat ama kiangah a pai hi. Tuanu in a thawl sukham a Jesu lutang tungah sathau namtui a buak hi.
Tua lai-a om mi kimkhat lungkim lo uh a, “Sathau namtui pammaih lel hi lo hiam?
Kizuak leh kumkhat thamana sanga tamzaw kikhawng ding hi, tua sum mizawngte piakhuai zaw hi,” a kici uh hi. Tua ciangin amaute in tuanu a taigawp uh hi.
Jesu in, “Hih nu bangmah cih dah un. Bang hang buaisak na hi uh hiam? Amah in kei tungah a kilawm na khat a sem khin hi.
Note tawh mizawngte a om khawm den ding uh a, na ut hunhunun amaute na huh thei uh hi. Ahi hangin kei note tawh ka omkhawm den kei ding hi.
Hih nu in ama hih theih bang a hih zo hi. Ka pumpi sathau namtui hong buah ciangin kei kivui nading bawlkhol ahi hi.
Thutak kong geninah, lungdamna-thu a kihilhna leitung mun khempeuhah tuanu a kiphawkna in ama hihsa thu zong a kigen ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Jesu lehek dingin Sawm-le-nihte lakah khat, Judas Iscariot, siampi makaite kiangah a va pai hi.
Amaute in hih thu a zak uh ciangin lungkim mahmah uh a, ama tungah sum piak dingin a kamciam pah uh hi. Tua hi-a amah in amaute khutah Jesu a piak thei nading hun hoih a ngak gige hi.

Silngo-sawhloh Anlum Pawi ni masa pen ni Paisan tuuno-a biakna a kipiak ngei hunin Jesu nungzuite in ama kiangah, “Paisan-pawi bawl nading koi lai-ah pai-in na bawlkhol le ung na deih hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi.
Tua ahi ciangin amah in a nungzuite nih sawla, amaute kiangah, “Khuapi sungah pai le uh cin tuibel khat a pua pasal khat tawh na kituak ding uh hi. Tuapa na zui un.
Ama lutna inntekpa kiangah, ‘Siapa in: Ka nungzuite tawh Paisan-pawi ka bawl nading, ka zintunna inndei koi lai ahi hiam, ci-in hong dongsak hi,’ va ci un.
Amah in van zat ding a kima om, a kipuahsa inndei tungnung a zaipi khat note hong lak ding hi. Tua lai-ah ei adingin na kisakhol un,” ci-in a vaikhak hi.
Tua nungzuite gel paikhia uh a, khuapi sungah a lut uh ciangin Jesu gensa bang tektek in a mu uh hi. Tua hi-a amaute in Paisan-pawi bawl nading a na kisakhol uh hi.
A nitak ciangin Sawm-le-nihte tawh Jesu a tung hi.
Amaute sabuai ah kingamin an a nek laitakun amah in, “Thutak kong geninah, an ka nek khawmpih note lakah khat in kei hong lehhek ding hi,”a ci hi.
Amaute lungsi dedu uh a, ama kiangah, “Kei hi buang kei ning maw?” ci-in khat khatin a dong uh hi.
Amah in, “Sawm-le-nihte lakah khat ahi hi; tuapa kei tawh kuangkum-a anlum a diahkhawm pa ahi hi.
Ama’ thu a kigelhsa bangin Mihing Tapa a pai ding hi. Ahi hangin Mihing Tapa a lehhek pa in gimna nak thuak nazen incia! Amah a piang vet lo hileh ama adingin hoihzaw ding hi,” a ci hi.
Amaute in an a nek laitakun Jesu in anlum la-a, lungdam ko-in balkhama, a nungzuite pia in, “Hih, ka pumpi ahi hi, la unla ne un,” a ci hi.
Tua khit ciangin hai la-in lungdam ko-a amaute pia-in amaute in tua hai panin a dawn ciat uh hi.
Amah in amaute kiangah, “Hih in mi tampi adingb kibuakhia thukhunna ka sisana ahi hi.
Thutak kong geninah, Pasian gam sungah a thaka ka dawn ni mateng tu-a kipan lenggahzu ka dawn nawn kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Amaute in biakna la a sak khit uh ciangin Olive Vum manawhin a paikhia uh hi.
Tua khit ciangin Jesu in amaute kiangah, “ ‘Tuucingpa ka sat dinga, tuuhonte kithehthang ding hi,’c ci-a kigelhsa bangin note na vekpi un na pukmang ding uh hi.
Ahi hangin ka thawh kik khit ciangin note mai Galilee ah ka na pai ding hi,” ci-in a gen hi.
Peter in, “Adang teng khempeuh a pukmang zongin kei ka puk kei ding hi,” ci-in a pulakkhia hi.
Jesu in, “Thutak kong geninah, tu ni, tu zan mahmah ak nihveid a khuan ma-in nang tektek in thumvei nong kitheih mawhbawl ding hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Ahi hangin Peter in, “Nang tawh sihkhawm ding ahi zongin nang kong kitheihmawhbawl ngei kei ding hi,” a ci teitei hi. Adangte khempeuh in zong tua mah a ci ciat uh hi.
Amaute Gethsemane kici mun ah pai uh a, Jesu in a nungzuite kiangah, “Thungen-a ka pai kalin hih lai-ah na tu un,” a ci hi.
Amah in Peter, James le John-te tonpih a lungdong ngeungau-in a lungkham mahmah hi.
Amah in amaute kiangah, “Dahluatna in sih nading zah in hong zen hi. Hih lai-ah na om unla, na kigalging un,” a ci hi.
Tawmkha pailai-in lei-ah bok a, ahi theih leh tua hun tawh a kipelh nadingin thu a ngen hi.
"Abbae, Pa aw, nang adingin na khempeuh hi thei hi. Hih hai kei kiang panin hong lakkhiatsak in. Ahi zongin kei deihna bang hi loin nangma deihna bang hizaw hen,” a ci hi.
Tua khit ciangin a nungzuite kiangah a pai kik leh amaute ihmu sa a om a mu hi. Amah in Peter kiangah, “Simon aw, ihmu na hi hiam? Nai khat sung beek kigalging zo lo na hi hiam?
Zia-etna na thuak loh nadingun kigalgingin thu na ngen un. Kha a ut hangin pumpi a thanem hi,” a ci hi.
Khatvei paikhia leuleu-a, a ngetsa mah bangin a ngen hi.
Amah a pai kik ciangin amaute ihmut suak lua uh ahi manin a ihmut laitak uh a tuak leuleu hi. Amaute in ama kiangah a gen ding uh a thei kei uh hi.

A thumveina va pai kika, amaute kiangah, “Note ihmu lailai-in tawlnga lailai na hi uh hiam? Pha zo ta! A hun hong tung ta hi. En un, mawhneite khut sungah Mihing Tapa a kilehhek hun hong tung petmah hi.
Tho un! Pai ta ni! Kei hong lehhekpa hih lai-ah hong pai ta hi!” a ci hi.
Tua banga a paupau laitak, Sawm-le-nihte lakah khat Judas a kilang hi. Siampi makaite, thukham siate le upate sawl namsau le khetbuk tawi mihon amah tawh a tonkhawm uh hi.
Tua a lehhekpa in, “Ka nappa pen amah hi ding hi; tuapa man pah unla, cingin paikhiatpih un,” ci-in amaute tawh lim a kilakkhol khin hi.
Jesu kiangah Juda paipah a, “Rabbi aw!” ci-in Jesu a nam hi.
Tua mite in Jesu lencipin a man uh hi.
Tua laitakin a gei-a dingte khat in a namsau dokin tulpipa nasempa a sat leh a bil langkhat a satkhia hi.
Jesu in, “Kei man dinga namsau le khetbuk tawh nong kuan zawzen uh, kumpi langpangte makai ka hi hiam?
Nisimin biakinnpi tualte ah thu ka hilh laitakin nong man kei uh hi. Ahi hangin Laisiangtho a tangtung pelmawh ding mah ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin mi khempeuh amah nusia-in a taimang uh hi.
Saihadial puanza khat longal puan dang a silh lo tangval khat in zong Jesu a zui hi. Amaute in amah a mat uh ciangin,
amah in a puanza nusia in a guaktang in a tai hi.
Amaute in tulpipa kiangah Jesu paipih uh a siampi makaite, upate le thukham siate khempeuh a kikhawm uh hi.
Peter in tulpipa inntual ciang tektek a kihal simsimin Jesu a zui hi. Tua laitakah amah a cingte tawh mei awi-in a va tukhawm hi.
Siampi makaite le Sanhedrin buppi in Jesu a thah theih nadingun langpangin paulap a zon uh hangin khat beek a mu kei uh hi.
Ama langah mi tampi dingin zuau teci a pan uh hangin a thugente uh a kituak kei hi.
Tua ciangin mi pawlkhat dingin ama langah hih zuau teci pang uh a,
"Amah in, ‘Mihing khuta kibawl hih biakinnpi ka susia dinga, mihing khuta kibawl lo adang khat nithum sungin ka lam kik zo ding hi,’ a cih ka za uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua bang hi napi amaute teci panna a kituak kei lailai hi.
Tua ciangin amaute mai-ah tulpipa dingin Jesu kiangah, “Dawng lo ding na hi hiam? Na langkhata hihte tecipanna bang hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
Ahi hangin Jesu in dawng loin a dai dide hi. Tua ciangin tulpipa in ama kiangah, “Nang Thupha Ngahpa’ Tapa Khristf na hi hiam?” ci-in a dong kik hi.
Jesu in, “Ka hi hi. Note in Thahat Pa taklama tu meiipi tunga hong paisuk Mihing Tapa na mu ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tulpipa in a puansilh balkek a, “Teci dang kul nawn ding ahi hiam?
Pasian a gendaina na za zo uh hi. Bang na ci ngaihsut uh hiam?” ci-in a dong hi. Amaute in amah sihsak thamin a mawhpaih uh hi.
Tua ciangin pawlkhat in amah cilphih uh a, a mai tuamin a khuttum uh tawh tumin, “Hong gen in!” a ci uh hi. Tua ciangin a cingte in amah tonpih in a sat uh hi.
A nuai innpi tualah Peter a om laitakin tulpipa nasem numeite khat a kiangah va pai hi.
Tuanu in Peter mei-awi a muh ciangin amah a va nai et mahmah hi. “Nang zong tua Nazareth mi Jesu tawh na kipawl hi,” a va ci hi.
Ahi hangin aman a nial hi. Amah in, “Na thugen ka thei kei-a, a pianzia zong ka thei beek kei hi,” ci-in kong pua ah a kihemkhia hi,g
Tua numei mah in tua lai-a om a muh ciangin a kima dingte kiangah, “Hih pa amaute lakah khat ahi hi,” a ci kik hi.
Amah in a nial leuleu hi. Tawlkhat khit ciangin a gei-a dingte in Peter kiangah, “Amau pawlte lakah khat na hi taktak hi. Galilee mi na hi ngel ve leh,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin amah le amah kihamsiat in, “Na gen uh hih mipa ka thei peuhmah kei hi,” ci-in a tomlo hi.

Tua khit phetin a nih veinah ak a khuang hi. Tua ciangin Peter in Jesu in a ma tunga, “Ak nih veii a khuan ma-in thum vei nong kitheihmawhbawl ding hi,” ci-a a gensa a phawk hi. Tua ciangin amah ki-ip zo nawn loin a kapkhia hi.
Zingsang phalvak tungin siampi makaite in upate, thukham siate le Sanhedrin buppi tawh thukhensatna a bawl uh hi. Amaute in Jesu henin paikhiatpih uh a, Pilate khutah a tun uh hi.
Pilate in, “Nang Jew-te kumpipa na hi hiam?” ci-in a dong hi. Jesu in, “Ka hi hi, na cih bang ahi hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Siampi makaite in amah thu tampi tawh a mawhmat uh hi.
Tua ahi ciangin Pilate in, “Amaute in nang thu tampi tawh hong mawhmat uh na thei hi. Dawng lo ding na hi hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
Ahi hangin Jesu in dawng tuan lo lailai ahi ciangin Pilate in lamdang a sa mahmah hi.
Tua hun lai-in pawi hun ciangin mipite nget thongkia khatpeuh a khahkhiat ding ngeina ahi hi.
Kumpi langdo-a, tualthatte tawh thong kiakhawm Barabbas kici mi khat a om hi.
Pilate kiangah mihonpite va pai uh a, a hih ngei banga a hih nadingin a ngen uh hi.
Pilate in, “Jew-te kumpipa no kiangah hong khah leng na deih uh hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
Tua pen siampi makaite in Jesu a hazat manun ama khutah a tut uh ahilam a theih man ahi hi.
Ahi hangin Pilate in Barabbas a khahsak zawk nadingin siampi makaite in mihonpite a tawsawn uh hi.
Pilate in, “Tua ahileh Jew-te kumpipa na cih pa uh bang ka cih ding hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
Amaute in, “Kilhlum in,” ci-in a kiko uh hi.
Pilate in, “Bang hangin maw? Amah in bang tatkhialhna nei ahi hiam?” ci-in a dong hi. Ahi hangin amaute in, “Amah kilhlum in!” ci-in a kinak ko semsem uh hi.
Pilate in mihonpite a lungkimsak nop manin amaute kiangah Barabbas a khah hi. Amah in Jesu a satsak khit ciangin kilhlup dingin amaute khutah a ap hi.
Galkapte in Jesu kumpi inn (tua pen gam-ukpa Innpi) ah paipih uh a, tua ciangin galkap company bup khat a sam uh hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in kumpi puan dupsan khat silhsak uh a, ling tawh kumpi lukhu khat phanin amah a khusak uh hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in, “Jew-te kumpipa aw, na khan sawt ta hen!” ci-in a otkhai uh hi.
Amaute in ciangkhutin a lu satsat uh a, cil a phihphih uh hi. Amaute khuk dinin amah a bia uh hi.
Amah a zahko khit uh ciangin kumpi puan dupsan suahkhiatsak uh a, ama puan a silhsak kik uh hi. Tua khit ciangin kilhlup dingin a paikhiatpih uh hi.
Alexander le Rufus-te pa, Cyrene pana Simon kici mi khat in gamsung panin tua lai a va tawn hi. Amaute in zawhthawh thu-in amah singlamteh a puasak uh hi.
Amaute in Golgotha (Luguh Mun cihna) kici munah Jesu a paipih uh hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in amah, paknamtui kha tawh kihel lenggahzu a pia uh hi. Ahi hangin a dawn kei hi.
Amaute in singlamteh tungah amah a kilh uh hi. Amaute in a puan hawm uh a, kua in koi tang ding cihna-in ai a lawn uh hi.
Amaute in amah a kilh laitakun nai thumna a sat hi.
Amah kimawhmatna-in JEW-TE KUMPIPA, ci-in theihsakna lai kigelh hi.
Amaute in amah tawh, misuamte nih a taklam khat, a veilam khat kilh uh a,
tua ciangin Laisiangtho gen: “Thukham palsatte tawh amah kisimkhawm hi” cih thu a tangtung hi.a
Tua lai a tawnte in amah engko in lupeisan uh a, “Petmah aw! Nang, biakinnpi susia a ni thum sunga lam kik ding pa,
singlamteh tung pan hong kumsuk inla, nang le nang hong kihon khia dih ve!” a ci uh hi.
Tua mah bangin siampi makaite le thukham siate in amaute lakah amah a zahko uh hi. Amaute in, “Amah in midangte honkhia zo a, amah le amah kihonkhia zo lo pi!
I mitin mu a i up theih nadingin hih Israel-te kumpipa, hih Khristb singlamteh tung pan hong kumsuk ta hen,” a ci uh hi. Tua mah bangin amah tawh a kikilh khawmte in zong a engko uh hi.
Tua gam bupah nai gukna-a kipan nai kuana dong khim a zing hi.
Nai kuana laitakin Jesu in, “Eloi, Eloi, lama sabacthani?” ci-in nakpi-in a kiko hi. A khiatna in, “Ka Pasian, ka Pasian aw, bang hangin kei hong taisan na hi hiam?”c cihna ahi hi.
Tua lai-a ding mi kimkhat in a zak uh ciangin, “Ngai dih un, amah’n Elijah sam hi,” a ci uh hi.

Mi khat va tai-a, lenggahzu thuk sungah tuihup a diah khit ciangin ciang dawnah koihin Jesu dawn dingin a pia hi. Amah in, “Bangmah cih dah dih un. Amah lakhiasuk dingin Elijah hong pai hiam, en phot dih ni,” a ci hi.
Jesu nakpi-in kiko-a tua ciangin a hutawpna a sang hi.
Biakinnpi puanzak a lu pan a taw dong kikekin phel nih a suak hi.
Jesu mai-a ding zakhat-ukpa in ama kikona led a sihzia a muh ciang- in, “Hih pa Pasian Tapae hi takpi ei!” a ci hi.
A gamla sim pan numei pawlkhat in a galvil uh hi. Amaute lakah Mary Magdalene, James nauzaw pen le Joses nu Mary, le Salome-te a om uh hi.
Hih numeite in Galilee ah amah zui uh a, a kisapnate a sepsak uh hi. Jerusalem dong amah tawh a ton numei dang tampi zong tua lai-ah a om uh hi.
Tua ni, kiginkholh Ni, Sabbath tunma ni ahi hi. Tua hi-a ni niam kuan ciangin,
Pasian gam a ngak gige Vaihawmte lakah mi thupi khat, Arimathea mi Joseph Pilate kiangah hangtakin pai-a Jesu luang a va ngen hi.
Pilate in amah si zo cih a zak ciangin lamdang a sa hi. Amah in zakhat-ukpa samin, Jesu si khin takpi hiam, cih a dong hi.
Si khin zo takpi, cih zakhat-ukpa kam pan a zak ciangin a luang Joseph a pia hi.

Tua ciangin Joseph in saihadial puan pawlkhat lei-in siluang lakhia suka, saihadial puanin a tun khit ciangin suangpi a khuak han sungah a sial hi. Tua ciangin tua han kong vang suangtum khatin a khak hi.
Mary Magdalene le Joses nu Mary-te in ama kisialna mun a mu uh hi.
Sabbath ni a bei khit ciangin Mary Magdalene, James nu Mary le Salome-te in Jesu luang a zut nading uh gimnamtui a keng uh hi.
Nipikal ni masa ni zingsang tung ni suah khit phetin amaute hanah hawh uh a,
"Han kongvang khakna suangtum kuan hong likkhiatsak ding hiam?” ci-in khat le khat a kikum uh hi.
Ahi hangin a daktoh uh ciangin a lian mahmah tua suangtumpi a tukkhia khin zo a mu uh hi.
Amaute han sungah a lut uh leh, puantualpi pak silh tangval khat, a taklam-a tu mu uh a, amaute a patau uh hi.
Amah in, “Patau kei un, a kikilhlum Nazareth mi Jesu a zong na hi uh hi. Amah tho kik zo hi! Amah hih lai-ah om lo hi. A kisialna mun en un.
Ahi hangin pai unla nungzuite le Peter kiangah, “Note mai Galilee ah amah na pai ding hi. Ama hong gensa bang tektekin, tua lai-ah amah na mu ding uh hi,’ ci-in va gen un,”a ci hi.
Tua numeite lungmang le ling kawmsa-in han pan paikhia-in a tai uh hi. Amaute lau uh ahi manin kuama kiangah bangmah a gen kei uh hi.
Nipikal ni masa ni, zingsang tung, Jesu a thawh kik khit ciangin a sung pana dawi sagih a hawlkhiatna nu Mary Magdalene kiangah a kilang masa pen hi.
Tuanu pai-in amah tawh a omkhawm ngei, adah a kap laite kiangah thu a gen hi.
Jesu nungta-a amah in mu khin zo cih thu amaute in a zak uh ciangin a um kei uh hi.
Tua khit ciangin tuate lakah nih gamsung lam zuanin a pai laitakun amaute kiangah meltuamin Jesu a kilang hi.
Hihte gel kileh kik uh a, adangte kiangah a va koh uh hangin amau zong a um tuan kei uh hi.

Tua nung ciangin nungzui Sawm le khatte in an a nek laitakun amaute kiangah a kilang hi. Amah a thawh kik khit ciangin amah a mute genna a up loh teltalna hang uh le amaute uplahna hangin amaute a tai hi.
Amah in amaute kiangah, “Leitung mun khempeuh ah pai unla, a piansaksa khempeuh tungah lungdamna thu na hilh un.
Um-a a kibaptise-te peuhmah kihonkhia dinga, ahi hangin a um lo peuhmah a kimawhpaih ding hi.
Tua ciangin a umte ahileh hih limte in a zui ding hi: Keima minin dawite a hawlkhia ding uh hi; amaute pauthakte in a pau ding uh hi.
A khutun gul a man ding uh hi; sihtheihna gu a dawn uh hangin bangmah a ci peuhmah kei ding uh hi. Amaute in cinate tungah a khut uh nga ding uh a, amaute a dam ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Topa Jesu in amaute a vaikhak khit ciangin amah vantungah kilato a, Pasian taklamah a tu hi.
Tua ciangin nungzuite paikhia uh a mun khempeuh ah thu a hilh uh hi. Topa in amaute seppih a, amaute a zui limte in ama thugen a kipsak hi.
Eite laka a tangtungsaa nate thu mitampi in na gelh khin zo uh hi.
A tunga kipan mit-a a mute le thu’ nasemte in eite kianga hong hilhsawm bang tektek uh ahi hi.
Tua ahi manin zahtakpipen Theophilus aw, kei mahmah in zong tuate khempeuh atunga kipan limtaka ka kantel sinsen khit ciangin a thu kizom diudeu-in nang adinga kong gelh ding pha ka sa hi.
Tua pen nang hong kihilhte a taktak a hina na theih nading ahi hi.
Judea gamah Herod kumpi ahi laitakin Abijah uk siampi pawl lakah Zechariah min nei siampi khat a om hi. Ama zi Elizabeth zong Aaron suan ahi hi.
Amau nupa Pasian muhna-ah mi thutang hi uh a, Topa thupiakte le zuih ding ngeinate khempeuh kawkbaanna om loin a zui uh hi.
Ahi hangin Elizabeth tasel ahi manin ta a nei kei uh hi; a nih un zong a kum uh tam lua ta hi.
Khatvei Zechariah uk pawl in na a sep hun, amah in Pasian mai-ah siampi na a sep sungin,
siampi ngeina tawh kizui-in Topa biakinnpi sungah pai-a gimnamtui hal ding ai a san uh leh amah in a ngah hi.
Gimnamtui hal hun a tun ciangin Pasian bia-a kikhawmte khempeuh in a pualam ah thu a ngen uh hi.
Tua laitakin Topa vansawltak khat ama kiangah kilanga, gimnam-tui halna biakna-tau taklam pangah a ding hi.
Zechariah in amah a muh ciangin kigaih a lau-in a koncip hi.
Ahi hangin vansawltakin a kiangah, “Zechariah aw, lau kei in na thungetna hong kiza zo hi. Na zi Elizabeth in tapa khat nei dinga, a min John na phuak ding hi.
Amah na lungnopna, na lungkimna hi dinga, ama suahna hangin mi tampi a kipak ding hi.
Ahang in, Topa muhna ah amah alian ding hi. Amah in leng gahzu ahi zongin a kibilh zu nam tuamtaumte ahi zongin dawn lo dinga, a suahb a kipan Khasiangtho tawh kidim ding hi.
Israel mite tampitak, Topa amau Pasian kiang a tunpih kik ding hi.

Tua hi-a amah in pate lungtang tate lamah kiheisak dinga, thumang lote, thumaan pilna lamah kiheisak ding, Topa adingin mite a baihsa-a, a koihkhol dingin Elijah kha le vangliatna tawh Topa mai-ah a pai ding hi,” a ci hi.
Zechariah in tua vansawltak kiangah, “Kei lah tek ta inga, ka zi lah kum tam lua ta hi. Hih thu bangci muan ngam ding ka hi hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
Tua vansawltak in, Gabriel ka hi hi. Pasian kianga ding ka hi-a hih lungdamna thu nang tunga gen ding le nang hong hopih dingin kei hong kisawl hi.
A hun a cin cianga a tung takpi ding ka thugente um lo na hi manin hih thu a tun mateng pau thei loin na daicip ding hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Tua kikal sungin mipite in Zechariah na ngak uh a, biakinnpi sungah tua tanvei a om lamdang a sa uh hi.
A paikhiat ciangin amaute a hopih thei kei hi. Amah pau thei lo a, amaute lim bek tawh a khutin a hopih ciangin biakinnpi sungah amah mangmu ahilam a theikhia pan uh hi.
A nasep hun sung a cin khit ciangin innah a ciah hi.
Hih thu teng khit ciangin a zi Elizabeth gai-a kha nga sung a tang om hi.
Amah in, “Topa in kei adingin hih hong hihsak ahi hi. Ka mite lakah tu hun laitaka ka maimawlna hong lakkhiat sakin kei hong angvan hi,” a ci hi.
A kha gukna ciangin, Pasian in Galilee gam khuapi khat ahi Nazareth ah,
David suan, Joseph min nei pasal khat tawh kiteng dinga a kidongsa nungak bit khat kiangah vansawltak Gabriel a sawl hi. Nungak bit min Mary ahi hi.
Ama kiangah vansawltak pai-in, “Nang hong ki-angvan mahmah nu aw kong hopih hi! Topa in nang hong ompih hi,” a ci hi.
Ama thugente hangin Mary lungmang mahmah a, bangci bang hopihna hiam, ci-in lamdang a sa hi.
Ahi hangin vansawltak in ama kiangah, “Mary aw, lau kei in Pasian in nang hong angvan zo hi.
Nau na paii dinga tapa khat na nei ding hi; a min Jesu na phuak ding hi.
Amah lian dinga Sang Penpa Tapa kici ding hi. Topa Pasian in a pa David tokhom pia dinga,
amah in Jacob suante uk denin ama gam a bei ngei kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Mary in vansawltak kiangah, “Kei nungak bit ka hi hi, hih thu bangci pian theih ding ahi hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
Vansawltak in, “Nang tungah Khasiangtho hong tung dinga Sang Penpa vang in nang hong sung ding hi. Tua ahi ciangin a suak ding misiangthopa, Pasian Tapa kicic ding hi.
Na tanaunu Elizabeth nangawn in a tek nungin ta khat nei dekta hi. Amah tasel a kici nangawn a gai kha guk pha zo hi.
Ahang in, Pasian in hih theih loh a nei kei hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Mary in, “Kei, Topa nasemnu ka hi hi. Na cih bangin kei tungah piang ta hen,” a ci kik hi. Tua khit ciangin vansawltak in amah a nusia hi.
Tua hunin Mary kithawi-a Judah gam sung mualtung khuapi khat zuanin pai mengmeng a,
Zechariah innah lutin Elizabeth a hopih hi.
Mary hopihna Elizabeth in a zak ciangin ama sunga naungeek dianga Elizabeth Khasiangtho tawh a kidim hi.
Amah in: “Numeite lakah thupha ngah nu na hi-a, nang sung pana suakkhia ding naungek, thupha ngah ahi hi!
Ahi zongin bang hanga ka Topa nu kei kianga hawh ding zah dongin kei hong ki-angvan ahi hiam?
Nong hopihna ka zak phetin ka sunga nau ngeek lungdamin a diang hi.
Topa in ama tunga a gensate a tung takpi ding hi, ci-a a um numei in thupha ngah ahi hi,” ci-in ngaihtakin a awngkhia hi.
Tua ciangin Mary in: “Ka hinna in Topa phat a
ka Honpa Pasian ah ka kha a kipak hi.
ahang in a nasemnu tualniamna hong thudon hi. Tu-a kipan khang sawnsawnte’n thupha ngah nu hong ci ding hi;
hang in, Thahat Pa in kei ading na lianpipi bawl zo a – ama min siangtho hi.
Amah a kihtate tungah akhang akhangin ama lainatna zaam suksuk hi.
Amah in a khut tawh a thahatna lak hi; a lungsim tawnga kisatheite a thehthang zo hi.
Gam-ukte amau tokhom panin khiasuk a, ahi hangin a tualniamte lamto khin zo hi.
A gilkialte na hoihin taisak a, ahi hangin a haute a hawm ciahsak zo hi.
Amah in ama nasem Israel huh a,
i pu i pate tungah a gensa bangin Abraham le a suan a khaktea hehpih denden ding, a phawk gige hi,”a ci hi.
Elizabeth kiangah Mary kha thum bang a tam khit ciangin innah a ciah hi.
Elizabeth suah hun tunga tapa khat a nei hi.
Topa in ama tungah lainatna lianpi a lah lam a vengte le a tanaute in za-in a lungdampih uh hi.
A nigiatna ni-in tua naupang vun-at dingin amaute khempeuh va pai uh a, a min, a pa Zechariah tamsak dingin a kisa uh hi.
Ahi hangin a nu in, “Hi kei! John phuah ding ahi hi,” ci-in a genkhia hi.
Amaute in ama kiangah, “Na tanaute lakah tua min nei om lo hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin a pa in naupang min ding bang phuak nuam hiam, cih amaute in khut tawh lim lakin a dong uh hi.
Amah in suangpek khat ngen in, “Ama min John ahi hi,” ci-a a gelh ciangin tua muna omte khempeuh in lamdang a sa uh hi.
Tua khit phetin a kam kihonga, a leigui kolin paukhia-a Pasian a phat hi.
A vengte khempeuh in piandang a sa mahmah uh hi. Judea gam mualtung tenga mite in zong hih thute khempeuh a gengen uh hi.
Hih thu a za peuhpeuh in lamdang sa uh a, “Tua ahileh hih naupang bangci mi hong hi tam?” ci-in a kidong ciat uh hi. Ahang in, Topa khutin amah a ompih gige hi.
A pa Zechariah, Khasiangtho tawh kidim a thu genin:
“Topa, Israel-te Pasian kiphat ta hen, bang hang hiam cih leh amah hong pai-in ama mite tankhia zo hi.
Ama nasem David suan sung panin eite ading, hotkhiatna kid khat hong potosak a,
(tanglai ama kamsang siangthote tungtawna a gensa mah bangin),
i galte le ei hong mudahte khut sung panin hotkhiatna ahi zongin,
i pu i pate tunga lainatna lak ding le ama thukhun siangtho phawk gige nading ahi zongin,
i pa Abraham tunga a ciamsa tua kiciamna:
i galte khut sung panin hong kihonkhia ding, lau lo-a ama na sem thei ding,
i nun sung teng ama mai-ah siang thona le thumaanna tawh ama na a sem ding i hi hi.
Tua ciangin nang, ka ta aw, Sang Pen-pa’ kamsangpa hong kici ding hi; a lampi sial dingin Topa mai-ah na pai dinga,
amaute mawhna maisakna tungtawna ama mite hotkhiat theihna piak nading ahi hi;
bang hang hiam cih leh i Pasian’ lainatna nem ngi-ingei hangin van pan sun nisuak i tungah hong tang dinga,
khuamial sung le sihna liim le khuamial sunga tengte tungah tangin, i khete lemna lampi a tawnsak ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin naupang khangto a, a lungsim a pumpi a hat hi; Israel mipite lakah a kilaak mateng gamlakah a teng hi.
Tua hun laitakin Rome khuapi uk bupah mi a kisim nading Caesar Augustus in thukip a pia hi.
(Hih in Syria gama Quirinius gam-ukpa ahi zawh kisimna a khatveina ahi hi)
Tua hi-a mi khempeuh amau khuapi ciat ah minkhum dingin a pai uh hi.
Tua ciangin Joseph zong Galilee gam Nazareth khuapi panin Judea gamah pai-a David gui le suan ahi manin David khuapi Bethlehem ah a pai hi.
Kiteng dingin a dotsa nausuak kuan Mary tawh min khum dingin tua khua ah a paikhawm uh hi.
Tua lai-ah a om laitakun nausuah hun tunga,
amah a tacil suakin tapa ahi hi. Amah in puanza bekin tuna, zintun innah amau ading inndei awng lo ahi manin tua naungek gan ankuang sungah a sial hi.
Tua nai-a lopaangte ah zan laitaka a tuute uh a vil tuucingte a om uh hi.
Amaute kiangah Topa vansawltak khat kilanga, amaute kimkotah Topa minthanna tangin a lau mahmah uh hi.
Ahi hangin vansawltak in amaute kiangah, “Lau kei un, mi khempeuh ading a lian mahmah lungdamna thu note kong puak hi.
Tuni-in David khuapi ah note ading Honpa khat suak khin zo hi; amah Khrista Topa ahi hi.
Note tungah hih lim ahi ding hi. Note in naungek khat puanzabek tawh kituna, gan ankuang sunga kisial na mu ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Thakhatin tua vansawltak tawh, vantung galkap hon tampitak kilang zuah uh a,
"A sang penna-a Pasian minthang henla, leitunga ama angvan mite tungah lemna om ta hen.”ci-in Pasian a phat uh hi.
Vansawltakte in amaute nusia in vantungah a ciahsan uh ciangin tuucingte in, “Bethlehem ah pai-in Topa hong gensa hih thupiang va en dih ni,” ci-in khat le khat a kiho uh hi.
Tua ciangin amaute paikhia mengmeng uh a, Mary Joseph le gan ankuang sunga kisial naungek a mu uh hi.
Amaute in amah a muh khit uh ciangin hih naungek tawh kisai amaute kianga kigen thu a kizelsak kawikawi uh hi.
Tua hi-a tuucingte thugen a zate khempeuh in lamdang a sa uh hi.
Ahi hangin Mary in hih thute kemcing gige-in a lungtangah a ngaihsunsun hi.
Tuucingte ciah kik uh a, amaute tunga kigensa bang tektekin a zak uh le a muhte uh hangin Pasian phatin a minthangsak uh hi.
A nigiatna ni, ama vun-at hun ciangin, amah a kipaii ma-a vansawltak phuahsa bangin a min Jesu a phuak uh hi.
Moses thukham tawh kizui-in amaute a kisiansuah ding hun a cin ciangin Joseph le Mary in Topa tunga ap dingin amah Jerusalem ah paipih uh a,
(“Tapasal masa peuhmah Topa tungah ap ding ah hi”b ci-a Topa Thukham sunga kigelh bangin)
Topa Thukham sunga kigen tawh kizui-in “Vakhu kop khat ahikeh kawl vakhuno nih”c tawh biakpiakna a pia ding uh hi.
Tua hunlaitakin Jerusalem ah Simeon kici biakna hahkat mi thumaan khat a om hi. Amah, Israel-te kihehnemna ngakin a om hi-a ama tungah Khasiangtho a om hi.
Amah in Topa Khrist a muh matengin a si kei ding hi, cih Khasiangtho in ama tungah a laaksa ahi hi.
Kha sawlna tawh amah biakinnpi tualah a pai hi. Thukham ngeina in a kalh banga a bawl dingin a nu le a pa-te in naupang Jesu a paipih uh ciangin,
Simeon in amah la-in tawi-a Pasian phatin:
"Thuneipipen Topa aw, na kamciamsa bangin na nasempa tu-in lungnuamtakin khahkhiad ta in.
Ahang in, ka mitte inna hotkhiatna a mu zo hi,
tua pen mi khempeuh mitmuh ah na bawlkholhsa hi-a,
Gentile-te tunga kilaak nading khuavak le na mi Israel-te minthan nading ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Naupang nu le pa-te in amah tawh kisai-a thu kigente piandang a sa uh hi.
Tua ciangin Simeon in amaute thupha pia-a, a nu Mary kiangah, “Hih naungek in Israel gam sunga mi tampi a puk nading, a thawh nading le a kilanggenna lim dinga laitansa ahi hi.
Tua hi-a mi tampite lungtang ngaihsutna a pholak nading ahi hi. Tuateh nang hinna zong namsau in a sunlet ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua lai-in Asher beh pana Phanuel tanu Anna kici kamsang numei khat a om hi. Amah tek mahmah ta hi. A pasal tawh a kiten zawh kum sagih bek nungta khawm uh a,
amah kum sawm giat le li a phak dong a meigong hi.e Amah in biakinnpi nusia ngei lo-a, sun le zan-in Pasian bia a, antangin thu a ngen hi.
Tua hun lianin amaute kiangah tuanu pai-in Pasian tungah lungdam thu puakin Jerusalem kitatkhiat ding a lam ente khempeuh tungah hih naupang thu a gen hi.
Joseph le Mary in Topa Thukham kalh khempeuh a bawl khit uh ciangin Galilee gam amau khua Nazareth khuapi ah a ciah kik uh hi.
Tua ciangin naupang khangto-a, a tha a hat hi; amah pilna tawh kidim a Pasian hehpihna a tungah a om hi.
Kum simin a nu a pa-te Paisan Pawi sim dingin Jerusalem ah a pai uh hi.
Amah kum sawm-le-nih a phak ciangin a ngeina omsa tawh kizui-in Pawi sim dingin a pai uh hi.
Pawi ven khit a nu a pa-te a ciah kik laitakun Jerusalem ah naupang Jesu a tam lai hi. Ahi hangin amaute in tua thu a phawk kei uh hi.
Amah tawh a tonkhawmin kingaihsun uh ahi manin ni khat lam a pai khin ta uh hi. Tua ciangin a tanaute le a lawmte lakah amah a zong pan uh hi.
Amah a muh loh uh ciangin a zong dingin Jerusalem ah a kileh kik uh hi.
Ni thum khit ciangin amah biakinnpi tualte-a siate lakah tu-in amaute thugen ngai-a thu dongin a om laitak a tuak uh hi.
Ama teltheihna le a dawnnate a za mi khempeuh in lamdang mahmah a sa ciat uh hi.
A nu a pa-te in amah a muh uh ciangin lamdang a sa uh hi. A nu in ama kiangah, “Ka ta aw, bang hangin hih banga hong bawl na hi hiam? Na pa tawh lunghimawh in nang kong zongzong uh hi,” a ci hi.
Amah in, “Bang hangin kei hong zong na hi uh hiam? Ka Pa inn-a a om ding mah ka hilam thei lo na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi.
Ahi hangin amaute in amau tunga a cihna thu a theitel zo kei uh hi.
Tua ciangin amaute tawh Nazareth ah paisuka, a thu uh a mang hi. Ahi hangin a nu in hih thute khempeuh a lungsim sungah a kemcing gige hi.
Jesu a pilna le a pumpi khanpha-in khanga Pasian le mite pahtakna a ngah hi.

Pontius Pilate, Judea gam ukpipa hi-a, Herod, Galilee gam ukpa hi-in, a sanggampa Philip, Iturea le Traconitis gam ukpa hi-a, Lysanias, Abilene gam ukpa ahi laitak– Tiberius Caesar in a uk zawh a kum sawm le ngana ahi hi.
Tua hunin Anna le Caiaphas tulpi sem hi uh a, tua hunlaitakin gamlaka om Zechariah tapa John tungah Pasian thu a tung hi.
Amah Jordan kimkot-a gamsung khua khempeuh ah pai-a, mawhnate maisak nading kisikna tawh kisai baptisena thu a hilh hi.
Kamsangpa Isaiah thute laibu sungah: “Gamlak-a kikopa aw in, ‘Topa ading lampi na sialkhol un, ama ading lampi na tangsak un.
Mualkuam khempeuh kivuk dim dinga, muallian le mualneu khempeuh kiniamsak ding hi. Lamkawi khempeuh kitangsak dinga, lamphok khempeuh kimaihtam ding hi.
Tua ciangin mi vannuai in Pasian hotkhiatna a mu ding uh hi.’ ci hi”a ci-a kigelh bang ahi hi.
Amah kibaptisesak dinga pai mihonte John in a muh ciangin, “No mualtan suante! Hong tung ding thangpaihna pana taikhia dingin kua in hong vauhilh ahi hiam?
Kisikna tawh kilawm gah na gah un. No le no in, ‘Abraham ka pa uh hi,’ kici kei un. Ahang in, Pasian in hih suangte Abraham tate a suaksak thei hi, cih kong hilh hi.
Sing phungte ah hei a om khin zo hi; gah hoih a gah lo kungte kiphukin mei sungah kikhul ding hi,” a ci hi.
Mihonpite in, “Tua ahileh bang ka hih ding uh hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi.
John in, “Puantungsilh nih a neithuah pa in, a nei lo pa khen ding a, tua mah bangin an nei pa in zong a hih ding hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Siahdongte zong a kibaptise dingin va pai uh a, “Sia aw, bang hih ding ka hi uh hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi.
Amah in amaute kiangah, “Na don ding zah val uh na dong kei un,” ci-in a gen hi.

Tua ciangin galkap pawlkhat va pai uh a, “Ko zong bang ka hih ding uh hiam?” ci-in amah a dong uh hi. Amah in, “Mi sum na gumsuh kei unla, zuauthu tawh mi na mawk ngawh kei un. Na khasum uh tawh lungkim lel un,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Mite in John hoh Khristb a hi kha tam ci-a a lungtang sunguah ngaihsun kakkakin, a ngak laitak uh ahi hi.

John in amaute khempeuh kiangah, “Keimah in note tui inc kong baptize hi. Ahi hangin kei sanga a vanglian zaw khat hong pai ding hi; ama khedap khaute sut ding nangawnin ka cin zo kei hi. Amah in note Khasiangtho le mei-in hong baptize ding hi.
Amah in a buhlak ciangka tawi-in buhphual a hahsiang ding hi. Atak teng a sal sungah koih dinga, a sii teng ahileh a mit thei lo mei sungah a khul ding hi,” ci-in a hilh hi.
John in mipite thudang tampi tawh hanthawna, amaute kiangah lungdamna thu a hilh hi.
Ahi hangin John in, gam-ukpa Herod tatsiatna khempeuh le a sanggampa zi Herodias hangin amah a tai ciangin,
Herod in ama tatsiatnasa teng a behlapna in thong sungah John a khum hi.
Mi khempeuh a kibaptise uh ciangin Jesu zong a kibaptise hi. Tua ci-a thu a nget laitakin van kihong a,
vakhu bangin Khasiangtho pumpi nei in ama tungah a kumsuk hi. Tua ciangin vantung pan aw khat in, “Nang ka it ka Tapa na hi hi; nang tungah ka lungkim mahmah hi,” a ci hi.
Jesu thuhilh nasep a kipatin kum sawmthum bang a pha hi. A kingaihsutna ah amah Joseph tapa hi-a, Heli tapa Joseph,
Matthat tapa Heli, Levi tapa Matthat, Melki tapa Levi, Jannai tapa Melki, Joseph tapa Jannai
Mattathias tapa Joseph, Amos tapa Mattathias, Nahum tapa Amos, Esli tapa Nahum, Naggai tapa Esli,
Maath tapa Nagai, Mattathias tapa Maath, Semein Tapa Matathia, Josech tapa Semein, Joda tapa Josech,
Joanan tapa Joda, Rhesa tapa Joanan, Zerubbabel tapa Rhesa, Shealtiel Tapa Zerubabel, Neri tapa Shealtiel,
Melki tapa Neri, Addi tapa Melki, Cosam tapa Adi, Elmadam tapa Cosam, Er tapa Elmadam,
Joshua tapa Er, Eliezer tapa Joshua, Jorim tapa Eliezer,Matthat tapa Jorim, Levi tapa Matthat,
Simeon tapa Levi, Judah tapa Simeon, Joseph tapa Judah, Jotham tapa Joseph, Eliakim tapa Jonam,
Melea tapa Eliakim, Menna tapa Melea, Mattatha tapa Menna, Nathan tapa Mattatha, David tapa Nathan,
Jesse tapa David, Obed tapa Jesse, Boaz tapa Obed, Salmond tapa Boaz, Nahshon tapa Salmon,
Amminadab tapa Nahshon, Rame tapa Aminadab, Hezron tapa Ram, Perez tapa Hezron, Judah tapa Perez,
Jacob tapa Judah, Isaac tapa Jacob,Abraham tapa Isaac, Terah tapa Abraham, Nahor tapa Terah,
Serug tapa Nahor, Reu tapa Serug, Peleg tapa Reu, Eber tapa Peleg, Shelah tapa Eber,
Cainan tapa Shelah, Arphaxad tapa Kainan, Shem tapa Arphaxad, Noah tapa Shem, Lamech tapa Noah,
Methuselah tapa Lamech, Enoch tapa Methuselah, Jared tapa Enoch, Mahalalel tapa Jared, Cainan tapa Mahalalel,
Enosh tapa Cainan, Seth tapa Enos, Adam tapa Seth. Pasian tapa Adam.
Jesu Khasiangtho tawh kidimin, Jordan panin ciah kika Kha in amah gamlakah a pi hi.
Tua lai-ah dawimangpa in ni sawmli sung a zia-et hi. Tua hun sungin amah in bangmah ne lo a, tua nite a bei khit ciangin a gil kial hi.
Dawimangpa in ama kiangah, “Nang Pasian Tapa na hileh hih suang, anlum suaksak in,” a ci hi.
Jesu in, “‘Mihingte anlum bekin nungta lo hi,’a ci-in kigelh hi.” ci-in a dawng hi.
Dawimangpa in munsang khatah amah paipih a, leitunga om kumpi gamte khempeuh thakhatin a lak hi.
Ama kiangah, “Thuneihna le a thupina teng khempeuh kei hong kipia zo hi. Ka piak nop peuh pia thei ka hi manin nang kong pia ding hi.
Tua ahi ciangin kei hong bia peuh lecin a vekin nang aa hi ding hi,” a ci hi.
Jesu in, “‘Na Topa Pasian bia inla ama na bek sem in,’b ci-in kigelh hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Dawimangpa in amah Jerusalem ah paipih a biakinnpi khum dawnah a dingsak hi. Amah in, “Nang Pasian Tapa na hileh hih lai panin tuaksuk in.
Bang hang hiam cih leh: “ ‘Nang tawh kisai-in limtaka nang hong cing dingin amah in a vansawltakte thu pia ding hi:
na khepek suang tawh na tahkhak loh nadingin, amaute in a khut uh tawh nang hong domto ding uh hi,’c ci-in kigelh hi,” a ci hi.
Jesu in, “‘Na Topa Pasian na zia-et kei in,’d ci hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Dawimangpa in hih zia-etna teng khempeuh a man khit ciangin hun hoih a om kik mateng amah a nusia hi.
Jesu, Kha vangliatna tawh Galilee ah ciah kika, ama thu gamsung khua khempeuh ah a kizel hi.
Amaute synagogue-te sungah thu hilh a, mikim in amah a phat uh hi.
Amah a khanna khua Nazareth ah pai-a, ama ngeina bangin Sabbath ni-in synagogue ah a pai hi. Amah laisim dingin a dingto hi.
Kamsangpa Isaiah laizial amah kipia hi. Amah in tua laizial a phel leh:

"Mizawngte tunga lungdamna thu hilh dingin keimah sathau hong nilh khin zo ahi manin, Topa Kha ka tungah a om hi. Amah in thongkiate suaktasak ding, mittawte khua musak ding, a kinengcipte khahkhia ding,
Topa angvanna kum a tangko dingin, kei hong sawl zo hi,”e ci-a kigelhna mun a mu hi.
A sim khit ciangin laizial zialin sawltakpa pia-in a tu hi. Jew-te synagogue sunga om mi khempeuh in amah mitkhah loin a en uh hi.
Tua ciangin amah in amaute kiangah, “Tuni-in hih Laisiangtho note zakin a tangtung hi,” a ci hi.
Mi khempeuh in amah phatgen in a kam pana kamngaihte lamdang sa mahmah uh a, “Hih pa Joseph tapa hi lo ahi hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi.

Jesu in amaute kiangah, “‘Zato mangpa aw, nang le nang kidamsak in! Na khankhiatna Capernaum a na hih ka zakte uh hih lai-ah zong hong hih dih in,’ ci-in hih paunak tawh nong bulh tektek ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Amah in, “Thutak kong geninah, ama khua-a kisang kamsang khat beek a om kei hi.
Elijah hun lai-in kum thum le kum lang sung van kikhak-a, gamsung khempeuh ah a nasia mahmah kialpi a tun laitakin Israel gamah meigong tampi om hi, cih mantakin kong gen hi.
Tua hi napi Sidon kual Zarephath a meigongnu kiang longal adangte kiangah Elijah a kisawl kei hi.
Kamsangpa Elisha hun lai-in zong Israel gamah phakf natna a vei tampi a om hi. Tua hi napi Syria mi Naaman bek longal adang khat beek a kisiangsak kei hi,” ci-in a gen a zom lai hi.
Synagogue sunga om mite khempeuh in hih thu a zak uh ciangin a lungham uh hi.
Amaute dingkhia in, khuapi pua-ah amah hawlkhia uh a, kenah khiatsuk dingin tua khuapi kiphuhna mualdawn kil ah amah a paipih uh hi.
Ahi hangin amah mihonpite kawmlak tawnin a gelkhia hi.
Tua ciangin Galilee gam khuapi khat, Capernaum ah paisukin Sabbath ni-in mite kiangah thu a hilh hi.
Ama thuhilhna lamdang a sa mahmah uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh a thuhilhna in thuneihna a nei hi.
Synagogue sungah kha gilog lut mi khat a om hi. Tuapa in a aw neihzah in,
“Ehei! Nazareth mi Jesu aw, kote bang hong cih nuam na hi hiam? Kote susia dingin hong pai na hi hiam? Nang kua na hi hiam, cih kong thei hi – Pasian’ Mi Siangtho na hi hi!” ci-in a kiko hi.
Jesu in khauhtakin, “Pau kei in! Ama sung pan paikhia in,” ci-in a sawl hi. Tua ciangin dawi in amaute khempeuh mai-ah tuapa a puksak khit ciangin amah liamsak loin a paikhia hi.
Mi khempeuh in lamdang sa mahmah uh a, “Hih thuhilhna bang ahi hiam? Thuneihna le vang tawh kha gilote thu a piak ciangin paikhia mawk uh hi!” khat le khat a kici uh hi.
Tua ciangin tua kuam kimkot tengah ama thu a kizel hi.
Synagogue inn panin Jesu paikhia a, Simon innah a hawh hi. Tua laitakin Simon sungnu nattun gim mahmah a, Jesu in amah a huh nading amaute in a ngen uh hi.
Tua ahi ciangin tuanu tungah kun a, nattun natna a tai leh a natna in amah nusiapah hi. Amah tho in amaute a zindo hi.
Nitum ciangin mipite in, natna tuamtuam a neite Jesu kiangah va paipih uh a, amah in amaute tungah khut nga kimin a damsak hi.

Tua tham loin mi tampite sung pan dawite paikhai a, “Nang Pasian Tapa na hi hi!” ci-in a kiko uh hi. Ahi hangin amah in amaute a tai hi. Tua dawite in amah Khristh hi, cih thei uh ahi manin amaute pau ding Jesu in a phal kei hi.
Khuavak ciangin Jesu gamdaihna munah a pai hi. Mite in amah zong uh a, ama omna munah a tun uh ciangin amaute nusia lo dingin a kho uh hi.
Ahi hangin amah in, “Pasian gam lungdamna thu hilh dingin kei hong kisawl ahi manin khua dangte ah zong ka hilh pelmawh ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua hi-a, amah in Judeai gam synagogue-te sungah thu a hilhhilh hi.
Ni khat Gennesareta tuilipi gei-ah Jesu a din laitakin a kimah mihonpi va kikhawmin Pasian thu a ngai uh hi.
Tua laitakin a lente uh a sawp ngabengte in tuili monga a nusiat uh gunkuang nih amah in a mu hi.
Simon’ gunkuang tungah amah kahto in sehtak pan tawm a khinphei dingun a gen hi. Tua ciangin amah tu-a, gunkuang panin thu a hilh hi.
A thu hilh a man khit ciangin Simon kiangah, “Tui thuk lamah hot phei inla na lente khiasukb in,” a ci hi.
Simon in, “Topa aw, zan thapai-in khuhkhuh napi bangmah ka man kei uh hi. Ahi zongin nang cih ahi manin ka khiasuk ding hi,” a ci hi.
Amaute in tua banga a hih uh ciangin ngasa tam awk lua ahi manin a lente uh a kikek dektak hi.
Tua ciangin gunkuang khat pen-a om a lawmte uh pai-in amau huh dingun a khutvan uh hi. Tua ciangin amaute pai uh a gunkuangte gel sungah a koih uh ciangin dim lua ahi manin a tum dektak hi.
Simon Peter in hih a muh ciangin Jesu mai takah bokin, “Topa aw, kei kiang pan paikhia in; mawhdim mi ka hi hi!” a ci hi.
Ahang in, ngasa tua zahta a mat uh amah le a pawlte khempeuh in lamdang a sa uh hi.
Zebedee tate James le John-te, Simon lawmte in zong lamdang a sa uh hi. Tua ciangin Jesu in Simon kiangah, “Lau kei in; tu-a kipan mihing na man ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in a gunkuangte uh tuigei-ah kaito uh a, na khempeuh nusia in amah a zui uh hi.
Khuapite khatah Jesu a om laitakin phakc natna in a pumtuam mi khat va pai hi. Tuapa in Jesu a muh ciangin leitualah khupbawh in, “Topa aw, ut peuh lecin nong siang-sak thei hi,” ci-in a thum hi.
Jesu in a khut zanin tuapa lawng a, “Ka ut hi, siang ta in!” a ci hi. Tua khit phetin phak natna in amah a nusia pah hi.

Tua ciangin Jesu in ama kiangah, “Kuama kiangah gen kei in, ahi hangin pai-in siampipa kiangah va kilak inla, amaute tungah teci panna in Moses in na sian nadinga hong thupiak na biakpiakna va pia in,” ci-in thu a pia hi.
Tua hi napi ama thu kizel semsem a, ama thugen ngai ding le a natnate uh a damsak ding deihin mihonpite a va pai uh hi.
Ahi hangin Jesu in gamdaihna munte ah kihemkhia zelin thu a ngen hi.

Ni khat Jesu in thu a hilh laitakin Galilee gam khuaneu khempeuh pan, Judea le Jerusalem pana pai Pharisee-te le thukham siate tua lai-ah a tu uh hi. Cinate a damsak nading Topa vangliatna ama adingin a om hi.
Mi pawlkhat in pumzaw khat phek tawh zawngin va paipih uh a, inn sungah tumpih in Jesu mai-a ngak ding a hanciam uh hi.
Mihonpite hangin Jesu kiang a tut theih nading uh lampi a muh theih loh uh ciangin innkhumah kahto in leisekpekte phelkhia uh a, mihonpite laizang, Jesu mai santakah a phekin a khai suk uh hi.
Jesu in amaute upna a muh ciangin, “Lawm aw, na mawhna kimaisak zo hi,” a ci hi.
Pharisee-te le thukham siate in, “Pasian a gendai hih mipa kua ahi hiam? Pasian longal kua in mawhna maisak thei ahi hiam?” ci-in a ngaihsun uh hi.
Jesu in amaute ngaihsutna thei a, “Note in bang hangin na lungsim uhah hih thute ngaihsun na hi uh hiam?
‘Na mawhnate kimaisak zo hi,’ cih ding le ‘Tho inla pai in,’ cih ding koi baihzaw hiam?

Ahi hangin Mihing Tapa in hih leitungah mawh maisak theih nading thu nei hi, cih na theih nadingun...,” a cih khit ciangin pumzawpa kiangah, “Tho-in, na phek la inla, innah ciah in, kong ci hi,” a ci hi.
Tua khit phetin amah amaute mai-ah dingto pah a, ama kizawnna a lak khit ciangin innah ciah a Pasian a phat hi.
Mi khempeuh in lamdang sa mahmah uh a Pasian a phat uh hi. Amaute in piandang sa lua mahmah uh a, “Tuni-in a ciamtehtak thute i mu zo hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua khit ciangin Jesu a paikhiat leh siahdonna bukno-a tu Levi min nei siahdongpa khat a mu hi. Jesu in ama kiangah, “Kei hong zui in,” a cih ciangin
Levi dingto a na khempeuh nusia in amah a zui hi.
Tua ciangin Levi in a innah Jesu ading anvakna pawi khat a bawl hi. Siahdongte hon tampi le midang tampi in amaute tawh an a nekhawm uh hi.
Ahi hangin Pharisee-te le amau pawlmi thukham siate in a nungzuite kiangah, “Bang hangin note in siahdongte le ‘mawhneite’ tawh nekhawm dawnkhawm na hi uh hiam?” ci-in a phunsan uh hi.
Jesu in amaute kiangah, “Cinate siavuan kisam uh a, cidamte kisam lo uh hi.
Thumaante sam dinga hong pai hi loin, mawhneite kisiksak dinga hong pai ka hi hi,” a ci hi.
Amaute in ama kiangah, “John nungzuite le Pharisee-te nungzuite in an a tan zelzel uh hangin nang nungzuite in a nene a dawndawn uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Jesu in, “Zineipa tawh a omkhawm kimlai a lenglate in bangci-in an tang thei ding uh ahi hiam?
Ahi hangin zineipa amaute kiang pan a kilakkhiat hun hong tung ding hi. Tua ni ciangin amaute in an tang ding uh hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Amah in amaute kiangah gentehna gen a: “Kuamah in puanthak eukhia in puanlui a thuap kei hi. Tua bangin kihih leh puan thak kimlai eukhia dinga tua puanthak bek le a lui a kituak kei ding hi.
Savun-um lui sungah lenggahzu thak kuamah in thun ngei lo hi. Tua bangin kithun leh savun-um kitamin lenggahzu bua dinga savun-um kisia ding hi.
Tua bang hizaw loin savun-um thak sungah lenggahzu thak kithun pelmawh zaw ding hi.
Tua ciangin lenggahzu kumlui a dawnsa peuhmah in ‘A kumlui mah geii zaw’ sa uh ahi manin lenggahzu thak a deih zaw kei uh hi,” a ci hi.
Sabbath ni khat Jesu buhlei tawnin a pai hi. Nungzuite in buhvui zutin a khut sunguah nuai-in a takte a ne uh hi.
Pharisee-te pawlkhat in, “Bang hangin Sabbath ni-in thukham tawh kituak lo hih na hi uh hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi.
Jesu in amaute kiangah, “David le a pawlte a gilkial laitakun bang hih uh cih sim ngei lo na hi uh hiam?
Pasian inn sungah lutin siampite bek nek dinga kiphal a ki-apsa anlum ne in, a pawlte zong a pia hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Tua ciangin Jesu in amaute kiangah, “Mihing Tapa, Sabbath’ Topa ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Sabbath ni dang khat synagogue sungah pai-a thu a hilh laitakin a khut taklam a teem mi khat a om hi.
Pharisee-te le thukham siate in Jesu a mawhmat nop manun Sabbath ni-in cina a damsak kha hiam, ci-in a vil gige uh hi.
Ahi hangin Jesu in amaute ngaihsutna thei ahi manin khutteempa kiangah, “Tho inla mi khempeuh mai ah ding dih in,” ci-in a sawl hi. Tua ciangin amah thoin tua lai-ah a ding hi.

Tua ciangin Jesu in amaute kiangah, “Sabbath ni-in a sia hih ding le a pha hih ding, nuntakna hot khiat ding le nuntakna suksiat ding koi pen thukham tawh kituak zaw ahi hiam, cih kong dong hi,” a ci hi.
Amah in amaute khempeuh en kawikawi a, tua ciangin tuapa kiangah, “Na khut zan in,” ci-in a sawl hi. Amah in a khut a zan leh a khutsa a dim kik phitphet hi.
Ahi hangin amaute lungham uh a, Jesu bangci hih ding cih thu khat le khat a .kikum uh hi.
Tua hunlai ni khat, thungen dingin Jesu mualtungah kahto a, zan khuavakin Pasian kiangah thu a ngen hi.
Zingsang ciangin ama kiangah a nungzuite sama, sawm le nih telkhia-in sawltakpi, ci-in a min vawh hi.
Tuate in: Simon (Peter min a phuah) le a sanggampa Andrew, James, John, Philip, Bartholomew,
Matthew, Thomas, Alphaeus tapa James, Zealot kici Simon,
James tapa Judas le lehhekpa Judas Iscariot te ahi uh hi.
Amaute tawh amah tonkhawm sukin munzang khatah a ding hi. Ama nungzui mihon tampi le Judea gam khempeuh pan ahi zongin, Jerusalem le Tyre le Sidon le tuipi dung pan ahi zongin mi tampitak,
ama thu a ngai ding le a cinate uh a damsak nading deihin tua lai-ah a na om uh hi. Kha giloa in a thuaksiatsakte kidamsakin,
ama tung panin vang paikhia a, cinate khempeuh dam siangsak ahi manin mi khempeuh in amah lawn a sawm uh hi.
Amah in a nungzuite en a: “A zawng note thupha ngah na hi uh hi, ahang in, Pasian gam nomau aa ahi hi
Tu laitaka gilkial note thupha ngah na hi uh hi, ahang in, hong kivak kham ding hi. Tu laitaka kap note thupha ngah na hi uh hi, ahang in, na nui ding uh hi.
Mite in note hong mudah uh a, Mihing Tapa hangin amaute in note hong puaseh in, hong engko in na min uh siasak a, hong nolh uh ciangin thupha ngah na hi uh hi.
"Vantungah no ading pahtakman lian ahi manin, tua ni-in kipakin lungdamin diang un. Ahang in, tua mah bangin a pu a pa-te un kamsangte na bawl zo uh hi.
"Ahi hangin a hau note, gimna na thuak ding uh hi, ahang in, na nuamsa khin zo uh hi.
Tu laitaka an kham note, gimna na thuak ding uh hi, ahang in, na gilkial ding uh hi. Tu laitaka nui note, gimna na thuak ding uh hi, ahang in, dah in na kap ding uh hi.
Mi khempeuh in note hong phatgen uh ciangin gimna na thuak ding uh hi, ahang in, na pu na pa-te un kamsangzuaute tua bangin a hih uh hi.
"Ahi hangin ka thugen a za mite tungah kong hilh hi: Na galte na it in, hong mudahte tungah a hoih na bawl in;
nang hong samsiate thupha na pia inla, hong bawlsiate ading thu na ngetsak in.
Mi khatpeuh in na pang hong bet leh a lang lam zong na dawh in. Mi khatpeuh in na puantualpi hong laksak leh na puantungsilh a lak ding kham kei in.
Hong ngente khempeuh na pia inla, na neihsa hong laksak peuhpeuh kiangah bangmah na ngen kik kei in.
Nang tunga hong kibawl ding na deih bangin midangte tungah na bawl in.
"No hong itte bek na it uh leh bang lawhtak ding na hi uh hiam? ‘Mawhneite’ nangawn in amau a itte it uh hi.
No tunga a hoih hong bawlte tung bekah a hoih na bawl uh leh bang lawhtak ding na hi uh hiam? ‘Mawhneite’ nangawn in tua bangin hih uh hi.
