Hong loh kik dinga na lamette bek uh na leitawisak uh leh tua in nang bang hong lawhtaksak tuan ding ahi hiam? ‘Mawhneite’ nangawn in a cinga loh kik ding a lamet uh ‘mawhneite’ leitawisak uh hi.

Ahi hangin note na hi uh leh na galte uh itin, amaute tungah a hoih bawl unla ngah kik ding khat beek lamen loin na leitawisak un. Tua ciangin na pahtakman uh lian dinga, Sang Penpa tate na hi ding uh hi. Ahang in, amah nuamna mel a thei lote le a tatsiate tungah a migi hi.
Na Pa un a lainat theih bangin no zong na lainat thei un.
Thu na khen kei un, no tungah zong hong kikhen kei ding hi. Na mawhpaih kei un, no zong hong kimawhpaih lo ding hi. Na maisak un, no zong hong kimaisak ding hi.
Pia un, no zong hong kipia ding hi. No tehna dimvum tham lo kinengcipin kitattat-a, a dimletin na anguah hong kisung ding hi. Ahang in, note zat tehna tawh no ading hong kitehsak ding hi,” a ci hi.
Amah in amaute kiangah hih gentehna gen a: “Mittaw khat in mittaw dang khat bangci lamhilh thei ding ahi hiam? A nih un leihawm ah kia lo ding uh ahi hiam?
A sin mi in a siapa sangin theizaw lo hi, ahi hangin cingtaaktaka a kisinsak peuhmah a siapa mah tawh kibang ding hi.
"Nang mittang-a singpek phawkkha loin na sanggampa mittang a singvui them bang dinga en na hi hiam?

Nang mahmah in na mittang a singpek mu thei lo napi na sanggampa kiangah, ‘Sanggam aw, na mit-a ninthem hong lakkhiatsak ning,’ bangci cih theih na hi hiam? Kineihsiampa aw, na mit-a singpek lakhia phot lecin tua ciangin na sanggampa mit-a lakkhiat ding singvui them na telmuh thei pan ding hi.
Singkung hoih, a gah hoih lo gah om lo a, singkung hoih lo a gah hoih gah a om kei hi.
Singkung khempeuh a gah in kikhentel thei ciat hi. Mite in thangling kung panin thei gah lo lo uh a, sialtalling kung panin lenggah a lo thei kei uh hi.
Mi hoih in a lungtanga a koihcing a hoihte panin na hoih pusuahkhia hi. Ahang in, lungtang sung a dimlet ciangin kamin kipaukhia hi.
"Bang hangin “Topa, Topa hong ci napi, ka gen bangin hih lo na hi uh hiam?
Ka kiangah hong pai-in ka thu za-a, a zuipahte bang tawh kibang hiam, cih kong lak ding hi,
Thukpi a tawh khit ciangin suangpi tungah bulkip a phut innlampa tawh kibang hi. Tui khanga, tua inn a nawk hangin kiptaka kilam ahi manin tua inn a lok zo kei hi.
Ahi hangin ka thute za napi a zui lote, bulpi a nei lo leituala inn lam pa tawh kibang hi. Tui khanga tua inn a nawk phetin puka, a kisia ngi-ingei hi,” a ci hi.
Jesu in hih thu khempeuh mipite zakin a gen khit ciangin Capernaum ah a lut hi.
Tua lai-ah zakhat ukpa khat in a pahtak mahmah nasempa cina-a, si dektakin a om hi.
Zakhat ukpa in Jesu thu za-a Jew upate pawlkhat ama kiangah sawlin, amah pai-a a nasempa a damsak nadingin thumsak hi.
Amaute Jesu kiang a tun uh ciangin, “Hih mipa ading na hihsak ding kilawm hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in i minam it a, ei Jew-te synagogue hong lamsak ahi manin hong pai hamtang in,” ci-in a kun tangtang uh hi.
Tua ahi ciangin Jesu in amaute a zui hi. Amah tuapa inn a tun dektak ciangin zakhat-ukpa in a lawmte sawl a, “Topa aw, kibuaisak dah in. Kei inn sungah nang kong lutsak ding kei adingin kilawm lo hi.
Nang kianga hong pai dinga kilawm ka kisaklohna zong tua hang mah ahi hi. Ahi hangin kammal khat gen lel lecin ka nasempa dampah ding hi.

Kei mahmah zong thuneihna nuai-a om ka hi-a, keima nuai-ah galkapte a om hi. Khat kiangah, ‘Pai in,’ ka cih leh pai-a, adang khat kiangah, ‘Hong pai in,’ ka cih leh hong pai hi. Ka nasempa kiangah, ‘Hih sem in,’ ka cih ciangin a sem hi,” a ci hi.
Jesu in hih thu a zak ciangin, tuapa lamdang sa mahmah a, amah a zui mihonpite lam nga-in, “Ken kong geninah, Israel-te lak nangawn ah hih zaha lian upna ka mu nai kei hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah sama kisawlte tung uh a, tua nasempa a damsa in a mu uh hi.
A sawt loin Nain kici khua ah Jesu pai-a, a nungzuite le mihon tampi in amah zui uh hi.
Amah tua khuapi kongpi a tun kuan ciangin meigongnu khat tapa khat neihsun a sisa in a kizawngkhia hi. Tua khuapi panin mihonpi in tua meigongnu a zui uh hi.
Topa in tuanu a muh ciangin khasiat mahmah ahi manin, “Kap nawn kei in,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin va naih a hankuang zawngte a dinkhawl uh hi. Amah in, “Tangvalpa aw, tho in kong ci hi!” a ci hi.
Misipa thoto in pau-a, Jesu in a nu kiangah a ap kik hi.
Amaute khempeuh in piandang sa in Pasian a phat uh hi. Amaute in, “Eite lakah kamsang lian khat hong kilang ta hi. Ama mite huh dingin Pasian hong pai ta hi,” a ci uh hi.
Hih Jesu tawh kisai thu Judeaa le a kimkot gamsung khua khempeuh ah a kizel hi.
John nungzuite in hih thupiang khempeuh John a hilh uh hi. Amaute lakah nih sama,
Topa kiangah, “Hong pai ding pa mah na hi hiam? Midang ka na lamen lai ding uh hiam?” cih a dong dingin a sawl hi.
Tua mite Jesu kiang a tun uh ciangin, “‘Hong pai ding pa mah na hi hiam? Midang khatpeuh ka na lamen lai ding uh hiam?’ cih a dong dingin Baptize-pa John in na kiangah kote hong sawl hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua hun laitak tektekin Jesu in natna satna le kha gilo a veite tampi damsakin, mittaw tampi khua a musak hi.

Tua ciangin amah in thupuate kiangah, “Note pai kik unla, na zaksa na muhsa uh thu teng John kiangah va hilh un: Mittawte in khua mu uh hi, khebaite lam pai thei uh hi; miphakteb damsiang uh hi; bilngongte in khua za uh hi; misite kihingkiksak hi; mizawngte kiangah lungdamna thu kihilh hi.
Keima hanga a puk lo mi thupha ngah ahi hi,” a ci hi.
John thupuate a ciah khit uh ciangin Jesu in mihonpite kiangah, John thu hih bangin gen a: “Bang en dinga gamlak ah pai na hi uh hiam? Huih mut-a huang pumpeng en dinga paikhia na hi uh hiam?
Ahi kei leh bang en dinga paikhia na hi uh hiam? Puan hoih silhte en dinga pai na hi uh hiam? Hi lo hi. Puan hoih silhte le a noptatte kumpi-inn sungah a om uh hi.
Tua ahileh note bang en dingin paikhia na hi uh hiam? Kamsangpa en dingin maw? Hi mah hi. Ken kong geninah, kamsangpa sangin a lianzaw hi.
Tuapa thu hih bangin kigelh hi: “‘Ka thupuapa na mai-ah ka sawl dinga amah in na mai-ah na lampi ding a sialkhol ding hi,’c
Ken kong geninah, numei sung pana suakte lakah Baptisepa John sanga lianzaw kuamah a om kei hi; ahi zongin Pasian gamah a neupen nangawn amah sangin a lianzaw hi,” a ci hi.
(Mi khempeuh, siahdongte nangawn in Jesu thugen a zak uh ciangin Pasian lampi a maan hi, ci-in a sang uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amaute John in baptise khin hi.
Ahi hangin Pharisee-te le thukham siamte John in baptise kha lo ahi manin amau ading Pasian ngimsak na a nolh uh hi.)
"Tua ahileh hih khang mite bang tawh ka teh ding hiam? Amaute bang tawh kibang uh hiam?
Suamzuakna munah tu a: “ ‘Tamngai kong mutsak uh hangin na laam kei uh hi; misi-la ka sak uh hangin lah na kap kei uh hi,’ ci-in a kigal to naupangte tawh kibang uh hi.
Ahang in, Baptize-pa John anne lo lenggahzu dawn loin hong pai-a, ‘Dawi lawm neipa hi,’ na ci uh hi.
Mihing Tapa hong pai ciangin ne-in dawna, ‘An hai zu haipa, siahdongte le “mawhneite” lawmpa hi,’ na ci zel uh hi.
Ahi hangin pilna aman a hina a tate khempeuh in lakkhia hi,” a ci hi.
Pharisee-te khat in nitak-an nekpih dingin Jesu sama, tua Pharisee-pa innah pai-in sabuai-ah a kingam hi.
Jesu in tua Pharisee-pa inn-a an a nek lam mawhna a bawl ngitnget tua khua-a numei khat in a theih ciangin sathau namtui suangngo thawl khat tawi a,
Jesu nunglam a khe phungah kap kawmin dinga a khitui in Jesu khepekte a kawtsak hi. Tua khit ciangin a samin nul-a, namin a sathau namtui a buak hi.
Amah a sam Pharisee-pa in a muh ciangin, “Hih pa kamsang ahileh amah a lawng kua hi-a hih nu bangci numei hi-in, mawhnei khat ahilam a thei ding hi,” amah le amah a kici hi.
Jesu in ama kiangah, “Simon aw, kong gen nop khat a om hi,” ci-in a dawng hi. Amah in, “Sia aw, hong gen in,” a ci hi.
Jesu in, “Sum pakhak pa khat tungah mi nih in sum ba uh hi. Khat in denariid zanga ba-in adang khat in sawmnga a ba hi.
Amaute in a leiba uh loh zo lo tuak uh ahi manin amah in a leibate a nihin maisak tuak hi. Tua ahileh tuate gel kua pen in amah nak itzaw ding ahi hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
Simon in, “Leiba a tamzaw a kimaisakpa hi-in ka um hi,” ci-in a dawng hi. Jesu in, “A mantakin na khen zo hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin amah tuanu lamah kihei-a Simon kiangah, “Hih nu na mu hiam? Na innah kong hawh a, ka khe sil nading tui nong pia kei hi. Ahi hangin amah in ka khepekte a khitui tawh kawtsakin a samin a nul hi.
Nang nong nam kei a, ahi hangin hih nu in innsung kong luta kipan tawlnga loin ka khepekte a nam hi.
Nang, ka lu sathau nong nilh kei a, amah in ahileh ka khepekte sathau namtui a buak hi.
Tua ahi manin ken kong geninah, ama mawhna tampite kimaisak zo ahi manin tampi-in a it hi. Ahi hangin tawmkha a kimaisakte in a tawm it uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Jesu in tuanu kiangah, “Na mawhnate kimaisak zo hi,” a ci hi.
Lengla dangte in, “Mawhnate nangawn a maisak hih mipa kua ahi hiam?” ci-in a kiho uh hi.
Jesu in numei kiangah, “Na upna in nang hong honkhia zo hi; lungnuamin ciah in,” a ci hi.
Tua khit ciangin Jesu khuapi le khuaneute ah zin kawikawi-a, Pasian gam tawh kisai lungdamna thu a tangko hi. Tua Sawm-le-nihte ama kiangah om uh a,
kha gilo le a natnate uh a damsak numei pawlkhat zong a om uh hi: A sung pana dawi sagih a paikhiatna nu Mary (Magdalene kici);
Herod inn sunga sungtapipa Chuza zi Joanna, Susanna, le adang tampi tawh a om uh hi. Hih numeite in amau neih bangbang tawh amaute a panpih uh hi.
Khuapite panin Jesu kiangah mipite pai uh a, mihon tampi a kihonkhop laitakin amah in hih gentehna na gen a,
"Lokhopa khat ama khaici vawh dingin kuankhia hi. Khaici a theh ciangin pawlkhat lamdungah tu-a kituancilin vana vasate in nemang uh hi.
Pawlkhatte suang tungah tu-a a po khiat ciangin a nom om lo ahi manin ankungte a keugaw hi.
Adang pawlkhatte linglakah tu-a, lingkung tawh khangkhawmin lingkung in depgawp hi.

Adang pawlkhatte leuleu lei hoihna ah a tu hi. Tuate poto in a kivawh sangin azah zakhat-a tamzaw gah a gah hi,” a ci hi. Hih thu a gen khit ciangin, “Zak nading bil nei peuh in za ta hen,” ci-in a kiko hi.
A nungzuite in hih gentehna a khiatna a dong uh hi.
Amah in, Pasian-gam thusimte theih theihna note hong kipiak hangin, “amaute in mumu napi a muhtel theih loh, zaza napi in a theihtel theih loh,’a nadingin midangte tungah gentehnate zangin ka gen hi.
"Hih gentehna a khiatna: Khaici pen Pasian thu ahi hi.
Lam dunga tute, thu za-a, ahi hangin uma hotkhiatna a ngah loh nadingin dawimangpa va pai-in amau lungsim panin Pasian thu a lakkhiatte ahi hi.
Suang tunga tute, Pasian thu a zak uh ciangin lungdamin a san uh hangin zungkha lote ahi uh hi. Amaute in tomkha sung um uh a zia-etna a thuak uh ciangin a pukmangte ahi hi.
Ling laka tu khaicite, Pasian thu a zak uh hangin a nuntakna uhah nuntak nading lunghimawhnate, hauhnate le nopsaknate in depgawp-a, a picing lote cihna ahi hi.
Ahi hangin lei hoihna-a tu khaicite ahileh lungsim picing le lungsim hoih nei in Pasian thu za-in kem dena, thuak keikai-in gah a gahkhiate cihna ahi hi.
"Kuamah in mei a vak khit ciangin bel sung ahi zongin lupna nuai ahi zongin a sel kei hi. Tua sangsikin inn sunga om khempeuh in khua a muh theih nadingin meivak tunna tungah tungzaw hi.
Ahang in, a kigenkhia lo ding a ki-imcip khat beek om lo-a, a kitheikhawk lo ding le a langtanga kipholak lo ding a kiselcip khat beek a om kei hi.
Tua ahi manin thu bangci ngaih na hi uh hiam, limtakin ngaihsun un. A nei peuhmah kipia beh ding hi; a nei lo peuhmah ama neihsa-a a ngaihsutte nangawn kilaksak ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua laitakin amah tawh kimu nuamin Jesu nu le a sanggamte a pai uh hi; ahi hangin mihonpite hangin ama kiangah a pai thei kei uh hi.
Mi khat in, “Na nu le na sanggamte, nang hong mu nuamin innpua ah ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Amah in, “Pasian thu za a, a zuite ka nu le ka sanggamte ahi hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Ni khat Jesu in a nungzuite kiangah, “Tuilipi galkhat lamah galkah ni,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amaute gunkuang ah tuangin a dingkhia uh hi.
A pai laitakun amah a ihmu hi. Tuilipi tungah huih le guah kinuai-a gunkuang tuum dektak ahi manin amaute adingin a lauhuai mahmah hi.
Nungzuite pai-in, “Topa, Topa, tui a kia petmah ding hi ta ung!” ci-in a phong uh hi. Amah tho-in huih le tuihual kinuai a tai ciangin huihpi daipah in a sippah dide hi.

Amah in a nungzuite kiangah, “Na upna uh koi-ah om hiam?” ci-in a dong hi. Amaute in lau kawm lamdang sa mahmah kawmin, “Hih pa kua hiam? Thu a piak ciangin huih le tui nangawn in ama thu mang uh hi,” a kici uh hi.
Amaute Galilee tuilipi galkhat lam Gerasenesb kualah gunkuangin a pai uh hi.
Tui gei-ah Jesu a kumkhiat ciangin khuapi panin dawilut mi khatin a na dawntuah hi. Hih mipa in sawt veipi puan silh lo, inn ah teng loin hante lakah a teng hi.

Amah in Jesu a muh ciangin kiko-a ama khe phungah bokin, “Sang Pen Pasian Tapa Jesu aw, kei bang hong cih nuam na hi hiam? Kei hong bawlsia kei in ci-in kong thum hi!” ci-in a aw neih zahin a kiko hi.

Ahang in, Jesu in tuapa sung pan tua kha giloc a paikhiat nadingin thu a pia hi. Tua kha gilo in tuapa tam veipi a man hi. A khut a khete sikkhainiang tawh khihin a cin uh hangin a sikkhainiangte peksatin tua dawi in amah gamdaih na munte ah a hawl hi.
Jesu in ama kiangah, “Na min bang ahi hiam?” ci-in a dong hi. Amah in a sungah dawi tampi om ahi ciangin, “Legion hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Tua ciangin amaute Kawhawmpi sungah a paisak loh nadingin ama kiangah a thumthum uh hi.
Mual pangah vok hon tampi a gamta hi. Dawite in tuate sungah a lutsak nadingin Jesu kiangah a nget uh ciangin amah in a phal hi.
Tua mipa sung pan dawite a paikhiat ciangin vokte sungah lut uh a vok honte kensang pan tuili sungah tuaksukin tui kia khin uh hi.
Vok cingte in tua thupiangsa a muh uh ciangin tai uh a, khuapi le khuaneute ah a koh uh ciangin,

bang thu piang hiam cih en dingin mipite a paikhia uh hi. Jesu kiang a tun uh ciangin dawite in a paikhiatsan pa Jesu khe phungah tu-in, puan silh-a, a lungsim pil kik-a om a muh uh ciangin a lau uh hi.
Tua thu a musate in dawilut pa a kidamsak zia mite kiangah a gen uh hi.
Tua ciangin amaute lau mahmah uh ahi manin, Gerasenes kuala mi khempeuh in amaute kiang pan Jesu a paikhiat ding a ngen uh hi. Tua ciangin amah gunkuang sungah kahin a paikhia hi.
Dawite a paikhiatna pa in amah a tonpih nadingin a thum hangin Jesu in,

"Na inn ah ciah inla Pasian in nang tungah bangzah hong bawlsak cih thu na gen in,” ci-in amah a sawlkhia hi. Tua ahi ciangin tuapa paikhia a, Jesu in ama tungah bangzah bawlsak cih khuapi sung khempeuh ah a gen hi.
Mi honpite khempeuh in Jesu a kileh kik ding lamen uh ahi manin, amah a ciah kik ciangin a na muak uh hi.
Tua laitakin Jairus min nei synagogue ukpa va pai-a, Jesu khephungah bokin ama inn ah a pai nading a ngen hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh kum sawm-le-nih bang a pha pan a tanu neihsun a si dektak hi. Jesu lampi ah a pai laitakin mihon pite in a nehkham dektak uh hi.
Tua lai-ah kum sawm le nih sungd siluang natna a vei, kuama damsak zawh loh numei khat a om hi.
Tua-nu, Jesu nunglamah pai-in a puantualpi mongtep a lawn leh a siluang a kangpah hi.
Jesu in, “Kei hong lawng kua hiam?” ci-in a kan hi. Amaute khempeuh in a nial uh ciangin Peter in, “Topa aw, mipite in nang hong neh in hong phukhakha uh hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Ahi hangin Jesu in, “Hong lawng khat om hi; ka tung panin vang a paikhiat lam ka thei hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin tuanu in amah kitheikhia veve ding cih a theih ciangin lingsa in va pai-a, Jesu khe phungah a bok hi. Mi khempeuh zakin, amah in bang hangin Jesu lawnga, bangci dampah lian cih thu a gen hi.
Tua ciangin amah in tuanu kiangah, “Ka tanu aw, na upna in nang hong damsak hi. Lungnuamin ciah in,” a ci hi.
Jesu a paupau laitakin synagogue ukpa Jairus inn panin mi khat hong pai hi. Tuapa in, “Na tanu si ta hi. Siapa buaisak nawn dah in,” a ci hi.
Jesu in hih thu a zak ciangin Jairus kiangah, “Lau kei in; um lel in, tua hileh amah dam ding hi,” a ci hi.
Amah Jairus inn a tun ciangin Peter, John le James le tua naupang nu le pa longal adang kuamah inn sungah a tumpih kei hi.
Tua kawmkalin mi khempeuh amah kahin a taamlo uh hi. Jesu in, “Tawp dih un, amah a si hi loin a ihmu ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Amaute in tua numeino a si ahilam thei uh ahi manin amah a nuihsan uh hi.
Ahi hangin amah in tuanu a khutin len a, “Ka ta aw, tho in!” a ci hi.
Tuanu a kha kileh kik a thakhatin a ding to hi. Tua ciangin Jesu in ama nek ding bang khatpeuh a piak dingun a sawl hi.
A nu a pate in lamdang a sa uh hi. Ahi hangin amah in hih thupiang kuama kiangah a gen loh nadingun thu a pia hi.
Jesu in Sawm-le-nihte a sapkhawm khit ciangin, dawite khempeuh a hawlkhiat nading uh le natnate a damsak nading uh vang le thuneihna a pia hi.
Tua ciangin amah in Pasian gam thu hilh ding le cinate damsak dingin amaute a sawl khia hi.
Amah in amaute kiangah, “Na khualzinna-ua na zat dingun ciangkhut, thung-ip, anlum le sum keng loin puantungsilh keng thuah kei un.
Inn khatpeuh ah na lut uh ciangin tua khua na nusiat mateng uh tua inn ah taam suak un.
Mite in note hong ngaih kei uh leh amau langa teci ahi dingin tua khua na nusiat uh ciangin na khepek-ua leivuite singkhia un,” a ci hi.
Tua ahi ciangin amaute kuankhia uh a, khuaneute ah pai kawikawi-in mun khempeuh ah lungdamna-thu hilhin, mite a damsak uh hi.
Tua laitakin gam-ukpa Herod in thupiang teng na za-a a amkham mahmah hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh mi pawlkhat in misi pan John thokik zo hi, ci uh a,
adang pawlkhat in Elijah hong kilang hi, ci-in pawlkhat leuleu in tanglai-a kamsangte khat hong hing kik hi ci uh hi.
Ahi hangin Herod in, “John ngawng ka tansa ahi hi. Tua ahileh a thu ka zak pa kua ahi hiam?” ci-in donga, amah a muh nadingin a hanciam hi.
Sawltakpite kileh kik uh a, a nasepsate uh Jesu a zasak uh hi. Tua ciangin amah in amaute paipih a Bethsaida kici khuapi khat lamah a kihemkhia uh hi.
Ahi hangin mihonpite in thei veve uh a, amah a zui uh hi. Amah in amaute na muak a, Pasian-gam thu genpihin damsak ding a kisamte a damsak hi.

Nitak lam ni niam ciangin Sawm-le-nihte ama kiangah va pai uh a, “Hih lai gamsungpi ahi manin hih kima khuaneu khuatate ah pai-in a nek ding uh le a zintun nading uh a zon theih nadingun mipite sawlkhia in,” a ci uh hi.

Amah in, “A nek ding uh bang khatpeuh pia un,” ci-in a dawng hi. Amaute in, “Hih mihonpite khempeuh ading an lei dinga pai ding ka hi kei ngal uh leh, anlum nga le ngasa nih bek ka nei uh hi,” ci-in a dawng uh hi.
(Tua lai-ah pasal tul nga bang a om hi.) Ahi hangin amah in a nungzuite kiangah, “Sawmnga ta khawngin a pawlpawlin khen unla tusak dih un,” a ci hi.
Nungzuite in tua banga a khen khit uh ciangin mi khempeuh a tu uh hi.
Amah in, tua anlum nga le ngasa gel la-a, vantung lam ento in, lungdam a koh khit ciangin tuate a balkham hi. Tua khit ciangin mipite a lui dingun nungzuite a pia hi.
Amaute khempeuh in ne uh a, a kham pikpek khit uh ciangin a khamvalte uh a nungzuite in a top uh leh bawmta sawm le nih tak a pha hi.
Khatvei Jesu in amah kia-a thu a nget laitakin a nungzuite zong om a, amah in amaute kiangah, “Mihonpite in kei kua hi, hong ci uh hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
Amaute in, “Mi pawlkhat in Baptize-pa John hi; pawlkhatte in Elijah hi; pawlkhat leuleu in tanglai kamsangte khat hong hing kik hi; hong ci uh hi,” ci-in a dawng uh hi.
Amah in, “Tua ahileh no, kei kua hi nong ci uh hiam?” ci-in a dong hi. Peter in, “Pasian’ Khrista na hi hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Jesu in hih thu kuamah a hilh loh nadingun khauhtakin a vauhilh hi.
Tua ciangin amah in, “Mihing Tapa in tampi thuak pelmawh dinga, upate, siampi makaite le thukham siate in amah nolhin, pel loin amah kithat dinga a ni thumna ni-in kihingkiksak ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah in amaute khempeuh kiangah, “Mi khatpeuh in ka nung hong zuih nop leh amah leh amah kinial pelmawh dinga nisimin ama singlamteh kisuanin hong zuih kul hi.
Ahang in, ama nuntakna a honkhia nuamte in taan ding uh a, ahi hangin kei hanga a nuntakna a mangsakte in a honkhia ding hi.
Mi khatin leitung buppi a neih hangin amahmah kimansuah ahikeh kitaan leh bang phatuam ding ahi hiam?
Mi khatpeuh in keimah le ka thute a zumpih leh vantung misiangthote le Pasian minthanna le ama minthanna tawh Mihing Tapa hong pai ciangin ama hangin a maizum ding hi.
Thutak kong geninah hih lai-a ding mi kimkhat in Pasian gam a muh ma-un sihna a ciam kei ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Jesu in hih thu a gen zawh ni giat bang a phak ciangin Peter, John le James-te zawnin mualtung ah thungen dingin a kahto uh hi.
Thu a nget laitakin, a mel kikhela, a puante khuaphia bangin a tang hi.
Mi nih – Moses leh Elijah,
minthanna thupi tawh kilang uh a, Jesu tawh a kiho uh hi. Amaute in Jerusalem a, a tangtunsak ding, ama paikhiat nading thu a gen uh hi.
Peter le a pawlte a ihmut uh suak mahmah a, ahi hangin a tei sinsen uh ciangin ama minthanna le amah tawh a dingkhawm mi nih a mu uh hi.

Tua mite Jesu kiang pan a paikhiat laitakun Peter in, “Topa, hih lai-a i om nuam mahmah hi. Nang ading khat, Moses ading khat, Elijah ading khat, buk thum hong lamsak nung,” a ci hi. (Ama gen bang hiam cih a thei kei hi.)
Tua banga a pau laitakin meii khat kai-in amaute tuama, meii lakah a tum uh ciangin a lau uh hi.
Meii lak panin aw khat in, “Hih in ka teelsa ka Tapa ahi hi; ama thu na ngai un,” a ci hi.
Tua aw in a gen khit ciangin amaute in, Jesu amah kia-a om a mu uh hi. Nungzuite in hih thu amaute lungsimah kem gige uh a, amau muhsa thute tua hunin kuama kiangah a gen kei uh hi.
A zing ciang, mualtung pan a kumsuk uh ciangin mihon tampi in amah a na dawntuah uh hi.
Mihonpite lakah khat in, “Sia aw, ka tapa hong etsak dih in; amah bek ta-a ka neih ahi hi.
Amah kha khat in mana, thakhat khatin a kiko zakzak hi. Tua kha in amah kisatsak gawp a, a kam panin cilphuan a bua hi. Tua kha in amah nusiat hun nei lo phiala, a susia gawp ding hi ta hi.
Na nungzuite kiangah tua kha a hawlkhiat nadingun ka nget hangin a hawlkhia thei kei uh hi,” a ci hi.
Jesu in, “Thu um lo-a a lehtat khang mite aw, note tawh bang tan vei om khawma, bang tan vei hong dawhdawh zo ding ka hi hiam? Na tapa hong paipih in,” a ci hi.
Tua naupang a paipih laitak nangawnin dawi in leitualah tuksak-a a kisatsak gawp hi. Ahi hangin Jesu in tua kha gilob tai-a tua naupang a damsak khit ciangin a pa a pia kik hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in Pasian liatna lamdang a sa mahmah uh hi. Mi khempeuh in Jesu hihna piandang a sak laitakun amah in a nungzuite kiangah,
"Thu khat kong gen ding hi. Limtakin na ngai un: Mihing Tapa mite khutah a kilehhek ding hi,” a ci hi.
Ahi hangin amaute in bang a cih nopna hiam, cih a thei kei uh hi. Amaute theih loh dingin hih thu ki-im lai ahi manin amaute in a khiatna tel thei lo uh a, amah lah a dong ngam kei uh hi.
Nungzuite in amau lakah kua lianpen ding cih a kisel ngeingai uh hi.
Jesu in amaute ngaihsutna thei a, naupangno khat kai-in, a kiangah a dingsak hi.

Tua ciangin amah in amaute kiangah, “Keima min hangin hih naupnangno a sang peuhpeuh, kei hong sang ahi hi; kei hong sang peuhpeuh kei hong sawlpa a sang ahi hi. Ahang in, note khempeuh laka a neupen in a lianpen ahi hi,” a ci hi.
John in, “Sia aw, mi khatin nang minin dawite a hawlkhiat ka mu uh a, ei mi hi lo ahi manin a hih nawn loh nadingin ka kho uh hi,” a ci hi.
Jesu in, “No hong langpang lo peuhmah no pawl ahi hi, tuapa kho kei un,” a ci hi.
Jesu vantungah a kilak toh ding hun a tun kuan ciangin Jerusalem lam manawhin kuankhia ngiatngiat a,
ama mai-ah thupuate a sawl hi. Ama ading nate a baihsa-a koihkhol dingin Samaria khua neu khatah amaute a lut uh hi.
Ahi hangin amah Jerusalem manawh ahi manin tua khuate in amah a na muak kei uh hi.
Nungzui James le John-te in hih thu a muh uh ciangin, “Topa aw, amaute suksiat nadinginc vantung panin meikuang sam le ung nong awi hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi.
Ahi hangin Jesu kihei-in amaute tai-a,
tua ciangin amaute khua dang khatah a pai uh hi.d
Amaute lampi-a a pai laitakun mi khat in ama kiangah, “Na paina peuhpeuh ah kong zui ding hi,” a ci hi.
Jesu in, “Ngiate in kua nei uh a, van-a vasate in bu a nei uh hi; ahi hangin Mihing Tapa in a lutang ngak nading mun a nei kei hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Amah in adang khat pa kiangah, “Kei hong zui in,” a ci hi. Ahi hangin tuapa in, “Topa aw, va ciah photin, ka pa va vui masa ning,” a ci hi.
Jesu in ama kiangah, “Misite in amau misite na vui uh hen. Ahi hangin nang pai inla Pasian-gam thu na tangko in,” a ci hi.
Adang khat leuleu in, “Topa nang hong zui ning, ahi hangin va ciah kik masa photin ka innkuanpihte mangpha va khak phot ning,” a ci hi.
Jesu in, “Lokaihna tu lenkawma a nunglam en peuhmah Pasian-gam sunga nasem dingin cing zo lo hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Tua khit ciangin Topa in adang sawmsagih le nihtea sehkhia-in ama pai nading mun le khua lian khempeuhah, ama mai-ah nihta in a sawlkhia hi.
Amah in amaute kiangah, “An lak ding tampi a om hangin nasem ding mi tawm hi. Tua ahi ciangin ama lo lai-a nasem dingin an nei Topa kiangah ngen ta un.
Pai un, keivomte lakah tuunote bangin note kong sawlkhia hi.
Sumbawmte, thung-ipte, khedapte keng kei un; lamkalah kuamah hopih kei un.
"Inn khatpeuh ah na lut uh ciangin, ‘Hih innah lemna om ta hen.’ ci masa un.
Tua lai-ah lemna deih mi a om leh na piak uh lemna ama tungah tung dinga, a deih kei leh no tungah hong kileh kik ding hi.
Nasempa in thaman ngah ding kilawm ahi manin tua innah na tam unla, nek ding dawn dinga hong piak peuhpeuh na ne un. Inn khat pan inn khatah zin na khel kawikawi kei un.
"Khua khatpeuh ah na lut uh a hong ngaih uh leh na mai-ua hong lui peuhpeuh ne un.
Tua khua-a cinate damsak unla amaute kiangah, ‘Note kiangah Pasian-gam hong nai ta hi,’ ci-in gen un.
Ahi hangin khua khatpeuh na lut uh a hong ngaih kei uh leh kongzingte ah pai-in,
‘Ka khepek-ua bang na khua-ua leivuite nangawn no langa pang dingin ka phiatkhia uh hi. Ahi ta zongin Pasian-gam hong nai ta hi, cih na tel un,’ ci un.
Kong gen tektek hi, tua ni ciangin tua khua thuak ding sangin Sodom khuapi thuakna a thuak nopzaw ding hi.

"Korazin aw, gimna nak thuak na nicia! Bethsaida aw, gimna nak thuak na nicia! No sunga kibawl nalamdangte Tyre le Sidon khuate ah kibawl leh amaute in ippipuan silhin vut kibuakin sawt veipi-in kisik zo ding uh hi.
Ahi hangin thukhenna ah no thuak ding sangin Tyre le Sidon khuate thuakna a zangzaw ding hi.
Nang Capernaum aw, vanlai dongin hong kilamto ding ahi hiam? Hi peuhmah lo ding hi; a thuk penna munb dongin na kiasuk ding hi.
"No thu hong ngaite, kei thu ngai ahi hi; no hong nolhte, kei hong nolh ahi hi; ahi hangin kei hong nolhte, kei hong sawlpa nolh ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Sawmsagih le nihte lungnuamin ciah kik uh a, “Topa aw, nang min hangin dawite nangawn ka thuthu un om tazen hi,” a ci uh hi.
Amah in, “Vantung panin khuaphelep bangin Satan hong kumsuk ka mu zo hi.
Gulte le aikamte na tuatcil theih nading uh le galpa vang khempeuh na zawh theih nadingun thuneihna kong pia zo hi. Note bangmah in hong siasak zo lo ding hi.
Ahi zongin khate in na thu uh a manna hangin lungnuam kei unla vantungah na min uh a kigelhna hangin na lungnuam zaw un,” ci-in a dawng hi.

Tua hun laitakin Khasiangtho tungtawnin Jesu lungnuam mahmah a, “Vantung le leitung’ Topa, ka Pa aw, hih thute mipilte le theihna sangte tungah na im-a, naupangte tungah pholak na hi manin nangmah kong phat hi. Hi mah hi, Pa aw, hih in nangma deihna ahi hi.
"Ka Pa in na khempeuh kei hong ap zo hi. Tapa kua hiam, cih Pa longal kumah in thei lo-a, Pa kua hiam, cih Tapa le Tapa in a theihsak dinga a teelte longal kuamah in a thei kei uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin a nungzuite lamah amah kihei a, “Tu-a na muhte uh a mu mitte thupha ngah ahi hi.
Ahang in, kamsangte le kumpi tampitakin na muhte uh a muh nop uh hangin mu kha lo uh a, na zakte uh a zak nop uh hangin a za kha kei uh hi, cih kong gen hi” ci-in a tuam genpih hi.
Khat vei Jesu zia-et dingin thukham siam khat dingto a, “Sia aw, nuntak tawntungna ka luah theih nadingin ka hih pelmawh ding bang ahi hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
Jesu in, “Thukham ah bang kigelh ahi hiam? Nang bang na ci ngaihsut hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.

Tuapa in, “‘Na Topa Pasian na lungtang khempeuh, na hinna khempeuh, na thahatna khempeuh le na lungsim khempeuh tawh na it in,’c cih le ‘Nang le nang na ki-it bangin na vengte it in,’d ci-in kigelh hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Jesu in, “Mantakin nong dawng hi. Tua bangin zui lecin na nungta ding hi,” a ci hi.
Ahi hangin tuapa amah le amah kidiktangsak nuam ahi manin Jesu kiangah, “Tua ahileh ka vengte kua ahi hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
Tua dawnna-in Jesu in, “Mikhat, Jerusalem pan Jericho lam manawha a paisuk laitakin misuamte a tuak hi. Tuate in a puan hawkkhiatsak uh a, sat gawpin a sisa phialin nusia-in a paisan uh hi.
Tua lampi mah tawnin siampi khat paisuk a, tuapa a muh ciangin a pamlamah pelin a paisan hi.
Tua mah bangin Levi-te khat va pai-a tua mun a tun ciangin tuapa mu-a, a langkhatah pelin a paisan hi.
Ahi hangin Samaria mi khualzin khat tua mun ah tunga tuapa a muh ciangin a hehpih hi.
Amah tua mipa omna-ah pai-a, a liammate sathau le lenggahzu nuhin a tuamsak hi. Tua ciangin tuapa ama laa tungah tuangsaka, zintun innah paipihin a khoi hi.
A zing ciangin nguntange nih lakhia a zin-inn ngakpa a pia hi. Amah in, ‘Amah na khoi in; nang aa na zatbeh a om leh kong kileh kik ciangin kong din ding hi,’ ci hi.
"Hih mi thumte lakah misuamte khut thuakpa adingin kua pen a vengte hi, ci-in na ngaihsun hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
Thukham siampa in; “Amah a lainatpa pen ahi hi,” ci-in a dawng hi. Jesu in, “Pai inla tua mah bangin na hih in,” a ci hi.
Jesu le a nungzuite a pai laitakun khua khatah amah lut-a, Martha min nei numei khat in amah a inn a na hon hi.
Amah in Mary kici sanggam numei khat a nei hi. Tuanu a thugente ngai-in Topa khephungah a tu hi.

Ahi hangin Martha pen a innsung nasep teng semin a buai mahmah hi. Amah Jesu kiangah pai-a, “Topa aw, ka sanggamnu in nasep khempeuh kei guak hong khiat phamawh sa lo na hi hiam? Kei hong huh dingin sawl dih in!” a ci hi.
Topa in, “Martha, Martha aw, na tampi lunghimawhin na lunggim hi.
Ahi hangin a kisam na khat bek a om hi.f Mary in a hoihzaw pen tel khin zo a, tua pen ama tung pan a kilakhia nawn kei ding hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Ni khat Jesu in mun khatah thu a ngen hi. A thunget a man khit ciangin a nungzuite khat in ama kiangah, “Topa aw, John in ama nungzuite thungetzia ding a hilh bangin kote zong hong hilh in,” a ci hi.
Amah in amaute kiangah, “Thu na nget uh ciangin, “‘Paa aw, nangma min kisiangthosak ta hen, na gam hong tung ta hen.b
Ka nisim an uh nisialin hong pia in.
Ko tunga hong mawh peuhpeuh maisak ka hi manun, kote mawhnate hong maisak in,c Zia-etna sungah hong pi kei in,’d na ci un,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah in amaute kiangah, “Note lakah khat in lawm khat nei-a, tuapa zankim laitakin a lawmpa kiangah pai-in, ‘Lawm aw, anlum thum hong leitawisak dih in.
Khualzin ka lawmpa khat kei kiang hong tunga amah ka lui ding bangmah ka nei kei hi,’ ci hi.
"Tua ciangin inn sunga om pa in, ‘Hong buaisak kei in. Kong ka kalh zo-a ka tate ka luppih zo hi. Thoin bangmah kong pia thei kei ding hi,’ ci hi.
Ken kong geninah amah tho-in a lawmpa ahi mana a piak loh hangin, a lawmpa kuhkalnae hangin amah tho in a kisap zahzah a pia ding hi.
"Tua ahi ciangin note kianga kong cihinah: Ngen un, hong kipia ding hi; zong un, na mu ding uh hi; kiu un, kong hong kihon ding hi.
Ahang in, a ngen peuhpeuh in a ngah uh hi; a zongte in a mu uh hi; a kiute ading kong kihon ding hi.
"Na tapa un ngasaf hong ngen leh tua tangin gul a pia ding note lakah pa kua om na hi uh hiam?
Ahikeh aktui hong ngen leh aikam a pia ding kua om na hi uh hiam?
Note mi gilo hi napi, tua ci-in na tate uh na hoih mawkpiak ding thei na hi uh leh, vantunga om na Pa un ama kianga Khasiangtho a ngente pia nuam zawsem lo ding ahi hiam!” a ci hi.
Jesu in a pau thei lo dawi khat a hawlkhia hi. Tua dawi a paikhiat ciangin a pau thei lo pa pau thei a, mihonpite in lamdang a sa mahmah uh hi.
Ahi hangin amaute pawlkhat in, “Amah in dawite kumpitapa Beelzebubg suangin dawite a hawlkhia hi,” ci uh hi.
A dangte in amah a zia-et na-un van panin lim khat a ngen uh hi.
Jesu in amaute ngaihsutna thei-a amaute kiangah, “Amah le amah kilangpang gam kisia dinga, amah le amah kilangpanga kikhen innkuan puk ding hi.
Satan, amah le amah kilangpang leh ama gam bangci kip thei ding ahi hiam? Hih kong genna pen Beelzebub suangin dawite hawlkhia nong cih man uh ahi hi.
Tu-in ken Beelzebub suangin dawite hawlkhia ka hileh, na nungzuite un kua suangin dawite hawlkhia uh ahi hiam? Tua ahi ciangin amaute, no tungah thukhente a suak uh hi.
Ahi hangin Pasian khutme tawh dawite ka hawlkhiat leh Pasian gam note tungah hong tung zo hi.
"Mi thahat khat in ama inn, hiam tawh a cin ciangin a neihsate a bit hi.
Ahi hangin amah sanga hatzaw khatin amah busima, a thazawh khit ciangin ama muan a hiamte sutin a nate a hawmthang hi.
"Kei hong koppih lote ka langa pang hi-a kei hong kaihkhoppih lote a thehthang ahi hi.
"Mi khat sung panin kha giloh khat a paikhiat khit ciangin a khawl nading zongin a keuna munte ah a vak kawikawi hangin a mu kei hi. Tua ciangin amah in, ‘Ka nusiatsa inn ah ciah kik ning,’ ci hi.
A tun kik ciangin tua inn kiphiat siangin kipuah sinsena om a mu hi.
Tua ciangin amah pai-a, amah sanga tatsiazaw kha sagih zawnin tua lai-ah lutin va teng uh hi. Tua mipa nuntakzia a nunung in, a masa sangin a siazaw hi,” a ci hi.
Jesu in hih thute a gen laitakin mihonpite lak pan numei khat in, “Nang ta-a hong nei hong don nu, thupha ngah ahi hi,” a gal cih hi.
Amah in, “Pasian thu za-a a mangte, thupha ngah hizaw hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Mihonte a tam semsem ciangin Jesu in, “Hihte, a tatsia khangmite ahi hi. Amaute in lim lamdang hong nget uh hangin Jonah lim longal lim khat beek a kilak kei ding hi.
Ahang in, Nineveh-te adingin Jonah, lim a suah bangin Mihing Tapa zong hih khang mite adingin lim hi ding hi.

Solomon pilna ngai dingin leitaw lam Kumpinu lei mong panin va pai to ahi manin amah in thukhen ni ciangin hih khang mite tawh dingin amaute a mawhpaih ding hi.Tu-in hih lai-ah Solomon sanga lianzaw khati a om hi.

Thukhen ni ciangin Nineveh khua mite, hih khang mite tawh ding khawmin amaute a mawhpaih ding uh hi. Ahang in, Jonah thuhilhna hangin amaute kisik uh hi. Tu-in hih lai-ah Jonah sanga lianzaw khat a om hi.
"Kuamah in, meivak vakin a kimuh loh nading mun ahikeh kuangkum nuai-ah a koih kei hi. Tua sangsikin inn sunga a lut khempeuh in meivak tang a muh theih nadingin meivak tunna tungah kikoihzaw hi.
Na pumpi adingin na mittang meivak ahi hi. Na mittang a hoih laiteng na pumpi khempeuh khuavak tawh a kidim hi. Ahi hangin na mitte a mial ciangin na pumpi zong khuamial tawh a kidim hi.
Tua ahi ciangin note sunga om khuavak, khuamial ahi loh nadingin limtakin ngaihsun un.
Tua ahi manin na pumpi khempeuh uh khuavak tawh kidima, a mialna themkha zong a om kei leh khuavak in note hong tan mah bang in na pumpi uh a tang khin kiuhkeuh ding hi,” a ci hi.
Jesu a thu gen a man ciangin Pharisee-te khat in amah an nekpih dingin a sam hi. Tua ciangin amah pai-in sabuai ah a kingam hi.
Ahi hangin an a nek ma-in Jesu a kisil loh lam tua Pharisee-pa in a theih ciangin lamdang a sa hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in ama kiangah, “Ahileh no Pharisee-te in hai le kuangte a pualam na silsiang uh hangin na sunglam uh huaihamna le tatsiatna tawh a kidim hi.
No mihai honte! A pualam a bawlpa in a sunglam zong bawl hi lo ahi hiam?
Ahi hangin kuangj sunglam-a omte mizawngte na pia un. Tua hileh note adingin na khempeuh a siang ding hi.

"No Pharisee-te aw, note in mint, rue le huan antehhing nam khempeuh sawmah khat na piak uh hangin Pasian’ itna le thutang thudon lo na hi manun gimna na thuak ding uh hi. Hihte gel a masa pen hih lo tuan loin a nunung pen na hih ding uh ahi hi.
"No Pharisee-te aw, synagogue-te sunga tutna thupipente ah tu nuam diakin, van zuakna munte ah pibawl ding ut diak na hi manun gimna na thuak ding uh hi.
"Mite in thei kha loin, atung a tot uh ciamtehna om lo hante tawh kibang na hi manun note in gimna na thuak ding uh hi” a ci hi.
Thukham siamte khatin, “Sia aw, hih thute na gen ciangin kote zong hong selpho na hi hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.

Jesu in, “No thukham siamte aw, mite tungah a puak zawh loh ding uh vante na suan uh a tua ciangin amaute na huh nading un na khutme nangawn uh khat beek tangsak lo na hi manun gimna na thuak ding uh hi.
"Note in na pu na pate uh thah kamsangte han bawl na hi manun gimna na thuak ding uh hi.
Tua ahi ciangin na pu na pa-te uh hihnate na thukimpihna uh teci a pang na suak uh hi. Amaute in kamsangte that uh a, amaute hante note in na bawl uh hi.
Hih thu hangin Pasian in ama pilna tawh, ‘Amaute kiangah kamsangte le sawltakpite ka paisak dinga, amaute in tuate pawlkhat thatin, pawlkhat a bawlsia ding uh hi,’ ci hi.
Tua ahi manin leitung piancila kipan kamsangte khempeuh sisan ahi zongin,

Abel sisan a kipan biakna-tau le mun-siangtho kikala kithat Zechariah sisan dong, a luangkhia khempeuh hih khang mite mawhna in kisim ding hi. Hi mah hi, ken kong geninah hihte khempeuh hih khang mite mawhna in a kisim ding hi.
"No thukham siamte aw, theihna tawhtang lakhia na hi manun gimna na thuak ding uh hi. No mahmah lah lut loin lut dinga kisate lah na dal uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua lai panin Jesu a paikhiat ciangin Pharisee-te le thukham siate in amah nasiataka langpan ding sawmin ngak uh a,
ama kamin amah a mat theih nadingun thu a dong huan uh hi.
Tua hun laitak, khat le khat kisikkha zah dongin mi tul tampi a kihonkhop uh ciangin Jesu in a masa penin a nungzuite kiangah, “Kineihsiamna ahi Pharisee-te silngo lakah na kikem un.
A kipholak lo ding, a kiselcip bangmah om lo a; a kitheikhawk lo ding a ki-imcip bangmah a om kei hi.
Khuamial sunga na gente uh sun nitang sungah kiza dinga, inn sungtawnga na huausimte uh innkhum dawnah kitangko ding hi.
"Ken kong geninah lawmte aw, pumpi a thah khit ciangin aban bangmah a cih thei nawn lote na kihta kei un.
Ahi hangin na kihtak ding uh kua hiam cih kong lak ding hi: Pumpi a thah khit ciangin hell khuk sunga hong paii thei dinga vangliatna a neipa na kihta un. Hi hi, ken kong geninah amah na kihta un.
Kawlgit nga ciangin pennya nih in kizuak hi lo ahi hiam? Tua hi napi Pasian in kawlgit khat zong a mangngilh kei hi.
Na samzangte khempeuh uh kisim khin takpi hi. Lau kei un; kawlgit tampi sangin note na manphazaw uh hi.
"Ken kong geninah, mite mai-a kei hong sang peuhpeuh Mihing Tapa in Pasian vansawltakte mai-ah a sang ding hi.
Ahi hangin mite mai-ah kei hong kitheihmawhbawlte Pasian vansawltakte mai-ah ka kitheihmawh bawl ding hi.
Tua ahi ciangin Mihing Tapa a langgente peuhmah kimaisak dinga, ahi hangin Khasiangtho a gendai peuhpeuh a kimaisak kei ding hi.
"Synagogue-te mai ahi zongin gam-ukte le thuneite mai-ah ahi zongin note hong kipaipih ciangin bang kici hutin, bang gen ding cih lunghimawh kei un.
Tua hun ciangin na gen ding uh Khasiangtho in hong hilh na ding hi,” ci-in a gen hi.
Mihonpite lakah khat in, “Sia aw, ka sanggampa tawh ka gamh luah dingte ka hawm nadingun ama tungah hong gensak in,” a ci hi.
Jesu in, “Mihingpa, nogel kikal-a thukhen ding ahikeh lemgen dingin kua in kei za hong pia hiam?” ci-in a dawng hi.
Tua ciangin amah in amaute kiangah, “Kigalging un! Huaihamna nam khempeuh panin na kikem un; mihing nuntakna pen neih le lama bucinna tawh a kim kei hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah in amaute kiangah gentehna gen a, “Mi hau khat lo ah an tampi a piang hi.
Tuapa in, ‘Bang ci ding ka hi hiam? Ka ante ka khol nading mun ka nei kei hi,’ ci-in a ngaihsun hi.
"Tua ciangin amah in, ‘Hih ka hih ding hi. Ka salte phelkhia-in a lianzaw ka lam dinga, tua lai-ah ka ante khempeuh le ka vante ka koih ding hi.
Tua ciangin, ‘Kum tampi man ding na hoih tampi ka koih khin zo hi. Nuntakna nopzatin, nene-in dawndawnin gualnuam in, ka kici ding hi,’ ci hi.
"Ahi hangin Pasian in ama kiangah, ‘Nang mihaipa! Tu zan mahmah in na nuntakna nang tung pan hong kilaksak ding hi. Tua hileh nang adinga na koihkholhte kua in tang ding ahi hiam?’ ci hi.
"Pasian lamah hau lo a, ama adinga na a kholte peuhmah tua bang hi ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua caingin Jesu in a nungzuite kiangah, ‘Tua ahi ciangin ken kong geninah na nuntak nading, na nek ding ahi zongin, na silh na ten ding ahi zongin na pumpi uh ading bangmah lunghimawh kei un.
An sangin nuntakna thupizaw a, puan sangin pumpi thupizaw hi.

Va-akte na ngaihsun dih un: Tuate in vawh lah vawh lo, at lah at lo, gawdam ahi zongin sal ah ahi zongin a khol kei uh hi. Tua hi napi Pasian in tuate a vak hi. Vasate sangin note na manpha zawtham pek uh hi!
A lunghimawh manin a nuntak hun nai khat bek nangawn a sottob thei note lakah kua om ahi hiam?
Hih bang thu neucik khat nangawn na hih theih loh khit nungsangun adangte bang lunghimawhna na hi uh hiam?
"Unokte khanzia na ngaihsun un. Na sem loin khau lah a khek kei uh hi. Tua hi napi Solomon nangawn a thupina khempeuh tawh a kizep laitakin, hihte zahin zong a kizem zo kei hi.
Upna neu mite aw, tuni-in hih lai-ah om a, zing ciangin mei-a kikhul ding lopa kung khat, Pasian in tua zahin zem ahileh amah in note puan hong guan zaw tham ding hi!
Tua ahi ciangin na nek na dawn ding uh ngaihsut penin nei kei un; tuate na lunghimawh kei un.
Hih nate khempeuh leitung lawkite in zon penin a nei uh hi. Hih nate na kisap lam uh na Pa un a thei hi.
Ahi zongin Pasian gam na zong un, tua hileh hih nate khempeuh hong piathuah ding hi.
"Tuu hon tawmkhate aw, na Pa un note gam hong piak ding lungkim khin ahi manin na lau kei un.
Na neihsate uh zuak unla mizawngte na pia un. A patvang thei lo sumbawm no le no na kiguan unla, a bei thei lo, gutate in a naih theih loh le nget nek theih lohna mun vantungah na gou uh khol un.
Ahang in, na gou omna munah na lungsim zong om ding hi.
"Na sem dinga kisa kholsa in om unla, meivak kuangsa-in om un;
mopi powi sima hong ciah kik, kong a kiuh pheta a honpah thei dinga a pu uh a ngakte bangin om un.
A pu uh a pai ciangin tua banga a ngak laitak a tuah nasemte hampha ding uh hi. Thutak kong geninah, an vak dingin amah kithawi-a, a nasemte sabuai ah kingamsakin amaute ankuang a lui ding hi.
Zan, vil nihna ahi zongin, vil thumna ahi zongin a pu a pai cianga, a pu in kigingsa-a om a tuah nasemte a hampha ding uh hi.
Ahi hangin note in hih thu na theitel un: Inn neipa in zanlai bang hunin gutate pai ding hiam cih theikhol leh a inn kiluhsak lo ding hi.
Na muanmawh loh hun laitakun Mihing Tapa hong pai ding ahi manin note zong pel loin kigingsa in om un,” a ci hi.
Peter in, “Topa aw, hih gentehna ko tung beka gen na hi hiam, ahikeh mikim tunga gen na hi hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
Topa in, “Tua ahileh ama inn sunga nasem dangte ukin, amaute a hunhuna an a pia dinga a pu in a koih, a muanhuai a pil sungtapipa kua ahi hiam?
A pu a ciah kik cianga tua banga a sep laitak a tuah nasempa hampha ding hi.
Thutak kong geninah, a pu in tuapa a neihsa khempeuh a uksak ding hi.
Ahi hangin tua nasempa in, ‘Ka pu sawtveipi hong tam na inteh,’ ci-in nasem-numei le nasem-pasalte satgawp henla, an ne in zu dawnin zu na kham leh,
a lamet loh ni le a khuadon loh hun laitakin a pu tung dinga, tua nasempa a pu in atnenin thu um lote tawh mun khatah a koihkhawm ding hi.
"A pu deihna thei napi-in, a pu deihna banga gamta lo-a, kigingkhol lo tua nasempa tam veipi a kisat ding hi.

Ahi hangin bangmah thei lo-a gawtna thuak nadinga kilawm nate a hihpa ahileh tawm vei kisat ding hi. Tampi a kipiate tung panin tampi kingen kik ding hi; tampi a ki-apte tung panin a tamzaw lai kingen kik ding hi.
"Leitungah mei puak dinga hong pai ka hi hi. Tua mei a kuang khin hileh ut sing!
Ahi hangin ka thuak ding baptisena khat oma, tua a kizawh siang mateng ka lungdong mahmah hi!
Leitung ah kilemna puak dingin hong pai hi, ci-in hong ngaihsun kha uh hiam? Hi lo hi, ken kong geninah kikhenna khah dinga hong pai ka hi hi.
Tu-a kipanin innkuan khat mi nga a phate, thum lang ah nih, nih langah thumin khat le khat kilangpang ciat ding uh hi.
A tapa langah a pa, a pa langah a tapa, a tanu langah a nu, a nu langah a tanu, monu langah teknu, teknu langah monu kilangpan ciatin amaute a kikhen ding uh hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Amah in mihonpite kiangah, “Nitumna-lam panin meii hong kai na muh uh ciangin, ‘Guah zu ding hi,’ na ci thei pah uh a, guah lah a zu takpi hi.
Leitaw-lam pana huih a nun ciangin, ‘Khua lum ding hi,’ na ci uh a, a lum takpi hi.
Kineihsiamte! Van le lei maitangte pianzia na khia thei uh hi. Bangci bangin tu lai hun khia thei lo na hi uh hiam?
"Bang hangin note in amaan le amaan lo khen thei lo na hi uh hiam?

Thukhenpa kiangah na langpa tawh na paikhawm laitak mah un lampi-ah na kilemkik zawh nading nakpi in hanciam in. Tua hi kei leh amah in thukhenpa kiangah nang hong kai dinga, thukhenpa in bupa tungah hong apin, tua bupa in nang thong sung hong denna ding hi.
Ken kong geninah, na liausum na piak khit siang matengin na suakta kei ding hi”c.
Tua laitakin tua lai-a om mi pawlkhat in, Pilate in Galilee-te sisan le a biakpiakna uh a helsakna Jesu kiangah a ko uh hi.
Jesu in, “Tua Galilee mite in hih banga a thuak manun a Galilee mipih dangte khempeuh sangin a mawhzaw hi dingin na ngaihsun uh hiam?
Ken kong geninah, a mawhzaw tuan kei uh hi! Ahi hangin note na kisik kei uh leh note zong na vekun na mangthang khin ding uh hi.
Ahikeh Siloam a tausang in a denlup mi sawm le giatte, Jerusalem a tengte khempeuh sangin a mawhzaw hi dingin na ngaihsun uh hiam?
Kong hilh tektek hi, a mawhzaw tuan kei uh hi! Ahi hangin note na kisik kei uh leh note zong na vekun na mangthang khin ding uh hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Tua ciangin amah in, hih gentehna gen a: “Mi khat in a lenggui lo sunga kisuan theikung khat a nei hi. Amah a gah en dingin a pai hangin a gah khat beek a mu kei hi.

Tua ciangin amah in a lenggui lo cingpa kiangah, ‘Kum thum sung tawntung thei a gah hiam, cih en dingin kong paipai hangin a gah khat beek ka mu kei hi. Phuk tan in! Lei hoih pengsak lel hi lo hiam?’ ci hi.
"Tuapa in, ‘Pu aw, kum khat khawi lai dih in, a kimkot toin leihoih na sung phot dih ning.
Ni kum ciang a gah le pha! A gah kei leh tua ciangin phuk in,’ ci-in dawng hi,” a ci hi.
Sabbath ni khat Jesu in synagogue-te khatah thu a hilh hi.
Tua lai-ah kha khat in, kum sawm-le-giat sungtak a poisak numei khat a om hi. Tuanu a nung kulin a dingtang thei peuhmah kei hi.
Jesu in amah a muh ciangin a mai lamah samkhia a, “Numei aw, na zawnkhalna panin hong kikhahkhia hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah in tuanu tungah a khutte nga-a, tua khit phetin tuanu dingtang thei-a Pasian a phat hi.

Sabbath ni-in Jesu in cina damsak ahi manin synagogue ukpa lungkim lo a mipite kiangah, “Nasep hun ding ni guktak a om hi. Tua ahi ciangin a kidamsak dingin tua nite in hong pai unla, Sabbath ni-in hong pai kei zaw un,” a ci hi.
Topa in tuapa kiangah, “No kineihsiamte, Sabbath ni-in na bawngte na laate uh a buk pan sutin nomau ciat in tui pia dingin paipih hi lo na hi uh hiam?
Tua ahileh kum sawm le giat sungtak Satan in a hencip hih Abraham tanu a kihencipna pan Sabbath ni-in khahkhiat huaizaw lo ding ahi hiam?” ci-in a dawng hi.
Amah in hih thu a gen ciangin amah a langpangte khempeuh zahlak uh a, ahi hangin mipite ahileh ama hih nalamdangte hangin a kipak uh hi.
Tua ciangin Jesu in, “Pasian gam bang tawh kibang ahi hiam? Bang tawh ka teh ding hiam?
Mi khat in huan sunga a cin ankam tang tawh kibang hi. Tua ankam khangto a, kungpi suakin a hiangte tungah huihlak vasate a tuang uh hi,” a ci hi.
Amah in, “Pasian gam bang tawh ka teh ding hiam?
Numei khat in a ki mekman buhnel lompia khat a khangsak zo-a, a sawh silngo tawh kibang hi,” a ci lai hi.
Tua ciangin Jerusalem lam manawhin a pai kawmin khuapi khuaneute ah lutin thu a hilh hi.
Mi khat in ama kiangah, “Topa, mi tawmkha bekin hotkhiatna ngah ding uh ahi hiam?” ci-in a dong hi. Amah in amaute kiangah,
"Kong kawcik-a lut ding na hahkat un. Bang hang hiam cihleh, mi tampi in lut ding a hanciam ding uh a, ahi hangin a lut thei kei ding uh hi, cih kong gen hi.

Inn neipa khatvei thoin kong a khak khit nak leh note a pualamah dingin, ‘Topa aw, kote kong hong hon in,’ ci-in kongkhak kiu-in na ngen ding uh hi. “Ahi hangin amah in, ‘Note kong thei kei hi; koi pan hong pai cih zong kong thei kei hi,’ ci-in dawng ding hi.
"Tua ciangin note in, ‘Nang tawh i nekhawm i dawnkhawm a, ka kongzingte uah zong thu na hilh hi,’ na ci ding uh hi.
"Ahi hangin amah in, ‘Note kong thei kei hi; koi pan hong pai cih zong kong thei kei hi, no a tatkhelte aw paimang un!’ ci-in hong dawng ding hi.
"Abraham, Isaac, Jacob le kamsangte khempeuh, Pasian gam sungah om a, note pualamah hong kihawlkhia cih na muh uh ciangin tua lai-ah kahna le hagawina a om ding hi.
Nisuahna, nitumna, leilu, leitaw panin mite hong pai ding uh a, Pasian gam sunga pawipi-ah amau mun ciatah a tu ding uh hi.
A nunungte masa a, a masate nunung cih a om takpi hi,” ci-in a gen hi.
Tua hun laitakin Jesu kiangah Pharisee-te pawlkhat va pai uh a ama kiangah, “Hih lai nusia in mundang khatpeuh ah pai in. Herod in nang hong that nuam hi,” a ci uh hi.
Amah in, “Pai-in tua ngia kiangah, ‘Tuni le zingciang dawite hawlkhia-in mite ka damsak dinga, a ni thumna ni-in ka tupna ka tung ding hi, ci hi,’ ci-in va gen un.
Bangbang ahi zongin tuni, zingciang le thaiciang ka vakvak lai ding hi - ahang in, Jerusalem pualamah kamsang kuamah a si thei peuhmah kei ding hi!
"Jerusalem aw, Jerusalem, kamsangte that-a, nang kianga hong kisawlte suangin a deng nang, akpi in a note a kha nuai-ah a khop bangin na tate ka khop nop hangin nang na ut kei hi!
En in, na inn a hawmmangsa in kinusia ding hi. Ken kong geninah, ‘Topa minb hong paipa in thupha a ngah hi,’a na cih matengin nong mu kik nawn kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Sabbath ni khat, a kipi-et mahmah Pharisee khat innah Jesu an ne dingin a pai ciangin amah limtakin a encik uh hi.
Tua lai-ah, ama mai-ah tuipuak natna a vei mi khat a om hi.
Jesu in Pharisee-te le thukham siamte kiangah, “Sabbath ni-a cina damsak ding thukham tawh kituak hiam, kituak lo hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
Ahi hangin amaute a dai khipkhep uh hi. Tua ciangin amah in, tua mipa lenin damsaka, a ciahsak hi.
Tua khit ciangin Jesu in amaute kiangah, “Note lakah khatpeuh in a tapaa ahikeh a bawngtal khat, Sabbath ni-in tuikhuk sungah kia leh a kaikhiapah lo ding kua om ahi hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
Amaute in gen ding a nei kei uh hi.
Lenglate in sabuai-a tutna thupite a tel uh amah in a theih ciangin amaute kiangah gentehna gena:
"Mi khatpeuh in mopi pawi-a hong sap ciangin no sanga lianzawte na kisam kha thei ding ahi manin, tutna thupite ah na tu kei un.
Tua hileh note gel hong samkhawm inntekpa hong pai-in na kiangah, ‘Na tutna tuapa na awn in,’ hong ci ding hi. Tua ciangin nang zahlakin a thupi lo penna munah na tut kul kha ding hi.

Ahi hangin nang hong kisap ciangin aniam penna munah na tut leh, inntekpa hong pai-in nang kiangah, ‘Lawm aw, a hoihzaw mun tutna ah na tuto in,’ hong ci ding hi. Tua ciangin na lenglapihte khempeuh lakah na angtang ding hi.
Ahang in, amah le amah a kitawisangte kiniamsak dinga, amah le amah a kiniamsakte kitawisang ding hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Jesu in a inntekpa kiangah, “Sun-an ahi zongin nitak-an ahi zongin na vak ciangin, na lawmte ahi zongin na sanggamte ahi zongin na tanaute ahi zongin sum hau na vengte ahi zongin sam kei in. Tua banga na sap leh amaute in nang hong samin hong thuk kik ding uh hi.
Anvakna pawi na bawl ciangin mizawngte, mipoite, khebaite le mittawte na sam zaw in,
tua hileh thupha na ngah ding hi. Amaute in nang hong thuk zawh loh hangin thumaante thawhkik ciangin nang hong kithukkik ding hi,” a ci hi.
Amah tawh sabuai-a tukhawmte khat in hih thu a zak ciangin Jesu kiangah, “Pasian gam sunga pawi-a an ne dingte, thupha ngah ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Jesu in, “Mi khat in pawi lianpi khat bawlin mi tampi a kho hi.
Tua anvak pawi hun ciangin a khohsate kiangah, ‘Hong pai ta un, na khempeuh a baihsa-in om zo hi,’ ci-a gen dingin a nasemte a sawl hi.
"Ahi hangin a khohsate in a kibangin paulap a nei ciat uh hi. A masa pa in, ‘Lo khat a lei khin phet ka hi a, pai-in tua lo ka et kul hi. Nong hehpihna-in hong pengsak in,’ ci hi.
"Adang khat in, ‘Bawng kap nga a lei khin phet ka hi-a tuate sin dingin a pai kimlai ka hi hi. Nong hehpihna-in kei hong pengsak in,’ ci hi.
"Adang khat leuleu in, ‘Zi nei khin phet ka hi hi, tua ahi ciangin kong pai thei kei ding hi,’ ci hi.

"Nasempa ciah kika, a pu kiangah hih thute a zasak hi. Tua ciangin inn neipa heha, a nasempa kiangah, ‘Khuapi kongzingte le kongzingneute ah pai mengmeng inla, mizawngte, mipoite, mittawte le khebaite hong lutsak in,’ ci-in thu pia hi.
"Nasempa in ‘Pu aw, nong thupiak bangin kihih khin zo hi, ahi hangin mun awng lai hi,’ ci hi.
"Tua ciangin a pu in nasempa kiangah, ‘Lamliante le lamneute ah va pai inla, ka inn a dim nadingin amaute hong lutsak in.
Ken kong geninah, a kikhosate khat beek in ka anvak a ciam kha kei ding uh hi,’ ci hi,” a ci hi.
Mihon tampi tawh Jesu a paikhawm laitakin amaute lam nga in,
"Kei kianga hong pai mi khatpeuh in a nu, a pa, a zi a tate le a sanggampate, a sang gamnute tham lo ama nuntakna nangawn a muhdah kei leh amah, kei nungzui a hi thei kei ding hi.
Tua hi-a ama singlamteh pua-a ka nung hong zui lo peuhmah ka nungzui a hi thei kei ding hi.
"Gentehna-in note lakah tausang dawh nuam khat om leh a tua tausang a dawh zawh nading sum a kicing ding a nei hiam, cih thei dingin tu-in aman ding tuat masa lo ding ahi hiam?
Ahang in, amah in a bulpi pan khin napi, zosiang zo kei leh a mu khempeuh in nuihsan dinga,
‘Hih pa in tausang dawh kipan khin napi a zosiang kei hi,’ ci ding uh hi.
"Ahikeh gentehna in kumpipa khat in kumpi dang khat sim dingin kithawi leh mi tul sawmnih tawh a kuanpa, mi tul sawm tawh a nang zo ding hiam, cih tu photin, ngaihsun masa lo ding ahi hiam?
Amah a kingap kei leh, a galpa a gamlapi-a a om lai-in ama kiangah palai sawl dinga, kilem nadingin a thumsak ding hi.
Tua mah bangin note laka na khempeuh a nusia lo peuhmah ka nungzui a hi thei kei ding hi.
"Ci a lim hangin a alna mang leh bangci in ki-al kiksak thei ding hiam?
Leitak ading ahi zongin eklei dinga khol ding ahi zongin kimanna a nei kei hi; kibuakhia lel hi. “Zak nading bil nei peuh in za ta hen,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin ama thu gen ngai dingin siahdongte le “mawhneite” ama kimah a kikhawm uh hi.
Ahi hangin Pharisee-te le thukham siate in, “Hih mipa in mawhneite ngai-in amaute tawh an a nekhawm hi,” ci-in a phunsan uh hi.
Tua ciangin Jesu in amaute kiangah gentehna gen a,
"Note lakah khat in tuu zakhat nei a, tuate lakah khat mansuah leh sawmkua le kua-te pawn lakah nusia in a tuu mang a muh mateng zong lo ding ahi hiam?
A muh ciangin lungnuamtakin a liangko tungah pua-in,
innah a ciah hi. Tua ciangin amah in a lawmte le a vengte samkhawm a, ‘Kei hong nuampih un; ka tuu mang ka mu zo hi,’ ci hi.
Tua mah bangin kisik a kul lo a thumaan mi sawm kua le kua-te sangin mawh nei khat a kisik na hangin vantung ah nuamna a lianzaw ding hi, cih kong hilh hi.
"Ahikeh gentehna-in numei khat in nguntanga sawm nei in khat mansuah leh tuanu in mei vaka a inn phiatin a muh mateng limtakin zong lo ding ahi hiam?
A muh ciangin a lawmte le a vengte samkhawm in, ‘Kei hong nuampih un; ka sum mang ka mu zo hi,’ ci hi.
Tua mah bangin ken kong geninah, mawhnei mi khat a kisikna hangin Pasian vansawltakte omna ah nuamna a om hi,” a ci hi.
Jesu in a thugen zomlai a, “Tapa nih a nei mi khat a om hi.
A nauzawpa in a pa kiangah, ‘Pa aw, i goute sung pan kei tanh ding hong khenkhia in,’ ci hi. Tua ciangin amah in a neihsate amau gel a hawmsak hi.
"Tua khit a sawt loin a nauzawpa in a neih khempeuh kaikhawmin, gamlapi ah pai-a noptatna-in a sum neih teng a zangbei hi.
A neih khempeuh a zat bei khit ciangin tua gambup ah kialpi tunga, amah a kitasam hi.
Tua ciangin amah tua gam mite khat kiangah sum thalawh dingin pai-a, tuapa in amah a lo ah vok-an pia dingin a sawl hi.
Amah in vokte nek begapte duhgawh mahmah a, ahi hangin kuamah in bangmah a pia kei hi.
"Amah le amah a kiphawkkhiat ciangin, ‘Ka pa inn a sum thalawhte tampi in an khamval nei ding uh a, kei lah hih lai-ah ka puksi dektak hi!
Kei dingkhia ning ka pa kiangah ciah kikin: Pa aw, vantung le nangma tungah ka mawh zo hi.
Nang ta cih dingin ka kilawm nawn kei hi; na sum thalawhte khat bangin hong koih in ka ci ding hi,’ ci hi.
Tua ahi ciangin amah tho-a, a pa kiangah a ciah hi. “Ahi hangin inn pan gamlapi-a a om laitakin a pa in na galmuh-a, amah khuatuah mahmah ahi manin, a tapa delha pumkawi-in a nam hi.
"A tapa in ama kiangah, ‘Pa aw vantung le nangma tungah ka mawh zo hi. Nang ta cih dingin ka kilawm nawn kei hi,’b ci hi.
"Ahi hangin a pa in a nasemte kiangah, ‘Manlang un! Puan a hoih pen hong la unla amah silhsak un. A khutme ah zungbuh bunsak unla khedap zong bulhsak un.
Bawngno vakthau pen hong paipih unla go un. Pawipi bawlin lawm ni.
Ahang in, hih a si khinsa ka tapa tu-in hing kik zo hi; a mangsa hi-a tu-in kimu kik hi,’ ci hi. Tua ahi ciangin amaute in a lawm uh hi.
"Tua hun laitakin a tapa uzaw pen lo-ah a om hi. Inn kiang a tun ciangin tumging le lamna a za hi.
Tua ahi ciangin amah in nasemte khat sama, ‘Bang kihih ahi hiam?’ ci-in dong hi.
Amah in, ‘Na sanggampa hong ciah ta a, cidam ludamtakin na pa kiang hong tung kik ahi manin na pa in amah bawngno vakthau pen gawh hi,’ ci hi.
"A u pa heh a inn sungah a lut nuam kei hi. Tua ahi ciangin a pa pusuakin amah va zol hi.

Ahi hangin amah in a pa kiangah, ‘Ngaihsun in! Kum hi tan vei nang adingin sila-na ka sema, nong thupiakte ka mang lo ngei peuhmah kei hi. Tua hi napi ka lawmte tawh ka lop nadingin keelno khat nangawn nong pia ngei kei hi.
Ahi hangin na neihsa teng numei kizuakte tawh a zatmang khit cianga inn hong zuan hih na tapa, bawngno vakthau pen na gawh tazen hi!’ ci hi.
"A pa in, ‘Ka ta aw, nang le kei i omkhawm dena, ka neih khempeuh nang aa ahi hi.
Ahi hangin na sanggampa a si khinsa tu-in hong hing kika, a mangsa tu-in kimu kik ahi manin nuamin i lop a kul hi,’ ci hi,” ci-in a gen hi.
Jesu in a nungzuite kiangah, “Khatvei mihau khat om a, sungtapipa in a pu neihsa teng a zat beisak hi, ci-in kingawh hi.
Tua ahi ciangin a pu in amah sama, ‘Nang thu ka zak bang thu ahi hiam? Ka sungtapipa hi thei nawn lo ding na hi manin na sum ciamtehna hong lak dih in,’ ci hi.
"Sungtapipa in a lungsim sungah, ‘Tu-in bang cih ding ka hi hiam? Ka pu in ka nasepna pan hong tawpsak ding hi. Lei to dingin lah ka hat nawn kei a, khut dawha nget ding lah ka maizum hi.
Hih lai-a ka nasep ka tan ciangin mite in a innuah kei hong san theih nadingun ka hih ding ka thei ta hi,’ ci hi.
"Tua ahi ciangin amah in a pu tunga leibate a banbanin a sam hi. Amah in a masa pen kiangah, ‘Ka pu tungah bangzah na ba hiam?’ ci-in dong hi.
"Amah in, ‘Olive thau gallona za giat hi,’ ci hi. “Sungtapipa in ama kiangah, ‘Na leiba lai va la inla, tu mengmeng in zali in bawl in,’ ci hi.

"Tua ciangin a nihna pa kiangah, ‘Nang bang zah ba na hi hiam?’ ci-in dong hi. “Amah in, ‘Mangbuh seub tul khat hi,’ci-in dawng hi. “Amah in ama kiangah, ‘Na leiba lai va la inla, zagiat-in bawl in,’ ci-in gen hi.
"A pu in a simtat nasempa geelsiam mahmah ahi manin a phat hi. Ahang in, khuavak sunga om mite sangin hih leitung mite in amaute kibatpihte tawh kizop zia ah a geelsiam zaw uh hi.
Ken kong geninah, leitung hauhnate lawm ngah nadingin na zang un; tua hileh a bei ciangin tawntung tenna ah note hong kimuak ding hi.
"Tawmcik tunga muanhuaite tampi tungah kimuang thei dinga, tawmcik tunga muanhuai lote tampi tungah zong a muanhuai kei ding hi.
Tua ahi ciangin note leitung hauhna kem dingin na muanhuai kei uh leh hauhna taktak kem dingin kua in hong muang ding ahi hiam?
Midang khatpeuh neihsa tungah na muanhuai kei uh leh no neihsa ding kua in hong pia ding ahi hiam?

"Kuamah in to nih na a sem khawm thei kei hi. Khat itin khat a mudah hiam, khat beelin a khat a simmawh hiam, khat zawsang hi ding hi. Pasian na le Sum na, na sem khawm thei kei ding uh hi,” ci-in a gen hi.
Sum iplah Pharisee-te in hih thu a zak uh ciangin Jesu a zahpih uh hi.
Amah in amaute kiangah, “Note, mite mitmuh ah dik na kitansak uh hangin Pasian in na lungtangte uh a thei hi. Mite in manpha a sak mahmah nate Pasian muhna-ah kihhuai hi.
"John hun masiah Thukham le Kamsangte a kitangko hi. Tua khita kipan, Pasian gam lungdamna thu kihilhin, tua sungah thahatthu-in mikim a lut gawp hi.
Thukham panin a mal themcik khat a mawk maiman sangin van le lei a mawk maiman ding a baihzaw ding hi.
"A zi ma a numei dang khat a tenpih peuhmah, angkawmpa suak a, a kimasa numei a tenpih peuhmah angkawmpa a suak hi.
"Khatvei sumhaupa khat a om hi; tuapa in puan dupsan le saihadial puan silh a, nisimin noptatin a om hi.
A kongpi gei-ah meima in a pumtuam Lazarus min nei khutdawh-a ngen khat kikoih hi.
Amah in sumhaupa sabuai pana kia an-nengte a lunggulh hi. Uite nangawn pai-in ama meimate a liahsak uh hi.
"Tua khutdawh-a ngenpa a sih ciangin vansawltakte in Abraham kiangah a puak uh hi. Sumhaupa zong si-a, a kivui hi.
Amah gentheipi-a a omna mun hellc khuk sung pan a khuadak leh agal pekpekah Abraham le a kianga om Lazarus a mu hi.
Tua ciangin amah sama, ‘Pa Abraham aw, kei hong hehpih in. Hih mei sungah gimna nakpi in ka thuak hi. Lazarus in a khutme dawn tui diahin ka leii hong votsak dingin hong sawl in,’ ci hi.

"Ahi hangin Abraham in, ‘Ka ta aw, na nuntak hun sungin na hoihte na ngah a, tua laitakin Lazarus in na hoih lote a ngah hi, cih phawk in. Ahi hangin tu-in amah hih lai-ah nuamsa a, nang na hileh gimna na thuak hi.
Tua banah eite kikalah guam thukpi khat om a, tua kantanin hih lai pan tua lai-a pai nuamte a pai thei kei uh hi; tua lai pan hih lai ko kianga hong pai nuamte a pai thei kei uh hi,’ ci hi.
"Amah in, ‘Tua ahileh pa aw, ka pa inn ah Lazarus nong sawlsak ding kong thum hi.
Ahang in, sanggam pasal nga ka nei hi. Tua ka sanggamte hih gentheihna mun hong tun loh nadingun amah in amaute va vauhilhsak hen,’ ci-in dawng hi.
"Abraham in, ‘Amaute in Moses le Kamsangte a nei uh hi; tuate thu na ngai uh hen,’ ci-in dawng kik hi.
"Tuapa in, ‘Hi lo hi, pa Abraham aw, a sisate kiang panin amau kiangah khatpeuh va pai leh amaute kisik ding uh hi,’ ci hi.
"Amah in ama kiangah, ‘Amaute in Moses le Kamsangte thu a ngaih nop kei uh leh a sisa khatpeuh a thawh kik hangin a taksang tuan kei ding uh hi,’ ci hi,” ci-in a gen hi.
Jesu in a nungzuite kiangah, “Mite mawhna a bawlsak ding thute hong tung pelmawh ding hi. Ahi hangin tua mawhnate a bawlsak mipa in nakpitakin gimna thuak ta hen.
Hih naupangnote mawhna a bawlsak tua mipa, a ngawgah angawina suang kikhihin tuipi sungah kipai leh ama adingin hoihzaw ding hi.
Tua ahi ciangin note kigalging un. “Na sanggampa in mawhna a bawl leh tai inla, a kisik leh ama mawhna maisak in.
Nang tungah ni khatin mawhna sagih vei hong bawla, nang kiangah sagih vei mah hong pai-in, ‘Ka kisik hi,’ hong cihleh maisak in,” ci-in a gen hi.
Sawltakpite in Topa kiangah, “Ka upna uh hong khangsak in,” a ci uh hi.
Amah in, “Note in ankam tang cia-a neu upna na neih uh leh hih nailung ankung kiangah, ‘Kizunglot inla, tuipi sungah va po in,’ ci le uh cin na thu uh hong mang ding hi.
"Gentehna-in, note lakah khat in lokai ahikeh tuucing nasem khat nei hi. Tua nasempa lo pan a ciah ciangin ama kiangah, ‘Tu-in hong pai inla an ne dingin tukhawm ni,’ a ci ding hiam?
‘Ka nitak-an kuang hong lui inla a kigingsa-in om in; an ka nek ka dawn laitakin hong tuan-vai in; ka kham khit ciangin nang na ne na dawn thei pan ding hi,’ ci zaw ding hi lo ahi hiam?
Amah in a nasempa tunga sep dinga a hilh bangin sem ahi manin ama tungah a lungdam ding hiam?
Tua ahi ciangin note in zong no tunga hong kigen khempeuh na hih khit uh ciangin, ‘Eite, a kizen lo na semte i hi hi; i sep ding zah bek a sem i hi hi,’ na cih ding uh ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Jerusalem lam manawh-a a pai laitakin Jesu in Samaria le Galilee kikal gamgi dung a zui hi.
Amah khuaneu khatah a lut laitakin phak natnaa a vei mi sawm in amah a na dawntuah uh hi. A gamlat simna munah ding uh a,
"Jesu aw, Topa aw, kote hong hehpih in!” ci-in nakpi in a galsap uh hi.
Amah in tuate a muh ciangin, “Pai unla, siampite kiangah va kilak un,” a ci hi. Tua banga a pai kimlai mah amaute a siang uh hi.
Amaute lakah khat in a damsiang lam a kitheih ciangin va pai kika, aw ngaihtakin Pasian a phat hi.
Amah Jesu khephung kidenna-in a lungdamna a gen hi – amah Samaria mi ahi hi.
Jesu in, “A kisiangsak sawm pha hi lo ahi hiam? Adang kuate koi-ah om uh ahi hiam?
Hih mi namdang pa longal hong kileh kika Pasian phat ding khat beek om lo ahi hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
Tua ciangin amah in tuapa kiangah, “Tho inla pai in; na upna in nang hong damsak zo hi,” a ci hi.
Khat vei Pharisee-te in Pasian gam hong tun ding hun a dot uh ciangin Jesu in, “Pasian-gam mit-a kimu thei-in hong tung lo ding hi.
Mite in, ‘Pasian gam hih lai-ah om hi, hua lai-ah om hi,’ zong a ci thei kei ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian gam note sungahb a om hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Tua ciangin a nungzuite kiangah, “Note in Mihing Tapa nite lakah khat na muh nop hun uh hong tung dinga, ahi hangin na mu kei ding uh hi.
Mite in note kiangah, ‘Amah hua lai-ah om hi!’ Ahikeh ‘Amah hih lai-ah om hi!’ hong ci ding uh hi. Amaute na nungdelh kei un.
Ahang in, Mihing Tapa, ama ni-inc khuaphelep in van mong khat pan mong khat dong phia in a tanzal tawh kibang ding hi.
Ahi hangin amah in na tampi thuak masa-in, hih khang mite in amah a nolh phot ding uh hi.
"Mihing Tapa hun in, Noah hun lai mah bang ding hi.
Noah gunkuangpi sungah a lut ni dongin mite in ne-in dawna, mo la mo kha-in a om uh hi. Tui khanga amaute khempeuh a tuum mang hi.
"Lot hunlai-in zong tua mah bang ahi hi. Mite in ne-in dawna, lei-in zuak-a suanin a lam uh hi.
Ahi hangin Lot in Sodom a nusiat ni-in vantung panin kaat le meikuang zusuk a, amaute khempeuh a kangtummang uh hi.
"Mihing Tapa hong kilaak ni ciangin tua bang tektek hi ding hi.
Tua ni-in innkhum tunga omte kuamah inn sunga vante la dingin kumsuk kei hen. Tua mah bangin lo-a omte, na khatpeuh la dingin ciah kik kei hen.
Lot’ zi phawk gige un!
A nuntakna a hu nuamte in mangsak dinga, a nuntakna a mangsakte in hu ding uh hi.
Ken kong geninah, tua zanin lupna khatah mi nih lumkhawm dinga; khat kila-in khat kinusia ding hi.
Numei nih in an gawikhawm dinga; khat kila-in khat kinusia ding hi.
Lo lai-ah mi nih om dinga; khat kila-in khat kinusia ding hi,”d a ci hi.
Amaute in, “Koi lai-ah maw, Topa?” ci-in a dong uh hi. Amah in, “Mi siluang omna peuhpeuh ah musanete a kikhawm ding uh hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Tua ciangin Jesu in a nungzuite, lungkia lo-a thu a nget tawntung nadingun gentehna khat a gen hi.
Amah in, “Khuapi khatah Pasian kihta lo, mite a awlmawh lo thukhenpa khat om hi.
Tua khuapi sunga meigongnu khat ama kiangah pai ngitnget a, ‘Ka langpa tungah mantakin thu hong khensak in,’ ci-in ngen hi.
"Amah in tawlkhat sung a nial hi. Ahi hangin a tawpkhakna ah, ‘Pasian nangawn kihta loin mite ka awlmawh loh hangin,
hih meigongnu in hong buaisak den ahi manin, amah hong paipai-a kei hong gimsak ngi-ingei nawn loh nadingin a thu tangtakin khensak ning!’ ci-in ngaihsun hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in, “A thutang lo tua thukhenpa gente ngaihsun dih un.
Pasian in, sun le zana ama kianga kiko, a teelsate adingin thu khensak lo ding ahi hiam? Amaute ngaksaksak ding ahi hiam?
Ken kong geninah amaute thu manlangtakin a khensak ding hi. Ahi zongin Mihing Tapa hong pai ciangin leitungah upna a mu ding hiam?” a ci hi.
Amaute thumaanna kimuanga midangte khempeuh a neumuh pawlkhatte tungah Jesu in gentehna gen a,
"Pharisee khat le siahdong khat mi nih thungen dingin biakinnpi ah a pai uh hi.
Pharisee-pa dingto a, ama thua amahmah in ngena, ‘Pasian aw, keimah midangte khempeuh - misuamte, a kheltatte, angkawmte tham lo hih siahdongpa bang hi lo ka hi manin na tungah ka lungdam hi.
Nipikal khatin nih vei an tangin ka ngah khempeuh sawm ah khat ka pia hi,’ ci hi.
"Siahdongpa ahileh a gamlapi-ah a ding hi. Amah in vantung lam nangawn ento loin a awm tum-a, ‘Pasian aw, mawhneipa keimah hong lainat in,’ ci hi.
"A khat pa sangin hih pa, Pasian mai-ah diktangsa in innah a ciah hi, cih kong gen hi. Ahang in, amah le amah a kitawisangte kiniamsak dinga amah le amah a kiniamsakte a kitawisang ding hi,” a ci hi.
"Naungekte, Jesu a lawngsak dingin mipite in ama kiangah a paipih uh hi. Nungzuite in a muh uh ciangin amaute a tai uh hi.
Ahi hangin Jesu in naupangnote ama kiangah sama, “Naupangnote ka kiangah hong paisak un. Amaute na dal kei un, Pasian gam in hih bangte aa ahi hi.
Thutak kong geninah, naupangno banga Pasian gam a sang lo peuhmah tua gam sungah a lut ngei kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Ukpa khat in ama kiangah, “A hoih siapa aw, nuntak tawntungna ka luah theih nadingin ka hih pelmawh ding bang ahi hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
Jesu in, “Bang hangin kei hoih hong ci na hi hiam? Pasian bek longal kuamah a hoih a om kei hi.
Angkawm kei in, tual that kei in, gu kei in, zuau teci pang kei in, na nu na pa pahtawi in,b cih thupiakte na theihsa ahi hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Tuapa in, “Tuate khempeuh ka neu-a kipan ka zuihsa ahi hi,” a ci hi.

Jesu in hih thu a zak ciangin ama kiangah, “Na khat na samlai hi. Na neihsa khempeuh zuak inla, mizawngte pia in. Tua hileh vantungah gou na nei ding hi. Tua khit ciangin hong pai-in kei hong zui in,” a ci hi.
Tuapa in hih thu a zak ciangin hau mahmah ahi manin a lungsi dedu hi.
Jesu in amah en a, “A haute Pasian gam a lut nading haksa mahmah hi!
Mihau khat Pasian-gam sungah a lut ding sangin kala-oh khat phimbil vangah a thawl ding a baihzaw takpi ding hi,” a ci hi.
Hih thu a zate in, “Tua hileh hotkhiatna kua in ngah zo peuhmah ding hiam?” a ci uh hi.
Jesu in “Mihing hih theih lohte Pasian in hih thei hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Peter in ama kiangah, “Kote in ka neih khempeuh uh nusia in nang kong zui uh hi!” a ci hi.
Jesu in amaute kiangah, “Thutak kong geninah, Pasian gam hangin a inn, a zi, a sanggampate, a nu-le-pa le a tate a nusia peuhmah in,
hih khanghunah a zah tampi ngah in, hong tung ding khanghunah nuntak tawntungna a ngah ding hi,” a ci hi.
Jesu in Sawm le nihte paipih tuamin amaute kiangah, “Eite Jerusalem ah i paito dinga, Mihing Tapa thu kamsangte gelhsa khempeuh a tangtung ding hi.
Gentile-te khutah amah a piakhia ding uh hi. Tuate in amah zahko-in, engbawlin, cilphih-in, satin that ding uh hi.
A ni thumna ni-in a tho kik ding hi,” a ci hi.
Nungzuite in hih thute khat beek a theitel kei uh hi. Amaute tungah a khiatna ki-im lai-a, amah in bang thu gen hiam, cih a thei kei uh hi.
Jericho ah Jesu a tun kuan ciangin mittaw khat lamgei-ah tu-in khutdawhin a ngen hi.
Tuapa in mihonpi lam pai a zak ciangin, bang thu piang hiam, cih a dong hi.
Amaute in ama kiangah, “Nazareth mi Jesu in hong nawk laitak hi,” ci-in a gen uh hi.
Amah in, “David Tapa Jesu aw, kei hong lainat in!” ci-in a galsap hi.
A madawk mipite in amah tai uh a, daitaka a om nadingin a gen uh hi. Ahi hangin tuapa in, “David Tapa aw, kei hong lainat in,” ci-in a kinak ko semsem hi.
Jesu khawl-a ama kiangah tuapa a paipih nadingun thu a pia hi. Tuapa ama kiangah a tun ciangin Jesu in,
"Bang kong hihsak ding deih na hi hiam?” ci-in a dong hi. Amah in, “Topa aw, khua ka mu nuam hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Jesu in, “Khua mu ta in; na upna in nang hong damsak zo hi,” a ci hi.
Tua khit phetin khua mu pah lian a, Jesu nungzui-in Pasian a phat hi. Mi khempeuh in zong tua thu a muh uh ciangin Pasian a phat uh hi.
Jericho ah Jesu luta kantanin a pai hi.
Tua lai-ah Zacchaeus min nei mi khat a om hi. Amah siah dong makai ahi manin a hau mahmah hi.
Amah in Jesu kua hiam, cih a mu nuam hi. Ahi hangin a tun tom mi hi-a mihonpite hangin a mu thei kei hi.
Tua ahi ciangin amah na matai a, Jesu in a tot nading lampi gei-a po theithek kung khatah a na kah hi.
Tua munah Jesu a tun ciangin ento a, ama kiangah, “Zacchaeus aw, hong kum mengmeng in. Tuni-in na innah kong taam kul hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahi ciangin amah kumsuk pah a lungdam mahmah in a muak hi.
Mipite khempeuh in hih thu a muh uh ciangin, “Amah ‘mawhneipa’ inn ah zin tung dingin pai tazen hi,” ci-in a phun uh hi.

Ahi hangin Zacchaeus dingto a Topa kiangah, “Topa, en in! Hih lai-ah tu mahmah in ka neihsa alang mizawngte ka pia hi. Mi khatpeuh khemin ama neihsa ka laksak leh a zah li-in ka din kik ding hi,” a ci hi.
Jesu in ama kiangah, “Hih mipa zong Abraham tapa ahi manin tuni-in hih innsungah hotkhiatna a tung ta hi.
Ahang in, Mihing Tapa, a mangsate zong ding le honkhia dinga hong pai ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Amah in Jerusalem naih ta a, mipite in Pasian gam a kilangpah dingin ngaihsun uh ahi manin amaute in Jesu thugen a ngaih laitakun amah in amaute kiangah gentehna khat gena,
"Kumpi za kipiasakin tua khit cianga hong ciah kik dingin nampi mi khat gamlapi gamah a zinkhia hi.
Tua ahi ciangin amah in a nasemte sawm sama, amaute minaa sawm ciat pia in, ‘Kong ciah kik mateng hih sumte tawh summet na bawl un,’ ci hi.
"Ahi hangin gam mite in amah mudah uh a, ama kiangah, ‘Hih mipa ka kumpi dingun ka deih kei uh hi,’ ci-a gen dingin a nungah palaite a nungdelhsak uh hi.
"Ahi zongin amah kumpi suak veve a, tua khit ciangin innah a ciah kik hi. Tua ciangin sum a ap a nasemte in bangzah na metsak hiam, cih thei nuamin a nasemte a samsak hi.
"A khatna pa va pai a, ‘Pu aw, na mina khat in sawm a met hi,’ ci hi.
"A pu in, ‘A hoih ka nasempa aw, na hoih na sem hi! Thu neu mahmah khat tungah muanhuai na hi manin khuapi lian sawm na uk in,’ ci hi.
"A nihna pa va pai a, ‘Pu aw, na mina khat in nga a met hi,’ ci hi.
"A pu in, ‘Nang, khuapi lian nga na uk in,’ ci-in a dawng hi.
"Tua ciangin a nasem dang khat va pai-a, ‘Pu aw, hih lai-ah na mina a om hi; puanthem tawh tunin mun khatah ka koihcip hi.
Nang mi genhak na hi manin kong kihta hi. Na koih lohpi na lakhia a, na vawh lohpi na at hi,’ ci hi.
"A pu in, ‘Nang a tatsia nasempa aw, na thugente tawh kizui-in na tungah thu ka khen ding hi! Kei mi genhak hi-in, ka koih lohna ah lakhia in, ka vawh lohpi at ka hilam thei takpi na hi hiam?
Tua ahileh bang hangin kong ciah kik cianga ka sum a met tawh ka ngah kik theih nadingin ka sum, sumsinte na ap lo na hi hiam?’ ci hi.
"Tua ciangin amah in a gei-a dingte kiangah, ‘Tuapa tung pan ama mina lakhia unla, mina sawm a neipa na pia un,’ ci hi.
"Amaute in, ‘Pu aw, amah’n mina sawm nei khin hi!’ ci uh hi.
"A pu in, ‘A nei khempeuh kipiak beh dinga, ahi hangin a nei lote tung pan a neihsun nangawn kilakkhiatsak ding hi.
Ahi hangin amau kumpi dinga hong deih lo ka galte hih lai-ah hong paipih unla, keima mai-ah that un,’ ci hi,” a ci hi.
Jesu in hih thute a gen khit ciangin amah mapi-in Jerusalem zuanin a pai hi.
Olive Vum kici mual bul-a om Bethphage le Bethany a tun kuan uh ciangin a nungzuite nih a mapaisak hi. Amah in amaute kiangah,
"Na mai-ua khua ah pai le uh cin tua khua na lut uh ciangin kuama tuan ngei nai lohna laano khat a kikhih na mu ding uh hi. Sut unla hih lai-ah hong paipih un.
Mi khatpeuh in, ‘Bang hangin tua laano sut na hi uh hiam?’ ci-a hong dot leh, ‘Topa in deih hi,’ ci-un,” ci-in a sawl hi.
Tua a sawlte pai uh a, ama gensa bang tektekin a mu uh hi.
Amaute in tua laano a sut laitakun a neipa in amaute kiangah, “Bang hangin tua laano sut na hi uh hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
Amaute in, “Topa in deih hi,” ci-in a dawng uh hi.
Amaute in Jesu kiangah paipih uh a, tua laano tungah a puantualpite uh phahin a tungah Jesu a tuangsak uh hi.
Tua banga a pai laitakin mipite in a puantualpite uh lampi-ah a phah uh hi.
Olive Vum zuatna lampi a tunsuk dektak uh ciangin a nunga zui mihon buppi in, amau muhsa nalamdangte hangin lungnuamtakin aw ngaihtak tawh Pasian phat uh a:
"Topa min-a hong pai kumpipa in thupha a ngah hi!b “Vantungah lemna om henla, a sang penna munah minthanna om ta hen!”ci-in a awng uh hi.
Mihonpite laka Pharisee-te pawlkhat in Jesu kiangah, “Sia aw, na nungzuite tai in!” a ci uh hi.
Amah in, “Ken kong geninah, amaute dai le uh suangte kiko ding uh hi,” ci-in a dawng hi. Hab 2:11
Jerusalem a tun kuan uh tua khuapi a muh ciangin amah in kah a,
"Nang, bang in kilemna hong puak ding cih tuni-in thei tapeuh lecin maw—ahi hangin lah tu-in tua thu na muh loh dingin kisel ta hi.
Na galte in nang hong do nading kulh bawlin a kimkot panin nang umcih in hong bumek ding hun hong tung ding hi.

Amaute in nang le na tate na khuapi kulh sungah leilak hong denna ding uh hi. Pasian in note hong veh hun na theih loh manun amaute in suang khat tungah suang dang khat beek a kithuapsa in a hawi kei ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah biakinnpi huang sungah lutin vanzuakte a hawlkhia hi.
Amah in amaute kiangah,” ‘Ka inn, thungetna inn kici ding hi,’c ci-in kigelh hi. Ahi hangin note in, ‘misuamte kuapi’ na suaksak tazen uh hi,”d a ci hi.
Amah in nisimin biakinnpi ah thu a hilh hi. Ahi hangin siampi makaite, thukham siate le mipite laka makaite in amah that dingin a hanciam uh hi.
Ahi zongin mipite in ama thugente pom uh ahi manin thah theih nading lampi a mu thei kei uh hi.
Ni khat biakinnpi tualah thu hilh-a lungdamna-thu a gen laitakin siampi makaite le thukham siate, upate tawh ama kiangah va pai uh hi.
Amaute in, “Nang, bang thuneihna tawh hihte hih na hi hiam? Hih thuneihna kua hong piak hiam, hong gen in?” a ci uh hi.
Jesu in, “Kei zong khat kong dong ding hi, hong gen un.
John baptise-na koi pana kipan hiam, vantung pan hiam, mihing tung pan hiam?” ci-in a dawng hi.
Amaute in, “‘Vantung pan hi,’ ci leeng, ‘Tua ahileh bang hangin amah um lo na hi uh hiam?’ hong ci ding hi.
‘Mihing tung pan hi,’ ci leeng lah mipite khempeuh in eite suang tawh hong deng ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in John kamsangin a sang uh hi” ci-in a kikum uh hi.
Tua ahi ciangin amaute in, “Koi pan hiam, ka thei kei uh hi,” ci-in a dawng uh hi.
Jesu in, “Ken zong bang thuneihna tawh hihte ka hih, cih kong gen kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Amah in mipite kiangah gentehna gena, “Lenggui lo a bawl mi khat a om hi; tuapa in a lenggui lo lo-khawhlawhte pawlkhat khawhlawhsak in sawt veipi a paikhiatsan hi.
A lak hun a tun ciangin lenggah khawm dingin lo-khawhlawhte kiangah nasem khat a sawl hi. Ahi hangin amaute in tuapa satgawp uh a, khut guakin a ciahsak uh hi.
Tua ciangin amah in tuate kiangah nasem dang khat sawl kik hi. Ahi hangin amaute in tuapa zong na satgawp uh a, a zahlaksak ngiingei khit uh ciangin a khut guakin a ciahsak uh hi.
Amah in a thumna pa sawl lai-a, amaute in tuapa liamsakin a hawlkhia uh hi.
"Tua ciangin lo neipa in, ‘Bang lawh ding ka hiam? Ka it ka tapa ka sawl ding hi; amah na zahtak buang ding uh hi,!’ ci hi.
"Ahi hangin lo-khawhlawhte in amah a muh uh ciangin, ‘Hih pa, a gouluah pa ahi hi; amah that leng a luah ding teng ei aa hi ding hi,’ ci-in thutanna a bawl uh hi.
Tua ahi ciangin amaute in amah daipua ah kaikhia uh a, a that uh hi. “Tua ahileh lo neipa in amaute bang a ci bawl ding hiam?
Amah pai-in lo-khawhlawhte that in ama lo midangte a pia ding hi,” a ci hi. Mipite in hih thu a zak uh ciangin, “Hih bang piang ngei kei ta hen!” a ci uh hi.
Jesu in amaute en gemgam a, “Tua ahileh: “Inn lamte nilkhiat suang, inntungkhuma suang a suak hi,’b
Tua suang tunga puk peuhmah kitamzan dinga, ahi hangin tua suang in a delhkhakte peuhmah a zanciim ding hi, ci-a kigelh a khiatna bang ahi hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
Thukham siate le siampi makaite in hih gentehna amau a cihnopna ahilam thei uh ahi manin a matpah theih nadingun lampi a zong uh hi. Ahi hangin amaute in mipite a kihta uh hi.

Amaute in amah encik gige uh a, mi muanhuai a kineihkhem thusim kante ama kiangah a sawl uh hi. Thuneihna le vang a nei gam-ukpa tungah Jesu a piakkhiat theih nadingun ama kam tawh amah lehmat thei dingin a kilamen uh hi.
Tua ahi ciangin thusim kante in ama kiangah, “Sia aw, nang in ahi bang thu genin na hilh a, kuamah deihsak tuam nei loin thutak bangin Pasian thu na hilh lam ka thei uh hi.
Tua hi-a kote adingin Caesar tungah siah piak tuak hiam, piak tuak lo hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi.
Amah in amaute kineihkhemna a muhtel ciangin,
"Denarius khat hong lak dih un. A tungah kua lim le kua min tuang ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
Amaute in, “Caesar aa ahi hi,” ci-in a dawng uh hi. Amah in amaute kiangah, “Tua ahileh Caesar aa te Caesar pia unla, Pasian aa te Pasian pia un,” a ci hi.
Amah in tua banga mipite laka a gennate tawh amah a awksak zo kei uh hi. Ama dawnnate lamdang sa uh a, tua ciangin amaute a dai uh hi.
Thawhkikna om lo hi, a ci Saddusee-te pawlkhat thu dong dingin Jesu kiangah a pai uh hi.
