Amaute in, “Sia aw, Moses in, ‘Mi khat a sanggampa a sih a, ta nei man loin a zi a nusiat leh tuapa in meigongnu tenpihin a sanggampa ading tate neihsak hen,” ci-in ko adingin a gelh hi.
Tu-in unau pasal sagih a om hi. A upapen in zi nei-a ta nei loin a si hi.
A nihna pa tuateh
a thumna pa in tuanu tenpih uh a, tua mah bangin a sagihun ta nei man loin a si khin uh hi.
A tawpkhakna ah tua numei zong a si hi.
Tua ahileh tua numei in unau pasal sagihte tenpih kim ahi ciangin thawhkik ni ciangin amah kua pen zi hi ding hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi.
Jesu in, “Hih khanghun a mite in mopi mokha in a om uh hi.
Ahi hangin hong tung ding khanghun le misi pana thawhkikna ngah dinga kilawmte in mo pi loin mo lah a kha kei ding uh hi.
Amaute vantung mite bang ding uh ahi manin a si thei nawn kei ding uh hi. Amaute thawhkikna tate ahi manun Pasian tate ahi uh hi.
Ahi hangin, Topa in, ‘Abraham Pasian, Isaac Pasian le Jacob Pasian,'c ci-in sam ahi manin sawlbawk lak thu ah Moses nangawn in a sisate tho kik hi, cih a lak hi.
Pasian ah mi khempeuh nungta ahi manin amah a site Pasian hilo, a nungtate Pasian ahi hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Thukham siate pawlkhat in, “Sia aw, dawng thei mahmah ciai!” ci-in a dawng uh hi.
Tua ciangin kuamah in dotna dang peuhmah amah a dong ngam nawn kei uh hi.
Tua ciangin Jesu in amaute kiangah, “Khrist,d David tapa hi, ci-in bangci-a amaute in gen thei uh ahi hiam?
Phatna late Bu sungah David mahmah in: ‘Topa in ka Topa kiangah:
"Na galte khempeuh na khe ngakna-a ka bawl matengin ka taklamah na tu-in,”’e ci-in pulakkhia hi.
David in amah ‘Topa’ ci hi. Tua ahileh bangci in amah a tapa hi thei ding ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
Mi khempeuh in ama thugen a ngaih laitakun Jesu in a nungzuite kiangah,

"Thukham siate pan na kikem un. Amaute puantual deldal silhin vak kawikawi nuam uh a, van zuakna munte ah pibawl ding utin, synagogue-te sunga tutna thupi pente ah tu nuam diak uh a, anvaknate ah uliante tutna-ah a tu nuam uh hi.
Amaute in meigongte inn netum uh a, kineih in sauvei pipi thu a ngen uh hi. Tua bang mite nasiatakin gawtna kithuaksak ding hi,” a ci hi.
Jesu a khuadak toh leh, sum haute in biakinnpi sumkholna sungah amau sum a khiat uh a mu hi.
Amah in, a zawng meigongnu khat in a neu mahmah sumsan tanga nih a khiat zong a mu hi.
Amah in, “Thutak kong geninah, hih a zawng meigongnu in midang khempeuh sangin tam khiazaw hi.
Hih mite khempeuh in a hauhna uh panin khia uh hi; ahi hangin tuanu in a zawnsa pipi-in a ma kivak nading a neih khempeuh a khia hi,” a ci hi.
A nungzuite pawlkhat in suang melhoihte le Pasian tunga ki-ap letsongte tawh hoihtaka kizem biakinnpi thu a gen uh hi. Ahi hangin Jesu in,
"Hih laitaka na muhte uh tawh kisai-in suang khat tungah suang dang khat beek kiciang lo a, a vekpi-in a kicipmang kiuhkeuh hun hong tung ding hi,” a ci hi.
Amaute in, “Sia aw, hih thute cik cianga piang ding ahi hiam? Hih thute a tun dektakna bang limin kithei ding hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi.

Amah in, “Note kuamah in hong khem zawh loh nadingin na kigalging un. Ahang in, keima minin mi tampi hong pai ding uh a, ‘Amah ka hi hi. Hun hong nai ta hi,’ hong ci tangtang ding uh hi. Amaute na zui kei un.
Gal thu le kumpi lumletna thu na zak uh ciangin na linglawng kei un. Hih thute a piang masa pelmawh ding mah hi-a ahi hangin a beina a tungpah nai kei ding hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Tua ciangin amah in amaute kiangah, “Minam khat le minam khat kido dinga, gam khat le gam khat a kido ding uh hi.
Mun tuamtuam ah zin nakpi in ling dinga, kialpi le pul tungin vantung panin a kihtakhuai thupiangte le lim lianpite hong om ding hi.

"Ahi hangin hihte a pian ma-in amaute in note tungah a khut uh hong nga-in hong bawlsia ding uh hi. Keima min hangin amaute in note synagogue-te le thongte ah hong tun ding uh a, kumpite le gam-ukte mai-ah hong paipih ding uh hi.
Hih in amaute tunga teci pang na suah nading uh ahi hi.
Ahi hangin no le no na kihut zia ding uh ama in na lunghimawh loh nadingun lungsim khentatsa-in om un.
Ahang in, na langte un note hong nan zawh loh nadingun thute le pilna kong pia ding hi.
Na nu-le-pate, na sanggamte, na tanaute le na lawmte un note hong lehhek ding uh a, pawlkhat hong that ding uh hi.
Keima hangin mi khempeuh in note hong mudah ding uh hi.
Ahi hangin na samzang khat nangawn uh a mang thang kei ding hi.
Kiptaka dinna tawh nuntakna na ngah ding uh hi.
"Galkap honpi in Jerusalem a umcih na muh uh ciangin a hawmmang nading nai ta hi, cih na thei ding uh hi.
Tua ciangin Judea gama omte mual tungah tai uh hen; tua khuapi sunga omte taikhia uh henla, gamsunga omte tua khuapi ah lut kei uh hen.
Tua in, a kigelhsa khempeuh a tangtun nadingin gawtna hun ahi hi.
Tua nite, nau paiite le naungek nei nupite adingin mulkimhuai lua ding hi! Tua gam sung tengah lungdonna lianpi le hih mite tungah thangpaihna lianpi a tung ding hi.
Amaute namsau in puk ding uh a, minamte khempeuh thongkiate bangin a kai ding uh hi. Gentile-te hunte a tangtun kim khit matengin Gentile-te in Jerusalem a tuancil ngi-ingei ding uh hi.
"Ni, kha le aksite sungah limte hong om ding hi. Tuipi kilok le tuihual hawkte hangin leitunga minamte lunggimin a cimawh ding uh hi.
Van a nate khempeuh kiling dinga, leitunga piang dingte kihta kholin lau lua-in mite a sibup ding uh hi.
Tua laitakin vanglianpi le minthanna tawh meii laka hong paisuk Mihing Tapa amaute in a mu ding uh hi.
Hih nate tun a kipat ciangin note tatkhiatna nai ta ahi manin ding to unla khuadak khia un,” a ci hi.
Amah in amaute kiangah hih gentehna gena: “Theikung le singkung dangte khempeuh na en un.
A tehte a sel ciangin khuakhal hun nai ta hi, cih na thei uh hi.
Tua mah bangin hih nate a pian na muh uh ciangin Pasian gam hong nai ta hi, cih na thei un.
"Thutak kong geninah, hih thute khempeuh a tun khit mateng hih khang miteb a bei peuhmah kei ding hi.
Van le lei a mangthang ding hi; ahi hangin ka thute a mangthang ngei kei ding hi.

"Note pilvang un, tua hi keileh na lungsimte uh lalthangin zukhamna le nuntak nading lunghimawh nate in hong thazawhgawp dinga tua ciangin na upmawh loh laitak un tua ni, thang kisai bangin no tungah hong tung ding hi.
Leitung bupa tengte khempeuh tungah tua ni a tung ding ahi hi.
Note na kigalging gige un. Thupiang dingte khempeuh pana na suahtak nading uh le Mihing Tapa mai-a na din theih nadingun thu na ngen un,” a ci hi.
Jesu in biakinnpi ah nisimin thu hilh a, Olive Vum ah giak dingin nitak sialin a paikhia hi.
Ama thugen ngai dingin zingsang tungin mi khempeuh biakinnpi ah a pai uh hi.
Paisanpawi kici Silngo-sawhloh Anlum Pawi hun kuan ciangin,
siampi makaite le thukham siate in mipite kihta uh ahi manin Jesu a hepkhiat theih nading uh lampi a zong uh hi.
Tua ciangin Sawm-le-nihte lakah khat, Iscariot kici Judas sungah Satan a lut hi.
Tua ciangin siampi makaite le biakinnpi cing makaite kiangah Judas pai-a Jesu a lehhek theih nading zia amaute tawh a kikum hi.
Amaute lungkim uh a, amah sum piak dingin a thukim uh hi.
Amah thukima, mihonpite om loh kala amaute khutah Jesu a piak theih nading hun hoih a ngak gige hi.
Tua ciangin Silngo sawhloh Anlum Pawi ni tunga, tua ni Paisan Tuuno-a biakpiak ni ding ahi hi.
Jesu in Peter le John kiangah, “Pai unla Paisan-pawi i nek theih nadingin na kisakhol un,” ci-in a sawl hi.
Amaute in, “Koi lai-ah na bawlkhol le ung nong deih hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi.
Amah in, “Khuapi sung na lut uh ciangin tuibeel khat a pua pasal khat tawh na kituak ding uh hi. Ama lutna inn dong amah zui unla,
a inntekpa kiangah, ‘Siapa in: Ka nungzuite tawh Paisan-pawi ka nek nading zintunna inndei koi lai ahi hiam, ci-in hong dongsak hi,’ va ci un.
Amah in van zat ding a kima omsa inndei tungnung a zaipi khat hong lak ding hi. Tua lai-ah na bawlkhol un,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Amaute a pai uh ciangin Jesu gensa bang tektekin nate a mu uh hi. Tua hi-a amaute in Paisan-pawi bawl nading a bawlkhol uh hi.
A hun a tun ciangin Jesu le sawltakpite sabuai ah a kingam uh hi.
Tua ciangin amah in amaute kiangah, “Keimah in ka thuak ma in hih Paisan-pawi note tawh i nekkhawm ding utin ka ngaklah mahmah hi.
Ahang in, Pasian gamah hih thu a tangtun hun matengin ka ne nawn kei ding hi, cih kong gen hi,” a ci hi.
Amah in hai a lak khit ciangin lungdam ko a, “Hih hai la unla note lakah hawm un.
Ahang in, ken kong cih inah Pasian gam hong tun mateng lenggahzu ka dawn nawn kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Amah in anlum la-a, lungdam ko-in balkhama, amaute pia-in, “Hih in note adinga kipia ka pumpi ahi hi; kei nong phawk tawntung nadingun na bawl un,” a ci hi.
Tua mah bangin nitak-an a nek khit uh ciangin hai la-a, “Hih hai, note adinga kibuakhia ka sisan-a thukhunna thak ahi hi.
Ahi hangin kei hong lehhek ding pa khut, keima khut tawh sabuai ah a om hi.
Thukip omsa bangin Mihing Tapa a pai ding hi. Ahi hangin amah a lehhek tua mipa in, gimna a thuak ding hi,” a ci hi.
Amaute lakah kua pen in hih a hih tam, ci-in a kidong ciat uh hi.
Amaute lakah alian pena kingaihsun kua hiam, cih thu kiselna zong a piang hi.
Jesu in amaute kiangah, “Gentile-te ahi uh leh a kumpite uh amau tungah kiliansak uh a, amau tunga thuneihna a zangte, amau le amau Deihsakte a kici tawm uh hi.
Ahi hangin note tua bang na hi kei un. Tua sangsikin, note lakah a lianpen in a moipen bang hi dinga, a ukpen in nasempa bang hi ding hi.
Sabuai-a tupa le tuanvaipa kua lianzaw ahi hiam? Ahi hangin kei ka hileh note lakah nasempa bang ka hi hi.
Hong kizia-et lai-a hong dinpihte note na hi uh hi.
Ka Pa in kei tunga gam khat hong bilpiak bangin note tungah gam khat kong pia hi;
ka gam sunga sabuai ah kei tawh nekhawm dawnkhawma, kumpi tokhom tungah tu-in Israel beh sawm-le-nihte tungah thu na khen theih nading uh ahi hi.
"Simon, Simon aw buh haih bangin Satan in nanga haih hong sawm hi.
Ahi hangin Simon aw, na upna a lawhsap loh nadingin nang ading thu ka ngen zo hi. Na kihei kik ciangin na sanggamte na thahatsak in,” a ci hi.
Ahi hangin amah in, “Topa aw, nang tawh thong kiakhawm ding ahi zongin, sihkhawm ding ahi zongin a kigingsa ka hi hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Jesu in, “Peter aw, ken kong geninah, tuni ak a khuan ma-in kei nong theihna thumvei na nial ding hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.

Tua ciangin amaute kiangah, “Note sumbawm, thung-ip le khedapte hong kengsak lo a kong sawlkhiat lai-in kisapna na nei uh hiam,” ci-in a dong hi. Amaute in, “Bangmah ka kisam kei uh hi,” ci-in a dawng uh hi.
Amah in amaute kiangah, “Tu-in ahileh sumbawm ahi zongin, thung-ip ahi zongin na neih uh leh keng un; namsau na neih kei uh leh na puantualpite uh zuak unla lei un.

‘Amah thukham palsatte tawh a kisimkhawm hi,’b ci-in kigelh hi. Tua hi a hih thu kei tungah hong tangtung pelmawh ding hi, cih kong gen hi. Himah hi. Kei thu a kigelhsate a tangtung ding hi ta hi,” a ci hi.
Nungzuite in, “Topa en dih in, hiah namsau nih om hi,” a ci uh hi. Amah in, “Pha zo hi,” a ci hi.
Jesu a pai ngei bangin Olive Vum ah pai-a, a nungzuite in amah a zui uh hi.
Tua mun a tun ciangin amah in amaute kiangah, “Zia-etna sungah na puk loh nadingun thu na ngen un,” a ci hi.
Amaute khen suanglot khat tan bangah khukdinin thu ngen a,
"Pa aw, na ut leh hih hai tawh hong kipelhsak in; ahi zongin kei deihna bang hi loin nangma deihna bang hizaw hen,” a ci hi.
Vantung panin vansawltak khat ama kiangah kilanga, amah a thakhauhsak hi.
Amah lunggimin thu limngetzaw-a, a khua-ul sisanmal bangin leitungah a takkhia hi.c
A thungetna pan dingkhia a, a nungzuite kiangah a pai kik ciangin amaute dah lua-in thazawm uh ahi manin a ihmut laitak uh a tuak hi.
Amah in amaute kiangah, “Note bang hangin ihmu na hi uh hiam? Tho un. Zia-etna sunga na puk loh nadingun thu ngen un,” a ci hi.
Tua banga a paupau laitakin mihon khat va paito uh a, Sawm-le-nihte laka khat, Judas kici pa in amaute a makaih hi. Amah in Jesu nam dingin a va naih hi.
Ahi hangin Jesu in ama kiangah, “Judas aw, nang Mihing Tapa khatvei napna tawh lehhek ding maw?” ci-in a dong hi.
Jesu a zuite in hih thu piang ding a muh uh ciangin, “Topa aw, ka namsaute uh tawh ka sat ding uh hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi.
Tua ciangin amaute lakah khat in, tulpipa nasempa a sat leh a taklam bil a satkhia hi.
Ahi hangin Jesu in, “Tu-a zah pha zo!” ci-in a dawng hi. Tua ciangin amah in tua mipa bil lawngin a damsak hi.
Tua ciangin Jesu in amah man dinga a pai siampi makaite, biakinnpi cing makaite le upate kiangah, “Kei man dinga namsau le khetbuk tawh nong kuan zawzen uh kumpi langpang dinga makaih ka hi hiam?
Nisimin biakinnpi tualte ah note tawh ka om khawm laitakin khut khat zong nong nga kei uh hi. Ahi hangin tu laitak, note hun ahi, khuamial thuneih hun ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in amah manin paikhiatpih uh a, tulpipa innah a tun uh hi. Peter in a kigamla simsimah a zui hi.
Ahi hangin amaute in inntual laizangah mei cih in a tutkhawm uh ciangin amaute kiangah Peter zong a va tu hi.
Nasem numei khat in meitang ah tua lai-a a tut a mu hi. Tuanu in amah va tel-et a, “Hih pa amah tawh kipawl hi,” a ci hi.
Ahi hangin amah in nial a, “Numei aw, ken amah ka thei kei hi,” a ci hi.
Tawmvei khit ciangin midang khat in amah mu-a, “Nang zong amaute lakah khat na hi hi,” a ci hi. Peter in, “Mipa aw, ka hi peuhmah kei hi!” ci-in a dawng hi.
Nai khat bang khit ciangin adang khat in, “Hih pa amah tawh kipawl pha mahmah, Galilee mi ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Peter in, “Mipa aw, na thu gen ka thei peuhmah kei hi!” ci-in a dawng kik hi. Tua banga a pau laitakin ak a khuang hi.
Topa kihei a tangtakin Peter a en hi. Tua ciangin Peter in Jesu in ama tunga, “Tuni ak khuan ma-in thumvei nong kitheihmawhbawl ding hi,” ci-a a gen a pawk hi.
Tua ciangin amah a pualam ah pusuak a kah cihtakin a kap hi.
Jesu a cingte in zahko in a sat uh hi.
Amaute in a mit tunsak uh a, “Nang kuan hong su hiam? Hong gen dih in!” a ci uh hi.
Amaute in engkona kam tampi ama tungah a zang uh hi.
Khuavak tungin tangpi upa vai hawmte, siampi makaite le thukham siate kikhawm uh a, amaute mai-ah Jesu a paipih uh hi.
Amaute in, “Nang Khristd na hileh, hong gen in,” a ci uh hi. Jesu in, “Kong gen hangin note in nong um nuam kei uh a,
kong dot hangin nong dawng nuam kei uh hi.
Ahi hangin tu-a kipan Mihing Tapa a thahat Pasian taklamah a tu ding hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Amaute khempeuh in, “Tua ahileh nang Pasian Tapa na hi hiam?” ci-in a dong huan uh hi. Amah in, “Maan hi, nong cih bang uh ka hi hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in, “Teci dang kul nawn ding ahi hiam? Eite in ama kam panin i za zo hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin tua lai-a kikhawmte khempeuh ding uh a, amah Pilate kiangah a paipih uh hi.
Amaute in, “Hih pa in ka minam uh a holhthawh ka thei uh hi. Caesar tunga siah piak ding dalin kumpi khat, Khrista in kigen lai hi,” ci-in amah a ngawh uh hi.
Tua ahi ciangin Pilate in Jesu kiangah, “Nang, Jew-te kumpipa na hi hiam?” ci-in a dong hi. Jesu in, “Ka hi hi, na cih bang ahi hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Tua ciangin Pilate in siampi makaite le mihonte kiangah, “Hih pa, mawhmat theih nading thubul ka mu kei hi,” ci-in a pulak hi.
Ahi hangin amaute in, “Amah in a thuhilhna tawh Judeab gam sunga mi khempeuh a tokbuai hi. Galilee pan hong panin hih ciang dong hong tun hi,” a ci teitei uh hi.
Pilate in hih thu a zak ciangin Galilee gam mi ahi hiam, ci-in a dong hi.
Jesu, Herod uk sung mi ahilam a theih ciangin amah Herod kiangah a puak hi. Tua hun laitakin Herod zong Jerusalem ah a om hi.
Herod in Jesu a muh ciangin, a muh nop sawt zo ta ahi manin a lungkim mahmah hi. Ama thu a na zaksa mah bangin amah in nalamdang pawlkhat a bawl ding a lamen hi.
Amah in thu tampi adot kawikawi hangin Jesu in a dawng kik kei hi.
Siampi makaite le thukham siate tua lai-ah ding uh a nakpi in a mawhsak uh hi.
Tua ciangin Herod le a galkapte in amah ciamnuih-bawlna in nei uh a, a zahko uh hi. Amah kumpi puan hoih mahmah khat silhsakin Pilate kiangah a puak kik uh hi.
Tua ni-in Herod le Pilate a kilawmta kik uh hi - tua ma-in amau gel a kigalneih uh ahi hi.
Pilate in siampi makaite, ukpate le mipite kaikhawma,
amaute kiangah, “Note in hih mipa in kumpi langpang dingin mite tawsawn hi, ci-in ka kiangah nong paipih uh hi. Nomau mai mahmah ah amah ka sittel ciangin amah na mawhmatna uh thubul ka mu kei hi.
Herod in zong amah kei kiangah hong puak kik ahi manin a mu tuan lo ahi hi. Na muh mah bangun sihna thuak nadinga kilawm bangmah a hih kei hi.
Tua ahi manin, amah ka gawt khit ciangin ka khahkhia ding hi,” c ci hi.
Tua hunlai-in Pawi hun ciangin amaute tungah mi khat a khahkhiat ding ama hih theih ahi hi.d
Amaute in, “Hih pa that in! Ko kiangah Barabbas hong khahkhia in,” ci-in aw khatin a kiko uh hi.
(Barabbas pen tua khuapi sunga kumpi a langdona hang le a tualthahna hangin thong sunga kikhum ahi hi.)
Pilate in Jesu khahkhia nuam ahi manin amaute tungah a ngen kik hi.
Ahi hangin amaute in, “Amah kilhlum in! Amah kilhlum in!”ci-in a kiko teitei uh hi.

Amah in a thumveina amaute kiang ah, “Bang hang in? Amah in bang tatkhialhna lian hih ahi hiam? Sihna a thuak nading zahin paulap ding bangmah ka mu kei hi. Tua ahi manin amah ka gawt khit ciangin ka khahkhia ding hi,” a ci hi.
Ahi hangin amaute nakpi in kiko uh a, amah a kilhlup nadingin a kalh teitei uh ciangin amau kikonate in a zozaw hi.
Tua ahi ciangin Pilate in amau kalhna banga piak dingin a khensat hi.
Amau ngetsa, kumpi langdona hang le tual thahna hanga thong sunga kikhumpa khahkhia-in, amau ut banga a bawl dingun amau tungah Jesu piakhia hi.
Amaute in amah a paikhiatpih laitakun gamsung panin tua lai hong tawn Cyrene mi Simon lencip uh a, amah singlamteh suanin Jesu nung zui-in singlamteh a puasak uh hi.
Mipi tampitakin amah zui uh a, tuate lakah amah kah a, a zui numeite zong a kihel uh hi.
Jesu kihei-in amaute kiangah, “Jerusalem tanute aw, kei adingin kap kei un, no ading le na tate uh adingin kapzaw un.
Ahang in, note in, ‘Tasel numeite, nau a paii ngei lo gilte le a kiteep ngei lo nawite thupha ngah ahi hi!’ na cih hun uh hong tung ding hi.
Tua ciangin, “amaute in mualliante kiangah, ‘Ko tungah hong cim un!’ mualneute kiangah, “Kote hong vuk un!’” ci ding uh hi.e
Ahang in, mite in sing ahin laitakin hihte hih uh ahileh akeu ciangin bang suak tazen ding uh hiam?” a ci hi.
Tatkhialhna lian a nei midang nih zong thah dingin amah tawh a paikhiatpih uh hi.
Luguh kici munah amaute a tun uh ciangin tua lai-ah amah le tatkhialhna lian a neite – a taklam khat, a veilam khat tawh singlamteh tungah a kilh uh hi.
Jesu in, “Pa aw, amaute in a hih uh thei lo uh ahi manin amaute maisak in”f a ci hi. Amaute in ai lawnin a puante a hawm uh hi.
Mipite dingin en uh a, ukpate in amah a zahpih beh lai uh hi. Amaute in, “Amah in midangte a honkhia zo hi; amah Teltuampa Khat, Pasian’ Khrist hi ahileh, amah le amah kihonkhia ta hen,” a ci uh hi.
Galkapte zong paito uh a, amah a zahko uh hi. Amaute in amah lenggahzu thuk pia-in ama kiangah,
"Nang Jew-te kimpipa na hileh nang le nang kihonkhia in,” a ci uh hi.
Ama lutung santakah :HIH PA JEW-TE KUMPIPA HI ci-in theih-sakna lai a suang uh hi.
Tua lai-a kikhai tatkhialhna lian a neite khat in, “Nang Khrist hilo na hi hiam? Nang le ko hong honkhia in!” ci-in a engko hi.
Ahi hangin a khat pa in, “Amah banga nang, gawtna thuak na hi khit nungsang Pasian kihta lo na hi hiam?
Ei i hileh i gamtatnasate tawh kizui-in thuak i hi manin a kituaka gawtna a thuak i hi hi. Ahi hangin hih pa in tatkhialhna khat beek a nei kei hi,” ci-in tuapa a tai hi.
Tua khit ciangin amah in, “Jesu aw, na gam sungah na tun ciangin kei hong phawk in,g” a ci hi.
Jesu in ama kiangah, “Thutak kong geninah, tuni-in kei tawh Paradise ah na omkhawm ding hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Tua hun nai gukna pawl hi-a nai kuana dongin gam bupah ni tang lo ahi manin,
khim a zing hi. Tua ciangin biakinnpi puanzak phel nih a suak hi.
Jesu in, “Pa aw, ka kha nangma khut sungah kong ap hi,” ci-in nakpitakin a kiko hi. Tua banga a kiko khit ciangin, a huu a beisak hi.
Zakhat ukpa in thu piang teng a muh ciangin Pasian phat a, “Hih pa, mi thumaan hi takpi hi,” a ci hi.
Hih thute en dinga kikhawm mite khempeuh in thupiangte a muh uh ciangin, a awm uh tumin a paikhia uh hi.
Ahi hangin Galilee pana amah a zui numeite a kipan amah a theite khempeuh a kigamla simna munah dingin hih thute a galvil uh hi.
Tua laitakin Vaihawmte khat, mi hoih, mi thutang Joseph min nei khat a om hi.
Tuapa in amaute thukhen-satnate le a gamtatnate uh a thukim kei hi. Amah Judea gam khua lian khat, Arimathea mi hi-a Pasian gam a ngak gige mi khat ahi hi.
Amah Pilate kiangah pai-in Jesu luang a va ngen hi.
Tua ciangin amah in siluang lakhiasuk a, saihadial puanin a tun khit ciangin kuamah khat beek a kisial ngei nai lohna mun suangpi a kikhuak han sungah a sial hi.
Tua ni Kiginkholh Ni hi-a Sabbath ni a kipan ding hi ta hi.
Galilee pana Jesu tawh a paikhawm numeite in Joseph zui uh a, tua han le ama luang a kisial zia a mu uh hi.
Tua khit ciangin amaute inn ah ciah uh a gimnamtui le sathau namtui a kigingkhol uh hi. Ahi hangin amaute in thupiak a manna un Sabbath ni-in a tawlnga uh hi.
Nipikal ni masa pen ni, zingsang phalvak tungin tua numeite amau bawlkholhsa gimnamtuite kengin hanah a hawh uh hi.
Amaute in tua han pana suangtum kilikkhiasa a mu uh hi.
Ahi hangin a sungah a lut uh leh Topa Jesu luang a mu kei uh hi.
Hih thu ah amaute lungmangin a om laitakun, a puante uh khuaphialep banga tee zalzal pasal nih a gei uah thakhatin a ding hi.
Tua numeite lau lua mahmah uh ahi manin kunsukin amai uh lei-ah a phum uh hi. Ahi hangin tua mite in amaute kiangah, “Note in bang hangin misite lakah mihing zong na hi uh hiam?
Amah hih lai-ah om lo hi; amah tho kik zo hi! Amah note tawh Galilee gama a om lai-in note kiangah,
‘Mihing Tapa mawhnei mite khut sungah kipia dinga, kikilhlumin a ni thumna ni-in kithokiksak ding hi,’ ci-a hong gen phawk gige un,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin ama thugente a phawk kik uh hi.
Amaute han pan a ciah kik uh ciangin hih thute khempeuh, Sawm-le-khatte le adangte khempeuh a hilh uh hi.
Sawltakpite kiangah hih thu a gente: Mary Magdalene, Joanna, James nu Mary le amaute tawh a omkhawm midangte ahi uh hi.
Ahi hangin amaute in tua numeite thugente uptak lo sa uh ahi manin a um kei uh hi.
Ahi zongin Peter ding to-in hanah a tai hi. Amah kunsukin a et leh, saihadial puan bek a mu hi. Tua ciangin amah in tua thupiang-sate lamdang sa in a ciah kik hi.
Tua ni mah in amaute lakah nih, Jerusalem panin tai sagiha bang a gamlatna Emmaus kici khua neu ah a pai uh hi.

Hih thute kikumin a paupau laitakun Jesu mahmah paito in amaute tawh a tonkhawm hi.
Ahi hangin amaute lakah amah a kitheisak kei hi.
Amah in amaute kiangah, “Na pai kawmkawmun bang kikum na hi ua?” ci-in a dong hi. Amaute mai mialin a dinkhawl uh hi.
Amaute khat Cleopas min nei pen in, “Jerusalem a hawhte lakah tua lai-a tusawng tenga thupiangte a thei lo nang bek hi niteh maw?” a ci hi.
Amah in, “Bang piang a hia?” ci-in a dong hi. Amaute in, “Nazareth mi Jesu thu ahi hi. Amah kamsang khat hi-a Pasian mai le mi khempeuh mai-a, a pauna le a tatnate ah vang a nei hi.
I siampi makaite le ukpate in amah a si dingin thu khen uh a, kilhlum uh hi;
ahi hangin kote in Israel-te tankhia ding pa amah hi dinga ka lamet uh ahi hi. Tua tham loin hih thu a pian zawh a ni thumna hi ta hi.
Tua banah ka numeite uh pawlkhat in lamdang hong sasak mahmah uh hi. Tuni zingsang tungin amaute hanah va hawh uh a,
ahi hangin ama luang a mu kei uh hi. Amaute hong ciah kik uh a, amah nungta hi, ci-a amau tunga gen van sawltakte a muhna thu hong gen uh hi.
Tua ciangin ka pawlte uh kimkhat han ah va pai uh a, numeite gen bang tektek in mu uh hi; amah va mu lo takpi uh hi,” ci-in a dawng kik uh hi.
Amah in amaute kiangah, “Hai na lawmlawm uh cia! Kamsangte gen sate khempeuh uphak sa si uh cia!
Khristb in hihte khempeuh a thuak masak kul phot-a, tua khit ciangin ama minthanna sunga lut pan ding hi lo ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Moses a kipan Kamsangte khempeuh in amah tawh kisai-in Laisiangtho sunga a gensa khempeuh amah in amaute tungah a hilhcian hi.
Amaute a pai nading uh tua khuaneu a zuat laitakun Jesu a paisuak lai ding bangin a kineih hi.
Ahi hangin amaute in, “Ni kai lua ta-a, ni tum phial ta ahi ciangin ko kiangah hong tam in,” ci-in amah a kun uh hi. Tua ahi ciangin amah pai-in amaute kiangah a tam hi.
Amah in amaute tawh ankuang a um khawm ciangin, anlum la-a, lungdam ko-in, balkham a, amaute a pia hi.
Tua ciangin amaute a mit uh kihonga amah a theician uh hi; tua ciangin amau muhna panin amah a mang hi.
Amaute in, “Amah tawh lampi ah tonkhawmin, kiho-a, Laisiangtho hong hilh laitakin i lung hong lawng hi lo ahi hiam?” ci-in khat le khat a kidong uh hi.
Amaute ding khia uh a thakhatin Jerusalem ah a kilehkik uh hi. Amaute in tua lai-a Sawm-le-khatte le amau tawh a om, a na kikhawm khawmte in,
"Hi takpi! Topa tho kik zo a Simon kiangah kilang hi,” ci-in a gen laitak uh a tuak uh hi.
Tua ciangin tuate gel in lampi a thupiangte le Jesu in anlum a balkhap laitaka a meel a theihcian patna uh thute a gen uh hi.
Hih thu a gengen laitakun amaute laizangah Jesu mahmah va dinga, amaute kiangah, “Note tungah lemna om ta hen,” a ci hi.
Amaute sikha mu kisa uh a kigaihin a lau mahmah uh hi.
Amah in amaute kiangah, “Bang hangin note lungmang in lungka na hi uh hiam?
Ka khutte le ka khepekte en un. Kei mahmah hi buang ing! Hong lawng unla en un; sikha in tu-a na muh uh kei neih bangin satak le guh a nei kei hi,” a ci hi.
Amah in hih teng a cih khit ciangin a khutte le a khepekte amau a lak hi.
Amaute lungdamin lamdang sa lua uh ahi manin a up nai loh lailai uh ciangin, “Hih lai-ah nek theih ding khatpeuh na nei uh hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
Amaute in amah ngasa haikeu khat a piak uh leh
la-a amaute muh in a ne hi.

Amah in amaute kiangah, “Hih in note tawh ka omkhawm lai-a ka gen: Kei thu, Moses Thukham, Kamsangte le Phatna-late sunga kigelhte khempeuh a tangtung pelmawh ding hi, ka cih hih thu ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amaute lungsim amah in honsaka, amaute in Laisiangtho a theitel uh hi.
Amah in amaute kiangah, “A kigelhsa thu hih bang ahi hi: Khrist in thuak dinga a ni thumna ni-in misi pan tho in,
Jerusalem pan kipankhia in, ama minin minamte khempeuh tungah kisikna le mawh maisakna thu a kihilh ding hi.
Hih thute ah note teci na hi uh hi.
Keimah in ka Pa hong kamciamsa, note tungah kong sawl ding hi; ahi hangin asangna pana vangliatna note hong kisilhsak matengin tua khuapi ah na om tadih un,” ci-in a gen hi.
Amah in amaute Bethany kimnai-ah pai khiatpih-a, a khut lamto in amaute thupha a pia hi.
Amah in amaute thupha a piak laitakin amaute nusia in amah vantungah kila to hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in amah bia uh a, lungdam mahmah in Jerusalem ah a ciah uh hi.
Tua ciangin amaute, Pasian phatin biakinnpi ah a om suaksuak uh hi.
Atungin Thu om-a, tua Thu Pasian tawh omkhawmin, tua Thu Pasian ahi hi.
Atungin amah Pasian tawh a omkhawm hi.
Ama tungtawnin na khempeuh kibawl hi. A kibawlsate khempeuh ama bawlloh a om kei hi.
Ama sungah nuntakna om-a, tua nuntakna, mite khuavak ahi hi.
Khuamial sungah tua khuavak tanga, ahi hangin khuamial in amah a theitela kei hi.
Pasian kiang pana hong kisawl mi khat a om hi. Ama min John ahi hi.
Mi khempeuh in ama tungtawnin tua khuavak a up theih nadingin khuavak tawh kisai a theisak dingin teci-a hong pai ahi hi.
Amah ahileh tua khuavak ahi kei hi. Khuavak tawh kisai teci-a hong pai hi bek hi.
Mikim tungah a tang tua khuavak taktak leitungah hong pai hi.b
Amah leitungah om-a, leitung ama piansak hi napi leitung in amah a thei kei hi.
Ama aa mahmah ahi te kiangah hong pai ahi hangin ama aa te in amah a sang kei uh hi.
Ahi zongin amah a sangte khempeuh, ama min a umte khempeuh tungah Pasian tate suah nading thuneihna a pia hi.
Tuate pianngei tatec banga suak hi lo, mihing khensatna bang le pasal deihna pana suak zong hi lo, Pasian pana suak ahi uh hi.
Tua Thu, ci-le-sa suak a, eite lakah amah a teng hi. Eite in ama minthanna – Pa kiang pana hong pai thutak le hehpihna a dim Tapad neihsun minthanna i mu khin hi.
Amah tawh kisai John in teci a pang hi. Amah in, “‘Kei nunga hong pai pa, kei ma-a om khin ahi manin amah in kei hong khup zo hi,’ ci-a ka genpa hih pa ahi hi,” ci-in kiko hi.
A kicing ama hehpihna panin eite khempeuh in thupha khat khit khat i ngah hi.
Ahang in, Moses tungtawnin thukham kipia hi. Jesu Khrist tungtawnin hehpihna le thutak hong pai ahi hi.
Kuamah in Pasian a mu ngei kei hi. Ahi hangin Pa kianga om Tapa neihsun beke f in amah a kitheisak zo hi.
Tu-in Jerusalem a Jew-te in, John kua hiam cih a dong dingin siampite le Levi-te ama kiangah a sawl uh ciangin ama teci panna hih ahi hi.
Amah ki-im loin teltakin kipulak a, “Kei, Khrist ka hi kei hi,”g kici hi.

Amaute in, “Tua ahileh nang kua na hi hiam? Elijah na hi hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi. Amah in, “Ka hi kei hi,” a ci hi. “Nang Kamsangpa pen na hi hiam?” ci-a a dot uh ciangin, Amah in, “Ka hi kei hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
A tawpna ah amaute in, “Nang kua na hi hiam? Ko hong sawlte kianga ka gen kik ding uh dawnna khat hong nei in. Nang kua kici na hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi.
John in Isaiah kammalte zangin dawng a, “‘Topa ading lampi na tangsak un,’ ci a gamlaka kiko pa aw, keimah ka hi hi,”h a ci hi.
Tua ciangin a kisawl Pharisee-te pawlkhat in,
"Khrist lah hi lo, Elijah lah hi lo, tua Kamsangpa lah hi lo na hileh bang hangin baptise na hi hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi.
John in, “Keimah in tui ini ka baptize hi. Ahi hangin note lakah na theih loh uh mi khat a om hi.
Amah ka nunga hong pai pa ahi hi; ama khedapkhau sut ding nangawnin ka cin zo kei hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Hihte khempeuh John baptisena mun Jordan galkhat lam Bethany khua a thupiang ahi hi.
A zing ciangin ama lam manawh a Jesu hong pai John in a muh ciangin, “En un, leitung mawhna a puakhia Pasian Tuuno!
‘Ka nunga hong pai pa, ka mai-a omsa ahi manin kei hong khup zo hi,’ ci-a ka kiko lai-a ka genpa hih pa ahi hi.
Kei zong amah ka thei kei hi. Ahi hangin baptise-a kong paina pen Israel-te tunga amah a kipulak nading ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin John in teci panga: “Vantung panin vakhu bangin Kha hong kumsuka, ama tunga khawlden ka mu hi.
Baptize dinga kei hong sawlpa, ‘Kha hong kumsukin ama tunga a khawlna pa pen Khasiangtho-a hong baptize ding pa ahi hi,’ ci-in kei hong hilh lo hileh amah ka thei kei ding hi.
Ken ka mu khin ta a, Pasian Tapa hi, cih teci ka pang hi,” ci-in a gen hi.
A zing ciangin John a nungzuite lakah nih tawh tua lai-ah a om kik uh hi.
Amah in Jesu hong pai a muh ciangin, “En un, Pasian’ Tuuno!” a ci hi.
A nungzuite in hih thu a zak uh ciangin Jesu nung a zui uh hi.
Jesu kihei-a, amaute in a nung a zuih uh a muh ciangin, “Bang deih na hi uh hiam?” ci-in a dong hi. Amaute in, “Rabbi, (Siapa cihna) nang koi-a taam na hi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
Amah in, “Hong pai le uh cin na mu ding uh hi,” ci-in a dawng hi. Amaute va pai uh a, a omna a mu uh hi. Amah tawh tua ni a taam khawm uh hi. Tua hun nai sawmna pawl ahi hi.
John thugen za-a Jesu nung a zui nihte lakah Simon, Peter sanggampa Andrew khat ahi hi.
Andrew in a hih masak pen a sanggampa Simon zonga, “Messiah (Khrist cihna) ka mu zo uh hi,” ci-in a va gen ahi hi.
Tua ciangin Jesu kiangah amah a paipih hi. Jesu in amah en a, “Nang John tapa Simon na hi hi, na min ‘Cephas’(a kileh ciang Peterj)kici ding hi,” a ci hi.
A zing ciangin Jesu in Galilee lamah pai a sawm hi. Philip mu-a, “Ka nung hong zui in,” a ci hi.
Andrew le Peter mah bangin Philip zong Bethsaida khuapi mi mah ahi hi.
Philip in Nathanael a muh ciangin, “Moses in Thukham sunga ama thu a gelh, kamsangte in zong amah tawh kisai a na gelh uh, Joseph tapa Nazareth mi Jesu ka mu zo uh hi,” a ci hi.
Nathanael in, “Nazareth e! Tua panin na hoih piang thei maw?” ci-in a dong hi. Philip in, “Hong pai inla hong en in,” a ci hi.
Nathanael ama kiang zuana pai Jesu in a muh ciangin, “Hih lai-ah a sunga khialhna khat beek a om lo Israel mi taktak khat a om hi,” ci-in a gen hi.
Nathanael in, “Kei bang hong ci theih na hi hiam?” ci-in a dong hi. Jesu in, “Philip in nang hong sap ma, theikung nuai-a na om lai-in kong thei zo hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Nathanael in, “Rabbi, nang Pasian Tapa na hi hi. Israel Kumpipa na hi hi,” ci-in a genkhia hi.
Jesu in, “Theikung nuai-ah nang kong mu zo hi, ci-a kong gen manin na umk hi. Tua sanga thupizaw nate na mu ding hi,” a ci hi.
Amah in, “Nangl thutak kong geninah: Van kihongin, Mihing Tapa tungah Pasian vansawltakte a kumsuk le a kahto nam mu ding hi,” ci-in a genbeh lai hi.
A ni thum ni-in Galilee gam Cana ah mopawi khat a om hi. Tua lai-ah Jesu nu om a,
Jesu le a nungzuite zong tua mopawi ah kisam hi.
Lenggahzu a bei ciangin Jesu nu in, “Amaute’n lenggahzu a nei nawn kei uh hi,” ci-in a gen hi.
Jesu in, “Kong it numei aw, bang hanga kei hong kaaipaan na hi hiam, ka hun a tung nai kei hi,” a ci hi.
A nu in a nasemte kiangah, “Ama hong gen bangbang na hih un,” a ci hi.
Tua kiang nai-ah gallona sawmnih pan sawmthum a ta suang tuibel guk om-a tuate Jew-te biakna ngeina-a kisilna a zatte nam ahi hi.
Nasemte kiangah Jesu in, “Tuibel sungah tui dim un,” ci a, amaute in agong ciang a dim uh hi.
Tua khit ciangin amah in amaute kiangah, “Bang zah hiam khat suakkhia unla, pawi thusapa kiangah va puak un,” a ci hi. Amaute in a cih bangin a hih uh hi.
Pawi thusapa in tui, lenggahzu a kisuaksak pen a ciam hi. Tui a dim nasemte in a theih uh hangin amah in lenggahzu koi pan kingah cih a thei zo kei hi. Tua ciangin zipipa sam tuama,
"Mi khempeuh in lenggahzu alim pente hawm masa a, lenglate in a kham khit ciangin a lim lote hawm hi. Nang na hileh tu dong alim pente na sit lai hi,” a ci hi.
Jesu nalamdang bawlte lakah a masa pen hih Galilee gam Cana-a a bawl ahi hi. Amah in a minthanna tua bangin kilaaka, a nungzuite in amah a um uh hi.
Hih khit ciangin a nu, a sanggamte le a nungzuite tawh Capernaum ah a paisuk uh hi. Tua lai-ah ni tawmkha a taam uh hi.
Jew-te Paisan pawi hun a tun dektak ciangin, Jerusalem ah Jesu a pai to hi.
Biakinnpi huang sungah bawngte, tuute le vakhu zuak-a omte le sum khek-a tu midangte a mu hi.
Amah in satna khauhual tep nei bawl-a, tuute, bawngte le mi khempeuh biakinnpi huang sung panin a hawlkhia hi. Sum khekte dangka-tangte thehthangsaka, a sabuaite uh a lumletsak hi.
Amah in vakhu zuakte kiangah, “Hihte hih mun panin lakhia un. Bang hangin ka Pa inn van zuakna mun suaksak ngam na hi uh hiam!” a ci hi.
A nungzuite in, “Na inn ading ka aam luatna in kei hong netum ding hi,”b ci-a kigelh thu a phawk uh hi.
Tua ciangin Jew-te in, “Hihte khempeuh na hih theih nading thuneihna na neih lam ka theih nadingun kote nalamdang khat hong lak in,” ci-in a kal uh hi.
Jesu in, “Hih biakinnpi susia un, ni thum sungin ka ding kiksak ding hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Jew-te in, “Hih biakinnpi lam nading kum sawmli le kum guk a sawt hi. Nang ni thum sungin dingsak zo ding na hi hiam?” a ci kik uh hi.
Ahi hangin Jesu gen biakinnpi pen, ama pumpi ahi hi.
Misi panin amah a kithawhsak ciangin a nungzuite in hih a gensa thute a phawk kik uh hi. Tua ciangin Laisiangtho le Jesu gensa thute a um uh hi.
Paisan Pawi sung Jerusalem a, a om laitakin, a lim lamdang bawlte mi tampi in mu uh a, ama min a um uh hi.c
Ahi hangin Jesu in mi khempeuh thei ahi manin amaute tungah a ki-ap kei hi.
Amah in mihing lungsim sunga omte thei khina, mihing in mihing thu a gen ding kisam lo hi.
Jew-te vaihawm pawlte lakah Nicodemus kici Pharisee-te khat a om hi.

Amah zanin Jesu kiangah va pai-a, “Rabbi aw, Pasian kiang pana hong pai siapa na hi cih ka thei uh hi. Ahang in, Pasian in a ompih kei leh kuamah in na bawl lim lamdangte a bawl thei kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Jesu in a dawnna in, “Thutak kong geninah, ‘Mi khatpeuh a suah kika kei leh Pasian gam a mu thei kei hi,” a ci hi.
Nicodemus in, “A khangham khinsa mi khat bangci in suak kik thei ding ahi hiam?” ci-in dong a, “A nih veina a suak dingin a nu sungah lut kik thei lo takpi mah ding hi!” a ci hi.
Jesu in, “Thutak kong geninah, tui le Kha-a suak kik lote peuhmah Pasian gamah a lut thei kei hi.
Ci-le-sa in ci-le-sa mah piangsaka, Khab in kha mah a piangsak hi.
Nangc suahkiksak pelmawh ding na hi hi ‘kong cih lamdang sa kei in.
Huih, a utna peuhah a nung hi. Aging na za hi, ahi hangin koi pan hong nung a, koi lamah nung ding cih na thei kei hi. Kha pana piang mi peuhmah tua bang ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Nicodemus in, “Hih thu bangci pian theih ding hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
Jesu in, “Nang Israel-te siapa hi napi hih nate thei lo na hi hiam?
Thutak kong geninah, kote in ka theih uh ka gen uh a, ka muhsa uh teci ka pang uh hi.
Note kiangah leitung nate thu ka gen hangin na um kei uh hi. Tua ahileh vantung nate thu ka gen hangin bangci up thei ding na hi uh hiam?
Vantung pana hong pai Mihing Tapad longal vantungah kuamah a pai ngei kei hi.
Moses in gamlakah gul a khai bang tektekin Mihing Tapa kikhai ding hi.
Amah a um mite khempeuh in, nuntak tawntungna a neih theih nading ahi hi.e
Pasian in leitung it lua ahi manin, a Tapa a um khempeuh mangthang lo-a nuntak tawntungna a neih nadingin a Tapa khat neihsunf a pia hi.
Ahang in, leitung mawhpaihsak dingin Pasian in a Tapa leitungah a sawl kei hi. Ama tung tawnin leitung a honkhia dingin a sawl hizaw hi.
Amah a um khempeuh a kimawhpaih kei hi. Ahi hangin amah a um lo mi peuhmah Pasian Tapag khat neihsun a min um lo ahi manin mawh paihsa ahi hi.
Thutanna hih ahi hi: Leitungah Khuavak hong tung zo hi, ahi hangin mihingte in a gamtatnate uh gilo ahi manin khuavak a it tangun khuamial a it uh hi.
Gitlohna a hih mi peuhmah in a gamtatnate a kipholak ding lau ahi manin khuavak mudah a, khuavak ah a lut kei ding hi.
Ahi hangin thutaka a nungta mi peuhmah, a gamtatna khempeuh Pasian tungtawna sem a hina teltaka a kilat nadingin khuavak ah a lut hi,”h a ci hi.
Hih teng khit ciangin Jesu le a nungzuite Judea gam sungah pai uh a, tua lai-ah amaute tawh tawlkhat sung taamin a baptise uh hi.
Tu-in John in zong Salim kiang Aenon munah a baptise hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh, tua munah tui tam ahi manin a kibaptise dingin mite va pai den uh hi.
(Hih pen thong sunga John a kikhum ma ahi hi).
John nungzuite le Jewi pawlkhat kikalah biakna ngeina zui-a kisilna tawh kisai-in kiselna a piang hi.
Amaute John kiangah pai uh a, “Rabbi aw, Jordan gala na ompihpa – ama thu na genpa in baptise-a mi khempeuh in amah zuan uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Hih thu ah John in, “Mihingte in vantung pana kipiate bek ngah thei hi.
‘Kei, Khristj ka hi kei hi. Ama mai-a hong kisawlpa ka hi hi,’ ci-a ka gen note mahmah in teci na pang thei uh hi.
Mo pen zineipa aa ahi hi. Zineipa lawmpa in zineipa kithuahpihin ngak-a, zineipa aw a ngai hi; zineipa aw a zak ciangin lungnopna tawh a kidim hi. Tua lung nopna kei aa hi-a tu-in kicing ta hi.
Amah lian semsem dinga, kei ka neu semsem ding hi.
"Tunglam pana hong paipa na khempeuh tungah a om hi. Leitung pana hong paipa leitung aa hi-a leitung mi bangin thu a gen hi. Van tung pana hong paipa ahileh mi khempeuh tungah a om hi.
Amah in a muhsa le a zaksa teci panga, ahi hangin a teci panna kuamah in a sang kei hi.
Ama teci panna a sang mi in Pasian thutak ahi hi, cih a thukimpih ahi hi.
Ahang in, Pasian sawlpa in Pasian thute a gen hi. Pasiank in ama tungah ciangtan loin Kha a pia hi.
Pa in Tapa it a; na khempeuh a khutah a koih hi.
Tapa a um mi peuhmah in nuntak tawntungna a nei hi; ahi hangin Tapa a nial peuhmah in nuntakna a mu kei ding hi; ahang in, Pasian thangpaihna ama tungah a om hi,”l a ci hi.
John sangin Jesu in nungzui tam ngahzaw, tam baptise zaw hi, ci-in Pharisee-te in a za uh hi.
A taktakin Jesu hi loin a nungzuite in a baptise uh hizaw hi.
Topa in hih thu a zak ciangin Judea gam nusia-a, Galilee gamah khat vei a pai kik hi.
Amah Samaria gam tawnin a pai kul hi.
Tua hi-a Jacob in a tapa Joseph adingin a piakna mun kiang Samaria a khuapi khat, Sychar kici ah a tung hi.
Tua lai-ah Jacob tuikhuk a om hi. Jesu a khualzinna-in gim a, tuikhuk kiangah a tu hi. Tua hun pen nai gukna pawl ahi hi.
Samaria numei khat tui tawi-in va pai a, Jesu in ama kiangah, “Ka dawn ding tui nong pia diam?” a ci hi.
(A nungzuite an lei dingin khuapi sungah paikhin uh hi.)
Samaria numei in, “Nang Jew mi hi-in, kei Samaria numei ka hi hi, bangci-a tui dawn ding hong ngen na hi hiam?” a ci hi. (Ahang in, Samaria mite tawh Jew-te kithuah lo uh hi.a)
Jesu in, “Pasian letsong thei-in, na kianga tui hong ngenpa thei hi lecin, ama kiangah na ngen zaw ding a, amah in a nungta tui hong pia khin zo ding hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Numei in, “Sia aw, tuikhuk lah thuka, na khai nading bangmah na neih loh pi hih a nungta tui koi pan ngah thei ding na hi hiam?
Amah mah le a tate, a tuuhonte, a ganhonte in a dawnna uh, hih tuikhuk hong piapa ka pa uh Jacob sangin lianzaw na hi hiam?” a ci hi.
Jesu in, “Hih tui a dawnte peuhmah a dangtak kik ding hi;
ahi hangin kei piak tui a dawn mi peuhmah a dangtak ngei nawn kei ding hi. Ken ka piak tui, ama sungah tuinak suakin nuntak tawntungna dongin a phulto taktak ding hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Numei in ama kiangah, “Sia aw, ka dangtak nawn loh nading le hih muna tui khai-a ka pai nawn loh nadingin, tua tui kei hong pia in,” a ci hi.
Amah in tuanu kiangah, “Pai-in na pasal va sam inla, hong pai kik in,” a ci hi.
Amah in, “Pasal ka nei kei hi,” ci-in a dawng hi. Jesu in, “Pasal ka nei kei hi, na cih amaan hi,
a taktakin pasal nga na nei zo a, tu-a na neih pa pen na pasal a hi kei hi. Tu-a na gen pak maan mahmah hi,” a ci hi.
Numei in, “Sia aw, kamsang khat na hilam ka thei thei hi.
Ka pate un hih mualtungah bia uh a, ahi hangin no Jew-te in: Jerusalem bekah kibia thei hi, na ci se uh hi,” a ci hi.
Jesu in, “Numei aw, kei hong um in. Hih mual tung ahi a, Jerusalem ah ahi zongin Pa na biak loh hun uh hong tung ding hi.
No Samaria mite in na theih lohpi uh na bia uh hi; kote in ka theih uh ka bia uh hi. Ahang in, hotkhiatna, Jew-te pan ahi hi.
Ahi hangin a bia taktakte in a kha le thutak a, Pa a biak hun uh hong tung ding tham loin tu-in a tung zo hi, ahang in, tua banga biate bek Pa in a zong hi.
Pasian in kha ahi hi. Amah a biate in kha le thutakin a bia pelmawh ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua numei in, “Tua Messiah (Khrist kici) hong pai ding cih ka thei hi. Amah hong pai ciangin eite tungah na khempeuh hong telgen ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Jesu in, “Amah pen tu-a nang hong hopih pa ka hi hi,” a ci hi.

Tua khit phetin a nungzuite tung kik uh a, numei tawh a kiho a muh uh ciangin lamdang a sa uh hi. Ahi hangin khat beek in, “Bang deihna hiam?” ahikeh “Bang hang tuanu hopih na hi hiam?” ci-in a dong kei uh hi.
Tua ciangin tua numei in tuibel nusia in khuapi sungah pai kik a, mite kiangah,
"Hong pai un, ka hihsa khempeuh kei tunga hong genpa khat hong en un. Hih pa Khristb hi kha lo ding hiam?” a ci hi.
Amaute khuapi panin paikhia uh a, ama lam a zuan uh hi.
Tua kalin a nungzuite in, “Rabbi aw, bang khatpeuh ne in,” ci-in a sawl uh hi.
Ahi hangin amah in amaute kiang ah, “A thu bangmah na theih loh uh an nek ding ka nei hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin a nungzuite in, “Mi khatpeuh in an na puak zo hi ve maw?” a kici uh hi.
Jesu in, “Kei hong sawlpa deihna bang sep ding le tua nasep ka zawh ding, ka an ahi hi,” a ci hi.
"Note in, ‘tu zawh kha li ciangin an lak hun ta ding hi,’ ci hi lo na hi uh hiam? Note kong hilh hi, khuadakin lote en dih un! Ante min khin in lak hun ta hi.
Tu nangawn in buh atpa in thaman a sang hi. A vawh pa le a at pa a lungdam khawm theih nadingin tu nangawnin tawntung nuntakna ading an a la hi.
‘Mi khat in vawh a, midang khat in a at hi,’ kici in thumaan ahi hi.
Na sep loh uh at dingin note kong sawl hi. Midangte in nakpi-in na sem uh a, amau sep gah note in na at uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua numei in, “Ka hih ngeisa khempeuh hong gen hi,” ci-a teci a panna hangin tua khuapi a Samaria mite tampi in amah a um uh hi.
Tua ciangin Samaria mite ama kiangah pai-in amaute kiangah a taam nadingin kho uh a, ni nih a taam hi.
Ama thugente hangin thu-um tampi a kibehlap hi.
Amaute in tua numei kiangah, “Nang hong genna hang bek-a um ka hi nawn kei uh a, ko mahmah in tu-in ka za uh a, hih mipa, leitung Honpa taktak hi, cih ka thei uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
A ninih ni khit ciangin Galilee zuanin a pai hi.
(Jesu mahmah in, kamsangpa in ama gamah pahtawina ngah lo hi, cih a kawkkhia khin hi.)
Galilee ah a tun ciangin Galilee mite in amah a na muak uh hi. Amaute, Jerusalem a Paisan Pawi hun sungin va om kha uh ahi manin a hihsate khempeuh a mu zo uh hi.
Tui, lenggahzu a suahsakna mun Galilee gam Cana ah khat vei va hawh kik hi. Tua lai-ah kumpi nasem ulian khat oma, a tapa Capernaum ah cina-in a lum hi.
Hih pa in, Judea panin Galilee ah Jesu tung zo cih a zak ciangin ama kiangah va pai a, a si dektak a tapa a va damsak nadingin a thum hi.
Jesu in ama kiangah, “No mihingte in na lamdang le a lamdangte na muh loh ngalun na um ngei kei ding uh hi,” ci-in a gen hi.
Tua kumpi nasem ulianpa in, “Sia aw, ka ta a sih ma-in hong paisuk in” a ci hi.”
Jesu in, “Pai lel in, na tapa nungta ding hi,” a ci hi. Tuapa in Jesu thugen muangpah a, a paikhia hi.
Amah lamkal ah a om laitakin a nasemte in a tapa nungta hi, cih thu tawh amah a na dawn uh hi.
Amah in a tapa noptuam hun a kan ciangin amaute in, “Zanni a nai sagihna hunin nattun a dam hi,” a ci uh hi.
Jesu in, “Na tapa a nungta ding hi,” a cih hun lian hi, cih a pa in a thei hi. Tua ciangin amah le a innkuanpihte in a um uh hi.
Hih pen Judea pan Galilee ah Jesu, tun zawh nalamdang a bawl a nihna ahi hi.
Tua nung a sawt loin Jew-te pawi sim dingin Jerusalem ah Jesu a paito hi.
Jerusalem a, Tuu kongpi kici kiangah Aram pau-a Bethsaidaa kici tuili khat a om hi. Tua tuili kimkotah talap nga a om hi.
Hih munah a lumden mittawte, khebaite, pumzawte, mipoi tampi a om uh hi.b
A hunhunin Topa vansawltak kumsukin tui va lok zelzel hi. Tua tui a tat ciangin a kidiah masa penpen a cinatna peuhpeuh a dam hi.c
Tuate lakah kum sawm-thum-le-giat sung a zawngkhal khat a om hi.
Jesu in tuapa mu-a, tua munah tua bangin sawtveipitak lum hi, cih thei-in a kiangah, “Na dam nuam hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
Tua mi zawngkhalpa in, “Sia aw, tui a tat ciangin, tui sungah hong diah ding kuamah ka nei kei hi. Kidiah dinga ka kithawi ciangin kei ma-ah midang khat na kidiah khin zel hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Jesu in ama kiangah, “Ding in, na phek la inla pai in,” a ci hi.
Tuapa thakhatin dampah-a a phek la-in a pai hi. Hih thupiang Sabbath ni khat ahi hi.
Tua ahitak ciangin Jew-te in a kidam sakpa kiangah “Sabbath ni ahi hi, thukham in phek na puak ding kham hi,” a ci uh hi.
Ahi hangin amah in, “Kei hong damsakpa in ka kiangah, ‘Na phek la inla pai in,’ hong ci hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in, “‘Na phek la inla pai in,’ hong ci kua hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi.
Tua lai-a om mihonte lakah Jesu lutmangpah ahi manin a cidampa in a damsakpa kua hiam, cih a thei kei hi.
Tua nung ciangin Jesu in amah biakinnpi ah mu a, “En in, na dam kik hi, mawhna na bawl nawn kei in, tua hikeileh nang tungah a siazaw hong tung kha ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua mipa paikhia-a, Jew-te kiangah amah a damsakpa Jesu ahilam a gen hi.
Tua ciangin Jesu in hih nate Sabbath ni-a sem ahi manin Jew-te in amah a bawlsia uh hi.
Jesu in amaute kiangah, “Ka pa in tuni mahmah dongin na sem tawntunga, kei zong ka sem hi,” a ci hi.
Jesu in Sabbath ni a tan loh man bek hi loin Pasian nangawn ama Pa a cihna hang le Pasian tawh a kikim-a a kikoihna thute hangin Jew-te in amah thah ding a hanciam semsem uh hi.

Jesu in amaute hih in a dawng hi: “Thutak kong geninah, Tapa in amah guakin bangmah a hih thei kei hi; a Pa hih a muhsate bek hih thei hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh, Pa hih peuhpeuh Tapa in zong a hih hi.
Ahang in, Pa in Tapa it-a a hih khempeuh amah a lak hi. Himah hi, lamdang na sak dingun hihte sanga a lamdangzaw nangawn a lak lai ding hi.
Ahang in, Pa in misite nuntakna pia-in a thawhkiksak bangin Tapa in zong a piak nop mite tungah nuntakna a pia hi.
Tua banah, Pa in kuama tungah thu a khen kei hi, ahi hangin thukhenna khempeuh Tapa tungah a ap hi;
tua pen mi khempeuh in Pa a pahtawi bangin Tapa a pahtawi nading uh ahi hi. Tapa a pahtawi lote in amah a sawlpa, Pa pahtawi lo ahi hi.
"Thutak kong geninah, ka thugen za a, kei hong sawlpa a um peuh in nuntak tawntungna a nei hi; a kimawhpaih kei ding hi. Amah in sihna kantanin nuntakna ah tung zo hi.
Thutak kong geninah, misite in Pasian Tapa aw a zak hun hong tung dinga, tu-in zong hong tung zo hi; a zate a nungta ding hi.
Ahang in, Pa in amah mah-a nuntakna a neih bangin Tapa in zong amah mah-a nuntakna a neih nadingin a pia zo hi.
Amah Mihing Tapa ahi manin thukhen nading thuneihna amah in pia zo hi.
"Hih thu lamdang sa kei un, ahang in, amau han sunga omte in ama aw za in,
hong paikhiat hun hong tung dinga, a hoih a nasemte a nungta dingin tho ding uh hi. A tatsiate kimawhpaih dingin tho ding uh hi.
Kei thu guakin bangmah ka hih thei kei hi. Ka zak bangin thu ka khen hi.Tua ahi ciangin ka thukhenna atang hi. Ahang in, kei lungkim nading zong loin kei hong sawlpa lungkimna ka zong zaw hi.
"Kei thu ah kei le kei teci kipang leng, ka teci panna a kip kei ding hi.
Kei hong angvan teci pang midang khat om hi, kei thu teci panna a kip hi, cih ka thei hi.
"Note in John kiangah na kansak zo uh hi. Amah in thutak teci a pang hi.
Mihing teci panna ka sang hi, ka cihna hi loin note in hotkhiatna na ngah theih nadingun ka gen hizaw hi.
John pen meivak hi-a a kuang in khua a vaksak hi. Ama khuavak ah hun khat sung nopsak ding na teel uh hi.
"John teci panna sanga thugik zaw ka nei hi. Ahang in, Pa in zawh khit dinga hong piak tua ka nasep pen Pa in kei hong sawl ahina teci ahi hi.
Kei hong sawlpa Pa mahmah in kei tawh kisai teci a pang hi. Note in a aw na za ngei kei uh a, a mel zong na mu ngei kei uh hi.
Ama sawlpa um lo na hi manun a thu zong note sungah a teng kei hi.
Laisiangtho simna hangin nuntak tawntungna a kinei sa na hi manun limtakin na sind uh hi. Hih Laisiangtho, kei thu teci pang ahi hi.
Tua hi napi nuntakna ngah dingin kei kiangah nong pai nuam kei uh hi.
"Mite hong phatna ka sang kei hi.
Ahi hangin note kong thei hi. Note lungsungah Pasian itna na neih loh uh ka thei hi.
Ka Pa minin kong pai-a, note in nong sang kei uh hi. Ahi hangin midang khat ama minin hong pai leh, amah na sang ding uh hi.
Note khat le khat kiphatna kisangin, Pasian khat beke hong phatna ngah ding na sawm kei uh leh bangci up thei ding na hi uh hiam?
"Ahi hangin Pa mai-ah note hong mawhsak dingin hong ngaihsun kei un. Note hong mawhsak, na lametna uh a kingakna pa Moses ahi hi.
Moses in kei thu gelh zo ahi manin amah na up uh leh kei zong nong up ding uh ahi hi.
Ahi zongin ama gelhsate na up loh nung sangun kei gente bangci up thei ding na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua nung ciangin Galilee Tuipi (tua pen Tiberias tuipi) galkhat lam pekah Jesu a galkah hi.
Mihon tampi in cinate tunga a hihsa lim lamdangte mu uh ahi manin amah a zui uh hi.
Tua ciangin mual pangah Jesu paito-a a nungzuite tawh a tu hi.
Jew-te Paisan Pawi hun a nai ta hi.
Jesu a daktoh leh ama lam zuana pai mihonpite a mu hi. Philip kiangah, “Hih mihonpite nek ding an koi-ah i lei ding hiam?” a ci hi.
Amah in a hih ding a lungsim sungah theikhol khin napi a zia-et nop manin a dot ahi hi.
Philip in, “Hih teng in kam khat ciat a nek ding uh kha giat thamana in zong a lei zo kei ding hi!” ci-in a dawng hi.
A nungzui dangte khat, Simon Peter sanggampa Andrew in,
"Hih lai-ah naupangno khat in mangbuh ham lum nga le ngasa neu nih a nei hi. Ahi zongin mihing hizah in bang tham a ne ding uh ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
Jesu in, “Mipite na tusak un,” a ci hi. Tua munah lopa a tam hi. A tu mi peuhmah tul nga bang a pha hi.
Tua ciangin Jesu in anlum la a, lungdam ko-in a tu mihonpite lakah a duh zahzah uh a luisak hi. Tua mah bangin ngasa zong a hih hi.
Amaute in a duh zahzah uh a nek khit pikpek uh ciangin a nungzuite kiangah, “Khamval themte khawm kik un. A thelthang khat beek omsak kei un,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin mangbuh ham lum nga a nete in a khamval uh athem a khop uh leh bawmta sawm le nih a pha hi.
Jesu nalamdang bawl mite in a muh khit uh ciangin, “Hih pa, leitunga hong pai ding Kamsangpa hi takpi hi,” a ci pan uh hi.
Amaute in zawhthawh thu-in Jesu, kumpi-in koih nuam uh ahilam Jesu in a theih ciangin mual tungah a kihem khia hi.
Nitak ciangin a nungzuite tuilipi ah paisukin,
gunkuang ah tuang uh a, tuilipi kantanin, Capernaum lamah a galkah uh hi. Tua hunin khua mial ta-a, Jesu lah a mau kiang a tung nai kei hi.
Huih khauh nunga, tui nakpi-in a kilok hi.
Amaute in tai thum ahikeh tai thum le alangb a hot khit uh ciangin gunkuang lam manawh in Jesu tui tunga pai mu uh a, a lau mahmah uh hi.
Ahi hanign amaute kiangah, “Keimah ka hi hi, lau kei un,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in gunkuang sungah amah tuangsak nuam uh a, tua khit phetin a manawhna uh tuigei-ah gunkuang a tung pah hi.
A zing ciangin tuilipi galkhat-a om mihonpite in, gunkuang khat bek tua lai-ah om a, Jesu lah a nungzuite tawh tuang khawm loin amauteng guak a pai uh a thei uh hi.
Tua ciangin Tiberias pan gunkuang pawlkhat va pai-a, Topa in lungdam a koh khit ciangin anlum a nekna mun kiang uh, mun khatah a khawlsak uh hi.
Mihonpite in Jesu le a nungzuite tua lai-ah a om loh lam a theih uh ciangin gunkuang tungah tuang leuleu uh a, Jesu zong dingin Capernaum ah a pai uh hi.
Tuilipi galkhatah amah a muh uh ciangin amaute in, “Rabbi aw, cik-a hihtak tung na hi hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi.
Jesu in thutak kong geninah, lim lamdang na muh manun kei hong zong na hi kei uh a, anlum ne in na gilvah manun kei hong zong na hi uh hi.

A sia thei an ngah nadingin na na sep uh sangin Mihing Tapa hong piak ding, nuntak tawntungna donga kimang ding an ngah nadingin sem zaw un. Pa Pasian in amah a sanna ciamtehna ama tungah a koih zo hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in, “Pasian deih na ka sep nadingun bang hih kul ahi hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi.
Jesu in, “Ama hong sawlpa up ding, Pasian’ na sepna ahi hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in, “Tua ahileh ka muh uh cianga nang kong up theih nadingun lim lamdang bang nong lak ding hiam? Bang hih ding na hi hiam?
‘Amah in vantung panin amaute nek ding anlum a pia hi,’c ci-a kigelh bangin ka pute un gamlakah manna a ne uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Jesu in amaute kiangah, “Thutak kong geninah, vantung pana anlum hong pia Moses hi lo hi. Vantung pana anlum taktak hong pia, ka Pa ahi hi.
Ahang in, Pasian anlum ahileh vantung pan hong paisuk in, leitung khempeuh nuntakna a piapa ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Amaute in, “Sia aw, tu-a kipan tua anlum ko hong pia in,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin Jesu in telgen a, “Kei mah, nuntakna anlum ka hi hi. Kei kianga hong paite a gilkial ngei kei dinga, kei hong umte a dangtak ngei kei ding hi.
Ahi hangin kong gensa bangin note in hong mu khin napi nong um kei lai uh hi.
Ka Pa hong piakte khempeuh ka kiangah hong pai dinga, ka kianga hong pai khempeuh ka hawlkhia ngei kei ding hi.
Ahang in, kei deih bang sem ding hi loin kei hong sawlpa deih banga sem dingin vantung pan kong paisuk hi.
Kei hong sawlpa deih na ahileh, kei hong piak khempeuh khat zong mansuah lo a, nitawp ni ciangin amaute ka thawhsak ding ahi hi.
Ahang in, ka Pa deihna ahileh Tapa mu a, amah a um peuhpeuh in nuntak tawntungna nei-a, ni nunung ni ciangin amah ka thawhsak ding ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Amah in, “Vantung pana hong pai suk anlum ka hi hi,” a cihna hangin Jew-te in amah a phunsan uh hi.
Amaute in, “A nu le a pa i theih mahmah Joseph tapa Jesu hi lo hiam. Bangci a, ‘Vantung pana hong paisuk ka hi’ ci thei ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
Jesu in, “Note phun zelzul nawn kei un.
Kei hong sawlpa, Pa in a huai lohte khat beek kei kiangah hong pai thei lo dinga, hong paite lah ni nunung ni ciangin ka thosak ding hi.
Kamsangte laibu sungah, ‘Pasian in amaute khempeuh a hilh ding hi,’d ci-in kigelh hi. Ka Pa thu ngai-a ama kianga a sin khempeuh ka kiangah hong pai hi.
Pasian kiang pana hong pai mi khat longal Pa a mu ngei a om kei hi. Amah bek in Pa a mu zo hi.
Thutak kong geninah, a um mi in nuntak tawntungna a nei hi.
Keimah, nuntakna anlum ka hi hi.
Na pute na pate un gamlak ah manna a nek uh hangin a si thei lai veve uh hi.
Ahi hangin mite in ne-a, a sih theih nawn lohna uh vantung pana hong paisuk anlum hih lai-ah a om hi.
Keimah in vantung pana hong pai a nungta anlum ka hi hi. Mi khat in hih anlum a nek leh a nungta tawntung ding hi.Hih anlum in leitung buppi nuntak nadinga ka piak ding ka sa ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Jew-te in, “Hih pa in i nek dingin a sa bang hong ci piak theih ding hiam?” ci-in nakpi-in a kinial uh hi.
Jesu in amaute kiangah, “Thutak kong geninah, Mihing Tapa a sa ne-a, a si na dawn kei uh leh note sungah nuntakna na nei kei ding uh hi.
Ka sa ne a, ka si a dawn peuhmah in nuntak tawntungna a nei hi. Ni nunung ni ciangin tua mi ka thokiksak ding hi.
Ahang in, ka sa, an taktak hi-a ka si dawn ding taktak ahi hi.
Ka sa ne a ka si a dawn peuhmah kei sungah tenga, ama sungah kei ka teng hi.
A nungta Pa in kei hong sawl-a, Pa hangin kei ka nuntak bangin kei-a kivak peuhmah kei hangin a nungta ding hi.
Hih in Vantung pana hong kumsuk anlum ahi hi. Na pute na pate un manna ne uh a, a si veve uh hi; ahi hangin hih anlum-a kivakte a nungta tawntung ding hi,” a ci hi.
Hih thu, Capernaum a synagogue ah thu a hilh laitaka a gen ahi hi.
A nungzuite tampi in hih thu a zak uh ciangin, “Hih in a khauh thuhilhna ahi hi. Kua in sang thei ding hiam?” a ci uh hi.
Hih thu ah a nungzuite phun uh cih a theih ciangin Jesu in amaute kiangah, “Hih thu in no hong dong ahi hiam?
Note in Mihing Tapa ama-a a omna munah a kahtoh mu le uh cin, bang na ci tazen uh tam!
Kha in nuntakna a pia hi, ci-le-sa bangmahin kimang lo hi. Note tunga kong gen thute khae hi-a amaute nuntakna ahi hi.
Ahi zongin note lakah a um lo na om lai uh hi,” a ci hi. Ahang in, Jesu in a kipatcilin amaute kua teng in um lo dinga, kua in lehhek ding cih a thei khol khin hi.
Amah in a gen ban zom lai-a, “Pa in a hihtheihsakte longal kuamah ka kiangah hong pai thei lo hi, ka cihna ahang hih ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Hih huna kipan a nungzui mi tampi nunghei-in amah a zui nawn kei uh hi.
Jesu in Sawm-le-nihte kiangah, “No zong kei nong taisan nuam uh hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
Simon Peter in, “Topa ko kua kiang ah pai ding ka hi uh hiam? Nangmah in nuntak tawntungna thu na nei hi.
Pasian’ Mi Siangtho na hi cih kong um uh a, kong thei uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Jesu in, “No, Sawm-le-nihte hong teel khin hi lo ka hi hiam? Hi napi note lak nangawn ah khat, dawi mangpa ahi hi!” ci-in a dawng hi.
(Sawm-le-nihte lakah khat ahi hanga a nung cianga a lehhek ding pa Simon Isacariot tapa Judas a genna ahi hi.)
Hih teng khit ciangin Jew-te in Jesu thah sawmin tua munah a ngak uh ciangin Judea pan kihemkhia-in Galilee kim tengah a vak kawikawi hi.
Ahi hangin Jew-te Biakbuk Pawi hun nai ta a,
Jesu sanggamte in, “Na nungzuite in nalamdang na bawlte a muh theih nadingun hih mun nusia in Judea ah na pai ding kilawm hi.
Tangpi theih tham mi a hi nuam peuhmah in a simthamin na a sem ngei kei hi. Hih nate hih na hi nungsang, leitung mite mai-ah kilakkhia in,”a ci uh hi.
Ahang in, ama sanggamte nangawn in amah a um kei uh hi.
Tua ahi ciangin Jesu in amaute kiangah, “Kei ading hun hoih a tung nai kei hi. No adingin hun khempeuh a hun ahi hi.
Leitung in no hong mudah thei kei ding hi. Ahi hangin a gamtat hoih lote lakkhia ka hi manin kei hong mudah hi.
Tua Pawi va sim un. Kei hun tung nai lo ahi ciangin tua Pawi simin ka pai naia kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Hihte a gen khit ciangin Galilee ah a taam lai hi.
Ahi zongin a sanggamte in pawi sim dinga a paisan khit uh ciangin mipite theih lohin amah zong va paisim hi.
Pawi bawlna phualah Jew-te in amah kan uh a, “Tua mipa koi-ah om hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi.
Mihonpite lakah ama thu kihuausim uh a, a kizel thang hi. Pawlkhatte in, “Amah mi hoih hi,” a ci uh hi. Adangte in, “Hi kei, amah’n mite a khem hi,” a ci uh hi.
Ahi hangin Jew-te kihtakna hangin ama thu kuamah in mipi zakin a genkhia kei uh hi.
Pawi bawlna alang bang a kiman ciangin biakinnpi tualah Jesu paito in thuhilh a kipan hi.
Jew-te in lamdang sa in, “Hih mipa in sinna nei lo napi hih bang theihna sang koi pan ngah hi ding hiam?” ci-in a kidong uh hi.
Jesu in, “Ka thuhilhte kei aa ahi kei hi. Hong sawlpa kiang pana hong pai ahi hi.
Mi khatpeuh in Pasian deihna hih ding a teel leh, ka thuhilhna Pasian pan hiam, ahikeh keima thu a gen ka hi hiam, cih a mukhia ding hi.
Amah leh amah-a thugen peuhmah in ama minphat nading zongin a gen hi. Ahi hangin amah a sawlpa min phat nading thu gen pa ahileh mi thutak hi a, ama thu ah zuauthu bangmah a om kei hi.
Moses in note thukham hong pia zo hi lo ahi hiam? Hi napi note khat beek in thukham na zui kei uh hi. Bang hangin kei thah hong sawm na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi.
Mihonte in, “Nang dawi lut na hi hi; kua in nang thah hong sawm ahi hiam?” ci-in a dawng uh hi.
Jesu in amaute kiangah, “Nalamdang khat ka bawl-a, na vekun lamdang na sa uh hi.
Ahi zongin Moses in vun-at ding thu hong piak manin (A taktakin Moses pana hong kipia hi loin pupite pan peka hong kipia hizaw hi.) Sabbath ni-in nau-pangte vun na atsak uh hi.
Sabbath ni-a naupangte vun-at in Moses thukham palsat lo ahileh bang hangin Sabbath ni-a mi ka damsiangsak ciangin ka tungah heh na hi uh hiam?
A pualam-a kilangkhia bek enin thu na khen kei unla, amaantakin thu na khen un,” a ci hi.
Tua laitakin Jerusalem mite pawl khat, thu dot ding kipan uh a, “Amaute in thah a sawm uh hih pa hi lo hiam?
Amah hiah om a, tangpi zakin thu gen napi, amaute in kam khat beek a ci ngam kei uh hi. Thunei vaihawmte in amah Khristb taktak hi, ci ta uh hi inteh maw?
Ahi hangin hih mipa koi pan hong pai cih i thei hi. Khrist hong pai ciangin amah koi pana hong pai cih kuamah in a thei kei ding hi,” a ci uh hi.

Tua hun Jesu in biakinnpi tual ah thu a hilh laitak hi-a, “Himah hi, kei nong thei uh hi. Koi pana hong pai cih zong nong thei uh hi. Kei thu-a hih lai-a om ka hi kei hi. Ahi hangin kei hong sawlpa a thumaan hi. Note in amah na thei kei uh hi.
Ahi hangin kei, ama kiang pan ka hi-a, amah in kei hong sawl ahi manin, amah ka thei hi,” ci-in a kikokhia hi.
Amaute in hih thu ah mat a sawm uh hi. Ahi hangin a hun tung nai lo ahi manin kuamah in ama tungah khut a nga kei hi.
Tua hi napi mipite lakah tampi in amah a um lai uh hi. Amaute in, “Khrist hong pai ciangin hih mipa bawl sangin lim lamdang zaw a bawl ding hiam?” a kici uh hi.
Ama thu tua banga mipite a kihuau sim uh Pharisee-te in a za uh hi. Tua ciangin siampi makaite le Pharisee-te in amah man dingin biakinnpi cingte a sawl uh hi.
Jesu in, “Note tawh hun tawm no sung bek ka om a, tua khit ciangin kei hong sawlpa kiangah ka pai ding hi.
Kei nong zong ding uh a, ahi hangin nong mu kei ding uh hi; ka omna ah nong pai thei kei ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Jew-te in, “Hih pa i muh theih lohna mun koi lai-ah pai sawm hiam? Greek-te laka kithehthang i mipihte lakah pai-in Greek-te hoh hilh ding ahi tam?
‘Kei nong zong ding uh a, ahi hangin nong mu kei ding uh hi; ka omna ah nong pai thei kei ding uh hi,’ a cih ciangin bang a cihnopna hi ding hiam?” a kici uh hi.
Pawi, a ni nunungpen le a thupi pen ni-in Jesu dinga, “A dangtak mi khatpeuh a om leh kei kiangah hong pai-in dawn ta hen.
Laisiangtho gensa bangin, kei hong um mi peuhmahd sung pan a nungta tui lui-in a luang ding hi,” ci-in nakpi-in a kiko hi.
Hih in amah a umte in a nung ciangin a ngah ding uh Kha a genna ahi hi. Jesu kipahtawi nai lo ahi manin tua hun dong Kha a kipia nai kei hi.
Ama thute a zak uh ciangin mi kimkhat in, “Hih pa tua Kamsangpa hi takpi hi,” a ci uh hi.
Adangte in, “Amah Khrist ahi hi,” a ci uh hi. Adang pawlkhatte leuleu in, “Bang ci-a, Galilee pan Khrist hong pai thei ding hiam?
‘Khrist pen David innkuane pan le David tenna khuapi Bethlehem pan hong pai ding hi,’ ci-in Laisiangtho in gen hi lo ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
Tua bangin Jesu hangin mihonpite a kikhen uh hi.
Pawlkhatte in amah a mat nop uh hangin ama tungah kuamah in khut a nga kei hi.
A tawpna ah, siampi makaite le Pharisee-te kiangah biakinnpi cingte ciah kik uh a, “Bang hangin amah hong paipih lo na hi uh hiam?” ci-in amaute in a dong uh hi.
A cingte in, “Hih mipa gen bangin kuamah in thu a gen ngei kei hi,” ci-in a pulak uh hi.
Pharisee-te in, “Note zong hong khem zo ta, na cihna uh maw?” ci-in a dongkhak uh hi.
Gam-ukte khempeuh ahikeh Pharisee-te khatpeuh in amah um uh ahi hiam?
Hi lo! Ahi hangin thukham neukha zong a thei lo hih mihonte – hamsiatna thuak ahi uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
A masa lai-a Jesu kianga a paingei amau mite Nicodemus in,
"I thukham sungah, ama thu za masa lo, a nasepna mu masa loin mi mawhpaih nading thu a om hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
Amaute in, “Nang zong Galilee pan na hi hiam? En lecin Galilee panin kamsangf hong pai lo hi, cih na mu ding hi,” ci-in a dawng uh hi.
Tua ciangin amaute a inn tek uah a ciah uh hi.
Jesu ahileh Olive Vum ah a pai hi.
Ni suah tungin amah biakinnpi tualah a kilang kik hi. Mi khempeuh a kimah kikhawm uh a, amaute thuhilh dingin a tu hi.
Thukham siate le Pharisee-te in angkawm kimlai a mat uh numei khat a va puak uh hi. Amaute in mihonpite mai-ah amah dingsak uh a,
Jesu kiangah, “Sia aw, hih numei a angkawm laitaka kiman ahi hi.
Thukham sungah Moses in tua bang numeite suanga den dingin thu a pia hi. Tu-in nang bang na gen ding hiam?” a ci uh hi.
Amah mawhmat theih nadingin hih dotna tawh a thangsiah uh hi. Ahi hangin Jesu kunsuka, a khutme in leilak a gelh hi.
Amaute in a dot cinten uh ciangin Jesu tutang toin amaute kiangah, “Note mawh nei lo khatpeuh a om leh tuapa in amah suangin deng masa hen,” a ci hi.
Amah kunsuk kik-a leilak a gelh hi.
Tua laitakin hih thu a zate a tek pente masa in khatkhatin paikhia uh a, Jesu le a kianga ding numei bek a om lai hi.
Jesu tutang to kik-a, “Numei aw, amaute koi-ah om uh hiam? Kuamah in hong mawhpaih lo hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
Numei in, “Kuamah in hong mawh paih kei, sia aw,” a ci hi. Jesu in, “Ken zong kong mawhpaih kei hi, tu-in pai inla, mawhna tawh na nuntakna pen na nusia in,” ci-in a thuhilh hi.
Jesu in mihonpi tungah thu a gen khit ciangin, “Keimah leitung khuavak ka hi hi. Kei hong zui peuhpeuh khuamial lakah pai loin nuntakna khuavak a nei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Pharisee-te in, “Hih thu ah nangma thu nangmah in teci na kipang hi. Na teci panna a kip kei hi,” ci-in a to uh hi.

Jesu in, “Keima thu keimah in teci ka pang zongin ka teci panna a kip hi. Ahang in, koi panin hong pai, koi lamah pai ding cih ka kithei hi. Ahi hangin note in kei, koi pana hong pai, koi-ah pai ding cih neukha zong na thei beek kei uh hi.
Note in mihing thukhen bangin na khen uh a, ken kuama tungah thu ka khen kei hi.
Ahi hangin ken thu ka khen leh kei guak-a khen hi lo ka hi manin ka thukhenna amaan hi. Kei hong sawlpa, Pa tawh ka ding khawm hi.
Note neih thukham sungah, ‘Mi nih in teci a pan nak leh kip hi,’ ci-in kigelh hi.
Keima thu kei le kei teci ka kipanga, ka teci dang khat, ka Pa kei hong sawlpa ahi hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.

Tua ciangin amaute in, “Na Pa koi-ah om hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi. Jesu in, “Note in kei ka hi-a, ka Pa ahi zongin na thei kei uh hi. Kei hong thei le uh cin, ka Pa zong na thei ding uh hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Hih thute biakinnpi huang sung, biakna-a kipia nate koihna munah, a hilh lai-a a gen ahi hi. Ama hun tung nai lo ahi manin kuamah in a man kei hi.
Jesu in khat vei genbeh lai-a, “Kei ka paikhiamang dinga, nong zong ding uh hi; note na mawhnate uh sungah na si ding uh hi. Ka paina ah nong pai thei kei ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Hih thu a gen ciangin Jew-te in, “Amah le amah kithat ding hi ding hiam? Bang dinga, ‘Ka paina munah nong pai thei kei ding uh hi ci hi ding hiam?” ci-in a kidong uh hi.
Jesu in a thugen ban zom lai-a, “Note nuai lam pan na hi uh a, kei, tung lam pan ka hi hi. Note hih leitung pana, na hi uh a kei, hih leitung pan ka hi kei hi.
Na mawhnate uh sungah na si ding uh hi, kong ci hi. Keimah tua ka cih paa ka hi cih na up kei uh leh na mawhnate uh sungah na si takpi ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Amaute in, “Nang kua na hi hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi. Jesu in, “Kong kipulak tawntung sa bang ka hi hi.
Note tungah thukhena gen ding tampi ka nei hi. Ahi hangin kei hong sawlpa muantham ahi manin ama tung pana ka zakte leitung buppi ka hilh hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
A Pa thu a gen ahilam amaute in a phawk thei kei uh hi.

Tua ciangin Jesu in, “Mihing Tapa na khaitoh khit uh ciangin kei a tua ci ding mah ka hilam nong thei ding uh hi. Pa in kei hong hilh teng bek ka gena, kei thu-in bangmah ka sep loh lam zong na thei ding uh hi.
Ama lungkimna bek sem ka hi manin, kei hong sawlpa kei tawh omkhawma, kei guak hong nusia kei hi,” a ci hi.
Amah a pau laitak nangawnin mi tampi in amah a um uh hi.
Jesu in amah a um Jew-te kiangah, “Ka hilhna na let uh leh ka nungzuite taktak na hi uh hi.
Tua ciangin thutak na thei ding uh a, tua thutak in note hong suaktasak ding hi,” a ci hi.
Amaute in, “Kote Abraham suanteb ka hi uh a, kuama sila ka suak ngei kei uh hi. Bangci a hong kisuaktasak ding ci thei na hi hiam?” ci-in amah a dong uh hi. lk 3:8
Jesu in, “Thutak kong geninah, mawhna a bawl peuhmah mawhna sila ahi hi.
Silate in, innkuan sungah munkip a nei kei hi. Ahi hangin tapa in a tawntungin innkuan sung mi ahi hi.
Tua ahi ciangin Tapa in note hong suaktasak leh na suakta taktak ding uh hi.
Note Abraham suan na hi uh kong thei hi. Ahi zongin ka thu note sungah tasak zo lo na hi manun kei hong that dingin na kiging khin zo uh hi.
Pa omna muna ka muhsate no tungah kong gen hi. Note in na pac uh tung pana na zakte uh na hih uh hi,” a ci hi.
Amaute in, “Ka pa uh Abraham ahi hi,” ci-in a dawng uh hi. Jesu in, “Note Abraham tate hi le uh cind Abraham septe na sem ding uh hi.
Tua bang ahileh Pasian tung pana ka zaksa thumaan a gen pa kei, thah nong sawm zel uh hi. Abraham in tua bangte a hih kei hi.
Na pa uh hih bangin note in na hih uh hi,” a ci hi. Amaute in, “Kote zawlta ka hi kei uh hi. Pa khat bek ka neih uh, Pasian mahmah ahi hi,” ci-in a sel uh hi.

Jesu in amaute kiangah, “Na Pa uh Pasian ahileh note in kei nong it ding uh hi. Ahang in, kei Pasian kiang pana hong pai ka hi-a, tu-in hiah ka om hi. Keima thu-a hong pai hi loin hong sawlpa thu-a hong pai ka hi hi.
Bang hang ka thu gen thei siang lo na hi uh hiam? Ka thu gen na za thei kei uh hi.

Note, na pa uh dawimangpa suan na hi uh hi. Tua ahi manin na pa uh deihna na tangtungsak nuam uh hi. Amah a cil panin tualthatpa hi-a, ama sungah thutak om lo ahi manin thutak a len kei hi. Amah zuau thei-a, zuauphuakte pa ahi manin zuau a gen ciangin ama pianpih pau-a pau ahi hi.
Ahi zongin thutak kong gen manin kei nong um kei uh hi!
Note khatpeuh in ka mawhna nong man thei uh hiam? Ken thutak hong gen ka hileh bang dinga kei hong um lo na hi uh hiam?
Pasian aa ahite in Pasian gente a za hi. Pasian aa hi lo na hi manun na za thei kei uh hi,” a ci hi.
Jew-te in, “Nang, Samaria mi hi in, dawi lut hi, kong cih uh maan lo ka hi uh hiam?” ci-in a dawng uh hi.
Jesu in, “Kei sungah dawi a lut kei hi. Ahi hangin ken ka Pa ka pahtawi-a, no kei nong pahtawi kei uh hi.
Ken keima minthanna ka zong kei hi; ahi hangin a zong khat om-a, amah thukhenpa ahi hi.
Thutak kong geninah ka thu a zui mi in sihna a mu ngei kei ding hi,” a ci hi.

Jew-te in hih thu a zak uh ciangin, “Dawi lut na hilam tu-in ka thei ta uh hi! Abraham si-a tua mah bangin kamsangte zong a si uh hi. Tua hi napi mi khatpeuh in na thu a zuih leh sihna ciam kha lo ding, na ci hi.
Ka pa uh Abraham sangin lianzaw na hi hiam? Amah si-a tua mah bangin kamsangte zong a si uh hi. Nang kua-a kingaihsun na hi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
Jesu in, “Kei le kei ka kiminthansak leh ka minthanna a mawkna a suak hi. Ka Pasian uh hi, na cih uh ka Pa in kei hong pahtawipa ahi hi.
Note in amah na theih loh uh hangin ken amah ka thei hi. Amah ka thei kei hi, ci leng note mah bangin zuauphuak ka hi ding hi. Ahi hangin amah ka thei-a a thu ka zui hi.
Na pa uh Abraham in ka ni a muh ding a ngaihsut ciangin a nuam hi; a mu a, a lungdam hi,” a ci hi.
Jew-te in, “Kum sawmnga zong upa nai lo napi, Abraham maw na muh tazen!” a ci uh hi.
Jesu in, “Thutak kong geninah, Abraham suah ma-in kei ka om hi!” a ci hi.
Hih thu a gen a zak uh ciangin amah a den nading uh suang a tawm uh hi. Ahi hangin Jesu bu-a biakinnpi tual panin a kihemkhia hi.
Jesu a paipai laitakin mittawsa-a suak khat a mu hi.
A nungzuite in, “Rabbi aw, hih pa mittawsa-a a suah kua mawhna hang hiam, amah hiam, a nu-le-pa hizaw hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi.
Jesu in, “Amah lah mawh kei, a nu-le-pa lah mawh kei, ahi hangin ama nuntakna ah Pasian nasepna a kilat nadinga piang ahi hi.
Sun ahi laiteng kei hong sawlpa na i sep pel mawh ding ahi hi. Kuamah in na a sep theih loh hun zan hong tung ding hi.
Leitunga ka om laiteng, leitung khuavak ka hi hi,” a ci hi.
Hih teng a cih khit ciangin lei lakah a cil phiha, a ciltui tawh buan bawlin mittaw pa mit a nuh hi.
Ama kiangah, “Pai inla Siloam (Hih Kammal Sawl cihna) bualah va sil in,” ci-in a sawl hi. Tua ciangin tuapa pai-in va sil-a khua musa-in innah a ciah hi.
A vengte le khut dawh-a a nget lai a musate in, “Hih pa, mun khatah tu-a a ngenpa pen hi lo hiam?” ci-in a kidong uh hi.
Pawlkhat in, “Hi mah hi,” a ci uh hi. Adangte in, “Hi kei tuapa tawh a kisun bek hi,” a ci uh hi. Ahi hangin amahmah in, “Tua mipa ka hi hi,” a ci hi.
Amaute in, “Tua ahileh na mitte bang hong ci vak hiam?” ci-in a dong tentan uh hi.
Amah in, “Jesu a cih uh mi khat in, buan bawlin ka mit nuha, ‘Siloam bual ah va pai inla va sil in,’ ci-a hong gen ciangin kei zong pai-a ka va sil leh khua ka mu thei hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Amaute in, “Tuapa koi-ah om ta hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi. Amah in, “Thei keng,” a ci hi.
Amaute in Pharisee-te kiangah mittaw ngei pa a paipih uh hi.
Jesu in buan bawla mipa mit a vaksak ni, Sabbath ni khat ahi hi.
Tua ahi ciangin Pharisee-te in zong khua bangci muh kik hiam, cih amah a dong uh hi. Mipa in, “Ka mit ah buan hong nuhsaka ka sil leh tu-in khua ka mu thei hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.

Pharisee-te pawlkhat in, “Tua mipa in Sabbath ni tang lo ahi manin Pasian kiang pana hong pai ahi kei hi,” a ci uh hi. Adangte in, “Mawh nei mi khat in tua bang limlamdang bangci bawl theih ding ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi. Tua ciangin amaute a kipawlkhen uh hi.
A tawpna ah mittawpa kiangah kihei kik uh a, “Amah in na mitte vaksak ahi ciangin, ama thu gentheih bang na nei hiam?” a ci uh hi. Tua mipa in, “Kamsang khat hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Jew-te in amah mittaw ngei-a tu-in khua mu thei ahilam, a nu-le-pa a sapsak matengun a um kei teitei uh hi.
Amaute in, “Hih pa no tapa ahi hiam? A mittawsa-a suak na cih pa uh ahi hiam? Tu-a khua a muh theih kikna bangci bang ahi hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi.
A nu-le-pa in, “Amah ka tapa uh hi, cih ka thei uh hi; mittawsa-a suak ahilam zong ka thei uh hi.
Ahi zongin bangci bangin tu-a khua mu thei-a, kua in a mit vaksak cih ka thei kei uh hi. Amah dong dih un. Amah picing ta hi; ama thu amahmah in gen hen,” a ci uh hi.
Jew-te in: Jesu pen Khrista hi, ci-a a sang peuhmah synagogue pan kihawlkhia ding hi, ci-a thukhensatna nei zo uh ahi ciangin a nu a pa-te in Jew-te a kihtak manun hih banga a gen uh ahi hi.
A nu-le-pa in, “Amah picing ta hi, amah dong un,” a cihna uh tua thu hang ahi hi.
Mittaw ngei pa a nihveina sam kik uh a, “Pasian min thangsak inb Kote in hih pa mawhnei hi, cih ka thei uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Amah in, “Amah mawh nei ahi le ahi loh ka thei kei hi. Na khat ka thei hi, ka mit a tawsa hi-a ahi zongin tu-in khua ka mu hi!” ci-in a dawng hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in, “Nang tungah bang hong hih hiam? Na mit bang hong ci vaksak ahi hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi.
Amah in, “Kong gen khin zo-a na ngai kei uh hi. Bang dinga za kikkik nuam se na hi uh hiam? No zong ama nungzui suak nuam na hi uh hiam?” ci-in a dawng hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in amah sim mawh bawlin tai gawpgawp uh a, “Hih mipa nungzui nang na hi mah ve! Ko bel Moses nungzui ka hi uh hi!
Pasian in Moses a hopih lam ka thei uh hi. Ahi hangin hih pa koi pana hong pai cih nangawn ka thei kei uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tuapa in, “Tua hi ve a ciamteh huai! Note in hong paina thei lo. Amah’n lah ka mit hong vaksak.
Pasian in mawh neite thu ngai lo hi, cih i thei hi. Amah in a deihna a hih a pasian-mite thu a ngai hi.
Mittawsa a suak, mit kivaksak thu kuamah in a za ngei kei hi.
Hih pa, Pasian kiang pan hi kei leh bangmah a hih thei kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Hih thu ah amaute in, “Nang, suah tunga mawhna tawh a kidim pa, bang hangin ko thu hong hilh ngam tazen na hi hiam!” ci-a a dawn kik khit uh ciangin amah a hawlkhia uh hi.
Amaute in tuapa hawlkhia uh cih Jesu in za a, amah a muh ciangin, “Mihing Tapa na um hiam?” a ci hi.
Mipa in, “Sia aw, amah kua ahi hiam? Amah ka up theih nadingin hong gen in,” ci-in a dong hi.
Jesu in, “Tu-in amah na mu zo hi; tu laitaka nang tawh a kihopa ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin tuapa in, “Topa aw, ka um hi,” ci-in a bia hi.
Jesu in, “Mittawte in khua a muh nading le mitvakte a mit uh a tawt nading, thukhen dingin hih leitungah kong pai hi,” a ci hi.
Amah tawh a om khawm Pharisee-te pawlkhat in hih banga a gen a zak uh ciangin, “Bang e? Ko zong a mittaw maw?” ci-in a dong uh hi.
Jesu in, “Mittawsa hi le uh cin mawhna ah na khial kei ding uh hi. Ahi hangin tu-in ka mit uh a vak hi, ci na hi manun na mawhna uh a om lai hi.
"Thutak kong geninah, tuukhumna kongpi lam pan lut lo-a, mundang ah kahin a lut peuhmah, guta le misuam ahi hi.
Kongpi lam tawna lutpa ahileh ama tuute a cingpa ahi hi.
Kong cingpa in amah kong honin tuute in a aw a ngai uh hi. Ama tuute a minin sama a pikhia hi.
Ama aa khempeuh a pikhiat khit ciangin amaute mai-ah amah masa-a, a tuute in a aw thei uh ahi manin anung a zui uh hi.
Ahi hangin a theih loh uh mi nung a zui ngei kei uh hi. A taktakin, a mel a theih loh mite aw thei lo uh ahi manin, amah a taisan ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Jesu in hih bang tehpihna zangin thu gena, ahi hangin amaute tungah bangci nuam hiam cih a theitel kei uh hi.
Tua ahi ciangin Jesu in, “Thutak kong geninah, keimah tuute adingin kongpi ka hi hi.
Ka mai-a hong pai ngei khempeuh gutate le misuamte hi uh a, ahi hangin tuute in amau thu a ngai kei uh hi.
Keimah, tua kongpi ka hi hi; kei hong tawna a lut mi peuhmah kihonkhiaa ding hi. Amah sungtumin pusuakkhia dinga lonona a mu ding hi.
Gutate ahileh, a gu ding, a that ding le a siasak ding beka pai ahi hi. Kei ka hileh amaute in nuntakna a neih nading, adim a neih nadingun hong pai ka hi hi.
"Keimah, tuucing hoihpa ka hi hi. Tuucing hoihpa in a tuute ading a nuntakna a pia hi.
A kicial tuucing pen tuu neipa hi lo hi. Tua ahi ciangin keivom pai a muh ciangin a tuute nusia in a taimangsan hi. Tua ciangin keivom in tuute mana, tuuhonte a kithehthangsak hi.
Tua mipa a kicial ahi manin a tuute don lo-a, a taimangsan ahi hi.
"Keimah, tuucing hoihpa ka hi hi; ka tuute ka thei-a, ka tuute in zong kei hong thei uh hi.
Pa in kei hong theih bang tektekin kei zong Pa ka thei hi – tua hi-a ka tuute ading ka nuntakna ka kham hi.
Hih tuu khumna inn sungah a om lo tuu dang zong ka nei hi. Amaute zong kong paipih pelmawh ding hi. Amaute in zong ka aw ngai ding uh a, tuuhon khat omin tuucingpa khat a om ding hi.
Ka Pa in kei hong itna pen, ka lakkik dinga ka nuntakna ka kham hang ahi hi.

Kei tung pan kuamah in hong lak khiatsak hi lo hi. Keima ut thu-a kikham ka hi hi. Keima ut thu-a kikham-theihna le lakkik-theihna thuneihna ka nei hi. Hih thupiak, ka Pa tung pana ka ngah ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Hih thute hangin Jew-te a kipawl khen leuleu uh hi.
Amaute tampi in, “Amah dawi lut-a a haipau ahi hi. Bang dinga ama thu ngai i hi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
Ahi hangin adangte in, “Dawi lut mi thugen hih bang hi lo hi. Dawi in mittawte mit vaksak thei ding hiam?” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin Jerusalem ah Apnab Pawi a tung hi. Phalbi lai hi a,
biakinnpi huang sunga om, Solomon Talap sungah Jesu a vak kawikawi hi.
Jew-te a kimah va kikhawm uh a, “Bang tan vei lungsim laklawha hong koih ding na hi hiam? Nang, Khristc na hileh siangtakin hong gen dih in,” a ci uh hi.
Jesu in, “Kong gen hangin na um kei uh hi. Ka Pa min a ka bawl nalamdangte in kei adingin gen khin zo hi.
Ahi hangin ka tuute hi lo na hi manun na um kei uh hi.
Ka tuute in ka aw a ngai uh hi; keimah in amaute ka thei-a amaute in kei hong zui uh hi.
Amaute nuntak tawntungna ka pia-a, a mangthang ngei kei ding uh hi; amaute ka khut sung pan kuamah in a lakhia thei kei ding hi.

Jerusalem panin Bethany taia nih sangin naizaw a,

Jew-te Paisan-pawi hun a nai mahmah ciangin kisakkholhna, Paisan-pawi ma-a biakna ngeina-a kisiansuahna bawl dingin gamsung khua panin mi tampi Jerusalem ah a paito uh hi.
