Ahi hangin siampi makaite le Pharisee-te in, amah a mat theih nadingun Jesu omna mun a mu a om leh amau kiangah a va gen nadingun thu a pia uh hi.

Hih lai-ah Jesu pahtawina in nitak-an kivak hi. Martha in an nek ding bawl-a sabuai-a kingamte lakah Lazarus a om hi.
Tua ciangin Mary in nard sathau citak a namtui, a manpha mahmah pinta khat tawi a, Jesu khepekte buakin a sam tawh a khepekte a nul hi. Tuateh sathau namtui gim in inn sung khempeuh a zel khin hi.
Ahi hangin a nungzuite khat, a nung cianga amah lehhek ding pa Judas Iscariot in,
"Bang hanga hih sathau namtui zuaka a sum mizawngte kipia zaw lo ahi hiam? Tua in kum khat thamanb zah man hi,” a ci hi.
Amah in mizawngte a khualna tawh a cih hi loin amah guta ahi man ahi hi; amah sum-ip kem hi-a tua sunga kikoihte ama adingin a la zelzel pa ahi hi.

Note mizawngte tawh na om khawm lai ding uh hi. Ahi hangin kei tawh na omkhawm tawntung kei ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua hun sungin Jesu tua lai-a a om lam Jew mihon tampi in a theih uh ciangin a va pai uh hi. Ama hang bek hi loin misi pana a thawhsakpa Lazarus zong a mu nuam uh hi.
Tua ahi ciangin siampi makaite in Lazarus zong thah a sawm uh hi.
Ahang in, ama hangin Jesu lamah Jew-te kihei uh a, amah a muang uh hi. uh hi.
A zing ciangin Pawi sima pai mihon tampi in, Jesu in Jerusalem zuan, cih thu a za uh hi.
Amaute nisuh hiang tawi-in amah dawn dingin paikhia uh a, “Hosanna!”c “Topa mina hong paipa in thupha a ngah hi!”d “Israel Kumpipa in thupha a ngah hi!” ci-in a awng uh hi.
Jesu in laano khat mu a,
"Zion Tanu aw, lau kei in; en in, na kumpipa laapi ta laano tungah tuangin hong pai hi,” ci-a kigelhsa bangin tua tungah a tuang hi.e
A tunglai teng a nungzuite in hihte khempeuh a theitel kei uh hi. Jesu a kipahtawi khit ciang bekin ama thu hih banga, a kigelh lam le amaute in hih banga hih uh ahilam a thei pan bek uh hi.
Tua laitakin amah tawh a om khawm mihonpite in, amah in han sung panin Lazarus sama, misi pan a thawh sakna thu a thangsak beh lailai uh hi.
Hih nalamdang a bawlna thu a zak manun mi tampite amah dawn dingin a kuankhia uh hi.
Tua ciangin Pharisee-te in, “Thei un, bangmah i lawh zo nawn kei hi. Leitung bupin ama nung zui khinmang uh hi!” a kici uh hi.
Pawi sunga Pasian bia dinga pai mite lakah Greek-te pawlkhat a om uh hi.

Jesu in, “Mihing Tapa a kimin-thansak hun tung zo hi.
Thutak kong geninah, mangbuh tang khat lei lakah kia-a, a sih phot kei leh a tang khat guak mah om niloh hi. Ahi hangin a sih leh tang tampi a suang hi.
Ama nuntakna a it mi in taan dinga, hih leitunga, a nuntakna a mudah mi in nuntak tawntungna adingin a kemcing ding hi.
Ka na a sem peuhmah in kei hong zuih pelmawh kul-a, kei omna ah ka nasempa zong a om ding hi. Ka na a sem mi peuhmah ka Pa in a pahtawi ding hi.
"Tu-in ka lungmang hi, bang ka ci gen ding hiam? ‘Pa aw, hih hun panin hong hon in,’ ka ci ding hiam? Ka ci kei ding hi, hih hang maha hih hun dong a tung ka hi hi.
Pa aw, na min thangsak in!” a ci hi. Tua ciangin, “Ka thangsak zo a, ka thangsak lai ding hi,” ci-in vantung pan aw khat a ging hi.

Ahi hangin kei ka hileh leitung pan hong kikhaitoh ciangin kei lamah mi khempeuh ka huai ding hi,” a ci hi.

Hih thu hangin amaute in a um thei kei uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Isaiah in mun dangah:

"Amah in amaute mit tawsakin, a lungtangte uh sisak hi, tua ahi manin a mit uh tawh bangmah mu thei lo uh a, a lungtang uh tawh zong bangmah theitel thei loin a kihei thei kei uh hi – tua hi kei leh amaute ka damsak kha ding hi,”h ci hi.

"Ka thugente za napi a zui lo mi tungah thu ka khen kei ding hi. Ahang in, leitung thukhen dinga hong pai ka hi kei a, a honkhia dinga hong pai ka hizaw hi.

Ahang in, keima ut thu-a gen ka hi kei a, kei hong sawl Pa in bang thu gen dinga, bangci gen ding cih hong thu piaksa bek ka gen hi.
Hih thupiakna in nuntak tawntungna tun hi cih ka thei hi. Tua ahi ciangin ka gen peuhmah Pa in kei gen dinga hong hilh tektekte bek ka gen hi,” ci-in a kiko hi.
Tua hun, Paisan Pawi madiak ahi hi. Jesu in hih leitung nusia in, Pa kiangah a pai hun ta, cih a thei hi. Hih leitunga om ama mite it a, amaute a itnaa a vekpi-in tu-in a lak hi.

"Note na vekpi un kong ci khin kei hi; ka teelsate ka thei hi. Ahi zongin hih in, Laisiangtho sunga; ‘An ka nekkhawm pihpa in kei langah a khetul a liikto zo hi,’b a cih thu a tangtunsak nading ahi hi.

Simon Peter in, “Topa koi-ah pai ding na hi hiam?” ci-in a dong hi. Jesu in, “Ka pai nading mun ah tu-in nong zui thei kei ding uh hi, ahi hangin tunung ciangin nong zui ding uh hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.

"Note kilungmangsak kei un. Pasian muang unla, a kei zong hong muang un.

Pai-in note om nading mun ka bawl khit ciangin ka omna munah note na om theih nadingun hong pai kikin note kong la ding hi.
Ka paina mun tunna lampi na thei uh hi,” a ci hi.
Thomas in, “Topa aw, na pai nading ka thei kei uh hi. Lampi bangci theih ding ka hi uh hiam?” a ci hi.
Jesu in, “Keimah in, lampi, thutak le nuntakna ka hi hi. Kei tawn loin kuamah Pa kiang a tung thei kei hi.
Kei nong theih takpi uh leh ka pa zong na theib ding uh hi. Tu-a kipan amah na thei zo uh a, na mu zo uh hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Philip in, “Topa aw, Pa hong lak lecin tua pen ko adingin phazo ding hi,” a ci hi.
Jesu in, “Philip aw, note tawh hih tanveitak ka omkhawm nangawnin kei hong thei nai lo na hi hiam? Kei hong mute peuhmah, Pa mu ahi hi. Bangci a, ‘Kote, Pa hong lak in,’ ci thei na hi hiam?
Pa sungah kei ka om a, kei sungah Pa a om cih um lo na hi hiam? Note kianga kong gen thute, kei thu beka, gen ka hi kei hi. Ka sunga a nungta Pa in ama na a sem hizaw hi.
Pa sungah kei ka om a, kei sungah Pa a om hi, ka cih ciangin kei hong um un. Tua ahikeh zong nalamdangte kitelsakna beek um un.
Thutak kong geninah, kei hong um mi peuhmah in ka sepsa pen mah a sem ding hi. Pa kiangah pai ding ka hi manin hihte sangin na lianzaw nangawn a sem ding hi.
Tapa in Pa tungah minthanna a puak theih nadingin kei min suanga na nget peuhpeuh uh ka na sepsak ding hi.
Note in kei min suanga na khatpeuh nong nget uh leh kong sepsak ding hi.
"Kei nong it uh leh kong thupiak na mang ding uh hi.
Pa kiangah ka ngen dinga, amah in note tawh a omkhawm tawntung dingin Thukuppihpa dang khat –

Thutak Kha note hong pia ding hi. Leitung in amah thei ngei lo, mu zong mu ngei lo ahi manin a sang thei kei hi. Ahi zongin amah note tawh omkhawm a, note sungah om dingc ahi manin amah na thei uh hi.
Tagahte bangin note kong nusia kei ding hi. No kiangah kong pai ding hi.
A sawt loin leitung in kei hong mu nawn kei ding hi. Ahi hangin no nong mu ding uh hi. Kei nungta ka hi manin note zong na nungta ding uh hi.
Tua ni ciangin kei ka Pa sungah om-in, kei sungah note na om uh a, note sungah kei ka om cih na theitel ding uh hi.
Ka thupiakte nei-a a mang peuhmah kei hong it ahi hi. Kei hong itte ka Pa in it dinga, kei zong amah it-in, ama tungah ka kilak ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Judas (Judas Iscariot lo pen) in, “Ahi hangin Topa aw, bang dinga kote kianga kilah sawm a, leitung mite kianga kilah sawm lo na hi hiam?” a ci hi.
Jesu in, “Mi khatpeuh in kei hong it leh ka hilhna a mang ding hi. Ka Pa in amah it dinga, ama kiangah ka pai ding uh a, amah tawh ka teng khawm ding uh hi.
Kei hong it lote in ka hilhna a mang kei ding uh hi. Hih na zak uh thute kei aa hi lo hi; kei hong sawlpa ka Pa aa ahi hi.
"Note tawh ka omkhawm lai-in hihte khempeuh kong gen khin zo hi.
Ahi hangin tua Thukuppihpa keima mina Pa in hong sawl ding tua Khasiangtho in na khempeuh hong hilh dinga, kong gensa khempeuh hong phawkkiksak ding hi.
Lemna note kong nusiat hi; ka lemna note kong pia hi. Leitung piak bangin note tungah kong pia kei hi. Na lungmang kei unla, na lau kei un.
"Note in, ‘Ka paimang dinga no kiangah kong pai kik ding hi,’ ka cih na za uh hi. Pa kiangah pai ding ka hi manin kei nong it uh leh na kipak ding uh hi. Ahang in, kei sangin Pa lianzaw hi.
Hih thu a pian cianga na up theih nadingun a pian ma-in no tungah tu-in kong gen hi.
Hih leitung kumpitapa hong pai ta ahi manin note tawh sawtveipi ka kiho nawn kei ding hi. Amah in kei bangmah hong cih zo kei hi.
Kei in Pa ka it a, ka Pa in kei hong thupiak bang tektekin ka sep lam leitung in a theih pelmawh kul hi. "Hong pai un; tu-in paikhia ni.
"Keimah lenggui taktak ka hi-a, ka Pa, tua lo neipa ahi hi.
Kei sungah oma, a gah lo hiang peuhmah a sattan hi; a gah hiang peuhmah tam a gah zawk nadingin heuhin a hahsianga hi.
Note tungah kong gensa thu hangin na siang khin ta uh hi.
Keima sungah om un, note sungah ka om ding hi. Amah beka gah thei hiang a om kei hi. A guipi-ah a om pelmawh kul hi. Note zong keima sunga na om kei uh leh na gah thei kei ding uh hi.
"Keimah, lengguipi ka hi hi. Note hiangte na hi uh hi. Mi khat kei sungah oma, ama sungah kei ka om leh gah tampi a gah ding hi. Kei loin bangmah na hih thei kei uh hi.
Mi khatpeuh kei sungah a om kei leh amah, a kipaimang a vul hiang tawh kibang hi. Tua bang hiangte kitawmin mei sungah kikhula, a kangtum hi.
Kei sungah na om uh a, ka thute no sungah a om leh na ut peuhpeuh uh na ngen un; hong kipia ding hi.
Note in gah tampi na gah uh a, ka nungzuite na hina uh na lahna uh, ka Pa minthanna ahi hi.
"Ka Pa in kei hong itsa bangin note kong it zo hi. Tu-in ka itna sungah om un.
Ka Pa thupiakte manga ama itna sungah ka om bang tektekin, kong thupiakte na man uh leh ka itna sungah na om ding uh hi.
Ka lungnopna note sungah om a, note lungnopna a kicin theih nadingin hih thu kong gen zo hi.
Kong thupiak hih ahi hi: Note kong it bangin note khat le khat na ki-it thuk un.
A lawmte tang dinga a nuntakna a paai itna sanga itna lianzaw a nei kuamah om lo hi.
Ka thupiak na zuih uh leh ka lawmte na hi uh hi.
Silate in a pu nasep thei lo uh ahi manin note silate kong ci nawn kei hi, tua sangsikin ka Pa tung pana ka theih khempeuh note hong theisak khin ka hi manin lawmte kong ci ta hi.
Note in kei nong teel kei uh a, keimah in pai-a gah a gah tawntung dingin note kong teel hi. Tua ciangin ka min suanga na nget peuhpeuh uh Pa in note hong pia ding hi.
Ka thupiak hih ahi hi: Khat le khat ki-it thuk un.
"Leitung in note hong muhdah leh, kei hong mudah masa hi, cih thei gige un.

Leitung aa na hi uh leh ama aa bangin note hong it ding hi. A taktak in leitung aa na hi kei uh hi. Keimah in leitung mite lak panin note kong teelkhia zo hi. Tua hangin leitung in note hong mudah hi.

Note tunga kong gensa thute ciamteh un: ‘A pu sanga lianzaw nasem kuamah a om kei hi.’b Amaute in kei hong bawlsia uh ahileh, no zong hong bawlsia ding uh hi. Amaute in ka hilhna a man’ uh leh no aa zong a mang ding uh hi.
Ka min hangin amaute in note hih bangin hong bawl ding uh hi. Ahang in, amaute in kei hong Sawlpa a thei kei uh hi.
Amaute kiangah hong pai-in thu gen lo hi leng khialhna hanga a mawh a suak kei ding uh hi. Ahi zongin tu-in ahileh a mawhna uh paulap ding a nei kei uh hi.
Kei hong mudahte in ka Pa zong a mudah uh hi.
Amaute lakah kuama bawl loh va bawl kei leng, amaute khialhna hangin a mawh suak lo ding uh hi. Ahi hangin tu-in hih nalamdangte mu zo uh a, tua hi napi amaute in kei le ka Pa hong mudah khawm uh hi.
Ahi hangin hih in amaute thukham sunga kigelhsa: ‘Amaute in ahang om lopi-in kei hong mudah uh hi,’c cih a tangtunna ahi hi.
"Pa kiang pana no kianga kong sawl ding, Pa kiang pana hong paikhia thutak Kha – Thukuppihpa hong pai ciangin kei tungtang thu teci a pang ding hi.
Note zong a cil a kipan kei tawh om khawm na hi uh ciangin teci na pang pelmawh ding uh hi.
"Note in lam na khialh loh nadingun hihte khempeuh kong gen zo hi.
Amaute in synagogue panin hong hawlkhia ding uh hi. A taktakin, note hong that peuhpeuh Pasian nasem-a a kingaihsut hun hong tung ding hi.
Kei ka hi a, ka Pa ahi zongin hong thei lo uh ahi manin amaute in tua bangin a hih ding uh hi.
Ahun hong tun ciangin kong vauhilhsa ahilam na phawk nadingun hih thu kong gen hi. A cil-in note tawh omkhawm ka hi manin hih thu note kong hilh kei hi.
"Tu-in kei hong sawlpa kiangah ka pai ta ding hi. Ahi hangin note khat beek in, ‘Koi-ah pai ding na hiam?’ ci-in nong dong kei uh hi.
Hih thute ka gen manin na dah lua uh hi.

Ahi hangin thutak kong geninah: Ka paikhiat note hoih nading ahi hi. Kei paikhia lo hileng Thukuppihpa no kiangah hong pai lo ding hi. Ahi zongin kei va paikhia leng, no kiangah amah kong sawl ding hi.
Amah hong pai ciangin mawhna, thumaanna le thukhenna thu ah, leitung a mawhnaa a laktel ding hi:
mawhna thu ah, mite in kei hong up loh hang uh ahi hi;
thumaanna thu ah, note in kei nong muh nawn loh nading uh mun Pa kiangah ka pai ding hang;
tua ciangin thukhenna thu ah, hih leitung kumpitapa tu-in a kimawhpaih laitak hang ahi hi.
"Tu-a na san zawh ding sangua tamzaw note kiangah gen ding ka nei hi.
Ahi hangin amah thutak Kha hong pai ciangin thutak khempeuh ah hong pi ding hi. Ama thu hong gen ding ahi kei hi. A zak thute bek gen dinga, hong piang lai ding thu note hong hilh ding hi.
Amah in kei kiang pan la-in note tungah hong theihsakna tawh kei hong minthangsak ding hi.
Pa aa khempeuh kei aa ahi hi. Kha in kei aa pan la-in note tungah hong theisak ding ka cih tua hang ahi hi.
"Hun tawm vei khit ciangin kei nong mukha nawn kei ding uh hi; tua khit a sawt loin nong mu ding uh hi,” a ci hi.

A nungzuite pawlkhat in, “‘Pa kiangah pai ding ka hi manin hun tawm vei khit ciangin kei nong mu nawn kei ding uh hi; tua khit a sawt loin nong mu ding uh hi,’ a cih bang a cih nopna hi ding hiam?” ci-in a kidong uh hi.
Amaute in, “‘Hun tawm vei,’ a cih bang a cihna hi ding hiam, a thugen lah i tel zo peuhmah kei a?” ci-in a kidong lailai uh hi.

Jesu in amaute in hih thu dong nuam uh cih a theih ciangin, “‘Hun tawm vei khit ciangin kei nong mukha nawn kei ding uh hi, tua khit ciangin a sawt loin nong mu ding uh hi,’ ka cih ciangin ka cihnopna bang hiam cih khat le khat kidong na hi uh hiam?
Thutak kong geninah, leitung a lungdam laitakin note kapin na dah ding uh hi. Na lungkham ding uh a, ahi hangin na lungkhamna uh lungnopna a suak ding hi.
"Numei tasuak in tasuah hun tung ahi manin a na a thuak hi. Ahi hangin ta a suah khit ciangin leitungah ta khat suak ahi manin lungdamin a thuaknate a mangngilh hi.
Tua mah bangin note zong tu lai-takin na dah uh hi. Ahi zongin note kong mu kik dinga, na lungdam ding uh hi. Note lungdamna kuamah in hong sutkhia kei ding hi.
Tua ni ciangin kei, bangmah nong dong nawn kei ding uh hi. Thutak kong geninah, kei min suanga na nget peuhpeuh uh ka Pa in hong pia ding hi.
Tu hun dong kei min suangin bangmah na ngen nai kei uh hi. Ngen le uh cin na ngah ding uh a, tua ciangin na lungdamna uh a kim ding hi.
"Tehpih zanga thu kong gen khit hangin hih bang pau namte zanga kong gen loh hun hong tung ta hi. Ahi hangin ka Pa thu siangtaka kong gen hun hong tung ding hi.
Tua ni ciangin note in kei min suangin na ngen ding uh hi. Note tangin Pa kiangah kong ngetsak ding a ci ka hi kei hi.
Hi lo hi, Pa mahmah in note hong it hi, bang hang hiam cih leh note in kei nong it uh a, Pa kiang pana hong pai ka hilam na um uh hi.
Pa kiang panin kong pai-a, leitung ah kong lut khin zo hi; tu-in leitung nusia in Pa kiangah ka ciah kik ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Jesu nungzuite in, “Tu-in tehpih zang loin kiteltakin na gen hi.
Tu-in ahileh na khempeuh na thei a, kuama hong dot nangawn a kul kei hi, cih ka thei ta uh hi. Nang, Pasian kiang pana hong pai na hilam hih in ko hong umsak ta hi,” a ci uh hi.
Jesu in, “Hong um ta buang uh teh maw!b

Ahi hangin note na inn ciatuah na kikhenthang hun uh hong tung ding tham loin hong tung zo hi. Note in kei guak nong nusia ding uh hi. Ahi zongin ka Pa tawh om khawm ka hi manin kei guak ka hi kei hi.
Note in kei sungah lungnopna na ngah nadingun hih thute kong gen khin ta hi. Hih leitung ah note na lungmang ding uh hi. Ahi hangin kilungkhauhsak un! Leitung ka zo zo hi,” a ci hi.
Jesu in hih teng a genkhit ciangin vantung lam entoin thu ngen a: “Pa aw, a hun tung zo hi. Na Tapa in nang hong minthansak theih nadingin, na Tapa minthangsak in.
Ahang in, amah na piaksa mi khempeuh tungah nuntak tawntungna a piak theih nadingin mi khempeuh tunga thuneihna amah na pia zo hi.
Tu-in hih in nuntak tawntungna ahi: nang bek a maan Pasian na hina le na sawlpa Jesu Khrist a theihna uh ahi hi.
Ka hih dinga nong piakte zawhsiangna tawh leitungah minthanna nang kong puak zo hi.
Tu-in ahileh Pa aw, leitung a om ma-a nang tawh ka neih minthanna-in kei hong minthangsak in.
"Leitung pana nong piakkhiatte tungah nanga na laakkhia zo hi. Amaute nang aa ahi uh hi; amaute kei nong pia zo-a na thu a mang uh hi.
Tu-in amaute in kei nong piak khempeuh nang kiang pana hong pai ahilam thei ta uh hi.
Ahang in, kei nong piak thute, amaute ka pia-a, tuate a sang uh hi. Amaute in nang kiang pana pai ka hilam theitel uh a, nang kei nong sawl zong a um uh hi.
Amaute ading thu kong ngetsak hi. Leitung ading kong ngen kei hi. Ahi hangin nong piaksate ading kong ngen hi. Ahang in, amaute nang aa ahi uh hi.
Kei neih khempeuh nang aa hi-a, nang neih khempeuh kei aa ahi hi. Tua hi-a, amau tungtawnin minthanna ka ngah hi.

Leitung ah sawt ka om nawn kei ding hi. Ahi hangin amaute leitung ah om lai ding uh a, nang kiangah kei kong pai ding hi. A Siangtho Pa aw, nang le kei khat i hi bangin, amaute khat ahi theih nading un kei nong piaksa min – nangma min vangliatna tawh amaute hu in.
Amaute tawh ka omkhawm laitakin, nong piaksa min tawh amaute bittakin ka hu zo hi. Laisiangtho a tangtun nadinga a mang thang pa pen simloh khat beek ka mansuah kei hi.
"Tu-in nang kiangah kong pai ta ding hi. Ahi hangin amaute in amau sungah ka lungnopna a dim a neih theih nadingun leitung a ka om laitakin hih thute ka gen hi.
Amaute tungah na thu ka pia khin a, kei leitung aa ka hi lo bangin amaute zong leitung aa hi nawn lo uh ahi manin leitung in amaute a mudah hi.
Amaute leitung pan na lakkhiat ding kong ngen kei hi. Ahi hangin gilopa panin na hut ding kong ngen hi.
Kei, leitung aa ka hi lo bangin, amaute zong leitung aa hi lo uh hi.
Amaute thutak tawh siangthosakb in; na thu thutak ahi hi.
Leitungah kei nong sawl bangin, amaute leitungah ka sawl zo hi.
Amaute zong a siantho takpi nadingun keimah le keimah ka kisiangthosak hi.
"Amaute ading kia kong ngen kei hi. Amaute thupuakte tungtawn a kei hong um ding mite adingin zong kong ngen hi.

Pa aw, nang kei sungah na om a, kei nang sungah ka om bang tektekin amaute khat a suah theih nadingun kong ngen hi. Nang, kei nong sawl ahilam leitung in a up nadingin amaute zong ei sungah om uh hen.
Eite khat i hi mah bangin amaute zong khat ahi theih nadingun nong piaksa minthanna amaute ka pia zo hi.
Amaute sungah kei ka oma kei sungah nang na om hi. Nang, kei nong sawl le kei nong it bangin amaute na it cih leitung in a theih nadingin amaute kiciantakin pumkhat suak uh hen.
"Pa aw, nong piaksa mite ka omna-ah kei tawh a om khawm ding le nong it mana leitung piansak ma-a minthanna nong piak keima minthanna a muh ding uh ka deih hi.
"A thumaan Pa aw, leitung in nang hong thei kei zongin, ken nang kong thei-a, nang, kei nong sawl amaute in a thei uh hi.
Amaute tungah nang kong pulak zo-a, nangmah in kei nong itna amaute aa ahi theih nading le kei mahmah amaute sungah ka om theih nadingin kong pulak lai hi,” a ci hi.
Jesu in thu a nget khit ciangin a nungzuite tawh tua mun nusia in Kidron Kuam a kantan uh hi. Tua kuam galkhatah Olive lo khat a om hi; tua lo sungah amah le a nungzuite a lut uh hi.
Jesu le a nungzuite tua lai-ah kituah pahpah uh ahi manin amah lehhekpa Judas in tua mun a thei hi.
Tua ahi ciangin Judas in, galkap pawlkhat le siampi makaite le Pharisee-te pana ulian pawlkhat makaih in lo sungah a va pai uh hi. Amaute in meisel, meivak le hiam a keng uh hi.
Jesu in ama tunga thu piang ding khempeuh thei khin a, paikhia-in amaute kiangah, “Kua deih na hi uh hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
Amaute in, “Nazareth mi Jesu,” ci-in a dawng uh hi. Jesu in, “Kei, amah ka hi hi,” a ci hi. (Tua laitakin a lehhekpa Judas zong amaute lakah a ding hi.)
Jesu in, “Kei, amah ka hi hi,” a cih ciangin amaute nungkin in lei-ah a puk uh hi.
Jesu in, “Kua deih na hi uh hiam?” ci-in amaute a dong kik hi. Amaute in, “Nazareth mi Jesu,” a ci uh hi.
Jesu in, “Kei, amah ka hi hi, ci-in kong gen zo hi. Kei hong zong na hi uh leh hih mite paisak un,” ci-in a dawng hi.
"Nong piaksa mi khat beek ka mansuah kei hi,”a a cih thu a tangtun nadingin hih thu a piang ahi hi.
Tua ciangin namsau khat a nei Simon Peter in a namsau dokin tulpipa nasempa a sat leh a taklam bil a satkhia hi. (Tua nasempa min Malchus ahi hi.)
Jesu in Peter kiangah, “Na namsau paimang in. Pa hong piaksa hai dawn lo ding ka hi hiam?" ci-in thu a pia hi.
Tua ciangin galkap pawlkhatte le a makaipa uh tawh Jew-te uliante in Jesu a man uh hi. Amaute in amah hen uh a,
tua kuma tulpi a sem Caiaphas sungpa Anna kiangah a puak masa uh hi.
Caiaphas pen, mipite tangin mi khat si leh hoih ding hi, ci-a Jew-te tungah thuhilh pa ahi hi.
Simon Peter le nungzui dang khat in Jesu a nungzuih uh hi. Hih nungzuipa pen tulpipa meltheih ahi manin tulpipa huang sung dong Jesu tawh a tonkhawm hi.
Ahi zongin Peter in a pualam kongbiang ah a ngak hi. Tulpipa meltheih nungzuipa pai kika, nasem-a om nungak kiangah a gen ciangin huang sungah Peter a lutsak hi.
Kongkhak a nungaknu in Peter kiangah, “Nang hih mipa nungzui lakah khat hi lo na hia?” ci-in a dong hi. Amah in, “Hi keng,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Khuadam a, nasemte le uliante mei awi-in mei kimkotah a ding uh hi. Peter zong amaute lakah mei awi-in a ding hi.
Tua hun laitak, tulpipa in Jesu, a nungzuite le a hilh thute a dot laitak ahi hi.
Jesu in, “Leitung kiangah a lang tang in ka gen zo hi. Jew-te kikhopna ahi zongin synagogue-te le biakinnpi ah thu ka hilh tawntung hi. Ka sim gen bangmah a om kei hi.
Bang dinga kei hong dong na hi hiam? Ka thugen a zate dong in. Ka gensate thei mahmah uh hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Jesu in hih bang a cih ciangin a kianga om uliante laka khat in, “Tulpipa dawn nading hih bang maw?” ci-in a maitang a beng hi.
Jesu in, “Thu maan lo gen ka hileh ka khialhna hong gen in. Ahi hangin thutak gen ka hileh bang hanga hong beng na hi hiam?” ci-in a dawng hi.
Tua ciangin Annas in amah hensa mah in tulpi Caiaphas tungah a puak hi.b
Simon Peter mei awi-a a din laitakin, “Ama nungzui dang khat hi ngel ve teh aw?” ci-in amah kidong hi. Amah in, “Hi keng,” ci-in a nial hi.
Tulpipa nasemte laka Peter in a bil a satkhiatsak pa tanaute khat in, “Olive lo sungah amah le nang hong mu khawm hi lo ka hia?” ci-in a to hi.
Peter in nial kik leuleu a, tua hun laitakin ak a khuang hi.

Tua ciangin Jew-te in Caiaphas inn panin Rome-te ukpipa innpi ah Jesu a paipih uh hi. Tua hun zingsang tung ahi hi. Jew-te in Paisan Pawi ne thei nuam uh a, biakna ngeina palsat a, a nit loh nadingun kumpipa inn sungah a lut kei uh hi.
Tua ahi ciangin amaute kiangah Pilate paikhia a, “Hih mipa na mawh matna uh bang ahi hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
Amaute in, “Amah in tatkhialh na lian nei kei leh nang khut sungah kong tun kei ding uh hi,” ci-in a dawng uh hi.
Pilate in, “Note mah in amah pai-pih unla, nomau thukham bangin thu khen un,” a ci hi. Jew-te in, “Ahi hangin mi khatpeuh tungah thu khena thah theih nading thu ka nei kei uh hi,” ci-in a nial uh hi.
Bangci banga sihna thuak ding cih, Jesu in ama sih nading thu a genkholhna, a tangtun nadingin hih thu a piang ahi hi.
Tua ciangin innpi sungah Pilate lut kik a, Jesu samin thu donga, “Nang, Jew-te kumpipa na hi hiam?” a ci hi.
Jesu in, “Tua pen nang ngaihsut mah ahi hiam, ahikeh kei thu midang khatpeuh hong gen ahi hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
Pilate in, “Kei Jew mi ka hi hiam? Nang, kei khut sung hong tun na mipihte le na siampi makaite ahi hi. Nang bang hih na hi hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
Jesu in, “Kei kumpi gam hih leitung hi lo hi. Hi hileh, Jew-te hong matin ka nasemte in kei hong hutna un a do ding uh hi. Ahi hangin kei kumpi-gam mundang pan ahi hi,” a ci hi.

Pilate in, “Nang, kumpi khat na hi maw leh!” a ci hi. Jesu in, “Kei kumpi nong cih na maan hi. A taktakin, hih thu hangin ka suaka, hih thu hang mahin leitung ah kong pai-a thutak ah teci ka pang hi. Thutak lama pang peuhmah in ka thu a ngai uh hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Pilate in, “Thutak bang ahi hiam?” ci-in a dong hi. Tua a cih kawmin Jew-te kiangah paikhia kik a, “Amah mawhsak nading thukho bangmah ka mu kei hi.
Ahi hangin Paisan-pawi hun ciangin note kiangah thongkia khat ka khah ding na ngeina uh ahi hi. ‘Jew-te kumpipa’ kong khah ding na deih uh hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
Amaute in, “Hi lo, amah hi lo! Barabbas hong pia ou,” ci-in a kiko kik uh hi. Barabbas ahileh kumpi langdona-a kihel khat ahi hi.
Tua ciangin Pilate in Jesu a satsak hi.
Galkapte in ling phekkhawmin kumpi lukhu phan uh a, a lu-ah a khusak uh hi. Amaute in kumpi puan dupsan silhsak uh a,
ama kiangah pai thithe in, “Jew-te kumpipa, cidam ta in!” a ci uh hi. Tua ciangin amaute in a mai a beng uh hi.
Pilate khatvei paikhia kik a, Jew-te kiangah, “En un, amah mawhsak nading thukho bangmah ka mu kei hi, cih kong theihsakna-in amah note kiangah kong khahkhia hi,” a ci hi.
Jesu, kumpi puan dupsan silhin, ling lukhu khusa-in a paikhiat ciangin Pilate in amaute kiangah, “Mipa hiah om hi!” a ci hi.

Siampi makaite le uliante in amah a muh phetun, “Kilhlum in! Kilhlum in!” ci-in a kiko uh hi. Ahi hangin Pilate in, “Amah la unla, kilhlum un. Ken ahileh amah mawhsak nading thukho ka mu zo kei hi,” a ci hi.
Jew-te in, “Kote in thukham ka nei uh hi; tua thukham tawh kizui-in amah a sih pelmawh kul hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh, amah ‘Pasian Tapa ka hi hi,’ kici hi,” a ci teitei uh hi.
Pilate in hih thu a zak ciangin lau semsem zaw a,
innpi sungah a lut kik hi. Amah in, “Koi pana hong pai na hi hiam?” ci-in Jesu a dot ciangin Jesu in a dawng kei hi.
Pilate in, “Kei hong dawng nuam lo na hi hiam? Nang, kilhlup theihna le khahkhiat theihna thuneihna a nei ka hilam phawk lo na hi hiam?” a ci hi.
Jesu in, “Tunglam pana hong kipia ahikeh kei tungah bangmah vangliatna na nei kei hi. Tua ahi ciangin nang tunga kei hong puakpa in mawhna lianzaw a bawl hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.

Tua-a kipan Pilate in Jesu a khah nading a hanciam hangin Jew-te in, “Hih mipa na khahkhiat leh Caesar lawm na hi kei hi. Kumpipa ka hi hi, a kici peuhmah Caesar langpang ahi hi,” ci-in a kiko niloh uh hi.
Pilate in hih thu a zak ciangin Jesu a pualam ah paikhiatpih a, Suangphah (Aram pau in Gabbatha) kici mun-a thukhenna tokhom tungah a tu hi.
Tua hun, Paisan-pawi Nipikal Kiginkholh ni, nai gukna pawl ahi hi. Pilate in Jew-te kiangah, "Hih lai-ah na kumpipa uh om hi," a chi hi.

Ahi hangin amaute in, “Amah lakhiamang in! Amah lakhia mang in! Amah kilhlum in!” ci-in a kiko uh hi. Pilate in, “Na kumpipa uh kilhlum ding ka hi hiam?” ci-in a dong hi. Siampi makaite in, “Caesar longal kumpi dang kuamah ka nei kei uh hi,” ci-in a dawng uh hi.
A tawpna-ah Pilate in amah kilhlup dingin amaute tungah piakhia ta hi. Tua ciangin galkapte in Jesu cingin a paikhiatpih uh hi.
Ama singlamteh ding amah in pua-a, Luguh Mun (Aram pau-a Golgotha kici) lamah a paikhia hi.
Amaute in amah singlamteh tungah a kilh uh hi. Amah tawh midang nih – alang tuakah khat tuak kilhin a laizangah Jesu a kilh uh hi.
Pilate in theihsakna khat bawlsak a, singlamteh ah a suang hi. Tua ah, JEW-TE KUMPIPA, NAZARETH MI JESU, kici hi.
Jew-te tampi in hih lai kisuang a sim uh hi. Ahang in, Jesu singlamteh tunga a kikilhlupna mun khuapi kiang hi-a, tua theihsakna lai, Aram, Latin le Greek pau-in kigelh hi.
Jew-te siampi makaite in Pilate kiangah, “‘Jew-te’ Kumpipa’ ci-in gelh kei in, hih mipa’ Jew-te kumpipa ka hi hi’ kici hi, ci-in gelh in,” a va ci uh hi.
Pilate in, “Ka gelh khitsa, ka gelhkhitsa ahi hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.

Galkapte in singlamteh tungah Jesu a kilh uh ciangin a puansilhte la in phel li suah uh a phel khat ciatin tang uh a, a puan sungsilh a siit lai uh hi. A puan sungsilh pen a khuina om lo, alu pan ataw dong zang khata kiphan ahi hi.

Amaute in, “Balkek kei ni, a ngah ding pen aisan ni,” a kici uh hi. Hih banga a hihna uh, Laisiangtho sunga kigen, “Amaute in ka puante hawm uh a, ka puan-ak ading ai a san uh hi,”a cih thu a tangtun nading ahi hi. Tua hi-a, hih pen galkapte hih ahi hi.
Jesu singlamteh gei-ah a nu, a nu sanggamnu, Clopas zi Mary le Magdalane a Mary-te a ding uh hi.
Jesu in tua lai-a om a nu le a kianga ding, a it a nungzuipa khat a muh ciangin a nu kiangah, “Kong it numei aw, na tapa hih lai-ah om hi,” ci-in,
nungzuipa kiangah, “Na nu hih lai-ah om hi,” a ci hi. Tua hun a kipan hih nungzuipa in tuanu a inn ah a kem hi.
Tua khit, Jesu in na khempeuh cingkim khin ta, cih a theih ciangin Laisiangtho a tangtun nadingin, “Ka dangtaak hi,” a ci hi.
Tua lai-ah lenggahzu thuk bel khat a om hi. Amaute in tua sungah tuihup diah uh a, puknah hiang dawnah suangin Jesu mukah a tah uh hi.
Jesu in tua dawn ding a ngah khit ciangin, “Kizo zo hi,” a ci hi. Tua tawh a lukunsukin, a kha a khahkhia hi.

Tua ni pen Kiginkholh ni hi-a, a zingciang lah Sabbath ni thupi tuam ni ding ahi hi. Jew-te in Sabbath ni-a singlamtehte tungah a luangte uh a om ding a deih loh man un, Pilate kiangah a khete uh sutan-a, a luangte uh a lakkhiat ding a ngen uh hi.
Tua ahi ciangin galkapte va pai in, Jesu tawh kikhai khawm, a masa pa khete sutan uh a, tua ciangin adang khat aa a sutan uh hi.
Ahi hangin Jesu kiang a tun uh ciangin amah a sisa in mu uh a, a khete a sutan kei uh hi.
Tua tangin galkapte khat in Jesu teneem teipi khatin sun-a, sisan le tui kihel a luangkhia pah hi.
A mu pa in a muh thu teci panga, ama teci panna thutak ahi hi. Amah in thutak gen ahilam thei a, nang zong na up theih nadingin teci a pang hi.
Laisiangtho in: “Ama guh khat beek a kisutan kei ding hi,”b a cih le
Laisiangtho mundang khatah: “Amaute in a sutpa uh a en ding uh hi,”c a cih thu a tangtun nadingin hih banga piang ahi hi.

Tua nung ciangin Arimathea a teng Joseph in Pilate kiangah, Jesu luang a ngen hi. Joseph, Jesu nungzui khat ahi hangin Jew-te a kihtak manin a langtang in a zui kei hi. Amah pai-in Pilate phalna tawh a luang a la hi.
Amah tunung lama zana Jesu kianga hawhpa Nicodemus in a zui hi. Nicodemus in paknamtui kha le aloes kihel poundd sawm sagih le nga ding khawng a keng hi.
Amaute in Jesu luang lakhia uh a, saihadial puanin gim namtui tawh a tuam khawm uh hi. Hih pen Jew-te kivuina ngeina zuihna ahi hi.
Jesu kikilhlupna munah huan khat om a, tua huan sungah kuamah a kisial ngei nai lohna han thak khat a om hi.
Jew-te Kiginkholh ni ahi hang le a kiangah han om pah ahi manin amaute in tua lai-ah Jesu a sial uh hi.
Nipi kal a ni masa ni, zingsang tung khuamial laipi-in Mary Magdalene, hanah pai-a, han kongvang panin suang kilikkhiasa-a om a mu hi.
Tua ciangin Simon Peter le Jesu in a it nungzuipa kiangah amah va tai-a, “Amaute in han sung panin Topa a lakhia zo uh hi, amah koi-ah koih uh hiam, ka thei kei uh hi!” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Peter le nungzui dang khat pen in han lam a manawh uh hi.
A nih un taikhawm uh a, ahi hangin tua nungzui dang khat pa in Peter makhelhin han a tung masa hi.
Amah kunsukin a sung ena, tua lai-a om a kitunna saihadial puante enin, a sungah a lut kei hi.
Tua ciangin a nunga om Simon Peter tunga, han sungah a lut hi. Tua lai ah a luang tunna saihadial puan mu a,
Jesu lutang kimkot-a han puan om zong a mu hi. Tua puante kizial tuamin saihadial puan tawh a tuamtuakin a om hi.
A tawpna ah han a tung masa nungzuipa zong a sungah a lut hi. Amah in mu-a a um hi.
(Amaute in tua hun dong, Laisiangtho in, Jesu misi pan kithosak ding hi, cih thu a theitel nai kei uh hi.)
Tua ciangin nungzuite a inn uah ciah kik uh a,
ahi hangin Mary han pua-ah dingin a kap hi. A kah kawmkawmin kunsukin han sung a et leh,
puanpak silh vansawltak nih, Jesu luang kisialna mun, a lukhungah khat, a khekhuantaw-ah khat a tu a mu hi.
Amaute in, “Numei aw, bang dinga kap na hi hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi. Tuanu in, “Ka Topa lakhiamang uh a, koi-ah koih uh hiam, ka thei kei hi,” a ci hi.
Tua laitakin a nunghei leh a nunga ding Jesu a mu hi; ahi zongin Jesu ahilam a thei kei hi.

Amah in, “Numei aw, bang dinga kap na hi hiam? Kua zong na hi hiam?” a ci hi. Tuanu in huan neipa sa a, “Sia aw, amah na puakkhiat mang ahileh koi-ah koih na hi hiam, hong gen in, ken ka la kik nuam hi,” a ci hi.
Jesu in, “Mary” ci-in a sam hi. Ama lam nga-in amah kihei a Aram pau in, “Rabboni!” (Sia cihna) ci-in a awngkhia hi.

Jesu in, “Pa kiangah ciah nai lo ka hi manin hong lenlen kei in. Tua sangin ka sanggamte kiangah pai inla, ‘Ka Pa, na Pa uh, ka Pasian na Pasian uh kiangah a ciah kik dek ta ka hilam amaute va hilh in,’” a ci hi.
Tua thu tawh nungzuite kiangah Mary Magdalene pai-in, “Topa ka mu khin hi!”a ci hi. Jesu in ama tunga a gen khempeuh amaute a ko hi.
Tua nipikal, ni masa ni nitak in, Jew-te kihta-in kong kikalhkhum uh a, a kikhop laitakun, Jesu pai-in amaute lakah va dinga, “Lungmuanna, note tawh om ta hen!” a ci hi.
Hih a cih khit ciangin a khutte le a teneem amaute a lak hi. Nung-zuite in Topa a muh uh ciangin a nuam lua mahmah uh hi.
Jesu in, “Note tawh Lemna, om ta hen! Pa in kei hong sawl bangin note kong sawl hi,” a ci leuleu hi.
Tua tawh amaute tungah a huu khah a, “Khasiangtho na sang un.
Mi khatpeuh a mawhnate na maisak uh leh amau mawhnate a kimaisak hi a, amau mawhnate na maisak kei uh leh amau mawhnate a kimaisak lo ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Nungzuite kiangah Jesu a pai lai-in Sawm-le-nihte lakah khat Thomas (Didymus kici) a om kei hi.

Nungzui dangte in ama kiangah: “Topa ka mu khin uh hi,” ci-in a gen uh hi. Ahi hangin amah in, “A khut sunga siktukkilh ma mu-a, ka khutme-in siktukkilh omna munte lawng-a, a pang ka lawn tektek mateng ka um kei ding hi,” a ci bikbek hi.

Nipikal khat khit ciangin a nungzuite tua inn ah kikhawm kik uh a, Thomas zong amaute tawh a omkhawm hi. Kongkhakte a kikalh hi napi, Jesu pai-in amaute lakah dinga, “Lemna, note tawh om ta hen!” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin “Thomas kiangah, “Na khutme in hih lai lawng in; ka khutte en in. Na khut zan inla ka pang lawng in. Lunghei nawn kei inla um in,” a ci hi.
Thomas in, “Ka Topa le ka Pasian!” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Jesu in ama kiangah, “Na muh khit manin nong um hi; mu lo napi-a umte thupha ngah ahi hi,” ci-in a gen hi.
Jesu in a nungzuite muhin hih laibu sunga kigelh lo lim lamdang tampi a bawl hi.
Ahi hangin Jesu, Khrist hi-a, Pasian Tapa hi, cih na up theiha nading uh le tua upna hangin ama minin nuntakna na neih theih nadingun hihte a kigelh ahi hi.
Tua nungin Tiberiasa tuipi gei-a a nungzuite kiangah Jesu a kilang kik hi. A kilahzia hih bang ahi hi:
Tua lai-ah Simon Peter, Thomas (Didymus kici) Galilee gam Cana pan Nathanael, Zebedee tapate le adang nungzuite nih a om uh hi.

Simon Peter in amaute kiangah, “Kei nga beng dingin ka kuan ding hi,” a cihleh amaute in, “Ko zong kong zui ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi. Tua ciangin amaute paikhia-in gunkuang sungah a tuang uh hi. Ahi hangin tua zanin bangmah a man kei uh hi.
Zingsang tungin gun gei-ah Jesu dinga, ahi hangin nungzuite in Jesu ahilam a thei kei uh hi.
Amah in amaute galsap a, “Lawmte, nga khat beek man lo maw?” a ci hi. Amaute in,“Man het lo,” ci-in a dawng uh hi.

Amah in, “Na len-un na gunkuang taklam pang uh khuh dih un; tua hileh pawlkhat na man ding uh hi,” a ci hi. Amaute in a khuh uh ciangin nga tam awk lua ahi manin a len uh gunkuang sung a tun zo kei uh hi.

Tua ciangin Jesu it nungzui pa in Peter kiangah, “Topa hi!” a ci hi. “Topa hi” a cih Simon Peter in a zak phetin a puan tungnung tengin (ahang in, amah puansilh loin a om hi) tui sungah a diangkhia pah hi.
Nungzui dangte tuigei pan a gamla lo tong zanihb bangah om uh a, amaute in len dima ngasa kai kawmin gunkuangin a zui uh hi.
Tui gei a tun uh ciangin amaute in tua lai-ah meihol-am tunga ngasa le anlum kihang a mu uh hi.
Jesu in amaute kiangah, “Tu-a na ngasa matte uh tawm hong la dih un,” a ci hi.
Simon Peter gunkuang tungah kah a, tui gei-ah len a kai hi. Ngasa a lian bekbek 153 tak a awk hi. Tua zahtak hi napi len a kek kei hi.
Jesu in amaute kiangah, “Hong pai unla zing-an ne un,” a ci hi. Nungzuite khat beek in, “Nang kua na hiam?” ci-in a dong ngam kei uh hi. Amaute in Topa ahilam a thei uh hi.
Jesu pai-in anlum la-a, amaute pia-in tua mah bangin ngasa zong a pia hi.
Hih in, Jesu misi pan a thawh kik zawh a nungzuite kiangah a kilah a thumveina ahi hi.

An a nek khit uh ciangin Jesu in Simon Peter kiangah, “John tapa Simon aw, hihte sangin kei nong it zaw taktak hiam?” a ci hi. Amah in, “Hihi Topa aw, nang kong it na thei hi,” a ci hi. Jesu in, “Ka tuunote na vak in,” a ci hi.
Jesu in, “John tapa Simon aw, kei nong it taktak hiam?” a ci kik hi. Amah in, “Hihi Topa aw, nang kong it na thei hi,” ci-in a dawng hi. Jesu in, “Ka tuute na cing in,” a ci hi.

Ama kiangah, “John Tapa Simon aw, kei nong it hiam?” ci-in a thumveina a dong hi. Jesu in, “Kei nong it hiam?” ci-a a thumveina a dot manin Peter lungsim a nasak hi. Amah in “Topa aw, na khempeuh na thei hi; nang kong it na thei hi,” a ci hi. Jesu in, “Ka tuute na vak in.

Thutak kong geninah, na khangno zawk lai-in nang le nang kizemin na utna peuhah na pai hi. Ahi hangin na khangham ciangin na khutte zanin midang khatpeuh in nang hong zem dinga, na pai nop lohna pi-ah hong paipih ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Hih thu pen bangci bang sihna tawh Peter in Pasian a minthansak ding cih Jesu in a genna ahi hi. Tua ciangin amah in ama kiangah, “Kei hong zui in,” a ci hi.
Peter a nunghei leh Jesu it nungzui pa-in amaute a zuih laitak a mu hi. (Hih pa pen, nitak-an a nek khawm lai-ua Jesu tungah kingama “Topa, kua-in nang hong lehhek ding hiam?” ci-a a dong pa ahi hi.)
Peter in amah a muh ciangin, “Topa amah bangci ding?” ci-in a dong hi.
Jesu in, “Amah kong pai kik dong a nungta lai dingin deih leng zong nang tawh bang kisai hiam? Nang kei nong zuih pelmawh kul hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.

Hih thu hangin ‘Hih nungzui pa a si kei ding hi,’ ci-in sanggamte lakah kam lengsawn a kithang hi. Ahi hangin Jesu in amah si lo ding a cihna hi lo-a, “Kong pai kik dong amah a nungta lai dingin deih leng zong nang tawh bang kisai hiam,” a ci hi bek hi.
Hih nate ah teci panga a gelh pa hih nungzui pa ahi hi. Ama teci panna amaan hi, cih i thei hi.
Jesu in nadang tampi zong a sem lai hi. A vekpi in kigelh khin hileh leitung buppi nangawn in a kigelh ding laibute a koih nading mun a nei kei ding hi, ci-in ka um hi.
Theophilus aw, ka laibu masa sungah Jesu in a septe le a hilhte khempeuh a kipat tunga kipan
a teelsa sawltakpite tungah Khasiangtho tungtawna a lah khit ciangin vantungah a kilaktoh ni donga thute ka gelh ahi hi.

A thuak dingte a thuak khit nungin hih mite kiangah amah mah kilak-a, amah a nungta takpi ahina, a uptak kitelna tampitak a lak hi. Amaute kiangah amah kilak in, ni sawmli sung Pasian gam thu a gen hi.
Khatvei amaute tawh an a nek khawm laitakun amah in: “Jerusalem nusia kei un. Ahi zongin kong gen na zaksa uh ka Pa in letsong hong piak dinga hong ciam, na ngak un.
Ahang in, John in tui-ina hong baptise hi. Ahi hangin ni tawmkha khit ciangin Khasiangtho-in na kibaptisa ding uh hi,” ci-in thu a pia hi.
Tua ahi ciangin amaute a kisuktuah khawm laitakun, “Topa aw, Israel tungah tuhunin kumpi-gam ding kiksak ding na hi hiam?” ci-in dong uh hi.
Amah in amaute kiangah, “Pa in ama thuneihna tawh a seh ani ahi zongin ahun ahi zongin note theih ding hi lo hi.
Ahi hangin note tungah Khasiangtho hong tun ciangin vangliatna na ngah ding uh a, Jerusalem, Judea gam, Samaria gam khempeuh le leimong dongah ka tecite na hi ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua teng a cih khit ciangin amaute muh mahmah in amah kilato a, amaute muhtawp ah meii in a liah hi.
Amah a paito amaute in a et zuizui laitakun, amaute gei-ah thakhatin puanpak silh mi nih a ding hi.

Amaute in, “Galilee mite aw, hih lai-ah vanlam enin bang hangin ding na hi uh hiam? Note kiang pan vantung ah kilato hih Jesu tektek mah vantung ah a pai na muh bangun hong pai kik ding hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin khuapi pana Sabbath ni khat lamb a gamla Olive Vum kici mualno panin Jerusalem ah a ciah kik uh hi.

Amaute a tun uh ciangin amau omna ngei dei tungnung ah a pai uh hi. Tua lai-a omte: Peter, John, James le Andrew; Philip le Thomas, Bartholomew le Matthew; Alphaeus tapa James le Zealot pawla Simon le James tapa Judas-te ahi uh hi.
Amaute in numeite, Jesu sanggamte le a nu Mary tawh thu a ngen khawm tawntung uh hi.
Tua nite in, thu-umtec (za le sawm nih bang a pha ding mi hon khat) lak panin Peter ding to-a,
"Sanggamte aw, tanglai peka Khasiangtho in David kam tawna a na gen, Jesu a mante a makaih Judas tawh kisai Laisiangtho thu a tangtun ding kisam hi.
Tuapa eite lakah khat hi-a i naseppih ahi hi,” a ci hi.
(Judas in a gitlohna mana a ngah pahtakman tawh lo khat a lei hi. Tua munah bungbu kiatin a pumpi kitam a, a gilzangte buakhia hi.
Jerusalem a om mi peuhmah in hih thu a za uh hi. Tua ahi ciangin amaute in tua mun amau kamin, Sisan-lo cihna Akeldama, ci-in a phuak uh hi.)

Peter in, “Bang hang hiam na ci uh leh Phatna-late bu sungah, “‘Ama mun kinusia ta hen; tua sungah a teng ding kuamah om kei hen,’d tua ciangin, ‘Ama makaihna mun midang in laih ta hen’”e ci-in kigelh zo hi.
Tua ahi manin Topa Jesu eite lakah sungtum pusuak in a om sung khempeuh,

John baptise a kipan eite kiang pana Jesu a kilaktoh hun dong eite tawh a om khawmsa mite lak-a khat i teel ding kisam hi. Ahang in, tuate lakah khat in eite tawh ama thawhkikna teci a pan tektek ding kisam hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin mi nih: Barsabbas kici Joseph (Justus zong a kici) le Mathias-te a sehkhia uh hi.
Tua khit ciangin thu ngen uh a, “Topa aw, mi khempeuh lungtang na thei hi.
Judas ama munah pai-a, a nusiat hih sawltakpi nasep a sem ding hih mi nihte kua zaw teel na hi hiam, kote hong lak in,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin ai lawn uh a, Mathias tung a tu hi. Tua ahi ciangin amah sawltakpi sawm-le-khat lakah kigawm beh hi.
Pentecost ni a tun ciangin amaute a vekpi un mun khatah a om khawm uh hi.
Van pan thakhatin huihpi nung ging bangin ging a, amaute tutna inn sung khempeuh a dim hi.
Amaute in meileiite hileh a kilawm amah le amah kikhenin amaute tung tekah a khawl ciat a mu uh hi.
Amaute khempeuh Khasiangtho tawh kidim uh a, Kha hihsak theih bang, kam dangtea in a pau uh hi.
Tua lai-in van nuai-a minam khempeuh panin a pai Pasian kihta Jew-te, Jerusalem ah a tam lai uh hi.
Amaute in hih awging a zak uh ciangin mi hon khat lungmangin va kikhawm uh hi. Ahang in, amaute thugente amau pau ciatin a za uh hi.
Amaute in lamdang sa lua mahmah uh a, “Hih mite a vekpi-un Galilee-te pau-a pau mi hi lo uh ahi hiam?
Tua hi napi eite in amaute pau, ei pianpih pau tekin i zak theih bangci dan hiam?
Parthia-te Media-te Elam-te;Meso - potamia le, Judea le Cappadocia, Pontus le Asia,
Phrygia, le Pamphylia, Egypt le Cyrene kianga Libya gam khente a tengte; Rome pana a hawhte,
(Jew-te le Jew biakna a zuite tawh); Cret-te le Arab-te – eite khempeuh in, amaute in Pasian nalamdang bawlte a gen uh ei pau ciatin lah i za mawk a!” ci-in a kidong uh hi.
Lamdang sa mahmah in lungzing uh a, “Bang cihna hi peuhmah ding hiam?” a kici uh hi.
Ahi zongin mi pawlkhatte in amaute nuihsan in, “Lenggahzu tam dawn lua ta uh hi,”b a ci uh hi.

Tua ciangin Sawm-le-khatte tawh Peter ding to-a a aw sangsak in mihonte kiangah, “Ka mipih Jew-te le Jerusalem a om note khempeuh aw, hih thu note tungah kong telgen ding hi. Ka thugen limtakin na ngai un.
No upmawh bangin hih mite zukham hi lo uh hi. Tu-in zingsang nai kua sat pan bek hi!
Hi lo hi, hih in kamsangpa Joel in a na gen:
"Pasian in, ‘Ni nunungte ah mi khempeuh tungah ka Kha ka sungkhia ding hi. Na tanute na tapate un kamsang ding uh a, na tangvalte un mangmu in, na putekte un mang a man ding uh hi.
Tua ni ciangin, ka nasem numei le pasalte tung nangawn ah ka Kha ka sungkhia ding a, amaute in thu a genkhol ding uh hi.
Tunglam vanah a lamdangte le nuailam leitungah limte le sisan le mei le meikhu sahpite ka lak ding hi.
A lian a minthang Topa ni hong tun ma-in ni khuamial suak dinga khapi sisan a suak ding hi.
Tua ciangin Topa min a lote peuhmah kihonkhia ding hi,’c a cihsa ahi hi.
"Israel mite aw, hih thu ngai un: note in na theih mah bangun Nazareth mi Jesu pen Pasian in note lakah ama tungtawna a bawl nalamdangte, a lamdangte le limte tawh Pasian in a kipsak mi ahi hi.
Pasian in a tupsa le a theihkholhsa bangin note khutah hong kipia hi. Tua ciangin note in mitatsiated huhna tawh singlamteh tungah na kilhlum uh hi.
Ahi hangin sihna in amah lenden zo lo ahi manin, Pasian in misi pan thokiksak a, sih gentheihna pan a suaktasak hi.
David in ama thu a genna-ah: “ ‘Ka mai-ah Topa ka mu tawntung hi. Ka taklamah om ahi manin, kei ka ling kei ding hi.
Tua ahi manin ka lung nuam a; ka leii a kipak hi; ka pumpi zong lametna-in a nungta ding hi.
Ahang in, hankhuk ah kei nong nusia kei dinga, na Mi Siangthopa zong na muatsak kei ding hi.
Nuntakna lampi kei nong theisak zo hi; na omna munah lungnopna tawh kei nong dim ding hi,’e a na ci hi.
Sanggamte aw, pupi David si zo a, kivui zo-in, tuni mahmah in hih lai-ah a han om hi, cih kimuangtakin kong gen thei hi.
Ahi hangin amah kamsang khat hi-a, Pasian in kiciama, ama suante sung pan khat ama kumpi tokhoma, a tutsak ding a kamciamsa a thei hi.
Hong tung ding mukhol ahi manin hankhuk sungah kinusia lo-a, a pumpi zong muat lo ding, ci-in Khristf thawhkikna thu a na genkhol hi.
Pasian in hih Jesu thosakin nung tasaka, hih thu a taktak a hina kote khempeuh, teci ka hi uh hi.
Amah Pasian taklam ah kitawisang a, Pa kiang pana kamciamsa Khasiangtho ngahin ama hong buakkhiat tu-a na muh na zakte uh ahi hi.
Ahang in, David vantung ah kah lo napi: “‘Topa in ka Topa kiangah,
"Na galte khempeuh na khepekte ngak nading ka suahsak matengin ka taklam ah na tu in,”’g ci hi.
"Tua ahi manin Israel mi khempeuh in tel ta un: Na kilhluppa uh hih Jesu, Pasian in Topa le Khrist suaksak zo hi,” a ci hi.
Mite in hih thu a zak uh ciangin a lung uh vut a, Peter le sawltakpi dangte kiangah, ‘Sanggamte aw, bang hih ding ka hi uh hiam?” a ci uh hi.
Peter in, “Na mawhnate uh a kimai sak theih nadingin note, na vekpi un kisik unla Jesu Khrist minin na kibaptise un. Tua ciangin Khasiangtho letsong na ngah ding uh hi.
Tua kamciam pen note le na tate uh ading le gamlapi-a omte khempeuh ading – i Topa Pasian in a sap dingte khempeuh ading ahi hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Kammal dang tampi tawh amaute vauhilh a, “Hih a kisiasa khang mite panin note kihonkhia un,” ci-in amaute tungah a thum hi.
Ama thu gen a sangte kibaptise uh a, tua ni-in amau pawl sungah mi tul thum bang a kibehlap hi.
Sawltakpite thuhilhna le amau tawh kithuahna, anlum balkhapna le thu ngetnate ah, amau le amau a va kipumpiak uh hi.
Mi khempeuh in lamdang sa mahmah uh a, sawltakpite in alamdang tampi le apiandang limte a bawl uh hi.
Thu-umte khempeuh omkhawm uh a na khempeuh a nei khawm uh hi.
A neihsate uh le a vante uh zuakin mi khatpeuh a kisapna bangbangin a pia uh hi.
Nisimin biakinnpi huangte sungah a kithuah khawm ngitnget uh hi. Amaute innah anlum balkhamin lungdamna le itna lungsimtak tawh nekhawm uh a,
Pasian phatin, mi khempeuh in angvanna nuam a sa uh hi. Topa in nisimin amau pawl sungah a kihonkhia mi a kibehlapsak hi.
Ni khat, nitak lam nai thum laitak thunget hunin biakinnpi ah Peter le John paito uh hi.
Tua laitakin a suah tunga mipoi khat, biakinnpi huangte sunga paite tungah khutdawh-a ngen dingin nisima a kikoihna mun Kilawm kici biakinnpi kongpi ah kipuak hi.
Tuapa in Peter le John a lut dektak a muh ciangin amaute kiangah sum a ngen hi.
Peter in amah en gega a, John in zong a en hi. Tua ciangin Peter in “Ko hong en dih in!” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin tuapa in, amaute in bang khatpeuh a piak ding uh lamena, a law pet hi.
Tua ciangin Peter in, “Kham ahi-a ngun ahi zongin ka nei kei hi. Ahi hangin ka neih pen nang kong pia hi. Nazareth mi Jesu Khrist minin lam pai in,” a ci hi.
A khut taklam ah manin kaito a, tua mipa khepekte le siakmite thahatin a khauh hi.
Amah a khe-in diang to a, lam a pai hi. Tua ciangin amaute tawh biakinnpi huangte sungah paikhawma, pai-in dianga Pasian a phat hi.
Mite khempeuh in amah lam pai a Pasian a phat a muh uh ciangin,
Kilawm kici biakinn kongpi-a tu, khutdawh-a ngen pa mah hi cih thei tel uh a, amaute in tuapa tunga thupiangte lamdangsa in a lungmang uh hi.
Khutdawh-a ngenpa in Peter le John a zuihzuih laitakin, mi khempeuh in lamdang sa uh a, amaute omna Solomon Talap a kicihna mun ah a tai uh hi.

Peter in a muh ciangin amaute kiangah, “Israel mite aw, bang hangin hih in note lamdang hong sasak ahi hiam? Kote vang tawh ahikeh ka pasianmina uh hanga hih mipa lam a paisak thei bangin bang hangin kote hong hi ci et na hi uh hiam?
Abraham, Isaac le Jacob-te’ Pasian, i pate Pasian in ama nasem Jesu min thangsak zo hi. Note in amah thah dingin na piakhia uh a, Pilate in amah khah ding thukim napi ama mai-ah amah na nolh uh hi.
Note in a Siangtho le Thumaan Pa na nolh uh a, tualthat khat no kianga hong khah dingin na ngen uh hi.
Note in nuntakna a piapa na that uh a, ahi hangin Pasian in amah misi pan a thosak hi. Hih thuah kote teci ka hi uh hi.
Note in na muh uh le na theih uh hih mipa Jesu min upna hangin kihatsak hi. Note khempeuh in na muh uh bangin ama tunga damsiangna a pia pen Jesu min le ama tungtawna hong pai upna ahi hi.
"Tu-in sanggamte aw, na makaite uh hih bangin khuaphawk loin a gamtat uh ka thei hi.
Ahi hangin Pasian in kamsangte khempeuh tungtawn a, ‘Khrista in thuak ding hi,’ ci-a a gen kholhsate a tangtunsakna hih bang ahi hi.
Tua ahi ciangin kisikin Pasian lam nga kik un. Tua hileh na mawhnate uh kisiaksiangin Topa tung panin thathak ngahna hun hong tung thei dinga;
tua ciangin note adinga kisehsa tua Khrist – Jesu nangawn note kiangah hong sawl thei ding hi.
Sawt lai peka ama kamsang siangthote tungtawna a kamciam bangin Pasian in na khempeuh a bawlphat hun hong tun masiah amah ahileh pel loin vantung ah a om lai ding hi.
Ahang in, Moses in, ‘Topa na Pasian un nomau mite lak panin note adingin kei tawh kibang kamsang khat hong khangkhiasak ding hi; amah in note tungah hong gen peuhmah na man pelmawh uh kul hi.
Ama thu a ngai lo peuhpeuh ama mite lak panin kikhenkhia siang ding hi,’b ci hi.
"Hi takpi hi, Samuel a kipan, kamsangte khempeuh thu na gen zahzah in tu lai hunte a na genkhol zo hi.

Tua hi-a kamsangte le Pasian in, na pu na pa-te uh tawh thukhunna a na bawlsate a luahte na hi uh hi. Amah in Abraham tungah, ‘Na suan na khakte tungtawnin leitunga mi om khempeuh thupha kipia ding hi,’c ci hi.
Pasian in a nasempa a khankhiatsak ciangin note, na tatsiatna panun na vekun kikhelin thupha hong piak theih nadingin note kiangah hong sawl masa hi,” a ci hi.
Peter le John in mipite tungah thu a gengen laitakun siampite, biakinnpi cing makaipa le Sadducee-te va pai uh hi.
Sawltakpite in Jesu ah misite a thawhkikna mipite tungah hilhin a tangkona un, amaute a lungzingsak mahmah hi.
Amaute in Peter le John man uh a, nitaklam ahi manin a zingciang dong thong sungah a khum uh hi.
Ahi hangin amaute thupuak a za mi tampi in um uh a, pasal tulnga bang pha ta hi.
A zing ciangin gam-ukte, upate le thukham siate Jerusalem ah a kikhawm uh hi.
Tua lai-ah tulpi Annas om a, amah tawh Caiaphas, John Alexandar le adang tulpite innkuanpihte zong a om hi.
Amaute in Peter le John a mai-uah dingsak uh a: “Bang vangliatna le bang min tawh hih bawl na hi uh hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi.
Tua ciangin Khasiangtho tawh Peter kidima, amaute kiangah, “No gam-ukte le upate aw,
mipoi khat tunga migitna nasep hangin amah bangci dam hiam cih thusitna thuak dingin tuni-in ko hong kisam ahileh,

note le Israel gama midangte khempeuh in hih thu thei ta un. A dam siang sinsensa a note mai-a ding hih mipa pen, note in na kilhlup uh, ahi hanga Pasian in misi pana a thawhkiksak pa Nazareth mi Jesu Khrist min hanga dam ahi hi.
Amah, “‘No innlamte nolh suang, inntungkhuma suang a suak ahi hi,’b
Midang khat beek sungah hotkhiatna a om kei hi. Ahang in, eite kihotkhiat nading van kikhupsin nuai-a mihing tungah a kipia, min dang a om kei hi,” a ci hi.
Amaute in Peter le John a hanna mu uh a, lai siam lo mi mawkmawk ahilam uh thei uh ahi ciangin lamdang sa-in hih mite Jesu tawh a om khawm uh hi, cih a phawk uh hi.
Ahi hangin cina a damsakpa uh amau tawh ding khawm a muh theih manun bangmah a gen thei kei uh hi.
Tua ahi ciangin Sanhedrin panin kihemkhia dinga thu a piak khit uh ciangin, amaute thu a kikum uh hi.
Amaute in, “Hih mite bang cih ding i hi hiam? Jerusalem a teng mi peuhmah in lah, nalamdang thupi khat a bawl uh thei uh a, i nial nading lah a om kei hi.
Ahi hangin tu-a ban, hih thute milakah a kizelhbeh nawn loh nadingin kham ni. Hih min tawh mi khatpeuh tungah thu a gen nawn loh nadingun i vauhilh kul hi,” a kici uh hi.
Tua khit ciangin amaute sam kik uh a, Jesu minin thu gena, a hilh nawn het loh nadingun thu a pia uh hi.
Ahi hangin Peter le John in “No le no kingaihsun dih un, Pasian mitmuhna ah Pasian thu sangin no thu kong man ding uh, koi maanzaw ding ahi hiam?
Ahang in, ka muhsa uh le ka zaksa uh thu gen loin ka om thei kei uh hi,” ci-in a dawng uh hi.
A nasia zaw in tawng’ uh a, tua khit ciangin amaute a paikhiasak uh hi. A piangsa thu hangin mi khempeuh in Pasian phat uh ahi manin, amaute in gawtna a piak nading uh a khensat thei kei uh hi.
Ahang in, a lamdangtaka kidamsak tua mipa kum sawmli val upa ta hi.
Peter le John a kikhah ciangin amau mite kiangah pai kik uh a, amaute tunga siampi makaite le upate thugen khempeuh a zasak uh hi.
Amaute in hih thu a zak uh ciangin a aw uh sangsakin Pasian kiangah thu a ngen khawm uh hi. Amaute in, “Thuneipipen Topa aw, vantung, leitung, tuipite le a sunga omte khempeuh na bawlsa ahi hi.
Na nasempa ka pa uh David kam tawnin Khasiangtho-in na gen a: “‘Bang hang minamte heh a, mite in a mawknapi sawmsim uh hiam?
Topa langa pang ding le a Sathau Nilh-pac langpang dingin, leitung kumpite panmun la-in, gam-ukte a kikhawm uh hi,’d ci hi.
Hi takpi hi. Herod le Pontia Pilate in Gentile-te le hih khuapi sunga Israel mitee tawh kimu khawmin na sathau nilhsa pa, na nasem siangtho Jesu langpang dingin kithuhual uh hi.
Amaute in nang vangliatna le nang deihna-in a piang dinga a khentat kholsa bangin sem uh hi.
Tu-in Topa aw, amaute hong tawnna ngaihsun inla, hangtaka na thu a gen dingin na nasemte hihtheihna lianpi hong guan in.
Na nasem siangtho Jesu min tungtawnin cina damsaka, a lamdang limte lak ding le a lamdang tuamtuamte hih dingin na khut hong zankhia in,” a ci uh hi.
Thu a nget khit uh ciangin amau te kikhopna mun a ling hi. Amaute khempeuh Khasiangtho tawh kidim uh a, Pasian thu hangtakin a gen uh hi.
Thu-umte khempeuh, lungsim le ngaihsutna kikhatin a om uh hi. Amau neihsate kuamah in aituamin nei lo uh a, ahi hangin a neih khempeuh uh a neikhawm uh hi.
Sawltakpite in, vangliatna lianpi tawh Topa Jesu thawhkikna teci pang uh a amaute khempeuh tungah hehpihna tampitak a tung hi.
Amaute lakah a kitasam a om kei hi. Ahang in, leitangte ahikeh inn neite in a hunhunin zuak uh a, a khot uh sumte,
sawltakpite khe phungah koihin a kitasam peuhpeuh tungah a hawm uh hi.
Cyprus pan, Joseph kici Levi mi khat, sawltakpite in Barnabas (Hanthawnna Tapa cihnopna) a cih uh mipa in
lo khat a neih zuak a, a sum paipihin sawltakpite khephungah a koih hi.
A min Ananias kici mi khat in zong a zi Sapphira tawh a neihsa leitang a zuak khawm uh hi.
A zi theihpih sinsenin amah mah in a sum khenkhat a im hi. Ahi hangin a ip loh teng sawltakpite khe phungah va puak hi.
Tua ciangin Peter in, “Ananias aw, Satan in na lungsim hong zo-in, Khasiangtho khema, na leitang zuak mana na ngah sum pawlkhat nang adingin na kep, bangci bang hiam?

A kizuak ma-in zong nang aa hi lo ahi hiam? A kizuak khit ciangin zong tua sumte nang thu-a na zat theih hi lo ahi hiam? Tua banga hih ding ngaihsutna bang in hong neisak hiam? Mihingte khem hi loin Pasian khem na hi hi,” a ci hi.
Ananias in hih thu a zak ciangin, puksukin a si hi. Tua thupiang a zate khempeuh nak lau mahmah uh hi.
Tua ciangin tangvalnote pai-in a luang tun uh a, amah puakhia-in a vui uh hi.
Tua khit nai thum bang ciangin, thupiangte bangmah thei loin a zi a va lut hi.
Peter in, “Nang le Ananias in na leitang man-ua na ngah uh hih zah mah ahi hiam? Hong gen dih in,” ci-in a dong hi. Amah in, “Himah, aman tua zah mah hi,” a ci hi.
Peter in, “Bangci-a Topa Kha zia-et ding kithukim na hi uh hiam? En dih in! Na pasal vuite khe kongkhak bulah om hi; nang zong hong puakhia ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua hun laitakin ama khephung ah puksukin a si hi. Tua ciangin tangvalnote tumin amah a sisa a om mu uh a, puakhia in a pasal geiah a vui uh hi.
Pawlpi bup le hih thu a zakha mi khempeuh a nak lau mahmah uh hi.
Sawltakpite in mite lakah lim lam dang le a lamdang tampi a bawl uh hi. Thu-umte khempeuh Solomon Talap ah a kituahkhawm zel uh hi.
Mipite in amaute tunget mahmah tei napi, a pawlpih ngam kuamah a om kei hi.
Tua hi napi lah Topa a um numei pasal tam semsema amau pawlmi a kibehlap hi.
Tua thu hangin Peter in tua lai tawna a pai ciangin amaute pawlkhat alim in a liahkhak beek nadingin mite in a cinate uh lupna le phek in lampi-ah a na sial uh hi.
Jerusalem kima khuapite panin zong mihonpite va kikhawm uh a, a cinate uh le kha giloa in a gentheihsakte va puakin amaute khempeuh a dam uh hi.
Tua ciangin Sadducees pawlte sunga kihel tulpipa le ama kithuahpihte in a haza mahmah uh hi.
Amaute in sawl takpite man uh a, tangpi thong inn ah a khum uh hi.
Ahi hangin Topa vansawltak khat in zan laitakin thong kongkhakte hongin a paikhitpih hi.
Amah in, “Pai un, biakinnpi huangte ah ding unla, hih nuntak-thakna thupuak bucing mite tungah gen un,” a ci hi.

Amaute tunga kigensa bangin khuavak phetin biakinnpi huangte ah lut uh a, mite thu a hilh uh hi. Tulpipa le a kithuahpihte a tun uh ciangin Israel upate—Sanhedrin khempeuh kikhawmsakin, thonga sawltakpite a samsak uh hi.
Ahi hangin thong inn a tun uh ciangin makaite in tua lai-ah amaute a mu kei uh hi. Tua ciangin amaute ciah kik uh a,
"Thong inn muanhuai taka kikalh le kongkhakte ah a cingte a ding ka mu uh hi. Ahi hangin tuate ka hon uh ciangin a sungah kuamah ka mu kei uh hi,” ci-in a zasak uh hi.
Hih zaksakna a zak uh ciangin biakinnpi cingte makaipa le siampi makaite in, hih thu bang hong suak zen tam, ci-in a lungmang uh hi.
Tua ciangin mi khat va pai a, “En un, thong sunga na khum uh mite in, biakinnpi huangte sungah dingin mite thu hilh uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua phetin biakinn cing makaipa a makaihpih teng tawh va pai uh a, sawltakpite hong tonpih uh hi. Mipite in suang tawh a den ding lau uh ahi manin thagum a suang kei uh hi.
Sawltakpite a tunpih khit uh ciangin tulpipa thusit dingin Sanhedrin mai-ah a dingsak uh hi.
Amah in, “Hih minin thu na hilh loh nadingun thukhauh kong pia zo uh hi. Ahi hangin na thuhilhna un Jerusalem khua sung teng zelkhin a, hih mipa sisan ah ko nong mawhkhusak uh hi,” a ci hi.
Peter le sawltakpi dangte in, “Mihing thu sangin Pasian thu ka man zawk pelmawh uh kul ding hi.
Amah sing tungah khai-a na thah pa uh Jesu, ka pate uh Pasian in misi pan thosak zo hi.
Amah in Israel-te tungah kisikna leh mawhmaisakna a piak theih nadingin Pasian in amah tawisanga ama taklamah koih in, Kumpitapa le Honpa in a tusak hi.
Hih thu ah kote teci ka hi uh a, Pasian in ama thu a mangte a piak Khasiangtho zong teci ahi hi,” a ci uh hi.
Amaute in hih thu a zak uh ciangin lungso uh a, amaute a that nuam uh hi.
Ahi hangin mi khempeuh in a zahtak uh Gamaliel kici thukham sia Pharisee khat Sanhedrin sungah ding to a, tua mite tawm vei sung a pua lamah omsak phot nading thu a pia hi.
Tua ciangin amaute tungah thu gen a, “Israel mite aw, hih mite na bawl nopna thu uh limtakin ngaihsun un.
A beisa hun khat lai-in Theudas hong kilang in, mi gina ngel khatin hong kigena mi zali bang in amah pawl uh hi. Amah kithat in, ama nungzuite maimang a, bangmah ahi kei hi.
Mi kisim hun laitakin ama nungah Galilee mi Judas kilang leuleu a, gam lehdo mi honkhat a makaih hi. Amah zong kithata, a nungzuite a kithehthang uh hi.
Tua ahi manin tu laitaka i thu tawh kisai-in ngaihsutna kong piak nopinah: hih mite hi ci omsak un! Khahkhong lel un! Ahang in, amau sawm le a nasepte uh mihing sawm lel ahileh lawhsam ding uh hi.
Ahi hangin Pasian pan ahileh mite na kho zo kei ding uh hi; Pasian langdo na hi lel kha ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
A thugen in amaute a thuzawh hi. Amaute in inn sungah sawltakpite sam in a sat uh hi. Tua ciangin amaute in Jesu mina thu a gen nawn loh nadingun thu pia uh a, amaute a khah uh hi.
Sawltakpite, tua Min hanga zah lakna a thuak tham dinga a om uh nuam uh a, Sanhedrin panin a paikhia uh hi.
Ni khat khit ni khat biakinnpi tual le inn khat pan inn khatah, Jesu in Khristb hi cih lungdamna thu tawlnga loin hilhin a tangko uh hi.
Tua hun lai-in nungzuite tam semsem uh a, nisim an hawmna tawh kisai-in Greek-Jew-te in amau meigongte kithu don lo hi, ci-in Hebrew-Jew-te a phunsan uh hi.
Tua ciangin Sawm-le-nihte in, nungzuite khempeuh kikhawmsak uh a, “Pasian thu gen ding thu don lo liangin annek tuidawn dingah kong tuanvai uh leh ko adingin man lo ding hi.
Sanggamte aw, note lakah Kha le pilna tawh kidim pasal sagih teel un. Tuate tungah hih nasep ka suan ding uh a,
kote in thungetna le nasepna kong hahbawl ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi.

Hih thusun in a pawl bup uh a lungkimsak hi. Amaute in upna le Khasiangtho tawh adim Stephen; tua banah Philip, Procorus, Nicanor, Timon, Parmenas le Jew biakna-a kikhel Antioch pana Nicolas zong a teel uh hi.
Amaute in hih mite sawltakpite tungah ap uh a, amaute in a lutung-uah a khut uh nga-in thu a ngetsak uh hi.
Tua bangin Pasian thu a kizel hi. Jerusalem ah nungzuite khang semsem a, siampite tampi in tua upna a zui uh hi.
Tu-in Stephen, Pasian hehpihna le vang tawh a dim mi khat hi-a, mite lakah a piandang mahmah le a lamdang limte a bawl hi.

Ahi zongin Synagogue-a Salsuaktate (amaute a kilawhna uh) pawlmite langpanna hong piang hi. Tuate Syrene le Alexandria, Cilicia le Asia gamkhente pana a pai Jew-te ahi uh hi. Hih mite in Stephen thu a sel uh hangin,
ama pilna le a thugenna-a pang, Kha langah a pang zo kei uh hi.
Tua ciangin mi pawlkhat zolsim uh a, “Stephen in Moses le Pasian langah daisakna thu a gen ka za uh hi,” a cisak uh hi.
Tuaci-in amaute in mipite le upate le thukham siate a hansuah uh hi. Amaute in Stephen man uh a Sanhedrin mai-ah a tun uh hi.
Teci zuau phuak-a teci pang amaute in, “Hihpa in mun siangtho le thukham a langgen niloh hi.
Kote in, ‘Hih Nazareth mi Jesu in hih mun susia dinga, Moses in eite khuta hong piaksawm i pupa ngeina a kheng ding hi,’ a cih ka za uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Sanhedrin a tu mi khempeuh in Stephen limtakin entek uh a, amaute in a maitang, vansawltak maitang tawh kibangin a mu tek uh hi.
Tua ciangin tulpipa in ama kiangah, “Hihte hong matna a maan hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
Hih thu a dawnna in amah in, “Sanggamte le pate aw, ka thugen na ngai un! I pa Abraham Haran-a a ten ma Mesopotamia a, a om lai-in ama kiangah minthanna Pasian a kilang hi.
Pasian in, 'Na gam le na mite nusia inla, kong lah nading gamah pai in,’a ci hi.
"Tua ahi ciangin Chaldea gam nusia in Haran ah a teng hi. A pa a sih khit ciangin tu-a note tenna mun hih leitang ah Pasian in amah sawl hi.

Amah in ama tungah a luah ding leitang khepek cia nangawn a pia kei hi. Ahi hangin Abraham in ta a neih loh lai nangawn in, amah le a nunga asuan akhakte in tua leitang a tang ding uh hi, cih Pasian in kamciam khin hi.
Pasian in ama tungah: ‘Na suan na khakte amau gam lo khatah mikhualin om ding uh a, amaute sila suakin, kum zali sung kibawlsia ding hi.
Ahi hangin amaute sal-a a khawi mite ka gawt ding hi, ci-in gen a, tua nung ciangin amaute tua mun pan paikhia ding uh a, hih munah kei hong bia ding uh hi,’b Pasian in ci hi.

Tua ciangin Abraham tungah vun at ding thukhun a pia hi. Tua hi-a Abraham, Isaac’ pa hong hi-in a suah khit ni giat ciangin a vun a at hi. Tua nung ciangin Isaac, Jacob’ pa hong hi-a James, pupi sawm le nihte pa hong suak hi.
Pupite in Joseph a hazat manun Egypt ah sila-in a zuak uh hi. Ahi hangin Pasian in amah ompih a,

ama lungkhamna khempeuh panin hukhia hi. Amah in Joseph tungah pilna le Egypt kumpi Pharaoh mai-ah maipha ngahna a pia hi. Tua ahi ciangin amah in Egypt gam khempeuh le a kumpi inn sung khempeuh a uksak hi.
"Tua ciangin Egypt le Canaan gam sung khempeuh ah kialpi tungin, gim thuakna lianpi tunga, i pate in an a mu zo kei uh hi.
Egypt ah an om hi cih Jacob in a zak ciangin i pate a khat veina hawh dingin a sawl hi.
A nih veina a hawh uh ciangin, Joseph in a sanggamte kiangah amah kua hi hiam cih kigen a, Pharaoh in Joseph innkuan sung thu a na thei hi.
Hihte khit ciangin Joseph in a pa Jacob a innkuan bup tawh samsaka, a vekun sawm sagih le nga a pha uh hi.
Tua ciangin amah le i pate sihna mun Egypt ah Jacob a paisuk hi.
Amaute luangte Shechem ah kipuak kika, Abraham in Shechem-a Harmor tate tung pana sum bangzah hiam khat tawh a leisa hankhuk sungah kisial hi.
Pasian in Abraham tunga a kam ciam a tangtunsak ding hun a nai ciangin Egypt a i mite kibehlapin tam mahmah uh hi.
Tua ciangin Joseph thu bangmah a thei kha lo kumpi dang khat in, Egypt gam uk hi.
Amah in i mipihte khembawl in, i pute nengcipa, a ta suakthakte uh, a sih nadingin thatang hat thu-in a paikhiasak hi.
"Tua hun laitakiin Moses suak a, amah naupang mawkmawk ahi kei hi.c Ahang in, a pa inn sungah kha thum sung kikem hi.
A pua-ah a kikoihkhiat ciangin Pharaoh tanu in amah la a, ama tapa bangin khoi hi.
Moses in Egypt pilna khempeuh sin a, thugenna le nasepna ah a vanglian hi.
"Moses kum sawmli a phak ciangin ama mipih Israel mite veh ding a khensat hi.
Ama mipihte khat, Egypt-te khatin a khelbawl laitak mu-a, a hu dingin va pai-in, a phulakna in Egypt pa a that hi.
Moses in, Pasian in amaute honkhia dingin amah zang hi, cih a phawk ding uh hi, ci-in a ngaihsun hi. Ahi hangin amaute in a phawk kei uh hi.
A zing ciangin Israel mite nih a kilai laitak Moses in a tuak hi. Amah in amaute lep sawmin, ‘Guaite aw, note sanggam khat hi napi, bang hanga khat le khat kisiasak nuam na hi uh hiam?’ ci hi.
"Ahi hangin a gilo-zawpa in Moses thalsawn a, ‘Kua in kote tungah uk a thukhenpa dingin nang hong koih ahi hiam?’
Zan-a Egypt pa na thah bangin kei hong that nuam na hi hiam?’d ci hi.
Moses in hih thu a zak ciangin, Midian ah taimang sanin tua lai-ah mikhualin va tenga tapa nih a nei hi.
"Kum sawmli khit ciangin Sinai Vum kiang gamlakah vansawltak khat, sawl kawm meikuangin Moses kiangah kilang hi.
Amah in hih a muh ciangin a na muh lamdang a sa mahmah hi. A naizaw-a en dingin a pai leh amah in Topa aw za a:
‘Na pate uh Pasian, Abraham, Isaac le Jacob-te’ Pasian ka hi hi,’e ci hi. Moses lau in linga, a en ngam kei hi.
"Tua ciangin Topa in ama kiangah, “Na dinna mun siangtho ahi manin na khedap suahkhia in.
Egypt a ka mite a kinencipna ka mu zo hi. Amaute tauna ka za zo-a, a suaktasak dingin hong paisuk ka hi hi. Tu-in hong pai in, Egypt ah kong sawl kik ding hi,’f ci hi.

"Amaute in, ‘Kua in kote tungah uk a thukhenpa dingin nang hong koih ahi hiam?’ ci-a, a thu a nialpa uh hih Moses mah ahi hi. Amaute ukpa le hukhia pa dingin Pasian mahmah in amah, sawl kawm meikuang sunga ama kianga kilang vansawltak tungtawna a sawl ahi hi,
Amah in amaute Egypt panin pai khiatpih a, Egypt gam, San Tuipig le sehnel-gam ah kum sawmli sung a lamdangte le lim lamdangte a bawl hi.
‘Pasian in nomau mite lak panin keimah bang kamsang khat hong sawl ding hi,’h ci-a Israel-te tungah a na hilh pa tua Moses mah ahi hi.
Amah sehnel-gam a mihon kipawlkhawmte’ pate le Sinai Vum tunga amah a hopih van sawltak tawh a omkhawm hi; amah in eite tunga hong puaksawn ding a nungta thute a ngah hi.
"Ahi hangin i pate in ama thu a mang kei uh hi. A man’ sangsik un, amah nolh uh a, a lungtangte uh Egypt lam a nga kik uh hi.
Amaute in Aron kiangah, ‘Kote mai-a pai ding pasiante hong bawlsak in. Egypt pana hong pikhia hih mihing pa Moses lah bang suak ta hiam, ka thei kei uh hi!’i ci uh hi.
Amaute in bawngno suna lim a bawl uh tua hun lai ahi hi. Amaute in tua tungah kithoihnate puak uh a, a khut uh tawh a bawlsate uh pahtawi-in a lawm uh hi.

Ahi hangin Pasian in lehngatsana vantung nate biakna adingin amaute a ngawh piak hi. Hih kamsangte laibu sunga kigelhsa thu: “O Israel innkuante aw, gamlak ah kum sawmli sung, biakpiakna le biaknate kei nong puak uh hiam?
Moloch biakbukno le na pasian uh Rephan aksi, biak dinga na bawl uh milimte na tawisang uh hi. Tua ahi manin Babylon galkhatah salinj kong paisak ding hi,’ kici le hih thu kituak hi.
"I pu i pa-te in gamlak ah Teci panna biakbuk a nei uh hi. Tua pen, Pasian in Moses tunga a hilh, alim a muhsa banga kibawl ahi hi.
Biakbuk ngah khin in, Pasian in amaute mai-a a hawlkhiat minamte leitang a lak uh ciangin i pate in Joshua makaihna tawh tua biakbuk na pua uh a, tua biakbuk, David khanghun dong tua gamah a om hi.
Amah in Pasian angvanna nuamsa a, Jacobk Pasian ten nading a lamsak theih nading ngen hi.
Ahi hangin ama ading inn lam pa Solomon ahi hi.
"Bangbang ahi zongin a Sang Penpa ahileh mihing bawlsa innte ah a teng kei hi. Kamsangpa gen bangin:
"‘Vantung ka tokhom hi-a, leitung ka khe ngakna ahi hi. Kei ading bangci bang inn lam ding na hi hiam? Ahikeh ka khawl nading mun koi lai hi ding hiam?
Hih na khempeuh ka khuta ka bawlsa hi lo ahi hiam? Topa in ci hi.’l
"No a genhak mite, lungtang le bil vun-at lohte! Na pate uh tawh na kibang tektek uh hi. Note in Khasiangtho na nang ngitnget uh hi!
Na pate un a bawlsiat loh kamsang om ngei ahi hiam? Amaute in Thumaan Pa hong pai ding thu a genkholte nangawn a that uh hi.
Vansawltakte tungtawna kizang thu kham ngah napi a zui lo note in tu-in amah lehhekin na that uh hi,” a ci hi.
Amaute in hih thu a zak uh ciangin lungso uh a, a ha uh a gawisan uh hi.
Ahi hangin Khasiangtho tawh kidim Stephen in vantung lam ento-in, Pasian minthanna le Pasian taklam a ding Jesu a mu hi.
Amah in, “En un, van kihong le Pasian taklama Mihing Tapa a ding ka mu hi,” a ci hi.
Tua takteh, amaute in a bil uh hum uh a, a aw neih zah un kiko in amah a bawhhuan uh hi.
Khuapi sung panin talkaih gawp uh a, suangin a deng uh hi. Tua hun tektekin tecite in Saul kici tangvalno khat khephungah a puante uh a koih uh hi.
Amaute in amah suang tawh a den laitakun Stephen in, “Topa Jesu aw, ka kha na sang ta in,” ci-in thu a ngen hi.
Tua ciangin khukdin-a, “Topa aw, hih mawhna amaute tungah na phul kei in,” ci-in a kiko hi. Hih teng a cih khit ciangin a ihmu hi.
Saul zong tua lai-ah om a, ama sihna a thukimpih hi. Tua ni-in Jerusalem ah pawlpi kibawlsiatna lianpi om a, sawltakpite longal adangte khempeuh Judea le Samaria gam sung tengah a kithehhthang uh hi.
Pasian a zahtak mite in Stephen vui uh a, amah a kah ngutngut uh hi.
Ahi hangin Saul in pawlpite suksiat ding a kipan hi. Inn khat pan inn khatah pai-in numei hitaleh pasal hitaleh kaikhia gawpin amaute thong ah a khum hi.
A kithehthang mite in amau paina peuhpeuh ah thu a hilh uh hi.
Samaria gam khuapi khatah Philip paisuak a, tua lai-ah Khrista thu a tangko hi.
Mihonte in Philip thugen za uh a, a limlamdang bawlte a muh ciangun amaute khempeuh a kiangah va pai-in a thugen limtakin a ngai uh hi.
Mi tampi sung pan kha giloteb kiku vangvang in paikhia uh a, pumzawte le mipoite tampi a dam uh hi.
Tua ahi ciangin tua khuapi sungah lungdamna lianpi a tung hi.
Simon kici mi khat, khuapi sungah tawlkhat sung oma, ai sanin Samaria mi khempeuh in lamdang mahmah a sa uh hi. Amah mi lian khatin kingaihsun-a a kisial hi.
Mi lian mi neu, mi khempeuh in ama thu ngai-in, “Hih mipa, Vangliatna Lian kici Pasian vangliatna ahi hi,” ci-in a thangsak uh hi.
Amah in amaute sawtveipi a mitphial bawlna lamdang sasak mahmah ahi manin, amah a zui uh hi.
Ahi hangin Philip in Pasian gam thupha le Jesu Khrist min thute a hilh ciangin um uh a, a numei a pasalin a kibaptise uh hi.
Simon mahmah in zong uma a kibaptise hi. Amah in a lian lim lamdang le a nalamdang a muhte lamdang sa in Philip a zui kawikawi hi.
Jerusalem a sawltakpite in, Samaria ah Pasian thu kisang ta cih a zak uh ciangin amaute kiangah Peter leh John a sawl uh hi.
Amaute a tun uh ciangin Khasiangtho a ngah nadingun amaute thu a ngetsak uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute khat beek tungah Khasiangtho a tung nai kei hi; amaute Topa Jesu min sungahc a kibaptise pan bek uh hi.
Tua ahi ciangin Peter le John in amaute tungah a khut uh nga uh a, Khasiangtho a ngah uh hi.
Simon in sawltakpite khut ngakna tawh Kha kipia cih a muh ciangin amaute sum tah a,
"Ka khut ka ngaknate in Khasiangtho a ngah theih nadingin hih, hihtheihna kei zong hong pia un,” a ci hi.
Peter in, “Na sum tawh mangthang khawmta in! Bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian letsong sum tawh lei theih dingin na ngaihsut hi.
Pasian mai-ah na lungtang maan lo ahi manin hih nasepna sungah tanh ahi a, panna ahi zongin na nei kei hi.
Hih tatsiatna pan kisik inla, Topa tungah thu ngen in. Na lungsungah tua bang ngaihsutna na neih, amah in hong maisak kha thei ding hi.
Ahang in, khaatna tawh na kidim a, mawhna sila-in na om cih kong mu hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Tua ciangin Simon in, “Na gensate kei tungah bangmah hong tun loh nadingin Topa tungah thu hong ngetsak in,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Peter le John in Topa thu teci pangin a thansak khit uh ciangin Samaria gam khuaneu tampi ah lungdamna-thu a hilh kawmun Jerusalem ah a ciah kik uh hi.
Tu-in Topa vansawltak khain Philip tungah, "Jerusalem pana Gaza lama paisuk - gamlak lamneu ah leitaw-lam manawhin pai in," a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah kipankhia a, lampi ah Ethiopia mid cil kigetpa, Ethiopia kumpinu Canda gou khempeuh a uk kumpi nasem ulian pa tawh a kituak hi. Hih mipa Jerusalem ah Pasian bia dinga va pai hi-a
inn lamah ciah kikin sakolleng tungah tu-a, kamsangpa Isaiah laibu a sim hi.
Philip kiangah Kha in, "Sakolleng va naih inla, a kiangah va om in," ci-in a gan hi.
Tua ciangin Philip in tua sakol leng a va delh leh tua mipa in kamsangpa Isaiah laibu a sim a za hi. Philip in, “Tu-a na lai sim na theitel hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
Amah in, “Mi khatpeuh in hong hilhcian kei ngal leh bangci theih ding ka hi hiam?” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amah in Philip kahto-a amah tawh a tukhawm dingin a sam hi.
Tua cilgehpa in: “A gopa kianga kipaipih tuu bangin amah kipaipih a, a mul metpa mai-a a ham lo tuuno bangin a kamka kei hi.
Amah kizahlaksakin thutang ahina kisuhsak hi. Ama nuntakna leitang pan kilaksak ahi manin asuan a khakte thu kua in gen thei ding hiam?”e cih Laisiangtho mun a sim laitak ahi hi.
Cilgehpa in Philip kiangah, “Nong hehpihna in, hih kamsangpa amah le amah kigen ahi hiam, ahi keileh mi khatpeuh thu gen ahi hiam hong hilh dih in,” ci-in a dong hi.
Tua ciangin Philip in tua Laisiangtho mun tektek mah pansanin Jesu tawh kisai lungdamna thu a genpih hi.
A paipai laitakun tui omna mun khat tung uh a, cilgehpa in, “En in, hih lai-ah tui a om hi. Bang hangin kibaptise lo ding ka hi hiam?” a ci hi.
Philip in, “Na lungsim khempeuh tawh na up leh na kibaptise thei hi,” a ci hi. Kumpi nasempa in, “Jesu Khrist, Pasian Tapa hi, cih ka um hi,”f ci-in a dawng hi.
Tua ciangin sakolleng a khawl nading thu a pia hi. Philip le cilgehpa tui sungah paisuk khawm uh a, Philip in amah a baptise hi.
Tui sung pan a paikhiat toh uh ciangin Topa Kha in Philip lakhiamang pah a, cilgehpa in a mu kik nawn kei hi. Ahi hangin lam tawntungah lungnuamtakin a pai hi.
Philip ahileh Azotus ah kilang a, zin kawikawi-in Caesarea a tun dong khuapi khempeuh ah lungdamna-thu a hilh hi.
Tua hun sungin Saul in Topa nung zuite langbawla thahnopna huu a sangkhia lailai hi. Tulpipa kiangah va pai a,
Lampi thu a zui mi a muh nak leh numei ahi a pasal ahi zong in Jerusalem ah thong a khiat theih nadingin Damascus a synagogue-te a, a lah ding lai a ngen hi.
Amah zinkhia a, Damascus a tun dektak laitakin vantung panin khuavak khat in a kimkot a tanzal hi.
Amah lei lakah puka, aw khat in, “Saul, Saul, bang hangin kei hong bawlsia na hi hiam?” a cih a za hi.
Saul in, “Topa aw, kua na hi hiam?” ci-in a dong hi. Amah in, “Na bawlsiat Jesu ka hi hi.
Tu-in tho inla khuapi sungah lut in. Na hih pelmawh ding hong kigen ding hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Saul tonpih mite gen ding nei loin tua lai-ah a ding uh hi. Awging a zak uh hangin kuamah a mu kei uh hi.
Lei lak panin Saul thoto-a, a mit a hak hangin bangmah a mu thei kei hi. Tua ciangin amaute in amah a khutin len uh a, Damascus khua sungah a paipih uh hi.
Mittawsa in ni thum sung oma bangmah a ne a dawn kei hi.
Damascus ah Ananias kici nungzui khat a om hi. A mangmuhna sungah Topa in amah sama, Ananias aw,’” a ci hi. Amah in, “Topa aw, ka om hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Topa in ama kiangah, “Kongzing Tang a Judas inn ah va pai inla, Tarsus khua mi Saul va kan in. Amah in thu a nget laitak ahi hi.
Amah in a mangmuhna ah, Ananias kici mi khat pai-a, a mit in khua a muh kik nadingin a tungah a khut a nga hi,” ci-in a gen hi.
Ananias in, “Topa aw, hih mipa in Jerusalem a na misiangte a bawlsiatna thu tampi ka za zo hi.
Tua hi-a amah in siampi makaite thuneihna tawh na min a lote khempeuh man dinga hih lai-a hong pai ahi hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Ahi hangin Topa in Ananias kiangah, “Va pai in! Gentile-te le a kumpite uh le Israel mite mai-ah ka min a pua dinga ka vanzat dingin amah ka teelsa ahi hi.
Kei min hangin bangzah ta thuak ding cih amah ka lak ding hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Ananias tua inn ah pai-a, a lut hi. Saul tungah a khutte nga a, “Sanggampa Saul aw, hih lai-a nong pai laitak-a lampi ah nang tunga hong kilak Topa – Jesu in, khua na muh kik theih nading le Khasiangtho tawh na dim theih nadingin kei hong sawl zo hi,” a ci hi.
Saul’ mitte panin a lip bang khat, thakhat in kiakhia-a khua a mu thei kik hi. Amah tho-in kibaptise a,
an a nek khit ciangin a tha a hat kik hi. Damascus a om nungzuite tawh Saul ni tampi a omkhawm hi.
Amah in synagogue-te sungah Jesu, Pasian Tapa hi, cih thuhilh a kipan pah hi.

Ama thugen a zate khempeuh in lamdang sa lua in, “Jerusalem ah hih min a lote nakpi-a a siattutpa hih pa hi lo ahi hiam? Amaute thonga khum bangin siampi makaite khut sunga a khum dinga hong pai hi lo ahi hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi.
Tua hi napi Saul khangin vanglian semsem a, tua Jesu, Khrista a hina kitelsakin Damascus a teng Jew-te khempeuh gen ding thei loin a kamkasak hi.
Ni tampi khit ciangin Jew-te in amah thah sawmsim uh a,
ahi hangin Saul in amaute geelsimna a thei hi. Amaute in amah a thah theih nadingun sun le zanin khuapi kongpite ah a pang uh hi.
Ahi hangin ama nungzuite in, zanin khuapi kulh vang panin bawm tawh amah a khaisuk uh hi.
Amah Jerusalem a tun ciangin nungzuite tawh kipawl a sawm hi. Ahi hangin amaute in amah, nungzui hi taktak dingin um zo lo uh a, a vekun amah a kihta uh hi.

Ahi hangin Barnabas in amah paipihin sawltakpite kiangah a pi hi. Amah in amaute kiangah Saul in a khualzinna-ah Topa a muh zia le Topa in amah a hopihna le Damascus ah lau loin Jesu mina thu a hilhnate a gen hi.
Tua ciangin amaute tawh Saul om khawm-in, adal om loin Jerusalem khuapi sungah vak kawikawi uh a, Topa minin hangtakin thu a gen hi.
Amah, Greek kampau Jew-te tawh kiho in thu a kinial hi. Ahi hangin amaute in thah a sawm uh hi.
Tua lai-a om sanggamte in hih thu a theih uh ciangin Caesarea ah tonpih suk uh a Tarsus ah a kha uh hi.
Tua ciangin Judea, Galilee le Samaria gam sunga om pawlpite in lungmuan hun a ngah uh hi. Khasiangtho in hanthawnin thakhauhsak a, tua bangin Topa kihta-a, a nungta mi khangin a tam semsem hi.
Tua gam sung tengah Peter a zin kawikawi lai-in Lydda a misiangte kiangah a va hawh hi.
Tua lai-ah Aeneas kici a pum zaw a, kum giat sung lupna ngaka om mi khat a mu hi.
Peter in, “Aeneas aw, Jesu Khrist in nang hong damsak hi. Tho inla na lupna phek zial in,” a ci hi. Aeneas a thoto pah hi.
Lidda le Sharon a teng mite khempeuh in amah mu uh a, Topa lamah a kihei uh hi.
Joppa ah (a khiatna Dorcasb ahi) Tabitha kici nungzui khat om a, amah in mizawngte huhin, na hoih sem tawntung khat ahi hi.
Tua hun pawlin amah cina-a a si hi. A luang a kisil khit ciangin inntung dei khatah kisial hi.
Lidda pen Joppa khua kiang ahi hi. Tua hi-a a nungzuite in Lidda ah Peter om cih a zak uh ciangin ama kiangah mi nih sawl uh a, “Hehpihna in hong paipak dih in!” ci-in a kun uh hi.

Peter in amaute zui-a, amah a tun ciangin inntung dei-ah a kahpih to uh hi. Meigongte khempeuh Peter kimkotah ding uh a, Dorcas amau tawh a om khawm lai-a, a bawlsa puantualte le puan dangte amah lakin a kapkap uh hi.
