Peter in amaute khempeuh inndei pua lamah a sawlkhia hi. Tua ciangin khukdin sukin thu a ngen hi. A si numei lamah kihei a, “Tabitha, tho in,” a ci hi. Tuanu hakin Peter mu-a a tu to hi.
Peter in a khutah lenin a khe-in a dingsak hi. Tua ciangin thu-umte le meigongte sama, amaute tungah amah a nungta in a pia hi.
Hih thu Joppa khua sung khempeuh ah kithei khawka mi tampi in Topa a um uh hi.
Joppa a Simon min nei savun bawlpa tawh Peter tawmvei sung a om hi.
Caesarea ah Cornelius min nei, Italy galkap pawl a kici ah, zakhat-ukpa khat a om hi.
Amah le a innkuanpihte khempeuh biakna ah kipumpiakin Pasian kihta uh hi. Amah in a kitasamte phaltakin pia a, Pasian kiangah ahun simin thu a ngen hi.
Ni khat, nitak lam nai thum pawlin mang a mu hi. Topa vansawltak khat ama kianga pai kiciantakin mu a, amah in, “Cornelius!” a ci hi.
Cornelius lau-in amah en gega a, “Topa aw, bang ahi hiam?” ci-in a dong hi. Tua vansawltak in, “Na thungetnate le mizawngte na citpiaknate Pasian mai-ah a kiphawk den biakna dingin hong tungto zo hi.
Tu-in Joppa ah mi sawl inla, Simon min nei Peter kici pa va samsak kik in.
Amah savun bawl Simon tawh omkhawm a, ama inn tuipi gei ahi hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Amah a hopih vansawltak a ciah khit ciangin Cornelius in a nasemte nih le a galkapte lakah biakna-a kipumpiak khat a sam hi.
Amah in amaute tungah a piangsa thu khempeuh gena, Joppa ah a sawl hi.
A zingciang sun pawl, amaute khuapi zuana a pai laitakun, thungen dingin Peter inntungah a pai to hi.
Amah a gil kiala, bang khatpeuh duh in; a an ding a kihuan san laitakin mumang bangin a om hi.
Van kihonga, a pek lianpi khat a kiu li tek panin leitunga kikhaisuk a mu hi.
Tua sungah khe li nei ganhing nam khempeuh, leitunga, a bokvak ganhingte le huih lak vasate zong a om hi.
Tua ciangin aw khat in ama kiangah, “Peter aw, tho in. Go inla ne in,” ci-in a gen hi.
Peter in “Hi buang lo e, Topa! Ken a siangtho lo le a nin na khatpeuh ka ne ngei kei hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Tua aw in a nih veina hopih a, “Pasian in a sianga a bawlsa na khatpeuh, siang lo hi, ci kei in,” a ci hi.
Thum vei tua bangin hi-a tua khit ciangin tua a pek lianpi vantungah kila kik pah hi.
Peter in tua a mangmuh a khiatna a ngaihsutsut laitakin Cornelius sawl mite in Simon inn mu uh a, a kongpi ah a khawl uh hi.
Peter kici Simon tua munah a taam lai hiam, ci-in a galdot uh hi.
Peter in a mangmuhna a ngaihsutsut laitakin Kha in ama kiangah, “Simon aw, mi thuma in nang hong zong hi.
Tua ahi ciangin tho inla, kumsuk in. Amaute kong sawl ahi manin, na zuih ding lungsit kei in,” a ci hi.
Peter kumsuk a mite kiangah, “Na zonpa uh keimah ka hi hi. Bang dinga hong pai na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi.

Tua mite in, “Zakhat-ukpa Cornelius kiang pana hong pai ka hi uh hi. Amah thumaanin Pasian kihta mi hi a, Jew mi khempeuh in a zahtak khat ahi hi. Vansawltak siangtho khat in ama kiangah, nang thu gena, amah in a zak theih nadingin ama kiangah nang hong sap dingin a gen hi,” ci-in a dawng uh hi.
Tua ciangin Peter in tua mite inn sungah sama zin a tungsak hi. A zing ciangin amaute tawh Peter tonkhawma, Joppa a, sanggamte pawl khat in a zui uh hi.
A thai ciangin Caesarea a tung uh hi. Cornelius in amau tun ding lamena, a tanaute le a kinaipih a lawmte a na samkhol hi.
Inn sungah Peter luta, Cornelius in amah na dawn tuahin, amah zahtaka, a khephungah a bok hi.
Ahi hangin Peter in amah phong to-a, “Ding to in, kei zong mihing lel mah ka hi hi,” a ci hi.
Amah tawh a kiho kawmin Peter sungtuma, mi tampi a kikhawm a mu hi.

Amah in amaute kiangah, “Jew mi adingin Gentile mi tawh kikholh ahi zongin, amau kiangah va hawh ahi zongin, ka thukham uh tawh kituak lo hi, cih na theihsa uh ahi hi. Ahi hangin mi khatpeuh a siangtho lo ahikeh nin hi ka cih loh nadingin Pasian in hong lak zo hi.
Tua hi-a kei hong kisapsak ciangin nial loin kong pai hi. Bang hanga kei hong samsak na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi.
Cornelius in, “Nung ni li lai-in, ka inn sungah nitak lam nai thum, tu hunin thu ka ngen hi. Thakhatin ka mai-ah puan atang selsal a silh mi khat hong dinga,
‘Cornelius aw, Pasian in na thungetna za zo a, mizawngte na piakte ciamteh zo hi.
Joppa a Peter kici Simon samsak in. Amah tuipi gei-a teng savun bawlpa Simon inn ah tung hi,’ ci hi.
Tua ciangin nang kong samsak pah a, nong pai a hoih mahmah hi. Tu-in kote nong hilh dinga Topa hong thupiak peuhmah a ngai dingin kote khempeuh hih lai Pasian mai-ah ka om uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Peter thugen kipan a, “Pasian in angvan tuam nei loin
minam khempeuh panin amah kihta-a, a dik-a gamta mite khempeuh a sanna thu, amaan a hina teltakin ka thei ta hi.
Pasian in Israel-te tunga a thupuak mite khempeuh Topa Jesu Khrist tungtawna kigen hih lemna hong tun lungdamna thute ahi hi.
John in baptise-na thu a gen khit nungin Galilee gama kipan Judea gamsung khempeuh ah bang thu piang hiam, cih na thei zo uh hi.

Pasian in Nazareth mi Jesu, Khasiangtho le vangliatna sathau a nilh zia le amah pai kawikawi in, Pasian in amah a ompihna hangin na hoih sema, dawimangpa vangliatna nuai-a mi khempeuh a dam saknate na thei zo uh hi.
Jew-te gam le Jerusalem a, a septe khempeuh ah kote teci ka hi uh hi. Amaute in amah sing tungah khai-in that uh a,
ahi hangin a ni thum ni-in Pasian in misi pan amah thokiksaka, a kimusak hi.
Amah mi khempeuh in mu lo a, Pasian in a teci dinga a teelkholhsa kote in mu in – misi pana a thawh khitin amah tawh a nekhawm a dawnkhawm kote ka om uh hi.
Amah in mite tunga thuhilh ding le mihingte le misite tunga thukhen ding pa in amah a sehna thu teci ahi dingin Pasian in kote thu hong pia hi.
Amah a umte khempeuh in ama min tungtawnin mawh maina a ngah nading uh thu, kamsangte khempeuh in teci a pang zo uh hi,” a ci hi.
Peter in hih thute a gengen laitakin hih thupuak a za mi khempeuh tungah Khasiangtho a tung hi.
Peter tawh a pai khawm vunatte lakah a um mite in, Gentile-te tung nangawna Khasiangtho a kisunkhiat ciangin lamdang a sa mahmah uh hi.
Ahang in, amaute pauteb in pau uh a, Pasian a phat uh a za uh hi. Tua ciangin Peter in,
"Hih mite tui-in a kibaptise ding kua in kham thei ding ahi hiam? Eite bang tektekin amaute in Khasiangtho a ngah zo uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah in amaute Jesu Khrist min-a kibaptise dingin thu a pia hi. Tua ciangin amaute in ni tawmkha sung amaute kiangah Peter a taam lai nading a thum uh hi.
Sawltakpite le Judea gam sunga om sanggamte in, Gentile-te in zong Pasian thu sang khin ta uh cih a za uh hi.
Tua ahi ciangin Jerusalem ah Peter a pai toh ciangin vunatte laka thu-umte in amah mawhsak in,
"Nang, vunat-lote innah hawhin amaute tawh an na nekhawm hi,” a ci uh hi.
Peter in na khempeuh a pian bang bangin a cingin gen a:
Joppa khuapi ah thungen a ka om laitakin mumang bangin mang ka mu hi. Vantung panin a kiu li tek pana kikhaisuk, a pek lianpi bang khat ka omna-ah ka mu hi.
Asung ka et leh leitung a khe li nei ganhingte, gamsate, a bokvak ganhingte le huih lak vasate ka mu hi.
Tua ciangin kei kiangah, “Peter aw, tho in. Go inla ne in,” ci-a hong gen aw khat ka za hi.
"Ken, ‘Hi buang lo e, Topa! A siangtho lo le a nin na khat beek ka kam sungah tum ngei nai lo hi,’ ci-in ka dawng hi.
"Tua aw in vantung panin a nih veina hong gen a, ‘Pasian in a siang a, a bawlsa na khatpeuh, siangtho lo hi, ci kei in,’ ci hi.
Hih bangin thum vei dong hi-a, tua ciangin vantungah kikhai to kik hi.
"Tua hun laitak tektekin Caesarea pana kei kianga hong kisawl mi thum ka tunna inn ah hong tung lian uh hi.
Amaute tawh lungsit lo-a ka pai ding Kha in hong gen hi. Hih sanggamte guk in zong kei hong zui uh a, tua mipa inn ah ka lut uh hi.
Amah in kote kiangah, a inn sungah vansawltak kilang a, ‘Joppa a Peter kici Simon samsak in.
Amah in nang le na innkuanpihte khempeuh kihotkhiat nading thu puak khat hong puak ding hi,’ ci-in a genzia hong gen hi.
"Thu gen ka kipat takin, a cila eite tunga hong tung bangin amaute tungah Khasiangtho a tung hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in, John in tui ina hong baptise hi; ahi hangin note Khasiangtho in hong kibaptise ding hi,’ ci-a a gensa ka phawk hi.
Tua hi-a Topa Jesu a um, eite hong piak tawh a kibang letsong, Pasian in amaute pia ahileh Pasian a nial thei dinga kingaihsun kei kua ka hi hiam?” a ci hi.
Amaute in hih thu a zak uh ciangin bangmah nialna nei nawn tuan loin, “Tua ahi mawk leh Pasian in, nuntakna ngah nadingin kisikna Gentile-te tungah phal tazen hi lo maw!” ci-in Pasian a phat uh hi.
Stephen tawh kisai-a bawlsiat na hangin a kithehthang mite Phoenicia, Cyprus le Antioch dongah tung uh a, Jew-te tung bekah thupuak a gen uh hi.
Bangbang ahi zongin amaute pawlkhat Cyprus le Cyrene pana mite, Antioch ah pai-in Greek-te tungah zong Topa Jesu lungdamna thu gen ding a kipan uh hi.
Topa khut, amaute tawh omkhawm a, mi tampitakin um in, Topa lamah a kihei uh hi.
Hih thu Jerusalem a pawlpite in na za uh a, Antioch ah Barnabas a sawl uh hi.
Amah tungin, Pasian hehpihna a tunzia a muh ciangin a nuam mahmah hi. Amaute khempeuh in a lungsim khempeuh uh tawh Topa tungah a muanhuai nadingun a hanthawn hi.
Amah mi hoih hi-a Khasiangtho le upna tawh kidim in, Topa kiangah mi tampitak a tun hi.
Tua ciangin Saul zong dingin Tarsus ah Barnabas pai a,

amah a muh ciangin Antioch ah a paipih hi. Tua hi-a Barnabas le Saul tua lai-a pawlpi tawh kum khat vilvel kikhawl uh a, mi tampitak thu a hilh uh hi. Antioch ah nungzuite, Khristian-te a kici masa pen hi.
Hih hun sungin kamsangte pawlkhat Jerusalem pan Antioch ah a paisuk uh hi.
Amaute lakah Agabus min nei khat ding to a, “Kha tungtawnin, Rome gam sung khempeuh ah kialpi nasiatakin tung ding hi,” ci-in a genkhol hi. (Hih pen Claudius in a uk laitakin a tung hi.)
Nungzuite in amau hihtheihna ciat tawh Judea gama teng sanggamte huhna piak dingin thu a khensat uh hi.
Amaute in tua thu tangtungsak uh a, Barnabas le Saul tungah amau letsongte upate ngah dingin a khak uh hi.
Tua hunlai pawlin Kumpi Herod in pawlpi mite pawlkhat bawlsiat sawmin a man hi.
Amah in John sanggampa James namsau tawh that khin zo hi.
Hih thu in Jew-te lung kimsak cih a muh ciangin Peter zong mat beh a sawm lai hi. Hih in Silngo-sawhloh Anlum Pawi huna thupiang ahi hi.
Amah a mat khit ciangin thong sungah khuma, galkap li-a kipawl, pawl lite cin dingin a ap hi. Herod in, Paisan Pawi a ven cianga mipite mai-ah thukhen dingin lakkhiat a sawm hi.
Tua dinga Peter thong sunga a khum ahi hi. Ahi hangin pawlpite in ama ading cihtakna tawh Pasian tungah thu a ngen uh hi.
Herod in thukhen dinga lakkhiat a sawm ni ma zanin, galkap nih kikalah Peter luma, sikkhainiang nihin kikhihin, a cingte in kong a cing uh hi.

Thakhatin Topa vansawltak khat kilanga, thong inn sung teng khuavak in a tan hi. Amah in Peter a pang bengin a phawng hi. Amah in, “Manlang in, tho in!” ci-a Peter khutdawh pan sikkhainiangte a kitolkhia hi.
Tua ciangin vansawltak in a kiangah, “Na puante silh in, na khedapte bulh in,” a ci hi. A cih bangin Peter in a hih hi. Vansawltak in, “Na puantualpi silh inla kei hong zui in,” ci-in a gen hi.
Peter in amah thong pua ah a zuih hangin, vansawltak hihna a takpi mah hiam, cih thei loin mangmu-in kingaihsun hi.

Amaute in thong cingte a masa le a nihna khengin khuapi sung paina sik kongpi a tung uh hi. Tua kongpi ama thu-in na kihonga, amaute a paikhia uh hi. Kongzing khat a zuih suak khit uh ciangin vansawltak in amah thakhatin a nusia hi.

Tua ciangin Peter in khua phawk a, “Topa in ama vansawltak hong sawla, Herod khutlum pan le Jew mite in zong lamena, a ngak uh na khempeuh panin kei hong hukhia ahilam lungheina om loin tu-in ka thei ta hi,” a ci hi.
Amah in hih thu a phawkkhiat ciangin, mi tampi kikhawm a thu a ngetna mun Mark zong a kici John nu Mary inn ah a pai hi.
Peter in kongkhak puanung pen va kiu-a, a hon dingin Rhoda kici nasem numeino khat a pai hi.
Tuanu in Peter aw ahilam a theihcian ciangin nuam mahmah a, kong hon loin lehtai kika, “Kongkhak ah Peter om!” ci-in a kiko zak hi.
Amaute in ama kiangah, “A hai hi mai niteh!” a ci uh hi. Hi taktak hi, ci-in a nial teitei ciangin amaute in, “Ama vansawltak hi inteh,” a ci uh hi.
Ahi hangin Peter in kongkhak kiukiu a, kong a hon uh ciangin amah mu uh a, lamdang a sa mahmah uh hi.

Peter in amaute a daih nadingun a khut vana, thong sung panin Topa in amah a lakkhiatna zia teng a gen hi. Amah in, “James le sanggamte kiangah hih thu na ko un,” a cih khit ciangin mundang ah a pai hi.
A zingsang ciangin galkapte lakah patauhna lianpi khat a om hi. Amaute in, “Peter tungah bang thu piang ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
Herod in kiciantakin amah zonga, a muh loh ciangin thong cingte sittel a, amaute thah dingin thu a pia hi. Tua ciangin, Judea gam panin Caesarea ah Herod pai-a tua lai-ah tawmvei sung a om hi.

Amah Tyre le Sidon mite tawh a kitawng den ahi hi. Amaute kipawl khawmin amah tawh kihopih a sawm uh hi. Amaute in kumpipa nasem muan pa Blastus panpihna tawh lemna a ngen uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute an ngahna ama kumpipa gam sung bek ahi hi.
A ni ciam ni ciangin Herod in a kumpi puantual silh-a a kumpi tokhom tungah tu-in, mipite tungah thu a gen hi.
Amaute in, “Hih aw, mihing aw hi loin Pasian aw ahi hi,” ci-in a awng uh hi.
Herod in, Pasian phatna pia lo ahi manin Topa vansawltak khat in, amah sattukin than in ne-a a si hi.
Ahi hangin Pasian thu khangin a kizel semsem hi.
Barnabas le Saul in a nasep uh a zawh khit uh ciangin Jerusalem panina ciah kik uh a, Mark zong a kici John a tonpih uh hi.
Antioch a pawlpi sungah kamsangte le thuhilhte: Barnabas, Niger kici Simeon, Cyrene mi Lucius, Manaen (Gam ukpa Herod tawh a khangkhawmpa) le Saul-te a om uh hi.
Amaute in Topa bia in an a tan laitakun Khasiangtho in, “Amaute ka sapna na a sem dingin Barnabas le Saul hong sehkhiatsak un,” a ci hi.
Amaute in an tangin thu a nget khit uh ciangin amaute gel tungah a khut uh nga uh a, a sawlkhia uh hi.
Amaute gel Khasiangtho sawlin Seleucia ah paisuk uh a, tua lai panin Cyprus manawhin tembaw in a tuang uh hi.
Amaute Salamis a tun uh ciangin, Jew-te synagogue-te ah Pasian thu a tangko uh hi. John zong amaute huh in amau tawh a omkhawm hi.
Amaute Paphos a tun dongun tua tuikulh tung khempeuh ah a zin kawikawi uh hi. Tua lai-ah dawi-ai tawi-a, kamsang zuau Bar-Jesus kici Jew mi khat om a,
amah pen gam ukpa Sergius Paulus nasempa ahi hi. Tua gam ukpa a pil mahmah mi khat hi-a Pasian thu za nuam ahi manin, Barnabas le Saul a samsak hi.
Ahi hangin Elymas dawi-ai tawi pa (tua pen a min khiatna) in amaute na nang a, tua upna panin gam ukpa heikhiat a sawm hi.
Tua ciangin Paul zong a kici Saul, Khasiangtho tawh kidim a, Elymas en gemgam in,
"Nang dawimangpa ta khat na hi-a amaan nate khempeuh gal na hi hi! Khemna nam khempeuh le zuautatna tawh na kidim hi. Topa lampi maan na lehheina, tawp ngei lo ding na hi hiam?

Tu-in Topa khut in nang hong langpan hi. Na mit a taw dinga, hun bang tan hiam khat nitang na mu thei kei ding hi,” a ci hi. Ama tungah thakhatin meiilum le khuamial in tuam a, amah in zawt kawikawi-in a khuta amah kai ding a zongzong hi.
Gam-ukpa in a piangsa thu a muh ciangin a um hi; ahang in, Topa tawh kisai tua thuhilhna lamdang a sa mahmah hi.
Paphos panin Pamphylia gama Perga lam manawhin Paul le a pawlte tembaw in tuang uh a, John in amaute tua khua ah nusia-in amah Jerusalem ah a kileh kik hi.
Perga panin amaute Pisidia gama Antioch ah a paisuak uh hi. Sabbath ni-in amaute synagogue ah lutin a tu uh hi.
Synagogue ukte in Thukham le Kamsangte laibu pan a sim khit uh ciangin amaute kiangah, “Sanggamte aw, mipite hanthawn nopna thupuak na neih uh leh hehpihna tawh hong gen un,” a ci uh hi.
Paul ding to-in a khut vana, “No, Pasian a bia Israel-te le Gentile-te aw, ka thugen na ngai un!
Israel mite’ Pasian in i pate na teeltuama, Egypt a, a om lai-un tua mite na lawhcingsakin ama vangliatna thupi tawh tua gam panin amaute na pikhia hi.
Kum sawmli sung sehnel-gam ah amau gamtatnaa a thuak keikai hi.
Amah in Canaan gam sunga minam sagihte lawnthal a, amaute leitang ama mite luah dingin a pia hi.
Hihte khempeuh a tun nading kum 450 bang sawt hi. “Tua nung ciangin kamsang Samuel hun dong, Pasian in amaute ading thukhente a pia hi.
Tua ciangin tua mite in kumpi khat ngen uh a, amah in Benjamin beh ahi Kish tapa Saul, amaute a pia hi. Amah in kum sawmli sung a uk hi.

Saul paikhiat khit ciangin amaute kumpi dingin David a koih hi. Amah tawh kisai-in teci panga, ‘Ka lungsim tawh kituak Jesse tapa David ka mu zo hi; amah in sep dinga ka deih peuhpeuh a sem ding hi,’ ci hi.
"Pasian in hih mipa suan le khakte panin Israel-te kianga a ciamsa bangin Honpa Jesu a puak hi.
Jesu a pai ma-in John in, Israel mite khempeuh tungah kisikna le baptisena a hilh hi.

John in a nasep a zawh kuan in, ‘Kei kua hi-in nong ngaihsun uh hiam? Tua na ngaihsut pa uh ka hi kei hi. Amah ka hi kei a, amah ka nungah hong pai dinga, ama khe dapkhau phel ding nangawnin ka cin kei hi,’ ci hi.
"Sanggamte, Abraham tate le no Pasian kihta Gentile-te aw, hih hot-khiatna thupuak eite tungah hong kipuak zo hi.
Jerusalem a mite le a gam-ukte un, Jesu theitel lo napi, Sabbath tenga kisim kamsangte thugente amah mawhpaihna tawh a tangtun uh hi.
Amaute in sihna ding zahin thukho mu zo lo napi Pilate in a thah nading a ngen uh hi.
Ama thu a kigelhsa khempeuh a hih kim khit uh ciangin singtung pan lakhia uh a, han sungah a sial uh hi.
Ahi hangin Pasian in amah misi pan thosak a,
Galilee pan Jerusalem a, a khual zinpihte in ni tampi sung a mu uh hi. Tu-in i mipihte tungah amaute teci ahi uh hi.
"Kote in note tunga kong gen uh lungdamna thu: Pasian in i pate tunga a kamciamsa,
ei amau tate adingin Jesu thawhsaktohna tawh tangtun zo hi. Phatna-late a nihna ah: “‘Nang ka Tapa na hi hi; tuni-in na Pab kong suak hi,’c ci-a kigelhsa bangin,
a muat ngei nawn lo dinga Pasian in misi pana a thawhsak takpina thu, hih thute: “‘David tunga kamciamsa, a siangtho le a kip thupha nang kong pia ding hi,’d ci-a,
tua ahi manin mundangah zong, “‘Nang in, nangma Misiangtho Pa na muatsak kei ding hi.’e ci-in kigelh hi.
"Ahang in, David in ama khan sungin Pasian deihna bangin na a sep khit ciangin a ihmu hi; a pate tawh kivui-a, a pumpi a muat hi.
Ahi hangin Pasian in misi pana a thawhsak pa ahileh a muat kei hi.
"Tua ahi manin ka sanggamte aw, Jesu tungtawnin mawhnate maisakna thu note tungah kitangko ahilam na theih ding uh ka deih hi.
Moses thukham pana dik na tan theih lohnate khempeuh uh, ama tungtawnin a um peuhpeuh in dik tang ta hi.
Kamsangte gensa no tunga a tun loh nadingin na kikem un; tua in:
"‘No mizahpih hatte aw en un lamdang sa unla mangthang un; ahang in, mi khatpeuh in hong gen taleh na up ngei loh ding uh na khat, na nuntak sungun ka hih ding hi,’f ci hi,” a ci hi.
Synagogue panin Paul le Barnabas a ciah uh leh mite in Sabbath ni kik ciangin hih nate thu a ban a genlai dingun a sam uh hi.

A kikhawm mipite a kikhen uh ciangin Jew mite le Jew-te biakna-a kikhelsa a kipumpiak mahmah mi tampite in Paul le Barnabas a zui uh hi. Amaute in na hopih uh a, Pasian hehpihna sungah kiptaka a om den nadingun a kun uh hi.
Sabbath ni kik ciangin khuapi bupa mi khempeuh phial Topa thu ngai dingin a kikhawm uh hi.
Jew-te in mihonpite a muh uh ciangin haza mahmah uh a, Paul thugente langbawlin a siatgen uh hi.

Tua ciangin Paul le Barnabas in: “Note kiangah Pasian thu kong gen masak ding mah uh ahi hi. Note in tua thu nial a, nuntak tawntungna ngah dingin cing kisa lo na hi nungsangun, tu-in Gentile-te lam ka nga ta uh hi.

Ahang in, Topa in eite hong thupiak hih ahi hi. “‘Nang in leitung mongte dongin hotkhiatna na puak theih nadingin keimah in nog Gentile-te tungah khuavak ahi dingin kong bawl zo hi,’h ci hi,”i ci-in amaute hangtakin a dawng uh hi.
Gentile-te in hih thu a zak uh ciangin lungdam mahmah in Topa thu pahtawi uh a, nuntak tawntungna ngah dinga kisehsate khempeuh in a um uh hi.
Tua kual bup tengah Topa thu a kizel hi.

Ahi hangin Jew-te in Pasian kihta numei zahtakhuaite le khuapi sunga tangpi makaite a holhthawh uh hi. Amaute in Paul le Barnabas langbawlin a bawlsia ding mi tawsawn uh a, amau kual panin a hawlkhia uh hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in tua mite a langpanna un a khepekua leivuite singkhia uh a, Iconium ah a pai uh hi.
Nungzuite, lungnopna le Khasiangtho tawh kidim uh hi. 1Th 2:16
Iconium a Jew-te synagogue ah Paul le Barnabas a paingei bang un a pai uh hi. Tua-a a thugenna un mi lungsim sukha lua ahi manin Jew-te le Gentile-te tampitak in a um uh hi.
Ahi hangin a um nuam lo Jew-te in Gentile-te tawsawn uh a, sanggamte langpang dingin a lungsim uh a hihsiatsak uh hi.
Tua lai-ah amah in Paul le Barnabas lim lamdangte le a lamdangte bawl theisakin ama hehpihna thupuakte a kipsak pa Topa adingin hangtakin thu genin hun sawt khop a zang uh hi.
Khuapi mite kipawl khen uh a, pawlkhatte Jew-te lamah pangin adangte sawltakpite lamah a pang uh hi.
Tua lai-ah Gentile-te le Jew-te lakah a makaite uh tawh amaute bawlsiat ding le suanga den ding a sawmsimna uh kipan hi.
Ahi hangin amaute in tua thu theikhia uh a, Lycaonia khuapite ahi Lystra, Derbe le a kima gamte ah tai-in,
tua lai-ah lungdamna thu a hilh veve uh hi.
Lystra ah a suah tunga kipan khebai, lam pai ngei lo khe poi khat a om hi.
Paul a paupau laitakin amah in thu va ngai hi. Paul in amah tangtakin enin, dam nading upna a neih lam mu a,
"Na khe in ding in!” a ci hi. Tuateh mipa diangto paha lam a pai hi.
Mihonte in Paul nasepsate a muh uh ciangin, “Eite kiangah pasiante mihing bangin hong paisuk hi!” ci-in Lycaonia pau-in a kiko uh hi.
Barnabas pen Zeus ci uh a, Paul pen a thugen makai ahi manin Hermes ci uh hi.
Khuapi pua mahmah a biakinn nei pa siampi Zeus in khuapi kongpite ah bawngtal le pak kualte a va puak hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amah le mihonpite in amau tungah biakpiakna pia nuam uh hi.
Ahi hangin sawltakpi Barnabas le Paul-te in a zak uh ciangin a puansilh lai uh balkek uh a, mihonpite lakah tai-in a kiko uh hi.

"Mite aw, bang hangin hih bawl na hi uh hiam? Kote zong no mah bangin mihing lel ka hi uh hi. Kote in lungdamna thu no hong puakin, hih kimanna a nei lo nate panin, van le lei le tuipi le tuate sunga omte a bawl a nungta Pasian lama na kihei ding uh hong gen ka hi uh hi.
Amah in a beisa hunin, minam khempeuh amau ut bangbangin gamtasak hi.

Tua hi napi teci panna om loin amaute a mawk nusiat kei hi: vantung pana guah le amau hun ciata, a gah an pia-in a migitna hong lak hi. An tampi-in hong vaka, na lungtang uh lungnop na tawh a dimsak hi,” a ci uh hi.
Hih thute nangawn tawh amaute tunga kithoihna bawl ding mihonte a kham zo kei dektak uh hi.
Tua ciangin Antioch le Iconium panin Jew-te pawlkhat va pai uh a, mihonte a thu zawh uh hi. Amaute in suangin Paul deng uh a, a sisa in ngaihsunin khuapi pua-ah a talkaihkhia uh hi.
Ahi hangin ama kimkotah nungzuite a kikhop khit uh ciangin amah tho-a khuapi sungah a lut kik hi. A zing ciangin amah le Barnabas Derbe ah a pai uh hi.
Tua khuapi ah amaute in lungdamna thu hilh uh a, nungzui tampitak a ngah uh hi. Tua ciangin amaute Lystra, Iconium le Antioch ah ciah kikin
nung zuite thakhauhsak uh a, upna-ah thutakin a om den nading uh a hanthawn uh hi. Amaute in, “Pasian gam i lut nadingin haksatna tampi i thuak ding mah ahi hi,” a ci uh hi.
Amau pawlpi tekah Paul le Barnabas in upate sehsaka uh a, a muante uh thungetna le antanna tawh Topa tungah a ap uh hi.
Pisidia gam sung tawna a pai khit uh ciangin Pamphylia tung uh a,
Perga ah thu a gen khit uh ciangin Attalia ah paisuk uh hi.
Attalia panin a zawh khitsa uh nasepte sem dinga, Pasian hehpihna sunga a ki-apna uh Antioch ah tembaw in a ciah kik uh hi.
Tua lai a tun uh ciangin amaute in pawlpi teng kai khawm uh a, amaute tungtawna Pasian nasepnate khempeuh le Gentile-te tungah upna kong a kihon takpinate a zasak uh hi.
Tua lai ah nungzuite tawh sawt veipi a taam uh hi.
Judea gam panin Antioch ah mi pawlkhat paisuk uh a, “Moses hong hilh ngeina tawh kizui-in vun na at kei uh leh note hong kihonkhia thei lo ding hi,” ci-in sanggamte a hilh uh hi.

Hih thu in Paul le Barnabas tawh amaute nakpi-a kinialna le kiselna a piangsak hi. Tua ciangin Paul le Barnabas sehin adang thu-um pawlkhat tawh, hih thu tawh kisai-a sawltakpite le upate tawh kimu dingin Jerusalem ah a paitosak uh hi.
Pawlpite in lampi-ah kha uh a, Phoenicia le Samaria gamte tawna a zin kawmun Gentile-te kikhelna zia a gen uh hi. Hih thuthak in sanggamte khempeuh a nuamsak mahmah hi.
Amaute Jerusalem a tun uh ciangin pawlpite, sawltakpite le upate in na dawn uh a, amaute in amau tungtawna Pasian nasepnate a zasak uh hi.
Tua ciangin Pharisee-te pawl lakah thu-umte pawlkhat dingin, “Gentile-te, vun-atsakin Moses thukham pelloin zuihsak ding ahi hi,” a ci uh hi.
Sawltakpite le upate hih thute kikum dingin a kikhawm uh hi.

Tampitak a kikup khit uh ciangin Peter ding to a, “Sang gamte aw, a beisa tawlkhat lai-in Gentile-te in keima kam panin lungdamna thupuak za uh a, a up theih nadingun note lak panin Pasian in hong teelkhia cih na thei uh hi.
Mihing lungtang sung a thei, Pasian in amaute a sanna hong lahna-in eite hong piak bang tektek, amaute Khasiangtho a pia hi.
Amah in amau lungtangte, upna tawh siansuah khin ahi manin eite le amaute hong deidan lo hi.
Tua bang ahileh eite le i pate in i puak zawh loh hakkol nungzuite ngawngah suanin Pasian zia-et ding i hi hiam?
Hi lo! Amaute mah bangin eite zong i Topa Jesu hong hehpihna tungtawnin i suakta cih i um hi,” ci-in thu a gen hi.
Barnabas le Paul in amaute tung tawna Pasian in Gentile-te laka lim lamdang le a lamdang a bawlte a gen laitakun, a kikhawm khempeuh thungai-in a sip dide uh hi.
Amaute a man khit uh ciangin James in, “Sanggamte aw, ka thugen na ngai un.
Pasian in ama mi mahmah dingin Gentile-te lak pan pawlkhat a lakna in, amaute bangci awlmawh hiam cih a masa penin hong lak zo hi, cih eite kiangah Simona in hong telgen zo hi.
Kamsangte thugente hih tawh kituak hi:
“‘Tua khit ciangin kong kileh kik dinga a puksa David puanbuk ka lam kik ding hi. A kisiasa ka lam kik dinga, ka puahthak ding hi.
A mangthang baang’ mite le ka min a suang Gentile-te khempeuh in, Topa a zon theih nading ci-in hih nate khempeuh a hih pa Topa in a gen hi,’b
khanghunte khempeuhin tuate kithei khin zo hi, ‘c ci-in kigelh hi.
"Tua ahi manin Pasian lama hong kihei Gentile-te adingin haksatna i bawl loh ding ka thupukna ahi hi.
I bawl sangsikin amaute lai khakin, milim biakna in a nitsak ante, numei-pasal paktatna, ngawng heklupte sate le sisante a tan dingun hilh zaw ni.
Ahang in, amasapen hunlai-a kipan khuapi khempeuh ah Moses in a hilhsa hi-a Sabbath ni simin synagogue-te sungah a kisimsimsa ahi hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin sawltakpite le upate in pawlpi bup tawh, amau mite pawlkhat teeltuam ding le Paul le Barnabas tawh Antioch ah sawl dingin thu a khensat uh hi. Amaute in sanggamte laka makai (Barsabbas kici) Judas le Silas mi nih a teel uh hi.
Amaute in a nuai-a bangin lai a puasak uh hi: Sawltakpite le upate, na sanggamte un, Antioch, Syria le Cilicia a om thu-um Gentile-te tungah: Kong hopih uh hi.
Kote in thuneihna ka piak loh pi un, ko kiang pan mi pawlkhat hong pai-in a thugen un na lungsim uh hong buaisaka, amau thugente in hong lungzingsak cih ka za uh hi.
Tua ahi ciangin kote khempeuh in mi pawlkhat teelkhia-in i lawm itte Barnabas le Paul tawh no kianga sawl khawm dingin ka thukim uh hi.
Amaute i Topa Jesu Khrist min hanga a nuntakna a pia ngamte ahi uh hi.
Tua ahi manin lai-a kong gelhte uh a kam uh tawh a kipsak dingin Judas le Silas kong sawl uh hi.
A kisam a nuai-a kigente simloh a dang bangmah no tungah kong suat loh ding uh, Khasiangtho le kote in hoih ka sa uh hi:
Milimte thoihna ante, sisan, ngawngheklup ganhingte sa, le numei-pasal paktatna na tang ding uh hi. Hih nate pelh le uh cin a hoiha gamta na hi ding uh hi. Mangpha.
Tua mite sawlkhia uh a, amaute Antioch ah paisukin, tua lai-a pawlpite kaikhawm uh a, laikhak a pia uh hi.
Mipite in sim uh a, hanthawnna thupuak hangin a nuam mahmah uh hi.
Amau mahmah zong kamsang ahi Judas le Silas-te in sanggamte tungah hanthawnna kam tampitak genin a thakhauhsak uh hi.
Tua lai-ah tawlkhat sung a taam khit uh ciangin sanggamte in, lemna thupha tawh amaute a sawlte kiangah a ciahkiksak uh hi.
Ahi hangin Silas in tua lai-a taam lai dingin a khensat hi.d
Ahi hangin Antioch ah Paul le Barnabas taam lai uh a, tua lai-ah amaute le midang tampi sinsakin Topa thu a hilh uh hi.
Tua zawh tawmvei khit ciangin Paul in Barnabas kiangah, “Topa thu i gennasa khuapi khempeuh ah pai kikin, sang gamte kiangah hawhin, amaute bang a ci uh hiam, va en ni” a ci hi.
Barnabas in Mark zong a kici John tonpih nuam a,
ahi hangin Paul in amah tonpih ding hoih a sa kei hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in Pamphylia gamah amaute na taisan a, amaute tawh na a sem zom kei hi.
Amaute nasiatakin kithutuak lo uh a, a kipawlkhen uh hi. Barnabas in Mark tonpih a, tembaw tuangin Cyprus ah pai uh a,
ahi hangin Paul in Silas teela, sanggamte in Topa hehpihna ah a ap khit uh ciangin a kuankhia uh hi.
Pawlpite thakhauhsakin amah Syria le Cilicia tawnin a pai hi.
Derbe ah amah tunga, tua khit ciangin nungzui Timothy tenna Lystra a tung hi. Timothy nu, thu um Jew mi hi-a a pa Greek mi ahi hi.
Lystra le Iconium a sanggamte in amah phat mahmah uh hi.
Paul in a khualzinna ah amah tonpih nuam ahi manin a vun a atsak hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh tua huam a tengte Jew-te vive hi-a, a pa Greek mi ahilam a theih khitsa uh ahi hi.
Amaute khuapi khat pan khuapi khatah zin uh a, Jerusalem a sawltakpite le upate in mite zuih dinga thukhensatna a bawlsate uh a gen kawikawi uh hi.
Tua hi-a pawlpite upna ah kithakhauhsakin nisimin mi a kibehlap hi.
Paul le a lawmte Phrygia le Galatia kual khempeuh ah zin kawikawi uh a, Asia gama thu a hilh ding uh Khasiangtho in a phal kei hi.
Mysia tawh gamgi a tun uh ciangin amaute, Bithynia ah lut sawm uh a, ahi hangin Jesu’ Kha in amaute a pai ding uh a phal kei hi.
Tua ciangin Mysia khengin Troas ah a paisuk uh hi.
Zan laitakin Paul in Macedonia gam mi khat dingin, “Macedo-nia ah hong galkah unla, ko hong huh un,” ci-a gen khat a mangin a mu hi.
Paul in mang a muh khit ciangin Pasian in eite amau kianga lungdamna-thu hilh dingin hong deih hi, ci-a Macedonia a pai dingin a kithawi pah uh hi.
Troas panin tuipi tungah tembaw in Samothrace zuanin tangtakin ka pai uh a, a zing ciangin Neapolis ka tung uh hi.
Tua lai panin Macedonia khuapi khen sunga a lian pen Rome pemtate tenna khua ahi, Philippi ka tung uh hi. Tua lai ah sawt veipi ka taam uh hi.
Sabbath ni-in khuapi kongpi pualam ah paikhia-in thunget nading mun om a ka lametna uh gungei-ah ka pai uh hi. Tua lai-a a na kikhawmsa numeite tungah thu ka gen uh hi.
Tua thungaite lakah Lydia min nei, Thyatira khuapi pana puan dupsan zuak Pasian a bia numei khat a om hi. Topa in Paul thupuak sang dingin a lungsim a honsak hi.

Amah le a innkuanpihte a kibaptise khit uh ciangin a inn ah kote hong sam hi. Amah in, “Kei, Topa a um khat hi, ci-a nong sim uh leh hong pai-in ka inn ah hong taam un,” a ci hi. Tua ci-in kote hong zol zo ta hi.
Khat vei thungetna muna ka pai laitakun dawi lawmnei-a mailam thu a genkhol thei sila numeino khat ka tuak uh hi. Amah in mailam thu genkholin, amah a neite ading sum tampitak a thalawhsak hi.
Hih numeino in Paul le ko adangte hong zui a, “Na suahtak nading uh lampi hong gen hih mite Sang pen Pasian nasemte ahi uh hi,” ci-in a kiko hi.

Hih bangin amah in ni tampi sung a hih den hi. A tawpna ah Paul in nawngkai sa mahmah a kihei-in tua kha kiangah, “Ama sung pan paikhia dingin Jesu Khrist minin thu kong pia hi,” a ci hi. Tua hun lianin kha in tuanu a nusia hi.
Tua silanu a neite in a sum muhna uh bei ta cih a theih uh ciangin Paul le Silas man uh a, thuneite mai-a ding dingin vanzuakna mun sumbuk tualah a kaigawp uh hi.
Amaute in thukhen mangte mai-ah amaute puak uh a, “Hih mite Jew-te hi uh a, ka khuapi uh a tokbuai gawp uh hi.
Tua pen, ko Rome mite san le zuih dinga ngeina tawh kituak lo hong hilh hang uh ahi hi,” a ci uh hi.
Paul le Silas langah mihonpite pang uh a, thukhen mangte in amaute puan hawkkhiatsakin satsak dingin thu a pia uh hi.
Amaute nakpi-a, a kisat khit ciangin thong sungah kikhum a, limtaka a cin ding in thong cingpa thu a pia uh hi.
Tua bang thupiaknate a ngah bangin amaute thong sungnung pen ah khuma, a khete ah kol a bulh hi.
Zankim pawlin Paul le Silas in, Pasian kiangah thu ngenin biakna late sa uh a, thongkia dangte in a ngai uh hi.
Thakhatin zin nakpi-in linga, thong inn bulpi a kilok hi. Thakhatin thong kong khak khempeuh kihonga, mi khempeuh kikhihna sik khainiang khempeuh kitolkhia hi.
Thong cingpa khanglo a thong kongkhakte kihongsa a om a muh ciangin, thongkiate suakta khin hi ci-a ngaihsun ahi manin a namsau dokin amah le amah thah a kisawm hi,
Ahi hangin Paul in, “Bangmah kicih kei in! Kote ka vekun hiah ka om uh hi!” ci-in a kiko hi.
Thong cingpa in meivaksakin a sungah lut pah a, Paul le Silas-te mai-ah ling kawmin a bok hi.
Tua ciangin amah in amaute paikhiatpih a, “Pute aw, hong kihotkhiat nadingin bang ka hih ding kul hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
Amaute in, “Topa Jesu um un, nang le na innkuanpihte hong kihonkhia ding hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in amah le a inn sunga om adangte khempeuh tungah Topa thu a genpih uh hi.
Tua zan hunpi mah in thong cingpa in amaute paipih a, a liamnate uh silsakin amah le a innkuanpihte khempeuh a kibaptise uh hi.
Thong cingpa in a inn ah paipih a, amaute an lui-in, Pasian um ta uh ahi manin a innkuan bupun lungnopna tawh kidim uh hi.
Khuavak ciangin thukhen mangte in thong cingpa kiangah a bupate uh sawlin, “Tua mite khahkhia in,” cih thupiak tawh a paisak uh hi.
Thong cingpa in Paul kiangah, “Thukhen mangte in nang le Silas khahkhiat ding thu hong pia zo uh hi. Na pai thei ta uh hi. Lungnuamtakin pai ta un,” ci-in a gen hi.

Ahi hangin Paul in uliante kiangah, “Kote Rome mi hi napi thudotna om loin mipi mai-ah hong satin thong sungah hong khum uh hi. Tua hi napi tu-in sim khahkhiat hong sawm uh ahi hiam? Hi thei peuhmah lo ding hi! Amaute mahmah hong pai-in kote hong tonpihkhia ta uh hen,” a ci hi.
Uliante in hih thu thukhen mangte kiangah tun uh a, amaute in Paul le Silas, Rome mi ahilam a theih uh ciangin a patau uh hi.
Amaute lungkimsak dingin va pai uh a, thong sung pan tonpihkhia in khuapi a nusiat nadingun a ngen uh hi.
Paul le Silas thong sung pan a paikhiat khit uh ciangin Lydia inn ah a pai uh hi. Tua lai-ah sanggamte tawh kimu-in amaute a hanthawn uh hi. Tua ciangin a paikhia uh hi.
Amaute Amphipolis le Apollonia nawkin a pai uh ciangin Jew-te kikhopna innpi omna Thessalonica a tung uh hi.
Ama ngeina bangin synagogue sungah Paul pai a, Laisiangtho pansanin Sabbath ni thum sung amaute thu a kikuppih hi.
Khrista in thuak in, misi pan a thawh ding mah a hihna zia teltakin genin a lak hi. Amah in, “Note tunga kong tangko hih Jesu, Khristb ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Jew-te pawlkhat kithuzawha Paul le Silas a pawl uh hi; tua mah bangin Pasian kihta Greek-te tampitak le a kipi-et numei a tawm het lo in a pawl uh hi.

Ahi hangin Jew-te in haza uh a, vanzuakna muna migilo pawlkhat kaikhawmin khuapi sungah mipi khawm uh a, ngongtatna a pan uh hi. Amaute Jason innah lut henhan uh a, mihontec lak pan kaihkhiat dingin Paul le Silas a zong uh hi.
Ahi hangin amaute a muh loh uh ciangin Jason le sanggamte pawlkhat kaigawpin khuapi vaihawm uliante mai-ah tun uh a, “Leitung khempeuhah buaina bawl hih mite hih lai hong tung uh a,
Jason in amaute a innah a tungsak hi. Amaute khempeuh in Caesar thukipte thusim loin, ‘Jesu kici adang kumpi khat om hi,’ ci uh hi,” ci-in a kiko uh hi.
Mihonpite le khuapi vaihawm uliante in hih thu a zak uh ciangin a pumbuai gawp uh hi.
Tua ciangin Jason le adangte kitatna piasakin a khah uh hi.
Khuamial tungin sanggamte in Berea ah Paul le Silas a khakhia pah uh hi. Tua lai a tun uh ciangin Jew-te synagogue ah amaute a pai uh hi.
Thessalonica mite sangin Berea mite nampi tat zaw uh hi. Ahang in, lawptakiin thupuak sang uh a, Paul thugente amaan mah ahi hiam, ci-in nisimin Laisiangtho a encian uh hi.
Jew mi tampi in um uh a, tua mah bangin a kipi-et Greek numei honkhat le Greek pasal tampi in zong a um uh hi.
Thessalonica a Jew-te in Berea ah Paul in Pasian thu a hilh lam a theih uh ciangin tua lai-ah zong va pai uh a, mihonpite tawsawnin a kitomsak uh hi.
Sanggamte in tuipi gei-ah Paul sawlkhia pah uh a, ahi hangin Silas le Timothy Berea ah a tam lai uh hi.
Amaute in Athen dong va kha uh a, Paul in Silas le Timothy in a manlang theithei-a, a nungdelh nading uh thu puasak in a ciahsak kik hi.
Paul in amaute ngaka Athen a, a om sungin tua khuapi milimte tawh a kidim mu-a, a lungdong lua mahmah hi.
Tua ciangin synagogue sungah Jew-te le Pasian kihta Greek-te thu kuppih a, tua mah bangin vanzuakna munah nisima a omkha peuhpeuh a kikuppih hi.

Epicurea le Stoic thuguizuihte honkhat amah tawh a kisel uh hi. Amaute pawlkhat in, “Hih kam theipa in bang gen nuam ahi hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi. Paul in lungdamna thu ahi Jesu thu le thawhkikna thu hilh ahi manin a dangte in, “Amah in gamdang pasiante a gum hileh kilawm,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in amah Areopagus thu kikupna ah paipih uh a, tua lai-ah, “Tu-a na hilh thuhilhna thak ko ka thei thei ding uh hiam?
Zak ngei loh ngaihsutna pawlkhat nong zasak a, tuate bang cihnopna hiam, ka thei nuam uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
(Athen mite le tualai-a teng gamdang mi khempeuh in bangmah dang sem loin a nunung pen ngaihsutna thak peuhpeuh ngai-in tua thu bek genna in a hun uh a zang uh hi.)
Tua ciangin Areopagus thukikupna ah Paul ding to a, “No Athen mite’ lam khempeuh ah na biakna-mi uh cih ka mu hi.
Ahang in, pai kawikawi-a, na biak uh nate ka vel leh biakna-tau khat ah: THEIHLOH PASIAN ADING, ci-a kigelh ka mu hi. Tu-in note in na theih loh uh na biak uh, note tungah kong tangko ding hi.
"Leitung le a sunga om na khempeuh a bawl Pasian, van le lei Topa hi-a khut tawh kilam biakinnpite ah a teng kei hi.
Amah in kisapna khat peuhpeuh a nei bangin mihing khuta na a kisepsak hi lo hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amah mah in mite khempeuh nuntakna le huu le adang khempeuh a pia hi.
Mi khat panin mihing nam kim bawla, amaute leitung bup a luahsak hi. Amaute ading hunte sehsaka, amaute ten nading mun ciat a sehsak hi.
Eite tek kiang panin Pasian gamla lo hi napi, mihingte in amah zonga, zama, a muh khak zenzen leh cih deihna in hihte a hih ahi hi.
’Ahang in, ama sungah eite nungta-in, i tanga mihing hina i nei hi. Na la phuahte uh pawlkhat ah, ‘Eite ama suan ama khak i hi hi,’ ci hi.
"Tu ahi ciangin eite Pasian suan le khak i hi khit nungsang khutsiamte in a zep uh kham, ngun ahikeh suang tawh kibawl milim a bang dingin a pasian-hina i ngaihsut ding hi lo hi.
Pasian in a beisa hunin tua bang khuaphawklohna a kimuh-mawhbawl hangin tu-in amah in mun khempeuhah mi khempeuh a kisik dingin thu pia zo hi.

Ahang in, amah in a sehkholhsa mipa zangin thumaan tawh leitung mi khempeuh thu a khen ni ding sehkhol khin zo hi. Hih thu amaanna mi khempeuh tungah a lahna-in, amah misi pan a thokiksak hi,” a ci hi.
Amaute in misi thawhkikna thu a zak uh ciangin pawlkhat in zahpih uh a, ahi hangin adangte in, “Hih thu tungtang na gen ka za kik nuam uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua laitakin Paul in tua kikhawmte a nusia hi.
Mi tawmkhat in Paul nung zuisuak uh a, a um uh hi. Amaute lakah Areopagus a pawl mi Dionysius le Damaris kici numei khat le adang tampi zong ahi uh hi.
Hih teng khit ciangin Athen nusia in Corinth ah Paul a pai hi.

Tua lai-ah Pontus gammi Aquila kici Jew mi khat tawh a kituak hi. Amah, Jew-te khempeuh in Rome nusia dinga Claudius in thu a piakna hanga Italy pana a zi Priscilla tawh hun sawt nai lo-a a tung uh ahi hi. Amaute tawh kimu dingin Paul a pai hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh amah amaute banga puanbuk bawlpa ahi manin amaute kiangah taamin na semkhawm uh hi.
Sabbath ni simin Jew-te le Greek-te zol sawmin synagogue sungah thu a kikuppih hi.
Macedonia panin Silas le Timothy a tun uh ciangin Paul amahmah thuhilhna bekah kipumpiak a, Jew-te kiangah, “Jesu in Khrista hi,” ci-in a hilh hi.

Ahi hangin Jew-te in Paul sel uh a, a selpho uh ciangin amaute a langpan dingin a puante singkhia a, amaute kiangah, “Na sisan uh nomau lutungah tu ta hen! Ka tavuan ah ka siang zo hi. Tu-a kipan Gentile-te kiangah ka pai ta ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Paul in synagogue nusia a, tua inn zoma om Pasian bia pa khat Titus Justus inn ah a lut hi.
Synagogue ukpa Crispus le a innkuan pihte khempeuh in Topa um uh a, ama thu a za Corinth mite tampi in umin a kibaptise uh hi.
Zan khat Paul mangmuhna sungah Topa in hopih a: “Kihta kei in, na gen ban zom in, dai tuan kei in.
Nang tawh omkawm ka hi manin kuamah in nang hong doin hong liamsuah lo ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh hih khuapi sungah mi tampi ka nei hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Paul, kum khat le alang sung om a, amaute Pasian thu a hilh hi.
Gallio, Achaia-a gam-ukpa ahi laitakin Jew-te kipawlkhawmin Paul va busim uh a, thukhen zumah a tun uh hi. Amaute in,
"Hih mipa in thukham tawh kileh bulhin Pasian bia dingin mite a zol hi,” ci-in a ngawh uh hi.
Paul a pau dektak laitakin Gallio in Jew-te kiangah, “No Jew-te in a kilawm lo gamtatna ahikeh khialhna lian thu hong gen hi le uh cin na thu uh, thu-in kisang thei ding hi.
Ahi hangin nomau thukham tawh kisai kammalte le minte thu hanga piang ahi manin no le no mah in na siangsak un. Tua bang thute a khen in ka pang kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin thukhen zum panin amaute a hawlkhiasak hi.
Tua ciangin amaute khempeuh in synagogue ukpa Sosthene bawhhuan uh a, thukhen zum mai-ah a sat uh hi. Ahi hangin Gallio in a awlmawh kei hi.

Corinth ah tawm vei sung Paul a taam lai hi. Tua ciangin sanggamte nusia in Priscilla le Aquila tonpih a Syria ah tembaw-in a pai uh hi. Amah in kiciam nasa khat a neih manin tembaw tung a tuan ma-in Cenchrea ah a sam a metmaisak hi.
Amaute Ephesus tung uh a, tua lai-ah Paul in Priscilla le Aquila a nusia hi. Amah ahileh synagogue ah pai-a Jew-te thu a kikuppih hi.
Hun tamzaw a zat ding a nget uh ciangin amah in a sel hi.
Ahi hangin a nusiat ding ciangin, “Pasian deihna ahileh kong pai kik ding hi,” ci-in a kamciam hi. Tua ciangin Ephesus panin tembaw tuangin a dingkhia hi.
Caesarea a tun uh ciangin paito-in pawlpite va hopih a, tua ciangin Antioch ah a paisuk hi.
Antioch ah hun sawtkhop a zat khit ciangin tua lai pan Paul kipankhia kik a, Galatia le Phrygia kual mun khat khit mun khatah zin kawikawi-in, nungzuite khempeuh a va thakhauhsak hi.
Tua hun sungin Alexandria khua mi Apollos kici Jew mi khat Ephesus ah a pai hi. Amah theihna sang khat hi-a, Laisiangtho theih mahmah tawh a thuah hi.
Amah Topa lampi lama kihilh ngiingeisa hi-a, John baptisena bek a thei hi napi, Jesu thu tawh kisai siangtakin hilha, lawptakinb thu a gen hi.
Amah, synagogue sungah hangtakin a pau ngam hi. Priscilla le Aquila in a thu gen a zak uh ciangin a innuah sam uh a, ama tungah Pasian lampi thu a kimzawin a hilh cian uh hi.

Achaia-a Apollos a pai nop ciangin sanggamte in amah hanthawn uh a, tua lai-a om nungzuite in amah a na muak nadingun lai a khak uh hi. Amah a tun ciangin hehpihna hanga a um mite adingin amah a phatuam pha mahmah hi.
Ahang in, mipi laka thu kinialnate ah amah in Jesu in Khrist hi, ci-in Laisiangtho panin Jew-te a dongkhak giapgiap hi.
Corinth ah Apollos a om laitakin gam sung lamzikpi zui in Paul zina, Ephesus a tung hi. Tua lai-ah nungzuite pawlkhat mu a, amaute kiangah,
"Na up uh ciangina Khasiangtho na ngah uh hiam?” ci-in a dong hi. Amaute in, “Ka ngah kei uh hi, Khasiangtho a om lam nangawn ka za ngei nai kei uh hi,” ci-in a dawng uh hi.
Tua ciangin Paul in, “Tua ahileh bang baptisena na ngah uh hiam?” a ci hi. Amaute in, “John baptisena” a ci uh hi.
Paul in, “John baptisena pen kisikna hanga baptisena ahi hi. Amah in mipite kiangah ama nunga paipa a up dingun hilha, tua pen Jesu um ding cihna ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Amaute in hih thu a zak uh ciangin Topa Jesu min sungahb a kibaptise uh hi.
Paul in amaute tungah a khut a ngak ciangin amaute tungah Khasiangtho tunga pautec in pau-in thu a gen uh hi.
Tua mite a vekpi un sawm-le-nih bang a pha uh hi.
Synagogue sungah Paul luta, mi lungsim a zo theithei dingin Pasian gam thu kiselin, hangtakin kha thum sung tua lai-ah thu a gen hi.

Ahi hangin amaute pawlkhat phengphi uh a, um nuam loin mipi mai-ah Lampi thu a gensia uh hi. Tua ciangin Paul in amaute a nusia hi. Amah in nungzuite paikhiatpih a, Tyrannus-te thugenna innpi sungah nisimin thu a kikuppih hi.
Asia gam sunga teng Jew-te le Greek-te khempeuh in Topa thu a zak nadingun hih bangin kum nih sung a hih hi.
Pasian in Paul tungtawnin a lam dang tuan nalamdangte a bawl hi.
Paul tawh a kisukhasa mainul neute le angtuamte, cinate kiangah a kitawi ciangin a natnate uh damin, kha gilote in amaute a nusia uh hi.

Kha gilote hawlkhia-a, a vak kawi kawi Jew-te pawlkhat in dawilut mite tungah Topa Jesu min zangin kha gilote hawlkhiat a sawm uh hi. Amaute in, “Paul in a thu a hilhpa Jesu minin na paikhiat ding thu kong pia hi,” khawng a ci uh hi.
Hih banga a hihte, Jew siampi makai khat Sceva tapa sagihte ahi uh hi.
Ni khat tua kha gilo in amaute tungah, “Jesu ka thei a, Paul thu zong ka thei hi, no kua na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin kha gilo lutna mipa amaute tungah diang gawpa, a vekpi un a zogawp hi. Amah in amaute nakpi-in vua a, guaktangin sisan luang sa-in a taikhia uh hi.
Ephesus a teng Jew-te le Greek-te in hih thu a theih uh ciangin lau uh a, Topa Jesu min nakpitakin a zahtak uh hi.
A umte tampi hong pai uh a, a gitloh gamtatnate uh a pulakkhia khin uh hi.
Dawi-ai tawi mi honkhat in a laizialte uh kaikhawm uh a mipite muhin a haltum uh hi. Tua laizialte aman a seh uh ciangin a vekpi in drachmasd tul sawmnga man hi.
Hih bangin Topa thu zaipitakin kizela, a vangliatna a khang hi.
Hihte khempeuh a pian khit nungin Paul in Macedonia le Achaia-a nawkin Jerusalem ah pai ding a khensat hi. Amah in, “Tua lai ka tun khit ciangin Rome ah zong ka hawh kul hi,” ci hi.
Amah a huhte nih, Timothy le Erastus, Macedonia ah sawl a, amah tawmvei sung Asia gamah a taam lai hi.
Tua hun pawlin Lampi thu tawh kisai buaina lianpi khat a piang hi.
Ngun seek Demetrius min nei khat oma, tuapa in ngun tawh, Artemis biakbuknote bawla, khutsiamte adingin sumzuakna neu het lo khat a suaksak hi.
Amah in amau sep bang a semte le sumbawlna-a a neite khempeuh samkhawm in, “Guaite aw, hih sum bawlna panin sum tampitak hong tum hi, cih na thei uh hi.
Tua hi-a hih mipa Paul in Ephesus le Asia gam bupah mi tampitak thuzawha, a pimang zia mu-in na za zo uh hi. Amah in, ‘Mihing bawltawm pasiante Pasian hi peuhmah lo hi,’ ci hi.

I sumbawlna a minsiat ding a lauhuai bek tham loin alian numei Artemis biakinnpi zong kithusim loin Asia gam le leitung bup khempeuh-a kibia nusian mahmah kiminsiasaka a pasian thupina teng a kisuh ding lauhuai hi,” a ci hi.
Amaute in hih thu a zak uh ciangin lungso uh a, “Ephesus-te Artemis alian hi!” ci-in a kiko uh hi.
Khuapi sung bup a so pah henhan hi. Mipite in Macedonia pana Paul khualzinpihte, Gaius le Aristarchus man uh a, limlahna inn sungah khekhatkhai bangin a lut henhan uh hi.
Mihonpite mai-ah Paul kilaak nuama, ahi hangin a nungzuite in a phal kei uh hi.
Paul lawmte, tua gam uliante pawlkhat nangawn in tua limlahna inn sungah a va kilai-phum loh nadingin thumin thu a khak uh hi.

Tua-a kikhawmte pumbuai gawp uh a, pawlkhat in thu khat genin, adang pawlkhat in thu dang khat mah gen uh a, a kiko uh hi. Mi a tamzaw thamte, amau bang hanga tua lai-a om uh hiam, cih nangawn a kithei kei uh hi.
Jew-te in amai lamah Alexander sawn uh a, mihonpite pawlkhat amah lamlakin a kiko uh hi. Amah in mipite mai-ah a kiphelhna thu a gen theih nadingin a daih nading uh a khut a van hi.
Ahi hangin amah Jew mi hi, cih a theihcian uh ciangin amaute khempeuh kithukhat in, “Ephesus-te Artemis a lian hi!” ci-in nai nih sung bang a kiko uh hi.
Khuapi lai-atpa in mihonpite daisak a: “Ephesus mite aw, Ephesus khuapi in a lian Artemis biakinnpi le van pana hong kia tuanu lim a kem ahilam leitung bupin a theihsa hi lo ahi hiam?
Tua ahi manin hih thute nial theih nading a om lo ahi khit nungsang daitakin om a, na gamhtat loh ding uh ahi hi.
Hih mite in eite nusian gendai loin i biakinnpi lah luh lo napi hih lai-ah nong tun zo uh hi.
Demetrius le ama khutsiampihte in mi khatpeuh tungah lungkimlohna nei uh ahileh thukhenna innte honsa in om a, gam-ukte lah om uh hi. Amaute in ngawhna thu a bawl thei uh hi.
Tua lo adang thu puaktoh nop lai na neih uh leh a ngeina om bangin kikhopna ah a kisiansak kul ding hi.
Tuni-a thupiangte hangin a ngongtat a hong kingawh khak ding lauhuai hi. Hih thu tungtang ah siksan ding thukho i neih loh nungsang hih banga buaina bawl kei ni,” a ci hi.
Hih teng a gen khit ciangin tua-a kikhawm teng a kikhensak hi.
Tua buaina a ven ciangin Paul in nungzuite samsaka, amaute a hanthawn khit ciangin mangpha khaka, Macedonia a pai dingin a dingkhia hi.
Amah tua huam tengah zin kawikawi-a, mite kiangah hanthawnna thu tampi genin a tawpna-ah Greek a tung hi.
Tua lai-ah kha thum a taam hi. Syria gam zuana tembaw tawh pai a sawm hi napi Jew-te in thah a sawsim manin Macedonia tawna ciah kik dingin a khensat hi.
Berea panin Pyrrhus tapa Sopater, Thessalonica panin Aristarchus, Secundus, Derbe panin Gaius le Timothy zong, Asia gam panin Tychicus le Trophimus-te in a zui uh hi.
Hih mite na mapai uh a, Troas ah kote hong ngak uh hi.
Ahi hangin Silngo-sawhloh Anlum Pawi khit ciangin Philippi panin tembaw in ka tuang uh a, ni nga khit ciangin Troas ah ka lawmte uh pha in tua lai-ah ni sagih ka taam khawm uh hi.
Nipikal ni masa pen ni-in anlum balkham dingin ka kikhawm uh hi. Paul in mite kiangah thu gena, a zing ciangin paisan sawm ahi manin zankim dong thu a gen niloh hi.
Ka kikhopna mun uh inn tungnung dei sungah meivak tampi a om hi.
Paul in thu gengen mai ahi ciangin Eutychus kici tangvalno khat tawhlet ah tu-a, a ihmut suak mahmahin a lusu hi. Amah a kikhim ciangin inn dawl thumna panin lei-ah kiasuka, a sisa in kitawm hi.
Paul kumsuka, tua tangvalnopa tungah boksukin a kawi hi. Amah in, “Amah nungta hi, patau kei dih un!” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin inn tungah kahto kika anlum balkhamin a ne hi. Khuavak dong thu a gen khit ciangin a paisan hi.
Mite in tangvalnopa a nungta in a inn ah ciahpih uh a, amaute nakpi-in a kihehnem hi.
Tembawpi-in Assos lamah ka na ma pai uh a, tua lai-ah tembaw tawh Paul a la ding ka hi uh hi. Amah tua lai-ah khe-a, a na mapai ding ahi manin amah in hih banga a gel ahi hi.
Amah in Assos ah kote hong dawntuah a, tembaw ah ka tuansak khit uh ciangin Mitylene ah ka paisuak uh hi.
A zing ciangin tua lai panin ka paikhia leuleu uh a, Kios ka tung uh hi. A thai ciangin Samos ka kantan uh a, a zing ciangin Miletus ka tung uh hi.
Paul in a hi theih le Pentecost ni lap nuam ahi manin Asia gam sungah ahun zang khin loin, Ephesus khengsuakin a manlangin Jerusalem tun a sawm hi.
Miletus panin Paul in, Ephesus a pawlpi upate a samsak hi.
Hong tun uh ciangin amaute kiangah: “Asia gam kong tun a ni masa pen ni-a kipan no lakah ka om sung khempeuh ka nuntakzia na thei khin zo uh hi.
Jew-te in kei thah dingin hong sawmsimna un nakpi-in hong zia-et ta leh, nakpitakin kiniamkhiatin khitui tawh Topa na ka sem hi.
Note adingin a phatuam ding peuhmah kong hilh ding ka lungsit kei a, tangpi theih ahi zongin inn simah ahi zongin note kong hilh hi, cih na thei uh hi.
Jew-te le Greek-te tungah, i Topa Jesu upna nei-in kisik a, Pasian lamah a kihei pelmawh nadingun ka tangko zo hi.
"Tu-in Kha hong sawl teiteina mangin, ka tungah bang thu piang ding cih thei loin Jerusalem ah ka pai ding hi.
Khasiangtho in kei tungah, khuapi simah thong kiat ding le haksatna in hong maituah hi, cih vauhilhna bek ka thei hi.

Ahi zongin tai kidemna man thei in Topa Jesu in ka sep dinga hong piaksa Pasian hehpihna lungdamna-thu teci ka pan ding mansiang khin peuh leng kei adingin ka nuntakna bangmah man loin ka ngaihsun hi.
"Tu-in kumpi-gam thu gena a laka ka pai kawikawina mite khat beek in nong mu kik nawn kei ding uh cih ka thei hi.
Tua ahi manin mi khempeuh sisan tungah ka mawhpeng hi, cih tuni-in note tungah kong pulak hi.
Ahang in, Pasian deihna buppi no tungah kong tangko ding sit ka nei kei hi.
Khasiangtho in nomau mahmah a cinga mite hong suahsak, tua tuuhonte limtakin na kem un. Ama sisan tawh a leisa Pasianb pawlpi a cingte na hi un.
Ken kong nusiat khit ciangin note lakah ngia hangsante hong lutin tuuhonte a hawi loh ding uh ka thei hi.
Note lak nangawn ah nungzuite amau lamah a kaihmang zawh nadingun thumaan a lehkaih mi hong khangkhia ding hi.
Tua ahi ciangin kigalging un! Kum thum sung khawl lo-a, sun tawh zan tawh khitui luanga note a milip tunga kong vauhilhna ciamteh un.
"Tu-in Pasian tung le note hong picingsak thei-a, a sianthosak sate khempeuh lakah gouluahna a pia ama hehpihna thu tungah note kong ap hi.
Mi khatpeuh neihsa, ngun ahi a, kham ahi a, nikten puansilh ahi zongin ka deih gawh kei hi.
Hih ka khutte in kei kitang sapna le ka lawmte kitangsapna pia, cih note mahmah in na thei zo uh hi.
Ka sepnasa peuhmah ah Topa Jesu kammal mahmah in, ‘Ngahna sangin piakna ah thupha omzaw hi,’ a cih phawk kawmin, hih bang nasep hahkatna tawh a thanem mi i huh ding kul hi, cih kong lak hi,” a ci hi.
Hih teng a cih khit ciangin amaute khempeuh tawh khukdinin thu a ngen uh hi.
Amaute khempeuh in amah kawi-in, namin, a kap uh hi.
Ama mai mu kik ngei nawn lo ding a cih in amaute a dahsak pen hi. Tua ciangin amaute in amah tembaw tung dong a kha uh hi.
Amaute tawh ka kikhen khit uh ciangin tembaw in ka tuang uh a tangtakin Cos ka zuan pah vingveng uh hi. A zing ciangin Rhodes pai-in tua panin Patara ah ka pai uh hi.
Phoenicia ah a galkah ding tembaw khat ka mu uh a, tua ah tuangin ka pai uh hi.
Cyprus ka galmuh khit uh ciangin a khang lam nawkin Syria dong ka pai uh hi. Tyre ah ka kinga uh hi. Tua lai-ah ka tembaw un a vanpuakte a suahkhia ding ahi hi.
Tua lai-ah nungzuite ka muh uh ciangin ni sagih sung amau kiangah ka taam uh hi. Amaute in Jerusalem dong, Paul a pai loh nadingin Kha tungtawnin a kho uh hi.

Ahi hangin ka hun uh a bei ciangin ka ding khia uh a, ka zinna ban uh ka zom uh hi. Nungzuite khempeuh le a zi a tate un khuapi nawl ciang hong kha uh a, tua lai mun, tuipiau-ah khukdinin thu ka ngen uh hi.
Khat le khat mangpha ka kikhak khit uh ciangin tembaw tungah ka kah uh a, amau bel inn ah a ciah kik ta uh hi.
Tyre panin ka zinna ban uh ka zom uh a, Ptolemais ah ka kinga uh hi. Tua lai-a sanggamte ka hopih uh a, amau kiangah ni khat ka kulh uh hi.
A zing ciang pai leuleu in Caesarea ka tung uh a, tua Sagihte lakah khat, lungdamna thugen Philip inn ah ka tung uh hi.
Amah in pasal a nei nai lo kam a sang tanu li a nei hi.
Tua lai-ah ni tam khop ka tam khit uh ciangin Judea panin Agabus kici kamsang khat hong paisuk hi.

Kote kiangah hong pai-a, Paul kawnggak la-in ama khut le a khete kihenin, “Khasiangtho in, ‘Jerusalem ah hih kawng gak neipa, Jew-te in hih bangin hen ding uh a, Gentile-te khut sungah pia ding uh hi,’ ci hi,” a ci hi.
Kote in hih thu ka zak uh ciangin kote le tua lai-a om mipite in Jerusalem ah Paul a pai loh nadingin ka kho uh hi.
Tua ciangin Paul in, “Bang hangin note kapa, ka lungtang tamkhamsak na hi uh hiam? Hong kihen bek tham loin Topa Jesu min hangin Jerusalem a sih ding nangawn a kigingkholsa ka hi hi,” hong ci hi.
Ka khohna uh hong man nop loh ciangin ka kho nawn kei uh a, “Pasian deih bangin piang ta hen,” ka ci uh hi.
Hih teng khit ciangin ka kithawi uh a, Jerusalem ah ka paito uh hi.
Caesarea panin nungzuite pawlkhat in hong zui uh a, ka tun nading uh Manson inn ah hong kha uh hi. Amah Cyprus mi hi-a, nungzui masate lakah khat ahi hi.
Jerusalem ah ka tun uh ciangin sanggamte in lungtaitakin hong tungsak uh hi.
A zing ciangin Paul le ko adang teng James tawh kimu dingin ka pai uh a, tua lai-ah upate khempeuh a kim uh hi.
Paul in amaute hopih in, Gentile-te lakah ama nasepna tungtawna Pasian nasepna cingtakin a zasak hi.
Amaute in hih thu a zak uh ciangin Pasian a phat uh hi. Tua ciangin Paul kiangah, “Sanggam aw, Jew-te tul bangzah in um khin zo cih le amaute khempeuh thukham zuih hahkatte hi cih na mu hi.
Gentile-te laka teng Jew-te khempeuh in a tate uh vunat loh ding ahi zongin ngeina zui loin Moses pan kiheikhia dingin nang na hilh, ci-in amaute a kizasak uh hi.
Bang cih ding i hiam? Amaute in hihtak nong tun za ngel ding uh hi.
Tua ahi ciangin kong gen bangun hih in. Kote kiangah a kiciam khinsa mi li a om hi.

Hih mite va tonpih in amaute a ngeina-a a kisiansuahna ah va kihel inla, a sam uh a metmai theih nadingun a sam met man ding uh sik in. Tua ciangin mi khempeuh in nang thu a kigennate a maanlohna thei ding uh a, nang mahmah thukham thu manga a nungta na hina thei ding uh hi.

Thu um Gentile-te ahi uh leh ka thukhensatna uh lai amaute ka khak zo uh a, amaute in milimte thoihna ante, sisan, ngawnghek ganhing sate le numei-pasal paktatna a tan dingun ka gelh zo uh hi,” a ci uh hi.

A zing ciangin Paul in tua mite tonpih a, amaute tawh amah mah a kisiansuah hi. Tua ciangin kisiansuahna nite bei ni ding le amau ciat in biakna a bawl ni ding uh theisak dingin biakinnpi ah a pai hi.
Tua ni sagih a cin dektak ciangin Asia gam pana Jew-te pawlkhat in biakinnpi ah Paul a mu uh hi. Amaute in mihonpite khempeuh tawsawnin amah man uh a,

"Israel mite aw, ko hong huh un! I mite, i thukham le hih mun lang panga, mun khempeuh-a mi khempeuh tungah thu a hilhpa hih pa ahi hi. Tua tham loin biakinnpi huang sungah Greek-te hong paipih in hih munsiangtho a buahsak hi,” ci-in a kiko uh hi.
(Tua hun ma-in khuapi sungah Ephesus mi Trophimus le Paul a kithuah mu uh a, Paul in amah biakinnpi huang sungah lutpih khin zo ding hi, ci-a theihsa banga a koih uh ahi hi.)
Khuapi sung khempeuh linglawnga, mun khempeuh panin mi hong tai-in a kisutuah uh hi. Paul manin biakinnpi panin kaigawp uh a, kongpite kikhak pah lian hi.
Amah thah a sawm laitakun Jerusalem khuapi bup hehin a so hi, cih Rome galkap mangpa kiangah thu va tung hi.
Amah in bute hon khat le galkapte tonpih a mihonpite lamah a taisuk uh hi. Tua mi ngonghtatte in galkap mangpa le a galkapte a muh uh ciangin Paul a sat nawn kei uh hi.
Galkap mangpa paikhia a, amah manin sik khainiang nih tawh hen dingin thu a pia hi. Tua ciangin amah kua hi-a, bang hih hiam, cih a dong hi.

Mihonpi lakah pawlkhat in thu khat gena, adang pawlkhat in a thu dang khat mah genin a kiko uh hi. Galkap mangpa in mite buaina hangin thutak a muh theih loh ciangin galkap inn sungah Paul paipih dingin thu a pia hi.
Kahlei ah Paul a tun ciangin tua migilote uang lua uh ahi manin galkapte in Paul a puak uh kul hi.
A nungzui mihonpite in, “Amah thatmang un,” ci-in a kiko uh hi.
Galkapte in galkap inn sungah Paul a lutpih dektak laitakun amah in galkap mangpa kiangah, “Kam khat kong gen thei ding hiam?” ci-in a dong hi. Amah in, “Greek pau na thei hiam?
A beisa hunlai-a mi linthawn pawl, tulli makaih a kumpi langpang dinga kipan Egypt mipa hi lo na hia?” ci-in a dawng hi.
Paul in, “Kei Jew mi ka hi hi. Cilicia gam Tarsus pan ka hi-a khuapi mawk mawk a mi ka hi kei hi. Nong hehpihna in mipite tungah thu hong gensak in,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Galkap mangpa tung pan thu a ngah khit ciangin kahlei tungah Paul dingto a, mihonte lamah a khut a van hi. Amaute khempeuh a daih dide khit uh ciangin amaute kiangah Arama pau-in:
“Sanggamte le pate aw, tu-in kei kihutna thu na ngai un,” a ci hi.
Amaute in amah Aram pau-a, a pau a zak uh ciangin a daipah khipkhep uh hi. Tua ciangin Paul in:

"Kei Jew mi ka hi hi. Cilicia gam Tarsus ah ka suak a, ahi hangin hih khuapi-a khangkhia ka hi hi. Gamaliel khut nuai-ah i pate thukhamte khempeuh sina, a siamsa ka hi a, tuni-a note khat peuhpeuh zah a Pasian ading a hahkat ka hi hi.
Hih Lampi thu a zuite a sih dongun ka bawlsia a, numei hi ta leh pasal hi ta leh manin thong sungah ka khum hi.

Hih bang ka hihna tulpipa le Vaihawmte in zong teci hong pang thei ding uh hi. Keimah in Damascus a, a sanggamte uh a laikhak nangawn uh amaute tung pan ka ngah a, hih mite Jerusalem thonga khum ding le gawt dinga puak dingin ka va kuan hi.
Damascus kiang ka tun laitak sun pawlin thakhatin van pan a tangpha mahmah khuavak khat in ka kimkot hong tanzal hi.
Lei-ah ka puk a, aw khat in ka tungah, ‘Saul! Saul! Bang hangin kei hong bawlsia na hi hiam?’ hong cih ka za hi.
"‘Topa kua na hiam?’ ci-in ka dong hi. “Amah in, ‘Na bawlsiat Nazareth mi Jesu ka hi hi,’ ci-in hong dawng hi.
Ka tonpihte in tua khuavak mu uh a, ahi hangin kei tunga hong hopih aw a theitel kei uh hi.
" ‘Topa aw, bang hih ding ka hi hiam?’ ci-in ka dong hi. “Topa in, ‘Tho inla Damascus khua sungah pai in, tua lai-ah na sep dinga kisehsate hong kigen ding hi,’ hong ci hi.
Tua khuavakpi in ka mit tawsak ahi manin ka tonpihte in ka khutin hong kai uh a, Damascus khua sungah hong lutpih uh hi.
"Ananias kici mi khat kei hong veh dingin hong pai hi. Amah thukham tan a ngentel mahmah khat hi-a, tua lai-a teng Jew-te khempeuh in a zahtak mahmah khat ahi hi.
Amah ka kiangah hong dinga, ‘Sanggampa Saul aw, khua mu in!’ hong ci hi. Tua hun lianin amah ka mu thei pah hi.
"Tua ciangin amah in: ‘I pate Pasian in, ama deihna thei ding Thumaan Pa mu ding le ama kam pan thute za dingin nang hong teel zo hi.
Na muhsa le na zaksate mite khempeuh tungah ama teci na hi ding hi.
Tua hi-a tu-in nang bang ngak lai na hi hiam? Tho in; ama min lo inla, kibaptise-in na mawhnate silkhia in,’ hong ci hi.
"Jerusalem ah ka ciah kika, biakinnpi ah thu ka nget ciangin mumang bangin ka om a,
kei kiangah, ‘Kinawh in!’ Amaute in, kei thu teci na panna hong sang lo ding uh ahi manin, Jerusalem nusia pak in,’ hong ci Topa ka mu hi.
"Topa aw, synagogue-te ah a banbanin pai-a, nang hong umte thong sungah khumin ka sat lam hih mite in thei zo uh hi.
Nang hanga si paa Stephen sisan a luan lai-in ka thukimpihna lakin amah a thatte puante cingin tua lai-ah ka ding hi,’ ci-in ka dawng hi.
"Tua ciangin Topa in ka kiangah, ‘Pai peuh in; gamlapi a om Gentile-te kiangah kong sawl ding hi,’ hong ci hi,” ci-in a gen hi.
Hih a gen hun ciang dong mihon pite in Paul thugen a ngai uh hi. Tua ciangin nakpi-in kiko uh a, “Leitungah omsak kei un! Hing-khawi huai kei!” a ci uh hi.
Amaute in a kiko kawmun a puan tualpite uh suahkhia-in van lamah leivui a theh gawp uh ciangin
galkap mangpa in galkap inn sungah Paul a tumpihsak hi. Bang hang mihonpite in amah kikosan ahi hiam, cih a theihkhiat nadingin amah sata, thu dot dingin a gen hi.
Amaute in amah sat dinga a dawhsak laitakun, Paul in tua lai-a ding zakhat ukpa kiangah, “A mawhna kimu nai lopi in, Rome mi khat na sat ding thukham tawh kituak na sak mah hiam?” a ci hi.
Zakhat-ukpa in hih thu a zak ciangin galkap mangpa kiangah pai-in a va zasak hi. Amah in, “Hih mipa Rome mi ahi hi, bang cih ding na hi hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
Paul kiangah galkap mangpa pai-in, “Nang Rome mi na hi hiam, hong gen in?” ci-in a dong hi. Amah in, “Ka hi hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Tua ciangin galkap mangpa in, “Rome gammi ka suah nadingin a man tampi ka pia hi,” a ci hi. Paul, in, “Ahi hanign kei ka suah a kipan gammi ka hi hi,” a ci hi.
Amah thu dong dinga kisate a tawp kik pah lian uh hi. Galkap mangpa mahmah zong Rome gammi khat ahi Paul, sik khainiang a khih ahilam a tel ciangin a patau hi.

A zing ciangin galkap mangpa in, bang pen hanga Jew-te in Paul hih banga mawhmat nuam uh ahi hiam, cih cian taka a theih khit nop manin, amah khahkhia a, siampi makaite le Sanhedrin-te khempeuh a kikup dingun thu a pia hi. Tua ciangin Paul paipiha amaute mai-ah a dingsak hi.
Paul in Sanhedrin-te tangtakin en a, “Ka sanggamte aw, tuni dongin Pasian tungah kisuantaakna om loin ka sep ding teng ka tangtun khin zo hi,” a ci hi.
Hih bang a cih ciangin tulpi Ananias in Paul kianga dingte kiangah a muk a satsak dingun thu a pia hi.

Tua ciangin Paul in, “Nang, a kanga kizut kawm aw, Pasian in nang hong sat na ve! Thukham tawh kituaka thukhen dingin tua lai-a tu hi napi kei sat dinga thu na piakna tawh thukham na palsat hi!” a ci hi.
Paul kianga dingte in, “Nang, Pasian tulpipa eng cih ngam maw?” a ci uh hi.
Paul in, “Sanggamte aw, ken amah tulpi ahilam ka thei kei hi, ‘Na mite ukpa gensiatna kam pau kei in,’a ci-in kigelh mah hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.

Tua ciangin Paul in amaute pawlkhat Sadducee hi-in, adangte Pharisee ahilam uh thei a, Sanhedrin mai-ah, “Ka sanggamte aw, kei Pharisee khat tapa Pharisee khat mah ka hi hi. Misite thawhkikna ka lamet manin thukhenna a thuak ka hi hi,” a cikhia hi.
Hih banga cih ciangin Pharisee-te le Sadducee-te kikalah kiselna pianga tua-a kikhawmte a kipawlkhen uh hi.
(Sadducee-te in thawhkikna om lo, vansawltak ahi a, kha ahi zongin om lo hi, ci uh a, ahi hangin Pharisee-te in, tuate khempeuh om hi, ci uh hi.)

Mihonpi buaina lianpi pianga, thu kham sia ahi Pharisee-te pawlkhat dingin nakpitakin sel uh a, “Hih mipa a tat khialhna bangmah ka mu kei uh hi. Vansawltak khatpeuh, kha khatpeuh in ama tungah thu gen hileh eite in bang lawh ding!” a ci uh hi.

Kiselna nasia lua mahmah a, amaute in Paul a balzan khak ding uh, galkap mangpa a lau hi. Amah in galkapte va paisuk a, thatang hat suanga amaute lak pan amah lakhia in galkap inn sungah a paipih dingun thu a pia hi.
A zing ciang zanin Paul kiangah Topa dinga, “Kilungkhauhsak in! Jerusalem a ka thu teci na pansa bangin Rome ah zong teci na pan teitei kul ding hi,” a ci hi.
A zing ciang zingsang in Jew-te in kisimzopna khat bawl uh a, Paul a thah khit matengun an ne tui dawn om lo ding, ci-in a kiciam uh hi.
Hih sawmsimna ah mi sawmli sanga tamzaw kihel uh hi.
Siampi makaite le upate kiangah amaute pai uh a, “Paul ka thah khit matengun, bangmah ne lo dingin khauh takin ka kiciam zo uh hi.

Tua ahi ciangin tu-in nang le Sanhedrin in Paul thu a cingzaw a thei nuam kineihin note mai-ah galkap mangpa in amah hong puak nadingin na ngen un. Amah hih lai hong tun ma-in a that dingin kigingsa-in ka om uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Ahi hangin Paul sanggamnu tapa in hih sawmsimna a zak ciangin galkap inn sungah pai-in Paul a va hilh hi.
Tua ciangin Paul in zakhat-ukpa khat sam a, “Hih khangnopa galkap mangpa kiangah va paipih in, amah in thugen ding a nei hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin amah in galkap mangpa kiangah a paipih hi. Zakhat ukpa in, “Thong kiapa Paul in kei hong samsak a, hih khangnopa in nang kiangah gen ding nei ahi manin nang kianga puak dingin hong sawl hi,” a ci hi.
Galkap mangpa in khangnopa a khutah lenin kai a, “Kei kianga nong gen nop bang ahi hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
Amah in: “Jew-te in ama thu a cingzaw-a thei nuam kineih in, zing ciangin Sanhedrin mai-ah Paul na puak nading hong nget ding uh a thukim zo uh hi.

Amaute thu mang peuhmah kei in. Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute, mi sawmli sanga tamzaw in amah lamkalah na pangsim ding uh hi. Amaute in amah a thah khit matengun, an ne tui dawn om lo dingin kiciamna bawl zo uh hi. Amaute tu-in a kigingsa-in om uh a, a ngetna uh na phal ding bek ngakin om uh hi,” a ci hi.
Galkap mangpa in khangnopa ciahsak in, “Hih thu kei kiangah nong theihsak lam kuama kiangah gen kei in,” ci-in limtakin a vaikhak hi.
Tua khit ciangin amah in zakhat ukte nih sama, “Tu zan nai kua in Caesarea a pai ding, galkap zanih, sakol tuang galkap sawm sagih le teipi tawi galkapb zanih tawh na kithawikhol un.
Ukpipa Felix kiang bittaka a tun nadingin Paul tuan nading zong vai hawmsak un,” ci-in thu a pia hi.
Amah in a nuai-a bangin laikhak khat a gelh hi:
Claudius Lysias, A Hoihpipen Ukpipa, Felix tungah: Kong hopih hi.
Hih mipa Jew-te in man uh a, that dektak uh hi. Ahi hangin amah Rome mi hi, cih thei ka hi manin ka galkapte tawh pai-in amah ka va hukhia uh hi.
Amaute in bang hanga amah mawhsak uh hiam, cih ka thei nuama, amau Sanhedrin tungah amah ka puak uh hi.
Amaute ngawhna pen amau thukham tawh kisai hi-a, ahi hangin amah a kingawhna, sih nading ahi zongin thong a khiat nading ahi zongin thukho ka mu kei hi.
Hih mipa thah ding kisawmsim cih hong kizaksak ciangin thakhatin nang kiangah kong paisak pah hi. Amah a mawhsakte zong, nangma kiangah thulang dingin hong om nading thu ka pia zo hi.
Tua bangin galkapte in amaute thupiakte pua uh a, Paul tonpihin azan azanin Antipatris dong a paipih uh hi.
A zing ciangin amah sakol tuang galkapte tonpihsak uh a, amaute galkap innte ah a ciah kik uh hi.
Sakol tuang galkapte Caesarea a tun uh ciangin ukpipa tungah laikhak pia-in ama tungah Paul a ap uh hi.
Ukpipa in laikhak sim a, amah bang gam pan hiam, cih a dong hi. Amah Cilicia pan ahilam a theih ciangin,
"Na thulangte hih lai hong tun ciangin na thu ka za ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Herod kumpi inn sungah Paul kem a, cin dingin thu a pia hi.
Ni nga khit ciangin tulpi Ananias in a upate pawlkhat le Tertullus kici taangding khat tonpihin Caesarea ah paisuk uh a, Paul a mawhsaknate uh ukpipa mai-ah a puak uh hi.
A sungah Paul a kisap ciangin Tertullus in Felix mai-ah a mawhsakna thu gen a: “Kote, nangma ukna nuai-ah lungmuangin sawtpi ka om uh hi. Na thumuhkholna tawh hih minam ah kipuahphatnate a om hi.
A hoihpipen Felix aw, mun khempeuh le lam khempeuh ah na hihnate lung damtakin ka sang uh hi.
Ahi hangin nang kong gimsak sawnsawn loh nadingun ka thu uh a tom theithei a kong gen nong ngaihsak ding kong thum hi.
"Kote in buaina a piangsak hih mipa, leitung khempeuh a Jew-te lakah mipi ngonghtatsakin a linglawngsakpa hi, cih ka mu uh hi. Amah Nazareth pawl tuam makaipa hi a,
biakinnpi nangawn buahsak a sawm hi; tua hi-a, amah ka man uh hi.a
Ahi hangin galkap mangpa Lysias hong pai-a, thatang hat thu-in kote khut sung pan amah dokkhia a, ama thulangte na mai-ah a pai dingin thu hong pia hi.
Nang mahmah in ama tungah dongin kan lecin amah ka mawhmatnate uh thutak ahina na theikhia thei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Jew-te in hih mawhmatna thumaan hi, ci-in a panpih uh hi.
Ukpipa in Paul a gen dingin a khut van ciangin amah in, “Hih minamte tungah kum tamkhop thukhenpa na hilam ka thei hi; tua ahi ciangin ka kihutna thu lungkim takin kong gen hi.
Jerusalem ah Pasian bia dinga ka paitoh, ni sawm-le-nih sawt nai lo, cih baihtakin na khentel thei ding hi.
Biakinnpi-ah mi khatpeuh tawh ka kiselna ahi zongin, synagogue-te sungah ahi zongin khuapi sung mun khat beekah ahi zongin mihonpite ka linglawngsakna ka thulangte in a mu kei ding uh hi.
Tua hi-a amaute in kei hong ngawhnate uh na mai-ah hong tellah thei kei ding uh hi.

Bangbang ahi zongin amaute in biakna pawltuam khat a cih uh Lampi nungzui ka hi bangin ka pate Pasian ka bia hi, cih kong pulak hi. Thukham tawh a kituak le Kamsangte lai sunga kigelhsa peuhmah ka um hi.
Hih mite bangin mi thumaante le mi tatsiate thawhkikna om tuak ding, ci-in Pasian sungah lametna ka nei hi.
Tua ahi ciangin Pasian le mite mai-ah kisuantakna a om lo dingin gamtat ka sawm tawntung hi.
"Kum tampitak ka om loh khit ciangin mizawngte ading letsong ka mipihte puak ding le biaknate pia dingin Jerusalem ah kong pai hi.
Biakinnpi huang sunga hihte hih a ka om amaute in hong muh lai-un, biakna ngeina tawh kisai-in ka siang hi. Kei tawh mihon kuamah om lo a, buaina khat beek ah zong ka kihel kei hi.
Ahi hangin Asia gam Jew-te pawlkhat a om uh hi. Tuate in kei langah mawhsak nading hong nei uh ahileh hih lai na mai-ah hong dingin hong mawhsak ding uh kilawm hi.
Ahikeh Sanhedrin mai-a ka din lai-in, kei tungah bang mawhsakna a mu uh hiam? Hih lai-a omte in gen uh hen.
Amaute mai-a ka din lai-a: ‘Misite thawhkikna thu tawh kisai-in tuni-in note mai-ah thusitna ka thuak hi,’ ka cih hoh ahi kei buang leh,” ci-in a gen hi.
Tua ciangin Lampi thu a thei mah mah Felix in thusit hun a sotto hi. Amah in, “Galkap mangpa Lysias hong pai ciangin na thu kong khensak ding hi,” a ci hi.
Amah in zakhat-ukpa tungah, “Paul limtakin cingsak inla, ahi zongin bang tan hiam khat kolsak in, a kisapnate a lawmte piasak in, ci-in thu a pia hi.
Ni tampi khit ciangin Jew numei ahi a zi Drusilla tawh Felix va pai uh hi. Amah in Paul samsak a, Khrist Jesu upna thu a gen a ngai uh hi.
Paul in, thumaanna, ei le ei pumpi ki-ukna le hong tung ding thukhenna thute a gen ciangin Felix lau a, “Pha zo! Ciah ta in. Hun hoih ka sak ciangin kong sam kik ding hi,” a ci hi.
Paul in amah golhguk a piak ding lamen kawmin, amah samsak pahpah a, amah tawh a kiho uh hi.
Kum nih a bei ciangin Porcius Festus in Felix za laih a, ahi hangin Felix in, Jew-te angvan nuam ahi manin thong kiasa in Paul a nusia hi.
Tua gam a tun zawh ni thum khit ciangin Caesarea panin Jerusalem ah Festus pai to a,
tua munah siampi makaite le Jew makaite ama mai-ah dingin Paul a mawhmatnate uh a gen uh hi.
Amaute in Festus kiangah amau a angvanna-in, a manlang theithei a Jerusalem ah Paul a puak nading a ngen uh hi. Ahang in, amaute in lamkal ah buksimin Paul thah nading a kigingkhol khin zo uh hi.
Festus in, “Caesarea ah Paul a kikhumsa hi a, kei mahmah zong tua lai-ah ka paipah ding hi.
Na makaite uh pawlkhat kei hong zuisak unla, tua mipa in hihkhialh nei ahileh tua lai-ah a mawhmatna uh gen uh hen,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Amaute tawh ni giat hiam, ni sawm hiam a omkhawm khit ciangin Caesarea ah paisuka, a zing ciangin thukhenna zum ah kahin a mai-ah Paul a puak nadingun thu a pia hi.
Paul a kilak ciangin Jerusalem pana paisuk Jew-te a kimkotah ding uh a, kiteltaka a lah theih loh uh mawhmatna nasia mahmah tampi tawh a mawhsak uh hi.
Tua ciangin Paul in a kihutna thu gen a: “Jew-te thukham tungah ahi zongin, biakinnpi tungah ahi zongin Caesar tungah ahi zongin khialhna bangmah ka bawl kei hi,” a ci hi.
Festus in Jew-te angvan-nopna khat nei a, Paul kiangah, “Hih mawh matna mah hong kisit dingin Jerusalem a paitoh ding na ut hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
Paul in, “Kei hong kisit nading a kilawm mun Caesar thukhenna mai ah tu-in ka ding hi. Nang mahmah in zong siangtaka na theihsa bangin Jew-te tungah bangmah khialhna ka bawl kei hi.

Ahi ta zongin sihna thuak nading donga mawhna ka neih leh sih ding ka nial kei hi. Ahi hangin hih Jew-te hong mawhmatna a maan lopi ahileh amaute tungah kei a piak nading thuneihna kuamah in a nei kei hi. Caesar tunga ka thu ka tun hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Festus in ama vaihawm mite tawh a kikup khit uh ciangin, “Na thu Caesar tungah na tun zo hi. Caesar tungah na pai ding hi!” ci-in a thukhenna a pulakkhia hi.
Ni tawm vei khit ciangin Kumpi Agrippa le Bernice in, Festus zahtakna pia dingin Caesarea a tung uh hi.
Tua lai-ah ni tampi a taam khit uh ciangin Festus in Paul thu, kumpipa a kikuppih hi. Amah in, “Hih lai-ah Felix in thong kiasa-a a nusiat mi khat a om hi.
Jerusalem ah ka pai ciangin siampi makaite le Jew-te upate ama langah pangin amah mawhpaih dingin hong ngen uh hi,

"Ken amau kiangah, ‘Mi khatpeuh a kimawhmat ciangin amah a mawhmatte mai-ah dinga, a mawhmatna uh pan a kihut nading hun hoih a ngah khit mateng, piakkhiat ding Rome-te ngeina hi lo hi,’ ci-in ka hilh hi.
Hih mun kei kiang hong tut uh ciangin a thu uh zia-olsak loin a zing ciangin thukhen zum ah ka kah pah a, tua mipa hong paipih nadingun thu ka pia hi.
Amah a mawhmatte thugen dinga a din uh ciangin ka upmawh bangin gitlohna lian khat beek tawh a mawhmat kei uh hi.
Tua sangsik in, amau biakna thu le Jesu kici mi sisa khat, Paul in nungta hi, a cih thu tawmkhat kitotpih uh ahi hi.
Tua thu ka kantel nading ka thei zo kei a, ‘Jerusalem ah paito in hih mawhmatna thu mah tua mun ah hong kisit leh na ut hiam?’ ci-in amah ka dong hi.
Paul in a thu Rome-te kumpipa thukhen dinga a tut ciangin Caeisar tunga ka puak theih mateng thong sunga khum dingin thu ka pia hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Agrippa in Festus kiangah, “Hih mipa thugen kei mahmah in ka za nuam hi,” a ci hi. Amah in, “Ama thugen zing ciangin na za ding hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
A zing ciangin Agrippa le Bernice thupitakin hong pai uh a, kumpipa nasem zaliante le khuapi uliante tawh kikhopna inndei lianpi sungah a lut uh hi. Festus in thu pia a, Paul kilutpih hi.

Festus in: “Kumpi Agrippa le kote tawh a om khawmte khempeuh aw, hih mipa na mu uh hi! Jew mite khempeuh in, Jerusalem le hih lai Caesarea a kei tungah a thu hong tun uh a, amah hingkhawi lai ding hi peuhmah lo hi, ci-in kiko uh hi.
Sihna thuak nading zahin ama gamtatna bangmah ka mu kei hi. Ahi hangin amah in Rome kumpipa tungah a thu tun ahi manin amah Rome ah puak dingin ka khensat hi.

Ahi hangin a Thupi Kumpipa tungah ama thu ka gelh ding thu kician bangmah ka nei kei hi. Tua ahi manin na thudotnate panun gelh ding khatpeuh ka neih nadingin noteng khempeuh le a diakdiak in nang Kumpipa Agrippa mai-ah amah kong paisak hi.
Ahang in, a kimawh matna om lopi a, thongkia khatpeuh a bana sawn ding, thu kicingtak hi thei lo hi, ci-in ka ngaihsun hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Agrippa in Paul kiangah, “Na thu nang mahmah gen dingin phalna kong pia hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Paul in a khut van a, ama kihutna thu a gen hi:
"Kumpi Agrippa aw, Jew-te hong mawhmatnate khempeuh, tuni-in nang mai-ah dinga ka kihutna thu ka gen theih hampha ka kisa hi.
Jew mite ngeinate le a kikalhnate uh theician mahmah na hi manin ka hampha diak hi. Tua ahi manin ka thugente lungduaitakin nong ngaihsak ding kong thum hi.
"Ka tenna gam sung ahi a, Jerusalem ah ahi zongin ka neu tunga kipan ka nuntak zia Jew-te khempeuh in a theih khitsa uh ahi hi.
Amaute in sawt peka kei hong theihsa uh hi-a Pharisee-te bangin nungta in, ka biakna pawltuam-uah a ciikpen pawl ka hilam, a ut nak uh leh teci hong pang thei ding uh hi.
Tua in ka pate uh tunga Pasian in a kam ciamsa ka lametna hangin tuni-a thusit a thuak ka hi hi.
Ko beh sawm-le-nihte in hahkattaka sun le zanin Pasian na sema, a tangtunna mu dinga ka lamet uh hih thuciam ahi hi. Kumpipa aw, hih ka lametna uh hangin Jew-te in kei hong mawhmat uh hi.
Bang hangin note khatpeuh in, Pasian in misite thosak, cih uphuai lo a ngaihsun ding na hi uh hiam?
"Kei mahmah in zong Nazareth mi Jesu min langdo-a, a hi thei zahzah ka sep ding mah hi, ci-in ka kipsan hi.
Jerusalem khua sungah zong tua mah ka hih hi. Siampi makaite thuneihna tawh misiangte tampi thong sungah ka khuma, amaute a kithah ciangin amaute langah thukimna ka khut ka lam hi.

Amaute gawt dingin synagogue khat pan khatah tam veipi ka pai a, thatang hatthu-in amaute Pasian gendaisak ding ka hanciam hi. Amaute ka huat luat manin a bawlsia dingin gamdang khuapite nangawn ah ka pai hi.
"Hih banga ka khualzinna khatah siampi makaite thuneihna le thupiakna tawh Damascus zuatna lampi ah ka pai hi.
Sun pawlin Kumpipa aw, ka paipai laitakin van panin ni sanga tangzaw khuavak khat ka mu a, kei le ka tonpihte kimkot a tanzal hi.
Ka vekpi un lei-ah ka puk uh a, aw khat in Arama pau in kei kiangah, ‘Saul, Saul, bang hangin kei hong bawlsia na hi hiam? Na khe tawh tulzum na suih ding, nang adingin haksa hi,’ hong ci hi.
‘Tua ciangin, ‘Topa aw, kua na hi hiam?” ci-in ka dong hi. “Topa in, ‘Nong bawlsiat Jesu ka hi hi;
tu-in tho inla, na khe-in ding in. Nang ka nasem ding le kei tawh kisai na muhsa teng le kong lah lai dingte ah teci dinga hong seh dingin na kiangah kong kilak hi.
Na mipihte lak le Gentile-te panin kong hukhia ding hi.

Keimah hong upna hangun mawhnate maisakna le sian thosaksate lakah mun a ngah theih nadingun, amaute mit honsak ding, khuamial pan khuavak ah a hei ding, Satan vangliatna pan Pasian lam a ngasak dingin nang kong sawl ding hi,’ hong ci hi.
"Tua bang ahi manin Kumpi Agrippa aw, van pana mangmuhna thu mang loin ka om kei hi.

Amaute kisik a Pasian lamah a kihei nading uh le a kisikna uh, a gamtatna uh tawh a lah nadingun a masa in Damascus-ate kiang, tua khit ciangin Jerusalem-ate kiang le Judea gam khempeuh le Gentile-te kiangah zong ka hilh hi.
Jew-te in biakinnpi huang sungah hong mana thah hong sawmna hih hang ahi hi.
Ahi hangin tuni mahmah ciang dong Pasian huhna ngahin hih lai-ah ka dinga, milian mineute tungah a kibangin teci ka pang hi. Kamsangte le Moses in hong piang dinga a gen uh,
Khristb in thuak dinga misi pana tho masa pen hi in, ama mite kiang le Gentile-te kiangah khuavak thu a tangko ding hi,’ a cih valkan ka gen kei hi,” a ci hi.
Hih thu tak a gen laitakin Festus in Paul kihutna na pauhelha, “Paul aw, a hai na hi hi! Na sinna tam lua in hong haisak hi,” ci-in a kiko hi.
Paul in, “A hoihpipen Festus aw, a hai ka hi kei hi. Ka gente maan a, thu-a santak ahi hi.
Kumpipa in hihte teltaka a theihsa hi-a, ama tungah ka ut bangbangin ka gen thei hi. Kong kawmlak peuha kihih hi lo ahi manin a theih loh om lo dingin ka kipsan hi.
Kumpi Agrippa aw, kamsangte na um hiam? Na up lam ka thei hi,” a ci hi.
