Tua ciangin Agrippa in Paul kiang ah, “Hih hun tomno sungin Khristian suak dingin hong zol zo a ki-um na hi haim?” a ci hi.
Paul in, “Hun tom taleh sau ta leh, nang bek hi lo tuni-a ka thugen a ngaite khempeuh hih sik khainiangte bulhna lo buangah kei a bat theih nading uh Pasian tungah thu ka ngen hi,” a ci hi.
Kumpipa dinga, ukpipa le Bernice le amau tawh a tute zong a ding uh hi.
Khat le khat kiho kawmin inndei nusia uh a, “Hih mipa in sih nading le thong kiat nading zahin bangmah a hih kei hi,” a kici uh hi.
Agrippa in Festus kiangah, “Hih mipa in Caesar tungah a thu tun lo hileh kikhah thei mah hi ven,” a ci hi.
Italy gam zuana tembaw tawh ka pai ding uh a kikhensat khit ciang in Paul le thongkia dangte Kumpi Galkap a sem Julius kici zakhat-ukpa tungah ki-ap hi.
Adramyttium pana Asia gam tuipi dunga khuate a pai ding tembawpi ah tuangin tuipi tungah ka om uh hi. Thessalonica pana hong pai Macedonia mi khat Aristarchus, ko tawh hong tuang khawm hi.
A zing ciangin Sidon ah ka kinga uh a, Paul kisapnate a lawmte in a piak theih nadingun, Julius in Paul hehpih a, a lawmte kianga a pai ding a phal hi.
Tua lai panin tuipi tungah ka om kik leuleu uh hi. Huih hong lehnun ahi manin Cyprus kiliahsakin ka pai uh hi.
Cilicia le Pamphylia gam tuipi gei gala tuipi tungah ka pai khit uh ciangin Lycia gama Myra ah ka kinga uh hi.
Tua lai-ah zakhat ukpa in Italy a pai ding Alexandria tembaw khat mu a, tua tungah kote hong tuangsak hi.
Ni tampi sung damdamin mai ka nawt uh a, haksapi in Cnidus ka tung uh hi. Huih in ka pai nopna uh tangtakin hong paisak thei lo a, Crete kiliahsakin Salmone leidawk tawh kigalsai-ah ka pai uh hi.
Tuipi gei zui-in haksapi-in ka pai uh a, Lasea khuapi kiang Van Siang kici mun ka tung uh hi.
An tana khit hun ahi tawh, hun tampi lah beita a, tembaw-a pai lauhuai mahmah ta hi. Tua ahi ciangin Paul in amaute vauhilh khol a,
"Guaite aw, i khualzinna siathuai ta ding hi. Tuahsia lehang tembaw le a vanpuakte i sup banah, i nuntakna zong kisia ding cih ka thei hi,’ a ci hi.
Ahi hangin zakhat ukpa in Paul thugen a ngaih tangin tembaw hawlpa le tembaw neipa thu a ngaizaw hi.

Tua tembaw khawlna phalbi sunga om nadingin kituak lo ahi manin tua lai panin paikhia a, Phoenix tungin tua lai-ah phalbi sung om ding lamenin a tamzaw thukimna tawh ka paisuak uh hi. Tua pen khang-nitumna le sak-nitumna a maingat tuak Crete-a tembaw khawlna ahi hi.
Khang huihdam hong nun ciangin amaute in a deih uh a ngah in a kingaihsun uh hi. Tua ciangin sikkip khai-in Crete gei zui-in ka pai uh hi.
A sawt lua nai loin tua tuikulh lamah “Sak-nisuah” kici huihpi hat mahmah khat hong nung hi.
Huihpi in tembaw zialnelh a, mai a nawt thei kei hi. Tua ahi ciangin huih zui-in huih nunna lamlamah ka pai uh hi.
Cauda kici tuikulh neu khat kidalsakin kihutna gunkuang neute ka hu zo kei dektak uh hi.

A nasemte in tuate tembaw tungah a kaihtoh uh ciangin tembaw nuai dongah khauzen paisakin a henkhawm uh hi. Syrtis sehtakte a phut khak ding uh lau-in, tuipi sikkip khaisa in tembaw a pai bangbangin a hawl uh hi.
Huihpi nak thuak den lua ka hi manun, a zing ciangin tembaw puak vante a lawnkhia uh hi.
A nithumna ni-in amaute in tembaw khauzialna a paikhia uh hi.
Ni tampi sung ni le aksite hong dawk het loh ciang le huihpi in hong nuai denden ciangin suahtak zawh nading lametna ka nei nawn kei uh hi.

Tua mite an ne loin hun sawtpi a om khit nungun amaute mai-ah Paul ding a: “Guaite aw, Crete panin paikhia kei ni, ka cihin ka thu hong mang hoh le uh cin nomau mahmah supna le siatna pan a kihu na hi ding uh hi.
Ahi hangin tu-in kilungkhauhsak un; bang hang hiam cihleh note khat beek na mangthang kei ding uh hi. Tembaw bek kisia ding hi.
A beisa zanin ama aa hi-a, a na ka sep Pasian vansawltak khat ka kiangah dinga,
‘Paul aw, lau kei in. Caesar mai-ah thu kisitin, na ding pelmawh ding hi. Pasian in a hehpihna-in nang tawh tembaw tunga tuangte khempeuh nuntak nading hong pia hi,’ hong ci hi.
Tua ahi ciangin guaite aw, na lungsim uh khauhsak lailai un. Ahang in, kei tunga hong gen bangbangin a piang ding hi, ci-in Pasian ka muang hi
Tua ahikeh zong tuikulhte khat teitei ah leilak i phukha pelmawh ding hi,” a ci hi.
A zan sawm-le-lina zanin Adriaticb Tuipi kantanin huih mutin ka om lailai uh a, zankim pawl ciangin tembaw nasemte in gam khat tung dek ta cih a thei uh hi.
Tui thukna teh uh a, pi zakhat sawmnihc a thuk lam a thei uh hi. Tomkha vei khit ciangin teh kik uh a, pi sawmkuad a thuk lam a thei uh hi.
Suangte tawh ka kitah khak ding uh lau uh a, tembaw nunglam pan sikkip li khia in zingsang khuavak nading thu ka ngen uh hi.
Tembaw nasemte taisim nuamin kihutna gun kuang neute tuipi sungah khia uh a, tembaw mailama sikkipte khai a kineih uh hi.
Tua ciangin Paul in zakhat-ukpa le a galkapte kiangah, “Hih mite tembaw ah om kei leh na suakta kei ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin galkapte in kihutna gunkuang henna khauzente attat uh a, a khahkhia mang uh hi.
Khuavak ma diakin Paul in amaute khempeuh, an a nek ding uh a kun hi. Amah in, “A beisa ni sawm-le-li sung, bangmah ne loin an ngawlin lauthawngsa in na om den uh hi.
Tu-in an tawmkha beek ne teitei un. Na sih loh nading uh an kisam hi. Note lakah khat beek in a lutang pan a samzang khat zong mansuah lo ding hi,” a ci hi.
Hih teng a cih khit ciangin anlum honkhat la-a, amaute khempeuh mai-ah Pasian tungah lungdam a ko hi. Tua ciangin balkhama, a ne hi.
Amaute khempeuh zong lungkhauh kik uh a, an tawm tek a ne uh hi.
Tembaw tunga tuang mi a vekpi in 276 ka pha uh hi.
A duh zahzah uh a nek khit uh ciangin tembaw a zang tuam nadingin buhhumte tuipi sungah a lawmkhia uh hi.
Khua a vak ciangin a gam a theih loh uh hangin tuipi gei sehtak khat mu uh a, ahi theih liai leh tua lai-ah tembaw khawlsak a sawm uh hi.
A sikkipte attat in tuipi sungah nusia uh a, tua hun mah in tembaw heina khihna khaute zong a phel uh hi. Tua ciangin tembaw mailam puanzak huih mut dingin khai uh a, tui gei lam ka zuan uh hi.
Ahi hangin tembaw in sehtak kho khat phukha-a, leitungah a kingacip hi. A mailam in phukha a, tangkhia thei nawn loin a nunglam zong tui kilok in a sattam gawp hi.
Galkapte in thong kiate tui pekin a suahtak khak ding uh dalna in thah a sawm uh hi.
Ahi hangin zakhat ukpa in Paul suaktasak nuam ahi manin amau sawmna a hihsak kei hi. Amah in tui pek theite tembaw tung pan leitung ah a diangkhia masa dingin thu a pia hi.
A om lai teng singpek tung peuh, tembaw sia tung peuh ah tuangin a pai uh kul hi. Hici bangin mi khempeuh leitung ah a suakta uh hi.
Tui gei-ah ka suahtak tak uh ciangin tua tuikulh Malta ahilam ka thei pan uh hi.
Ko tungah tuikulh mite, lamet loh zahin hong migi uh hi. Guah zu a khua dam ahi manin mei hong cihsakin hong muak uh hi.
Paul in singkang lom khat tomin meikhuk ah a khul hi. Meisa sa-in ngan khat taikhia-a, a khutah a kivial hi.
Tuikulh mite in a khuta gul kikhai a muh uh ciangin, “Hih pa tualthat hi ngel incin, tuipi sung pan a suahtak hangin Thutang in amah a nuntak ding phal lo hi,” a ci uh hi.
Ahi hangin Paul in mei sungah gul singkhia-a, a na a thuak kha kei hi.
Mite in hong bawk kei leh si-in hong puksuk ding hi, ci-in a muangmawh uh hi. Sawt veipi ngak uh a, amah bangmah a cih loh ciangin a ngaihsutna uh laih in, “Amah pasian khat hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua lai tawh kigamla lo-ah tuikulh-a kumpi nasem ulianpa Publius neihsa huang a om hi. Amah in kote a inn ah hong tungsaka, ni thum sung limtakin zin hong do hi.
A pa gilsan le nattun thuahin cina-a lupna ah lum hi. Amah vehin inn sungah Paul va tum a, thu a ngetsak khit ciangin ama tungah a khut nga-a, a damsak hi.
Hih banga a damsak ciangin tuikulh-a cina dang teng hong pai-in a dam uh hi.
Amaute in lam tampi ah kote hong pahtawi uh a ka dinkhiat kuan uh ciangin ka taksapnate uh hong guan uh hi.
Kha thum khit ciangin tua tuikulh a, phalbi sung a na khawlsa tembaw khatah tuangin ka pai uh hi. Alexandria-te tembaw hi-a a mai-ah pasian pengte, Castor le Pollux lim a kisuang hi.
Syracuse ah ka lut uh a, tua lai-ah nithum ka taam uh hi.
Tua panin ka dingkhia leuleu uh a, Rhegium ka tung uh hi. A zing ciangin khanglam huih hong nunga, a thai ciangin Puteoli ka tung uh hi.
Tua lai-ah sanggamte pawlkhat na om uh a, amaute in nipikal khat hong taampih un, ci-in hong kho uh hi.
Tua lai-a om sanggamte in ka pai uh a zak uh ciangin Appius sumbuk-zawn le Buzung Thumte dong hong zinin na dawn uh hi. Hih mite muh in Paul in, Pasian tungah lungdam ko-in a hanthawn hi.
Rome ka tun uh ciangin a cing galkap khat tawh, Paul ama thu-a a om ding a kiphal hi.

Ni thum khit ciangin amah in Jew makaite a samkhawm hi. Amaute a kikhop khit uh ciangin Paul in, “Ka sanggamte aw, i minamte tung ahi a, i pupa ngeina tungah ahi zongin bangmah siatna bawl lo napi Jerusalem ah kei hong kimanin Rome mite tungah hong ki-ap hi.
Amaute in kei hong sittel uh a, sih dan thuak ding zahin ka mawhna om lo ahi manin hong khah kik nuam uh hi.
Ahi hangin Jew-te in a nial uh ciangin kei ma mite tungah ka thu ka tut nop man hi loin, Caesar tungah ka thu hong kitunsak teitei ahi hi.
Tua thu hangin note tawh maitang kimu a, kiho nuamin kong sapsak ahi hi. Israel-te lametna hanga hih sik khainiang tawh hong kikhih ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Amaute in, “Kote in nang thu tawh kisai-in Judea gam panin lai khatpeuh lah ka ngah kei uh a, tua pana hong pai sanggamte kuamah lah nang thu hong ko-a asia-a gen a om kei hi.
Ahi hangin mun khempeuh ah mite in, hih biakna pawltuam thu a langpan uh thei ka hi manun nang bang na ci muh hiam, ka za nuam uh hi,” ci-in a dawng uh hi.

Amaute in Paul tawh kimuh kik ding ni khat seh uh a, a omna munah mi a tamzaw tham a va pai uh hi. Amaute kiangah zingsang a kipan nitak dong, amah in Pasian gam thu hilhcianin pulak a, Moses Thukham le Kamsangte panin Jesu thu ah amaute thuzawh a sawm hi.
Pawlkhatte ama thugen in thuzawh a, ahi hangin, adangte in a um kei uh hi.
Amau sung le amau sung kithutuak lo uh a, Paul in hih a tawpkhakna a gen khit ciangin a paikhia hi: “Na pu na pa-te uh kiangah Khasiangtho in kamsangpa Isiah tungtawna a gen a man hi. Amah in,
‘Hih mite kiangah pai inla, “Note in na zak ngitnget uh hangin na theitel ngei kei ding uh hi; na muh ngitnget uh hangin na mutel ngei kei ding uh hi,”

‘Hih mite lungtang sak lua ahi manin a bil uh tawh za mel lo uh a, mitsi uh hi. Tua hikeileh a mit uh tawh mu thei-in a bil uh tawh za a, a lungtang uh tawh theitel in kihei ding uh a, amaute ka damsak kha ding hi,’a ci hi.
"Tua ahi manin Pasian hotkhiatna Gentile-te tungah kipuak ta ding hi; amaute in a ngai ding uh hi, cih na theih ding uh ka deih hi,” a ci hi.b
Hih teng a gen khit ciangin Jew-te in ciahsan uh a, amau le amau sungah kiselna lianpi a om hi.
Ahang in, tua lai-ah kum nih hul, ama sapsa inn sungah Paul om a, amah tawh a kimu nuam khempeuh a sang hi.
A dal om loin hangtakin Pasian gam thu hilh a, Topa Jesu Khrist thu a sinsak hi.
Sawltakpi dinga kisam Pasian lungdamna-thu hilh dinga kisehtuama, Khrist Jesu nasem keimah Paul in –
Pasian in a kamsangte tungtawnin Laisiangtho sungah a ciamkholhsa,
a Tapa tawh kisai lungdamna-thu, amah mihing pianngei-a David suan,
sianthona Khaa tungtawna misi pana a thawhkikna hanga Pasian Tapa ahina vangliatna tawh a kipulakkhia pab i Topa Jesu Khrist ahi hi.
Ama tungtawn le ama min hangin upna pana piang thumanna-ah Gentile-te khempeuh lakpanin mite sam dingin kote in hehpihna le sawltakpi za ka ngah uh hi.
Jesu Khrist adinga kisam mite lakah note zong na kihel uh hi.
Pasian in it-a misiang dinga a sap Rome a omte khempeuh tungah: I Pa Pasian le Topa Jesu Khrist tung pana hehpihna le lemna note tungah om ta hen.
Amasa penin na upna uh leitung khempeuh ah kithang ahi manin note khempeuh hangin Jesu Khrist tungtawnin ka Pasian tungah ka lungdam hi.
Hun khempeuh a ka thungetna ah note kong phawk tawntung lam, ama Tapa lungdamna-thu ka lungsim khempeuh tawh hilh a, a na ka sep Pasian ka teci ahi hi.
Tua ciangin tu-in Pasian deihna banga note kianga kong pai theih nadingin lampi kihong ta buang hen, ci-in thu ka ngen hi.
Note hong thakhauhsak ding khalam letsong kong piak theih nadingin note kong muh ding ka lunggulh hi.
Tua pen, kei le note upna tawh khat le khat i kihanthawn tuah theih nading ahi hi.

Sanggamte aw, Gentile dangte lakah an ka lak bangin note lakah zong ka lak theih nadingin note kianga pai ding tamveipi ka geel (hangin tu ciang dong hong kidaltan ahilam) na phawk loh khak ding uh ka deih kei hi.
Greek-te le Greek lote tawh ahi zongin, a pilte le a haite tungah bat ka nei tuak hi.
Rome a om note kiangah zong lungdamna-thu hilh ding ka lawp mahmah na tua hang ahi hi.
Tua lungdamna-thu a um mite peuhmah hotkhiat nadinga Pasian vangliatna ahi manin ka maizumpih kei hi; a masa in Jew mite, tua khit ciangin Gentile-te ading ahi hi.

Ahang in, “A thumaante upna hangin a nungta ding uh hi,”c ci-a kigelhsa bang tektek in lungdamna-thu ah Pasian tung pan thumaanna kilaakkhia a, tua thumaana a masa pen pan a nunung pend dong upna hang ahi hi.
Amau tatsiatna tawh thutak neng cipa, pasian-milohna le tatsiatna khempeuh tungah Pasian thangpaihna van panin hong kilaak hi.
Pasian tawh kisai theihtel ding khempeuh Pasian in amau tungah kitelsak khin hi.

Ahang in, leitung piancil a kipan a kimu thei lo Pasian pianziate, a tawntung vangliatna le a Pasian pianngei a kipiangsaksa nate panin kitheitelin kimu ta ahi manin mihingte in pauhlam ding a nei kei uh hi.
Tua hi-a amaute in Pasian thei napi Pasian bangin minthangsak lo in ama tungah lungdamna a ko kei uh hi. Ahi hangin amaute ngaisutte thu ginalo suakin a lungtang haite uh a mialcip hi.
Amaute pil kisa napi mihai suak uh a,
a si thei mihing, vasate, ganhingte le a bokvak ganhingte tawh kisuna kibawl, limte tawh a si thei lo Pasian minthanna a kheng uh hi.
Tua ahi manin amaute khat le khat a zumhuaipi-a a pumpi uh kizang dingin mawhdim a lunggulhna uh tawh kizui-a, numei-pasal paktat dingin Pasian in a ngawhngatsan hi.
Amaute in Pasian thutak zuauthu tawh kheng uh a, a Piangsakpa sangin a piansak nate bia-in a na sem uh hi. Amah ahileh a kiphat tawntung hi. Amen.
Hih thu hangin Pasian in amaute a zumhuai kilunggulhnate ah a ngawh ngatsan hi. A numeite nangawn un, pasal tawh lupkhawmna ngeina uh a ngeina lo tawh a kheng uh hi.

Tua mah bangin pasalte in zong numei tawh lupkhawmna ngeina nusia in pasal le pasal a kilung gulh mahmah uh hi. Pasalte, pasal dangte tawh a muh thadahhuai-in gamta uh a, amau lehtatna tawh kituak gawtna a thuak uh hi.
Tua banah Pasian theihna kepcing ding thaman sa lo uh ahi manin hih dinga kilawm lo pipi a hih nadingun lungsim siat dimdem na-ah amaute a ngawhngatsan hi.
Amaute tatsiatna, gitlohna, duhhopna le lungsim siat dimdemna tawh kidim uh hi. Amaute enna, tualthahna, kitotna, khemna le etsatna tawh a kidim uh hi. Amaute, gensiathatte,
gendai hatte, Pasian muhdahte, kimisakte, kisatheite le kihisakte ahi uh hi. Amaute in gitlohna zia a thakthak phuan uh hi; amaute in a nu-le-pate uh thu a mang kei uh hi;
amaute, ngaihsutna neilo, upna nei lo, itna nei lo, hehpihna nei lo mi a suak uh hi.
Tua bang a hihte sih ding kilawm hi cih thukip Pasian thukhenna maan amaute in thei napi, hih nate tektek mah hih zom tham loin tua banga gamtate a thukimpih zawsop uh hi.

Tua ahi ciangin midangte tunga na thukhenna mun mah ah nangmah a kimawhpaih na hih manin midang khatpeuh tunga thukhen nang in paulap ding na nei kei hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh nang a thukhenpa mah in tuate mah in tua mah na hih hi.
Tua banga hihte tunga Pasian thukhenna in thutak pansan hi, cih i thei ciat hi.
Tua ahi ciangin mihing lel ahi nang in amaute tungah thu khen napi amau hihte mah na hih ciangin Pasian thukhenna pan a suakta dingin na kingaisun hiam?
Ahikeh Pasian migitna in kisikna lamah nang hong pi lam phawk loin a kicing ama migitna, a thuakzawhna le a lungduainate simmawh na hi hiam?
Ahi hangin na lungkhauhna le na kisik theihlohna lungtang hangin Pasian thukhenna maan a kilaak hun ahi Pasian’ thangpaihna ni adingin nang le nang tungah thangpaihna a khol na hi hi.
Pasian in “Mi khempeuh amau gamtatsa bangin a pia ciat ding hi.”a
A hoih gamtat denna tawh minthanna pahtawina le sihtheih nawnlohna a zongte tungah, amah in nuntak tawntungna a pia ding hi.
Ahi hangin ama angsung bek khuala, thutak nialin gitlohna a zuite adingin thangpaihna le hehna a om ding hi.
Gilo a gamta mihing khempeuh, a masa in Jew-te tua ciangin Gentile-te tungah lungmanna le lungdonna a tung ding hi.
Ahi hangin a hoiha gamtate khempeuh, a masa in Jew-te tua ciangin Gentile-te tungah minthanna pahtawina le lemna a tung ding hi.
Ahang in, Pasian in angvan tuam nei lo hi.
Thukham pualama mawhte khempeuh, thukham pua mah ah mangthang ding uh a, thukham nuai-a mawhte khempeuh thukham pansan in thu a khen ding hi.
Ahang in, Pasian muhna ah thukham a zate a thumaan hi loin thukham a mangte a thumaanin kipulak ding hi.
(A taktak in thukham nei Gentile-te in amau pianngei, ngeina pana thukham in a kalh nate a hih uh ciangin amaute in thukham nei lo napi, amau adingin tuate thukham suak ahi khit nungsang,
thukham in a kalhte amau lungtang ah kigelh hi, cih amau mah in kilangsak uh a, amau kitheihna lungsim in teci pang ahi manin a ngaisutnate un amaute a mawhsak a diksak thei zel hi.)
Keima hilh lungdamna-thu in a pulakkhiat mah bangin Pasian in Jesu Khrist tungtawna mi hingte’ thusimte a khen ni ciangin hih thu a tung ding hi.
Tu-in nang le nang Jew mi kici na hileh; thukham tungah kinga a, Pasian tawh na kizopna kisialhpih na hileh;
thukham in nang lam hong lah manin ama deihna thei-a a thupizaw nate a paktapa na hileh;
mittaw lampipa, khuamial sunga omte adinga khuavakpa
mihaite lamlakpa le naupangnote a hilhpa, theihna le thutak kiguanna thukham nei kici na hileh;
nang, midangte a hilhpa, nang le nang kihilh lo maw? Midangte guta lo dinga a hilh nang guta maw?
Nang mite angkawm lo dinga a hilhpa nang angkawm maw? Nang milim a kihpa nang biakinnpi luh maw?
Thukham kisialhpihpa aw, nang, thukham palsatna tawh Pasian daisak maw?
A kigelhsa mah bangin: “Note hangin Gentile-te lakah Pasian min kigendai hi.”b
Thukham na zuih uh leh vunat in man a nei hi. Ahi hangin thukham na palsat uh leh vunat loh mah na suak uh hi.
Vunat lo mite in thukham in a kalhte a zuih uh leh amaute vunat bangin kisim lo ding ahi hiam?
Taksa-a vunat lo napi, thukham a zui mi in, ngeina-bucing gelhsa neic a, vunat napi thukham palsatpa nang, hong mawhpaih ding hi.
A pualam Jew mi hihna bek tawh mi khatpeuh Jew mi a suak hi lo hi. Pualam le taksa-a vunatna lel tawh, vunat a kisuak tuan kei hi.

Ahi peuhmah kei hi. A sunglam Jew mi hihna bek tawh mi khatpeuh Jew mi a suak hi-a tua mah bangin vunatna in gelhsa ngeina bucing tawh hi lo, Kha tawh lungtanga vunatna ahi hi. Tua bang mipa, mite in a phat loh uh hangin Pasian in a phat hi.
Tua a hileh Jew mi hina hangin bang phattuamna oma, vunat mi suahna in bang man nei ahi hiam?
Lam khempeuh ah phattuamna a nei kim hi. A masa penin amaute tungah Pasian kammalte tektek a kikemsak khinsa ahi hi.
Mi kimkhat in upna nei kei leh bangci ding? Amau uplahna in Pasian muan huaina a guaksuaksak ding hiam? A guaksuaksak peuhmah kei hi!
Mi khempeuh zuau gen hi henla, Pasian a thutak hi ta hen. “Na thukhenna-a na zawhna le na kammal-a na thumaanna a kilat theih nading ahi hi,”a ci-a kigelhsa bang ahi hi.

Ahi hangin eite thumaanlohna in Pasian thumaanna siangtakin kilangsak zaw ahileh bang i gen ding hiam? Eite tungah Pasian thangpaihna hong tun manin Pasian thutang lo hi, i ci ding hiam? (Mihing pansante mah zanga sel ka hi hi.)
Ahi peuhmah kei hi! Tua bang hi mawk leh Pasian in leitung mite tungah thu bangci khen theih ding hiam?
"Keima zuau theihna in Pasian thutakna liansak zaw a, ama minthanna khangsak ahileh bang hangin kei mawh nei mi khat bangin hong kimawhpaih lai ahi hiam,” mi khatpeuh in ci kha thei ding hi.
Mi kimkhat in, “‘A hoih pian nadingin a sia bawl ni,’ ci uh hi,” ci-in hong gendai a, hong mawhmat uh bangin, bang hanga ci lel lo i hi hiam? Amaute in a kilawm bang mawhpaihna a thuak ding uh hi.
Tua ahileh thu bangci khup ding i hi hiam? Eite i hoihzaw tuan hiam?b I hoihzaw tuan peuhmah kei hi! Jew-te le Gentile-te khempeuh mawhna nuai-ah a kibangin om khin uh hi, i ci khin hi.
"Mi thumaan khat beek a om kei hi, khat nangawn a om kei hi;
a theitel kuamah om lo a, Pasian a zong khat beek a om kei hi.
A vekpi un lampial khin uh a, amaute a vekpi un kimanna a nei kei uh hi: a hoiha gamta kuamah om lo a, khat nangawn om lo hi,”c
"Amau gawlte hahkhuk kihongsa hi-a, amaute leii in zuauthu a gen hi."d Amaute muk ah mualtan gu a om hi."e
"Amaute kam, hamsia le kamkha tawh a dim hi.”f
Amaute khe sisan luangsak dingin manlang hi.
Amaute paina peuhpeuh siatna le gentheihna dima,
amaute in kilemna lampi a thei kei uh hi.”g
"Amaute mit ah Pasian kihtakna a om kei hi.”h ci-a kigelhsa bang ahi hi.
Kam khatpeuh a kisipsak nading le leitung mi khempeuh in Pasian mai-ah sittelna a thuak nadingin thukham in a gen khempeuh thukham nuai-a omte tunga a gen ahilam tu-in eite in i thei hi.
Tua ahi manin ama muhna ah thukham zuihna hangin kuamah thumaanin a kiseh kei ding hi; tua hi lo zaw in thukham tungtawnin mawhna i phawk hi.
Ahi hangin tu-in thukham tawh kisai kha lo, Thukham le Kamsangte in teci a pansa uh Pasian kiang pana hong pai thumaanna, kitheisak khin ta hi.
Pasian kiang pana hong pai hih thumaanna Jesu Khrist upna tungtawnin a umte khempeuh tungah a tung hi. A kilamdanna a om kei hi.
Ahang in, mi khempeuh mawh khin a, Pasian minthanna ngah zo loin,
Khrist Jesu hanga hong pai tatkhiatna tungtawnin, ama hehpihna hangin a khawnkhonga diktansak ahi uh hi.

Ama sisan upna tungtawnin thoihdamna-a biakpiakna-in Pasian in amah hong pia hi.i Amah thutanna a lahkhiat nadingin hih banga a hih ahi hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in a thuakzawhna hangin nidang lai-a mawhnate gawt loin hawi lai-a,
tu-in amah thutang ahi ding le Jesu sunga upna a ngah mitdik a tangsakpa ahi lai dingin a thutangna hih bangin a lak hi.
Tua ahileh kisialhna koi-ah a om hiam? A kipuaseh zo hi. Bang thu siksan in? Thukham zuihna hang maw? Hi lo hi. Upna hang ahi hi.
Ahang in, mi khatin thukham zuihna hang hi lo upna hangin dik a tang hi cih i kiplet hi.
Pasian, Jew-te bek Pasian ahi hiam? Gentile-te Pasian zong hi lo hiam? Hi mah hi.
Vunatte amau upna hangin midik tangsak dinga, tua upna mah tungtawnin vunat lote, dik a tangsak ding Pasian khat bek om ahi nungsang amah, Gentile-te Pasian zong ahi hi.
Tua hileh hih upna tawh eite in thukham guaksuaksak i hi hiam? A hi peuhmah kei hi! Tua hi lo zaw in eite in thukham i kipsak hi.
Tua ahileh i pu Abraham in hih thu ah bang mukhia ci ding i hi hiam?
A taktak in, Abraham in a sepsa hangin diktang hileh amah in kisialh nading a nei hi – ahi hangin Pasian mai-ah ahi kei hi.
Laisiangtho in bang ci ahi hiam? “Abraham in Pasian na uma, tua ama upna thumaanna in kisimsak hi,”a ci hi.
Mi khat in na a sep ciangin tua ama nasep thaman pen letsong in kisim lo-a, thalawhsa in kisim hi.
Ahi hang in na sem lo a, mi tatsiate dik a tangsak Pasian a muang mipa ama upna pen thumaanna-in kisim hi.
Sepnate tawh kisai lo, Pasian in thumaan hi, ci-a a sim mipa thupha ngahna thu David in a gen lai-in tua mah a na gen ahi hi. A gen na ah:
"A tatkhialhnate uh kimaisak a, a mawhnate uh a kikhuhsakte, thupha ngah ahi uh hi.
Topa in ama langah a mawhna mawhna-a a simsak lopa thupha ngah ahi hi.”b a na ci hi.
Hih thupha vunatte ading bek ahi hiam? Vunat lote ading zong hi lo ahi hiam? Abraham upna ama adingin thumaanna in kisim khin hi, cih i gengen lai hi.
A bangci dana kisim ahi hiam? A vunat khit ciang ahi hiam? A at ma ahi hiam? A at khit hi lo, a at ma ahi hi!

Vunat ahi nai loh lai-a upna hanga a ngah thumaanna ciamteh nadingin vunat ciamtehna a ngah hizaw hi. Tua ahi ciangin amau adinga thumaanna-a a kisimsak theih nadingin vunat lo napi-a a umte khempeuh pa hong suak hi.
Amah vunat bek hi lo, i pa Abraham in a vunat ma-a, a neih upna khekhap a zui vunatte pa zong ahi hi.
Leitung luahpa ahi nadingin kam ciam, Abraham le a suan a khakte in a ngahna uh thukham tungtawn hi loin upna hanga hong piang thumaanna tungtawn hizaw hi.
Ahang in, thukham suanga nungtate gouluahte hi ahi uh leh upna in man nei lo a, tua kamciam in zong kimanna a nei kei hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh thukham in thangpaihna a tun hi. Tua hi-a thukham om lohna ah tatkhialhna zong a om kei hi.

Tua ahi manin tua kamciam hehpihna hang ahi theih nading le thukham suangte hi loin Abraham upna bang upna a suangte ahi ama suan le khakte khempeuh tungah thukho ahi theih nadingin upna hanga hong tung ahi hi. Amah, eite khempeuh pa ahi hi.
"Nang minam tampite pa kong suaksak khin zo hi.”c ci-a ki gelhsa bang ahi hi. Amah a site nuntakna pia-a a om lopi nangawn a omsa banga a genpa, a uppa Pasian muhna ah eite pa ahi hi.
"Tua mah bangin na suan na khakte zong ahi ding hi,”d ci-a ama tunga kigensa bangin Abraham in lamet nading om lo napi lamen in um ahi manin minam tampite pa a suak hi.
Amah a khan kum zakhat bang pha ta a, ama pumpi a si tawh kibang ahina le Sarah sul zong a keu ahina thu upna kiam tuan loin a maituah hi.
Tua hi napi Pasian kamciam tawh kisai-in uplahna hangin hoi lo, a upna khauhzawin Pasian minthanna apia zo hi.
Pasian in a kamciam banga a tang tunsak theih nading vang a neihna thu, kiptakin a sang hi.
"Ama adingin thumaanna in kisim hi,” cih hih thu hang ahi hi.
"Ama adingin kisim hi,” cih kammalte amah guak ading bek hi lo a,
i Topa Jesu misi pana a thosakpa Pasian in thumaanna-a a simsak ding a um eite adingin zong a kigelh ahi hi.
Eite mawhna hangin amah sihna sungah kipiakhia a, diktansakna i ngah nadingin kihing kiksak hi.
Tua ahi manin upna tungtawnin diktansak i hi khit nungsang eitea Topa Jesu Khrist tungtawnin Pasian tawh i kilem hi.
Ama tungtawnin upna hangin tu-a i omna hehpihna sungah lut theihna i ngah hi. Tua hi a, Pasian minthanna lametna sungah eite i nuam hi.b
Tua bek tham lo i thuakna ah zong i nuam hi.c Bang hang hiam cih leh thuakna in thuakzawhna a piangsak hi;
thuak zawhna in nundan piangsak a, nundan in lametna piangsak ahilam eite in i thei hi.
Pasian in eite hong piak Khasiangtho tawh i lungsungah ama hong itna hong sungkhia khinta ahi manin lametna in eite hong lungkiasak kei hi.
Vangliatna i neih loh lai, a hun laitak lianin pasian-milote ading Khrist hong si hi, cih na thei hi.
Mi hoih adingin a singam a om kha mawh kei ding hi; ahi zongin mi thumaan khat adingin a singam kuamah a om khol kei ding hi.
Ahi hangin Pasian in eite hong it takpina hih bangin hong lak hi: Eite mawhnei i hi laitakin eite adingin Khrist a si hi.
Tu-in ama sisan hangin diktansak i hi khit nungsang, ama tungtawnin Pasian thangpaihna pan honkhiat in i om zawsem ding hi!
Pasian gal i hi laitakin, ama Tapa sihna tungtawnin eite amah tawh hong kilemkiksak ahileh tua banga kilem khinsate ama hinna tungtawnin hotkhiat in i om zawsem ding hi!
Tua bek tham loin ama tungtawna kilemkikna i ngahna pa i Topa Jesu Khrist tungtawnin Pasian sungah i nuam hi.
Tua ahi manin mi khat tungtawnin leitungah mawhna a lut bang tektekin mawhna tungtawnin sihna lut-a mi khempeuh mawh khin zo ahi manin mi khempeuh tungah sihna a tung hi.
Ahang in, thukham a kipiak ma-in leitungah mawhna na om zo hi. Ahi hangin thukham a om loh ciangin mawhna pen mawhna-in a kisim kei hi.
Tua hi napi, Adam hun pan Moses hun dong Adam palsat banga thupiak palsatna hanga a khial tektek lote nangawn tungah sihna in a uk hi. Adam pen hong tung ding pa lahna ahi hi.

Ahi hangin letsong pen thupalsatna tawh a kibang kei hi. Ahang in, tua mi khat thupalsatna hangin mi tampi si ahileh, Pasian hehpihna le mi khat mah ahi Jesu Khrist hehpihna hanga hong tung tua letsong, mi tampi tungah dimlet zawsem hi!

Tua ciang leuleu in Pasian letsong le tua mi khat mawhna hanga thupiang a kibang kei hi: Thukhenna in mawhna khat zui-in mawhpaihna tun a, ahi hangin letsong in thupalsatna tampi zui-in diktansakna a tun hi.

Ahang in, tua mi khat thupalsatna hangin tua mi tungtawnin sihna in hong uk ahileh Pasian hong piak a kicing hehpihna le thumaanna letsong a sangte in mikhat Jesu Khrist tungtawnin amau nuntakna sungah uk zawtham ding hi lo ahi hiam?
Tua bang diudeu in, thupalsatna khat in mawhpaihna piangsak ahileh thumaan khat bawlna in zong mi khempeuh nuntakna a tun diktansakna a piangsak hi.
Ahang in, tua mi khat thumanlohna tungtawnin mi tampi mawhnei a suah bang tektek in mi khat thumanna tungtawnin zong mi tampi mi thumaan kisuaksak ding hi.
Thupalsatna a khan nadingin thu kham hong kipiak beh hi. Ahi hangin mawhna a khanna munah hehpihna a khang semsem zaw hi.
Tua pen, sihna sungah mawhna in a uk bang tektek in i Topa Jesu Khrist tungtawnin nuntak tawntungna a tun dingin hehpihna in thumaanna tungtawna a uk theih nading ahi hi.
Tua ahileh bang i gen ding hiam? Hehpihna a khan nadingin mawhna bawl denden ding i hi hiam?
Mawh denden peuhmah lo e! Mawhna i sihsan zo hi; tua mawhna sungah bangci nuntak thei lai ding i hi hiam?
Khrist Jesu sunga kibaptise eite khempeuh ama sihna sungah zong a kibaptise zo i hilam thei lo na hi uh hiam?

Tua ahi manin Pa minthanna tungtawnin misi pan Khrist a thawh kik mah bangin eite zong nuntakna thak sungah i nuntak theih nadingin ama sihna sungah i kibaptisena tungtawnin amah tawh i kivuikhawm hi.
Ama sihna sungah eite kigawm khawm khin i hileh ama thawhkikna sungah zong amah tawh i kigawm khawm taktak ding hi.
Ahang in, mawhna pumpi’ thahatna a beia a suah nading le mawhna sila i suah nawn loh nadingin i pianlui pumpi amah tawh a kilhlum khin zo hi, cih i thei hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh a si khinsa mi peuhmah mawhna pan a suakta hi.
Tu-in Jesu tawh i sihkhawm leh amah tawh i nungta khawm ding hi, cih zong i um hi.
Ahang in, misi pan Khrist kithosak khin ahi nungsang a si kik thei nawn kei ding hi, cih i thei hi; sihna in amah a uk zo nawn kei hi.
Ama sih sihna pen khatvei-a cing dingin mawhna sihsanna ahi hi; ahi hangin ama nuntak nuntakna pen Pasian ah a nungta ahi hi.
Tua mah bangin note, mawhna sihsan khinin kingaihsun unla, Pasian ah Jesu sunga a nungta in na kingaihsun un.
Tua ahi manin mawhna kihhuai lunggulhnate na zuih khak loh nadingun a si thei na pumpi uh mawhna na uksak kei un.

Tatsiatna vanzat dingin na pumpi nate uh mawhna tungah na pia kei un. Ahi hangin sihna pan nuntakna a kitunsate bangin Pasian tungah nomau na kipia zaw unla na pumpi nate uh thumaanna vanzat dingin amah na pia zaw un.
Ahang in, note thukham nuai-a om hi loin hehpihna nuai-a om na hi manun mawhna in note hong uk teitei lo ding hi.
Tua ahileh bang? Eite thukham nuai-ah om hi loin hehpihna nuai-a om i hi manin mawhna i bawl ding hiam? A hi peuhmah kei hi!

Mi khatpeuh tungah ama thu mang dingin na kipiak uh ciangin ama thu na man pa uh sila na hi uh bangin, sihna ah hong tun mawhna sila na hi uh zongin, thumaanna ah hong tun thuman'na sila na hi uh zongin a thu na man pa uh sila na hilam uh thei lo na hi uh hiam?
Ahi hangin mawhna sila na hi ngei uh hangin no hong ki-apsa thuhilhna, na lungsim khempeuh uh tawh mang na hi manun Pasian tungah lungdamna om ta hen.
Mawhna panin note hong kisuaktasak khin zo a, thumaanna sila na suak khin ta uh hi.

Na pianngei pumpi uh ah thanem na hi manun mihing kammal tawh hong gen ka hi hi. Na pumpi nate uh, sian tholohna le a khang semsem tatsiatna-ah sila dingin na piak ngei bang tektek un, sianthona hong tun ding thumaanna-ah sila dingin na pumpi nate uh tu-in na pia un.
Mawhna sila na hi laitakun thumaanna in hong ukna pan na suakta zo uh hi.
Tua hun laitakin tu laitaka na maizumpih uh nate panin bang phat tuamna gah at na hi uh hiam? Tua nate in sihna a tun hi.
Ahi hangin tu-in mawhna panin note hong khahkhia a, Pasian lamah sila suak khin zo na hi manun na at uh phattuamna in sianthona ah hong tuna, tua in nuntak tawntungna hong tun hi.
Ahang in, mawhna thaman sihna hi-a, ahi hangin Pasian letsong ahileh i Topa Jesu Khrist sungab nuntak tawntungna ahi hi.
Sanggamte aw, thukham theite tunga thugen ka hi hi. Mi khat a nuntak sung teng bek thukham in ama tungah thu nei hi, cih thei hi lo na hi hiam?
Gentehna in pasal nei numei khat, a pasal a nuntak laiteng thukham hangin a pasal tawh ki-awhcip hi. Ahi hangin a pasal a sih leh kitenna tawh kisai thukham panin amah a kikhahkhia ahi hi.

Tua ahi ciangin a pasal a nuntak lai-in midang khat a tenpih leh amah angkawmnu a suak hi. Ahi hangin a pasal a sih leh tua thukham panin amah a kikhahkhia hi-a, midang khat a tenpih zongin amah angkawmnu a suak kei hi.
Tua ahi ciangin sanggamte aw, misi pana tho kik midang khat tawh ki-awh a, Pasian ah gah na gah theih nadingun Khrist pumpi tungtawnin note in zong thukham na sihsan uh hi.
Pianngeia mawhna in eite hong uk laitakin, sihna ading gah i gah nadingin thukham in a khanlawhsak lunggulh mawhnate in i pumpi sungah na a sem hi.

Ahi hangin tu-in ahileh hun khat lai-a eite hong hencip pen i sihsan zo-a a kigelhsa ngeina-bucinga nuntakna lui sung hi lo Kha a nuntakna thak sungah na i sep theih nadingin tua thukham panin eite hong kikhahkhia zo hi.

Tua hileh bang i gen ding hiam? Thukham pen mawhna ahi hiam? Hi zenzen lo hi! Thukham tungtawn hi kei leh mawhna bang hiam, cih ka thei kei takpi ding hi. Ahang in, thukham in “Deihgawh kei in”b na ci lo hileh deihgawh kici bang cihna hiam, cih ka thei kei ding hi.
Ahi hangin thupiak in a piankhiatsak hun hoih, mawhna in na bawh lian-a, keima sungah deihgawhna namkim gahkhiasak hi. Ahang in, thukham pualam ah mawhna a si hi
Hun khat lai-in thukham pua-ah ka nungta hi; ahi hangin thupiak hong tun khit ciangin mawhna nungta a kei ka si hi.
Nuntakna a tun ding thupiak tektek in a taktakin sihna a tun zawsop hi, cih ka theikhia hi.
Ahang in, thupiak in a piankhiatsak hun hoih na bawh lian-a, kei hong khemin thupiak tungtawnin kei hong sisak hi.
Tua hi-a thukham siangtho a, thupiak zong siangtho-in maanin a hoih hi.

Tua ahileh hoih a kici penin kei adingin sihna suak ahi hiam? Ahi peuhmah kei hi. Mawhna pen mawhna banga a kitheihtel theih nadingin a hoih tungtawnin keima sungah sihna a piangsak hi; tua in thupiak tungtawnin mawhna pen mawhna taktak a suah takpi nading ahi hi.
Thukham ahileh khalam thu ahilam i thei hi; ahi hangin keimah ka khami kei a, mawhna ah sila banga hong kizuak ahi hi.
Ka hih nop pen ka hih kei a, ahi hangin ka muhdah pen hih ka hi manin, ka hih pen ka theitel kei hi.
Ka hih nop loh pen hih ka hileh thukham hoih hi, ci-a thukimpih ka hi hi.
Tua hi-a tua banga a gamtang pen kei mahmah hi nawn loin ka sunga nungta mawhna ahi hi.
A hoih bawl ding ka lunggulh hangin bawl thei lo ka hi manin mawhna a dim keima pianngei pumpic sungah a hoih bangmah nungta lo hi, cih ka thei hi.
Ahang in, kei hihte a hoih ka hih nopte ahi kei hi; hi lo hi, ka hih nop loh a siate ka hih den zaw hi.
Tu-in ka hih nop lohte hih ka hileh, a hih pen kei hi nawn loin ka sunga nungta mawhna hih ahi hi.
Tua ahi ciangin hih thukham in na sem ahilam ka phawkkhia hi: A hoih ka hih nop laitakin kei tawh a omkhawm den a gilo a om na hi mawk hi.
Ahang in, ka mihinna laigil ah Pasian thukham ka lungkimpih hi.
Ahi hangin ka pumpi nate sungah thukham dang khat nasem ka mu hi. Tua thukham in ka lungsim thukham do a, kei pumpi nate sunga mawhnate sungah hong koltangsak hi.
Hinggim na zen ing e! Hih sihna pumpi panin kua in kei hong honkhia ding ahi hiam?
I Topa Jesu Khrist tungtawnin Pasian tungah lungdamna om ta hen! Tua hi-a kei mahmah ka lungsim sungah Pasian thukham sila ka hi-a ahi hangin mawhdim ka piangngei sungah mawhna thukham sila ka hi hi.
Tua ahi manin Khrist Jesu sunga omte adingina tu-in mawhpaihna a om kei hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Khrist Jesu tungtawnin nuntakna Kha thukham in mawhna le sihna thukham panin kei hong suaktasak zo hi.

Ahang in, mawhdim pianngeib in a thanemsak thukham, a thahatna bei-a, a sep theih loh pen, Pasian in mawhna hanga biaknac a kizang dingin mawhdim mihing bangind ama Tapa mahmah hong sawlna tawh a sem zo hi.
Tua ahi ciangin mawhdim pianngei banga nungta hi lo, Kha deihna banga nungta eite sungah thukham in a kalh thumaan a tun theih nadingin amah in mawhdim mihing sungah mawhna a mawhpaih hi.
Pianngei mawhna banga nungtate in, tua pianngei deihna bekbek a lunggulh uh hi. Ahi hangin Kha deihna banga nungtate in Kha deihna bekbek a lunggulh uh hi.
Mawhdim mie lungsim sihna hi-a ahi hangin Kha in a uk lungsim, nuntakna le lemna ahi hi.
Mawhdim lungsimf in Pasian a langneih hi. Tua in Pasian thukham a mang kei hi; zong a mang thei kei hi.
Mawhdim pianngei in a uksa mite in Pasian a lungkimsak thei kei uh hi.
Ahi zongin Pasian Kha note sungah a ten nak leh mawhdim pianngei in note hong uk nawn loin Kha in note hong uk hi zaw hi. Mi khatpeuh in Khrist Kha a neih kei leh Khrist aa ahi kei hi.
Ahi hangin note sungah Khrist a om leh mawhna hangin note pumpi si taleh thumaanna hangin na kha uh a nungta hi.
Misi pana Jesu a thosakpa Kha note sungah hong teng ahileh misi pana Khrist a thosakpa in no sunga teng ama Kha tawnin a si thei na pumpite uh zong nuntakna a pia ding hi.
Tua ahi ciangin sanggamte aw, tu-in bat khat i nei hi. Tua in mawhdim pianngei deihna banga a nungta dingin pianngei tungah i ba kei hi.
Ahang in, mawhdim pianngei deihna banga na nuntak uh leh na si ding uh hi; ahi hangin Kha hangin na pumpi uh gamtatsiate na sihsak uh leh na nungta ding uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cihleh Pasian Kha in a makaihte Pasian tapate ahi uh hi.
Ahang in, note launa sila hong suaksak kik kha a sangte na hi kei uh hi; ahi hangin tapa-suahnag Kha na sang zo uh hi. Tua hi a, ama hangin eite in, “Abba,h Pa,” i ci hi.
Pasian tate i hina eimau kha tawh tua Kha mahmah in teci a pang hi.
Tu-in tate i hileh gouluahte i hi hi. Khrist minthanna eite in zong i tanhpih theih nadingin ama thuaknate i thuakpih takpi leh Khrist tawh gouluah khawm Pasian gouluahte i hi hi.
Tu laitaka i thuak gimnate le eite sunga hong kilang ding minthannate tehkak tham ka sa kei hi.
A kipiangsak na khempeuh in Pasian tapate a kilaak nading lawptakin lamenin a ngak uh hi.
Ahang in, a kipiangsak nate khempeuh amau deihtel hang hi lo, amau a nuai siahpa deihna bangin bucinlohna nuai-ah kihen hi.
Tua in a kipiangsak khempeuh muatna sila pan kisuaktasaka, a minthang Pasian tate suahtakna sungah a tun nading lametna hang ahi hi.
A kipiangsak khempeuh in tu hun mahmah dong nausuahnat thuak bangin tau lai uh hi, cih i thei hi.
Tua bek hi lo Kha gahmasa a nei eite mahmah zong eite pumpi tatkhiat nading tapa i suah ding lawptakin ngakin i sungah tau-in i om hi.
Ahang in, hih lametna sungah eite hotkhiat i hi hi. Ahi hangin a kimusa lametna pen lametna ahi peuhmah kei hi. Kua in a muhsate lamen ahi hiam?
Ahi hangin i muh nai lohte i lamet leh tuate i ngak keeikai hi.
Tua mah bangin i thanemnate ah Kha in eite hong huh hi. Eite in thu bangci nget ding cih i thei kei hi, ahi hangin Kha mahmah in kammala lawhkhiat theih loh tuanate tawh eite adingin hong thumsak hi.
Tua hi a, eite lungsim a zongpa in Kha lungsim a thei hi. Bang hang hiam cihleh Pasian deihna tawh kizui-in Kha in misiangte ading a thumsak hi.
Tua ciangin Pasian in ama ngimna tawh kizui-a, a sapsa mitei ahi, amah a itte a hoih nadingin na khempeuh a sepsak hi,j cih i thei hi.
Ahang in, Tapa pen sanggam tampite lakah tacil a suah theih nadingin Pasian in a theihkholhsa mite ama Tapa tawh a kibang dingin a laitansa ahi hi.
Tua hi-a a laitansate zong a sam hi; a sapsate zong dik a tangsak hi; dik a tansaksate zong a minthangsak hi.
Tua ahileh hih thu dawn nadingin bang i gen ding hiam? Pasian eite lamah a pan leh ei langah kua pang zo ding ahi hiam?
Ama Tapa neihsun sit loin eite khempeuh ading hong pia pa in amah tawh na khempeuh hong citpiak khawm loin om ding ahi hiam?
Pasian in a telsate kua in mawhmat ding ahi hiam? Dik a tangsak Pasian ahi hi.
A mawhpaihpa kua ahi hiam? Si bek tham loin nungta-a, a tho kik pa Khrist Jesu, tu-in Pasian taklamah tu-a eite adingin hong thumsak hi.
Khrist hong itna panin eite kua in hong khenkhia zo ding hiam? Lungmanna, haksatna, bawlsiatna, kialna, silh ding kisapna, lauhuaina, namsaute in hong khenkhia zo ding ahi hiam?
"Nangma hangin kote in ni thapai-in sihna ka maituah uh hi; gawh ding tuute bangin kote hong kiseh hi,”k ci-a kigelhsa bangin,
hong khenkhia zo kei ding hi. Hihte khempeuh ah eite hong it ama tungtawnin gualzote sang i gualzo zaw hi.
Ahang in, sihna le hinna ahi zong in, vansawltakte le dawitel ahi zongin, tu hun le tu nung ciang ahi zongin, vangliatna khatpeuh ahi zongin,
a thukna le a sanna ahi zongin, a kipiangsak nate khat beek in i Topa Khrist Jesu sunga om Pasian hong itna panin hong khenkhia zo kei ding hi, cih ka kipsan takpi hi.
Khrist sunga om tua thutak ka gen hi – ka zuau hi loin Khasiangtho sunga ka kitheihna lungsim in tua kipsakna,
ka lung sungah dahna lianpi le lunggim ngitngetna nei-in ka om hi.
Ahang in, Israel-te keima mipih ka sanggamte hangin kei mahmah Khrist pan kikhen khia-in samsiatna thuak maileng ka ut hi.
Tapa suahsakna amau aa hi-a Pasian minthanna ahi zongin, thukhunte ahi zongin, thukham ngahna ahi zongin biakinnpi-a biakna le kamciamte khempeuh amau aa ahi hi.
Pubulte amau aa hi a, amaute panin Khrist leitung pu le pate kiguisut hi. Tua Khrist in na khempeuh tunga Pasian hi-a a tawntungin kiphat hi!a Amen.
Pasian thu a hawmsuak bang ahi kei hi. Ahang in, Israel-te pana piangte khempeuh Israel ahi kim kei uh hi.
Amaute ama suan le khak ahi uh hangin Abraham tate ahi kim kei uh hi. Tua sangsikin: “Na suan na khakte Isaac tungtawnin kiseh ding hi.”b ci hi.
Kammal dangin gen lehang pianngei tate Pasian tate ahi kei uh hi. Ahi hangin kamciamna tate, Abraham suan le khakte in kisim hi.
Ahang in, tua kamciam in: “A kisehsa hun a tun ciangin kong kileh kik dinga, Sarah in tapa khat a nei ding hi”c a na ci hi.
Tua bek tham loin Rebecca tate in pa kikhat eite pa Isaac a nei uh hi.
Tua hi napi tua a peng tate gel a suah ma uh asia apha a bawl theih mapek un, Pasian teelkhiatna tawh kisai ama ngimna:
sepna hang hi lo hong sampa hangin, cih thu a kip nadingin tuanu kiangah, “A uzaw in a naupa nasem a suak ding hi”d ci-in na kigen hi. Tua bang tektek in:
"Jacob ka it a, ahi hangin Esau ka mudah hi.”e ci-in kigelh zo hi.
Tua ahileh bang gen ding i hi hiam? Pasian a thutang lo ahi hiam? Hi peuhmah lo hi!
Ahang in, amah in Moses kiangah “Ka lainatte ka lainat dinga, ka khuatuahte ka khuatuah ding hi”f a na ci hi.
Tua ahi ciangin mihing lunggulhna tung ahi zongin, a hanciamna tungah ahi zongin kinga loin Pasian lainatna tung bekah kinga hi.
Ahang in, Laisiangtho in Pharaoh kiangah: Ka vangliatna nangma sungah ka lah theih nading le leitang tung khempeuh ah ka min a kitangko theih nading ngimna tawh nang kong laamto zo hi.”g ci hi.
Tua ahi manin Pasian in a lainat nopte tungah lainatna nei-a, a lungkhauhsak nopte a lung khauhsak hi.
Note khatpeuh in ka kiangah: “Tua ahileh bang hangin Pasian in eite hong mawhsak lai ahi hiam? Kua in ama deihna nang ahi hiam?” nong ci kha ding uh hi.
Ahi hangin mihing aw, Pasian a sel kik dingin nang kua na hi hiam? A kibawl na in a bawlpa kiangah, ‘Bang hangin kei hih bangin hong bawl na hi hiam?’ ci thei ding hiam”h
Beelseekpa in beellei lom khat panin a thupi-a zat ding beel le zattaang ding beel, bawl theihna thu nei hi lo ahi hiam?
Pasian in a thangpaihna lak ding le ama vang kitheikhawksak dingin suksiat dinga a koihsa ama thangpaihna a tun nadingte lungduaitakin thuak keikai ahileh bang gen nawn tuan ding i hi hiam?
A minthang dinga a bawlkholhsa, ama lainatna a ngahte tungah a kicing ama minthanna a lahkhiat ding
Jew-te pan bek hilo Gentile-te laka eite nangawn hong sam ahileh bang gen nawn ding i hi hiam?
Amah in Hosea sungah: “Keima mi ahi lo amaute, ‘keima mite’ ka ci ding hi; ka it loh nu zong, ‘ka it nu’i ka ci ding hi,
le “ ‘Note, keima mite na hi kei uh hi,’ ci-a amau tunga ka genna mun tekek ah amaute, ‘a nungta Pasian tapate,’j kici ding hi, cih thu a tung ding hi.” ci-in a gen hi.
Israel tawh kisai-in Isaiah in: “Israel mite tuipi gei-a sehnel zahin a tam uh hangin a baanglaite bek kihonkhia ding hi.
Ahang in, Topa in leitang tungah ama thukhenna a kip den dingin a manlangin tungsak ding hi,”k ci-in a kiko hi.
Nidang lai-a Isaiah in: “Thahatpen Topa in eite ading suan le khak hong nusiat lo hileh eite, Sodom bang i hi khin zo dinga, eite Gomorrah bang i hi khin zo ding hi,”l ci-a a gen bang tektek ahi hi.
Tua ahileh bang i gen ding hiam? Thumaanna a deih lo Gentile-te in upna hanga kingah tua thumaanna a ngah zo uh hi;
ahi hangin Israel-te in a delh uh tua thumaanna thukham a ngah kei uh hi.
Bang hanga ngah lo? Amaute in upna tawh zong loin sepna tawh a zon hang uh ahi hi. Amaute kimuktukna suang tungah a muktu uh hi. Hih bangin kigelh hi:
"En in, mi a muktusak ding suangtum khat le amaute a puksak ding suangtumpi khat Zion ah ka nga a, amah amuangte a maizum ngei kei ding uh hi,”m
Sanggamte aw, Israel mite adinga ka lunggulhna le Pasian tunga ka thungetna pen amaute a kihotkhiat theih nading ahi hi.
Ahang in, Pasian adingin amaute nakpi-a a hanciamna uh teci ka pang thei hi. Ahi hangin amaute hahkatna in theihna pansan ahi kei hi.
Amaute in Pasian kiang pana hong pai thumaanna thei lo uh a, amau thu-a phuaktawm nuam uh ahi manin Pasian thumaanna ah a ki-ap kei uh hi.
A um peuhmah in thumaanna a ngah theih nadingin thukham tawpna Khrist ahi hi.
Moses in thukham hanga kingah thumaanna a genna ah: “Hih nate a sem mi in hihte hangin a nungta ding hi.”a ci hi.
Ahi hangin upna hanga kingah thumaanna in: “Na lungsim sungah, ‘Vantung ah kua kahto ding hiam?’ ci kei in.”b (tua pan Khrist lasuk ding cihnopna)
cih ahi zongin, “ ‘A thuk sungah kua kumsuk ding hiam?c (tua pen misi panin Khrist lato ding cihnopna)” ci kei in.
Ahi hangin tua in bang gen ahi hiam? “Na kiangah thu om hi. Tua thu na kam sung le na lungtang sungah a om hi,"d ci hi. Kote tangko upnathu ahih le:
"Note in na kam uh tawh, ‘Jesu in Topa hi,’ ci-in pulaka, Pasian in amah misi pan thokiksak zo hi, ci-a na lungtang sung uhah na up uh leh note hong kihonkhia ding hi, cih upna thu ahi hi.
Ahang in, na lungtang uh tawh umin dik na tang uh a, na kam uh tawh pulakin note hong kihonkhia hi.
Laisiangtho in: “Amah a muang peuh mah a kimaizumsak ngei kei ding hi,”e ci hi.
Ahang in, Jew-te le Gentile-te kikal ah kilamdanna bangmah a om kei hi. Tua Topa mah mite khempeuh Topa hi-a ama tungah a kote khempeuh kicingtakin thupha a pia hi.
Ahang in, “Topa min a sam peuhmah kihonkhia ding hi,”f ci hi.

Tua ahileh amaute in amau uplohpa bangci sap theih ding uh hiam? Tua ciangin amaute in a thu a zak ngei lohpa uh bangci up thei ding uh ahi hiam? Amaute kiangah a hilh khatpeuh om kei leh bangci zak theih ding uh ahi hiam?
A kisawl kei leh amaute in bangci hilh theih ding uh ahi hiam? A kigelhsa bangin: “Lungdamna thu a puakte khe etlawm mahmah si e!”g
Ahi hangin Israel mite khempeuh in lungdamna thuthak a sang kim kei uh hi. Tua hangin, Isaiah in, “Topa aw, kote thupuak a um kua om ahi hiam?”h a na ci hi.
Tua bang ditdetin, tua thupuak zakna panin upna pianga, Khrist thu tungtawnin tua thupuak a kiza hi.
Ahi hangin amaute in za lo uh ahi hiam, cih kong dong hi. Za tham uh hi: “Amaute aw in leitung khempeuh zel khin zo-a, a kammalte un leimongte ban khin zo hi.”i

Israel-te in thei lo uh ahi hiam, cih kong dong leuleu hi. A masa penin Moses in: “Minam ahi lote eng dingin note kong bawl ding hi; theihna a nei lo minamte in note hong hehsak dingin ka bawl ding hi.”j na ci hi.
Tua ciangin Isaiah in hangtakin, “Keimah hong zong lote in hong mu zo uh hi; keimah hong kan lote tungah kei le kei ka kilaak zo hi.”k na ci hi.
Ahi hangin amah in Israel tawh kisai-in, “Thumang lo le paupeng mite lamah sun nilohin ka khut ka zan hi”l na ci hi.
Tua ahileh, Pasian in ama mite nolh ahi hiam, cih kong dong hi. A nolh peuhmah kei hi! Kei mahmah zong Abraham suan ahi Benjamin beh pana Israel mi khat mah ka hi hi.
Pasian in a theihkholhsa ama mite a nolh kei hi. Elijah in Israel-te langpanin Pasian tungah a hekna Laisiangtho gen thei ngei lo na hi uh hiam?
"Topa aw, amaute in na kamsangte that zo uh a, na biakna-taute a phelkhia zo uh hi. Kei kia bek ka om lai-a, amaute in kei thah hong sawm uh hi,”a ci hi.
Tua ciangin ama tungah Pasian dawnna bang ahi hiam? “Keima ading Baal mai-ah a khukdin lo mi tul sagih ka siit khin zo hi,”b
Tua hunmah bangin tuhun laitakin zong hehpihna hanga teelsa a baanglaite a om hi.
Tua hi-a hehpihna hang ahileh sepna hang hi nawn lo hi; sepna hang hi, hileh hepihna pen hehpihnac ahi nawn kei ding hi.
Tua ahileh bang ahi hiam? Israel-te in kuhkaltaka a zon uh mu lo uh a, ahi hangin a teelte in a ngah zo uh hi. Adangte kisak sak lai-a,
hih-a kigelh bang ahi hi: “Pasian in tuni tektek dong, amawk lungsim ahi zongin, a mu thei lo mittang ahi zongin a za thei lo bil ahi zongin, amaute a pia hi.”d
David in zong: “Amaute adingin a sabuai uh thangzak le tehlop suak henla, muktukna le gawina suak ta hen.
Amaute in a muh theih loh nadingun a mitte uh mial henla, a nungte uh kul tawntungta hen.”e a na ci hi.

Amaute a tho kik zo nawn lo dingin muktu uh ahi hiam, cih kong dong kik leuleu hi. Ahi peuhmah kei hi! Amaute tatkhialhna hangin Israel-te in Gentile-te a en nadingun hotkhiatna thu Gentile-te tungah tung zawsop hi.
Ahi hangin amaute tatkhialhna hangin leitung mite adingin hauhna suaka, amaute supna Gentile-te adingin hauhna suak ahileh amaute kicinna in bangzah a lianzaw hauhna a tunzaw tazen tam!
No Gentile-te tunga thugen ka hi hi. Gentile-te adinga keimah sawltakpi ka hina tawh,
ka mipihte in note hong eng-a pawlkhat ka hotkhiat theih nading lametna tawh keima mipihte a phawng dingin nakpi-in na ka sem hi.
Ahang in, amaute a kinolhna leitung mite kilemkikna hi ahileh amaute a kisanna, sihna panin hinna lo bang dang hi ding hiam?
Gahmasa banga kipia buhnel mekman them khat siangtho ahileh a lom bitin zong a siangtho hi; azung a siantho leh ahiangte zong a siangtho hi.
Tua hiangte pawlkhat kitankhia-in gamlak olive dawng khat ahi nang, tuate tungah hong kipeh a, olive tung pan hong pai khanna tui dawn khawm na hileh,
tua a kitankhiasa hiangte tungah na kisial kei in. Tua banga na kisialh leh hih thu na ngaihsun in: Nang in azung na vak kei-a azung in nang hong vak zaw hi.
Tua ahileh, “Kei hong kipeh theih nadingin hiangte kitankhia hi,” na ci kha ding hi.
Himah hi. Ahi hangin amaute uplahna hangin amaute a kitankhia hizaw a, nang na upna hanga ding na hi hi. Kisathei kei inla lau zaw in.
Tua hi-a Pasian in pianngei hiangte hawi lo ahileh nang zong hong hawi tuan kei ding hi.

Tua ahi manin Pasian migitna le ama thukhauhna; a pukte tungah a thukhauhna le ama migitna sunga na kip den nak leh nang tunga a migitnate ngaihsun in. Ama migitna sunga na kip den kei leh nang zong hong kisattan ding hi.
Amaute amau uplahna sungah a kohkan kei nak uh leh Pasian in amaute peh kik thei ahi manin amaute zong a kipeh ding hi.

A tawpna ah, pianngei-a gamlak olive kung ahi nang, hong satkhia-in pianngei tawh kilehbulhin a kicing olive kung tungah hong kipeh ahileh, hih pianngei hianga amau menkhiatna olive kung tunga peh ding baihzaw tham lo ding ahi hiam?
Sanggamte aw, note na kimisak loh nadingun; a lut ding zah a lut kim khit mateng Israel-te khenkhat lungkhauh tadih ding uh hi, cih thuthuk na theih loh ding uh ka deih kei hi.
Tua hi-a: “Zion panin tanpa hong pai ding hi; amah in Jacob panin pasian-milohna a hemkhia ding hi.
Tuateh amaute mawhnate a kilakkhiat ciangin amaute tawh ka thukhun hih ahif hi.”g ci-a kigelh bangin Israel-te khempeuh kihonkhia ding hi.
Lungdamna-thu tawh kisai-in ahileh note hangin amaute gal ahi uh hi. Ahi hangin teelna tawh kisai-in ahileh pubulte hangin amaute, itte ahi uh hi.
Ahang in, Pasian letsongte le ama hong sapnate a kidok kik thei kei hi.
Amaute thu manlohna hangin hun khat lai-a Pasian thu a mang lo note in, tu-in lainatna na ngah uh mah bangin
Pasian in note hong lainat bangin amaute in zong tu-inh lainatna a ngah theih nadingun amaute zong tu-in thumang lote a suak uh hi.
Ahang in, Pasian in mi khempeuh tungah lainatna a neih theih nadingin thumanlohna ah mi khempeuh a hencip hi.
Aw, Pasian in pilna le theihna a hauhi zia thuk na mahmah e! Ama thukhennate telzawh hi lo a, ama lampite sulkan zawh ding hi peuhmah lo hi!
"Topa lungsim kua in thei a, ahikeh a thudotpa kua hiam?j
"Pasian thukkik dingin Pasian tungah kua’n pia ngei ahi hiam?”k
Ahang in, nate khempeuh, ama kiang pan le ama tung pan le ama aa ahi hi. Amah in minthanna ngah tawntung ta hen! Amen.
Tua ahi manin sanggamte aw, a siangtho le Pasian lungkimna ahi a nungta biakpiakna ahi dingin na pumpi uh na piak nadingun Pasian lainatna hangin kong kun hi. Tuamah lah na khalama biakna uh ahi hi.

Hih leitung deihna tawh kizui-in na gamta nawn kei unla, na lungsim uh thaksuaksakin na kipumkhel un. Tua hileh a hoih, a lungkimhuai, a hoihkim Pasian deihna bang ahi hiam, cih khentel thei-in na pakta thei ding uh hi.

Ahang in, nangma hina tan sanga a sangzaw-in nang le nang kingaihsun kei in. Ahi hangin Pasian in nang hong piaksa upna za tawh kizui-in amaan thukhenna tawh nang le nang na kingaihsut nadingin ka ngahsa hehpihna hangin note tungah kong gen hi.
I pumpi in pumpi na tampi nei ciat a, tua pumpi nate khempeuh a nasep a kibat loh mah bangin,
a tampi eite in zong Khrist sungah pumpi i suaka, eite khempeuh khat le khat a kizom dimdiam i hi hi.
Eite in hong kipiasa hehpihna tawh kizui-in letsong a tuamtuam i ngah hi. Mi khat letsong thugen theihna ahileh amah in amab upna tawh kituakin zang ta hen.
Nasepna a ngah leh sem ta hen; Laihilhna a ngah leh limtakin hilh ta hen;

hansuah theihna a ngah leh hansuah ta hen; midang kitasamte huh theihna a ngah leh cinghtakin huh ta hen; makaihna a ngah leh kiciantakin uk ta hen; lainatna lahtheihna a ngah leh lungtaitakin lak ta hen.
Itna, a taktak hi pelmawh ding hi. Gitlohna na mudah un, a hoih na pom cinten un.
Note khat le khat unau ki-itna kho tawh na ki-it thuk un. No sangin midangte a sangzaw-in na kipahtawi thuk un.
Hahkat lo ngei kei unla, khalam hanciamna ah lenkipin Topa na sem un.
Lametna ah lungnuam unla, thuaksiatna ah lungduai-in, thungetna ah muanhuai un.
Pasian mi a kitasamte na hawm un. Zindo na siam un.
No hong bawlsiate thupha na pia un; thupha na pia unla, na hamsiat kei un.
A lungdamte tawh na lungdam khawm un. a dahte tawh na dah khawm un.
Note khat le khat na kithuhual un. Kisathei kei unla, dinmun niamtec tawh na kikhawl khawm nuam un. Na kimisak kei un.
Khatpeuh gitlohna, gitlohna-in na thuk kik kei un. Mikim muhna-ah amaana gamtat ding na hanciam un.
Ahih theih leh nang tunga a kingak laiteng mikim tawh na kilem un.
Ka lawmte aw, phu na la kei un; Pasian thangpaihna adingin na awnzaw un. Ahang in, Topa in: “Phulakna keima aa ahi hi. Keimah in ka thuk kik ding hi.”d ci hi.
Tua sangsik in: “Na galpa a gil a kial leh na vak in; adangtak leh a dawn ding bang khatpeuh na pia in. Hih bangin na hih leh amau lutungah mei-am vumsak na hi ding hi.,”e ci-in kigelh hi.
Gitlohna kizosak kei unla, a hoih tawh gitlohna na zo un.
Pasian piaksate longal in thuneihna nei lo uh ahi manin mi khempeuh in a ukte thu a mang pelmawh ding uh hi. Tu laitaka thuneite thuneihna Pasian piaksa ahi hi.
Tua bang diudeu-in thuneite a langdote, Pasian phuh kipsate a langdo ahi hi. Tua banga a langdote thukhenna kithuaksak ding hi.

Ahang in, a khiala gamtate adingin, gam-ukte lauhuai bek a, amaan-a gamtate adingin a lauhuai kei hi. Thunei mi khat na kihtakna panin na suakta nuam hiam? Na suahtak nop leh amaanin gamta lecin amah in nang hong phat ding hi.

Ahang in, nang tunga a hoih sem dingin amah Pasian nasempa ahi hi. Ahi hangin asia-a na gamtat leh lauthawng in; amah in a mawkna-in namsau a tawi kei hi. Amah, Pasian nasem hi-a, asia-a gamtate tungah thangpaihna ahi gawtna a tungsak dinga kisawlsawn ahi hi.
Tua ahi manin gawtna thuak khak ding hang bek hi loin, sia le pha khentheihna hangin zong thuneite thu man ding ahi hi.
Thuneite, hunbit a gam-uk Pasian ading nasemte ahi manin hih thu hangin zong siah na pia uh hi.
Mi khempeuh tungah na bat bangun na pia un. Siah piak dingte siah na pia un; mangmu piak dingte mangmu na pia un; zahtak dingte na zahtak un; pahtawi dingte na pahtawi un.
Khat le khat ki-it den ding leiba pen longal kuamah na kibasak kei un, ahang in, ama mipih a it mi in thukham tangtun ahi hi.
"Angkawm kei in” “Tual that kei in” “Gu kei in” “Deihgawh kei in”a kici thupiakte le thupiak dang a om peuhpeuh “Nang le nang na ki-it bangin na vengpa it in,”b kici zuihtawm ngeina in huam khin hi.
Itna in a vengpa a nasak kei hi. Tua ahi manin itna pen thukham tangtunna ahi hi.
Tu lai hun theitelin hih na nasem un. A tunga i up sangin eite hotkhiatna tu-in naizaw ahi manin na ihmutna panun khanlawh hun tung ta hi.
Zan bei dektak hi; sun hong tung dektak hi. Tua ahi ciangin khuamial gamtatnate paikhia-in khuavak galvante silh ni.
Zu uang dawnna, zukhamna, numei-pasal pak tatna le hukna lanna, kilungkimlohna le hazatnate sem loin sun huna i tat bangin eite a kilawmin gamta ni.
Mawh dim pianngeic lunggulhnate ngaihsun kei unla Topa Jesu Khrist na silh zaw un.
Kisel theihna thute tawh kisai-in upna thanemte mawhpaih pah kei unla, na sang zaw un.
Mi khat in a upna tawh kituakin an khempeuh ne thei hi. Ahi hangin upna thanem midang khat in anteh singgah bek a ne hi. Pasian in amah sang khin ahi manin,
nek theih khempeuh a nepa in a ne lopa neu-et kei hen. Nek theih khempeuh a ne kim lopa in a nepa mawhpaih kei hen.
Midang khatpeuh nasempa tungah thu khen dingin nang kua na hi hiam? Tua nasempa a pu thu-in a ding thei a puk thei hi. Topa in amah dingsak thei ahi manin amah a ding ding hi.
Mi khat in ni khat sangin ni dang khat a siangtho zaw in ngaihsun hi. Adang khat in ni khempeuh a kibangin ngaihsun hi. Mi khempeuh in ama lungsima a kipsan bang hi ding hi.

Ni khatpeuh a thupi tuan a sapa in Topa hangin thupi a sa hi. Sa nepa in Pasian tungah lungdam ko ahi manin Topa hangin a ne ahi hi. Sa tangpa in Pasian tungah lungdam ko ahi manin Topa hangin a tang ahi hi.
Ahang in, mi kuamah ama ading beka nungta hi loin, a si kuamah in ama ading bekin a si kei hi.
Eite i nuntak leh Topa adinga nungta i hi hi; eite i sih leh Topa adinga si i hi hi. tua ahi ciangin eite i si-a i hing zongin Topa aa i hi hi.
Ahang in, hih thu hang mahmahin a site le a hingte Topa aa ahikhawm theih nadingin Khrist si-a tua ciangin nungta kik hi.
Tua ahileh bang hangin na sanggampa tungah thu khen na hi hiam? Ahikeh bang hangin na sanggampa neu-et na hi hiam? Ahang in, eite khempeuh Pasian thukhenna tokhom mai-ah i ding kim ding hi.
"Topa in,'Ka nuntakna ka lo hi, ka mai-ah mi khempeuh khukdin ding uh a, Pasian tungah leii khempeuh in a pulak ding uh hi,’ ci hi,”a ci-in kigelh hi.
Tua ahi tak ciangin eite khempeuh in Pasian tungah eima thu tek i gen ciat ding hi.
Tua ahi manin eite khat le khat thu kikhen nawn kei ni. Tua sangsikin na sanggampa lampi ah muktukna suang, a dongkholh na ahi zongin a koih lo dingin na lungsim uh khensat un.
Topa Jesu sunga om mi khat ka hina tawh anb peuhmah asiang lo khat beek a om kei hi, cih ka kipsan mahmah hi. Ahi hangin mi khatpeuh in na pawlkhat siang lo a sak leh ama adingin a siang lo ahi hi.

Na nek khatpeuh hangin na sanggampa a lungdon leh itna sunga gamta na hi nawn kei hi. Ama adinga zong Khrist a si na sanggampa a lungdon leh itna sungah gamta na hi nawn kei hi. Na nekna hangin ama adingin zong Khrist a si na sanggampa, siasak kei in.
A hoiha na ngaihsutte a sia banga a kigen ding phal kei in.
Ahang in, Pasian gam pen nekna le dawnna thu hi loin, Khasiangtho sunga thumaanna, lemna le lungnopna ahi hi.
Bang hang hiam cihleh hih banga Khrist na a sem peuhmah in Pasian lungkimsak a, mite in zong a thukimpih uh hi.
Tua ahi manin kilemna le khat le khat kihansuahna sungah hong tun ding na i sep nadingin hanciam theih tawpin hanciam ni.
An hangin Pasian nasepna susia kei un. An khempeuh asiang ahi hi. Ahi hangin mi khatpeuh a muktusak dinga na khatpeuh a ne mi a khial ahi hi.
Na sanggampa pukna a piangsak ding sa nek loh ding ahi zongin, zu dawn loh ding ahi zongin, khat peuhpeuh hih loh ding ahi zongin hoihzaw hi.
Tua ahi ciangin hih nate tawh kisai-in na up peuhpeuh nang le Pasian kikal thu hisak in. Amah in maan a sak nate hangin amah le amah a kimawhpaih lo mipa, thupha ngah ahi hi.
Ahi hangin lunghei neihna a neipa in a nek leh amah a kimawhpaih ahi hi. Ahang in, ama nekna upna pan ahi kei hi. Tua hi-a upna pana hong pai lo khempeuh mawhna ahi hi.
A thahat eite in a thanemte’ hihzawhlohnate i thuakzawh ding hi-a, eimah le eimah i kilungkimsak ding hi lo hi.
Eite khempeuh in i vengte hoih nadingin amaute lungkimsaka, i khan suahtoh ding ahi hi.
Ahang in, “Note hong engkote engkona kei tung hong tu hi.”a ci-a kigelh bangin Khrist nangawn zong amah le amah a kilungkimsak kei hi.
Ahang in, eite in lametna i neih theih nadingin eite thuakzawhna le Laisiangtho hansuahnate tungtawnin a beisa huna kigelhte khempeuh eite hong hilh nadinga kigelh ahi hi.
Thuakzawhna le tha hong pia Pasian in Khrist Jesu na zuih bangun note lakah kipumkhatna kha hong pia ta hen.
Tua hileh lunsim khat le kam khat tawh i Topa Jesu Khrist Pasian le Pa na minthangsak thei ding uh hi.
Tua ahi ciangin Pasian na phat theih nadingun Khrist in note hong san bang tektekin note khat le khat na kisang un.
Ahang in, pubulte tungah kamciamsate a kipsak dingin Pasian thutak hangin Khrist, Jew-teb nasempa hong suak hi, cih note kong hilh hi.
Gentile-te in Pasian lainatna hanga amah a minthansak theih nadingin hih bangin kigelh zo hi: “Tua ahi manin Gentile-te lakah nang kong phat ding hi; biakna late sa-in na min ka phat ding hi.,”c
"Gentile-te aw, ama mite tawh kipakkhawm un,"d na ci kik a,
"No Gentile-te khempeuh aw, Topa phat unla, no mite khempeuh aw, lasa in amah phat un,”e na ci leuleu in.
Tua ciangin Isaiah in, “Jesse zungpi hong meng dinga, minamte a uk dingin khat hong khang ding hi; Gentile-te in ama sungah lametna a nei ding uh hi.”f na ci kik leuleu hi.
Khasiangtho vangliatna hangin lametna tawh na kidimlet theih nadingun amah na muan bangun lametna Pasian in lungdamna le lemna tawh note hong dim ta hen.
Ka sanggamte aw, note mahmah hoihna tawh kidimin, theihna kicing nei-in, khat le khat lam kilak dingin na cin uh cih kei mahmah in ka kipsan hi.
Note kiangah hangtakin thumal pawlkhat kong gelh zo hi; tua kong phawkkiksakna-in Pasian hong piak hehpihna hangin
Khasiangtho in Gentile-te a siangthosak Pasian santheih biakna a suah nadingun Gentile-te tungah siampi sepna tawh Pasian lungdamna-thu tangko dinga Khrist Jesu nasem khat ka hi hi.
Tua ahi manin Pasian na ka sepnate ah Khrist Jesu sungah ka minthang hi.
Ka gensate, ka sepsate hanga Gentile-te, Pasian thu a mangsak ding Khrist in kei tungtawn a, a sep khitsate longal bangmah kong gen ngam kei ding hi –
amah in Kha vangliatna tungtawnin lim le nalamdangte, vangliatna tawh a sem hi. Tua ahi ciangin Jerusalem a kipan Illyricum kimkot khempeuh ah Khrist lungdamna-thu ka tangko khin dipdep hi.
Mi khatpeuh bulkip tunga lam ka suah loh nadingin Khrist a kitheih nai lohna munte ah lungdamna-thu va hilh ding ka tup ngitnget ahi hi.
Hih bangin kigelh zaw hi: “Ama thu a kihilh lote in mu ding uh a, a za nai lo mite in a theitel ding uh hi,”g
Tua hangin note kianga kong pai ding a kikhaktan zelzel hi.
Ahi hangin tu-in hih kual tengah ka sep nading mun om nawn lo ahina le note kong muh kal ka ngaklah zawh kum tampi pha ta ahi manin,

Spain a ka pai ciangin no kiang phak dingin ka geel hi. No kiang kong nawk ciangin kong hawh ding le no tawh tawlkhat sung i kikholh khit cianga ka zin nading lam ka manawh ciangin nong huh ding uh ka lamen hi.
Ahi zongin tu tadihin Jerusalem a misiangte nasem dingin tua khua lam ka manawh laitak ahi hi.
Ahang in, Maccedonia le Achaia mite in Jerusalem a misiangte laka mizawngte citpiak a piak ding uh a lungkim uh hi. Amaute in sep ding lungkim uh a, amau tunga a bat uh zong ahi hi.
Ahang in, Gentile-te in Jew-te khalam thuphate tanhpih uh ahileh amau leitung thuphate zong a tanhpih ding uh Jew-te tungah a ba uh hi.
Tua ahi ciangin hih nasep ka zawh khit ciang le amaute in hih gah ngah uh hi, cih ka tel khit ciangin Spain gamah ka pai dinga, tua kawmin no kiangah kong bang ding hi.
Note kiangah kong pai ciangin Khrist thupha a dimtak tawh kong pai ding ka thei hi.
Sanggamte aw, kei ading Pasian kiangah nong thungetsakna uh tawh ka do, nong dopih dingun eite Topa Jesu Khrist itna hang le Kha itna hangin note kong kun hi.
Judea gama om thu um lote khut sung pana ka suahtak theih nading le Jerusalem a ka sep nate tua lai-a om misiangte in hong san theih nadingun thu na ngetsak un.
Tua pen Pasian deihna hangin note kiangah lungdamna tawh hong pai-a note tawh thathak i ngah khawm theih nading ahi hi.
Lemna Pasian note khempeuh tawh om ta hen. Amen.
Cenchrea pawlpi a nasema i sanggamnu Phoebe note tungah apin ka phat hi.
Amah, kei-a kipan mi tampi a huh mahmah khat ahi manin huhna a kisap peuhpeuh na piak ding uh le misiangte hih dinga kilawm bangin amah Topa sungah na san dingun kong thum hi.
Khrist Jesu sunga ka naseppihte Priscillab le Aquila, na hohpihsak un.
Amaute in kei adingin a luang uh a kham ngam khin uh hi. Kei bek hi loin Gentile-te pawlpi khempeuh zong amau tungah a lungdam uh hi.
Amau inn a kikhawm pawlpi teng zong na hopihsak un. Asia gama Khrist ah a kikhel masapen, ka lawm it Epenetus, na hopihsak un.
Note adingin na a sem Mary, na hopihsak un.
Kei tawh thong kiakhawm ka tanau Andronicus le Junias, na hopihsak un. Amaute sawltakpi lakah kikhaituam uh a, tua ciangin amaute Khrist sunga ka om ma-in a na om khinte ahi uh hi.
Topa sunga ka it Ampliatus, na hopihsak un.
Khrist sunga ka naseppih uh Urbanus le ka lawm it Stachys, na hopihsak un.
Khrist sungah kizia-eta, a kisang Apelles, na hopihsak un. Aristobulus bangkua sunga om teng, na hopihsak un.
Ka tanau Herodion, na hopihsak un. Topa sunga om Narcissus bangkua sunga omte, na hopihsak un.
Topa sunga nasep hakat numeite Tryphena le Tryphosa, na hopihsak un. Topa sunga nasep a na hahkat mahmah numei dang khat ka lawm it Persis, na hopihsak un.
Topa sunga teltuamsa Rufus le kei zong nu-a ka neih ama nu zong na hopihsak un.
Asyncritus, Phlegon, Hermes, Patrobas, Hermes le amau tawh a omkhawm sanggamte, na hopihsak un.
Philologus, Julia, Nereus le a sanggamnu, le Olympas le amaute tawh a omkhawm misiangte khempeuh na hopihsak un.
A siangtho kinapna tawh note khat le khat na kihopih un. Khrist pawlpite khempeuh in hong hopih uh hi.
Sanggamte aw, na sansa uh thuhilhna tawh kilehbulh, na lampi uh hong dongkhaksakin na kipawl khen nading uh a bawlte panin na kidawm un, ci-in kong kun hi. Amaute kiang pan na kihemkhia un.
Ahang in, tua bang mite i Topa Khrist nasem hi loin amau ankam lim nading bek a sem ahi uh hi. Amaute in kamzolna le mi maitang phatna tawh mi melmawlte lungsim a khem uh hi.
Mi khempeuh in na thumannate uh a za zo uh hi. Tua ahi ciangin note tungah lungdamna tawh ka kidim hi. Ahi hangin thu hoih lamsangah note na pilvang unla, asia lamsangah mawhpengin na om un.
Lemna Pasian in note khepek nuai-ah Satan a sikpek hak nawn kei ding hi. Eite Topa Jesu hehpihna note tawh om ta hen.
Ka naseppih Timothy in hong ho pihna note hong khak hi. Tua mah bangin ka tanaute, Lucius, Jason le Sosipater-te in zong hong khak uh hi.
Hih laikhak a gelhkhia keimah Tertius in Topa sungah note kong hopih hi.

Hih lai-a om pawlpi bup le keimah in a zindona nuam ka sak uh Gaius in note hong hopihna hong khak hi. Khuapi sung tang nasep ukpa, Erastus le i sanggampa Quartus-te in hong hopihna uh hong khak uh hi.c
Eite Topa Jesu Khrist hehpihna note khempeuh tawh omkhawm ta hen. Amen.
Tu-in khanghun sawtpi sung a kiselcip thuthuk kilaakkhiatna tawh kizui-a ka hilh lungdamna-thu le Jesu Khrist kitangkona tawh note hong kipsak zopa –
tua thuthuk tu-in kilaak khin a, minam khempeuh in um-a a thu a man theih nadingun tawntung Pasian thupiakna tawh kamsangte’ laigelhte tungtawnin kitheisak khin hi –
Jesu Khrist tungtawnin tua a pil Pasian khat bek tungah minthanna om tawntung ta hen. Amen.
Pasian deihna hanga Khrist Jesu sawltakpi khat dinga kisam Paul le i sanggampa Sosthenes in,
Corinth a om Khrist Jesu sunga sianthosaksa Pasian pawlpite le a siangtho dinga sapte, koimah peuh a om amaute le eite Topa – Topa Jesu Khrist min a lote khempeuh tungah:
I Pa Pasian le Topa Jesu Khrist tung pana hehpihna le lemna note tungah om ta hen.
Khrist Jesu sungah note hong piak hehpihna hangin note adingin Pasian tungah lungdam ka ko tawntung hi.
Ahang in, ama sungah note na thugenna uh le na theihna khempeuh uh lam citengah hong kihausak zo hi;
bang hang hiam cih leh Khrist thu teci ka panna uh note sungah kikipsak zo hi.
Tua ahi ciangin eite Topa Jesu Khrist hong kilaak ding lawptaka na ngak kawmun khalam letsong kisap na nei kei uh hi.
I Topa Jesu Khrist ni ciangin kawk na baan loh nadingun amah in a tawp dongin hong thakhauhsak ding hi.
A Tapa i Topa Jesu Khrist tawh kipawlna sunga note hong sampa Pasian a muanhuai hi.
Sangamte aw, note khempeuh khat le khat kithutuakin note lakah kipawl khenna a om loh nading le lungsim le ngaihsutna-a kicingtaka na kigawm theih nadingun i Topa Jesu Khrist minin kong thum hi.
Ka sanggamte aw, Chloe innkuanpihte pawlkhat in note lakah kitotna om ci-in hong zasak zo uh hi.

Ka cihnopna hih ahi hi. Note khat in,”Ken Paul ka zui hia,” adang khat in,”Ken Apolos ka zui hi,” adang khat leuleu in, Ken Cephasa ka zui hi,” adang khat lai in, “Ken Khrist ka zui hi,” na ci ciat uh hi.
Khrist kisehkhen ahi hiam? No adingin Paul kikilhlum ahi hiam? Paul min sungahb note kibaptise na hi uh hiam?
Crispus le Gaius longal note kong baptize khak loh ka nuam mahmah hi.
Tua ahi ciangin kuamah in kei min sungah na kibaptise uh, ci-in a ci thei kei hi.
(Himah hi, Stephanas-te innkuan zong ka baptise lai hi. Tua lo adang ka baptise lam ka phawk kei hi.)

Ahang in, Khrist in baptize dingin hong sawl lo a, lungdamna-thu hilh dingin hong sawl hi. Tua pen mihing pilna kammalte tawh gen ding hilo hi. Hi hileh Khrist singlamteh vangliatna a hawmsuaksak kha ding hi.
Ahang in, a mangthang mite adingin singlamteh thupuak, haina ahi hi. Ahi hangin hong kihonkhia eite adingin Pasian vangliatna ahi hi.
Ahang in, “A pilte pilna ka susia ding hi; a tei mite teina ka hawmsuaksak ding hi,”c ci-in kigelh zo hi.
Mipil koi-ah om hiam? Lai siam koi-ah om hiam? Hih khanghun ah thuguizuih mi koi-ah om hiam? Pasian in leitung pilna, haina suaksak hi lo ahi hiam?
Ahang in, Pasian pilna sungah leitung in ama pilna tungtawnin amah thei lo ahi nungsang a kihilh haihuaina tungtawnin a um mite a hotkhiat ding Pasian lungkimna ahi hi.
Jew-te in lim lamdang ngen uh a, Greek-te in pilna a zong uh hi.
Ahi hangin kote in Jew-te adingin kisuih khakna suang, Gentile-te adingin haina ahi, a kikilhlum Khrist thu ka hilh uh hi.
Ahi hangin Pasian sap Jew-te le Greek-te tungah Khrist, Pasian vangliatna le Pasian pilna ahi hi.
Ahang in, Pasian haina in mihing pilna sangin pilzaw a, Pasian thanemna in mihing hatna sangin thakhauhzaw hi.

Sanggamte aw, note hong kisap lai-in, bang na hi uh hiam, ngaihsun un. Hong sap mite lakah mihing tehnate-a apil na tam kei uh hi; mihing a thuzawh zong na tam kei uh hi; pianpih nampi zong tampi na om kei uh hi.
Ahi hangin Pasian in a pilte a maizumsak nadingin leitunga a hai nate a teel hi; Pasian in a thahatte a maizumsak nadingin leitunga a thanemte a teel hi;
Amah in a om nate a guak suaksak nadingin hih leitung na niamte, a simmawhhuai nate le a om lo nate a teel hi.
Tua pen ama mai-ah kuamah a kisaktheih theih loh nading ahi hi.
Ama hangin eite adinga Pasian tung pana pilna a hong suakpa Khrist Jesu sungah note na om uh a, tua in eite thumaanna, sianthona le tatkhiatna ahi hi.
Tua ahi manin “A kisial peuhmah Topa sungah kisial ta hen,”d ci-in kigelh hi.
Sanggamte aw, note kiangah Pasian thu teci pang dingaa kong pai lai-in dangnalna ahi zongin pilna thupizaw tawh ahi zongin kong pai kei hi.
Ahang in, note tawh ka om khawm sung teng Jesu Khrist le a kikilh lum amah longal bangmah theih ka tum kei bikbek hi.
Note kiangah thanemna, launa le linna tampi tawh kong pai hi.
Ka thupuak le ka thuhilhnate pilna le zolna kammalte tawh hi lo a, Kha vangliatna lahkhiatna tawh hizaw hi.
Tua-in na upna uh mite pilna tungah kinga loin Pasian vangliatna tungah a kingak zawk nading ahi hi.
Ahi ta zongin a picingsate lakah pilna thupuak ka gen uh a, ahi hangin hih khanghun ahikeh bangmah ahi lo ding hih khanghun gam-ukte pilna ahi kei hi.
Hi lo hi, kote in a kiselcip pilna le hun kipat ma-a eite minthan nadinga Pasian sehkholhsa Pasian pilna thusim ka gen uh hi.
Tu khanghun a gam-ukte khat beek in hih thu a theitel kei uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh thei uh hileh minthanna Topa a kilhlum kei ding uh hi.
Ahi zong in: “Amah a itte adingin Pasian bawlkholhsate mitin mu ngei nai lo, bilin za ngei nai lo lungsimin ngaihsun ngei nai lo”b ci-a kigelhsa bang hi a,
ahi hangin Pasian in a Kha in eite tungah hong laak zo hi. Tua Kha in na khempeuh zonga, Pasian thuthukpite nangawn a zongkha hi.
Ahang in, mite lakah mi khat ngaihsutna a thei thei a sunga om mihing kha longal kua ahi hiam? Tua mah tawh kibangin Pasian Kha longal kuamah in Pasian ngaihsutnate a thei thei kei hi.
Pasian in eite man nei lo a hong piak i theihtel theih nadingin leitung kha i ngah kei a, Pasian tung pana Kha i ngah hi.
Kote in ka gen uh hih thu mah ahi hi, mihimc pilna in eite hong hilh kammalte hi lo a, ahi hangin Kha hong hilh kammaltea zangin khalam thutakte khalam kammalte-in ka genkhia zaw uh hi.
Tua Kha a nei lo mite adingin Pasian Kha pana hong pai nate haina suak ahi manin a sang kei uh hi. Ahang in, khalam tawh kikhentel thei bek ahi manin amah in tuate a theitel thei kei hi.
Khami bek in nate khempeuh thu khena, ahi hangin amah kuama thukhena mai-ah a om kei hi.
"Ahang in, Topa a hilh thei dingin kua in ama lungsim thei ahi hiam?”d Ahi hangin eite in Khrist lungsim i nei hi.
Sanggamte aw, khamite kianga gen bangin note kiangah kong gen thei kei hi. Ahi hangin samite – Khrist sunga naupangnote kianga gen bangin kong gen hi.
Note in antak ne zo nai lo na hi manun antak hong pia loin nawizu kong pia hi. Hitakpi hi, tu dongin na ne zo nai kei uh hi.
Note na sami lai uh hi. Note sungah kihazatna le kitotna a om lai nungsang, note sami lai hi lo na hi uh hiam? Note mihing lel banga gamta hi lo na hi uh hiam?
Ahang in, khat in, “Ken Paul ka zui hi,” ci a, adang khat in,”Ken Apolos ka zui hi,” a cih ciangin note mihing lel mah hi lo na hi uh hiam?
Bangbang hi ta leh Apolos bang hi peuhmah hiam? Paul zong bang hi mawk hiam? Amaute tungtawna na up theih nadingun amaute sep dinga Topa in a guat ciat nasemte hi bek uh hi.
Keimah in a ci ka tuh a, Apolos in tui buak hi, ahi hangin Pasian in a khangsak hi.
Tua ahi ciangin a khangsakpa Pasian bek longal a tuhpa ahi-a tui buakpa ahi zongin bangmah ahi kei hi.
A tuhpa le tuibuakpa a tup uh a kibang hi a, a sepna uh tawh kizui-in pahtakman kipia tuak ding hi.
Ahi hangin kote Pasian tawh nasem khawmte ka hi uh a, note Pasian inn Pasian lo na hi uh hi.
Pasian in hong piaksa hehpihna zangin inn lam siampa bangin bulkip khat ka phut zo a, midang khatpeuh in tua tungah a lam hi. Ahi hangin mikim in a lamdan pilvang uh hen.
Ahang in, khat a kiphutsa Jesu Khrist longal bulkip dang peuhmah kuamah in a phut thei kei hi.
Mi khatpeuh in hih bulkip tungah kham, ngun, suang manphate, sing, lopa keu ahikeh buhtu zangin a lam leh,
tua Ni in tua nasep khuavak ah pholak ding ahi manin ama nasep bang ahi hiam cih a kilakkhia ding hi. Mei tawh tua nasep kilakkhia dinga, mei in mikim nasep ahina bangbang a zia-et ciat ding hi.
A lamsate bangmah a cih kei leh ama pahtakman a ngah ding hi.
A kattum leh a sum ding hi; amah bek mah suakta dinga, ahi hangin meikuang laka suakta bang lelin a suakta ding hi.
Note mahmah Pasian biakinnpi hi-in, note sungah Pasian Kha a ten lam thei lo na hi uh hiam?
Pasian biakinnpi siangtho a, note tua biakinnpi na hi manun, mi khatpeuh in Pasian biakinnpi a suksiat leh Pasian in amah a susia ding hi.
No le no kikhem kei un. Note lakah mi khatpeuh in tu khanghun tawh kituaka pil a kisak leh a pil a suah theih nadingin a “hai” suak hen.
Ahang in, hih leitung pilna Pasian mitmuh ah haina ahi hi. “Amah in a pilte amau zuau siamnaa ah a man hi” a cihleh
"Topa in a pilte ngaihsutna a mawkna hi, cih a thei hi”b ci-a kigelh bang ahi hi.
Tua ahi tak ciangin mihingte kisaktheihpih ding ahi nawn kei hi. Na khempeuh no aa hi a,
Paul ahi-a, Apolos ahi-a, Cephasc ahikeh kei tung ahi-a, nuntakna ahi-a, sihna ahi-a, tu hun ahi a, mailam hun ahi zongin – a vekpi-in no aa hi-a,
note Khrist aa hi-in, Khrist Pasian aa ahi hi.
Tua ahi ciangin mite in kote Khrist nasemte le Pasian thusim a kemte bangin hong ngaihsut ding uh ahi hi.
Kep ding a kipiakna mite a muanhuai pelmawh ding uh kisam hi.
Note na hi uh a, leitung thukhen zum khatpeuh ahi zongin kei tungah thu nong khen uh hangin phamawh ka sa kei hi; a taktakin kei le kei nangawn thu ka kikhen kei hi.
Kisuantakna ka nei kei hi, ahi hangin tua in kei mawhpeng hong suaksak tuan lo hi. Kei tunga thukhenpa Topa ahi hi.

Tua ahi ciangin a kisehsa hun a tun matengin bangmah thu na khen kei un; Topa hong pai ding ngak un. Amah in khuamial sunga kiselsimte khuavak ah pusuahkhia dinga, mihing lungtang tupnate a pholakkhia ding hi. Tua hun ciangin mikim in Pasian tung pan phatna a ngah ciat ding uh hi.

Sanggamte aw, tu-in no phattuam nadingin “Akigelhsa khengin pai kei in” cih thu a khiatna kote panin na sin theih zawk nadingun hih thute kei mahmah le Apolos tungah ka bulh hi. Tua hi-a mi khat sangin midang khat na kisaktheihpih zaw kei ding uh hi.
Ahang in, kua in note midang khatpeuh tawh a kibang loin hong bawl ahi hiam? Na ngah loh uh bang nei na hi uh hiam? A ngah na hi uh leh bang hangin a ngah lo bang kekin kisathei na hi uh hiam?
Na deih khempeuh uh na nei khin uh hi! A hau khin na hi uh hi! Kote tawh loin kumpi na suak khin uh hi! Note tawh kumpi ka suahkhawm theih nadingin kumpi suak takpi le uh cin ka ut mahmah hi!

Pasian in ko sawltakpite, kidemna muna mihonpite meizoma thah dinga kimawh paihsa mite tawh kibanga hong koih tawh kibang ka sa hi. Kote, khuavannuai buppi-a om vansawltakte le mihingte etnop lelin hong kinei hi.
Khrist adingin kote a hai ka hi uh a, ahi hangin note Khrist sungah na pil mahmah uh hi! Kote ka thanem uh a, note na thakhauh uh hi! Note hong kipahtawi-a, kote hong kisimmawh hi!
Tu hun laitak mahmah in ka gil uh kialin ka dang uh taka, puansiapi silhin, mi ngongtatna ka thuak uh a, inn loin ka om uh hi.
Ka khut uh tawh nakpi-in na ka sem uh hi. Hong kihamsiat ciangin thupha ka pia uh hi; hong kibawlsiat ciangin ka thuak keikai uh hi.
Hong kigensiat ciangin kamkhumin ka thuk uh hi. Tu hun mahmah ciang dong leitung deih loh leitang tunga ninpathem bang ka suak uh hi.
Hih lai note maizumsak nadinga ka gelh hi loin ka it ka tate banga kong vauhilhna hizaw hi.
Khrist sungah hong kem tulsawm bang na nei zawzen uh zongin pa tampi na nei kei uh hi. Ahang in, lungdamna-thu tungtawnin Khrist Jesu sungah note pa ka suak hi.
Tua ahi manin note in kei nong etteh ding uh kong thum hi.

Hih thu hangin Topa sungah a muanhuai ka it ka tapa Timothy no kiangah kong sawl hi. Amah in mun khempeuh a, pawlpi khempeuh ah ka thu hilh tawh kituaka, Khrist Jesu sunga ka nuntak zia note hong phawksak ding hi.
Note kiangah kei hong pai nawn lo ding bangin note pawlkhat na ki-uangsak uh hi.
Ahi hangin Topa in hong awi leh no kiangah kong pai baih dinga, tua ciangin hih a ki-uangsak mite kampauzia bek hi lo, bang vangliatna nei uh hiam, cih ka mukhia ding hi.
Ahang in, Pasian gam pen genzawh thu hi loin, vangliatna hizaw hi.
Note kiangah satna ciang tawh hong pai ding ka hi hiam? Itna le lungnemna tawh hong paizaw ding ka hi hiam? Bang teelzaw na hi uh hiam?
Note lakah numei-pasal paktatna om a, lawkite lak nangawna a om ngei lo: Mi khat in a pa zi tenpih hi, cih thu hong kithang takpi hi.
Na kisathei laidep uh hi! Na dah mahmah ding uh hizaw a, tua banga gamta mipa na kipawlna panun na puaseh ding uh hi lo ahi hiam?
Ka pumpi in kong om loh hangin kha-in no tawh ka omkhawm hi. Kei om mah tawh kibangin tua bang a hih mite tungah thu ka khen zo hi.
Note i Topa Jesu mina na kikhop uh ciangin kha in note tawh hong omkhawma, i Topa Jesu vangliatna zong a om hi.
