Ama mawhdim pianngeia a kisiat theih nading le Topa ni ciang ama kha a kihotkhiat theih nadingin hih mipa Satan khut ah pia un.
Na kisaktheihna uh a hoih kei hi. Silngo tawnkha in buhnel mekman lom sung teng khempeuh tawkzo cih thei lo na hi uh hiam?
Silngo sawh loh buhnel mekman thak na hi takpi bangun tua mah na suah nadingun silngo lui paimang un. Ahang in, Khrist eite Paisan Tuuno in biakna i pia zo hi.
Tua ahi manin etsatna le tatsiatna silngo lui tawh hi loin, silngo kisawh lo, a taktak le thutak anlumin Pawi bawl ni.
Kong laikhaknasa sungah numei pasal paktatte tawh kipawl loh ding kong gelh zo hi.
Hih leitunga a paktatte, huaiham le sum nesimte ahikeh milim biate ka cihna ahi peuhmah kei hi. Tuate hi hileh hih leitung na nusiat uh kul ding hi.

Ahi hangin amah le amah na sanggam uh ka hi kici napi numei pasal-a paktat ahikeh a huaiham, milim bia khat ahikeh mi gensiat hat khat, zukham khat ahikeh sum nesim khatpeuh tawh na kipawl peuhmah loh nadingun kong gelh ahi hi. Tua bang mi khatpeuh tawh an nangawn na nekhawm kei un.
Pawlpi pua lamate tungah bang nuammawh in thu va khen ding ka hiam? A sunga omte tungah thu na khen ding uh hi lo hiam?
A pua-a omte tungah Pasian in thu a khen ding hi. “Tua tatsiapa note lak pan hawlkhia un”b
Note lakah khatpeuh midang tawh a kisiat leh a thu a khensak dingin misiangte mai a tut tangin pasian-milote mai tun ngam ding uh ahi hiam?
Misiang te in leitung thu khen ding ahilam thei lo na hi uh hiam? Note in leitung thu khen ding na hi uh leh thuneute khen dingin cin buang lo ding na hi uh hiam?
Eite in vansawltakte thu i khen ding thei lo na hi uh hiam? Tua ahileh tu i nuntak sunga nate thu khen zawsem lo ding i hi hiam?
Tua ahi manin tua bang kisiatna na neih uh leh pawlpi sunga a kineu koih mite nangawn thukhen dingin seh lel un!a
Na maizum nadingun hih thu kong gen hi. Thu-umte kikalah thusiate khen ding zaha pilna nei note lakah om buang lo na hi uh hiam?
Ahi hangin tua sangsikin sanggam khat in adang khat thukhente tungah hekin tua nangawn thu um lote tung hi sawnsawn hi!
Tua banga note lakah thusia na kineihna uh no mahmah a guallel dimdemsa na hina uh a kilatna ahi hi. Bang dinga khial tangzaw mai lo na hi uh hiam? Bang dinga mi khemsa hizaw mai lo na hi uh hiam?
Tua sangsikin no le no kikhemin khialhna na bawl uh a, tua pen mah na sanggamte uh tungah na hih uh hi.
Mi tatsiate in Pasian gam a luah loh ding lam thei lo na hi uh hiam? Mi khemsa-in om kei un: Numei pasal paktatte, milim biate, angkawmte, pasal kizuakte, pasal le pasal paktatte,
gutate, duhhopte, zu khamkhamte, mi gensiate, sum ne simte khempeuh in Pasian gam a luah kei ding hi.
Note pawlkhat tua bang na hi uh hi. Ahi hangin i Topa Jesu Khrist min le i Pa Pasian Kha tawh note hong kisawp zo, hong kisiangthosak zoin, dik hong kitangsak zo hi.
Na khempeuh hih ding a kiphal hi – ahi hangin na khempeuh phattuamna a hi kim kei hi. “Kei adingin na khempeuh a kiphal hi” – ahi hangin na khat beek ka ki-uksak nuam kei hi.

An in gilpi ading ahi mah bangin gilpi zong an ading mah ahi hi – ahi hangin Pasian in tuate gel a susia ding hi. Pumpi pen numei pasal paktatna-a zat ding hi loin Topa ading hi-a Topa zong pumpi ading ahi hi.
Pasian in ama vangliatna tawh misi panin Topa thosak-a, eite zong hong thosak ding hi.
Note pumpi Khrist mahmah pumpi nate ahilam thei lo na hi uh hiam? Tua ahileh Khrist pumpi nate la-in a kizuakte tawh gawmkhawm ding ka hi hiam? Ka gawnkhawm ngei peuhmah kei ding hi!
A kizuaknu tawh a kigawmpa tuanu tawh pumpi ah khat suak ahilam thei lo na hi uh hiam? Ahang in, “Tua nihte cikhat sakhat a suak uh hi”b ci hi.
Ahi hangin amahmah Topa tawh a kigawmte kha-in amah tawh khat ahi hi.
Numei pasal paktatna na taisan un. Mihing in a bawl mawhna dangte khempeuh a pumpi pualam hi-a, ahi hangin numei pasal mawhna-a a mawhte ama pumpi tungah a mawh ahi hi.
Note pumpi Pasian tung pana na ngah uh no sunga om Khasiangtho biakinnpi ahilam thei lo na hi uh hiam? Note nomau aa na hi kei uh hi;
note man kipia-a leisa na hi uh hi. Tua ahi manin na pumpi uh tawh Pasian na pahtawi un.
Tu-in lai-a nong gelh uh thute tawh kisai-in pasal in zi nei kei leh a hoih hi.a
Ahi hangin paktatna hihzahta a om nungsang pasal in ama zi, numei in ama pasal ciat a nei tek ding uh hi.
Pasal in a zi tungah nupa hihna a tangcingsak ding hi. Tua mah bangin zi in zong a pasal tungah a tangcingsak ding hi.
Zi pumpi amah kia aa hi loin a pasal aa zong ahi hi. Tua mah bangin pasal pumpi zong amah kia aa hi loin a zi aa zong ahi hi.

Thungen dinga na kipumpiak theih nadingun na kithukimna uh hun tomkha kal simloh kuamah na kideek kei un. Note pumpi na ki-uk zawh lohna uh hanga Satan in hong khem zawh loh nadingin tua bang hun khit ciangin na kigawm kik un.
Hih pen thupiak bang hi loin a hi thei liailiai-a kong gen ahi hi.
Mi khempeuh kei tawh kibang leh ka ut hi. Ahi hangin mikim in Pasian tung panin letsong a tuamtuam nei ciat uh hi. Mi khat in hih letsong ngah a, midang khat in adang khat a ngah hi.
Kitenpih nei nai lote le meigongte tunga ka cihinah amaute in kei bangin tenpih nei kei le uh a hoih hi.
Ahi hangin amau le amau ki-uk zo loin huklua lanlua-a a om uh sangin tenpih neih hoihzaw ahi manin tenpih zaw uh hen.
Tenpih neisate tungah hih thupiak ka pia hi. (Kei piak hi lo, Topa piak): Zi, a pasal tawh kikhen peuhmah kei hen.
Ahi hangin a kikhen leh pasal nei loin om pelmawh hen. Ahikeh a pasal tawh kilemkik hen. Pasal in zong a zi ma peuhmah kei ta hen.
Adangte tungah hih ka gen hi. (Topa hi lo, kei gen): sanggampa khatpeuh in thu um lo mi zi-a a neih a, tuanu amah tawh a omkhawm nop nakleh ma kei hen.
Numei khat in zong thu um lo mi khat pasalin nei a, tuapa amah tawh a omkhawm nop nakleh ma kei hen.

Ahang in, a um lo pasal a zi tungtawnin sianthosaksa hi-a, a um lo zi zong a um a pasal tungtawnin sianthosaksa ahi hi. Tua hi kei leh na tate uh a siang lo hi dinga, ahi hangin tua mah bangin amaute a siangtho uh hi.
Ahi hangin thu um lo mi in a ciahsan leh ciah ta hen. Thu umpa ahikeh thu umnu tua bang thu in a khih kei hi. Pasian in kilema nungta dingin eite hong sapsa ahi hi.
Zi aw, na pasal na hotkhiat theih ding, na hotkhiat theih loh ding bang thei na hi hiam? Ahikeh pasal aw, na zi na hotkhiat theih ding le na hotkhiat theih loh ding bang thei na hi hiam?
Hi tase leh mi khatpeuh in Topa in a nuntak nadinga a sehna le tua dinga Pasian in a sapna kembit ta hen. Hih in pawlpi khempeuh tunga ka piak ngeina ahi hi.
Mi khat a kisap lai-in vunatsa ahi hiam? Amah vunat loh suak kei hen. Mi khat a kisap lai-in vun at loh ahi hiam? Amah in vunat kei hen.
Vunatna bangmah ahi kei hi. Vunat loh zong bangmah a hi tuan kei hi. Pasian thupiakte zuihna bek a thupi ahi hi.
Pasian in a sap laitak huna a om bangbangin mikim om ta hen.
Nang hong kisap laitak sila na hi hiam? Tua kilunghimawhsak kei in. Na suahtakna a ngah thei ding na hi zongin na om ngei bangin om in.
Topa in a sap laitakin sila a om mi, Topa suahtaksak mi hi a; tua mah bangin amah a kisap laitaka suakta mi, Khrist sila ahi hi.
Note man kipia-a leisa na hi uh hi. Mihingte sila na suak kei un.
Sanggamte aw, Pasian tunga hih dinga Pasian in a sapna ah mikim om ciat uh hen.
Tu-in nungak bitte tawh kisai-in: Topa tung pana thupiak ka nei kei hi; ahi hangin Topa lainatna hanga a muantak mi khat bangin thu ka khen hi.
Tu laitaka haksatna hangin na om bangbangua na om ding uh a hoihin ka ngaihsun hi.
Zi na nei ta hiam? Mak sawm kei in. Zi nei nai lo na hi hiam? Zi zong kei in.

Ahi hangin zi na neih khit leh na mawh kei hi, nungak bit khat in pasal a neih leh a mawh kei hi. Ahi hangin kitenpih a nei peuhmah in hih a nuntak sungin lung khamna tampi a tuak ding hi; tua hi-a tua pan in nang kong awngsut nuam hi.
Sanggamte aw, hun tom ta ka cihnopna ahi hi. Tu-a kipan zi neite a nei lo bangin om uh hen.
A kapte a kap lo bangin om uh hen. A lungdamte a lungdam lo bangin om uh hen; na khatpeuh a leite amau ading ahi lo bangin om uh hen.
Leitung na a zangte in uangzat lua kei uh hen. Ahang in, hih leitung tu-a a om bang lah a beibei ta ahi hi.
Lunghimawhna na neih loh ding uh ka deih hi. Zi nei lopa in Topa a lungkimsak theih nadingin Topa nate mah a lung himawhpih hi.
Ahi hangin zi neipa in a zi bangci lungkimsak ding cihna-in hih leitung nate lunghimawh a,

ama lung lutnate a kikhenthang hi. Pasal a nei lo numei ahikeh nungak bit in Topa nate a lunghimawh hi; tuanu tupna, a pumpi le a kha Topa tungah a pumpiak ding ahi hi. Ahi hangin pasal neisa numei in ahileh a pasal a lungkimsak thei ding cihna-in hih leitung nate a lunghimawh hi.
Note hoih nadingin hih thu kong gen hi; note kong ukcip nopna hi loin Topa tungah thumaana ki-apna bukimin na nuntak theih nading uh hizaw hi.

Mi khatpeuh in nungak bit khat a dot manin a kilawm loin gamta-in a kingaih sut-a, ahi hangin tuanu kulta-in nialna a neih kei-a, a lawmpa in tenpih loh theih lohin a ngaihsut leh ama lungkimna bangin tenpih ta hen. Amah a mawh kei hi. Amaute kiteng uh hen.
Ahi hangin tuapa in hi lo thei lo ahi man hi loin ama lungsim ah tenpih loh dingin kizo a, tua nungak bit tenpih loh nadingin a lungsim a khentat leh hih mipa a mana gamta ahi hi.
Tua ahi ciangin nungak bit a tenpihpa thumaana gamta ahi hi. Ahi hangin a tenpih lopa a hoihzaw a gamta ahi hi. b
Numei, a pasal nuntak sung teng a pasal ah kikhih hi. Ahi zongin a pasal a sih leh a deih peuhpeuh tenpih thei hi. Ahi hangin a lawmpa Topa aa hi pelmawh ding hi.
Kei khentatna ah tuanu a tuaci-in om leh a lungnuam zaw ding hi. Tua hi-a kei zong Pasian Kha nei-in ka kingaihsun hi.
Tu-in milim thoihna an tawh kisai-in: Eite khempeuh in theihna i neih lam i thei tek hi.a Theihna in mi kisatheisak a, itna in a khansuah hi.
Ka thei hi ci-a a kingaihsun mi in ama theih ding zah a thei nai kei hi.
Ahi hangin Pasian a it mi Pasian in a thei hi.
Tua tak ciangin milim thoihna an nekna thu panin milim pen, leitung ah bangmah a hi lopi hi-a Pasian khat longal adang om lo cih i thei hi.
Ahang in, vantung ahi-a leitung ahi zongin pasian a kicite om taleh zong (“pasiante” tampi le “topate” tampi om takpi hi.)

eite adingin Pasian khat bek om a, amah Pa hi-in, na khempeuh amah panin pianga eite ama adingin i nungta hi; tua ciangin Topa khat bek om a, amah Jesu Khrist ahi hi; ama tungtawnin na khempeuh pianga, ama tungtawnin eite i nungta hi.

Ahi hangin mi khempeuh in hih thu a thei kim kei hi. Mi pawlkhatte milim biak zongsang khin lua uh ahi manin tua bang ante a nek uh ciangin milim thoihna-a kizangsa ci-a ngaihsunsa-in a ne uh hi. Amau kitheihna lungsim thanem ahi manin a buah a suak uh hi.
Ahi hangin an in Pasian tawh hong kinaisak tuan kei hi. I nek loh hangin i siazaw tuan kei a, i nek hangin zong i hoihzaw tuan kei hi.
Bangbang ahi zongin na suahtakna uh na zatna uhah a thanemte adingin kimuktukna a suah loh nadingin kidawm un.
Ahang in a kitheihna lungsim thanem mi khatpeuh in theihna a nei nang milim biakna inn sungah an na nek hong mu leh milim thoihna-a kipiate a nek ding uh maingal kha lo ding uh ahi hiam?
Tua ciangin ama adinga Khrist a si, a thanem sanggampa nang theihna in a siasak ahi hi.
Hih bangin na sanggamte uh tunga na mawh uh a, a thanem amau kitheihna lungsim na liamsak beh uh ciangin Khrist tunga mawh na hi uh hi.
Tua ahi manin ka annek in mawhna sungah ka sang gampa a puksak leh amah ka puksak loh nadingin sa ka ne nawn peuhmah kei ding hi.
Kei suakta hi lo ka hi hiam? Sawltakpi khat hi lo ka hi hiam? I Topa Jesu mu khin hi lo ka hi hiam? Topa sunga ka nasepna gah note hi lo na hi uh hiam?
Adangte tungah sawltakpi ka hi kei kha zongin note adingin ka hi taktak hi! Ahang in, Topa sungah sawltakpi ka hina ciamtehna, note na hi uh hi.
Kei tunga thukhena tute tungah ka kihutna hih ahi hi.
A ne a dawn dingin thuneihna nei lo ka hi uh hiam?
Sawltakpi dangte Topa sanggamte le Cephasa-te bangin thu um mi zi neih theihna thuneihna nei lo ka hi uh hiam?
Ahikeh kivakna nasem ding Barnabas le kei bek ka hi uh hiam?
Ama sum zanga galkap na a sem kua ahi hiam? Lenggui suan napi lenggah ne lo kua ahi hiam? Ganhon khawi napi a nawi dawn lo kua ahi hiam?
Mihing muhna lel ah hih thu a gen ka hi hiam? Thukham in zong tua mah gen hi lo ahi hiam?
Ahang in, Moses thukham sungah “Bawngtal in buh a cil laitakin a muk hencip kei in”b ci-in kigelh hi. Pasian lunghimawh bawngtalte ahi hiam?

Amah in eite adingin hih thu gen takpi hi lo ahi hiam? Himah hi, eite adinga kigelh ahi hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh lokhopa in lo a khawh a, ancilpa in an a cil ciangin a gah ngah ding lamena a sep ding mah ahi hi.
Kote in note lakah khalam khaici vawhin note pan leitung nate ka at uh val lua ahi hiam?

Midangte in note panin hih huhna thuneihna ngah uh ahileh kote in a tamzaw san ngah lo ding ka hi uh hiam? Ahi hangin hih thuneihna ka zang kei uh hi. Tua tangin Khrist lungdamna-thu a khaktan ka suah loh nadingun na khempeuh ka thuak zaw uh hi.
Biakinnpi sunga nasemte in biakinnpi panin an ngah uh a, biakna-tau a nasemte in biakna-tau tunga kiluite a ngah lam thei lo na hi uh hiam?
Tua mah tawh kibangin Topa in: Lungdamna-thu a hilhte in, lungdamna-thu panin kivakna a ngah ding uh hi, ci-in thu a pia hi.
Ahi hangin hih thuneihnate khat beek ka zang kei uh hi. Kei adingin tua bang nong hih ding uh lamenin lai hong khak ka hi kei hi. Mi khatpeuh in hih kisialhna hong suhkhiat sangin ka si zaw ding hi.
Tua hi napi hih teitei dinga phut ka hi manin lungdamna-thu ka hilh ciangin ka kisial thei kei hi. Lungdamna-thu ka hilh kei leh gimna ka thuak hi!
Keima utthu-a hilh ka hileh pahtakman ka nei hi. Keima utthu-a hilh ka hi kei leh muanga sep dinga hong kipia a semkhia bek ka hi hi.
Tua hileh ka pahtakman ding bang ahi hiam? Lungdamna thu ka hilhna ah ka thuneihna zang lo a, man nei loin ka piak theih nading bek mah ahi hi.
Kei suakta-in kuama aa ka hi lo hangin mi a tam theithei ka ngah zawh nadingin mi khempeuh sila ka kisuaksak hi.
Jew-te ngah nadingin Jew-te tungah Jew-te bang ka suak hi. Thukham nuai-a omte ka ngah theih nadingin(kei mahmah thukham nuai-ah om lo napi) thukham nuai-a omte khat bangin ka om hi.
Thukham nei lote ka ngah zawh nadingin (Pasian thukham pan suakta hi loin Khrist thukham nuai-ah omzaw in)thukham nei lote kiangah thukham nei lote khat bangin ka om hi.
A thanemte ka ngah theih nadingin a thanemte kiangah a thanem ka suak hi. Mi pawlkhat ka hotkhiat theih nadingin a hih theihna lamlam ah mi khempeuh tungah na khempeuh ka suak hi.
Lungdamna thuphate ah tanh ka neih theih nadingin lungdamna-thu hangin hihte khempeuh ka sem hi.
Tai kidemna ah a taite khempeuh tai uh a, ahi hangin khat bek in pahtakman a san lam thei lo na hi uh hiam? Pahtakman na san theih nading lam lamun tai un.
Kidemna-a kihel dingte peuhmah nakpitakin a kisin uh hi. Amaute a kisia thei lukhu ngah dingin a kidem uh hi. Ahi hangin eite in a kisia thei lo ding lukhu ngah dingin i kidem hi.
Tua ahi manin tupna mel a nei lo mite a tai bangun ka tai kei hi. Huih lak a tum mi bangin ka do kei uh hi.
Tua bang lel bek hi loin midangte tungah thu ka hilh khit ciangin pahtakman sang dingin ka cinlah phing loh nadingin ka pumpi tumin sila in ka bawl hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh sanggamte aw, i pu i pate meiipi nuai-ah omin amaute khempeuh tuipi sung tawna a paisuakna thu na theih loh ding uh ka deih kei hi.
Amaute khempeuh Moses sungah meii le tuipi-in a kibaptise uh hi.
Amaute khempeuh in khalam an a kibang ne uh a,
khalam dawn a kibang a dawn uh hi; ahang in, amaute a tonpih khalam Suangpi panin dawn uh a, tua Suangpi Khrist ahi hi.
Ahi hangin amaute a tamzaw tungah Pasian lungkim lo a, amaute pumpi gamlakah a kithehthang hi.
Amaute bangin a gilo nate lunggulhin i om loh nadingin eite etteha dinga hihte a tungkhol ahi hi.
"Tua mite a ne a dawn dingin tusuk uh a, lawkite noptatna haihuai sunga bual dingin a dingto uh hi.”b ci-a kigelhsa amaute pawlkhat bangin milim biate suak kei ni.
Amaute pawlkhat in numei pasal paktatna a bawlna uh hangin ni khatin tul sawmnih le tulthum si uh hi – eite in tua bang mawhna bawl kei ni.
Amaute pawlkhat in Topa zia-et uh a, gul in a tuklup bangin eite in i Topa zia-et kei ni.
Amaute pawlkhat phun uh a, a thatgam thei vansawltak in amaute a thah bangin eite phun kei ni.
Amaute tungah hih thute etteh dingin na pianga, khanghunte a bukimna hong tunna, eite kivauhilh nadingin a kigelh hi.
Tua ahi ciangin kiptakin dinga na kingaihsut leh na puk loh nadingin kidawm in!

Note in mihingte tuah ngei zia-etna longal na tuak kei uh hi. Pasian a muanhuai hi; na thuak zawh loh ding zahval zia-etna hong tungsak kei ding hi. Ahi hangin note hong kizia-et ciangin na thuakzawh nadingun suahtakna lampi hong bawlsak ding hi.
Tua ahi manin ka lawm itte aw, milim biakna na taisan un.
Thu ngaihsun thei mite kianga thugen ka hi hi. Ka thugente nomau mahmah adingin na khentel un.
Eite in lungdam i koh tua lungdamkohna hai in, Khrist sisan a i kihelna hi lo ahi hiam? Eite in i balkhap anlum zong Khrist pumpi-a i kihelna mah hi lo ahi hiam?
Bang hang hiam cih leh anlum khat om a, lum khat panin ne tek i hi manin a tampi eite pum khat i hi hi.
Israel mite ngaihsun dih un: kithoihna sa a nete in biaknatau ah kihelna nei uh hi lo ahi hiam?
Tua ahileh milim tunga kipia kithoihna na khatpeuh ahi zongin, milim ahi zongin thupi hi, ka cihnopna ahi hiam?
Hilo hi. Ahi hangin lawkite kithoihna pen dawite tungah thoihna-a kipia hi-a, Pasian tunga kipia ahi kei hi. Tua hi-a dawite tawh na kikop khawm ding uh ka deih kei hi.
Topa hai dawnin dawite hai zong na dawn khawm thei kei ding uh hi. Topa sabuai le dawite sabuai ah a nihin na umkhawm thei kei ding uh hi.
Eite in Topa hazatna sosak dingin hanciam i hi hiam? Eite amah sangin thahat zaw i hi hiam?
Na khempeuh hih ding a kiphal hi. Ahi hangin na khempeuh phattuamna ahi kim kei hi. Na khempeuh hih ding a kiphal hi – ahi hangin na khempeuh in a hoihsak kim kei hi.
Kuamah in ama hoih nading bek zong loin midangte hoih nading zong zaw hen.
Na kitheihna lungsim dong loin sa zuakna-a kizuak sa khatpeuh na ne in.
Ahang in, “Leitung le a sunga om khempeuh Topa aa ahi hi.”c
Thu um lo mi khatpeuh in an ne dingin hong sapa na va hawh nop leh na kitheihna lungsim dong loin na mai-a kilui peuhpeuh ne in.
Ahi hangin mi khatpeuh in, “Hih in kithoihna-a kipia sa ahi hi,” hong cih leh tua hong genpa hang le na lungsim kisuantakna hangin ne kei in.d
Nang aa hi lo midang lungsim kitheihna gen ka hi hi. Ahang in, bang hangin kei suahtakna, midangte lungsim kisuantakna in thu kikhen ding ahi hiam?
Lungdamtaka tua an ka nek leh bang hanga na khatpeuh tungtanga Pasian tung lungdam ka kohna hangin kei hong kimawhsak ahi hiam?
Tua ahi ciangin na ne, na dawn uh zongin na hihna peuhpeuhuah na hihna khempeuh uh Topa minthan nadingin na hih un.
Jew-te le Greek-te ahikeh Pasian pawlpi khat peuhpeuh ahi zongin kimuktusak kei unla,
lam khempeuh ah mi khempeuh lungkimsak ka sawm bangin na hih un. Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute a kihotkhiat theih nadingin keimah kia hoih nading zong loin mi tampi hoih nading ka zong hi.
Keimah in Khrist ka etteh bangin kei hong etteh un.
Na khempeuh ah kei nong phawk gige man uh leh kong piaksawn hilhnatea bang tektekin lenkipa na sep manun note kong phat hi.
Tu-in pasalte khempeuh lutang Khrist hi-a, numei lutang pasal hi-in, Khrist lutang Pasian ahilam na theihtel ding uh ka deih hi.
Pasal peuhmah in thu a ngen a, thu a gen zongin a lutang a khuh leh a lutang simmawh ahi hi.
Tua mah bangin numei peuhmah in thu a ngen a, thu a gen zongin a lutang a khuh kei leh a lutang simmawh ahi hi – tua pen a sam a metmai tawh kibang tektek hi.
Numei in a lutang a khuh kei leh a sam a tan ding hi Numei adingin sam tan ahikeh sam metmai a zumhuai ding leh a lutang a khuh ding hi.
Pasal pen Pasian lim le a minthanna ahi nungsang a lutang a khuh kei ding hi.b Ahi hangin numei pen pasal minthanna ahi hi.
Ahang in, numei pana pasal kibawl hi loin, numei pen pasal pan hizaw hi.
Numei adingin pasal kibawl hi lo a, pasal adingin numei kibawl hizaw hi.
Hih thu hang le vansawltakte hangin numei in a lutang tungah thu a kineihna lim a neih ding kilawm hi.
Bangbang ahi zongin Topa sungah pasal loin numei a tangdin kei a, numei loin pasal a tangdin tuan kei hi.
Ahang in, pasal panin numei a kibawl bangin pasal zong numei pana suak ahi hi. Ahi hangin na khempeuh Pasian pana piang ahi hi.
No le no in khentel un: Numei in a lutang khuh loin Pasian tungah thu a nget ding a kilawm hiam?
A pianzia mahmah in zong pasal a sam a sau leh zumhuai-a,
ahi hangin numei a sam a sau leh ama minthanna ahi hi, ci-in hong hilh hi lo ka hi hiam? Ahang in, samsau pen numei lutang khuh nadinga kipia ahi hi.
Hih thu tawh kisai-in mi khatpeuh a selkhah nop leh eite in zat ngeina adang i nei kei a, Pasian pawlpite in zong a nei kei uh hi.
Na kikhopnate un hoihna sangin siatna piangsak zaw ahi manin a nuai-a kong lahte ah note kong phat kei hi:
A masa penin pawlpi hina tawh note na kikhop uh ciangin note lakah kipawl khenna om cih ka za a, upna ciang zong ka nei hi.
Note lakah kuate Pasian san hiam, cih a kilat nadingin ngaihsutna kibang lo zong a om ding mah ahi hi.
Note na kikhop uh cianga na nek pen uh Topa nitak-an ahi kei hi.
Ahang in, na nek uh ciangin kuamah kingak loin na ne tek pah uh hi. Khat gilkialin om a, adang khat in zu a kham hi.

Na nek na dawn nading uh inn nei lo na hi uh hiam? Ahikeh Pasian pawlpi simmawhin bangmah a nei lote zahlaaksak na hi uh hiam? Note kiangah bang kong gen ding hiam? Hih thu hangin note kong phat ding hiam! Kong phat peuhmah kei hi!
Ahang in, note kong piaksawn pen Topa tung pana ka ngah ahi hi: Topa Jesu a kilehhek ni zanin anlum la a,
lungdam a koh khit ciangin balkham a, “Hih in note adinga kipia ka pumpi ahi hi, kei nong phawk nadingun na hih un,” a ci hi.
Tua mah bangin nitak-an a nek khit uh ciangin hai la a, “Hih hai in ka sisana thukhunna thak ahi hi. Na dawn simun kei nong phawk nadingun na hih un,” a ci hi.
Ahang in, hih anlum ne a, hih hai na dawn simun Topa sihna ama hong pai dong a tangko na hi uh hi.
Tua ahi manin a kilawm loin anlum ne a, Topa hai a dawn peuhmah Topa pumpi le ama sisan tungah a mawh hi.
Mi khatpeuh in anlum a nek ma le hai a dawn ma-in amah a kisittel ding kisam hi.
Ahang in, Topa pumpi theician lopi-a, a ne a dawn mi peuhmah ama tungah thukhenna a tun nadingin a ne a dawn ahi hi.
Tua thu hangin note lakah tampi zawngkhalin cina uh a, mi tampi a ihmu zo uh hi.
Ahi hangin eite, ei le ei thu i kikhen khit leh thukhenna i thuak kei ding hi.
Topa in eite thu hong khen ciangin leitung tawh hong kimawhpaih khawm loh nadingin eite hong sekna ahi hi.
Tua ahi tak ciangin sanggamte aw, a ne dinga na kikhop uh ciangin khat le khat na kingak un.
Na kikhopna un thukhenna hong tut loh nadingin a gilkial khatpeuh a om leh a inn ah ne ta hen. Tua banah kong pai ciangin thudangte kong lak lai ding hi.
Sangamte aw, tu-in khalam letsongte thu na theih loh ding uh ka deih kei hi.
Note lawki na hih lai-un, a pau thei lo milimte lamah midangte thuzawh le pimangin na om lam uh na thei uh hi.
Tua ahi manin Pasian Kha pansana thugen mi peuhmah in, “Jesu kihamsiat hen” ci thei lo a, Khasiangtho pansan longal kuamah in, “Jesu in Topa hi,” a ci thei kei hi, cih kong gen hi.
Letsong a tuamtuam a om hangin Kha a kibang ahi hi.
Nasepna a tuamtuam a om hangin Topa a kibang hi.
Sepsakna nam tuamtuam a om hangin mi khempeuh sungah tua Pasian mah in a sem hi.
Tu-in mi khempeuh i hoihkim nading mikim tungah Kha kilatkhiatna kipia ciat hi.
Mi khat tungah Kha tungtawnin pilna thupuak kipia hi. Midang khat tungah tua Kha mah in theihna thupuak,
midang khat tungah a kibang Kha in upna kipia a, tua Kha khat mah in cina damsakna letsongte,

midang khat tungah nalam dang bawl theihna vangte, midang khat tungah thu magen theihna, midang khat tungah khate khentel theihna, midang khat tungah pau nam tuamtuama pau theihna, midang khat lai tungah paute khiat theihnab kipia hi.
Hihte khempeuh a kibang Kha khat nasep hi-a, amah in a sehsa bangin amaute a pia ciat hi.
Pumpi in na tampi tawh kibawl hi napi pumkhat ahi hi. A nate tampi ahi hangin pumpi khat a piangsak uh hi. Khrist zong tua mah bang ahi hi.
Ahang in, eite Jew-te i hi-a, Greek-te i hi zongin sila i hi-a, sila lo i hi zongin Kha khat inc pumpi khat sungah i vekpi-in hong baptise a, eite i vekpi in i dawn ding Kha khat mah hong kipia hi.
Na khat bek tawh pumpi kibawl hi loin na tampi tawh kibawl ahi hi.
Khe in,”Khut hi lo ka hi manin pumpi aa ka hi kei hi,” cileh tua a cihna lel tawh pumpi na a hina a bei tuan kei hi.
Tua ciangin bil in, “Kei mit hilo ka hi manin pumpi aa ka hi kei hi,” cileh tua a cihna lel tawh pumpi aa a hihna a bei tuan kei hi.
Pumpi a vekpi in mittang khat hi mawk leh khuazak theih nading koi-ah om ding ahi hiam? Pumpi a vekpi-in bil khat hi mawk leh a gimnam zak theih nading koi-ah om ding ahi hiam?
Ahi hangin Pasian in amaute, ama deihna bang tektekin pumpi tungah a guang kim hi.
Amaute khempeuh pumpi na khat bek hileh pumpi koi-ah om ding ahi hiam?
Tu in ahileh pumpi na tampi om a, ahi hangin pumpi khat ahi hi.
Mit in khut kiangah,”Nang kong kisam kei hi,” a ci thei kei hi. Lutang in zong khepek kiangah, “Nang kong kisam kei hi,” a ci thei kei hi.
Tua sangsikin pumpi na a gina lo hileh a kilawmte a kisampente hizaw hi.
Tua hi-a i thupisim loh pumpi nate i nak pahtawite hi thei zaw hi. A kithusim tham lo pumpi nate nakpi-in dop kulzaw hi.
I thusimzawk pumpi nate, tua banga limbawl tuan a kul kei hi. Ahi hangin Pasian in pumpi nate ki-awhsaka a kisamzaw pumpi nate tungah nakpitakin pahtawina pia-in,
pumpi sungah tua bangin kituam khenna om loin, a nate khat le khat a kibanga a kithusim tuah ciat nading uh ahi hi.
Khat in a thuak leh adang khempeuh in a thuakpih hi. A nate khat a kipahtawi leh adang khempeuh in a lungdampih uh hi.
Tu-in note Khrist pumpi na hi uh a, a pumpi nate na hikim uh hi.

Tua hi-a Pasian pawlpi sungah a masapenin Pasian in sawltakpite, a nihna-in kamsangte, a thumna ah lai hilhte, tua ciangin nalamdang bawlte, cina damsak theihna letsong ngahte, midang a huh theite, ki-ukna letsong ngahte le pau nam tuam tuam a paute zong a seh hi.
Mi khempeuh sawltakpi ahi uh hiam? Mi khempeuh kamsangte ahi uh hiam? Mi khempeuh lai hilhte ahi uh hiam? Mi khempeuh in nalamdangte a bawl uh hiam?
Mi khempeuh in cina damsakna letsong a nei uh hiam? Mi khempeuh pauted in a pau uh hiam? Mi khempeuh in a khiatna a gen uh hiam?
Ahi hangin letsong lianzawte lawpin na lunggulh zaw un.e
Mihingte pau le vansawltakte pau-ina ka pau theih hangin itna ka neih kei leh zam ahikeh daltuah ging bang lel ka hi hi.
Thugentheihna letsong nei-in thuthuk khempeuh le theihna khempeuh thei-in mual a kinsak zo upna ka neih hangin itna ka neih kei leh a mawkna ka hi hi.
Ka neihsa khempeuh mizawngte pia-in ka pumpi mei-a halb dingin ka pumpiak hangin itna ka neih kei leh bangmah ka lawhtak kei hi.
Itna lungduai a, itna a migi hi. Eng loin a kisial kei a, a kisathei kei hi.
Gamhtat loin ama angsung ding bek zong lo a, heh baih loin gamtatkhialhnate a ciamteh kei hi.
Itna in gitlohna pakta lo a, ahi hangin thutak ah a lungdam hi.
Itna in hu tawntungin, muang dena; lamen den in, a tawntungin a thuak keikai hi.
Itna a bei ngei kei hi. Kamsanga thugennate a om hangin a bei ding hi; paute a om hangin a dai ding hi; theihna a om hangin a beimang ding hi.
Ahang in, eite in a kim loin i thei a, a kim loin thu i gen hi.
Ahi hangin kicinna hong tun ciangin kicinlohna a maimang ding hi.
Naupang ka hi laitakin naupang bangin ka pau hi; naupang bangin ka ngaihsun a, naupang bangin ka khaikak hi. Ka khan khit ciangin naupang vaite ka nusia hi.

Tu-in limlang ah ahi milmial a muh bangin i muh hangin tua hun ciangin kimaituahin i mu ding hi. Tu-in a kim loin ka thei hi; tua hun ciangin a kicinga kei hong kitheih khit bangin a kicingin ka thei ding hi.
Tu-in upna, lametna le itna hih thumte a om den hi. Ahi hangin hih thumte lakah itna a lianpen hi.
Itna lampi tawnin khalam letsongte lawptakin na lunggulh un; adiakdiakin kamsanga thu gentheihna letsong na deih un.
Ahang in, pau khata a thugente mi tawh kiho hi loin Pasian tawh kiho ahi hi. A taktakin kuamah in amah a theitel kei hi; ama khab tawh thuthukte a gen ahi hi.
Kam sanga thugente peuhmah in, amaute tha khauhsak ding, hanthawn ding le hehnem dingin mihing tungah thu a gen hi.
Pautuam khata thugente ama phattuam nading hi-a; kam sanga thugente in pawlpi a phatuamsak hi.

Note khempeuh pautec zangin thugen thei hi le uh cin ka ut hi. Ahi hangin kam sanga thugen thei hi le uhcin ka utzaw lai hi. Pauted zanga thugen mi in pawlpi phattuam nadingin a thugen a khiatna a gen kei leh amah sangin kam sanga thugenpa a lianzaw hi.

Tu-in sanggamte aw, note kiangah hong pai-in paute zanga thu ka gen hangin kilaakna ahi a, theihna ahi zongin, kamsanga thugenna ahi a, thuhilhna kammal ahi zongin kong puak kei leh no adingin ka phattuamna bang om ahi hiam?
Nuntakna nei lo a ging thei bek nate nangawn: tamngai ahi zongin, harp ahi zongin, a bite ah khentelna om loin kiteltaka a gin kei leh bang aw in kitum hiam, cih kua in bangci theih ding ahi hiam?
Tua banah pengkul kiteltakin ging lo-a, a cihnopna a kitheih kei leh galsim dingin kua kithawi ding ahi hiam?
Note zong tua mah bang na hi uh hi. Na leii uh tawh a kitheithei kammalte na gen loh ngalun, kua in na thugen uh thei ding ahi hiam? Note huih laka thugen na suak lel ding uh hi.
Leitungah pau nam khempeuh a om takpi hi-a, ahi hangin khiatna nei lo khat beek a om kei hi.
Tua ahileh mi khatpeuh thugen bang a cihnopna hiam, cih ka theihtel theih kei leh tua thugenpa adingin gamdang mi ka suak a, kei adingin amah gamdang mi a suak hi.
Note zong tua mah bang na hi uh hi. Note in khalam letsongte neih ding lawp na hih nungsangun pawlpi a khangsak a ginazaw letsongte neih ding na hanciam un.
Hih thu hangin pautuam khat zanga thugen mi in, a thugen a khiatna a theih nadingin ngen ta hen.
Ahang in, pautuam khat zanga thu ka nget leh ka kha-in thu ka ngen a, ahi hangin ka lungsim in gah a gah kei hi.
Tua ahileh bang ka cih ding hiam? Ka kha-in thu ka ngen dinga ka lungsimin zong thu ka ngen ding hi. Ka kha-in la ka sa dinga ka lungsimin zong la ka sa ding hi.
Na kha-in Pasian na phat leh amaute lakah na thugen, a theitel lo-a kitheitee in na lungdamkohna-a na gen a theih loh nungsang bangci-in “Ámen” ci thei ding ahi hiam?
Nang pen lungdam a ko takpi na hi kha ding hi. Ahi hangin midangte a phatuamsak tuan kei hi.
Note khempeuh sangin paute zanga thu ka gen theih zawk manin Pasian tungah ka lungdam hi.
Ahi hangin midangte lamlak dingin pawlpi sungah pautuam khat zangin kammal tulsawm ka gen sangin a kithei kammal nga ka genzaw ding hi.
Sanggamte aw, naupang banga na ngaihsutnate uh tawp ta un. Gitlohna lamah naungeekte hi un; ahi hangin lungsim ngaihsutna lamah a khang hamsate na hi un.

Thukham sungah: “Pau theih loh mite tungtawn le gamdang mite muk tungtawnin hih mite tungah thu ka gen dinga ahi hangin tua ciang nangawnin amaute in ka thu a ngai kei ding uh hi, Topa in ci hi,”f ci-in kigelh hi.
Tua ahi ciangin paute pen a umte ading hi loin a um lote adingin lim ahi hi. Kamsanga thugenna ahileh a um lote ading hi loin a umte ading ahi hi.

Tua ahi ciangin pawlpi mite a vekun hong kikhawmin, a vekun paute zangin pau le uh, a theitelg nai lo pawlkhat ahi zongin, a um lo mi pawlkhat ahi zongin hong lut leh note mihai hong sa lo ding uh ahi hiam?
Ahi hangin mi khempeuh in kamsangin thu a gen laitakin a um lote ahi zongin, a theitelh nai lote ahi zongin va lut leh amah mimawh ahilam mi khempeuh in phawksakin thu khen ding uh a,
tua ciangin a lungtang sunga thusimte a kilang ding hi. Tua ciangin kiko-in,” Note lakah Pasian om takpi hi!” ci-in bokin Pasian a bia ding hi.

Tua ahileh sanggamte aw, bang gen ding i hi hiam? Na kikhop uh ciangin biakna la hiam, lamlahna hiam, kilaakna hiam, pautuam khat hiam, a khiatna genna hiam, khat ciat na nei tek uh hi. Hihte khempeuh pawlpi thahatsak nadinga zat pelmawh ding ahi hi.
Mi khatpeuh in pautuam khat a zat leh nih ahikeh a tampen thum in genin, khatkhatin kigenkhelin khat peuhmah in kam a phen pelmawh kul ding hi.
Kamphen ding a om kei leh biakinn sungah thugenpa daitakin om henla amah le Pasian tungah thu gen hen.
Kamsangte nih ahikeh thum in thu genin adangte in a thugen limtakin khaikak uh hen.
A tu mite khatpeuh tungah kilaakna a tun leh thugen masa pen khawl hen.
Ahang in, mi khempeuh lam kilakin a kihanthawn ahi theih nadingin note khempeuh in kikhelin thu na gen thei uh hi.
Kamsangte’ khate kamsangte ukna nuai-ah a om hi.
Ahang in, Pasian pen buaina Pasian hi loin lemna Pasian ahi hi. Misiangte kikhopna khempeuh bangin
pawlpi sungah zong numeite dai dide-in om uh hen. Amaute pau ding a kiphal kei hi; ahi hangin Thukham in a gen bangin amaute ukna nuai-ah om uh hen.
Amaute in thu khatpeuh a kan nop uh leh a inn ah a pasalte uh dong uh hen. Ahang in, numeite adingin pawlpi sunga thugen zumhuai hi.
Pasian thu note pana kipankhia ahi hiam? Ahikeh Pasian thu tunna note bek na hi uh hiam?
Mi khatpeuh, kamsangpa khat ahikeh khalam letsong nei mi khatin a kingaihsut leh note kianga kong gelhte Topa thupiakin sang ta hen.
Amah in hih thu a thusim keileh amah a kithusima kei ding hi.i
Tua ahi manin ka sanggamte aw, kamsanga thugen ding na lawp unla, paute a thugen ding zong na kham kei un.
Ahi hangin na khempeuh a kilawm a kituaka hih ding ahi hi.
Sanggamte aw, tu-in note in na sansa uh le dinmuna na neihsa uh kong hilh lungdamna-thu kong phawksak kik nuam hi.
Note kianga kong hilhsa thu kiptaka na let nak uh leh hih lungdamna-thu pansanin hotkhiat na hi ding uh hi. Tua hi kei leh a mawkna-a um na hi uh hi.
Ahang in, a thupia masa penin ka sansa kong piaksawn ahi: Laisiangtho gen bangin eite mawhna adingin Khrist si a,
amah kivui-in, Laisiangtho gen bangin a nithum ni-in tho kika,
Peterb kiangah kilangin tua khit ciangin Sawm-le-nihte kiangah a kilang hi.
Tua khit ciangin hun kibangin sanggam zanga sanga tamzawte kiangah a kilang hi. Amaute pawlkhat a ihmut khit uh hangin a tamzaw a nungta lai uh hi.
Tua ciangin James tungah kilang a, tua khit ciangin sawltakpite khempeuh kiang le
a nunung penin mi suah ngei banga suak lo kei tungah zong hong kilang hi.
Ahang in, sawltakpite lakah kei a neupen ka hi-a, Pasian pawlpi bawlsia ka hi manin sawltakpi cih ding nangawnin ka kilawm kei hi.

Ahi hangin Pasian hehpihna hangin ka hi bangbang ka hi-a, kei tungah ama hehpihna a mawkna-in a bei kei hi. A bei kei takpi hi, amaute khempeuh sangin na ka nak sepzaw a, tua nangawn kei sep hi loin kei tawh a omkhawm Pasian hehpihna sep ahi hi.
Tua ahi ciangin kei ka hi-a, amaute ahi zongin ka hilh uh thu hih thu hi-a, note up zong hih thu mah ahi hi.
Ahi hangin misi panin Khrist kithosak hi, ci-in kihilh ahileh bangci bangin note pawlkhat in misi thawhkikna om lo hi, ci thei ahi hiam?
Misi thawhkikna om lo hileh Khrist nangawn kithosak lo hi ding hi.
Khrist tho kik lo hileh kote thuhilhna kimanna nei lo hi dinga note upna zong kimanna nei lo hi ding hi.

Tua tham loin Pasian in Khrist misi pan thosak hi, cih thu teci ka pan manun kote Pasian thu ah zuau teci pang hong suaksak ding hi. Ahi hangin misi kithokiksak lo takpi hileh Pasian in amah a thokiksak lo hi ding hi.
Ahang in, misi kithokiksak lo hileh Khrist zong a kithokiksak nai lo lai hi ding hi.
Tua hi-a, Khrist kithokiksak lo hileh na upna uh a mawkna hi-a na mawhnate uh sungah a om lai na hi ding uh hi.
Tua ciangin Jesu sunga a ihmu masate zong a mangthang ahi ding uh hi.
Tu i nuntak sunga ding bekin Khrist sunga lametna nei i hileh mi khempeuh sangin a hehpih huaizaw i hi ding hi.
Ahi hangin misi pan Khrist kithokiksak zo takpi-a a ihmusate lak pan gahmasa ahi hi.
Ahang in, mi khat tungtawnin sihna hong tun mah bangin misi thawhkikna zong mi khat mah tungtawnin hong tung hi.
Ahang in, Adam sungah mi khempeuh a sih bangin Khrist sungah mi khempeuh a kinungtasak ding hi.
Ahi hangin mi khempeuh amau hun ciat hi ding uh hi. A gahmasa Khrist ahi hi; tua ciangin ama hong pai ciangin ama mite a tho kik ding uh hi.
Tua ciangin amah in ukna thuneihna le vangliatna khempeuh a suksiat khit, Pa Pasian tungah kumpi-gam a piakkhiat ciangin beina a tung ding hi.
Ahang in, amah in a galte khempeuh a khepek nuai-ah a koih mateng a uk ding hi.
A kisusia ding gal nunung pen sihna ahi hi.
Ahang in, amah in, “A khepek nuai-ah na khempeuh koih zo hi”c Ama nuai-ah “Na khempeuh” a cih ciangin Khrist nuai-ah na khempeuh a koihpa Pasian a gen khak loh lam kitel hi.
Amah in hih a sep khit ciangin Pasian pen na khempeuh ah na khempeuh ahi theih nadingin ama nuai-ah na khempeuh a koihnapa Tapa mahmah zong ama nuai-ah a koih ding hi.
Tua hi-a thawhkikna om lo hileh misi adinga kibaptise-te in bang hih ding uh ahi hiam? Misi kithosak lo hileh bang hanga amaute adingin mite kibaptise uh ahi hiam?
Kote adingin bang dinga a nai simin ko le ko kilausak ka hi uh hiam?
Sanggamte aw, nisimin ka si hi – ka cih pen i Topa Khrist Jesu sungah note kong minthanpih bang tektek hi, ka cihnopna ahi hi.
Mihing ngaihsutnate hang lelin Ephesus a gamsa gilote tawh ka kilai leh bang lawhtak ka hi hiam? Misi kithosak lo ahileh, “Zing cianga si ding i hi manin ne-in dawn lel ni”d
Mi khemsa-in om kei un: Kikholhpih hoih lo in tatzia hoih siasak hi.”
Note ahi ding bangin kiphawk kik unla, mawh nawn kei un; Pasian phawk lo pawlkhat om na hi manun na maizum nadingun hih thu kong gen hi.
Ahi hangin mi pawlkhat in, “Misite bang kici thawhkiksak hiam? Amaute bangci pumpi hong hi ding hiam?” ci-in dong thei kha ding hi.
Haihuai na zen e! Na tuh pen a sih phot kei leh a hing thei kei hi.
Na tuh ciangin a kungpi ding pen na suan kei hi; mangbuh ci ahikeh adang khatpeuh na tuh hi.
Ahi hangin Pasian in ama geelsa bangin kung guana, khaici nam tekah amau kung ciat a guan hi.
Sa khempeuh a kibang kim kei hi. Mihing in sa nam khat i nei hi. Gamsate in atuam, vasate in atuam, ngasate in atuam a nei hi.
Van pumpite zong om-a lei pumpite zong a om hi; ahi hangin van pumpite a thupina nam khat hi a, lei pumpite a thupina a namtuam khat ahi hi.
Ni in thupina nam khat nei a, kha in adang khat nei-in, aksite in zong adang khatmah a nei uh hi. Aksi ciatciat zong a thupina a kibang kei hi.
Misite thawhkikna zong tua tawh a kibang ding hi. A kituh pumpi a sia thei ahi hi. A sia thei loin a kithokiksak hi;
a simmawh huai-in kituh a, minthanna in kithokiksak hi. A thanemin kituh a, a vanglianin kithokiksak hi;
pianpih pumpi-in kituh a, kha pumpi in kithokiksak hi. Pianpih pumpi om ahileh kha pumpi zong a om hi.
Tua ahi ciangin “Mi masa Adam, a nungta mi suak hi.”e ci-in kigelh hi. A nunung Adam, nuntakna a pia kha ahi hi.
Ahi hangin khalam a om masa kei a, pianngei om masa-in tua khit ciangin khalam a om pan hi.
Mi masapen leitang vui tawh kibawl hi a, a nihna mi vantung pan ahi hi.
Lei mipa bangin lei mite a om uh hi. Vantung pana mipa bangin vantung a te a om uh hi.
Lei mipa tawh kibatna i neih bangin eitef in vantung pana mipa tawh kibatna i nei ding hi.
Sanggamte aw, si le sa in Pasian gam a luah thei kei hi, a kisia thei na in a kisia thei lo na a luah thei kei hi, cih note tungah kong pulak hi.
Ngai un, thuthuk khat kong gen ding hi: Eite khempeuh i ihmu kim kei ding hi.

Ahi hangin a nunung pengkul a mut ciangin thakhat thu mitphiat khat sungin i vekpi-in i kikhel ding hi. Ahang in, pengkul hong ging dinga, misite a sia thei lo dingin kithosak dinga eite i kikhel ding hi.
Ahang in, a siatheite in siat theihlohna silhin, a si theite in sihtheihlohna a silh ding hi.
A sia theite in siat theihlohna silh-a a si theite in sih theihlohna a silh ciangin: “Gualzawhna sungah sihna kivalhtum zo hi.”g
"Sihna aw, na gualzawhna koi-ah om hiam! Sihna aw, na gu koi-ah om hiam?”h ci-a kigelh thu a tung ding hi.
Sihna gu in mawhna hi-a mawhna vangliatna in thukham ahi hi.
Ahi hangin Pasian tungah lungdamna om ta hen! Amah in eite Topa Jesu Khrist tungtawnin gualzawhna hong pia hi.

Tua ahi manin kong it sanggamte aw, kiptakin ding un. Bangmah kilokzosak kei un. Topa sungah na nasepna uh a mawkna ahi loh lam thei na hi uh ciangin Topa nasem dingin nomau mahmah na kipum piak tawntung un.
Tu-in Pasian mite ading kaihkhopna thu: Galatia pawlpite hih dinga ka gen bangin na hih un.
Kong pai cianga kaihkhop a kul nawn lo dingin nipi kalkhat a ni masapen simin na sum ngahzah uh tawh kizui-in sehkhia ciat unla, na koih un.
Kong tun ciangin no hoihsak mite thu ka pulakna lai ka gelh dinga, na letsongte uh tawh Jerusalem ah amaute ka puasak ding hi.
Kei zong ka va pai ding a kul leh amaute ka tonpih ding hi.
Macedonia gam tawna pai ding ka hi manin Macedonia ka nawk khit ciangin no kiangah kong pai ding hi.
Note kiangah tomkha sung bang kong taam thei kha ding hi. Ahi kei leh ka paina peuhpeuha ka khualzinna nong huh theih nadingun phalbi sung nangawn ka taam kha ding hi.
Tu laitakin ban pak ding bek ka ut kei hi. Topa in hong phal leh no kiangah tawmvei sung kong taam ding ka lamen hi.
Ahi hangin Pentecost ni dong Ephesus ah ka taam ding hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh kei adingin a lawhcin huai nasep theihna kong lianpi khat hong kihon zo hi. Ahi zongin kei hong langpan tampi a om hi.
Timothy hong pai leh no kiangah a om sung bangmah a kihtak loh nadingin na bilpil un. Ahang in, amah zong keimah banga Topa na a sem den ahi hi.
Tua ahi ciangin amah san ding kuamah in nial kei hen. Kei kiangah hong ciah kik theih nadingin a khualzinna ah lungmuangtakin na kha un. Amah sanggamte tawh hong tonkhawm dingin ka lamen hi.
I sanggampa Apolos tawh kisai-in: Sanggamte tawh no kiangah pai dingin nakpitakin ka kun hi. Tu-in hong pai nop het loh hangin hun hoih a neih peuhpeuh ciangin hong pai ding hi.
Note kikem un, upna-ah kiptakin ding un; pasal hangte hi un, thahat un.
Na khempeuh itna tawh sem un.
Stephanas-te innkuan Achaia ah a piangthak masapente hi uh a, amaute mahmah zong misiangte nasepna ah a kipumpiak zo mahmah uh ahilam na thei uh hi.
Sanggamte aw, hih bang mite le amau naseppihte khempeuh le tua lai-a nasem mite tungah na kiniamkhiat ding uh kong thum hi.
Stephanas, Fortunatus le Achaicus-te hong tun uh ciangin ka nuam hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh note tung pan a kisam laiteng amaute in hong puak uh hi.
Ahang in, amaute in kei lungsim le no aa zong hong thakhauhsak uh hi. Tua bang mite a phawktak hi.
Asia gam sunga pawlpite in hong hopih uh hi. Aquila le Priscillaa te in Topa sungah lungsimtak tawh hong hopih uh a, amau inn a kikhawm pawlpi mite in zong hong hopih uh hi.
Hih lai-a om sanggamte khempeuh in zong hong hopih uh hi. Kinapna siangtho tawh khat le khat na kihopih un.
Keimah Paul in hih hopihna keima khut tekteka ka gelh ahi hi.
Mi khatpeuh in Topa a it kei leh hamsiatna thuak ta hen. Topa aw, hong pai ta in!b
Topa Jesu hehpihna note tawh om ta hen.
Khrist Jesu sunga om note khempeuh tawh ka itna om ta hen. Amen.c
Pasian deihna hanga Khrist Jesu sawltakpi Paul le i sanggampa Timothy in, Corinth a Pasian pawlpi tung le Achaia gam sung tenga misiangte khempeuh tungah:
I Pa Pasian le Topa Jesu Khrist tung pana hehpihna le lemna no tungah om ta hen.
Eite Topa Jesu Pasian le Pa, khuatuahna Pa le hehnepna khempeuh Pasian kiphat ta hen.
Pasian tung pana ka ngah uh hehnepna tawh gim thuakte ka hehnep theih nadingun amah in kote ka gim thuakna khempeuh panun hong hehnem hi.
Ahang in, kote nuntakna sunga hong luang Khrist thuaknate bang tektekin Khrist tungtawna hong pai kote hehnepna a dimlet hi.
Kote ka lungdon uh leh note hehnepna le hotkhiat nading ahi hi; kote hong kihehnem leh tua in kote thuak bangbang na thuak zawh nading uh note thuakzawhhatna hong guan hehnepna ahi hi.
Ko thuakte bang tektek na thuakna uh le kote hehnepna na ngah manun note adinga ka lametna uh a kip hi.
Sanggamte aw, Asia gama ka thuak uh haksatnate thu theihsak lo-a na om ding uh ka deih kei hi. Nuntakna nangawn khahsuah nading zahin kote thuak zawhzah valin hong kinehcih hi.
Hitakpi hi, ka lungsimun sihna thu khenna a thuak khinin ka kingaihsun uh hi. Ahi zongin ko le ko kimuang loin misite a thosak Pasian ka muan nadingun hih thu a piang ahi hi.
Amah in kote tua banga lauhuai sihtheihna panin hong hukhia khin a, hong hukhia lai ding hi. Na thungetna uh tawh nong huhna uh hangin amah in hong hukhia lai ding ci-in amah ka lamen uh hi.
Tua ciangin mi tampite thungetna dawnga, hehpih angvanna ko tungah hong kipia ahi manin kotea tangin mi tampite in lungdamna a ko kik ding uh hi.

Kote kisialhna hih ahi hi: Leitunga ka gamtatnate uh le a diakdiakin note tawh i kizopna thu ah kote ngaihsutna zang loin Pasian tung pana sianthona le cihtakpina tawh ka gamtatna uh ka lungsim kitheihna un teci a pang hi. Kote in leitung pilna tawh kizui-in hih loin Pasian hehpihna tawh kizui-in tua bangin ka hih uh hi.
Ahang in, note in na sim theih loh ding uh le na theihtel loh dingun bangmah kong gelh kei uh hi.

Tua ciangin note in kote a kim lo-a nong theihsa uh bangin Topa Jesu ni ciangin kote in note kong kisialhpih ding bangun note in zong kote hong kisialhpih thei ding ci-in a cingtaka na theihtel takpi ding uh ka lamen hi.
Hih mah ka muan manin nihvei na hamphat theih nadingun note kianga hawh masak dingin ka geel hi.
Macedonia a ka pai kawmin no kiangah hong hawhin, Macedonia pan kong ciah ciangin hong bang leuleu lenga, Judea ka manawh ciangin hong kha le uhcin ci-in ka geel hi.
Hici-a ka geel ciangin baihtaka geelziau ka hi hiam? Ahikeh lei mite hih bangin, Hihi, hihi,” le “Hikei, hikei,” cih a thuah lel ka hi hiam?
Ahi hangin Pasian a muanhuai takpi bangin kote in note tunga kong thupuak uh, “Hihi,” le “Hikei,” a hikhawm kei hi.
Ahang in, note lakah kei le Silasb le Timothy in kong hilh uh Pasian Tapa Jesu Khrist thu ah, “Hihi” le “Hikei,” cih a hikhawm kei hi. Ahi hangin ama sungah, “Hihi,” cih a hiden hi.
Ahang in, Pasian in bangzah ta in thuciam a bawl khin zongin tuate Khrist sungah,"Hihi," cih ahi khin hi. Tua ahi ciangin ama tungtawnin Pasian minthan nadingin eite in, “Amen,” i ci hi.
Tu-in Khrist sungah note le kote kiptaka hong ding khawmsakpa Pasian ahi hi.
Amah in eite sathau hong nilh zo a, ama hong neihna seal eite tungah hong khenin, hong tung ding ciamna-in khamkholhna ama Kha eite lungsungah hong koihsak hi.
Corinth ah kong kileh kik lohna note kong dopna ahilam ka teci ding Pasian ka ko hi.
Note upna tunga kiliansak hi loin, note na upna hangun kiptaka ding na hi manun, na lungnop nadingun no tawh a semkhawm ka hizaw hi.
Tua ciangin note a dahsaka kong hawh nawn loh nadingin ka lungsim ka khensat hi.
Ahang in, note hong dahsak leng kong dahsak note longal kei hong nuamsak ding kua dang om ahi hiam?
Kong pai ciangin kei hong lungnuamsak dinga kilawmte in hong lungkhamsak loh nadingin hih bangin lai kong gelh hi. Kei lungnopna hong lungnoppih dingin note khempeuh tungah muanna ka nei hi.
Ahang in, note kong lungkhamsak nopna hi loin kong itna athukzia kong theihsak nopna-in lungdonna lianpi, lungsung natna le khitui tampi tawh lai hong gelh ka hizaw hi.
Ka uanggenna hi loin mi khatpeuh in lungkhamna a piansak leh note khempeuh hong lungkhamsakna zahin kei hong lungkhamsak lua kei hi.
Mi a tamzawte in ama tungah gawtna a piak uh ama adingin kicing khin hi.
Tu-in ahileh tua sangsikin amah a khengvala dahna in a vukcip loh nadingin maisakin na hehnep zawk ding uh kisam hi.
Tua ahi manin amah na itna uh kipsak kik dingin note kong kun hi.
Lai kong gelhna pen note in zia-etna thuak zo-in na khempeuh ah na thumang uh hiam, cih kong zia-etna ahi hi.
Note in mi khatpeuh na maisak uh leh kei zong amah ka maisak hi. A mawhna ka maisak khitin maisak ding dang a om lai leh note tangin Khrist muhna ah
Satan in eite hong nopneh loh nadingin amah ka maisak hi. Ahang in, ama hong sawmnate i haih kei hi.
Troas ah Khrist lungdamna-thu gen dingin ka pai lai-in Topa in kei ading kong khat hong honsak hi, cih thei napi,
tua lai-ah ka sanggampa Titus mu lo ka hi manin ka lung a nuam kei lailai hi. Tua ciangin amaute mangpha ka khaka, Macedonia ah ka paisuak hi.
Ahi zongin Khrist hanga gualzawhna ah hong makaih den kote tungtawna ama theihna namtui mun khempeuh ah a kizelsakpa Pasian tungah lungdamna om ta hen.
Ahang in, a kihonkhiate le a mangthangte lakah kote, Pasian tungah gimnamtui ka hi uh hi.
Khat tungah sihna gimnam ka hi uh a, adang khat tungah nuntakna gimnamtui ka hi uh hi. Tua bang nasem dingin kua kicing ahi hiam?
Mi tampite tawh kibang loin met nadingin Pasian thu ka thangbawl kei uh hi. Tua sangsikin Pasian kiang pana kisawl mite bangin Pasian mai-ah cihtakna tawh Khrist sungah thu ka gen uh hi.
Kote, ko le ko kiphat kik dinga kipan ka hi uh hiam? Ahikeh mi pawlkhatte bangin note tungah ahikeh note tung panin panpihna laite kisam ka hi uh hiam?
Note mahmah kote lungtang tunga kigelhsa, mi khempeuh in thei-a a sim uh lai na hi uh hi.

Note Khrist tung pana lai na hi uh a, kote nasep gah, laitui tawh kigelh hi lo, a nungta Pasian Kha tawh a kigelh, suangpekte tungah hi lo, mihing lungtang pekte tunga kigelh lai na hina uh na lak uh hi.
Khrist tungtawnin kote in Pasian mai-ah tua zahta kimuanna ka nei uh hi.
Na khatpeuh ko pana piang hi, ci-a ngaihsun dingin ko mahmah in kicinna ka nei kei uh hi. Kote kicinna Pasian tung pan hizaw hi.
Amah in kote lai-a gelh hi loin Kha in thukhun thak nasemte bangin hong kicingsak zo hi. Ahang in, lai gelh in that a, ahi hangin Kha in nuntakna a pia hi.
Tu-in sihna hong tun nasepna, tua suang tunga kigelhkuak laimalte a mual thei minthanna hi napi-in Israel-te in Moses maitang tangtaka a et theihloh zah a, minthanna tawh hong tung ahileh
Kha nasepna minthang zawtham lo ding ahi hiam?
Mihingte a mawhpaih nasepna minthang ahileh thumaanna hong tun nasepna nak minthan zaw ngel ve!
Ahang in, a minthang ngeisa in a minthang zaw tham tawh tehin tu-in minthanna a nei nawn kei hi,
A mual thei nangawn minthanna tawh hong tung ahileh a om den minthanna bangzahin a lianzaw tham tam!
Tua ahi manin tua bang lametna ka neih khit nungsangun ka hang mahmah uh hi.
Kote ka hi uh leh a maitanga a vangtannate a mual hiaihiai lam Israel-te in a muh loh nadinga a maitang puan a khuhpa Moses bang ka hi kei uh hi
Ahi hangin amaute lungsim kimawlsaka tuni dongin thukhun lui a kisim ciangin tua khuhna puan mah a om lai hi. Khrist tungtawnin kilakhia thei bek ahi manin a kihawkkhiatsak nai kei lai hi.
Tuni dong nangawnin Moses laite a kisim ciangin khuhna puan in amaute lungtang a khuh lai hi.
Ahi hangin mi khatpeuh Topa lamah a kihei peupeuh ciangin khuhna puan a kihawkkhia ahi hi.
Tua Topa pen tua Kha hi-a, Topa Kha a omna ah suahtakna a om hi.
Maitang kikhuh lo-a Topa minthanna a tang sawnsaka kote pen Kha ahi Topa tung pana hong tung, a lian semsem minthanna tawh amah bang dingin hong kibawlpha den hi.
Tua ahi manin kote in Pasian lainatna tungtawna hih nasep ka neih khit nungsangun ka lungkia kei uh hi.

Tua sangin a simtham le a zumhuai-a gamtatnate ka tawpsan uh hi. Khem bawlnate zang loin Pasian thu zong ka lehkaih kei uh hi. Tua sangsikin tua thutak teltakin ka pholak uh a, Pasian mitmuh ah mi khempeuh lungsim tawh kituakin ka om zaw uh hi.
Tua ciangin ko gen lungdamna-thu a kikhuh leh zong a mangtangte adinga kikhuh hi lel hi.
Pasian lim a hipa Khrist minthanna lungdamna-thu khuavak a muh theih loh nadingun a um lote lungsim mit hih khanghun pasian in a tawsak hi.
Ahang in, kote in ko thu ka gen kei uh a, Jesu Khrist Topa a hina le Jesu hanga note nasem ka hina uh ka genzaw uh hi.
Ahang in, “Khuamial lak panin khuavak tang hen,”a a cipa Pasian in Khrist maitang a om Pasian minthanna, tua theihna khuavak hong piak nadingin kote lungsim sungah khuavak hong tangsak hi.
Ahi hangin na khempeuh sanga lianzaw, a vangliatna kote tung pan hi lo Pasian tung pan a hina a kilat nadingin hih gou, leibeelte sungah ka nei uh hi.
Kote ka kimkot panun nakpi-in hong kinehcih hangin netkhapin ka om kei uh hi; amkhamin ka om uh hangin lung mangin ka om kei uh hi;
bawlsiatin ka om uh hangin taihsatin ka om kei uh hi; hong kisattuk hangin hong kisusia kei hi.
Kote pum tungah Jesu nuntakna zong a kilaak theih nadingin kote pumpi ah Jesu sihna ka pua kawikawi uh hi.
Ahang in, a si thei kote pumpi tungah ama nuntakna a kilat theih nadingin a nungta kote, Jesu hanga si dingin piakkhiatsa in ka om tawntung uh hi.
Tua ahi tak ciangin kote sungah sihna in na sem a, ahi hangin note sungah nuntakna in na a sem hi.
"Ka um hi; tua ahi manin ka gen zo hi”b ci-in kigelh zo hi. Tua upna kha mah tawh kote in zong ka um uh a, tua ahi manin ka gen uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh misi pana Topa Jesu a thosakpa in Jesu tawh kote hong thosak khawm dinga, ama omna ah kote tawh note hong tunkhawm ding hi, cih ka thei uh hi.
Hihte khempeuh note phattuam nading hi-a, mi a tam semsemte kianga tung, tua hehpihna in Pasian minthan nading lungdamkohna a dimlet a piansak theih nading ahi hi.
Tua ahi manin ka lungkia kei uh hi. Ka pualam uh a kiamkiam hangin ka sunglam uh a ni a ni-in hong kithak suaksak hi.
Ahang in, a cihtak lo le hun tomno sunga ka thuak uh lungkhamnate in tuate khempeuh a khup tawntung minthanna kote hong ngahsak hi.
Tua ahi ciangin a kimu theite mitsuan loin a kimu thei lote ka mitsuanzaw uh hi. Ahang in, a kimu theite tomkha kal sung bek om a, a kimu thei lo pen ahileh a om tawntung ahi hi.
Tu-in eite tenna leibuk a kisiat leh mihing khut tawh kibawl lo, Pasian bawlsa tawntung inn khat vantungah i neih lam i thei hi.
Tu laitakin vantunga ten nading hong kisilhsak ding lunggulhin i thum i tau hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh eite hong kisilhsak ciangin guaktangin i om kei ding hi;

ahang in, eite hih buk sungah i om laitakin hong kigimsaka i tau hi; tua pen silh loh ding i ut man hi loin i vantung tenna hong kisilhsak ding i ut man le a sithei pen nuntakna in a valh ding i ut man hizaw hi.
Tua hi-a hih ding mah a eite hong bawl Pasian in hong tung ding khamkholhna-in Kha hong piakhol zo hi.
Tua ahi manin eite muangtakin i om den a, i pumpi-a i om laitengin Topa kiang tawh i kigamlat lam lah i thei hi.
Eite muhna tawh nungta loin upna tawh i nungta hi.
Eite lungmuangtakin i om a, pumpi nusia-in Topa tawh inn a omkhawm ding i utzaw lai hi, ka ci hi.
Tua hi-a i pumpi inn ah i om a, i om kei zongin amah i lungdamsak ding i tuppi pen ahi hi.

Ahang in, eite khempeuh Khrist thukhenna tokhom mai-ah i ding pelmawh ding hi. Tua ciangin mi khempeuh in asia ahi zongin apha ahi zongin, pumpi-a a om sunga a hihsate hangin amau ngah dinga kituakte a sang ding uh hi.

Tua ahi ciangin kote in Topa kihtakzia ding thei ka hi manun mite zol ding ka hahkat uh hi. Kote ka hi bangun Pasian mai-ah a kiteltakin ka kilang uh a, tua pen mah note in zong na lungsim uh tawh na theihtel ding uh ka lamen hi.
Lung sunga om pen hi lo, a kimu thei pen a kisaktheihpihte na dawn theih nadingun note tungah hong kisial kik ka hi kei uh a, kote nong kisaktheihpih nadingun hun hoih hong bawlsak ka hizaw uh hi.
Kote ka hai uh leh Pasian hang ahi hi; ka hai kei uh leh note ading ahi hi.
Ahang in, mi khempeuh adingin mi khat si-a, tua ahi manin mi khempeuh si hi, cih taksang takpi ka hi manun Khrist itna in kote hong sawl teitei hi.
Tua hi-a ama hangin a nungtate amau adingin nungta nawn loin amau adingin si-a, a tho kiksakpa adingin a nuntak theih nadingun amah mi khempeuh tangin a si hi.
Tua ahi ciangin tu-a kipan kote in leitung mite muh bangin kuamah ka mu kei uh hi. Khatvei lai-in hih bangin Khrist ka na mu uh a, tu-in ka mu nawn kei uh hi.
Tua ahi ciangin mi khatpeuh Khrist ah a om leh amah piansak thak ahi hi; alui pen beimanga, athak a tung zo hi!
Hihte khempeuh Khrist tungtawna kote amah tawh hong kilemkiksaka kilemna nasep hong piapa Pasian tung pan ahi hi:
Pasian in Khrist tungtawnin leitung amah tawh kilemsaka, mihingte mawhna amaute mawhna-in a simsak kei hi. Tua hi-a, tua kilemkiksakna thupuak kote hong kemsak hi.
Tua ahi manin kote tungtawnin Pasian in hih ngetna hong bawl bangin kote Khrist palaite ka hi uh hi. Kote in Khrist tangin: Pasian tawh kilemkik un, ci-in kong thum uh hi.
Eite ama tungtawnin Pasian thumaanna i suah theih nadingin Pasian in mawhna a nei lo amah eite adingin mawhnaa a suaksak hi.
Pasian tawh na semkhawm ka hi uh bangin Pasian hehpihna kimanna a nei lo-a ngah na suah loh nadingun kong thum uh hi.
“Kong angvan hunin note kong za a, hotkhiatna ni-in note kong huh hi,”a ci hi. Pasian angvan hun tuhun hi-a, hotkhiatna ni tuni ahi hi, cih kong gen hi.
Kote nasep a kiminsiatsak loh nadingin kuama lamlai-ah kimuktuk nading ka koih kei uh hi.
Pasian nasemte ka hi mah bangun lam khempeuh ah ko le ko a phathuai-in ka kilangsakzaw uh a: bawlsiatna thuakna ah; lungmanna ah, haksatna le lungdonna ah;
satnate ah, koltanna le ngongtatna ah; naham sepna, zana ihmut theihlohna le gilkialna ah;
siangthona, theihtelna, lungduaina le migitna ah; Khasiangtho le it takpina in;
thutaka genna le Pasian vangliatna tawh; veilam le taklama thumaanna galhiam tawh;
minthanna le simmawhna lakah, siatgenna le phatgenna lakah; a taktak hi napi a khema kingawhna bangin,
kithei napi a kithei lo bangin; sidekdek napi ka nungta uh hi; hong kisatgawp napi hong kithat liang lo a;
dah napi ka lungnuam tawntung uh a; zawng napi mi tampi ka hausak uh a; bangmah nei lo napi, na khempeuh ka nei uh hi.
Corinth-te aw, note kiangah siit nei loin thu kong gen uh a, ka lungtang uh zapi kong hon uh hi.
Kote in note tungah ngaihna ka kidaam het kei uh a, kote tungah note na kidaam zaw uh hi.
Ko aa bangin a kilawma nong thukna-un note in zong na lungtang uh zapi in hong hon un, ci-in tate tunga thugen bangin kong gen uh hi.
Thu um lote tawh hakkol na zawng khawm kei un. Ahang in, thumaanna le gitlohna in bang kikop khawm ahi hiam? Ahikeh khuamial le khuavak in bang kipawl khawmna nei thei ahi hiam?
Khrist le Belialb kikal ah bang kithutuahna om ahi hiam? A umte le a um lote in bang neikhawm ahi hiam?

Pasian biakinnpi le milimte kikal ah bang kithukimna om ahi hiam? Ahang in, eite a nungta Pasian biakinnpi i hi hi. Pasian in: "Amaute tawh ka teng dinga amaute lakah gamtangin, amaute Pasian ka hi dinga amaute keima mi ahi ding uh hi,”c
"Tua ahi manin amaute lak panin paikhia unla, a tuamin om un. Topa in ci hi. A siang lo peumah lawng kei le uhcin note kong sang ding hi.”d
"Keimah note Pa ka hi dinga, note ka tanu ka tapate na hi ding uh hi. Thahatpen Topa in ci hi.”e a cihsa ahi hi.
Kong it lawmte aw, hih kamciamte i neih khit nungsang, pumpi le kha a buahsakte khempeuh panin ei le ei kisiangthosakin Pasian zahtakna tawh siangthona ah bukimin om ni.
Note lungtang sungah kote mun hong awn un. Kote kuama tungah ka khial kei uh a, kuamah siasak loin, kuamah ka zawhthawhbawl kei uh hi.
Note mawhpaih nadinga hih thu hong gen ka hi kei hi. Note tawh sihkhawm ahi zongin nuntak khawm nading zah dongin kote lungsim sungah note na teng uh hi, cih kong genkhol khin zo hi.
Note kong muang mahmah hi; note kong kisaktheihpih mahmah hi. Keimah nakpi-in kihan thawnin, kote lungmanna khempeuh ah ka lungnopna uh a dimlet hi.
Ahang in, kote Macedonia a kong lut lai-un hih ka pumpi uh a tawlnga ngei kei hi. Ahi hangin kote kiheina peuhpeuh ah pualam ah kidona, sunglam ah launate ka tuak den uh hi.
Ahi hangin a kinengniamte a hehnempa Pasian in, Titus hong tunna tawh hong hehnemin,

ama hong tunna hang bek hi loin note in amah na hehnemna hang uh zong ahi hi. Amah in kote kiangah kei nong lunggulh uh, na dahluatna uh, kei nong lunghi mawh luatna uh thute hong gena ka lungnopna a lianzaw sem hi.
Lai kong khak hanga note hong dahsak ka hileh zong ka kisik kei hi. Ka kisik ta zongin kong laikhak in na lungsim uh a natsak lam ka thei a, ahi hangin tomcik sung bek ahi hi.
Note kong dahsak hang hi loin, na dahna un note hong kisiksakna hangin tu-in ka lung a dam hi. Ahang in, Pasian geel banga dah na hi uh hi; banglam banglam ah kote hong natsak hi lo hi.
Pasian lama dahna in hotkhiatna a tun kisikna piangsak a, a kisuanlah huai kei hi. Ahi hangin leitung dahna in sihna a tun hi.

En dih un hih Pasian lama dahna in note sungah bang cihtakna, no le no kihahsiang nop nading bang lawpna, bang ngaihdahna, bang patauhna, bang lunggulhna, bang lunghi mawhna, amaana thukhen ding a tunsak lam mu un. Hih thu tawh kisai-in bangmah peuhah na mawhpen' lam uh na kiciansak zo uh hi.

Tua hi-a note kiangah ken kong gelh ta zongin a khiala gamtapa hang hi lo a, a thuakte pawl hang zong ahi tuan kei hi, ahi hangin kote tungah note na kipiak zawhna uh nomau le nomau in Pasian mai-ah na muh theih nading uh hizaw hi.
Hihte khempeuh hangin kote hong kihanthawn hi. Kote hong kihanthawn banah note khempeuh hanga Titus in lungsim thathak a ngah mana a lungdam luatna ka muh uh ciangin ka nuam diak uh hi.

Ama tungah note kong kisaktheihpih a, tua thu ah nong zahlaksak kei uh hi. Ahi hangin note tunga kong gente khempeuh uh a maan ahi bangin Titus tunga note kong kisaktheihpihna uh zong a maanna hong lak hi.
Note khempeuh in a thu mangin lau le ling kawmin amah na san uh, a ngaihsut kik ciangin amah in note hong itna a lian semsem hi.
Note tungah muanna a kim kong neih theih manin ka nuam hi.
Sanggamte aw, tu-in Macedonia pawlpite tunga Pasian piak hehpih na thu na theih ding uh ka deih hi.
Amaute nakpi-a zia-et bawlsiatna lak pan, a lungnopna uh a dimletna le a zawn luat mahmahna panun nakpi-a citna nak nei-in a phulto hi.
Ahang in, amaute in a piak theih zahzah uh le a piak theihzah val nangawn uh a piak lam uh ka theihpih hi. Amau utthu-in,
misiangte ading nasepsakna amau zong hamphatna a tanh theih pah nadingun kote kiangah hong ngen uh hi.
Ko lamet bangin hih loin Topa tungah amau mahmah kipia masa-in tua khit ciangin Topa deihna tawh kituakin ko tungah hong kipia uh hi.
Tua ahi ciangin Titus in a masa lai-a a na patkhitsa ahi manin hih note hehphna nasep hong zawhpih vet dingin amah ka na kun uh hi.
Ahi hangin note upna, thugenna, theihna, cihtakna khempeuh le kotea nong itna uhah midangte sangin na tungnun zawk uh bangin hih piakna tawh kisai hehpihna ah zong na tungnung zaw un.
Note thu kong pia kei hi. Ahi hangin midangte cihtakna tawh tehin note itna a taktak ahina kong theih nop man ahi hi.
Ahang in, i Topa Jesu Khrist hehpihna na thei uh hi; ama zawnna tungtawna na hauh theih nadingun amah a hau hi napi note hangin a zawng hi.
Hih thu tawh kisai-in note ading a hoih pen kong thuhilhna in: Nikum in note a pia masa bek hi loin tua banga piak ding a ut masa na hi uh hi.
Hih dinga utna tawh lawptaka sep na sawm bangun na neih bangbang uh tawh kituak pia-in hih nasep na zosiang un.
Ahang in, utna a om nak leh a neih loh tawh kizui hi loin a neih tawh kizui-a a piak letsong a santak ahi hi.
Midangte vanzansak nadingin note vangik suat hong sawm ka hi kei uh a, a kikim ciat nading a deih ka hizaw uh hi.
Amaute hauhna in note tangsapna hong huk kik theih nadingin tu laitaka note hauhna in amaute sapna a hu ding hi.
"Tampi a khawmpa in tam lua nei lo a, tawmkha a khawmpa inlah tawm lua a nei kei hi”b ci-a kigelhsa bangin tua ciangin kikim dimdiamna a om ding hi.
Keimah in note kong lunghimawh bang lunghimawhna Titus lungsim sunga a guanpa Pasian tungah lungdam ka ko hi.
Ahang in, Titus in ka ngetna uh hong thukimpih bek hi loin ama lungsim tup tawmna bangin note kiangah lawptakin hong pai ding ahi hi.
Tuateh lungdamna-thu nasepna ah pawlpi mi khempeuh in a pahtak uh sanggampa amah kong zuisak uh hi.
Tua banah amah pen sumpi puaka ka pai lai-un kote hong zui dinga pawlpite in a teelpa uh ahi hi. Topa mahmah pahtawi nading le huh nuam ka hina uh lahna-in tua sum piak ka hawm uh hi.
Citna tawh a kipia hih letsongte ka zek uh ciangin gensiatna ka pelh nuam uh hi.
Ahang in, Topa muh bek hi lo mihingte muh mahmah in zong amaan na sem dingin ka hih theih tawpun ka kidawm uh hi.
Tua banah ka sanggampa un lam tampi ah ama lawpna hong latsak tham loin note hong muanna lianpi hangin amau tawh kong sawl uh hi.
Titus ahileh note laka ka naseppih le ka kikoppih hi-a, ka sang gam dangte uh ahileh pawlpi palaite le Khrist pahtawina ahi uh hi.
Tua ahi manin note in kong itna uh le kong kisaktheihpihna uh ahang pawlpi in a muhtel theih nadingun hih mite tungah na lak un.
Misiangte tunga hih nasepna thu no tungah lai-a gelh ding kisam ka sa kei hi.

Ahang in, midangte huh nading na lawpna uh ka thei zo a, nikum nungsang no Achaia gama omte a pia dingin a kithawisa-a om cih thu Macedonia gama omte tungah ka kisialhpih densa ahi hi. Tua ciangin note thalawpna in amaute a tamzaw nasep thanuamsak hi.
Ahi hangin, note kong kisaktheihpihna uh a hawmsuak loh nadingin amaute a kithawisa uh ahi hi, ka cih bangin a kithawisa na hih theih nadingun sang gamte kong sawl hi.
Ahang in, Macedonia-te khatpeuh in kei hong zuih a, note a kithawisa-in hong muh kei leh note kong muan gen mahmahsa ahi manin note gen loh kote zong ka maizum ding uh hi.

Tua ahi ciangin citpiak dinga na ciamsate uh pia dingin kithawikholsa-a na om theih nadingun hong ma hawh dingin sanggamte kut ding kisamin ka um hi. Tua hileh itsa pipi-a piak hi loin phaltaka kipiasa citpiak ahina hong kilang ding hi.
Hih thu ciamteh un: A cil vawh peuhmah in tawmcik at dinga, phaltaka a vawh ziahziah peuhmah in tampi a at ding hi.
Mi khempeuh in piak dinga a lungsima a khensatsa bangin pia uh hen; lungsit pipi ahikeh piak loh phamawh cihna-in pia kei uh hen, ahang in, Pasian in lungtaitaka piate a it hi.
Na kisap khempeuh uh Pasian in nei-a, hun khempeuh ah na khempeuh na hauh theih nadingun nasep hoih tawh note tungah hehpihna khempeuh kicingsak thei hi.
"Amah in a zawngte tungah ama letsongte mun khempeuh ah a hawmthang zo hi; ama thumaanna a tawntungin kipden hi.”a ci-in kigelh zo hi.
Khaici vawhpa tungah khaici pia a, a an ding anlum a piapa in, na sal ah antang khangsakin note thumaanna gah na khopte uh zong a tamsak semsem ding hi.
Note hun khempeuh ah na cit theih nadingun hauhna namcinin hong kihausak dinga, tua ciangin kote tung tawnin na citna uh Pasian tungah lungdamkohna suak ding hi.
Hih na nasepna uh Topa mite huhna bek hi loin Pasian tungah lungdam thu genna tampi a dimletna lahna hi lailai hi.
Na kilatkhiatna uh ahi tua nasepna hangin, Khrist lungdamna-thu na pulakna uh a zui thuman’na le amaute le mi khempeuh tawh na tanh khop uh na citna uh hangin mite in Pasian a phat ding uh hi.
Pasian in a hehpihna a dimletin note hong piakna hangin amaute in note hong lunggulhin thu hong ngetsak ding uh hi.
A kigen khin zo lo ama letsong hangin Pasian tungah lungdamna om ta hen.
Note tawh i kimaituah cianga “zahkai” a, i kigamlat cianga “hang san” pa keimah Paul in Khrist lungnemna le migitna pansanin kong ngen hi!
Hih leitung mite gamtat bangin gamta-a hong ngaihsun mi pawlkhat tungah, kong pai ciangin hangtaka cih ka sawm bangin cih a kul loh nadingin kong thum hi.
Ahang in, leitunga teng ka hi uh hangin leitung mi bangin gal ka do kei uh hi.
Kote galdona galvante leitung galvante ahi kei hi. Tuate tawh kilehbukhin, akip mahmah kulhte phel nading Pasian vangliatna a neizaw hi. Kitotnate le
Pasian theihna langdo-in, kipilsaknate khempeuh ka phelkhia uh a, Khrist thu a mang dingin ngaihsutna khempeuh salin ka kai uh hi.
Note thuman’na khatvei-a a kicin siang nak leh thuman’lohna nasep peuhmah gawtna pia dingin kigingsa in ka om ding uh hi.
Note in nate a pualama kilangkhia bekin na en uh hi.a Mi khatpeuh in: Khrist aa ka hi hi, ci-a a kimuan leh amah tawh kibang zahin kote zong Khrist aa ka hilam uh ngaihsun kik hen.
Ahang in, note hong phelgawp ding hi lo, hong laamto dinga Topa hong piak thuneihna kidaam lo-a a suang ka hileh zong ka zumpih kei ding hi.
Ka laikhakte tawh note hong linthawn ka bat ding ka ut kei hi.
Ahang in, mi pawlkhat in, “A laikhakte gikin khauh naven, amah taktakin mi lungsim kuai zo kei, a thugen zong bangmahpi hi kei,” hong ci uh hi.
Tua bang mite in no kiangah om lo-a, ka laikhakte uh sunga ka gelh bangbangun note kianga ka om ciangin zong ka hih ding uh ahilam phawk uh hen.
Amau le amau a kiphat mi pawlkhatte laka kihel ahikeh a kitehkak ngam ka hi kei uh hi. Amau le amau mah kitehin, amau le amau mah a kitehkak uh ciangin amau a pil ahi kei uh hi.
Kote ka hi uh leh a kilawm zah valin ka kisial kei uh a, bangbang ahi zongin Pasian in kote adinga hong sehsaksa zah note nangawn hong huamkha ciangah ka kisial ding uh hi.
Note kiang hong tung khin lo bangin aval akanin ka kisial kei ding uh hi. Ahang in, Khrist lungdamna-thu tawh no ciangciang kong ban khin ta uh hi.
Ko adinga kisehsa valin midangte nasepsa a kisialhpih zong ka hisam kei uh hi.b Kote lametna ahileh na upna uh a khantohna bangbangin note laka ka nasepna uh nakpi-a a zai semsem nading ahi hi.
Tua banga note khena gamte ah zong lungdamna-thu ka gen theih nading uh ahi hi. Ahang in, midangte gamhuam sunga na kisemsa ka kisialhpih nuam kei uh hi.
Ahi hangin, “A kisial mi, Pasian sungah kisial ta hen,”c
Ahang in, amah le amah a kiphatte kuamah in sang lo-a Topa in a phat mi kisang hi.
Note in ka haina tawmkha beek nong thuak zawh ding uh ka lamen hi; ahi hangin nong thuak zo khin uh hi.
Keimah in Pasian aamna-in note kong aam hi. Pasal khat tua Khrist tungah note nungak bit banga piak dingin kong kamciam zo hi.
Ahi hangin gulpi zuau siamna tawh Eve a khem zawh bangin Khrist tunga atak le a siangtho-a na kipiakna pan un na lungsim uh na pialsak khak ding uh ka lau hi.

Ahang in, no kiangah mi khatpeuh hong pai-in ko gen Jesu lo, Jesu dang khat thu hong genin, na ngahsa uh kha lo kha dang khat na ngah uh a, na sansa uh lungdamna-thu lo a kilamdang khat na san uh leh na nang zo kei baih lua uh hi.
Ahi hangin tua “sawltakpipente” sangin neukha zong a niamzaw in ka kingaihsun kei hi.
Thugen kisinna, a siam mi ka hi kholloh hangin theihna ka nei hi. Note tungah hih bang ka hina lam khempeuh ah kitel sinsenin ka langsak zo uh hi.
Note tungah man ngen loin Pasian lungdamna-thu ka genna tung tawnin a sangzaw munah note kong tut theih nadingin ka kiniamkhiatna kei adingin mawhna ahi hiam?
Note na ka sep nadingin pawlpi dangte pan huhna ngahin amaute aa ka sut hi.

Note kiangah ka om lai-in kisapna khatpeuh ka neih ciangin kuama vangik ka suak kei hi. Ahang in, Macedonia pana hong pai sanggamte in ka sapna teng hong pia uh hi. Note vangik ka suah loh nadingin lam khempeuh ah ka kikem a, tua bangin ka kikem lai ding hi.
Keima sungah Khrist thutak a om takpi bangin Achaia kuala omte khempeuh in hih ka kisialhna a beisak kei ding uh hi.
Bang hangin? Ken note kong it loh hang ahi hiam? Kong it lam Pasian in a thei hi!
A kisialhpih uh nate tawh kisai-a kote tawh kikima, a kingaihsut theih nading uh hun hoih a deih mite panmun ka bulkalh theih nadingun ka hih pen ka hih lailai ding hi.
Ahang in, tua bang mite sawltakpi zuau hi-a, zuauphuak nasemte, Khrist sawltakpi banga kineih tawmte ahi uh hi.
A lamdang hi lo hi. Satan zong amah le amah khuavak vansawltak khatin a kineih tawm hi.
Tua ahi ciangin ama nasemte thumaanna na sema, a kineihtawm uh leh lamdang sak ding ahi kei hi. Amaute beina in amau gamtatna tawh kituak ahi ding hi.
Kong gen kik inah: Kua mah in kei ahai-in hong ngaihsun kei hen. Ahi hangin nong ngaihsut uh leh tawm beek ka kisialhpih nadingin a haite na san bangun hong sang un.
Kei mahmah kimuanga ka kisialhna hih thu ah, Topa gen ding banga gen hi loin ahai banga gen ka hizaw hi.
Mi tampite leitung kisialh-a a kisialh nungsang kei zong ka kisial sam ding hi.
Pil lua na hi manun lungdam takin mihaite na thuak zo uh hi.
A taktakin note sal-a hong kai mi, note metna-a hong nei mi, hong zawh thawhbawl mi, amah le amah a kisangkoih mi, hong pangbet mite nangawn na thuak zo uh hi.
Tua bang dingin kote ka gina kei lua uh hi, cih maizumpipi-in kong gen hi. Mihai banga thu ka geninah: Mi khatpeuh in a kisialhpih ngam pen kei zong ka kisialhpih ngam hi.
Amaute Hebrew mi ahi uh hiam? Kei zong ka hi hi. Amaute Israel mi ahi uh hiam? Kei zong ka hi hi. Amaute Abraham suante ahi uh hiam? Kei zong ka hi hi.

Amaute Khrist nasem ahi uh hiam? (Mihai banga hih bang thu a gen ka hi hi) Kei ka hi zawsem hi. Na ka nak sepzaw hi; thong ah ka kia munzaw hi. A nasia zaw-in hong kisat hi. Sih theihna ah hong kitun pahpah hi.
Jew-te satna sawmli ah khatvei kiam, ngaveitak ka thuak hi.
Ciangpum in thumvei hong kisat hi. Suang in khatvei hong kideng hi. Tembaw kisiatna thumvei ka tuak hi. Sun khat le zan khat tuipi laizangah ka om ngei-a,

tawlnga loin mai ka nawt hi. Gunte ah lauhuaina, misuamte lauhuaina, keima gam mite kihtakhuaina, Gentile-te kihtakhuaina, khuapi sungah lauhuaina, gamlaka lauhuaina, tuipi tunga lauhuaina le sanggam-zuaute kihtak-huainate ka tuak zo hi.
Nakpitakin na semin ka gima, ihmu man lo liangin ka om thithe hi. Gilkial dangtakna ka thuak a, an ngawla ka om hun a tam hi. Ka guaktangin khuadam ka thuak hi.
Nadang khempeuh banah pawlpite khempeuh lunghimawhin nisimin ka lunggimpih lai hi.
Ken ka thanempih loh a thanem kua ahi hiam? Ka sunga ka thuakpih loh mawhna sunga om kua ahi hiam?
Kisial lo thei lo hileng ka ginatlohna hong lak nate ka sial ding hi.
A tawntunga kiphat ding Topa Jesu Pasian le Pa in ka zuau loh lam a thei hi.
Damascus a Kumpi Aretas khut nuai-a om ukpipa in kei hong matsak nadingin Damascus khuapi a cingsak hi.
Ahi hangin kulh tawhlet panin bawmin hong kikhaisuk a, amau khut panin ka suakta hi.
Ka kisial lailai ding hi. Met nading bangmah a om kei zongin Topa tung pana mangmuhnate le kilaaknate ka gen lai ding hi;
a kilato Khrist sunga mi khat ka thei hi. A beisa kum sawm le li lai-in van thumna-a kila to, a pumpi-in maw, a pumpi loin maw, cih ka thei kei a, Pasian in a thei hi.
Hih mipa ka thei-a a pumpi-in hiam, a pumpi tawh kikhen hiam, ka thei kei hi; ahi hangin Pasian in thei-a,
paradise ah kilato hi. Amah in genkhiat theih loh nate, mihing gen dinga kiphal lo nate a za hi.
Tua bang mipa ka kisialhpih dinga ahi hangin kei tungtang ah ka thanemnate longal ka kisialhpih kei ding hi.
Thutak gen ding ka hi manin kisial nuam leng zong mihai ka hi kei ding hi. Ahi hangin ka thugen le ka nasepna in a kilatsak zah vala kuamah in hong ngaihsut loh nadingin ka kidawm hi.
Hih a lian pha mahmah kilaaknate hanga ka ki-uatsak luat loh nadingin kei hong gimsak ding, ka ci-le-sa sungah ling khat – Satan thupuapa khat kei hong kipia hi.
Kei tung panin tua hong kilakkhiatsak nadingin Topa tungah thumvei ka ngen zo hi.

Ahi hangin amah in, “Ka hehpihna nang adingin kicing hi; ahang in, thanemna sungah ka vangliatna kicing hi,” hong ci hi. Tua ahi manin Khrist vangliatna kei tungah a om theih nadingin lungdam semsemin ka thanemna ka kisialhpih ding hi.
Tua hi a, thanemnate, simmawhnate, thuaksiatnate, bawl-siatnate, haksatnate sunga ka lung-nopna Khrist hang ahi hi. Ahang in, ka thanem ciangin ka tha a khauh hi.

Keimah le keimah mihai kong kisuah a, ahi hangin note in tua banga nong bawl uh ahi hi. Note in kei nong phat ding uh ahi hi. Ahang in, bangmah ka hi lo hangin “sawltakpi-pente” sangin neucik zong ka niamzaw peuhmah kei hi.
Sawltakpi khat kiciamtehna limte alamdangte le nalamdangte note lakah lungduaitakin kibawl zo hi.
Note adingin vangik ka suah lohna lobuang pawlpi dangte sanga na niam zawkna uh bang om ahi hiam? Hih ka tatkhialhna hong maisak un.

Tu-in a thumveina note kiangah hong hawh dingin ka kithawi zo hi. Na neihsate uh deih ka hi kei hi, kei deih note hizaw na hi manun note adingin vangik ka suak kei ding hi. A taktakin, tate in nu le pate ading a khol ding uh hi loin nu le pate in tate ading a khol ding uh hizaw hi.
Tua ahi ciangin note adingin ka neihsa khempeuh lungdamtakin pia-in kei mahmah nangawn ka kizang nuam hi. Ken note kong it semsem leh note in kei hong it lo semsem ding na hi uh hiam?
Tua pen ahi hi, himai ta hen, note adingin vangik ka suak kei hi. Tua hi napi khemsiamin note khembawlin note hong man ka hi ve maw!
No kianga kong sawlte khatpeuh zangin a met lakna-in hong zang ka hi hiam?
No kianga pai dingin Titus ka kun-a, i sanggampa kong zuisak hi. Titus in note a met lakna-in hong nei lo hi, hong nei ahi hiam? Ka lungsim uh kibangin lam khat zuikhawm lo ka hi uh hiam?

Note tungah kote a kihu nilohin hong ngaihsun lai na hi uh hiam? Khrist sunga omte bangin Pasian mitmuh a thu gengen ka hi uh hi. Tua hi-a kong it lawmte aw, ka hih khempeuh uh note thakhauhsak nading ahi hi.

Ahang in, kong pai cianga note na hi ding uh kong deih banga kong muh loh khak ding le note in kei ka hi dinga nong deih bangua nong muh loh khak ding uh ka lau hi. Kitotna, kihazatna, heh-a kiselnate, kipawlkhennate, kidaisakna, kigensiatna, ki-uatsakna le buaina a om khak ding zong ka lau hi.

Note kiangah kong pai kik ciangin ka Pasian un note mai-ah hong niamkhiatin nidanga na khialhnasa uh: kihuai-gamtatna, numei-pasal mawhna, huk luatna lanluatnate hangin mawh napi a kisik lo mi tampite hangin ka dah khak ding ka lau hi.
Hih in note kianga kong hawh a thumveina ding ahi hi. “Thu khempeuh teci nih ahikeh thum theihpihna tawh kipsak ding ahi hi”a

Note kianga a nihveina kong hawh lai-in vauhilhna kong pia khin zo hi. Ka om loh kala mah, tu-in kong gen kikinah: Kong kileh kik ciangin a beisa huna a mawhte ahikeh adangte kuamah ka dawm kei ding hi.
Tua in, Khrist in kei tungtawnin thu gen ahi hiam, cih a kitelna na kalh sese hang uh ahi hi. Note hong thazawh dingin amah thanem lo a, note lakah vanglian hi.

Ahang in, a taktakin ama thenemna ah kikilhlum napi Pasian vangliatna hangin a nungta hi. Tua mah tawh kibangin ama sungah kote thanem napi note nasem dingin Pasian vangliatna hangin amah tawh ka nungta ding uh hi.
Upna sungah na om uh hiam, no le no kisittel ciat un; no le no kizia-et un. Na kizia-et uh ciangin cing zo lo na hi kei buang uh leh Khrist no sungah a ten lam thei lo na hi uh hiam?
Kote tua zia-etna ah cing zo ka hilam uh hong thei dingin kong muang hi.

Khialhna bangmah na bawl loh nadingun, tu-in Pasian tungah thu ka ngen uh hi. Zia-etna ah kote cing ka hina uh mite theih ding deihna hi loin, zia-etna ah cing zo lo banga ka kilat uh hangin note amaan-a na gamtat ding uh deihna hizaw hi.
Ahang in, kote in thutak langdoin bangmah ka hih thei kei uh hi; thumaan lam bekah ka pang uh hi.
Kote ka thanem laitakun note na thakhauh manun ka nuam uh hi; na kicinkim nadingun thu ka ngen uh hi.
Kong pai cianga phelkhiat nading hi lo, note lamtoh nadinga Topa hong piak thuneihna ka khauh zat luat loh nadingin ka om loh kala hih bang teng hong gelh ka hi hi.
A nunung penin sanggamte aw, mangpha na man un. Kicinkimna na tum unla, kong ngetna na ngai un. Lungsim kikhatin na kilem un. Itna le lemna Pasian in note hong ompih ding hi.
Kinapna siangtho tawh khat le khat na kihopih un.
Misiangte khempeuh in hong hopih uh hi.
Mihing pan hi lo, mite sawl zong hi lo, ahi hangin Jesu Khrist le misi pana amah a thosak Pa Pasian sawltakpi Paul le
kei tawh a omkhawm sang gamte khempeuh in, Galatia a om pawlpite tungah:
I Pa Pasian le Topa Jesu Khrist tung pana hehpihna le lemna note tungah om ta hen.
I Pasian le Pa deihna bangin tu a gilo khanghun pana eite hong hu dingin i mawh nate adingin amah le amah hong kipia Pa
Pasian tungah a tawntung in minthanna om den ta hen. Amen. Lungdamna-thu Adang Om Lo
Khrist hehpihna hanga note hong sampa tawh hizahta a manlangin ki khena, lungdamna-thu adang na sanpah uh lamdang ka sa hi;
tua na san uh lah lungdamna-thu a hi peuhmah kei hi. Mi pawlkhatte in Jesu Khrist lungdamna-thu lehkaihin note hong lungbuaisak nuam uh ahi hi.
Ahi hangin kote ka hi uh zongin vantung pana vansawltak khat ahi zongin note kianga kong gen uh ahi lo, lungdamna-thu dang hong hilh a om leh tawntung mawhpaih hi ta hen!
Kote in kong gensa bangun tu-in kong gen kikinah: Mi khatpeuh in na sansa uh lungdamna-thu lo adang hong hilh leh a tawntungin kimawhpaih ta hen!

Tu-in mihingte maipha ahikeh Pasian maipha a zong ka hi hiam? Ahikeh mihingte lungdamsak a sawm ka hi hiam? Mihingte lungdamsak a sawm lailai ka hileh Khrist nasem ka hi kei ding hi. Pasian in Paul Sam
Sanggamte aw, ka hilh lungdamna-thu, mihing bawltawm ahi loh lam na theih ding uh ka deih hi.
Mi khatpeuh tung pana ka ngah hi lo a, hong hilhsak zong ahi kei hi; Jesu Khrist tung pan kilaakna-a ka ngah ahi hi.
Ahang in, nidang lai-in Jew biakna ngeina sunga ka nuntak zia, Pasian pawlpi nakpi-a ka bawlsiat zia le suksiat gawp ka sawmzia na za zo uh hi.
Ka khangual Jew mi tampi sung panin ka madawk a, ka pate ngeina gumin nakpi-in ka hahkat hi.
Ahi hangin ka pian tunga kei hong sehtuampa le a hehpihna hanga kei hong sampa Pasian in,
Gentile-te laka ka gen theih nadingin lungkimtaka a Tapa kei sunga hong kilaaksak lai-in mi khatpeuh ka dong kei hi.
