Kei ma-a sawltakpi ahi masate tawh kimu dingin Jerusalem ah zong ka paito kei a, ahi hangin Arabia ah paipah in tua khit ciangin Damascus ah ka ciah kik hi.
Tua zawh kum thum khit ciangin Peter tawh kimeltheih dingin Jerusalem ah paito-in ama kiangah ni sawm-le-nga ka taam hi.
Topa sanggampa James bek longal sawltakpi dang kuamah ka mu kei hi.
Note tunga kong gelh thu, zuau ahi loh lam Pasian mai-ah kong theitelsak hi.
Tua khit ciangin Syria le Cilicia ah ka pai hi.
Khrist sunga om Judea gam pawlpite kuamah in kei hong meltheih kei uh hi.
Amaute in: “Tunung lai-a eite hong bawlsia pa in, khatvei lai-a a suksiat a sawm tua upna thu tu-in a hilh ta hi,” ci-a kigen bek a za uh hi.
Keima hangin amaute in Pasian a phat uh hi.
Tua nung kum sawm-le-li ciangin Jerusalem ah ka paito kik hi; tua tungin Barnabas tawh ka hi hi. Titus zong ka tonpih hi.

Kilaakna thu manga pai ka hi-a, Gentile-te laka ka gen lungdamna-thu mah amaute mai-ah ka lui hi. Ahi hangin ka kitaitehna uh ahi zongin ka tainasa ah ahi zongin, a mawkna a suah ding ka lau manin makai hileh a kilawmte kiangah ka hilh sim hi.
Tua hi napi ka tonpih Titus nangawn Greek mi ahi hangin vunat dingin a kisawl teitei kei hi.
Khrist Jesu sunga i suahtakna hong ensimin sila hong suaksak dingin eite lakah sanggam zuau pawlkhat hong lutsim ahi manin hih thu hong piang ahi hi.
Note sungah lungdamna-thu, thutak a om theih nadingin tawmvei sung zong amaute thu ka mang kei uh hi.
Bangzahta in mi thupi hi le uh kilawm ta leh kei adingin amaute kilamdanna a om tuan kei hi. Pasian in a pualam kilatna in thu a khen kei hi—tua mite in ka thupuak bangmah a behlap kei uh hi.
Tua tawh kilehbulh in, Jew-te tungah lungdamna-thu hilh dingin Peter a kipiak bang tektek in, kei zong Gentile-te tungah a hilh dingin hong kipia hi, cih a mu uh hi.
Ahang in, Jew-te tunga sawltakpi Peter nasepna-a a sempa Pasian mah in Gentile-te tunga sawltakpi keima nasepna ah zong na a sem hi. Khuampite dinga a minthang

James, Peter le John-te in kei tungah hehpihna hong kipia cih a theih uh ciangin kei le Barnabas kilawmtakna khut taklam hong khak uh hi. Amaute in kote Gentile-te tungah pai-a, amaute Jew-te tungah a pai dung uh a thukim uh hi.
Amaute khempeuh in mizawngte phawk gige ding hong deih uh, kei zong ka lawp penpen mah ahi hi. Paul in Peter Sel
Antioch ah Peter hong pai ciangin amah khial khin ta ahi manin a mai-tangah amah ka sel hi.

James kiang pan kuate hiam a pai ma-in, amah in Gentile-te tawh an a ne khawmkhawm hi. Ahi hangin amaute hong tun uh ciangin vunatte pawl-a pangte a kihtak manun Gentile-te panin kikang koihin amah le amah a kituam koih hi.
Jew dangte in zong ama kineihsiamna zui uh a, tua ama kineihsiamna in Barnabas nangawn a pialmangsak hi.

Lungdamna-thu amaan bangin amaute in sem lo uh cih ka muh ciangin amaute khempeuh mai-ah Peter kiangah, “Nang Jew mi hi napi, Jew mi bang loin Gentile mi bangin na nungta hi. Tua hi napi Jew ngeina zui dinga Gentile-te na kalh teitei bangci bang hiam?
"Mawh nei Gentile-te bang hi lo pianpih a Jew mi ahi eite in

thukham zuihzawhna hang hi lo, Jesu Khrist upna hangin mi in diktansakna ngah hi cih i thei hi. Tua ahi ciangin eite in zong thukham zuihna hang hi lo, Khrist upna hangin dik tansak-a i om theih nadingin Khrist Jesu sungah i upna i nga hi; bang hang hiam cih leh thukham zuihna hangin kuamah dik a kitangsak kei ding hi.
"Eite in Khrist sungah dik kitansak ding i zon laitakin eite mahmah mawh neite i hina hong kilang ahi ciangin Khrist in mawhna khangsak cihna ahi hiam? Hi peuhmah lo hi:
Ka suksiat gawpsa ka lam kik leh thukham palsat mi ka hilam ka kitelsak hi.
Ahang in, Pasian adinga ka nuntak theih nadingin thukham tungtawnin thukham ka sihsan hi.

Jesu tawh ka kikilhlum zo a, kei ka nungta nawn kei hi; ahi hangin ka sungah Khrist a nungta hi. Ka pumpi sunga ka nuntakna pen, kei hong it-in, kei ading amahmah a kipia pa Pasian Tapa upna-in a nungta ka hi hi.
Thukham tungtawnin thumaanna kingah thei hileh Khrist a mawkna-a si hi ding ahi manin, Pasian hehpihna ka pampaih kei hi!” ka ci hi.
No Galatia mihaite! No kua in hong bumhai ahi hiam? Jesu Khrist a kilhlup bangin a kiteltakin note mitmuh tektek ah hong kilak hi.
Note tung pan na khat bek ka thei nuam hi. Thukham zuihna hangin Kha na ngah uh hiam, ahikeh na zakte uh na upna uh hangin na ngah uh hiam?
Tua zahta a hai lawmlawm na hi uh hiam? Kha tawh na pat khit nungun mihing nasepna tawh na ngim na tup uh tangtun sawm na hi uh hiam?
A mawkna-in tua zahta thuak na hi uh hiam, a mawkna taktak himawk ding hiam?
Pasian in thukham na zuihna uh hangin note, ama Kha hong pia in note lakah nalamdangte hong bawl ahi hiam, ahikeh na zaksa uh na up hang uh hizaw hiam?
Abraham ngaihsun un: “Amah in Pasian uma, ama adingin tua mah thumaanna in kisimsak hi,”
Tua ciangin a umte Abraham tate suak cih theitel un.
Pasian in upna hangin Gentile-te dik tangsak nuam cih Laisiangtho in mukhol a, Abraham kiangah, “Nang tungtawnin minam khempeuh thupha kipia ding hi,” ci-in lungdamna-thu na magen hi.
Tua ahi ciangin a umte khempeuh, upna nei mipa Abraham tawh thupha kipiakhawm hi.
Thukham zuihna-a kingate khempeuh hamsiatna nuai-a om lai uh ahi hi. Ahang in: “Thukham Laibu sunga kigelhte khempeuh a zuikim suak zolote peuh mah hamsiat ahi uh hi,” ci-in kigelh zo hi.
A teltakin thukham hangin Pasian mai-ah kuamah diktansak ahi kei hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh, “Mi thumaante upna hangin a nungta ding hi,”
Upna tungah thukham kibulphuh lo hi; tua tawh kilehbulh in, “Tuate a hih mi, tuate hang mahin a nungta ding hi.”
Eite tang dingin Khrist hamsia hong suakin thukham hamsiatna panin hong tan zo hi. Ahang in, “Sing tunga kikhai peuhpeuh hamsiat ahi hi,” ci-in kigelh hi.

Eite in upna hangin a kiciamsa Kha i ngah theih nadingin Abraham tunga kipia tua thupha, Khrist Jesu tungtawnin Gentile-te tungah hong tun theih nadingin amah in eite hong tan zo hi. Thukham le Thuciam
Sanggamte aw, nisim nuntakna panin gentehna khat kong gen ding hi. A kikipsaksa mihing thukhun pen, kuamah in paikhia thei loin a behlap thei kei hi. Hih thu ah zong tua mah bang ahi hi.
Abraham le a suan a khak tungah thuciamnate kipia hi. Laisiangtho in mi tampi a gennopna-in “na suan na khakte tungah zong” ci loin Khrist ahi mi khat genna in, “na suan na khak tungah” ci zaw hi.
Ka gennop hih ahi hi: A beisa huna Pasian in a kipsaksa thukhun pen tua khit kum 430 a kipia thukham in tua thuciam a phiat tuan kei hi.
Ahang in, thukham tungah gouluahza kinga hileh thuciam tunga kinga ahi kei ding hi. Ahi hangin Pasian in a hehpihna hangin thuciam tungtawnin gouluahna Abraham a pia hi.

Tua hi mawk leh, thukham bang ngimna ahi hiam? Thukham pen thuciam in a na gen tua Ci-le-sa hong tun mateng adingin khialhnate hanga kipia thuah ahi hi. Tua thukham pen vansawltakte tungtawn in palai khat zanga kikipsak ahi hi.
Ahi zongin mi pawlkhat bek tangin palai a ding kei hi; ahi hangin Pasian khat ahi hi.
Tua ahi manin thukham in Pasian thuciamte a langpan hiam? Langpan peuhmah lo hi! Ahang in, nuntakna a pia thei thukham kipia hileh thukham hangin thumaanna hong tung khin takpi ding hi.
Ahi hangin a kikamciam pen Jesu Khrist upna tungtawna kipiasa, a um mite tungah a kipiak thei nadingin Laisiangtho in leitung buppi mawhna thong kiapa ahi hi, ci-in genkhia hi.
Hih upna hong tun ma-in thukham in eite khempeuh thongah hong khia a, upna hong kilat mateng hong khumcip hi.
Tua ahi ciangin upna hangin dik tansak i hi thei nadingin Khrist kiangah eite hong pi ding in tua thukham hong ki-uksak hi.
Tu-in tua upna tungta ahi manin thukham in hong uk kha nawn kei hi. Pasian Tapate
Khrist Jesu upna tungtawnin note khempeuh Pasian tapate na hi uh hi;
ahang in, Khrist sunga kibaptise note khempeuh Khrist a silh na hi ta uh hi. Jew mi,
Greek mi a om kei hi; sila, sila lo a om kei hi; numei pasal a om kei hi. Ahang in, note khempeuh Khrist Jesu sungah khat na hi uh hi.
Note Khrist aa na hi uh leh Abraham suan na hi uh a, thuciam bangin gouluahte na hi uh hi.
Ka gen thu in, gouluahpa in a neu lai-in a luah ding khempeuh a neipa ahi hangin sila tawh a kilamdanna a om kei hi.
Apa hun seh hun a tun mateng a donte le a kemte ukna nuai-ah a om hi.
Tua mah bangin eite i neu lai-in leitung ngeina bulpite nuaiah sila i suak hi.
Ahi hangin a hun hong tun kim ciangin Pasian in a Tapa hong sawla, thukham nuai-ah numei sung panin hong suak hi.
Thukham nuai-a omte tapa hina, thuneihna a kimin i ngah theih nadingin hong tan hi.
Note tapate na hi manun “Abba, Pa” a ci khia tua Kha, ama Tapa Kha eite lungsungah Pasian in hong sawl hi.
Tua ahi ciangin note sila hi nawn loin tapa na hi uh hi; tapa na hi nungsangun Pasian in note zong gouluahpa in hong koih zo hi. Paul in Galatia-te Lunghimawh
Tunung lai, Pasian na theih ma un pianngei-a pasian a hi lote sila-in na om uh hi.

Ahi hangin tu-in note in Pasian thei tham loin, Pasian hong theih na hi nungsangun a thanem le bangmah a man lo thubulpite ah na kihei kik uh bangci bang ahi hiam? Tuate nuai-ah sila suak kikkik nuam na hi uh hiam?
Note in a kisehtuam nite, khate, khuahunte le kumte na tang uh hi!
Note adingin bang tan hiam khat a mawkna-a hahkat ka hi khak ding kong laupih hi.
Sanggamte aw, kong kun hi: note tawh a kibanga kong om bangin note zong kei bangin hong hi un. Kei tungah nong khial kei uh hi.
Na theihsa bangun, note tungah lungdamna-thu kong gen masakna ka ci natna hang ahi hi.
Ka dam loh no adingin zia-etna a suah hangin simmawhna peuh kihna peuhin nong nei tuan kei uh hi. Tua sangsikin Pasian vansawltak mahmah, Khrist Jesu mahmah bangin nong muak uh hi.
Note lungnopna khempeuh bang suak ta ahi hiam? Hih thei liai hi le uh cin na mittang nangawn uh khelkhia-in tuate kei nong piak nop lam uh ka thei hi.
Tu-in note thutak kong hilh mana na gal uh suak ka hi hiam?
Tua mite in note hong zogawp nuam uh hi; ahi hangin a hoih nading lam ahi kei hi. Amaute in kote pan note hong khenkhia in amau adingin nakpi-a na hahkat ding uh a deih uh hi.
Ngimna a hoih nak leh hahkat ding hoih hi; note tawh kong om sung bek hi loin a tawntungin na hahkat den un.
Note sungah Khrist lim a kilat matenga nausuahnat thuak banga kong thuak kik kong it tate aw,
note hangin amkham ka hi manin tu-in note tawh omkhawm hileng, ka aw suah khel nuam na zen ing e! Hagar le Sarah
Thukham nuai-a om nuam note in, thukham in a gen bang hiam, cih za lo na hi uh hiam, hong gen dih un?
Ahang in, Abraham in tapa nih nei a, khat sila numei tawh a neih hi-in, a khat pen a suakta numei tawh a neih ahi hi, ci-in kigelh hi.
Sila numei tawh a neih a tapa pen a ngeina banga suak hi-a, ahi hangin a suakta numei tawh a neih a tapa pen kamciamna khat tangtunna ahi hi.
Tua numeite thukhun nih tanga ding ahi manin, hihte tehkakna-a lak theih ding ahi hi. Thukhun khat Sinai Vum pan hi a, sila a suak ding tate a nei hi. Tua pen Hagar ahi hi.
Tu-in Hagar pen Arabia a om Sinai Vum tangin ding a, tu huna Jerusalem khuapi tawh a kibang ahi hi; bang hang hiam cihleh tuanu a tate tawh sila-in a om uh hi.
Ahi hangin tunglama om Jerusalem pen sila hi lo a, amah eite nu ahi hi.

Ahang in, “Ta nei lo tasel numei aw, nuam in; nang, nausuahnat a thuak kha lo nu aw, nuamin ngaihtakin kikokhia in; bang hang hiam cihleh pasal nei numei sangin a kipampaih numei khat in ta tam a nei zaw hi,” hi ci-in kigelh hi.
Tu-in sanggamte aw, note Isaac bangin kamciamna tate na hi uh hi.
Tua hunlai-in suah ngei-a suak tapa in Kha vangliatna pana suak tapa a bawlsia hi. Tu-in zong tua mah bang ahi hi.
Ahi hangin Laisiangtho in bang gen ahi hiam? “Sila numei tapa in a suakta numei tapa tawh gouluah khawm ngei lo ding ahi manin sila numei le a tapa hawlmang un.” ci hi.
Tua ahi manin sanggamte aw, eite sila numei tate hi loin sila lo numei tate i hi hi.
Khrist in a suakta dingin eite hong khahkhia hi. Tua ahi ciangin kiptakin ding unla, sila hakkol tawh no le no vangik kisuan kik nawn kei un.
Ka kammalte ciamteh un! Keimah Paul in kong hilh hi; vun na atsak uh leh no adingin Khrist in kimanna a nei peuhmah kei ding hi.
Vunatsak mi peuhmah in thukham a vekin a zuih kim kul hi, kong ci lai hi.
Thukham zuihna hangin diktansakna ngah a sawm note, Khrist panin khenkhiatsa na hi uh a, hehpihna panin na pukmang khin uh hi.
Ahi hangin kote in ka lamet uh thumaanna pen upna hangin Kha tungtawnin lawptakin ka ngak uh hi.
Ahang in, Khrist Jesu sungah vunat, ahi zongin, vunat loh ahi zongin kimanna a nei kei hi. Itna tungtawna kipulak tua upna bek in kimanna a nei hi.
Note kitaitehna hoihtakin na tai uh hi. Thutak na zuih loh nadingun kua in hong dal ahi hiam?
Tua bang kizolna ahileh note hong sampa kiang pan hi lo hi.
"Silngo tawmkha in annel mekman lompi khat sung khempeuh a tawksak thei hi.”
Note, lungsim tuamdang a nei lo dingin Topa sungah kong muang hi. Note hong lungbuaisak peuhpeuh in kuakua ahi zongin gawtna thutanna a thuak ding hi.
Sanggamte aw, vunat thu mah a hilh lailai hi leng bang hangin bawlsiatna thuak lai ding ka hi hiam? Tua bang hileh singlamteh hanga ngaihdahna a beisak ka hi ding hi.
Note hong buaisakte amau le amau kiget vet le uh hi lo ding hiam?
No ka sanggamte aw, a suakta dinga hong kisam na hi uh hi. Ahi zongin na suahtakna uh mawhdim pianngei deihna-a bualna in zang kei unla, tua sangin ki-itna tawh khat le khat na kisepsak thuk un.
"Nang le nang na ki-it bangin na vengte it in,” a cih thupiak khatah thukham khempeuh a kigawm khin hi.
Note khat le khat kikei-in na kinek thuk uh leh kikem un, khat le khat na kihihsia gawp ding uh hi. Kha-a Nuntakna
Tua ahi ciangin Kha-in na nungta un, tua hileh mawhdim pianngei deihna na tangtun kei ding uh hi, kong ci hi.

Ahang in, mawhdim pianngei lunggulhna pen Kha deihna tawh kilehbulh a, Kha lunggulhna pen mawhdim pianngei lunggulhna tawh kilehbulh hi. Tuate gel khat le khat kido ahi ciangin na hih nop uh na hih thei kei uh hi.
Ahi hangin Kha in nang hong pi leh thukham nuai-ah na om kei hi.
Mawhdim pianngei gamtatna telnop mahmah hi: numei-pasal paktatna, siantho-lohna le hukna-lanna;
milim biakna le bumna; muhdahna, kilemlohna, hazatna, hehluatna, angsung khualna, kilungkim lohna, kipawlkhennate le
en-na, zukhamna, uangtatna le tua bang nam khempeuh ahi hi. Tua banga nungtate in Pasian gam a luah kei ding hi, ci-a kong vauhilhsa bangin kong hilhkhol hi.
Ahi hangin Kha gah in: itna, lung nopna, kilemna, thuakzawhna, citna, hoihna, muanhuaina,
migitna le pumpi ukzawhnate ahi hi. Hihte a langpang ding thukham a om kei hi.
Khrist Jesu aa ahite in tua mawhdim pianngei deihna le a lunggulhna teng tawh a kilhlum zo uh hi.
Kha hanga nungta i hi nungsangin Kha tawh kalsuan khawm ni.
Eite khat le khat kimisak, kihehsakin ki-eng kei ni.
Sanggamte aw, mawhna a bawl mi khat a kimat leh a khami note in migitakin na phong ding uh hi. Ahi hangin no le no na kikem un; tua hi kei leh note in zong zia-etna na thuak kha ding uh hi.
Khat le khat na vangik uh kidawn tek un. Hih bangin gamta le uh cin Khrist thukham na tangtun ding uh hi.
Mi khatpeuh bangmah hi lo napi a thupi-a a kingaihsut leh amah le amah kikhem ahi hi.
Mi khempeuh in amau gamtatna encian ciat uh hen. Tua ciangin, midangte khatpeuh tawh kitehkak se loin amah le amah a kihisak thei pan ding hi.
Ahang in, mi khempeuh in amau van tek a pua ciat ding uh hi.
Thu-a kipantah peuhmah in, a pantah pa tawh a hoih khempeuh a tangkhawm pelmawh hi.
Khem zawhin na om kei un: Pasian pen ciamnuih bawl theih hi lo hi. Mi in ama vawh bangin a at ding hi.
Ama mawhdim pianngei lungkim nading a vawh mi in, tua pianngei panin siatna a at ding hi; Kha lungkim nading a vawh mi in, tua Kha panin nuntak tawntungna a at ding hi.
Eite in i tawpsan kei nakleh a hun a tun ciangin a gah at ding i hi manin na hoih sep cimtak kei ni.
Tua ahi manin hun hoih i neih sungin mi khempeuh tungah na hoih sem ni, a diakdiak in thu-um innkuante tungah sem ni. Vunat hilo Piansak Thakna
Keima khut mahmah in laimal golpipi-a no tunga kong gelhte en dih un!
A tungthama maipha ngah nuam mi pawlkhat in, vun hong atsak nuam teitei uh hi. Hih banga a hihna uh a thu, Khrist singlamteh thu hanga bawlsiatna tawh a kipelh nop man bek uh ahi hi.
Vunatte nangawn in thukham a zui kei uh hi. Tua hi ta leh note hong kisialhpih nuam uh ahi manin, vun hong atsak teitei uh ahi hi.
Kei adingin leitung kikilhcip a, kei zong leitung adingin hong kilhcipna ahi tua Topa Jesu singlamteh longal ka kisialhpih kei ding hi.
Vunat le vunat loh in phattuamna a nei kei hi. A thaka piansakna bekin phattuamna a nei hi.
Hih zuih ding ngeina a zuite khempeuh le Pasian Isreal-te tung dongah lemna le lainatnate om ta hen.
A nunung penin, ka pumpi tungah Jesu ciamtehnate pua ka hi manin, kuamah in kei hong buaisak kei ta hen.
Sanggamte aw, Topa Jesu Khrist hehpihna, note kha tawh om ta hen. Amen.
Pasian deihna hanga Jesu Khrist sawltakpi Paul in, Ephesus a om misiangte, Khrist Jesu sunga a muanhuaite tungah:
I Pa Pasian le Topa Jesu Khrist tung pana hehpihna le lemna no tungah om ta hen.
Vanlam gama, Khrist sunga khalam thuphate khempeuh eite thupha hong pia i Topa Jesu Khrist Pasian le Pa kiphat ta hen.
Ahang in, ama mitmuh ah ‘siangtho-a pau i ban loh nadingin leitung piansak ma-in ama sungah eite hong teel zo hi.
Ama nopsakna le deihna tawh kizui-in Jesu Khrist tungtawnin tate a hong san theih nadingin –
amah in a Itpa sungah eite hong piakkhong a minthang ama heh pihna pahtawi nadingin itna-in hong laitan kholhsa ahi hi.
Pasian hehpihna kicing tawh kizui-in ama sisan hangin ama sungah tatkhiatna le mawh maisakna i ngah a,
amah in pilna le theihcianna khempeuh tawh tua hehpihna kicingtakin eite hong pia zo hi.
Tua ciangin amah in Khrist sunga a ngimsa ama deihna thuthuk, a lungkimna hoih tawh kizui-in eite hong theisak hi.
A hun a cin ciangin a tangtung dingin vantung le leitunga na khempeuh lutang khat, Khrist mahmah nuai-a gawmkhawm ding ama tup ahi hi.
Ama deihna banga a ngimna tawh kituakin na khempeuh a semkhia pa in a deihna tawh kizui-in a laitansa bangin ama sungah kote hong kiteelsa hi-a,
Khrist sunga lametna a nei masa kote ama minthanna pahtawina ka suah theih nading uh ahi hi.

Note hong hotkhiatna lungdamna-thu, tua thutak thu na zak khit uh ciangin note zong Khrist sungah hong kihuai khawm hi. Na up khit uh ciangin ciamtehna khat, hong kikamciamsa Khasiangtho-a kiciamtehsa na hi uh hi.
Tua pen ama minthanna pahtawi nadingin Pasian neihsate tatkhiatna dongin i luah ding hong kamciamna ahi, khamkholhna ahi hi.
Hih thu hangin Topa Jesu na up na uh le misiangte khempeuh na itna uh ka zaka kipan,
ka thungetnate ah note hong phawk gige in no ading lung damkohna ka tawlnga nai kei hi.
Eite Topa Jesu Khrist’ Pasian a minthang Pa in, amah na theihcian zawk nadingun pilna le kilaakna Kha note hong piak theih nadingin thu ka ngen den hi.
Note hong sapna ahi lametna, misiangte sunga a minthang ama gouluah a kicinna le
a um mi eite adinga tehpih bei ama vangliatna thupi na theih nadingun na lungsim mitte uh a kivaksak nadingin zong thu ka ngen hi.
Misi pan amah a thawhkiksak lai-a vanlam gamah a taklam-a a tutsak lai-a
ukna le thuneihna, vangliatna le gam-ukna khempeuh, tu khanghun bek hilo hong tung ding khanghun ah zong a kipia thei za khempeuh tungpek ah Khrist a, a zatsa thahatna mah ahi hi.
Pasian in na khempeuh ama khepek nuai ah koih a, pawlpi adingin amah na khempeuh tungah lutang in seh khinin,
tua pawlpi pen ama pumpi hi-a, na khempeuh, lam khempeuh-a, a cingsakpa’ kicinna ahi hi.
Note na hi uh leh na mawhnate uh le na khialhnate uh sungah na si khin uh a,
hih leitung thu, tu laitaka thumang lote sunga na a sem kha tua huihgam ukpa na zuih lai-un, tuate sungah na nungta uh hi.

Hun khat lai-in eite khempeuh zong amaute lakah i nungta a, i mawhdim pianngei ukluatna tangtun in pumpi lunggulhnate le ngaihsutnate zui-in i om hi. Midangte bangin pianngeia in, thangpaihna nuai-a omte i hi hi.
Ahi hangin lainatna a hau Pasian in a lian mahmah eite hong itna hangin
khialhna sungah si-a i om laitak nangawnin Khrist tawh eite hong nungtasak khawm – hehpihna hangin hotkhiat na hi uh hi.
Pasian in Khrist tawh eite hong thosak khawma, vanlam gamah Khrist Jesu sungah amah tawh hong tukhawmsak hi.
Khrist Jesu sunga a migitna hanga eite tunga hong kigenkhia tehpih bei ama hehpihna kicinna, hong tung ding khanghunte ah eite tunga hong kilatsak nading ahi hi.
Ahang in, hehpihna hangin upna tungtawnin hotkhiat na hi uh hi. No le no a na ngah uh hi loin Pasian letsong ahi hi –
kuamah a kisialh theih loh nadingin sepna hang ahi kei hi.
Ahang in, eite sep dinga Pasian geelkholh, nasep hoih sem dinga Khrist Jesu sunga kipiangsak Pasian khutsiam i hi hi.
Tua ahi manin nidang lai-in pianngei in Gentile-te na hi uh a, amau le amau “vunat” (mihing khut tawh pumpi tunga ki-at) a kicite in note “vunat loh” hong cih uh phawk unla,
tua hunlai-in note Khrist tawh kikhenin Israel mi hina pan kipuaseh in, kam ciamna thukhunte-a tan nei lo gamdang mi hi-in, lametna a om lo le Pasian lo-a leitunga om na hilam uh phawk gige un.
Ahi hangin khatvei lai-a gamlapi-a om note, tu-in Khrist sisan tungtawnin Khrist Jesu sungah hong kinaisak ta hi.
Ahang in, nihte khat hong suaksak a, kikal dalna ahi kilemlohna kulhte a phelkhia pa a mahmah eite lemna hi-in,
amah in ama ci-le-sa ah tua thukham le thukham’ thupiakte le ngeinate a beisak hi. Mi nihte panin mi thak khat a mahmah sunga piansak ding a ngimna hi-a, tua hangin kilemna bawlin
hih pumpi khat sungah amaute gel sing lamteh tungtawnin Pasian ah kilemkiksaka tua tawh amaute kilang neihna a lamang hi.
Amah hong pai-in no a gamlapi-a omsate tungah kilemna thu, a nai-a omsate tungah zong kilemna thu mah hong gen zo hi.
Ahang in, ama tungtawnin eite in Kha khat tawh Pasian mai-ah luttheihna i nei tuak hi.
Tua thu hangin note mikhual le gamdang mi hi nawn loin, Pasian mite tawh tualsung mi na hikhawm uh a Pasian innkuan sung mite na hi uh hi,
innkiu suangpi Khrist Jesu mahmah tawh sawltakpite le kamsangte bulkip tunga hong kilam na hi uh hi.
Ama sungah tua inn buppi kizomkhawm a, Topa sungah a siangtho biakinnpi a suak dingin a khang hi.
Tua hi-a note zong Pasian ama Kha-in a tenna a suak dingin a kilamkhawm toto na hi uh hi.
Hih thu hangin, no Gentile-te tanga Khrist Jesu’ hanga thongkia keimah Paul in –
Note adinga kei tunga hong kipia Pasian hehpihna in na a sepkhiatna thu na za zo tham uh hi.
Tua in, a toma ka gelhsa bangin kilaakna tawh kei tunga hong kitheisak thuthuk ahi hi.
Tua ahi teh hih thu na sim uh ciangin Khrist thuthuk ka theihzia na thei ding uh hi.
Tua pen Pasian sawltakpi siangthote le kamsangte tunga tua Kha tawh tu huna a kilaak bangin khang dang mite tungah a kitheisak kei hi.
Hih thuthuk i cih in, lungdamna-thu tungtawnin Gentile-te in Israel-te tawh luah khawmin, pumpi nate suakkhawm uh a, Khrist Jesu sunga kamciam a tangkhawm a suahna uh ahi hi.
Ama vangliatna nasepna tungtawna kei tungah tua Pasian hehpihna letsong hong kipiak hanga hih lungdamna-thu nasempa a suak ka hi hi.
Pasian mi a neupente sanga a neuzaw hi napi hih hehpihna a kizongkhia zo lo Khrist hauhna thu Gentile-te tunga hilh ding
le a beisa khanghunte a, na khempeuh a piangsak Pasian sunga a kiselcip hih thuthuk nasepna mikim tungah teltaka lakkhia dingin kei hong kipia hi.
Ama ngimna in Pasian pilna thuap tampite pawlpi tungtawnin vanlam gam sunga thuneihna neite le ukna a neite tunga theihsak ding deihna hi a,
tua pen ama tawntung ngimna tawh kizui-in i Topa Khrist Jesu sunga a bukimsak pen ahi hi.
Ama sung le, ama sunga upna tungtawnin suahtakna le kimuanna tawh Pasian i nai thei ta hi.
Tua ahi manin note adinga ka thuaknate hangin a lungkia lo dingin kong ngen hi, tuate note minthanna ahi hi.
Hih thu hangin Pa mai-ah ka khukdin hi,
amah panin vantung le leitung ama innkuanbupa min a kilo hi.
Amah in a minthang ama hauhna panin, Kha tungtawnin vangliatna tawh na sunglam mi uh hong thakhauhsak nadingin thu ka ngen hi.
Tua pen upna tungtawnin note lungsungah Khrist a ten theih nading ahi hi. Tua ciangin note ading kong ngetsakna in itna ah zungkha-in, kipin,
misiangte khempeuh tawh vangliatna nei khawmin Khrist hong itna, a zaina, a sauna, a sanna, le a thukna na theih zawh nading uh,
le theihbatloh ahi itna thei-in, Pasian kicinna khempeuh ah note na dim theih nading uh ahi hi.
Tu-in i nget khempeuh le i lunggeel khempeuh sanga nakpi-a thupi zawtham le, eite sunga a sem a vangliatna tawh kizui-a a hih thei pa tungah
pawlpi le Khrist Jesu tungtawnin akhang akhang a tawntungin minthanna omden ta hen. Amen.
Tua ahi ciangin Topa adingin thongkia keimah in na ngahsa uh hong sapna tawh kilawm-a na nuntak ding uh kong kun hi.
Kiniamkhiat le migitakin om un; lungduai-in itna tawh khat le khat na kithuak keeikai un.
Kilemna in hong khihkhawmna tungtawnin, tua Kha a na kipumkhatna uh na letkip nadingun na hih theih tawpun hih un.
Pumpi khat le Kha khat – note hong kisap lai-a lametna khata hong kisap bangin –
Topa khat, upna khat, baptise-na khat,
na khempeuh tunga om, na khempeuh tungtawna, na khempeuh sunga ompa, mite khempeuh Pasian le Pa khat a om hi.
Ahi hangin Khrist sehsaknasa bangin eite tungah hehpihna hong kipia ciat hi.
Hih thu hangin: “A sangah amah a kahtoh ciangin, amatte pi-in tonpih to a, mite tungah letsongte a pia hi.” a na ci hi.
(Leilam gam, a niamna ah amah kumsuk lo hileh, “amah kahto” a cih, bang a cihnopna hi ding hiam?
Khuavannuai bup na khempeuh a kicingsak dingin a kumsukpa tektek vante khempeuh sanga sangzawin a kahto pa ahi hi.)
Amah, mi pawlkhat sawltakpi, pawlkhat kamsang, pawlkhat lungdamna thugen, pawlkhatte thuhilh sia le laihilh sia sem dingin a pia pa hi-a,
tuate in Khrist pumpi a khansuah theih nadingun Pasian mite na sem dinga a bawlkholh nading ahi hi.
Tua in eite khempeuh, tua upna le Pasian Tapa theihna ah khat suaka, Khrist kicinna zahzah a i picin mateng ading ahi hi.
Tua ciangin mite in zuau siamna le khelpilna tawh a geel uh amau khemna ah, tuihual in a lapsuk a laptoh, thuhilhna huih citeng in amut kawikawi naungekte i hi nawn kei ding hi.
Tua sangsik in, itna tawh thutak genin, Lutang ahi pa Khrist sungah, na khempeuh ah ama sungah i khangto ding hi.
Amah panin pumpi na khempeuh thagui tekah kihuh kizom khawmin, amau sep ding tek a sep ciangin tua pumpi, itna sungah khangin amah le amah a kikhansuah hi.
Tua ahi ciangin note, Gentile-te ngaihsutna gina lo-a, a nuntak bangun na nuntak nawn loh nadingun hih thu Topa sungah kong gena, kong kun tangtang hi.
Amaute lungtang kikhauh sakna hanga bangmah a theih loh manun, Pasiana nuntakna panin amaute kikhenkhia-a, a theihtelna uh kimialsak hi!
Amaute in zumna mel thei nawn loin a siang lo namkima bual dingin a uangzaw kilunggulhna nei tawntung uh a, amau hukna le lanna ah a kipiakhia khin zo uh hi.
Bangbang hi ta leh note in tua bang lamin Khrist na thei kei uh hi.
Jesu sunga om thutak tawh kizui-in ama sungah hong kihilh zo ahi ciangin note in amah thu na zaksa uh hi takpi hi.
Tuma lai-a na nuntakna uh tawh kisai-in khemhat lunggulhna in a siatsaksa na milui uh suahkhia ding,
na lungsim puakzia uh kibawl thak ding,
amaan thumaanna le sianthona taktak sungah Pasian tawh kibang dinga kipiangsak mithak na silh ding uh note hong kihilh hi.
Tua ahi manin eite khempeuh pumpi khat sunga a nate i hi manin note a kuamapeuh in zuauphuahna suahkhia-in a vengte tungah maantakin thu a gen pelmawh ding hi.
"Na heh sungin na mawh kei in,” na heh dam loin ni na tumsak kei in,
dawimangpa siksan na awn kei in.
A guta densa pa in gu nawn peuhmah loin a kitangsamte na khatpeuh a hop theih nadingin ama khut tawh, kimanna a nei na khatpeuh sem pelmawh hen.
Na kam panun kam hoih lo pusuak sak kei un, ahi zongin a zate in phat tuampih in amau tangsapna tawh kizui-a, amaute bawlpha in, a huh thei ding kammal bek pusuaksak zaw un.
Tatkhiat ni adinga note hong kiciamtehna Pasian Khasiangtho na dahsak kei un.
Khaat-na, ngonghehna le hehna, kitotzakna le gensiatnate khempeuh etsatna nam khempeuh tawh na paikhia un.
Note migi in khat le khat na kikhuatuah unla Pasian in Khrist sunga note mawhna hong maisak bang tektek in, na mawhna uh na kimaisak ciat un.
Tua ahi manin itluat tate bangin Pasian a ettehte hi unla,
Khrist in eite hong it a, eite adingin Pasian tungah a namtui-a biakna ding le biakpiakna dingin amah le amah a kipiakkhiat bangin itna nuntakna tawh na nungta un.

Ahi hangin note lakah numei pasal paktatna lim ahi a, siantho lohna nam khat peuhpeuh le huaihamna ahi zongin a om peuhmah kei ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian misiangthote adingin hihte kilawm lo hi.
Note kam panin zahmawhpau le haipauna, ciamnuih thanghuaite, tua banga kilawm lote omsak loin lungdam na ko zaw un.
Ahang in, a thangtat, a siangtho lo ahikeh a huaiham, tua banga hihte milim bia hi-a, Khrist le Pasian gam ah luah ding bangmah a nei kei hi, cih na theitel uh hi.
Thu mawkmawk tawh kuamah na kikhem zosak kei un. Bang hang hiam cihleh tua bang thute hangin thumang lote tungah Pasian thangpaihna a tung hi.
Tua ahi manin amaute tawh kithuah kei un.
Ahang in, hun khat lai-in note khuamial na hi uh a, ahi hangin tu-in Topa sungah khuavak na hi uh hi. Khuavak tate bangin na nungta un;
Ahang in, khuavak gah in, hoihna khempeuh, thumaanna le thutak ahi hi.
Topa lungkimna bang hiam, cih na zong un.
Gah a gah lo khuamial gamtatna tawh na kisawhkha kei unla amau gamtatnate na pholak zaw un.
Ahang in, thumang lote in a simthama a septe uh a kigenkhiat bek zong maizumhuai hi.
Ahi hangin khuavak in a pholak na peuhmah a kimu thei hi.
Ahang in, na khempeuh a kimu theisak khuavak ahi hi. Hih thu hangin: “Ihmu mi aw, khanglo in, misi panin tho in, tua hileh nang tungah Khrist a tang ding hi,”a na ci hi.
Tua hi-a na nuntak zia uh, apil lote bang hi loin apilte bangin limtakin kidawm unla,
nite hoih lo ahi manin hun hoih na neih peuhpeuh uh a hoih penin na zang un.
Tua ahi ciangin hai kei unla, Topa deihna bang ahi hiam, cih theitel zaw un.
Zu kham kei un, uangtat luatna mun hong tun thei hi. Tua sangsikin, Kha tawh na kidim zaw un.
Phatna-late, biakna late le khalam late in khat le khat na kihopih un. Na lung sung uhah phat kawmin Topa tungah la sa un,
Topa Jesu Khrist minin na khempeuh hangin Pa Pasian tungah lungdam na ko tawntung un.
Khrist zahtakna tawh khat le khat na kiniamkhiat tuah un.
Zite aw, Topa tunga ki-ap bangin na pasalte uh tungah ki-ap un.
Ahang in, Khrist in ama pumpi ahi pawlpi lutang le a Honpa ahi bangin zi lutang in a pasal ahi hi.
Khrist tungah pawlpi a ki-ap bangin zite zong na khempeuh ah a pasalte uh tungah a ki-ap ding uh hi.
Khrist in a pawlpi it a, ama adingin amah mah a kipumpiak khiat bang tektek in, pasalte aw, na zite uh it un.
Amah in pawlpi siangtho dingin thu tungtawnin tui in sawp a, singthosak hi,
tua pen a nin baang lo, a vun tonna om lo, a melhemna khatpeuh om lo tham loin siangtho le kawkbaang lo-a, a tangkhia pawlpi-in amah le amah a kipiakkhiat theih nading ahi hi.
Tua tawh kibangin, pasalte in amau pumpi bangin a zite uh a it uh kul hi. A zi it pa amah le amah ki-it ahi hi.
Tuate khempeuh khit ah, ama pumpi mudah kuamah om ngei lo a, Khrist in a pawlpi cingin a vak bang tektekin ama pumpi cingin a vak zaw hi.
Ahang in, eite ama pumpi nate i hi hi.
"Hih thu hangin pasal in a nu le a pa nusia-in a zi tawh kigawm dinga, tua nihte sakhat a suak ding uh hi.”
Hih in thuthukpi khat hi-a, ahi hangin kei gen ahileh Khrist le pawlpi thu ahi hi.
Bangbang ahi zongin, note a kua mapeuh amah leh amah a ki-it bangin na zite uh na it pelmawh un. Zi in zong a pasal a zahtak pelmawh ding hi.
Tate aw, Topa sungah na nu na pate uh thu na mang un, ahang in, hih in thumaan ahi hi.
"Na nu na pa pahtawi in.” Hih in thuciam tawh kizui thupiak masa pen ahi hi.
Tua bang na hileh na khan nuam dinga, leitungah sawtpi nuntak nuam na sa ding hi.
Pate aw, na tate uh mawk hehsak kei un, tua sangsikin, pattahna le Topa lamlahna ah khangtosak un.
Silate aw, Khrist thu na man ding bang tektek un, na lungsim sung uhah thutak cihtakna tawh zahtakna le kihtakna tawh na leitung pute thu na mang un.
Amaute hong muh sunga hong pahtak nading bek hi loin Khrist sila bangin na lungtang sung uhah Pasian deih bangin amaute thu na mang un.
Mihing nasem bang hi loin Pasian nasem bangin na lungtang khempeuh uh tawh na sem un.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian in sila ahi a, sila lo ahi zongin na hoih a sem peuhpeuh pahtakman a piak ding na thei uh hi.
Tua ciangin pute aw, tuamah tawh kibangin na silate uh na hih un. Van tungah note le amaute Pu ahi khawmpa om a, amah in gup le paih a neih loh lam thei na hi manun amaute na tawng kei un.
A nunung penin, Topa sung le ama thahat vangliatna sungah thakhauh un.
Dawimangpa hong sawmnate na nan zawh nadingun Pasian galvan a kimin silh un.
Ahang in, eite do ahileh si le sa hi loin vanlam gama gam-ukte, thuneihnate, hih leitung khuamial vangliatnate le kha gilo galkapte ahi hi.
Tua ahi manin ni hoih lo hong tun cianga na pan theih nading uh le hih ding khempeuh na hih khit uh cianga na din zawh lai nadingun Pasian galvan a kimin silh un.
Tua ciangin na kawnguah thutak kawnggak gaksa, na awmuah thumaanna awmdal bulhsa le
na khe-uhah kilemna lung damna-thu pana hong pai kigin kholhna bulhsa-in kiptakin ding un.
Hihte khempeuh banah gilopa mei kuang thaltangte na sukmit theih nadingun upna lum tawi un.
Hotkhiatna sik lukhu le Pasian thu ahi Kha namsau la un.
Tua ciangin hun khempeuh ah thungetna nam khempeuh le ngetna tawh Kha-in thu na ngen un. Hih thu ngaihsun kawmin pilvang unla misiangte khempeuh ading thu na ngetsak den un.
Thu ka hilh peuhpeuh cianga thu hong kipiak theih nading le lungdamna thuthuk lau lo-a ka theihsak theih nadingin zong thu na ngetsak un.
Ahang in, tua thu hangin sikkhainiang bulh kawma palai ka hi hi. Ka hih ding bangin lau peumah loin ka pulakkhiat theih nading thu na ngetsak un.
Topa sunga nasem muanhuai ka it sanggampa Tychicus in kei bangci om a, na bangci sep cih na theih nadingun na khempeuh hong gen ding hi.
Kote bangci cih na theih nading uh le amah in note hong hanthawn theih nading mahmah deihna-in amah note kiangah kong sawl hi.
Pa Pasian le Topa Jesu Khrist panin upna tawh kigawmkhawm itna le lemna, sanggamte tungah om ta hen.
A si theilo itna tawh eite Topa Jesu Khrist a itte khempeuh tungah hehpihna om ta hen.
Khrist Jesu nasem Paul le Timothy in, Philippi a om Khrist Jesu sunga misiangte khempeuh le saptuam kemte le saptuam upa teng tungah:
Eite Pa Pasian le Topa Jesu Khrist tung pana hehpihna le lemna no tungah om ta hen.
Note kong phawk simin ka Pasian tungah lungdam ka ko hi.
Note khempeuh ading thu ka nget simin lungnopna tawh ka ngen tawntung hi,
bang hang hiam cih leh ni masa pen ni-a kipan tu dong lungdamna-thu sungah na kihel den uh hi.
Note sunga nasep hoih a panpa in Khrist Jesu ni dongin a bucing dingin semsuak ding cih ka muang hi.

Ka lungsunga note kong neih nungsangin hih bang zia a lungsim a kong neih ding a man ahi hi; kolbulhin ka om a, lungdamna-thu hu-in ka kipsak zongin note khempeuh in Pasian hehpihna kei tawh na tangkhawm uh hi.
Note khempeuh Khrist Jesu itna tawh kong lunggulh lam Pasian in a thei ding hi.
Ka thungetna in: note itna theihna le a sung thu khenteltheihna ah khang semsema,
a hoihpen telsiang thei-in Khrist ni dong siangtho-in, kawkbanna om loin,
Pasian minthan nading le a kiphat nadingin Jesu Khrist tungtawna hong pai thumaan gah tawh na dim nading uh ahi hi.
Tu-in sanggamte aw, kei tunga hong tungsa thu in lungdamna-thu khangsak takpi cih na theih ding uh ka deih hi.
Tua hangin Khrist hanga kol bulh a om ka hilam kumpi inn cingte khempeuh le mi khempeuh in theikhawk ta uh hi.
Kol hong kibulhna hangin Topa sunga sanggamte a tamzaw in Pasian thute hangtak le lau het loin gen ding hanthawnna a ngah zaw uh hi.
Mi kimkhatte in enna le kilungsim demna tawh Khrist thu hilh uh a, ahi hangin adangte in amau ngimna hoih nei in, a hilh uh hi, cih thumaan ahi hi.
Hih a nunungte mah in lungdamna-thu a hu dinga om lai ka hilam thei-in itna tawh a hilh uh hi.
A masa pawl in thutak paii loin, kol bulha ka om sungin buaina tawh kei hong linglawngsak thei ding uh kisa in huaiham sawmin Khrist thu a hilh uh hi.

Ahi hangin bang phamawh ahi hiam? A thupi penin, ngimna hoih ahi-a ngimna hoih lo ahi zongin bangbang lamah Khrist thu a kihilh nak leh pha zo hi. Hih thu hangin ka nuam hi. Hihi, ka nuam lailai ding hi.
Ahang in, note thungetna tung tawn le Jesu Khrist Kha in kei hong huhna bangin kei tunga piang thu pen ka suahtakna hong suak ding cih ka thei hi.
Ka pumpi ah nuntakna ahikeh sihna in ahi densa bangin tu-in Khrist a kipahtawi theih nadingin a kicing hanna ka nei ding cih maizum loin lawptakin kihehnemna le lametna ka nei hi.
Kei adingin nuntak, Khrist hi-a, sih lah metna ahi hi.
Pumpi-in nungta lai leng, ka nasepna gah, gah lai ding hi. Tua hi napi bang teelzaw ding ka hi hiam? Ka thei zo kei hi!
Tua nih saikakin ka om a, paikhia-in Khrist tawh omkhawm ding ka lunggulh hi; tua mah nakpi in hoihzaw tham hi.
Ahi hangin note adingin pumpi-a ka nuntak lai ding kisamzaw hi.
Hih thu theitel ka hi manin ka nungta lai dinga, upna sunga na khan nading uh le na lungnop nadingun note khempeuh tawh ka omkhawm lai ding hi.
Tua ciangin note tawh ka omkhawm kikna tungtawnin Khrist Jesu sunga na lungnopna uh kei hangin a dimlet ding hi.

Bang khatpeuh piang ta leh, Khrist lungdamna-thu tawh a kilawm in, ki-ukin na gamta un. Tua hileh hong hawhin note kong mu a, ka om loh kalin note thu ka galzak zongin lungdamna-thu upna hu in, lungsim kikhatin na dingkip uh cih ka thei ding hi;
note hong langpangte in bangmah lamah hong lausak zo lo cih zong ka thei ding hi. Hih in Pasian in amaute susia dinga note hong hon ding ahi na amaute tungah lim hi ding hi.
Ahang in, amah um ding bek hi lo, ama ading thuak dingin zong, Khrist tang dingin note hong kiphal hi.
Ka thuaksa bang note in na thuak uh cih na muh nung sangun tu-in thuak ding nei lai ka hilam thei ta un.

Khrist tawh note kigawmna hangin kihanthawnna khatpeuh na neih uh a, a itna panin kihehnepna khatpeuh na neih uh a, Kha tawh kipawlna khatpeuh na neih uh a, kikhuatuahna le kilainatna khatpeuh na neih uh leh
lungsim kibangin om a, itna kibang nei in, lungsim le tupna kikhatin na omna uh tawh ka lungnopna na kimsak un.
Huaihamna le kihisakna tawh bangmah hih loin kiniamkhiatin no sangin midangte a hoihzaw-in na ngaih sun un.
Note khempeuh in no angsung ding bek khual loin midangte angsung ding zong na khualsak ciat un.
Note in Khrist Jesu lungsim bang na nei un:
Amah Pasian pianngei taktak hi napi Pasian tawh kikima om ding khiatlahna a letcip ding ngaihsun loin,
bangmah kihisak loin nasem pianngei tektek hong nei-a mihing tawh hong kibang zaw hi.
Mihing mel taktak hong pua a, amah le amah kiniamkhiatin, singlamteh tungah a sih dongin thu a mang tazen hi!
Tua ahi manin Pasian in amah a sang pen munah tawisanga, min khempeuh sanga min tungnung zaw pia-in,
tua Jesu min ah vantung, leitung le leinuai-a om khempeuh khukdinin,
leii peuhmah in, “Jesu Khrist, Topa hi,” ci-in pulak dinga, Pa Pasian minthanna ahi ding hi.
Tua ahi manin kong it lawmte aw, thu na man densa bangun ka om sung bek hi lo, ka om loh sungin zong ka thu hong mangzaw in, lau kawm ling kawmin note hotkhiatna na semkhia den un.
Ahang in, a hoih ama deihna bang a deih ding le a sem dingin note sunga a sempa, Pasian ahi hi.
Na khempeuh phun lo sel loin sem un;
a lungsim kawi le lungsim mawk khangmite lakah no Pasian tate, mawh nei lo, kawkbaang lo, siangtho in, khuavannuai-a aksite bangin na tan theih nadingun
nuntakna thu na letkip uh tawh kizui-in ka taina le ka nasepna a mawkna hi lo hi, cih Khrist ni-a ka kisialh nading ahi hi.
Ahi zongin note upna pana piang kithoihna leh nasepna tungah dawntheih-a biakna bangin, biaknain kei hong kisungkhia taleh note khempeuh tawh nuamin ka lungdam khawm veve hi.
Tua mah bangin note zong nuamin kei tawh na lungdam khawm ding uh hi.
Note thu ka zak ciangin kei zong ka kipak theih nadingin a sawt loin, note kiangah Timothy kong sawl pah ding Topa Jesu sungah ka lamen hi.
Note hoih nadinga hong khual taktak ding amah lo midang ka nei kei hi.
Ahang in, mi khempeuh in Jesu Khrist khual loin amau angsung bek a khual uh hi.
Ahi zongin tapa in a pa tawh a sepkhawm bangin Timothy in kei tawh lungdamna-thu a sepkhawmna ah amah le amah in a omzia a kilangsak hi, cih na thei uh hi.
Tua ahi manin kei tunga a piang ding thu a kitel phetin amah kong sawlpah ding ka lamen hi.
Kei mahmah zong kong paipah ding Topa sungah ka muang ngam hi.
Ahi hangin ka sanggampa, ka naseppih pa le ka galkappih le note thupuakpa zong ahi, ka kisapna teng hong huh dinga nong sawlpa uh Epaphroditus note kianga kong sawl kik ding kisam ka sa hi.
Ahang in, na zaksa bangun amah cina-a, note khempeuh hong ngai-in a lungdong hi.
Amah cina takpi-a, a si dektak hi. Ahi zongin Pasian in amah bek hi loin kei zong hong lainat a, dahna a kisuangsawnin hong tuaksak kei hi.
Tua ahi manin, note in amah na muh uh ciangin na nuam theih nading uh le keimah zong ka lunghimawhna a tawm tuam nadingin amah kong paisak ding ka lawpzawsan hi.
Topa sungah nuamna lianpi tawh amah na muak unla, amah bang mite na pahtawi un.
Bang hang hiam cih leh note in kei nong huh theih lohte uh hong huh dingin a nuntakna khaamin Khrist na semin a si dektak hi.
A nunung penin ka sanggamte aw, Topa sungah lungdam un! Note tungah a kibangmah gelh kik ding buaihuai lo a, note adingin bitna ahi hi.
Tua uite, tua gilo-a gamta mite tua misa a atgawpte lakah na pilvang un.
Ahang in, ei vunatte ei Kha-a Pasian biate, Khrist Jesu sunga a minthangte in, ci-le-sa ah muanna i nei kei hi.
Tua bangin suang nuam hi leng, kei mahmah in zong suan theih ding tampi ka nei hi. Midang khatpeuh in ci-le-sa suan ding nei a, a kingaihsut leh ken ka hauzaw sem hi;
a nigiat ni-a vunat Israel mi, Benjamin beh, Hebrew-te laka a Hebrew, thukham zuihna ah Pharisee,
hahkatna lamah pawlpi bawlsia; thukham tawh kisai thumaanna ah a genbaang lo ka hi hi.
Ahi hangin kei adinga metna ahi peuhmah tu-in Khrist hangin supna-in ka sim hi.

Tua tham loin ka Topa Khrist Jesu theihna a thupi luatna tawh tehin na khempeuh supna-in ka sima, ama hangin na khempeuh ka taan zo hi. Tuate khempeuh ninneng bangin ka ngaihsun hi, Khrist ka ngah nading le
ama sungah ka om theih nading hi-a, thukham pana hong pai keima thumaanna hi loin Pasian pana upna tawh hong pai Khrist upna tungtawna kingah thumaanna pen hizaw hi.
Khrist le ama thawhkikna’ vangliatna le a thuaknate thuakpihna, a sihna ah amah tawh kibatna ka thei nuam hi.
Tua pen misi pana thawhkikna ka ngah theih nading ahi hi.
Hih khempeuh a ngah khin ta, hong kicingsak khin zo, ka cihna hi loin Khrist Jesu in kei hong matna mah ken zong ka mat zawh nadingin mai ka nawt tentan hi.
Sanggamte aw, a mankha khin ta in ka kisim kei hi. Ahi hangin ka hih na khat in: nunglama omte ka mangngilh-a mailama om nate ka delh tentan hi.
Khrist Jesu sunga vanlam-a letsong ngah dinga Pasian in hong sapna kung lam manawh in ka nawt teitei hi.
A picing khinsa eite khempeuh in tua bang lungsim i neih ding ahi hi. Note in a kilamdang thu tuam khat na ngaihsut uh leh tua zong Pasian in hong theitelsak ding hi.
I ngahsa ciangciang bek tawh kikhom in eite nungta ni.
Sanggamte aw, kei omdan zui-in midangte tawh kipawl unla, note gamtat zia dinga kong piak bang uh zui-a a nungtate ciamteh un.
Ahang in, a beisa hunah mi tampite Khrist singlamteh galin a nungta uh hi, ci-a kong gensa bangin tu-in zong khitui nangawn tawh kong gen kik lai hi.
Amaute tupna, siatna hi-a, a pasian uh amau gilpi hi-in, a minthanna uh amau maizumna ahi hi. Amaute in leitung nate bek a ngaihsun uh hi.
Ahi hangin eite gammi i hina vantung ahi hi. Eite in tua mun panin Honpa Khat – Topa Jesu Khrist lawptakin i ngak hi.
Na khempeuh a ukna nuai-ah a koihsak thei tua vangliatna in a simmawh huai i pumpite, a minthang ama pumpi tawh kibang dingin a khel ding pa amah ahi hi.
Tua ahi manin ka sanggam, kong it, kong ngaih luat, ka lungnopna le ka pahtakman lukhute aw, Topa sungah na dinkip zia ding uh tua bang ahi hi, kong it lawmte aw!
Euodia le Sintyche-te, Topa sung-ah khat le khat a kilem nadingun ka thum hi.
Hihi, ka hakkol puakpih muanhuai aw, lungdamna-thu ka genna-a hong panpih hih numeite, Clement le ka naseppihte, nuntakna laibu sunga a min omte khempeuh na huh un.
Topa sungah lungnuam tawntung un. Kong genkik ding hi: Lungnuam un!
Mi khempeuh tungah na migitna uh na kitelsak un. Topa hong nai hi.
Na khatpeuhah lunghimawh in patau kei unla, na khempeuh ah lungdamkohna tawh thuahin, thungetna le ngetna Pasian tungah na tun un.
Tua hileh theihtelnate khempeuh a khup Pasian lemna in, Khrist Jesu sungah na lungsimte uh le na lungtangte uh hong cing ding hi.

A nunung penin sanggamte aw, a maan peuhmah, a zahtakhuai peuhmah, a dik peuhmah, a siang peuhmah, a ithuai peuhmah, a pahtakhuai peuhmah, na khatpeuh a hoih pen hi-a, a phattak nak leh tua bang nate na ngaihsun un.
Kei tung pana na sinsa, na ngahsa, na zaksa uh ahi zongin, kei sunga na muhsate uh ahi zongin na taksuaksak un. Tua hileh lemna Pasian, note tawh a omkhawm ding hi.
Kei nong deihsakna uh na thak suaksak takpi manun, tu petpetin Topa sungah nakpitakin ka lungnuam hi. Nong lunghimawh takpi uh a, ahi hangin nong lah nading uh hun hoih na nei kei uh hi.
A piang bangbang ka lungkim nadingin a kisin khinsa ka hi manin, kisapna nei-a hih thu a gen ka hi kei hi.
Taksap kici bang hi-a, kicing a kici bang hiam cih ka thei hi. Gilkialna hiam gilvahna, zawnna hiam hauhna – omzia namkim ah lungkimna thusim ka sin zo hi.
Kei thahatna hong pia pa tungtawnin na khempeuh ka hih thei hi.
Tua hi napi gimna ka thuak laitakin, kei nong thuakpih uh hoih mahmah hi.
Tua tham loin, no Philippi-te in na theihsa bangun, lungdamna-thu na theih cil lai nite ua, Macedonia pana ka zinkhiat lai-in, piakna le ngahna ah note longal hong huh pawlpi khat beek a om kei hi;
ahang in, Thessalonica a ka om sung nangawn in, kisapna ka neih ciangin huhna nong khakkhak uh hi.
Letsong ka zonna hi loin, note hamphat nading ka deihna hizaw hi.

Ken ka ngah ding zah ka ngah banah a tamzaw nangawn ka ngah zo hi; nong huhna uh kicing khengvala, Epaphroditus nong khak uh letsong zong ka ngah hi. Tuate, Pasian a lungdamsak, biakpiakna santham biakna namtui ahi hi.
Khrist Jesu sunga hauhna minthang tawh ka Pasian in note kisapna khempeuh hong guan ding hi.
Eite Pasian le Pa tungah a tawntung in minthanna om den ta hen. Amen.
Khrist Jesu sunga om mi siangte khempeuh na hopihsak un. Kei tawh a omkhawm i sanggamte in hong hopih uh hi.
Misiangte khempeuh, a diakdiak in Caesar innkuante in note hong hopih uh hi.
Topa Jesu Khrist hehpihna in note kha hong ompih ta hen. Amen.
Pasian deihna hanga Khrist Jesu sawltakpi Paul le i sanggampa Timothy in,
Colosse a, Khrist sunga a siangtho le a muanhuai sanggamte tungah: Eite Pa Pasian tung pana hehpihna le lemna note tungah om ta hen.
Note ading thu ka nget uh ciangin Pasian, eite Topa Jesu Khrist’ Pa tungah lungdam ka ko tawntung uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Khrist Jesu sunga na upna uh le misiangte khempeuh na itna uh ka za zo uh hi.
Tua upna le itna note adinga vantunga kikoihkholsa tua lametna pana piang hi-a, note tunga hong tung na zaksa uh tua lungdamna-thu – thumaan pen mah ahi hi.
Tua lungdamna-thu za-in Pasian hehpihna thutak khempeuh ah na theihtel ni-ua kipan note lakah a gah mah bangin, leitung mun khempeuh ah hih lungdamna thu in gah gahin a khang semsem hi.
Note in ka it uh, ka naseppih uh kote tanga Khrist nasem muanhuai Epaphras tung panin na za uh a,
amah in Kha sunga note itna zong kote hong hilh hi.
Hih thu hangin note thu ka zak ni-ua kipan, note ading khalam pilna le theihtelna khempeuh tungtawna, ama deih bang theihna tawh note hong dimsak nadingin Pasian tungah thunget ka tawp kei uh hi.
Hih banga ka thunget uh Topa adingin note a mannei-in nungta a, lam khempeuh ah amah lungkimsakin, na hoih khempeuh ah gah na gah ding uh, Pasian theihna lamah na khan nading uh,
le a lianpi sikdona le lungduaina lungnuamtaka ama thahatna minthang tawh kituaka vang liatna khempeuh tawh na thakhauh nading uh ahi hi.
Khuavak gama misiangte tawh gouluah khawm dingin note hong cingsak pa tungah lungdamna ka ko uh hi.
Ahang in, amah in khuamial ukna gam pan eite hong hukhia in, a it a Tapa gam sung hong tun zo a,
eite in ama sungah tatkhiatna le mawhnate maisakna i ngah hi.
Amah a kimu thei lo Pasian lim hi a, a kipiangsak nate khempeuh tunga a suak masa pen ahi hi.

Ahang in, na khempeuh ama piansak hi a: vantug le leitunga om nate, muh theih le muh theih lohte, kumpi tokhomte ahi zongin, vangliatna ahi zongin, ukte ahi zongin, thuneite ahi zongin, na khempeuh amah in ama adingin a piansak ahi hi.
Na khempeuh a om ma-in amah om a, ama sungah na khempeuh a kizom khawm hi.
Amah tua pumpi – pawlpi lutang ahi hi; na khempeuh ah amah a tung nungpen ahi theih nadingin, amah a kipatcilna le misite pana suak masa pen ahi hi.
Ahang in, ama sungah Pasian kicinna teng a om nading,
singlamteh tunga luang sisan tungtawnin kilemna piangsakin, leitunga om nate hitaleh vantunga om nate hitaleh na khempeuh ama tungtawnin amah tawh a kilemkik-sakna in Pasian lungkimna ahi hi.
Khatvei lai-in Pasian kiang panin gamdang mi na hi uh a, na gitloh gamtatnate uh hangin lungsim-a galte na hi uh hi.
Ahi hangin tu-in kawkbaanna om loin mawhsakna panin suakta a, ama muhna ah a siangtho-a hong piak theih nadingin Khrist in note ama pumpi-a sihna tawh hong kilemkiksak zo hi.

Tua pen lungdamna-thu pana piangkhia lametna pan kihei lo-a, kiptakin kilam a, note upna ah na omsuak uh leh cihna ahi hi. Hih lungdamna-thu, van nuai-a nungta khempeuh tungah a kitangko na zaksa uh hi-a, keimah Paul tua lungdamna thu nasempa ka suak zo hi.
Tu-in note adingin ka thuakna ah ka lung nuama, Khrist thuaknate tawh kisai-a pawlpi ahi ama pumpi hanga a sam lai thuaknate ka ci-le-sa in ka hudim hi.
Pasian thu a kicingtakin note tungah kong piak nadingin Pasian hong sawlna hangin nasempa ka suak hi.
Tua thuthuk, akhang akhang khanghunte ah a kiselcip hi-a ahi hangin tu-in misiangte tungah hong kipholak ta hi.
Pasian in a minthang hih thuthuk hauhnate, Gentile-te lak amau kianga a theisak dinga hong teel ahi hi. Note sunga om Khrist pen tua thuthuk a minthang lametna ahi hi.
Mi khempeuh Khrist sunga a kicing kim-a ka piak theih nadingun mi khempeuh tungah pilna namkim tawh taihilhin, hilhin amah ka tangko uh hi.
Tua ngimin kei sunga vangliantaka a sem ama thahatna khempeuh tawh pang tentanin a na ka sem hi.
No ading le Laodicia a omte ading le ka mel hong mu ngei nai lote adingin bangzahtakin na sem ka hi hiam, cih na theih ding uh ka deih hi.
Ka deihna in, amaute lungsungah kihanthawnin itna ah kigawm a, hauhna kicing theihtelna bukim nei-in Pasian thuthuk – tua Khrist a theih theih nading uh ahi hi.
Ama sungah pilna le theihna goute khempeuh a kisel hi.
Kuamah in note paulam nei-a kamsiam thu tawh hong khem zawh loh nadingin hih thute kong gen hi.
Tua hi-a note tawh ka pumpi a om khawm loh hangin note tawh kha-in ka om khawm a, Khrist sunga na upna uh a kipzia le hoihtaka na nuntakzia uh ka muh manin ka nuam hi.
Tua ahi ciangin Khrist Jesu, Topa a na sansa bang tektekun ama sungah nungta suakin,
note hong kihilh bangin ama sungah zungkha-in, kilamin upna ah thakhauhin om unla lungdamna tawh kidimlet tawntung un.
Khrist tunga kingak sangin mihingte tang ngeinate tung le hih leitung thubulte tunga kinga-a a hawmpi le a khem thei thuguizuihna tungtawnin kuamah in sal-a hong mat loh nadingun kikem un.
Ahang in, Khrist sunga Pasian-hina bucing pumpi nei-in a vekpi in om a,
vangliatna le thuneihna khempeuh tunga lutang ahipa, Khrist sungah kicinna note hong kipia hi.
Note zong mawhdim pianngei suahkhia-in ama sungah vunat na hi uh a, mihing khut-a at hilo Khrist hong at, vunatsa na hi uh hi.
Baptisena sungah amah tawh na kivui khawm uh a, amah misi pana a thosak Pasian vangliatna ah upna tungtawnin amah tawh na thokhawm zo uh hi.
Note na mawhnate uh le na mawh dim pianngei vunat lohna sung uhah na sih laitakun Pasian in note Khrist tawh hong nungta khawmsak hi. Amah in i mawhnate khempeuh hong maisaka,
eite langa pang eite hong do, a kigelhsa ngeina-bucing le a zuih ding ngeinate phiat-a, singlamteh ah kilhin a lakhiamang hi.
A vangliatnate le a thuneihnate suahkhiatsakin, singlamteh tawh tuate tungah gualzo-a, amah in tuate mipi muhnop a suaksak hi.
Tua ahi manin annek tuidawn ahi a, biakna pawikham ni, Kha Det pawi ahikeh Sabbath ni tawh kisai-in note tungah kuamah thu na khensak kei un.
Hihte in hong tung ding nate liim ahi hi; a taktak pen ahileh Khrist sungah a om hi.

Kiniam khiatna man lo le vansawltakte biakna a pakta mi khatpeuh, tua pah takman ngah zo lo dingin kibawlsak kei un. Tua bang mite in a muhsa uh thute a neng a tawngin gen a, ama khami lo lungsim in thadah ngaihsutnate tawh amah a kisatheisak hi.
Amah in, sazang le thagui-in vaka kizomkhawmsakin Pasian in a khansak banga a khang pumpi buppi pan, Lutang tawh a kizopna pa a mansuah hi.
Note in hih leitunga ngeina bulpite Khrist tawh na sihsan nungsangun, bang hangin hih leitung aa ahi lai banga, hih ngeinate:
"Len kei in! Ciam kei in! Lawng kei in!” a cihte nuai-a kipia lai na hi uh hiam?
Hihte khempeuh zatna tawh, leitung mite thupiakte le hilhnate kibulphuh ahi manin a kisia khin dinga laitansa ahi hi.
Tua bang ngeinate, amau bawltawm biakna, amau kiniamkhiatna man lo pumpi bawlsiatnate pilna takpi tawh kibang napi ci-le-sa deihluatna-a bualna kham nadingin kimanna taktak a nei kei hi.
Tua ahi ciangin, note Khrist tawh thokhawm khin na hi nungsang un Pasian taklama a om Khrist tutna mun, tunglam nate ah na lungsim uh na nga un.
Na lungsimte uh, leitung nate ahi lo tunglam nate tungah na nga un.
Ahang in, note na si zo uh a, tu-in na nuntakna uh, Khrist tawh Pasian sungah a kisel zo hi.
Note nuntakna ahi Khrist hong kilat ciangin note zong ama minthanna tawh na kilangkhawm ding uh hi.
Tua ahi manin na leitung pianngei uh ahi: numei-pasal paktatna siantholohna, kilunggulhluatna, gitlohnate le milim biakna ahi huaihamna na sisak un.
Hihte hangin Pasian thangpaihna hong tung ding hi.
Khatvei lai-in hih bang nuntakna tawh na nungta uh hi.
Ahi hangin tu-in ahileh tua nate khempeuh: hehna, ngonghehna, etsatna, gendaihatna le a kihhuai kampau, na muk panun na paikhia pelmawh un.
Na milui hinna uh le na gamtatna teng uh na suahkhiat khit nungsangun khat le khat na kikhem kei un.
A piangsak-Pa lim sunin theihna lama a kibawlthak mithak na silh un.
Hih thu ah Greek mi, Jew mi, vunat, vunat lo, mi melmawl, Scythia mi, sila, sila lo, a om kei hi; ahi hangin Khrist, na khempeuh hi-a, na khempeuh sungah a om hi.
Tua ahi manin note, Pasian teelsa a siangtho le a ithuai mi na hi bangun no le no in, kikhuatuahna, migitna, kiniam khiatna lungnemna le thuakzawhna na silh un.
Khat le khat kilungnoplohna na neih uh ciangin kithuak zo un. Topa in note hong maisak bangin na kimaisak tek un.
Hih a hoih pente khempeuh tungah, tuate khempeuh kicingtakin khata henkhawm itna na silhthuah un.
Pum khat a suak dingin lemna ah hong sap nungsangin na lungtangte uh Khrist lemna na uksak un. Na lungdam un.

Pilna khempeuh tawh note khat le khat kihilhin kithuhilh unla, na sunguah lungdamna tawh Phatna-late, biakna late le khalam-late Pasian tungah na sak kawmun na lungsim sunguhah Khrist thu na tengsak phitphet un.
Tua ciangin na hih peuhpeuh uh thu-in ahi-a, sepna-in ahi zongin Pa Pasian tungah ama tungtawnin lungdam na ko unla, Topa Jesu minin tuate na hih un.
Zite aw, Topa sungah a kilawm bangin na pasalte uh tungah na ki-ap un.
Pasalte aw, na zite uh it unla, amau tungah na ngongtat kei un.
Tate aw, na khempeuh ah na nu na pa-te uh thu na mang un, hih in Topa a lungkimsak hi.
Pate aw, na tate uh hehsak kei un, tua hi kei leh lungkia kha ding uh hi.
Silate aw, na khempeuh ah na leitung pute uh thu na mang un; amaute hong muh laitak le amau hong angvan nading deihna hi loin lungsim cihtakna le Topa zahtakna tawh na sem un.
Na khat peuhpeuh na hih uh ciangin mihing nasem bang hi lo, Topa nasem bangin na lungsim khempeuh uh tawh sem un.
Topa tung pan pahtakmanin gouluahna na ngah ding uh hi, cih na thei uh hi. A na nasep uh Topa Khrist ahi hi.
Khialhna a bawl mi peuhmah, angvantuamna om loin a khialhna man kipia kik ding hi.
Pute aw, note in zong vantung ah pu khat na neih lam uh phawk kawmin na nasemte uh a kilawm a kituak in vak un.
Lungdamtak le kikem gige kawmin thunget na hahkat un.
Tua ciangin sikkhainiang buna ka omna, Khrist thuthukte ka tangko theih nadingin kote ading zong thu na ngetsak un.
Ka tangko ding banga siangtaka ka tangko theih nadingin thu na ngetsak un.
A pualam mite tungah na gamtatzia uh na pilvang un; hun khempeuh a hoih penpenin zang un. _
Mi khatpeuh na dawn nading zia uh na theih nadingun, mi tawh na kihona uah hehpihna tawh kidim, ci sawhsa hi tawntung hen.
Tychicus in kei tunga thuthakte khempeuh hong gen ding hi. Amah i it sanggampa, nasem muanhuai le Topa sunga i naseppih khat ahi hi.
Kote omzia na theih theih nadingun hong gen ding le na lungsim uh hong hanthawn thei dingin amah note kiangah kong sawl hi.
Note lakah khat, a muanhuai, i it sanggampa Onesimus tawh hong ton uh hi. Amaute in hih lai-a thupiang khempeuh hong gen ding uh hi.
Barnabas tupa Mark hong hopih bangin ka thong kiatpih Aristarchus in zong hong hopih hi. (A thu kong gen na zaksa uh ahi hi; amah hong pai leh na muak un,)
Justus kici Jesu in zong hong hopih hi. Pasian gam adinga ka naseppih Jew mi om sun, hihte hi-a, amaute kei kihehnepna ahi uh hi.

Note lakah Khrist Jesu nasem khat ahi Epaphras in hong hopih hi. Amah in note, Pasian deihna khempeuh ah na dinkip nadingun, na picin nading uh le kitelcianna ciantak na neih nading-un nakpi-in thu a ngen den hi.
Note ading le, Laodicea le Hierpolis a omte adingin nakpi-in a sepna ka theihpih hi.
I lawm it siavuanpa Luke le Demas in hong hopih uh hi.
Laodicea a om sanggamte le Nympha le tuanu inn a pawlpi na hopihsak un.
Hih laikhak no kiangah a kisim khit ciangin Laodicea mi pawlpi ah zong na simsak unla, Laodicea pana laikhak zong na sim leuleu un.
Archippus kiangah, “Topa sunga na ngahsa nasep zosiang in,” ci-in na gen un.
Keimah Paul in hih hopihna laite keima khuta ka gelh ahi hi. Ka sik khainiangte na phawk un. Note tawh hehpihna om ta hen.
Paul, Silas le Timothy in, Pa Pasian le Topa Jesu Khrist sunga om Thessalonica Pawlpi tungah: Hehpihna le lemna no tungah om ta hen.
Kote thungetna sungah na min uh loin note khempeuh hangin lungdam ka ko tawntung uh hi.
Kote in, upna in a gahsak na sepna uh itna in a sepsak na nasep gimna uh le i Topa Jesu Khrist sunga lametna in a guat na thuak zawhnate uh Pa Pasian mai ah ka na phawk den uh hi.
Pasian hong it sanggamte aw, amah in note hong teelsa ahilam ka thei uh hi;

bang hang hiam cih leh kote gen lungdamna-thu, a thu bekin hong tung loin vangliatna, Khasiangtho le kitheih telsakna thukpi tawh no tungah hong tung hi. Note adingin no laka ka nuntak zia uh na thei uh hi.
Kote le Topa etteh-a gamtate na suak uh a, nakpitakin thuak napi Khasiangtho hong piak lungnopna tawh tua thupuak na sang uh hi.
Tua hi-a Macedonia le Achaia a thu-umte khempeuh adingin etteh na suak uh hi.
Macedonia le Achaia bek hi lo, note tung panin Topa thupuak kithangkhia ta a, Pasian na upna uh mun khempeuh ah kithei zo hi. Tua ahi manin tua thu kong gen uh a kul nawn kei hi.
Ahang in, amaute mah in kote nong sanna zia uh hong zasak sawn uh hi. Milimte na biakna uh pan, a nungta a maan Pasian nasem dingin Pasian lama na kihei zia uh le
misi pana a thawhsak pa, hong tung ding thangpaihna pana eite hong suaktasak ding pa a Tapa Jesu vantung pana hong pai ding ngaka na om zia uh amaute in hong ko uh hi.
Sanggamte aw, no kianga kong hawhna uh, a guaksuak loh lam na thei uh hi.
Na theihsa bangun tunung in Philippi ah hong kiselphona ka thuak uh a, langbawlna khauhtak om napi, i Pasian huhna tawh ama lungdamna-thu no tungah ka gen ngam uh hi.
Ahang in, kote hong ngetna pen zuauthu le ngimna siang lo pan hi loin, khembawla zol hong sawm zong ka hi kei uh hi.
Tua sangsikin Pasian in lungdamna-thu kem dinga a sansa mite bangin ka gen uh hi. Kote in mihing lungkimsak sawm loin kote lungtang hong entel pa Pasian lungkimsak ka sawmzaw uh hi.
Kote in mi maitang phatna ahi zongin, huaihamna selna in maikhuhna ahi zongin ka zat ngei loh lam uh nong thei uh a, hong theihpih Pasian ahi hi.
Kote in, note le mi khatpeuh pan mihing phat ding ka zong kei uh hi. Khrist sawltakpi ka hi mah bangun note adingin vangik a suak thei ding mah ka hi uh hi.
Ahi hangin nu in taneute a khoi bangin note lakah kong lungnem uh hi.
Note hong it lua ka hi manun, no tungah Pasian lungdamna-thu bek hi lo, ka nuntakna nangawn uh zong kong hawm nuam uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh note, kote it mahmah na suak uh hi.
Sanggamte aw, ka haksatna uh le ka nasep gimnate uh na thei lai takpi uh hi. Note kiangah Pasian lungdamna-thu ka hilh laitakun mi khatpeuh vangik ka suah loh nadingun sun le zanin na ka sem uh hi.
Thu um mite note lakah bangzah-a siangtho, thumaan le kawkbaang lo ka hi uh cih, note le Pasian ka tecite na hi uh hi.
Ahang in, pa in a tate a bawl bangin note kong bawl kim lam uh na thei uh hi;
ama gam le a minthanna sunga hong sampa Pasian tawh kilawma nungta dingin note kong hanthawn uh a, hong hehnem in kong kun uh hi.

Kote pana na zaksa uh Pasian thu na ngah uh ciangin, mihing thu bangin sang loin Pasian thu a hinatak bangin na sangpah uh a, tua thu in a um note sungah na sem ahi manin Pasian tungah ka lungdam tawntung uh hi.

Ahang in, no ka sanggamte aw, Khrist Jesu sunga om, Judea gam sunga Pasian pawlpite etteh-a gamtate na suak uh hi. Tua pawlpite in Jew-te khut a thuak uh bangin note in zong nomau gam mite khut na thuak uh hi.
Tua Jew mite in Topa Jesu le kamsangte that uh a, kote zong hong hawlkhia uh hi. Amaute in Pasian lungkimsak lo uh a mite khempeuh langah pangin,

Gentile-te a kihotkhiat theih nadingin amaute kianga thu ka hilh ding uh hong kham uh hi. Hih bangin a hih theih zahzah un mawhnate in amaute a kivuk uh hi. A tawpna ah amau tungah Pasian thangpaihna a tung petmah hi.

Ahi hangin sanggamte aw, tomvei sung note tawh hong kikhen ciangin (ngaihsutna hi lo, pumpi in) naseppih uh; adang khutgelhte ah ka sanggampa uh le Pasian’ nasem note kong ngaih luat manun, muh teitei kong sawm uh hi.
Ahang in, no kianga pai ding ka ut mahmah uh a, keimah Paul mahmah in .ka sawm thithe hangin Satan in hong khaktan hi.
Ahang in, eite Topa Jesu Khrist hong pai cianga ama mai-a ka minthanpih dingua ka lamet uh, ka lungnopna uh, ka pahtakna lukhu ding uh bang ahi hiam? Note hi lo na hi uh hiam?
Hi lua hi, note ka minthanna uh le ka lungnopna uh na hi uh hi.
Tua ciangin ka thuak zawh nawn het loh uh ciangin Athen ah ko kia hong kinusiat ding a hoih pen dingin ka ngaihsun uh hi.
Na upna uh hong thakhauhsak ding le hong hanthawn dingin Khrist lungdamna-thu zelhsakna ah Pasian na i seppih, i sanggampa Timothy kong sawl uh hi.
Tua in hih zia-etnate hanga kuamah a linglawn loh ding deihna ahi hi. Kote zia-etna thuak dinga laitansa ka hilam uh na theih luatsa uh ahi hi.
A taktakin no tawh i omkhawm lai-in kote hong kibawlsiat ding kong gengen zo uh hi. Na theih khitsa bangun a piang petmah hi.
Hih thu hangin ka thuak zawh nawn loh ciangin note upna thu kan dingin kong sawl hi. Mikhempa in bang lam hiam khatin hong khema, ka nasepna uh a mawkna a suah khak ding ka lauthawng hi.

Ahi hangin tumah in no kiang pan Timothy hong tung khinphet hi-a note upna itna le lungdamna thuthak hong puak hi. Amah in ko kiangah a lungdamhuai nong phawk tawntungna uh le kote no tawh i kimuh ding ka ut bang tektek un kote nong muhnopnate uh hong gen hi.
Tua ahi manin sanggamte aw, kote ka lungdonna uh le hong kibawlsiatna khempeuh ah note upna thu in hong hanthawn hi.
Ahang in, tu-in Topa sungah kiptaka na din khit manun ka nungta takpi ta uh hi.
Pasian mai-ah note hanga ka lungnopna khempeuh uh thuk kik nadingin Pasian tungah bangci in a kicing lungdamna a kimin ko kik thei ding ka hi uh hiam?
Note tawh kimu kika na upna uh a kisam laite kong huh theih nadingun sun le zanin hahkat theih tawpin hahkatin thu ka ngen uh hi.
Tu-in Pasian le Pa mahmah le i Topa Jesu in no kianga kong hawh theih nading uh lampi hong honsak ta hen.
No kong itna uh a khan semsem bangin note khat-le-khat le midang khatpeuh na itna uh Pasian in khangsak in dimletsak ta hen.
I Topa Jesu a misiangthote khempeuh tawh hong pai ciangin eite Pasian le Pa mai-ah siangtho-a kawkbaanna a om loh nadingin amah in na lungtang uh hong thakhauhsak ta hen.
A nunung penin sanggamte aw, Pasian na lungkimsak nadingun tu a na nuntaksa bangua na nuntak nadingun lam kong lak uh hi. Tu-in note, a tam semsem a sem dingin Topa Jesu sungah ngenin kong kun uh hi.
Topa Jesu thu neihna tawh lamlahna kong piakte uh na thei uh hi.
Pasian deihna ahi: na siantho ding uh, numei pasal paktatna na pelh ding uh,
a kuamah peuh in ama – pumpi siangtho-in a pahtawihuai-a, a uk tek ding a kisin ding uh;
Pasian a thei lo lawkite banga numei pasal kilunggulhluatna neih loh ding;
hih thu-ah kuamah in a sanggam tungah khialin ama tungah hamphatna zong kei hen. Kote in kong vauhilhsa uh le kong gensa bangun hih mawhnate khempeuh hangin Topa in mihingte a gawt ding hi.
Ahang in, Pasian in a nina nungta dingin hong sam lo-a, a siangtho-a nungta dingin hong samzaw hi.
Tua ahi manin hih lamlahna a nialte, mihing nial hi loin note ama Khasiangtho hong pia Pasian nial ahi hi.
Sanggam ki-itna thu tawh kisai ahileh nomau mahmah khat le khat na ki-it ding uh Pasian in hong hilhsa ahi manin lai-a kong gelh ding uh a kisam kei hi.
Tua hi-a Macedonia gam khempeuh a sanggamte na it takpi uh hi. Tua hi khin napi sanggamte aw, na it semsem ding uh kong kun lai uh hi.
Kong gensa bang tektekun daitakin nungta hithiat a, nomau nasep mah semin nomau khut mah tawh na sep ding na tum pen un.
Tua pen a pualam mite in na nisim nuntakna uh a zahtak theih nading uh le kuama tunga kingasawn na hi loh nading uh ahi hi.
Sanggamte aw, a ihmusa mite thu thei lo-a na om ding uh le lametna a nei lo midangte dah banga na dah ding uh ka deih kei uh hi.
Eite in Jesu si a, tho kik zo hi, ci-in i um hi. Tua ahi ciangin ama sunga a ihmu khinsate Pasian in Jesu tawh hong tonpih ding hi, ci-in i um hi.
Topa hong pai dong a om lai-a a nungta lai eite, a ihmusate sangin i masazaw peuhmah kei ding cih Topa kammal tawh kituakin note kong hilh uh hi.
Ahang in, Topa mahmah vantung panin, a ngaih mahmah thupiakna tawh, vansawltak lian aw le Pasian sapna pengkul ging tawh hong kumsuk dinga, tua ciangin Khrist sunga a sisate tho masa ding uh hi.
Tua khit ciangin a om lai a nungta lai-a om eite, huih lakah Topa dawn dingin amaute tawh meii lakah hong kilato khawm ding hi. Tua tak ciangin Topa tawh i om khawm tawntung ding hi.
Tua ahi manin hih thute in na kihanthawn ciat un.
Sanggamte aw, tu-in a ni le a hun thu kong gelh ding uh kisam lo hi.
Ahang in, zana guta bangin Topa ni, hong tung ding cih teltaka na theihsa uh ahi hi.
Mite in, “Lemna le muanna” a cih laitakun, naupaii numei, nausuahnat in a tut bangin amau tungah thakhatin siatna tung dinga, amaute a suakta kei ding uh hi.
Ahi hangin sanggamte aw, no na hi uh leh guta in a phawn banga, hih ni in hong phawn dingin khuamial laka om na hi kei uh hi.
Note na vekpi-un tua khuavak tapate le sunlai tapate na hi uh hi. Eite tua zan ahikeh tua khuamial aa i hi kei hi.
Tua ahitak ciangin a ihmu midangte tawh kibang loin a kigingsa le ei le ei ki-uk zo-in om ni.
Ahang in, a ihmute zanin ihmu a, zukhamte in zanin a kham uh hi.
Ahi hangin eite sunlai aa i hi nungsangin eimah le eimah ki-uk zoin, upna le itna awmdal in bulhin, lametna sik lukhu in hotkhiatna khu ni.
Ahang in, Pasian in eite ama thangpaihna thuak dingin hong seh lo a, ahi hangin i Topa Jesu Khrist tungtawnin hotkhiatna ngah dinga hong seh ahi hi.
Eite i ihmu zongin i hak zongin amah tawh i nuntak khawm theih nadingin eite adingin amah a si hi.
Tua ahi manin tu-a na hihsa bangun khat le khat kihanthawnin na kikhantohpih ciat un.
Tu-in sanggamte aw, note lakah nasep hahkatte, Topa sunga no hong ukte le no hong thuhilhte na zahtak ding uh kong sawl uh hi.
Amau nasepna hangin itna tawh a sangpenin na koih un. Khat le khat na kilem un.
Sanggamte aw, a thadahte vauhilh ding, a zahkaite hansuah ding, a thanemte huh ding le mi khempeuh tunga lungduai dingin kong kun uh hi.
Kuamah in khialhna, khialhna-in thuk kik loin note khat le khat ahi zongin, mi khempeuh tungah ahi zongin migit na sawm tawntung un.
Na lungnuam tawntung un;
thu na ngen den un;
hih in Khrist Jesu sungah note ading Pasian deihna ahi manin a piang khempeuh ah lungdam na ko un.
Tua Kha’ meikuang na mitsak kei un;
genkholhna thute na simmawhbawl kei un.
Na khempeuh sittel un. A hoihte kiplet un.
Siatna namte peuhmah na peel un.
Pasian mahmah, lemna Pasian in note hong siangthosak sinsen ta hen. Eite Topa Jesu Khrist hong pai cianga kawkbaanna a om lo dingin na kha, na lungsim le na pumpite uh a bupin hong kepsak ta hen.
Note hong sampa a muanhuai hi; amah in tuate a hih ding hi.
Sanggamte aw, kote ading thu na ngetsak un.
Kinapna siangtho tawh sanggamte khempeuh na kihopih un.
Hih laikhak sanggamte khempeuh tungah na sim nading uh Topa mai-ah thu kong pia hi.
Eite Topa Jesu Khrist hehpihna note tawh om ta hen.
Paul, Silas le Timothy in, Eite Pa Pasian le Topa Jesu Khrist sunga om Thessalonica pawlpi tungah:
Pa Pasian le Topa Jesu Khrist tung pana hehpihna le lemna note tungah om ta hen.

Note hangin Pasian tungah lungdam ka koh den ding uh kilawm hi. Sanggamte aw, amantakpi mah ahi hi, bang hang hiam cih leh na upna uh khangto semsem a, note khempeuh khat le khat na ki-itna uh a khangkhang hi.
Tua ahi manin bawlsiatnate le zia-etnate na thuakna uhah na sikdona uh le na upna uh Pasian pawlpite lakah ka kisialhpih uh hi.
Hihte khempeuh Pasian thukhenna man hi, cih a kilatna hi-a hih thu tawh kizui-in Pasian-gam adinga a santham ding na hina uh hanga a thuak na hi uh hi.
Pasian thutang hi; no hong buaisakte amah in buaisak dinga,
hong kibuaisak note buaina hong vengsakin, kote aa zong hong vengsak ding hi. Topa Jesu ama vansawltak vangliante tawh vantung pan meikuang tawh hong kilat ciangin hih thu a piang ding hi.
Amah in Pasian a thei lote le i Topa Jesu lungdamna-thu a mang lote a gawt ding hi.
Topa ompihna pan le a vangliatna thupina panin amaute kikhenkhia dinga, tawntung siatna-in kigawt ding hi.
Amah hong pai ni-in a misiangthote sungah kiminthangsak dinga amah a um mite khempeuh lakah piandang a kisa ding hi. Note kianga ka teci panna uh na upna un note zong a umte lakah hong kihelsak hi.

Hihte khempeuh phawk kawmin i Pasian in hong sapna tawh kilawm hong sak theih nading le na tup uh a hoih peuhmah le na upna uh hanga piang nasep khempeuh, ama vangliatna tawh a tangtunsak nadingin note ading thu ka ngen niloh uh hi.
Eite Pasian le Topa Jesu Khrist hehpihna tawh kizui-in, note sungah i Topa Jesu min a kithansak nading le ama sungah note hong min thansak nadingin hih bangin thu ka ngen uh hi.
Sanggamte aw, i Topa Jesu Khrist hong pai nading le ama kianga eite hong khop nading tawh kisai-in
Topa ni hong tung khin zo hi, ci-a a kigenkholhna pawlkhat ahi zongin, thu kigensawn ahikeh ko kiang pan hi a kici laikhakte hang ahi zongin, na linglawng, na patuah loh nadingun kong thum hi.
Lam khat peuhpeuh ah kuamah na kikhemsak kei un, ahang in, lehdona piangin, siatna-a kisehsa thukham palsatna mipa hong kilak mateng in tua ni hong tung lo ding hi.
Amah in Pasian a kici na khempeuh ahikeh a kibia khempeuh langdo dinga, Pasian biakinnpi sungah kikoihin, amah le amah kitawisangin amah le amah Pasian kici-in a kitangko hi.
Note tawh i omkhawm lai-a kong gen zel hih thute phawk nawn lo na hi uh hiam?
A hun liana, a kilaak theih nadingin amah bang in dal hiam, cih tu-in na thei uh hi.
Ahang in, thukham neihlohna in a simtham-a a neih vangliatna in a nasep pan zo hi; ahi hangin tu-a amah a dalpa a kilakkhiat masiah amah in tua bangin a kham lailai ding hi.
Tua tak ciangin thukham nei lo pa hong kilang dinga, Topa Jesu in a kam pana a hu tawh amah zothal-in ama hong paina a thupina in amah a susia ding hi.
Thukham nei lo pa hong paina ahileh nalamdang, lim le a lamdang khemte tawh a kilak Satan nasepna tawh kizui hi-a,
a mangthang dingte a khem gitlohna namkimin hong pai ding hi. Amaute in thutak it ding le a kihotkhiat ding a nial manun a mangthang uh hi.
Hih thu hangin amaute in zuauthu a up nadingun Pasian in a vanglian lam pialsakna a puak hi,
tua in, thutak um lo a, gitlohna nuam a sate khempeuh a mawhpaih nading ahi hi.

Ahi hangin Topa in hong it sanggamte aw, a cilin Pasian in Kha siansuahna nasepna tungtawn le thutak upna tungtawna hotkhiat nadingin note hong teel manin Pasian tungah lungdam ka koh den ding mah uh ahi hi.
I Topa Jesu Khrist minthanna na ngah theih nadingun amah in note, hih ka gen uh lungdamna-thu tungtawnin hong sam zo hi.
Tua ahitak ciangin sanggamte aw, kammal tawh ahi zongin, laikhak tawh ahi zongin no tunga kong puaksawn uh thuhilhnate lenin kiptakin ding un.
Eite hong itin ama hehpihna hanga tawntung hanthawnna le lametna pha hong pia i Topa Jesu Khrist mahmah le i Pa Pasian in,
na lungtang uh hong hanthawnin a hoih na gamtatnate uh le a hoih na pauna tenguhah hong tha khauhsak ta hen.
A nunung penin sanggamte aw, note laka ahi khinsa bang tektek in, Topa thupuak a manlangin kizel a, a kipahtawi theih nadingin kote ading thu na ngetsak un.
Mi khempeuh in upna nei kim lo ahi manin, a gilo a tatkhelte pan hong kihut theih nadingin thu na ngetsak un.
Ahi hangin Topa a muanhuai hi, na tha uh hong khauhsak dinga, gilopa panin hong hu ding hi.
Kong thupiakte uh na zui uh a, a zui lai dingin Topa sungah kong muang uh hi.
Pasian itna sung le Khrist thuakzawhna sungah a tung dingin Topa in lam hong lak ta hen.
Sanggamte aw, a thadahte le ko tung pana na ngah uh thuhilhna tawh kituaka nungta lo sanggamte peuhmah tawh na kithuah kei un, ci-in Topa Jesu Khrist minin thu kong pia uh hi.
Ahang in, kote etteh a nong neih ding uh ahi zia, no mahmah in na thei uh hi. No tawh ka om khawm lai-un ka thadah kei uh a,
a man piak lohin kuama an ka ne kei uh hi. Tua sangsikin, note khatpeuh adingin vangik ka suah loh nadingun gim pipi tawl pipi-in sun le zanin na ka sem uh hi.
Kote in hih banga ka hih uh ciangin, huhna ngah dinga thuneihna ka neih loh man uh hi loin ko le ko mahmah na zuih ding uh limlak ka suah nadingun ka sep uh hizaw hi.
Ahang in, no tawh ka omkhawm nangawnun zong: “Mi khat in na a sep kei leh an ne kei hen,” ci-in zuihtawm ngeina kong pia uh hi.
Note lakah pawlkhat thadah ci-in ka za uh hi. Amaute nasemin mahlah lo uh a, midangte thu va kumin a manlah uh hi.
Tua bang mite in na khatpeuh semin amau nektawm ding beek a thalawh nadingun Topa Jesu Khrist sungah thu pia-in ka kun uh hi.
Sanggamte aw, note na hi uh leh amaan note nasepna na cimtak ngei kei un.
Mi khatpeuh in hi lai sunga kong lah bangun a man nop kei leh amah na tuam ciamteh un. A maizum theih nadingin amah tawh na kikhawl kei un.
Ahi ta zongin na galbawl kei unla, sanggam bangin na vauhilh un.
Lemna Topa mahmah in, hun khempeuh a, lam khempeuh ah lungmuanna hong pia ta hen. Note khempeuh tawh Topa hong om khawm ta hen.
Keimah Paul in, hih hopihnate ka khutin ka gelh hi-a, ka laikhak khempeuh sungah ciamtehna tuam a suak hi. Hih in ka gelhzia ahi hi.
Eite Topa Jesu Khrist hehpihna note khempeuh tawh om ta hen.
Eite Honpa Pasian le i lamet Khrist Jesu thupiakna hangin Khrist Jesu sawktakpi keimah Paul in,
Upna sunga ka tapa taktak Timothy tungah: Pa Pasian le i Topa Khrist Jesu tung pana hehpihna, lainatna le lemna om ta hen.
Macedonia ah ka pai lai-a kong kut bangin Ephesus mah ah na tam lai in. Tua pen mi pawlkhat in thu upna maan lo hilh nawn lo a,

tangthu phuahtawm le a bei thei lo khang ciamtehna peuh kana, a kipumpiak nawn loh nadingun thu na piak theih nading ahi hi. Hihte in upna hanga piang Pasian nasepna sangin kinialna a piangsak zaw hi.
Hih thupiakna ngim kung in, lungsim siangtho, eima kitheihna hoih le upna taktak pana piang itna ahi hi.
Mi pawlkhatte, hihte panin gamlapi gam mang zo uh a, a khiatna nei lo holimna ah a pial uh hi.
Thukham sia suak nuam uh a, ahi hangin a thugen uh a theih loh banuah hi taktak sa-a, kipsana a gente uh zong bang hiam cih a thei kei uh hi.
Mi khat in thukham ahi banga a zat nak leh hoih hi, cih i thei hi.
Eite theihna ah thukhama pen mi hoihte adinga kibawl hi loin; thukham palsatte, a langdote, a pasian-milote le mawhdimte, a siangtho lote le biakna nei lote; a nu a pa a thatte, tualthatte,
angkawmte le a lehtatte, sila zuaka summet bawlte le zuautheite, zuauthu-a a kiciamte le thu-up maantak tawh kilehbulh peuhmahte adinga kibawl hizaw a,
tua thu-up maantak pen, amah in kei hong kepsak thupha Pasian aa ahi, a minthang lungdamna-thu tawh kituak ahi hi.
Muanhuai hong sa a, ama nasem dinga hong koih, tha hong guan i Topa Khrist Jesu tungah ka lungdam hi.
Khatvei lai-in Pasian daisakpa, mi bawlsiapa, a ngongtatpa ka hi napi in, theihlah man le uplah mana gamta ka hi manin lainatna kei hong kipia hi.
Khrist Jesu sunga om upna le itna zui-in i Topa hehpihna a dimletin kei tungah hong kisungkhia hi.
Hih lai-ah a bupa santham thugen muanhuai khat om a, tua in: mawhneite hon dingin Khrist Jesu leitungah hong pai hi, ci hi. Tua mawhneite lakah kei a sia pen ka hi hi.

Ahi hangin tua thu hang tektekin Khrist Jesu in, amah um a, nuntak tawntungna a sang dingte etteh dingin mawhneite khempeuh laka a sia pen keima tungah a bei thei lo ama lungduaina a latsak theih nadingin lainatna kei hong kilak zo hi.
Tu-in tawntung Kumpipa, a si thei lo, a kimu thei lo, amah bek Pasian tungah, a tawntungin pahtawina le minthanna om den ta hen.

Ka tapa Timothy aw, nang thu tawh kisai, khatvei lai-a genkholhnate tawh kituakin hih lamlahnate kong pia hi. Tua lamlahnate zui-a, upna le lungsim kitheihna hoih lenin galdona hoih na do theih nading ahi hi.
Mi pawlkhat in hihte nolh uh a, a upna uh a siasak ngi-ingei uh hi.
Amaute lakah, Pasian a gendai loh nadingun a kihilh dinga Satan tunga ka ap Hymenaeus le Alexander zong a kihel uh hi.
Tua ciangin, a masa penin mi khempeuh ading ngetnate, thungetnate ngetsakna le lungdamkohnate nei dingin kong kun hi.
Tua pen eite i pasian-mina le sianthona ah lungmuang tak le kilemtaka i nuntak theih nadingin, kumpite le thuneite khempeuh ading thungen ding cihna ahi hi.
Hih in hoih a, eite Honpa Pasian a lungkimsak hi.
Amah, mi khempeuh a kihotkhiat ding le thutak a theih ding uh a deih pa ahi hi.
Ahang in, Pasian khat om a, Pasian le mite kikalah palai khat omin tua mipa Khrist Jesu ahi hi.
Mi khempeuh tat nadingin amah kipia a, tua teci panna thu a hun lianin kipia hi.
Tua hi-a hih thu ah kei tangko pa le sawltakpi-in hong kiseh hi; ka zuau hi loin ka takpi hi-a, Gentile-te tungah upna mantak a hilh dingin sia in hong kiseh hi.
Mun khempeuh ah pasal khempeuh in hehna le kitotna om loin a khut siangthote uh lamto a thu a nget ding uh ka deih hi.
Numeite zong a zahtak baang dingin, a kilawm a kituaka a kizep ding uh ka deih hi. Samphek ahi zongin, kham, kep manpha le puan mantamte tawh hi loin,
Pasian bia numeite adinga kilawm ciang gamtat hoih tawh a kizep ding uh hizaw hi.
Numei in dai hithiat in, kiniamkhiatna kim tawh sin ta hen.
Numei in pasal tungah thu a hilh ding ahikeh thu a neih ding ka phal kei hi; amah a sip dide kul hi.
Ahang in, Adam kibawl masa a, tua ciangin Eve kibawl hi.
A kikhem zo pen Adam ahi kei hi; a kikhem zo pen tua numei hi-a mawhnei a suak hi.
Ahi hangin numeite in a kilawm a kituakin upna, itna le siangthona a neih suak nak uh leh nausuahna tungtawnin kihonkhia ding hi.
Hih lai-ah thugen muantak khat a om hi: Mi khatpeuh in saptuam kem suah ding a ut leh nasep thupi sem nuam ahi hi.
Saptuam kem ahileh: ngawh bei, zi khat bek a nei, a kidaam thei, amah ki-uk zo, a zahtak baang, zindo a siam, a hilh thei,
lenggahzu a kham lo, a ngongtat lo, a lungnem, kitot a hat lo, sum iplah lo hi pelmawh ding hi.
Ama innkuan sung ukzo a a tate in zahtakna takpi tawh a thu a mante hi pelmawh ding hi.
(Mi khatpeuh in ama innkuan sung a uk nading zia a theih kei leh Pasian pawlpi bangci kep thei ding ahi hiam?)
A piangthak tung hi lo ding hi. Tua hi kei leh kimisak dinga, dawimangpa thuak bang thukhenna a thuak kha ding hi.
A maimawl loh nading le dawimangpa thanga a awk loh nadingin pualam mite in hoihtaka a zahtak hi pelmawh ding hi.
