Tua mah bangin saptuam upate zong, zahtak a baang mi, a thutak, lenggahzu a hai lo, a maan lo metna a zong lo mi hi ding hi.
Amaute lungsim kitheihna siangtak tawh a thuk upna thutakte a lenkipte hi pelmawh ding hi.
A pel loin amaute kizia-et masa dinga, paubaanna a om kei leh upa kisemsak pan ding hi.
Tua mah tawh kibangin a zite uh zong zahtak a baang numei hi dinga, migensiat hat loin na khempeuh a kidaam thei, a muantak mi hi ding hi.
Saptuam upate, zi khat bek a nei hi pelmawh ding a, ama innkuan sung le a tate hoihtaka a uk zo hi pelmawh ding hi.
Limtaka na a semte in ama ading a hoih pen mun le Khrist Jesu sunga a upna uh kitelcianna lianpi a ngah uh hi.
No kianga kong paipah ding ka lamet hi napi, hih lamlahnate kong gelh hi.

Kong ziakai khak leh Pasian innkuan sunga mite in amau le amau bangci gamtat ding cih na theih nading uh ka deihna ahi hi. Tua Pasian innkuan, a nungta Pasian pawlpi hi-a thutak khuampi le bulkip ahi hi.

A lian mahmah nial nading a om lo pasian-mina thuthuk ahi: Amah pumpi-in hong kilang a, Kha in dik tangsakin vantung mite in mu uh a, minamte lakah a thu kihilhin leitungah ki-um a, minthanna tawh kilato hi.
Hun nunung ciangin mi pawlkhat in upna nusia ding uh a, zuau a phuak khate le dawite hilhnate a zui ding uh hi, ci-in Kha in kiteltakin a gen hi.
Tua bang hilhnate kineihsiam mi zuaute tungtawna hong pai hi-a, amau lungsim kitheihna siksa-a bikton tawh kibang ahi hi.
Amaute in mi a kiten ding kham uh a, thumaan thei a, a um mite in, lungdam ko-a, a san dingun Pasian in a piansak an pawlkhat a tan dingun thu a pia uh hi.
Ahang in, Pasian piansak na khempeuh a hoih hi-a lungdam ko-a, a kisan khit nak leh nial ding khat beek a om kei hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian thu le thungetna tawh siansaksa ahi hi.
Nang in hih nate, sanggamte kianga na hilhkhiat leh upna le na zuihsa thuhilhna hoih thutakte sunga khangto Khrist Jesu nasem hoih khat na hi ding hi.
A kiphuaktawm pasian-neilote tangthute le pitekte tangthu gente tawh kisawhkha kei inla, tua tangin na pasian-mi nadingin nang le nang kisin in.
Ahang in, pumpi kisinna in manphatna pawlkhat nei a, ahi hangin pasian-mina ahileh tu huna nuntak nading le hong tung ding nuntakna ah thuciam nei khawm ahi manin na khempeuh ah a manpha hi.
Hih in a bupa santham thugen muantak khat hi-a,
(hih hangin na semin nakpi-in i hanciam hi,) tua in mite khempeuh a diakdiakin a um mite ading, Honpa, a nungta Pasian sungah lametna i neihna ahi hi.
Hih nate thupiakna-in hilh in.
Na khangnona hangin kuamah kisimmawhsak kei in; ahi hangin thugenna, nun takna, itna, upna le sianthona ah thu-umte etteh dingin na om in.
Kong pai matengin mipite mai-ah Laisiangtho simin, thu hilhin lai hilhin hahkat in.
Upate in na tungah a khut uh a ngak laitak uh a thu genkholhna thupuak tungtawna hong kipia na letsong thudon loin om kei in.
Hih thute ah thanuam in; mi khempeuh in na khantoh zia a muh theih nadingin hihte ah kipumpiak in.
Na nuntakna le na thu-upna limtakin kemcing in. Tuate ah kuhkal lecin nang le na thugen a zate na honkhia ding hi.
A upazawpa tungah kamkhauh zangin tai kei inla, na pa bangin thudam tawh hansuah in. A khangnozawte na sang gampa bangin na bawl in;
a upazaw numeite, nute bang le a khangnozaw numeite siangthotakin sanggamnute bangin na bawl in.
A tasam takpi meigongnu limtakin na phawk in.

Ahi hangin meigongnu khat in tu le ta a neih leh amaute in a nu a pa, a pi a pu-te a thukkikna un, a biakna uh sepkhiat ding a masa penin sinin a innkuan sung uh kem uh hen; ahang in, hih in Pasian a lungkimsak hi.
Amah bek a kinusia a tasam takpi meigongnu in a lametna Pasian tungah nga-a, Pasian huh ding sun le zanin a ngen niloh hi.
Ahi hangin ama noptatna-a nungta meigongnu, a nuntak lai nangawnin a si ahi hi.
Kuamah a kimawhsak theih loh nadingin hih lamlahna mite tungah zong theisak in.
Mi khatpeuh in ama tanaute a diakdiak in a innkuanpih taktakte kisapna a huh kei leh upna a nial hi-a a um lo mi sangin a siazaw ahi hi.
Meigongnu khatpeuh a khan kum sawmguk a val khita, a pasal tunga a muanhuai ahi kei ngal leh meigongte lakah na ciamteh kei in.
Ahi zongin a gamtat hoihin, a tate khansuah zo a, zindo a siam, misiangte khe a silsak, gim ngahte huh tawntunga, gamtat hoih namkimte ah kipia zo mahmah in a kipahtak leh meigong lakah ciamteh in.
A khangno zaw meigong numeite ahileh tuate minlakah na hel kei in. Ahang in, a pumpi lunggulh nate in Khrist tunga a ki-apna uh a zawh ciangin pasal a deih uh hi.
Amaute in a kamciam masa uh a palsat manun amau le amau thukhenna a kitun uh hi.
Tua banah thadahna zongsang uh a, inn simah a banvak uh hi. A thadah bek uh hi loin mi gensiat hatin, na khempeuh ah kum zo uh a, amau gen loh ding pipi a gen uh hi.
Tua ahi ciangin a khangno lai meigong numeite in, pasal nei in, ta nei in, a inn sung uh kem uh henla, gensiat nading hun hoih galpa pia kei le uh, cih ka thuhilhna ahi hi.
Pawlkhatte Satan nung a zui dingin lam a pial khin takpi ta uh hi.
Thu um numei khat ama innkuan sungah meigong numei a nei a om leh amau hangin pawlpi vangiksak loin amah in amaute huh ta hen. Tua hileh a kitasam takpi meigongte pawlpi in huh thei ding hi.
Pawlpi sung hoihtaka a makaih upate, a diakdiak in thuhilh le laihilh na a semte a zahnih in pahtawi ding kilawm hi.
Ahang in, Laisiangtho in: “Bawngtal in buh a cil laitakin a muk hencip kei in,” ci a, tua ciangin, “Nasempa in a thaman a ngah ding kilawm hi,” ci hi.
Upa khat a kimawhsakna teci nih ahikeh thum a om kei leh thu-in na sang kei in.
Midangte vauhilhna a suah theih nadingin a mawhte mipite lakah na tai in.
Hih kong lamlahnate kuamah deidan lo, kuamah angvan tuan het loin na zat dingin Pasian le Khrist Jesu le a kiteltuam vansawltakte mitmuhin nang kong suan hi.
Mi tungah khutngak ding man langlua kei inla, midang mawhna ah va kikum kei in. Nang le nang a siangtho-in kikem in.
Na gilpi le na cinat pahpahna hangin tuisik bek na dawndawn tawp inla, lenggahzu tawmtawm na zang in.
Mi pawlkhatte mawhna a kilang sise hi-a, amau ma ah thukhenna mun a na tung zo hi; adangte mawhnate in amaute a sulzuih hi.
Tua mah bangin gamtatna hoihte kilang sise a, a kilang sise lote zong a kiselcip thei kei hi.
Pasian min le eite hilhna a kigen siat loh nadingin sila hakkol nuai-a omte khempeuh in, a pute uh na khempeuh ah a zahtak tham cingin ngaihsun uh hen.

Thu um mi pu-a, a neite in zong, amaute sanggamta ahi uh zongin zahtak lo tuan kei hen. Tua sangsikin, amaute nasepna hanga hamphatna a ngahte in, thu-umte le amau a itte ahi manin a na uh a hoihzaw a, a sepsak ding uh hizaw hi. Hihte na hilh ding le amaute tunga na kut ding ahi hi.
Mi khatpeuh in thu-upna maan lo hilh a, i Topa Jesu Khrist lamlahna bucing le Pasian thu lama hilhna a lungkim kei leh,
amah a kimisak hi a, bangmah a theitel lo ahi hi. Amah in kikalhna leh kiselna ah ukna maan lo a nei hi a, tuate in enna, kitotna, kigensiatna, a hoih lo lama kimuanmawhnate,
le lungsim sia mite kikalah kinawt ngitngetna a piangsak hi; amah thutak paii lo le pasian-mina, summet bawl nading beka a ngaihsun pa ahi hi.
Ahi hangin lungkimtaka pasian-mina in metna lianpi ahi hi.
Ahang in, eite in leitung ah bangmah i keng kei a, bangmah i puakhia thei kei hi.
Ahi hangin annek ding le puansilh ding i neih nak leh tua tawh i lungkim ding ahi hi.
Ahau nuam mite ahileh khemna le thang, a haihuai le a nasak thei lunggulh-luatnate hangin siatna le manthanna sungah a puk uh hi.
Ahang in, sum itna in siatna namkim bulpi ahi hi. Mi kimkhatte in sum deih lua-in tua upna pan pialkhia uh a, dahna tampi-in amau le amau a kisunlet uh hi.
Ahi hangin nang Pasian mipa aw, hihte khempeuh taisan inla, thumaanna, pasian-mina, upna, itna, sikdona le lungnemna na delh in.
Upna galdona hoih na do in. Hong theihpih tampite mai-ah kipulakna hoih na neihsa, hong sapna, tua nuntak tawntungna limtakin lenkip in.
Na khempeuh tungah nun takna a pia pa Pasian le Pontius Pilate mai-a pulakna hoih a pulak Khrist Jesu mitmuh in:
Topa Jesu Khrist hong kilat ni matengin a melhemna omlo, a kawk baang loin hih thupiakte na kep ding kong suan hi.
Tua hun pen Pasian thupha ngah amah bek Ukpa, kumpite’ Kumpi, tote’ Topa in ama hun lianin hong piangsak ding hi;
amah bek a si thei lo, a kineh thei lo khuavak sunga nungtapa, kuama muh ngei loh le a muh theih loh pa ahi hi. Ama tungah pahtawina le thahatna om tawntung ta hen. Amen.
Tu huna hih leitung sumhaute kiang ah, a ki-uatsak loh nading uh le a kician lo hauhna muang lo a, eite i lungnop nadingin na khempeuh kicingtaka hong piapa Pasian, a muan zawk nadingun thu pia in.
A hoih semin, gamtat hoih tampi a gamtat nading uh le cingh in mi a hop nop nadingun thu pia in.
Amaute in nuntakna taktak a letkip theih nadingun hong tung ding khanghun ah bulkip ahi dingin hih bangin gou a khol ding uh hi.
Timothy aw, na kep dinga hong kipia, limtakin cing in. Pasian nei lo thu mawk genna le a maan lopi-a theihna a kici, ngaihsutna kituak lote kiheimang san in.
Mi pawlkhatte tua bang nei a kicih hangun upna panin a pialmang uh hi. Hehpihna nang tawh om ta hen.
Khrist Jesu sunga om nuntakna kamciamsa tawh kizui-a Pasian deihna hanga Khrist Jesu sawltakpi Paul in.
Ka tapa it Timothy tungah: Pa Pasian le i Topa Khrist Jesu tung pana hehpihna, lainatna le lemna om ta hen.
Ka thungetnate ah sun le zanin nang kong phawk tawntung a, ka pu ka pa-te hihsa bangin lungsim kitheihna siang tawh a na ka sep Pasian tungah lungdam ka ko hi.
Lungnopna tawh ka kidim theih nadingin na khituite phawk kikin nang kong muh ding ka lunggulh mahmah hi.
Na up taktakna ka phawka, tua thu-upna, na pi Lois sungah nungta masa-in, tua khitteh na nu Eunic sungah nungta a, tu-in nang sungah zong nungta hi cih teltakin ka taksang hi.
Hih thu hangin nang tunga ka khut kong ngakna tungtawna, nang sunga om Pasian letsong pen na zapkuang den ding kong phawksak kik hi.
Ahang in, Pasian in eite, zahkaina kha hong pia loin, vangliatna, itna le ei le ei ki-ukzawhna kha hong piazaw hi.
Tua ahi ciangin i Topa thu na genkhiat ding maizum kei inla, ama thongkia ka hina zong maizumpih tuan kei in. Ahi hangin Pasian vangliatna tawh lungdamna-thu hanga ka thuak, hong thuakpih in.
Eite sepsa khatpeuh hang hi loin ama ngimna le hehpihna hangin hong honkhia a, nuntakna siangtho-a nungta dingin hong sam hi. Hun kipat ma-in hih hehpihna Khrist Jesu sungah eite hong kipia zo hi.
Ahi hangin tua hehpihna, eite’ Honpa Khrist Jesu hong kilatna tungtawnin tu-in hong kilaakkhia hi. Amah in sihna susia a, lungdamna-thu tung tawnin nuntakna le sih theihlohna hong puak hi.
Tua hi-a hih lungdamna-thu tawh kisai-in a tangkopa sawltakpipa le siapa dingin kei hong kiseh hi.
Tua thu hangin hih banga a thuak ka hi hi. Tua hi napi ka maizum kei hi; bang hang hiam cih leh ken ka up pa ka thei a, amah ka kepsakte tua ni adingin kem zo ding cih teltakin ka thei hi.
Kei tung pana na zaksate, Khrist Jesu sunga om upna le itna tawh, hilhna kician lahna-in lenkip in.
Nang hong kikemsak na hoih kemin, eite sunga teng a Khasiangtho huhna tawh na cing in.
Phygelus le Hermogenes-te zong kihel in, Asia gama omte khempeuh in kei hong taihsat lam na thei hi.
Topa in Onesiphorus-te innkuan tungah a lainatna na lak ta hen. Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in ka kolbulh maizumpih loin thathak hong ngahsak ngitnget hi.
Hong maizumpih gen loh Rome ah a om lai-in kei hong muh matengin haksapi in hong zong hi.
Tua ni teh Topa kiang pana lainatna mu dingin Topa in seh ta hen! Amah in Ephesus ah lam tampi in kei hong huh lam teltakin na thei hi.
Tua ahi ciangin nang ka tapa aw, Khrist Jesu sunga om hehpihna hangin thahat in.
Teci mi tampi mai-ah ka gen na zaksa nate midangte zong a hilh thei dinga a cin, a muanhuai mite na kemsak in.
Khrist Jesu galkap hoih bangin haksatna kote hong thuakpih in.
Galkap nasem mi kuamah in tangpi vai vasaipih loin amah a makaih mangpa a lungkimsak nuam hi.
Tua mah tawh kibangin kidemna sunga kihel mi khat peuh in kidemna ngeinate zui a, a dem kei leh a gualzote ngah lukhu a ngah kei hi.
Hahkattaka nasem, lokhopa in a gahte tang masa pen hi.
Topa in hihte khempeuh a sungthu hong theisak ding ahi manin, kong thugen ngaihsun kik in.
David suan le khak misi pana a kithosak Jesu Khrist phawk gige in.
Tualthat mawhna a nei khat banga kolbulhna ciang dong ka thuakna hih ka lungdamna-thu hang mah ahi hi. Ahi hangin Pasian thu kol a kibulh kei hi.
Tua ahi manin Khrist Jesu sunga om hot khiatna a tawntung minthanna tawh a ngah khawm nadingun tua a teelsate hangin na khempeuh ka thuak hi.
Hih lai-ah a muantak thugen khat a om hi: Amah tawh i sih khawm leh, amah tawh i nungta khawm ding hi;
eite in i thuak leh, amah tawh i uk khawm ding hi. Amah leh amah kinial thei lo ahi manin amah i nial leh, amah in zong eite hong nial ding hi;
eite i muanhuai kei zongin, amah a muanhuai den ding hi, ahang in, amah le amah a kinial thei kei hi.
Hih thute amaute phawksak kik den in. Thumalte peuh tawh kisai-a a kitot loh nadingun Pasian mai-ah amaute vauhilh in; tua in kimanna nei loin a ngai mite a siasak bek hi.
Maizumna om lo thutak thu diktakin a zang a santak nasempa bangin, Pasian tunga na kipiak theih nadingin na hih theih tawpin hih in.
Pasian thusimlohna, thu mawk gengen nate pel in. Bang hang hiam cih leh tua bang thu-a a uangte a pasian-mi kei semsem ding hi.
Amau thuhilhna, a banmuat meima bangin kizel hi. Amaute lakah Hymenaeus le Philetus,
thutak pana pialmangte kihel uh hi. Amaute in, “Thawhkikna tung khin ta hi,” ci uh a, pawlkhatte upna a siasak uh hi.
Ahi zongin Pasian bulkippi kiptakin dinga, “Topa in ama aate a thei hi,” cih le “Topa min a pulakte peuhmah in tatsiatna a taisan pelmawh ding uh hi,” ci-a kigelh tawh a tungah kiciamteh hi.
Inn lianpi sungah ngun le kham tawh kibawl nate bek om lo a, sing le bellei tawh kibawl zong a om hi; pawlkhat a zatna thupi a, pawlkhatte a gina kei hi.
Tua a nunung pen pana mi khat amah le amah a kisiansak leh a zatna a thupi-a vanzat siangtho suaka, a Pu adingin kimanna a nei na hoih peuhpeuh sem dinga kimang thei a suak hi.
Khangno gitloh lunggulhnate taisan inla, lungsim singtho-a Topa a sam mite tawh thumaanna, upna, itna le lemna na delh in.
A haihuai le thugina lo kiselnate in kitotna piangsak cih thei na hi manin tuate ah kikum kha kei in.
Topa nasemte kuamah tawh kitawng peuhmah lo ding uh hi; tua sangsikin mikim tungah migi-in, thu hilh thei dinga, zakdah hau lo ding hi.
Amah a langdote lungnemtakin lamlak pelmawh hen, Pasian in amaute kisiksakin kiheisak dinga thutak theihna ah a pi ding hi.
Tua ciangin khua hong phawk ding uh a, ama deihna bang sem dinga sal-a a khawi dawimangpa thang pan a suakta ding uh hi. 1Ti 1:5
Ahi hangin hih thu ciamteh in: ni nunungte ah a lauhuai hunte hong piang ding hi.
Mite in, amau le amau ki-itte, sum deihluate, kisialhhatte, kisa theite, siatgenhatte, nu-le-pa thu amang lote, lungdamna mel thei lote, a siangtho lote,
itna nei lote, a maisak nuam lote, gensiat-hatte, amah le amah ki-uk zo lote, a ngongtatte, a hoih deih lote,
a zuautatte, a gamhtatte, a kimisakte, Pasian it ding sanga nopsakna a itzawte,
pasian-mina lim nei napi a, a vangliatna a nialte hi ding uh hi. Amaute tawh kisawhkha kei in.
Amaute, kinelnelin mi innah va lut uh a, mawhnate tawh kidim lunggulhna namkim in a suknawk a tonawk,
a sinsin hanga thutak a thei lo numei zulhzaute a va zothawh gawpte ahi uh hi.
Jannes le Jambres-te in Moses a langdo bang tektekun, hih mite in zong thutak langdo uh a, amaute lungsim kisia gawpsa ahi manun upna thu tawh kisai-in a kinilkhiate ahi uh hi.
Ahi hangin amaute in ama uh a sot kei ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh tua mite thu tungtang mah bangin amaute haina zong mikim tungah a kitheitelsak ding hi.
Bangbang ahi zongin nang, ka thuhilhna thu khempeuh, ka nuntak zia, ka ngim ka tup, upna, lungduaina, itna, sikdona,

bawlsiatna, thuaknate – Antioch, Iconium le Lystra-te ah kei tungah bang teng pianga, bang bawl siatnate thuak ka hi hiam, cih a vekpi in na thei khin hi. Tua hi napi Topa in tuate khempeuh panin hong hukhia hi.
A taktakin Khrist Jesu sunga pasian-mina tawh a nungta nuam mi peuhmah kibawlsia dinga,
migilo le mi kheltatte, mi khem le khemna thuakin a siat semsem laitak uh hi ding hi.
Ahi hangin nang na hileh na sinsa le na kipsansa ah kip den in. Bang hang hiam cih leh nang in tuate na sinna pa na thei-a,
Khrist Jesu sunga upna tungtawnin hotkhiatna ngah nadingin hong pilsak thei a siangtho Laisiangtho na neu tunga kipan na theihsa ahilam zong na thei hi.
Laisiangtho khempeuh Pasian humuap hi-a, thuhilh nading, tai nading, bawlphat nading, thumaan lama pattah nadingin phatuamin manpha hi.
Tua in Pasian mipa pen na hoih khempeuh sem dingin kimtaka a kithuam theih nading ahi hi.
Pasian mai le misite le mihingte thukhen ding pa Khrist Jesu mai-ah, hong kilat nading le a gam paulamin hih nasep kong guan hi:
Thu hilh in; ahun ahi-a, ahun ahi kei zongin kigingsa-in om in; kuhkaltak le kidawm mahmah kawmin lam lakin, bawlpha in, tai-in, hanthawn in.

Ahang in, mite in thu-up bucing a cimtak hun hong tung ding hi. Tua sangsikin, amaute lunggulhna tawh kituakin, a bil thakna uh tawh kituak, a zaknophuai lel thu a gen dingin amau kiangah sia tampitak a kaikhawm ding uh hi.
Amaute in thutak lehngatsan ding uh a, phuahtawm tangthu lamah a nga ding uh hi.
Ahi hangin nang na hileh bangmah peuhah pilvang inla, haksatna thuakin sawltak na sem inla, na Pasian nasepna ah na nasep khempeuh zo in.
Ahang in, dawntheih-a biakna banga sun dingin a mansa in ka om a, ka pai hun hong tung zo hi.
Galdona hoih do khin in, tai kidemna ka tai zo a, upna ka kemcing zo hi.
Tu-in thumaana thukhenpa Topa in tua ni cinga kei hong piak ding thumaanna lukhu kei ading a om zo hi. Kei bek hong kipia loin ama kilat ding lawpa a ngakte khempeuh zong a pia ding hi.
A manlang theithei-in ka kiangah hong pai dih in.
Ahang in, Demas in hih leitung a it manin kei hong taisan a, Thessalonica ah a pai hi. Galatia ah Crescens pai zo a, Dalmatia ah Titus a pai hi.
Kei kiangah Luke bek a om hi. Mark hong zawn inla hong tonpih in. Bang hang hiam cih leh ka nasepna ah amah ka phattuampih mahmah hi.
Ephesus ah Tychicus ka sawl hi.
Nong pai ciangin Troas a Carpus kianga ka nusiat ka puantualpi le ka laizialte a diakdiak in ka savun laizialte hong puak in.
Sum sungpa Alexander in nakpi in kei hong bawlsia hi. Ama hihsa tawh kituakin Topa in a thukkik ding hi.
Amah in ka thupuak uh langdo lua mahmah ahi manin, nang zong kidawm mahmah in.
Ka kihutna thu ka gen masak lai-in kuamah in kei hong panpih lo-a, a kuamahpeuh in hong taisan uh hi. Amaute kimawhsak kei ta hen.

Ahi hangin ka gei-ah Topa dinga, kei tungtawnin Gentile-te khempeuh in tua thupuak a zak nadingun kicingtaka ka tangko theih nading tha hong guan hi. Tua hi-a, humpinelkai kam panin kei hong hukhia hi.
Gitlohna tawh hong kisukna citeng panin Topa in kei hong hu dinga, ama vantung gamah bittakin hong tunpih ding hi. Ama tungah a tawntungin minthanna om den ta hen. Amen.
Priscilla le Aquila le Onesiphorus-te innkuan na hopihsak in.
Korinth ah Erastus taam-a, Miletus ah Trophimus cinasa in ka nusia hi.
Phalbi ma-in hih lai tun hong sawm teitei in. Eubulus in nang hong hopih a Pudens, Linus, Claudia le sanggamte khempeuh in zong hong hopih uh hi.
Topa in na kha hong ompih ta hen. Hehpihna in nang hong ompih ta hen.
Pasian teelte, upna le pasian-mina – a tun thutak theih nadinga –
tua upna le theihna pen zuau a gen lo Pasian in hun kipat ma-a a ciamsa, nuntak tawntung nading lametna tungah kinga a,
eite Honpa Pasian thupiakna tawh hun a sak hun lianin, thuhilhna tungtawna ama thu hong kilatsakna Pasian nasem le Jesu Khrist sawltakpi keimah Paul in,
Eite in i upkhawm upna sunga ka tapa taktak Titus tungah: Pa Pasian le eite Honpa Khrist Jesu pana hehpihna le lemna hong tung ta hen.
Crete a nang kong nusiatna pen, a kizo nai lo a kinusiate na zawhsiang theih nading le nang kong lamlah bangin khuapi kima upate a seh ding na hi hi.
Upa dingte: a pel loin kawkbaanna om lo ding, zi khat bek a nei, a tate zong thu um mi hi ding a, phengphi-a a thumang lo mi a hi kei ding hi.
Saptuam kem pen, Pasian na a kikemsak ahi khit nung sangin pel loin kawkbaanna a om lo, a kiliansak lua lo, a heh baih lo, zu a kham lo, a gamhtat lo, met nading zonga a zuautat lo mi hi ding hi.
Tua sangsikin, a pel loin zindo siam mi, a hoih deih mi, ama pumpi ki-uk zo mi, a thutang mi, a siangtho le a kisek zo mi hi ding hi.
Amah in midangte thu-upna maan tawh han thawna a langpante a nial theih nadingin a kihilhsa a muantak, thupuak kiptakin a len pelmawh ding hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh a diakdiakin vunat pawlte sungah a lehdo thei mi, a kamsi le a zuauphuak mi tampi a om hi.
Amaute kamhum ding uh hi. Ahang in, a hilh loh ding pipi uh hillhin innkuan sung buppi a siasak uh hi; tua zong a maan lo-a metna zonna ahi hi.
Amau kamsangte khat nangawn in, “Crete mite zuauphuak dente, gilo ngongtatte, thadah a anhaite ahi hi,” na ci hi.
Hih teci panna a maan ahi hi. Tua ahi manin amaute upna ah a kip theih nading uh le
Jew-te phuahtawm tang thute ahikeh thutak a nial mite thupiakte a thudon loh nadingun khauh takin tai in.
A siangthote aa in na khempeuh siangtho a, ahi hangin a kisiate le a um lo mite aa in a siangtho khat beek a om kei hi. A taktakin amaute lungsim le a lungsim kitheihna uh a siakhawm hi.
Pasian thei kineih uh a, ahi hangin a gamtatna uh tawh a nial uh hi. Amaute mi huathuai, a thumang lo, na hoih sem dinga a cin lo uh ahi hi.
Thu-up maan tawh kituakin hilh pelmawh in.
Pasal khanghamte a kidaam thei ding, zahtak baang ding, amau le amau ki-uk zo ding, upna, itna le thuakzawhna ah a kip nadingun hilh in.
Tua tawh kibangin numei khang hamte, amaute nuntakna ah zahtak baang ding, mi gensiat hat loin, zu hai lo ding, ahi hangin a hoih khempeuh a sinsak dingun hilh in.
Kuamah in Pasian thu a gensiat loh nading in, amaute in, nupilate in a pasalte uh le a tate uh a it ding,
amau le amau ki-uk thei ding uh a, siangthoin, innah manlahin, migi-in, a pasalte uh thu a man ding uh a hilh thei ding uh hi.
Tua mah bangin pasal khangno laite amau le amau a ki-uk zawh nadingun hanthawn in.
Na khempeuhah na hoih semin amaute etteh na suak in. Thu na hilh ciangin thutakna, cihtakna,
le a kimawhpaih thei lo kampau siangtho lak in. Tua hileh hong langpante in, eite tungah thusia bangmah mu loin a maizum ding uh hi.
Silate in na khempeuhah a pute uh thu manga, amaute a lungkimsak ding uh hahkatin, amaute kam sel loin,
a na uh guksak loin a muanhuai zaw dingin hilh in. Tua hileh i Honpa Pasian tawh kisai hilhnate a deihhuai a suaksak ding uh hi.
Ahang in, hotkhiatna hong puak Pasian hehpihna, mi khempeuh tungah a kilang zo hi.
Tua hehpihna in pasian-milohna le leitung vaite deihna tawh kisai-a, “Ut lo,” ci ding le pumpi ki-uk zo-a nungta ding, diktat ding le tu khanghunah pasian-mitakin nungta dinga hong hilh lai mah in,
a lian a minthang eite Pasian le Honpa Jesu Khrist hong kilat nading-lametna thupha i ngak hi.
Amah, tatsiatna khempeuh pana eite hong tankhia ding le ama hong neihtuam dingin amahmah in hong siansuaha, a hoih a gamtat ding a lawp dingin eite ading amahmah hong kipia pa ahi hi.
Tua ahi ciangin hihte khempeuh hilh in; thuneihna khempeuh tawh hansuah inla tai in. Kuamah kisimmawhsak kei in.
Tua mite in gam-ukte le thuneite thu nial lo-a, a thu uh mangin, a hoih peuhpeuh sem dingin kiging kholin,
kuamah gensia loin mi tawh kilemin, mi ading khualin mi khempeuh tungah kiniamkhiatna taktak a lah dingun phawksak kik in.

Hun khat lai-in eite zong ahai, a thumang lo, mi khemsa le pumpi lung gulhna namkim le noptatna sila i hi hi. Gitlohna le hazatna tawh kidim in, mite muhdah le khat le khat kimuhdahna tawh i nungta hi.
Ahi hangin eite Honpa Pasian migitna le itna hong kilat ciangin,
amah in thu maana na i sep hang hi lo, ama lainatna hangin eite hong hon hi. Amah in eite suahkikna-a silsiangna le a Khasiangtho bawlphat thakna tungtawnin hong hon hi.
Amah in eite Honpa Jesu Khrist tung tawnin tua Kha Siangtho cingtakin eite tungah hong sungkhia hi.
Tua pen ama hehpihna hanga diktansak, nuntak tawntungna lametna a nei gouluahte i suah theih nading ahi hi.

Hih in a muantak thugen ahi hi: Pasian a muangte in a hoih peuhmah hih dinga, amau le amau a kipiak zawh nadingun hih thute na uang gen ding kong deih hi. Hihte in mi khempeuh adingin a hoih pen le a phatuam pen ahi hi.
Ahi hangin a haihuai kikalhnate, khang tangthute, thukham thu a kiselnate le kitotnate peel in. Bang hang hiam cih leh hihte, phattuamna nei lo le a kimanna bei ahi hi.
Pawl khen nuam mipa khatvei vauhilh inla, tua khitin a nihveina vauhilh lai in. Tua khit ciangin amah thudon nawn kei in.
Tua bang mite a tuampian le mawhdim hi-a, amah le amah kimawhpaih hi cih ciantakin na thei ding hi.
Artemas ahikeh Tychicus no kiangah kong sawl phetin Nicopolis ah ka kiangah pai hong sawm teitei in. Bang hang hiam cih leh tua lai-ah phalbi sung va om dingin ka khentat khin hi.
Tangdingpa Zenas le Apollos na huh theih bangbangun na huh unla, a kisap khempeuh uh na thei un.
I mite mawk nuntak loin a nisim kisapnate uh a kisiktawm zawh nadingun na hoih sem dingin amau le amau a kipiak nadingun kisin pelmawh uh hen.
Kei tawh a omkhawm teng in hong hopih kim uh hi. Upna sunga ei hong itte na hopihsak in. Hehpihna in note khempeuh hong ompih ta hen.
Khrist hanga thongkia pa Paul le i sanggampa Timothy in, Ka lawm it uh le ka naseppih uh Philemon,
ka sanggamnu uh Apphia, ka galkappih uh Archippus le na inna kikhawm pawlpi tungah:
I Pa Pasian le Topa Jesu Khrist tung pana hehpihna le lemna note tungah om ta hen.
Ka thungetna ah note kong phawk simin ka Pasian tungah lungdam ka ko tawntung hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa Jesu sunga na upna le misiangte khempeuh na itna thu ka za zo uh hi.
Na upna midangte na kuppihna ah thanuam-a, Khrist sunga i neih na hoih khempeuh theihtelna kim na neih theih nadingin thu ka ngen hi.
Sanggampa aw nang, misiangte lungsim thaksuaksak zo na hi manin na itna in kei hong lung nuamsakin hong hanthawn hi.
Tua ahi manin Khrist sungah na nasep ding hangtakin thu hong pia thei napi,
itna tawh kong thum zaw hi. Tua ciangin keimah Paul ka tek banah Khrist Jesu hanga thongkia zong ka hi lai-a,
kol ka bulh laitaka ka tapa hong suak Onesimus ading kong ngen hi.
Tunung lamin amah nang adingin kimanna a nei lo ahi hi. Ahi hangin tu-in nang le kei adingin mi manpha mahmah a suak hi. 1Co 1:10; 1Th 2:11
Kei pumpi zahin ngaihsunin am ah nang kiangah kong sawl kik hi.
Lungdamna-thu hanga sikkhainiang buna ka om sung teng, nang tanga kei hong huh dingin ka kiangah ka omsak nuam mahmah hi.
Ahi hangin nang hong deihsakna khempeuh nang utthu-a nong hihsa suaka, hong kihihsak teitei a suah loh nadingin nang thu loin bangmah ka hih nuam kei hi.
Nang tawh tawmvei sung na kikhenna uh pen amah a hoih a na neih kik theih nading hi kha ding hi –

tua nangawn zong sila hi nawn lo, sila sanga a hoihzaw sanggam it ahi zaw lai ding hi. Amah kei tungah a ithuai mahmah hi; ahi hangin mihing hina le Topa sunga sanggam khat hina tawh nang tungah hong ithuai zaw lai ding hi.
Tua ahi ciangin kei, na naseppih a nong sim leh kei nong muak ding bangin amah na muak in.
Amah in nang tungah khialhna khatpeuh a neiha, bat khatpeuh a neih leh kei tungah hong siik in.
Hih lai, keimah Paul in ka khut tekteka ka gelh ahi hi. Kei tungah nang mahmah nong kibat gen vet kei ni – keimah in a vekpi in kong din kik ding hi.
Sanggam aw, Topa sungah nang tung panin phattuamna ngah thei leng ka ut hi; Khrist sungah ka lungsim hong thaksuaksak in.
Hong mang dingin kong muanga, kong nget sanga lianzawin, na hih ding thei kawmin lai kong gelh ahi hi.
A kisam lai khatah: na thungetnate uh hong kidawnna-in, kei no tawh hong om khawm thei kik dingin kilamen ka hi manin zintunna inndei khat a baihsa-in na koih khol in.
Khrist hanga ka thong kiatpih Epaphras in nang hong hopih hi.
Ka naseppih Mark, Aristarchus, Demas le Luke-te in zong nang hong hopih uh hi
Topa Jesu Khrist hehpihna in na kha hong ompih ta hen.
A beisa hunin Pasian in kamsangte tungtawnin i pu i pa-te tungah lam tuamtuamin thu na gen a,
ahi hangin hih ni nunungte ah khuavannuai a bawlpa na khempeuh a luah dinga a sehpa, ama Tapa zangin eite tungah thu hong gen zo hi.

Tua Tapa in Pasian ahina taktak a kilatkhiatna le a minthanna tankhiatna hi-a, ama kammal vangliatna tawh na khempeuh a lenkip hi. Mawhnate siansak nading a bawl khit ciangin vantung Thupina taklam ah a tu hi.
Tua ahi ciangin vansawltakte sangin min thupi zawtham a luah mah bangin vansawltakte sangin a thupi zawtham hi.

Ahang in, Pasian in vansawltakte kua kiangah, “Nang ka Tapa na hi hi; tu ni-in na Pa ka suak zo hi, ” ci ngei ahi hiam? Ahikeh “Kei ama Pa ka hi dinga, amah ka Tapa ahi ding hi,” ci-in gen ngei ahi hiam?
Tua banah, Pasian in a ta masa pen leitungah hong paisak ciangin amah in, “Pasian vansawltakte khempeuh in amah bia uh hen,” ci hi.
Amah in vansawltakte a gen lai-in, “Amah in a vansawltakte huihte suaksakin, ama nasemte, meikungte a suaksak hi,” ci hi.
Ahi hangin Tapa thu ah amah in, “Pasian aw, na kumpi tokhom, a tawntungin om den dinga, a kumpi-gam ukna sik ciangkhut, thumaanna hi ding hi.
Thumaanna it-in, tatsiatna na mudah hi; tua ahi manin Pasian, na Pasian lungnopna sathau nilhna tawh na pawlte khempeuh sangin, nang hong tawisang zaw hi,”
Tua banah zong, “Topa aw, a tungin leitung bulpite na phut a, vantungte na khutin na bawl ahi hi.
Tuate a kisia ding uh a, nang na om den hi; tuate khempeuh puan bangin a patkhia ding uh hi.
Puantualpi bangin tuate na zialkhia dinga, puansilh bangin kikheng ding hi. Ahi hangin nang na kikhel kei a, kumte a bei ngei kei hi,” ci hi.
Pasian in, vansawltakte kua tungah: “Na galte khempeuh na khepekte ngak nadinga ka bawl khit matengin ka taklam ah na tu-in,” ci-in gen ngei ahi hiam?
Vansawltakte khempeuh, hotkhiatna luah dingte nasem dinga, kisawl khate hi lo ahi hiam?
Tua ahi manin eite i tolhmang loh nadingin i zaksa thute limtakin i thudon semsem kul ding hi.
Ahang in, vansawltakte gen thupuak kip zo a; tua thu zui loin a palsatte in gawtna diktak thuak tektek uh ahileh,
tua zahtaka thupi hotkhiatna thudon kei lehang bang i ci suahtak zawh ding hiam? Hih hotkhiatna a masa penin Topa in a genkhiat, ama gen a zate in ei tunga a kipsak ahi hi.
Pasian in zong limte, a lamdangte le nalamdang tuamtuamte le ama deih banga a hawm Khasiangtho letsongte tawh tua thu teci a pang hi.
Eite gen mailam huna hong om ding leitung pen vansawltakte nuai ah a koih kei hi.
Ahi hangin mi khat in teci a pannasa mun khat ah: “Nang ngaihsut tham dingin mihing bang hi-a, na thudon dingin mihing tapa bang ahi hiam?
Vansawltak sangin a niam zawzek in na bawl a; minthanna le pahtawina khusak in,

ama khepek nuai-ah na khempeuh na koih hi,” ci hi. Na khempeuh ama nuai ah koih a, Pasian in ama nuai ah a koih loh bangmah a om kei hi. Tua hi napi tu tadihin na khempeuh ama nuai-a omin i mu kei hi.

Ahi hangin vansawltakte sangin a niam zawdeuh a kikoih phot Jesu in, Pasian hehpihna hangin mi khempeuh adinga sihna a ciap theih nadingin sihna a thuak manin tu-in minthanna le pahtawina a kikhusak eite in i mu hi.
Tapa tampi minthanna ngahsakna ah ama ading le ama tungtawna na khempeuh a omna pa Pasian in, amaute hotkhiatna a piangsak pa thuakna tungtawna, a bukimsak ding mah kilawm hi.
Mite a siangthosak pa le a kisiang thosakte innkuan khat hi khawm hi. Tua ahi ciangin amaute sanggamte cih ding, Jesu a maizum kei hi.
Amah in, “Ka sanggamte tungah na min ka pulak ding hi; mihonte kikhopna ah nang phatna la ka sa ding hi,”
Tua ciangin, “Amah ka muang ding hi,” ci kik hi. Amah in, “Pasian in kei hong piaksa tate tawh, hiah ka om hi,” ci leuleu hi.
Tate in si le sa nei ahi nungsang amah in zong a sihna tungtawn a, sihna vangliatna a nei dawimangpa, a suksiat theih nading
le a nuntak sung teng sih ding launa sila-a omte a suahtak theih nadingin amaute mihing hina hong tang hi.
Ahang in, a taktakin ama huh vansawltakte hi loin Abraham suan le khakte hizaw hi.

Hih thu hangin Pasian na a sepna sungah mi lainat siam le a muanhuai tulpi a suah nading le mite mawhnate thoihdamna a bawl theih nadingin lam khempeuh ah a sanggamte mah bangin hong suah ding mah ahi hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh zia-etna a thuakte a huh theih nadingin amah zong kizia-etin a thuak hi.
Tua ahi manin vantung-lam sapna a ngah a siangtho sanggamte aw, eite in i pulak tua sawltakpi le tulpi Jesu tungah na ngaihsutnate uh kipsak un.
Pasian inn sung khempeuh ah Moses a muanhuai bang tektekin amah a sehpa tungah amah a muanhuai hi.
Inn sangin a lampa in pahtawina a ngah zawk bang tektek in Moses sangin Jesu in pah tawina thupizaw a ngah ding kilawm hi.
Ahang in, inn peuhmah a lam mi khat om a, ahi hangin na khempeuh a lam Pasian ahi hi.
Moses pen mailam a kigen ding thute teci a pang, Pasian innkuan sung khempeuh ah nasem muanhuai ahi hi.
Ahi hangin Pasian innkuan tungah Khrist tapa muanhuai ahi hi. Eite in i hanna le i kisialhpih tua lametna i letkip suak leh ama innkuan i hi hi.
Tua hi-a, Khasiangtho in: “Tu ni-in ama aw na zak uh leh,
gamlak a zia-etna hun sungin na lehdo lai bangun, na lungtang uh khauhsak kei un.
Tua lai-ah na pate un kei hong zia-et in hong sin uh a kum sawmli sung ka hihte a mu uh hi.
Tua khang tungah ka heh a, tua ciangin, ‘Amaute lungtang lam pial tawntung a, ka lampite a thei kei uh hi,’ ka cihna tua hang ahi hi.
Tua ciangin ka heh a, ‘Amaute ka khawlna-ah a lut ngei kei ding uh hi,’ ci-in kiciamin ka genkhia hi,” a ci hi.
Sanggamte aw, note a kuamah peuh lungtang ah mawhdim le umlah in, a nungta Pasian kiang pan na pialmang loh nadingun kikem un.
Ahi hangin tuni a kici sungin mawhna’ khemhatna hangin kuamah in a lungsim a khauhsak loh nadingin nisimin khat le khat na kihan thawn un.
Eite in a masa-a i neih kimuanna, a tawp dongin kiptaka i letkip leh Khrist sungah tanh a nei i hi hi.
Amah in, “Tu ni-in ama aw na zak uh leh, na lehdo lai bangun na lungsim uh khauhsak kei un,” na ci khin phet hi.
Za napi-a, a lehdo kuate ahi hiam? Egypt pana Moses in a pikhiatte hi lo uh ahi hiam?
Amah kum sawmli sung a hehna kuate tung ahi hiam? Mawhna bawla, a pumpi uh gamlaka, a pukte tung hi lo ahi hiam?
Pasian in ama khawlna ah amaute a tung ngei kei ding uh hi, ci a, a tomlawh, a thumang lote tung lo kua tung hi ding hiam?
Tua ahi ciangin amaute uplahna hangin a lut thei kei uh hi, cih i thei hi.
Tua ahi ciangin ama khawlna sunga lut nading kamciam om lai ahi manin khatpeuh tua sunga lut dingin a cin zawh loh khak ding kidawm ni.
Ahang in, amaute zak bang tektekin eite kianga hong kihilh lungdamna-thu i za hi; ahi hangin a zate in upna tawh a gawmkhawm loh manin, amaute zaksa thupuak, amau adingin kimanna a nei kei hi.

Pasian in, “Tua ciangin ka heh a, ‘Amaute ka khawlna ah a lut ngei kei ding uh hi,’ ci-in kiciamin ka genkhia hi,” a cih bang tektek in, tu-in a umsa eite tua khawlna ah i lut hi. Tua hi-a leitung a kipiansak khit nungsang a nasep a zawhsa ahi hi.
Ahang in, mun khatah: “A ni sagihna ni-in a nasepna khempeuh panin Pasain a khawl hi,” ci-in tua kammalte tawh ni sagihna thu a gen hi.
A tunga thumal sung mah ah, “Amaute ka khawlna sungah a lut ngei kei ding uh hi,” ci kik hi.
Pawlkhatte tua khawlna ah lut thei lai ding uh a, a beisa hun sunga a kiangua lungdamna-thu kigen a zasate, amau thumanlohna hangin a lut thei kei uh hi.

Tua ahi manin Pasian in ni dang khat seh kikin, tu-ni, ci-a tua a cih khit a sawtpi ciangin a ma-a a gensa bangin David tungtawnin, “Tu ni-in ama aw na zak uh leh, na lungtangte uh khauhsak kei un,” na ci hi.
Ahang in, Joshua in amaute khawlna pia khin hileh, Pasian in tua khitin ni tuam khat thu gen nawn lo ding hi.
Tua ahi ciangin Pasian mite adingin Sabbath khawlna khat om lai hi.
Ahang in, Pasian khawlna sunga a lutte khempeuh in Pasian ama nasepna pan a khawl bang tektekin amau nasepna panin khawl ciat ding uh hi.
Tua ahi manin amaute hong lah thumanlohna zui-in kuamah puk lo-a, tua khawlna-ah i lut nadingin i hih theih zahzah in hahkat ni.

Pasian thu nungta in hihtheihna a nei hi. Langnih a hiam namsau sangin hiamzaw a, nuntakna le kha, tang le guhngekte nangawn pailetin khen thei a, lungsim ngaihsutnate le lungtang tupnate khentel thei hi.
A kipiangsak khempeuh Pasian muhna pan a kisel bangmah a om kei hi. I thu i tut nading mitmuhin a kisin bangmah om loin kitel sinsen in a om hi.
Tua ahi manin eite in, vantungte khengin a pai tulpi Pasian Tapa Jesu i neih khit nungsang i pulak tua upna kiptakin len ni.
Ahang in, eite zawn khalna hong thuakpih thei lo tulpi nei i hi kei hi; ahi hangin eite thuak mah bangin zia-etna a pawlpawl a thuak ngei, ahi hanga mawhna a nei lo tulpi khat i nei hi.
Tua ahi ciangin eite in lainatna i ngah a, i kisap hunhuna hong huh ding hehpihna i ngah nadingin kimuangtakin hehpihna tokhom zuan ni.
Tulpi peuhmah mihing lak pana kiteel hi a, Pasian tunga nasep khempeuh amau tanga sem ding mawhnate hanga biakpiakna le letsongte a pia dinga kiseh ahi hi.
Amahmah zong thanemna ah om ngei zo ahi manin a thei lo mite le a gammangte lungnemtakin kem thei hi.
Hih thu hangin, amah in ama mawhnate le mite mawhnate tang dingin biakpiakna a piak ding kul hi.
Pasian in Aaron a sap bang tektekin a sap mite longal kuamah in ama thu-in hih pahtawina a la kei hi.
Tua hi-a Khrist in zong tulpi suahna minthanna ama tungah amahmah in a la kei hi. Ahi hangin Pasian in ama tungah, “Nang ka Tapa na hi hi; tu ni-in na Pa ka suak zo hi,” ci hi.
Tua ciangin mundang khatah, “Nang, Melchizedek gui zui-in siampi khat na hi tawntung hi,” a ci hi.
Jesu leitungah a nuntak hunlai-in amah sihna pan a honkhia thei pa tungah nakpi in kahna le khitui luanna tawh thu ngetnate le ngetnate ngena zahtakna tawh a ki-ap manin kisang hi.
Amah tapa hi napi a thuaknate panin thuman’na sin a,
khatvei hoihkim khinin, ama thu a mangte khempeuh adingin hotkhiatna nak hong suak zo a,
Melchizedek gui zui-in Pasian in tulpi za pia zo hi.
Hih thu tawh kisai gen ding tampi om a, ahi hangin theihna ah tuantual na hi manun teltaka gen ding haksa hi.
A taktak in, siate suakin mite na hilh ding uh hun ta hi napi Pasian thu thutak bulpite hong hilh kik ding mi khat na kisam uh hi. Antak hi lo nawizu na kisam uh hi.
Nawizu-a kivak peuhmah naungek hi lai ahi manin, thumaanna tawh kisai thuhilhnate na thei nai kei uh hi.
Ahi hangin antak pen, a sia le a pha khen thei a, zangin zongsang a, amau le amau a kisek sa, a picing sate ading ahi hi.
Tua ahi manin Khrist tawh kisai ah picin lam manawh ni. Sihna hong tun nasepnate pan kisikna bulkipte phut kik loin Pasian upna,
baptisenate tawh kisai lamlahnate, khutngaknate, misite thawhkiknate, le tawntung thukhennate tawh kisai, thuhilhna bulpite nusia ni.
Pasian in hong phal leh tua bangin i hih ding hi.
Khatvei khuavak mu khin a, vantung letsong a ciam khin, Khasiangtho sunga tanh a nei khin,
Pasian thu hoihna le hong tung ding khanghun vangliatnate a ciam khin mite,
a pukmang uh leh kisik theih ahi kei hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amau man nadingin Pasian Tapa a kilhlum kik uh hi-a, mipi mai-ah sim mawhna a thuaksak kik uh ahi hi.
A hunhunin guah a dawl, a kikhawh sakpa adingin a manpha gah a gahsak tua lo, Pasian thupha ngah ahi hi.
Ahi hangin ling le thanglingte a pona lo in kimanna nei lo-a, a kihamsiat ding lauhuai hi. A tawpna-ah a kihaltum ding hi.
Hih bang i cih tei hangin kong it lawmte aw, no tawh kisai-in hotkhiatna tawh kipawl a hoihzaw nate no aa hi, ci-in lungmuangin ka om hi.
Pasian thutang lo ahi kei hi; amah in na nasep uh le ama mite na huhnasa uh le na huh lai nadingte uhah amah na itna uh na lahnasa uh a mangngilh kei ding hi.
Na lametna uh a kip nadingin na vekun a tawpkhak dong tua bangin na thanuam ding uh kong deih uh hi.
Note na thadah ding uh kong deih kei uh a, upna le sikdona tungtawna kam ciamsa a luahte na etteh ding uh kong deih uh hi.
Pasian in Abraham tungah kamciam a piakin amah sanga lianzaw kiciam nading om lo ahi manin amahmah kilo in kiciam a,
"Thupha kong pia taktak ding a, suan le khak tampi kong pia ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua mah bangin lungduaitaka a ngak khit ciangin Abraham in tua a kikamciamsa a ngah hi.
Mihingte, amau sanga lianzaw khat lo-in kiciam uh a, tua kiciamna in thu kigen pen kipsakin kiselna khempeuh a beisak hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian in a kamciamsa a luahte tungah, ama tupna bang a khellohna theisak nuam ahi manin tomlawhna tawh a kipsak hi.
Eite in hong kipia lametna len-a i delh laitakin nakpi-a i kihanthawn theih nadingin Pasian zuautheihlohna thu nih tawh Pasian in a hih zo hi.
Eite in tua lametna kha adingin sikkipin i nei a, kip mahmah in muanhuai hi. Tua in, puanzak nung mun siangtho sungnung ah lut-a,
tua munah Jesu eite ma-ah eite tangin a na lut khinzo hi. Amah Melchizedek gui zui-in tawntung tulpi hong suak hi.
Hih Melchizedek pen Salem kumpipa hi-a a Sang Pen Pasian siampi ahi hi. Amah in, kumpite zo khina hong ciah, Abraham na dawnin thupha pia-a,
tua ciangin Abraham in, amah na khempeuh ah sawm ah khat a pia hi. A masa penin a min khiatna “thumaanna kumpipa” hi a, tua ciangin “lemna kumpipa” cihna “Salem kumpipa” zong ahi hi.
Nu nei lo, pa nei lo, khangsimna nei lo, kipat ni le nuntakna bei ni a nei lo, Pasian Tapa bangin, a tawntungin siampi-in a om den hi.
Amah bangzah takin lian hiam, ngaihsun dih ni. Pupi Abraham nangawn in a galvan matte panin sawm ah khat pia tanghial hi!
Tu-in Levi suan le khak siampi a suakte in a sanggamte uh ahi Abraham suan le khakte hi taleh amaute tung panin sawmah khat a kaih ding uh thukham in a kal hi.
Bangbang ahi zongin hih mipa in a pianna Levi pan sut lo napi, Abraham tung pan sawmah khat na kai-a, kamciamte a ngahpa thupha na pia hi.
Tua hi-a a lianzawpa in a neuzawpa thupha a piak pen theihkhialh nading a om kei hi.
Thukhat ah, a si thei mihingte in sawmah khat kai uh a, a thudang khatah a nungta hi a kici pa in a kai hi.
Sawmah khat a kai Levi in Abraham tungtawnin sawmah khat pia hi, nangawn kici thei ding hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Melchizedek in Abraham a na dawn hun laitakin Levi in a pubul pumpi sungah a om lai hi.

Levi-te siampi nasepna tungtawnin kicinna kingah hileh (ahang in, tua hihna kibulphuh in mite tungah thukham a kipia ahi hi.) bang hanga Aaron gui ahi lo, Melchizedek gui siampi dang hong pai kul lai ding ahi hiam?
Ahang in, siampi hina kilaihna a om bangin thukham zong laih pelmawh a kul hi.
Hih nate a kigenna pa ahileh beh tuam mi khat hi-a, tua beh panin kuamah biakna-tau ah nasem ngei a om kei hi.
Ahang in, eite Topa lah Judah suan le khak ahilam kitel zo a, tua beh tawh kisai-in Moses in siampite thu bangmah a gen kei hi.
Melchizedek bang siampi dang khat hong kilang ahi ciangin thugen hong kitelzaw semsem a,
tua siampi hong suakpa pen a pu a pa ua ngeina tawh hong suak hi loin, a kisia thei lo nuntakna’ vangliatna pansanin siampi hong suak ahi hi.
Ahang in, “Nang, Melchizedek gui zui-in tawntung siampi na hi hi,” ci-in kipulak hi.
Ngeina masa pen thanemin kiman na nei lo ahi manin kinawlkhin a,
(ahang in, thukham in bangmah a hoih kimsak kei hi.) a hoihzaw lametna hong kipia in, tua tungtawnin Pasian kiang i nai hi.
Tua nangawn zong kiciamna lo tawh hi peuhmah lo hi! Adangte kiciamna khat beek om loin siampi a suak uh hi.
Ahi hangin Pasian in kiciamna tawh ama tungah thu a gen khit ciangin siampi hong suak a: “Topa kiciam in, a lungsim a khel kei ding hi: “Nang tawntung siampi na hi hi,” ci hi,
Hih kiciamna hangin, Jesu a hoihzaw thukhun kipsakpa hong suak hi.
Tu-in sihna in amaute nasep a khaktan nungsangin siampi tampi a om hi.
Ahi hangin Jesu nungta tawntung ahi manin amah a kipden siampi ahi hi.
Tua ahi manin ama tungtawnin Pasian kianga a paite khempeuh kicingtakin honkhia thei hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amaute tanga a thumsak dingin a nungta tawntung hi.
Tua bang tulpi khat – a siangtho, a kawkbaang lo, a siang, mawhneite pana kikhenkhia, vante tunglama a kitawisang pa khat in, eite kitaksapna hong pia zo mahmah hi.

Tulpi dangte tawh kibang lo a, a masa in ama mawhna, tua ciangin mite mawhnate, biakpiakna ni khat khit ni khatin piak a kul kei hi. Amah in amaute mawhna ading amahmah biakpiakna-a a kipiak ciangin khatvei in cin khin hi.
Ahang in, thukham in a thanem mite’ tulpi in seh-a, ahi hangin thukham nunga hong pai kiciamna in a tawntunga hoihkim-a kibawl, Tapa a seh zo hi.
I thu gen, hih ahi hi; vantung ah Thupina kumpi tokhom taklam-a tu tua bang tulpi i nei a,
amah mihing bawl ahi lo, Topa bawl biakbuk taktaka munsiangtho-a sempa ahi hi.
Tulpi peuhmah biakpiakna le letsongte pia dinga kiseh ahi hi; tua ahi ciangin hih pa in zong piak ding na khat a neih ding kisam hi.
Thukham in a kalh letsongte a pia ding mi na om zo a hi manin, amah leitunga om hileh siampi a hi kei ding hi.

Amaute in munsiangtho khat sungah na sem uh a tua pen vantunga om pen liim leh kibatpih ahi hi. Hih thu hangin Moses in biakbuk lam dinga a kipat ciangin, “Mual tunga nang hong kilaksa bangin na khempeuh na bawl ding thei in,” ci-in a vauhilh hi.
Ahi hangin Jesu hong palaina thukhun bel, thukhun lui sanga thupizaw hoihzaw kamciamte tunga kibulphuh ahi manin amaute nasepna sangin Jesu nasepna a thupizaw hi.
Ahang in, a masa pen thukhun a khialhna khat beek om lo hileh thukhun dang ading mun a kizong kei ding hi.
Ahi hangin Pasian in tua mite mawhsak nading mu a, “Israel innkuante le Judah innkuante tawh thukhun thak ka bawl hun hong tung ding hi, Topa in cikhia hi.

A pu a pa-te a khut uah lenin Egypt pana ka paikhiatpih lai-in amaute tawh ka thukhun bang ahi kei ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh ka thukhun ah amaute muanhuai tawntung lo uh a, amaute ka nungngatsan ta hi, Topa in cikhia hi.

Hih in Israel innkuante tawh, tua hun khit cianga ka thukhun ding ahi hi, Topa in cikhia hi. Ka thukhamte amaute lungsim ah ka guang dinga, amau lungtang tungah ka gelh ding hi. Amaute Pasian ka hi dinga, amaute ka mite ahi ding uh hi.

Kuamah in a vengte ahikeh ama sanggampa tungah hilhin, ‘Topa thei in,’ cih a kul nawn kei ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amaute khempeuh in a neu pen pan a lian pen dongin kei hong thei ta ding uh hi.
Ahang in, amaute gitlohna ka maisak dinga, a mawhnate uh ka ciamteh nawn kei ding hi,” ci khin hi.
Hih thukhun “athak” cihna in thukhun a masa zatmawh a suaksak hi, zatmawh a suaksa a lui pen a mangthang pah ding hi.
Thukhun masa in biakna-a zat ding zuihtawm ngeina le leitung mun siangtho zong a nei hi.
Biakbuk khat a kilam hi. Tua buk dei masa ah meivak tunna, sabuai le a ki-apsa anlum om a, Mun Siangtho kici hi.
Puanzak nihna nungah Mun Siangtho Pen kici inndei khat a om hi.
Tua mun ah gim namtui halna kham biakna-tau le kham a kizut thukhun singkuang a om hi. Hih sing kuang sungah manna koihna kham bel, asel Aron ciangkhut le thukhun kigelhna suangpekte a om hi.
Singkuang tungsan ah thoihdamna mun limsunin Minthanna cherub-te a om hi. Ahi hangin hih nate tu-in i sut ditdet zo kei ding hi.
Hih bangin na khempeuh a kigualh diudeu khit ciangin siampite a nasepna uh sem dingin dei puanung sungah a hunhunin a lut den uh hi.
Ahi hangin inndei sung nung pen sungah tulpipa bek lut-a, kum khatin khatvei bek lutin amahmah ading le mite in a theih loh man-ua a bawl uh mawhnate tang dingin sisan a tawi lo ngei kei hi.
Hih thu hangin biakbuk masa pen a om laiteng Mun Siangtho paina lampi kilak nai lo tadih hi, cih Khasiangtho in hong lak hi.
Hih pen tu hun ading etsakna hi-a, letsongte le biakpiakna-a kipiate in hih biakna a piate kitheihna lungsim a siangsak thei kei hi, cih lahna ahi hi.
Tuate nek le dawn a kisitna ngeina tuamtuam lel hi-a, biakna ngeina thak hong tun mateng-a zat ding zuihtawm ngeina bek ahi hi.
Hih lai-a omsa a na hoihte tawh tulpi dinga Khrist hong pai lai-in piansak na laka kihel lo, mihing khuta kibawl lo, a lianzaw le a kicianzaw biakbuk sungah a lutsuak hi.
Amah, keelte le bawngnote sisan tawh lut lo-a, ama sisan mahmah tawh khatvei-a cin ding, tawntung tatkhiatna ngahsa in Mun Siangtho Pen ah a lut hi.
Biakna ngeina-a a sianglote tungah keelte, bawngtalte sisan le bawngla-vute kithehin amaute kisian suah a, tua bangin a puatham uh a siang hi.

Tua ahileh tawntung Kha tungtawnin amahmah kawk baang lo a; Pasian tunga kipia Khrist sisan in sihna hong tun nasepna panin a nungta Pasian na i sep theih nadingin i lungsim kitheihna hong siangsak zawtham lo ding ahi hiam!

Hih thu hang mahin thukhun thak palai Khrist hong hi-a, a kisam mite in a kiciamsa tawntung gouluahna a ngah theih nadingun, thukhun masa nuai-a a bawlsa uh mawhnate pan a suaktasak dingin tu-in tatman dingin amah hong si zo hi.
Thusiah tawh kisai peuhmah ah, a thusiahpa a sihna theihcian ding kisam hi;
bang hang hiam cih leh a thusiahpa a sih khit ciang bekin a thusiah kizang thei pan hi; a thusiahpa a nuntak sungin a kizang thei ngei kei hi.
Thukhun masa na ngawn zong sisan lo-a a na hih theih lohna hih thu hang mah ahi hi.
Moses in mite khempeuh tungah thukham in a piak thu teng a tangko lai-in, bawngnote sisan le tui, samul dupsan le puknah hiangte in laizial le mite khempeuh theh khawm hi.
Amah in, “Hih in Pasian in note zuih dinga hong piak thukhun sisan ahi hi,” ci hi.
Tua mah tawh kibangin, biakbuk le biakna ngeina-a kizang na khempeuh sisanin a theh hi.
A taktakin thukham in na khempeuh phial sisan tawh siansak dingin kal-a, sisan kibua loin mawh maisakna a om kei hi.
Tua ciangin hih biakpiaknate zangin vantunglam nate kibatpihte siansuah a kul ahi hi. Ahi hangin vantunglam nate mahmah, hihte sanga biakpiakna hoihzaw ahi hi.
Ahang in, Khrist ahileh a taktak tawh a kisun bek, mihing bawl a siangtho mun ah a lut kei hi; Pasian mai-ah eite tanga a va kilang dingin vantung mahmah ah a lut khin zo hi.
Tulpi in ama sisan ahi lo sisan tawisa in Mun Siangtho Pen ah kum simin a lut bangin vantungah Khrist a lut kikkik kei hi.

Tua bang hi hileh leitung kipiansak nungsang Khrist in tamveipi a na thuak kul ding hi. Ahi hangin tu-in khanghunte bei hunin khatvei-a kimang den mawh maisak nadingin amahmah biakpiakna-in hong kilang zo hi.
Mihing adingin khatvei sih ding laitansa hi-a, tua khit ciangin thukhenna a thuak ding hi.

Tua bang tektek in Khrist zong mi tampi mawhnate lakhiamang dingin khatvei biakpiakna in kipia zo hi; tua hi-a mawhna a pua ding hi nawn lo, amah a ngak mite hotkhiatna puak dingin a nihveina hong kilang ding hi.

Thukham pen hong tung ding na hoihte liim bek hi-a a taktakte hi lo hi. Hih thu hangin thukham in kum khat khit kum khat a kipia kikkik biakpiaknate zangin, a bia dinga a kianga a va naihte a hoihkimsak thei ngei kei hi.
Hoihkimsak thei hileh tua piaknate kitawpsak khin lo ding ahi hiam? Ahang in, a biate khatvei a kimangden siansaksa hi dinga amau mawhnate hangin mawh kisakna a nei nawn kei ding uh hi.
Ahi hangin tua biakpiaknate kum sima mawhna phawksak kikna ahi hi,
bang hang hiam cih leh bawngtalte le keelte sisan in mawhna a lakkhiamang thei kei hi.
Tua ahi manin Khrist leitungah hong pai lai in: “Biakpiakna le biakna na lunggulh kei hi, ahi hangin kei ading pumpi khat nong bawlkholhsak zo hi.
Meihal biakna le mawhna hanga biaknate in hong lungkimsak lo hi.
Tua ciangin ken, ‘Kei hih lai-ah ka om hi – laizial sungah kei thu a kigelh zo hi — Pasian aw, na deih bang a sem dingin kong pai hi,’ ka ci hi,” a ci hi.
Amah in a masa penin, “Biakpiaknate le biaknate, meihal biakna le mawhna hanga biaknate na lunggulh kei a, tuate tawh zong na lungkim tuan kei hi,” (thukham in tuate bawl ding na kal napi) a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah in, “Kei hih lai-ah ka om hi, na deihna sem dingin kong pai hi,” ci khin zo hi. A nihna a kipsak nadingin a masa pen a nawlkhin hi.
Tua thuseh hangin khatvei-a manden dingin Jesu Khrist pumpi-a biakpiakna tungtawnin eite hong kisiangthosak zo hi.
Siampi peuhmah in ni khat khit ni khat dingin ama biakna nasepte a sem hi; mawhnate a lakhiamang thei lo kithoihnate mah a pia kikkik hi.
Ahi hangin hih siampipa in hun khempeuh ading mawhnate biakpiakna khat a piak khit ciangin Pasian taklamah a tu hi.
Tua khit nungsang ama galte a khepek ngakna a kisuahsak ding a ngak hi;
ahang in, a kisangthosak mite, khatvei biakpiakna tawh a tawntungin a hoihkimsak hi.
Hih thu Khasiangtho in eite tungah teci a pang hi. A masa in,
"Tua hun khit ciangin amaute tawh ka bawl ding, thukhun hih ahi hi, Topa in ci hi. Amaute lungtang sungah ka thukhamte ka koih dinga, amaute lungsim sungah tuate ka gelh ding hi,” ci hi,
Tua khit ciangin: “Amaute mawhnate le thukham palsat-a a gamtatnate uh ka phawk nawn kei ding hi,” a cihbeh lai hi.
Tua ahi ciangin hihte a kimaisak nasa mun ah mawhna hanga biakpiakna khat beek a om nawn peuhmah kei hi.
Tua ahi manin sanggamte aw, Jesu sisan hangin Mun Siangtho Pen ah lut ding kimuanna i neih nungsang,
eite adingin tua puanzak kantanin a nungta le a thak lampi khat kihong zo a; tua pen ama pumpi ahi hi.
Tua hi-a Pasian innkuan tungah eite in siampilian khat i neih nungsang,
eite lungsim kisuantakna panin i lungtangte thehsiangsa le i pumpi tuisiang tawh silsa in, upna hanga kitheihtelna kim tawh Pasian kiang zuan ni.
Eite hong kamciampa muanhuai ahi manin i sansa lametna hoihtakin lenkip ni.
Tua bangin eite khat le khat itna le gamtat hoih lama i kithanopsuah theih nadingin ngaihsun ni.
Pawlkhatte a kingeinaseh bang uh hi loin kikhop khawmna nusia kei ni. Ahi hangin, tua Ni in hong naih ta cih na theih bangun khat le khat kihanthawn semsem ni.
Thutak theihna i ngah nungin thei gegu pi mahin mawhna i bawl lai leh mawhnate biakpiak nading om nawn lo a,
ahi hangin thukhenna le Pasian galte a valhtum ding meikuang zuahzuah a lauhuai lametna bek a om lai hi.
Moses thukham a nial peuhmah teci nih hiam, thum hiam om nak leh lainatna om loin a si hi.
Amah a siangsak thukhun sisan, a siangtho lo na bangin simmawh a, hehpihna Kha engko-in, Pasian Tapa a khenuai-a a tuancil mi, bangzah ta-a, a nasiazaw-in gawttakin na ngaihsun hiam?
Ahang in, “Phulakna kei aa hi-a, ken ka thuk ding hi,” cih le “Topa in a mite thu a khen ding hi,” a ci kik pa i thei hi.
A nungta Pasian khut sunga puk ding mulkimhuai mahmah hi.
Note in khuavak na ngah khit nungua haksatna mai-ah panmun la a, nasiataka na do lai uh ni masate phawk un.
Khat veivei note, mi tampi mai-ah engko ding le bawlsiat dingin hong kipholaka, a hun dangte ah a kibawlsiate tawh na ding khawm uh hi.

Thong sunga kiate na khasiat uh a, na neih na lamte uh hong laksakna uh zong lungnuamtakin na sang uh hi, bang hang hiam cih leh note mahmah in no adingin a hoihzaw le a tozaw neihsa na nei uh cih na thei uh hi.
Tua ahi ciangin na kimuanna lungsim uh na paikhia kei un; pahtakman tampi hong kipia ding hi.
Pasian deihna na sep uh ciangin ama hong ciamsa na ngah nadingun na sikdo ding uh kisam hi.
Ahang in, hun tomno khat sungah, “Hong pai ding pa amah hong pai dinga a ziakai kei ding hi.
Ahi hangin ka mi thumaanpa upna tawh a nungta ding hi. Amah a nungtolh leh ama tungah ka lungkim kei ding hi,”
Eite i hileh nungtolh-a kisiate laka i hi kei a, ahi hangin uma kihonkhiate i hizaw hi.
Tu-in upna pen, i lamette tel cianna le i muh lohte theihtelna ahi hi.
Tanglai mite a kiphatna hihte hang ahi hi.
A kimu theite a kimu thei pana kibawl hi loin, khuavannuai, Pasian thupiaka piang ahi hi, cih upna-in i theitel hi.

Abel in upna hangin Cain sangin biakpiakna hoihzaw Pasian tungah a pia hi. Pasian in ama biaknate a phatgen lai-in upna hangin mi thumaan a hina a phat hi. Amah a sih khit hangin upna hangin thu gen lailai hi.

Enok in upna hangin sihna a thuak khak loh nadingin hih nuntakna pan a kilakhia hi; Pasian in amah lakhiamang zo ahi manin a kimu zo nawn kei hi. Ahang in, amah a kilak ma in, Pasian a lungkimsak pa khat hi, ci-a kiphatsa khat ahi hi.
Tua hi-a upna loin Pasian a kilungkimsak thei kei hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh ama kianga hong pai peuhmah in amah a om takpi mah hi, amah citaka a zongte pahtakman a pia hi, ci-a up ding a kul hi.

Noah in upna hangin a kimu nai lo nate ah a kivauhilh ciangin kihtakna siangtho tawh, a innkuanpihte hotkhiat nading gunkuangpi a lem hi. Ama upna hangin leitung mawhpaih a, upna hanga thumaanna a luahpa a suak hi.
Abraham in upna hangin a nung cianga, a luah dinga a ngahna muna pai dingin a kisap lai-in koi lamah pai ding cih nangawn a theih loh hangin mangin a pai hi.
Amah in a upna hangin gamdang a kiciamna gamah mikhual bangin inn a lam hi. Amah tawh a kibanga ciamna a luahpih Isaac le Jacob mah bangin tuipuan bukte ah a teng hi.
Ahang in, bulpite a nei khuapi lian khat a lamen hi. Tua khuapi a geelpa le a lampa Pasian ahi hi.
Abraham in upna hangin, amah tek lua ta-in Sara mahmah lah tasel hi napi ama tunga thu a ciampa muanhuai a sak manin amah pa khat a suah theihna kipia hi.
Tua hi-a hih a si tawh a kibang mi khat panin vantunga om aksite zaha tam le tuipi sehtak-a sehnel kisim zo lote zah, suan le khakte zong a piang hi.

Hih mite khempeuh upna tawh a nuntak lai mah un a si uh hi. Amaute in a kiciamsa nate ngah lo uh a, tuate gamlapi panin galmuh in a galmuak bek uh hi. Tua hi-a amaute leitungah gamdang mi le mikhual ahilam uh a kiphawk uh hi.
Tua bang a ci mite in amau ading gam khat a zong uh hi, cih a kilangsak hi.
Amaute in a nusiatsa uh gam na lunggulh den uh hileh ciah kik nading hun hoih nei khin tham ding uh hi,
Tua sangsikin, amaute in gam hoihzaw khat vantung gam a lunggulh uh hi. Pasian in amaute ading khuapi lian khat bawlkhol zo ahi manin, amau Pasian a kicih ding a maizum kei hi.
Pasian in a zia-et ciangin Abraham in upna hangin biakpiak nadingin Isaac a pia hi. Tua kam ciamna a ngahpa in a tapa khat neihsun biakpiakna-a pia dingin a kithawi hi.
Tua mah lah Pasian in, “Isaac tungtawnin na suan na khak a kiminlawh ding hi,” a cihna pa hi lai hi.
Abraham in, Pasian in misisate thosak thei, ci-in ngaihsun a tehpih in gen leng, amah in Isaac misi pan a ngah kik ahi hi.
Isaac in upna hangin Jacob le Esau mailam ding ngaihsunin thupha na pia hi.
Jacob in a sih kuanin upna hangin Joseph tapate thupha pia ciat-a a ciangkhut tungah kingamin na bia hi.
Joseph a sih kuanin upna hangin Israel mite Egypt pan a paikhiat nading le ama guhte tawh kisai lamlahna na pia hi.
Moses nu le pa-te in upna hangin, amah a suah khit kha thum sung sel uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in amah naupang mawkmawk hi lo cih mu uh ahi manin kumpipa thupiak a kihta kei uh hi.
Moses in a khan khit ciangin upna hangin Pharaoh tanu’ tapa a kicih ding a nial hi.
Mawhna nopsakna-a tomvei sung gualnop sangin Pasian mite tawh bawlsiatna a thuak khawm ding teelzaw hi.
Mailam ah pahtakman a san ding a etkholh manin Khrist hanga maimawkna pen Egypt gam goute sangin manphazaw a sa hi.
Amah in upna hangin kumpipa hehna kihta loin Egypt nusia hi; amah in muh theih loh mipa a muh manin a thuak keeikai hi.
Amah in, upna hangin ta masa a thatpa in Israel ta masa a sukkhak loh nadingin Paisan-pawi le sisan thehna a na bawl hi.
Tua mite in upna hangin leihul a pai bangin San Tuipi a kantan uh hi; ahi hangin Egypt mite in tua bangin hih a sawm uh leh amaute tui ah kialum uh hi.
Mite in upna hangin, Jericho ni sagih sung a kimkot khit uh ciangin khulhte a cim hi.
Numei kizuak Rahab in, upna hangin thukansimte a tunsak manin thumang lote tawh a kithat khawm kei hi.
Bang genbeh lai ding ka hi hiam? Gideon Barak, Samson, Jephtha, David, Samuel le kamsangte thu gen nading ka hun a kicing kei hi.
Amaute in upna tungtawnin kumpi gamte zo uh a, thutang tawh ukin, a kiciamsate a ngah uh hi; amaute in humpinelkai kamte khak uh a
meikuangpi phelhmitin namsau ma pan suakta uh hi. Amaute thanemna thakhauhna suakin galdona ah vanglian uh a, gamdang galte zo mang uh hi.
Numeite in amau misite, a nungtasa-in ngah kik uh hi. Adangte kigawt-a, thawhkikna hoihzaw ngah dingin a kikhah khiat ding a nial uh hi.
Adangte sikkhainiang tawh kikhihin thong sungah a kikhum laitakin pawlkhatte in ciamnuih bawlna le sat gawpna a thuak uh hi.
Amaute suang in kideng, amaute singat tawh tumnih kisuah; amaute namsau tawh kithat hi. Amaute in tuu vun, keel vunte silhin vakvai uh a, gentheih bawlna, bawlsiatna le khel bawlna kithuaksak hi.
Amaute adingin leitung tenna taak hi lo hi. Amaute gamlak mualsang, suanghawm le kaw hawm sungah a tai kawikawi uh hi.
Amaute in a upna uh hangin phatna a ngah uh hi. Tua hi napi amaute kuamah in tua ciamsa pen a ngah kei uh hi.
Pasian in eite ading a hoihzaw khat geel khin zo ahi manin eite tawh i kimkhawm ciang bekin amaute kihoihkimsak ding hi.

Tua ahi manin hihzah taka a tam teci meiipite in i kimkot ah hong um ahi ciangin eite hong dal na khempeuh le baihtaka hong awksak ziau thei mawhna paikhia-in eite adingin i mai-a kiciamtehsa tai kidemna zui-in sikdotakin tai ni.
Ama mai-a kikoih lungnopna a ngah nadinga singlamteh ah simmawh bawlsiatnate a thuak keeikai khit ciangin Pasian taklamah a tu, i upna a piang sakpa le a hoihkimsakpa Jesu mitsuan gige ni.
Note lungkia a, thanemin na om loh nadingun mawhdim mite in amah a langbawlna a thuakpa na ngaihsun un.
Mawhna do-a na panna-uhah na sisan uh a luan dongin na do nai kei uh hi.
Tapate banga note kianga hong gen, “Ka tapa aw, Topa hong sekna neu ngaihsut kei in; amah in nang hong tai ciangin na lung kiasak kei in;
bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in a itte sek-a, tapa-a a sante peuhmah dan a tuaksak hi”
Haksatnate sekna hi, ci-in thuak keeikai un; Pasian in tapa bangin hong bawl hi. Ahang in, a pa in a sek loh ta bangci ta ahi hiam?
Note hong kisek kei leh (mi peuhmah in sekna a thuak hi.) tapate taktak hi loin zawlta na hi-ua hi ding hi.
Tua tham loin eite khempeuh in pianna pa i nei teka amaute in ei hong sekin tua hangin amaute i zahtak hi. I khate’ Pa tungah ki-ap zawthamin nungta lo ding i hi hiam?
I pate in tomcik sunga dingin, amau in hoih pen a sak uh bangin eite hong sek uh a, ahi hangin Pasian in ama sianthona i tanhpih theih nadinga i hoih nadingin hong sek ahi hi.
Hong kisek laitakin sekna a nuam om loin na velval hi. A kisin khinsate in a nung ciangin thumaanna le lemna gah gahkhia uh hi.
Tua ahi manin a zawngkhal na bante uh le a thanem na khukte uh hatsak un!
Khebaite kilawi loin a dam zawk nadingin, “Na khete uh ading lamphei sial un.”
Mi khempeuh tawh kilemin nungta a, na siantho nadingun nakpi-in hanciam un; sianthona lo tawh kuamah in Topa a mu kei ding hi.
Kuamah in Pasian hehpihna ngah lo-a, a om loh nading le a khaatna zung po toin buaina piangsaka, mi tampi a ninsak ding tua zung a sel loh nadingin kikem un.
Kuamah in numei-pasal paktatna bawl kei hen, ahikeh an nek khat tawh tapa upa luahna za a zuak pasian-milo Esau bangin om kei hen.
Na theihsa bangun tua khit ciangin hih thupha a luah nop hangin amah kinial ta hi. Khitui luangin tua thupha a zon kik hangin lungsim kikhelna a suah zo kei hi.
Note a kilawng thei, mei-a a kang thei, khuamialpi, khuazing le huihpi;
pengkul mutna ahikeh thu kigen a zate in amau tunga tua bang thu a kigen nawn loh nadinga a nget zawzen uh aw a ginna mual a tung na hi kei uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh, “Ganhing nangawn in tua mualpi a sukkhak leh suangin kidenglum pelmawh ding hi,” ci-a thu kipia amaute in a thuak zo kei uh hi.
Tua a muh pen lipkhaphuai lua ahi manin Moses in, “Lau in ka ling hi,” na ci hi.
Ahi hangin note hong tunna mual pen Zion Vum hi-a, a nungta Pasian khuapi ahi vantung Jerusalem ahi hi. Note, vansawltak tul tampi mun tul tampite lungnuama a kikhopna,
van tungah a min uh a kigelhsa, ta masa pawlpi kiang hong tung ta na hi uh hi. Mi khempeuh tunga thukhenpa: mi thumaante kha a hoihkimsakpa Pasian kiang,
thukhun thak palai pa Jesu kiang le Abel sisan sanga thu hoihzaw a gen sisan kitheh kiang tung zo na hi uh hi.

Tua thu a genpa na nial loh nading un kikem un. Leitung ah amaute a vauhilhpa a nial uh ciangin suakta lo uh ahileh vantung pana eite hong vauhilhpa nungngatsan lehang i suahtak nading baih lo semsem ding hi lo ahi hiam?
Tua hun laitakin a aw ging in lei lingsaka ahi hangin tu-in, “Khatvei lai, lei bek hi lo vante zong ka lingsak ding hi,” ci-in thu a ciam zo hi.
Tua kammal “khatvei lai” cih in a kipiangsak nate, a kiling thei khempeuh paikhiat nading le a kiling lote om den theih nading cihnopna ahi hi.
Tua ahi manin eite, a kiling thei lo gam a ngah i hi nungsangin lungdam ni. Tua ciangin zahtakna le launa tawh san theih dingin Pasian bia ni.
Ahang in, eite Pasian pen a haltum mei ahi hi.
Sanggam bangin khat le khat ki-it tawntung un.
Mikhualte zindo ding mangngilh kei un; tua banga a hih pawlkhatte in a theih loh kalun van sawltakte a zindo uh ahi hi.
Thongkiate tawh a kiakhawm bang le bawlsiatna a thuakte tawh nang mahmah a thuak khawm bangin amaute na phawk den un.
Numei-pasal paktatnate khempeuh le angkawmte tungah Pasian in thu khen ding ahi manin, mi khempeuh in, kitenna pahtawi-in nupa lupna siangthosak uh hen.
Pasian in, “Nang kong nusia kei dinga nang kong taisan ngei kei ding hi,” ci ahi manin sum iplahluatna panin kikem unla, na neih zahzah uh tawh lungkim un.
Tua ciangin eite in kimuangtakin, “Topa in kei hong huhpa hi; ka lau kei ding hi, mihing in kei bang hong cih thei ding ahi hiam? ci hi.
Note tunga Pasian thu hong gen na makaite uh phawk gige un. Amaute nuntakzia pana hong piangkhiate ngaihsun unla, amau upna etteh un.
Jesu Khrist zanni tuni le a tawntungin kibang den hi.
Thuhilhna tuamdangte khempeuh na kipimangsak kei un. A nete adingin kimanna a nei lo biakna ngeina ante sangin, hehpihna hanga a kithakhauhsak i lungtangte adingin a hoih hi.
Eite in biakbuk sunga nasemte in a nek theih lohna biakna-tau khat i nei hi.
Tulpi in, mawhna hanga biakna-in Mun Siangtho Pen ah gante sisan paipih hi; ahi hangin a luangte giahphual pualamah kihal hi.
Tua mah tawh kibangin Jesu in, ama sisan tungtawnin mite a siangthosak nadingin khuapi pualam ah thuak khin zo hi.
Tua ahi ciangin ama thuak maimawkna thuak dingin giahphual pua ama kiangah pai ni.
Ahang in, hih lai-ah a om den ding khuapi i nei kei a, ahi hangin hong tung ding khuapi i zong hi.
Tua ahi manin Pasian tungah Jesu tungtawna phatna biakpiakna-a ama min a lo mukte gah pia tawntung ni.
A hoih sep ding le midangte hop ding mangngilh kei ni; tua bang biakpiaknate tawh Pasian kilungkimsak hi.

Na makaite uh thu mangin amau thuneihna ah ki-ap un. Amaute nasepna a pulak pelmawh ding mi bangin note hong vil uh ahi hi. Amau nasepnate ah vangik suak lo a, lungnopna a suah nadingin amaute thu na mang un; tua hi kei leh no adingin phatuam lo ding hi.
Ko ading thu hong ngetsak un. Lungsim kisuantakna nei lo le lam khempeuh ah pahtawitaka nuntak ding ka lunggulh lam uh ka telcian uh hi.
A diakdiakin note kianga kong pai kik theih baih nading thu nong ngetsak ding uh kong thum hi.
Tawntung thukhun sisan tungtawn in a lian Tuu cingpa i Topa Jesu misi pana a thosak tua lemna Pasian in,
ama deihna sep nadingin a hoih na khempeuh note hong guanin Jesu Khrist tungtawnin eite sungah ama lungkimna bangbangin hong sem henla ama tungah a tawntungin minthanna om den ta hen. Amen.
Sanggamte aw, laikhak tomno khata kong gelh ahi manin kong hanthawnnate nong thuakzawh ding uh kong thum hi.
I sanggampa Timothy kikhah khia zo, cih na theih ding uh ka deih hi. Amah hong tun baih leh no tawh kimu dingin kong paikhawm ding uh hi.
Na makaite khempeuh uh le Pasian mite khempeuh na hopihsak un. Italy pana mite in hong hopihna uh hong khak uh hi.
Note khempeuh tawh hehpih na om ta hen.
Pasian le Topa Jesu Khrist nasem keimah James in, Minamte lakah kithehthang beh sawm-le-nihte: Kong hopih hi.
Ka sanggamte aw, zia-etna a tuam tuam na thuak uh ciangin nuamna takpi-in na ngaihsun un.
Bang hang hiam cih leh upna hong kizia-et ciangin sikdona khangsak zaw hi, cih na thei uh hi.
Bangmah kisam loin picingin na kicin nadingun sikdona in no tungah na a sep khit pelmawh kul hi, cih na thei uh hi.
Note lakah pilna kisam khatpeuh a om leh, kuamah tai lo-a cingh taka a pia pa Pasian kiangah ngen leh amah kipia ding hi.
Ahi hangin a nget ciangin lunghei nei loin a up pelmawh kisam hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh a lunghei neite, huih muta kilok tuipi hual tawh kibang hi.
Tua bang mi in Topa tung pan na khatpeuh ngah dingin kingaihsun kei hen.
Amah lungka mi hi-a, a hihna khempeuh ah kipna mel a nei lo mi ahi hi.
A nuntakna a niam sanggamte in a dinmun sang uh kisaktheihpih uh hen.
Ahi hangin a hau mi khatin, a dinmun niamna kisaktheihpih hen, bang hang hiam cih leh amah gamlak pakte bangin a mangthang ding hi.
Ahang in, ni suakin nakpi-in sa-a singno a kungkeu hi; a pakte pulh-a; a mel hoihna teng kisusia hi. Tua mah bangin a haute a sumbawl laitak nangawnun a vuaimang ding uh hi.
Zia-etna thuaka, a sikdo mi thupha ngah ahi hi. Bang hang hiam ci leh zia-etna a thuak zawh khit ciangin Pasian in amah a itte a kamciamsa nuntakna lukhu a ngah ding hi.
Amah a kizia-et ciangin kuamah in, “Pasian in kei hong zia-et hi,” ci kei hen. Gitlohna-in Pasian kizia-et thei lo-a, amah in zong gitlohna tawh kuamah a zia-et kei hi;
ahi hangin mi khatpeuh ama gitloh lunggulhna in kai-a a zol ciangin zia-etna a thuak ahi hi.
Tua lunggulhna a gaii khit ciangin mawhna a suakkhia hi; mawhna a picin khit ciangin sihna a suak hi.
Kong it sanggamte aw, mi khemsa-in om kei un.
A hoih le a bukim letsong peuhmah tunglam pan hi-a, vantung khuavakte’ Pa pana hong kipia ahi hi. Amah, niliimte banga a kilaihlaih hi lo hi.
Ama piansak khempeuh lakah a gahmasate i suah theih nadingin thutak thu tawh a suak dingin eite hong teel hi.
Kong it sanggamte aw, hih thu ciamteh un: A kuamah peuh thuzak ding manlang hen. Kampau ding le heh ding manlang kei hen.
Ahang in, mihing hehna in Pasian deih, a thumaan nuntakna a tun kei hi.
Tua ahi manin a kithangzat a kihhuai gamtatna khempeuh na tang un; note hong honkhia thei, note sunga kisuan thu lungnemin na sang un.
No le no kikhemin thu ngai lelte hi kei un. Thu banga a gamtate na hi un.
Mi khatpeuh in thu za napi in thu bangin a gamtat kei leh, a maitang limlangin en a,
a ki-et khit ciangin paikhia a, amah bang tawh kibang hiam cih a mang ngilhpahte tawh kibang ahi hi.
Ahi hangin suahtakna a pia thei a hoihkim thukham limtakin en-a, thu bangin gamta-a a zaksate mangngilh loin a sempah mi, ama sepna ah thupha kipia ding hi.
Mi khatpeuh, amah le amah biakna uukmi in kingaihsun napi, a leii a kep zawh kei leh amah le amah a kikhem suaka, ama biakna kimanna a om kei hi.
Eite Pa Pasian in khialhna nei lo le a sianga a san biakna in: tagahte le meigong numeite a lungdon ciangin don-a leitung nitsakna pana kikepna ahi hi.
Ka sanggamte aw, a minthang i Topa Jesu Khrist sunga thu-umte na hi uh bangin angvan tuam nei kei un.
Gentehna in note kikhopna sungah kham zungbuh bunin puan hoih silh khat hong lut a, mizawng puansia nemnam silh khat zong hong lut hi.

Note in puan hoih silh pa tuam bawlin, “Hih lai-ah tutphah nuam om hi,” na ci uh a, ahi hangin mizawng pa tungah, “Hua lai-ah na ding in,” ahikeh, “Ka khephung sual tungah na tu in,” ci-a thudon tuam na neih uh leh
mi deidan tuamin no le no sungah ngaihsutna hoih lo tawh thu a khen suak lo ding na hi uh hiam?
Kong it ka sanggamte aw, ngai un: Pasian in upna ah ahau ding le amah a itte a kamciam, ama gam a luah dingin leitung mite muhna-a a zawngte teel hi lo ahi hiam?
Ahi hangin note in a zawngte na zahlaksak uh hi. Note hong netum mihaute hi lo uh ahi hiam? Thukhenna mun hong tun amaute hi lo uh ahi hiam?
Note hong nei, ama min thupi a gensia amaute hi lo uh ahi hiam?
Laisiangtho sunga om: “Nang le nang na ki-it bangin na vengte it in,” a cih kumpi thukham na letkip takpi uh leh amaana gamta na hi uh hi.
Ahi hangin angvantuam na neih uh leh a mawh na hi uh a, thukham palsatte mah bangin thukham in mawh hong tangsak hi.
Ahang in, thukham a buppi-in zui napi, thu khat kia-a, a muktute a vekin a palsat khin a suak hi.
Ahang in, “Angkawm kei in,” hong ci pa in, “Tual that kei in,” zong hong ci lai hi. Ang na kawm loh hangin, tual na thah leh, thukham a palsat mah na hi hi.
Suahtakna a pia thukham in thu a khen ding mite bangin thugenin gamta un.
Bang hang hiam cih leh lainatna a nei lo mi peuhmah tungah lainatna om loin thu a kikhen ding hi. Thukhenna tungah lainatna a gualzo hi.
Ka sanggamte aw, mi khat in upna ka nei hi, a cih hangin gamtatkhiatna a neih kei leh bang phatuam ahi hiam? Tua bang upna in amah honkhia thei ahi hiam?
Gentehna in sanggampa khat ahikeh sanggamnu khat in puansilh le a nisim an nei loin om hi.
Note khat in ama kiangah, “Nuamtakin om in, khualum inla, an kham in,” ci-in ahi hangin a kisapnate bangmah na hihsak kei leh bang phatuam ahi hiam?
Tua mah tawh kibangin gamtatkhiatna in a zuih kei leh upna kia bek a si ahi hi.
Ahi hangin mi khatpeuh in, “Nang upna na nei hi; ken gamtatna ka nei hi,” ci ding hi. Gamtatnate loin na upna hong lak in. Ken ka sepna-in ka upna kong lak ding hi.
Pasian khat om hi, cih na um hi. Pha hi! Dawite nangawn in tua mah umin lau-in a ling uh hi.
Nang mihaipa aw, gamtatna loin upna a kimanna om lo hi cih a kitelna na thei nuam hiam?
I pu Abraham in a tapa Isaac biakna-tau tungah a piak ciangin ama nasepsa thumaanin kisimsak hi lo ahi hiam?
Ama upna le a gamtatnate in semkhawm a, ama sepna in a upna bucingsak hi cih na thei hi.
Tua hi a, Laisiangtho in, “Abraham in Pasian um a, tua ama upna ama thumaanna-in kisimsak hi,” a cih tangtunga, amah Pasian lawmpa kici hi.
Mi khat a upna guak hi loin ama sepna in dik tangsak ahilam na thei hi.
Tua mah tawh kibangin numei kizuak Rahab nangawn in thukansimte zin tungsak a, lampi tuam ah a khakkhiat ciangin ama gamtatnasa hangin thu maan suak hi lo ahi hiam?
Kha a om lo pumpi a si ahi bangin gamtatna om lo upna a si ahi hi.
Ka sanggamte aw, sia a sem kote in a khauhzaw thukhenna thuak ding ka hi manun note a tampi sia suah na sawm kei un.
Eite i vekpi in lam tampi-ah i muktu hi. Mi khatpeuh in a kam pauna ah khialhna a neih kei leh amah mi picing khat hi-a, ama pumpi bup a kemcing thei mi zong ahi hi.
Sakolte in thu a man nadingin a kam sungah kamkaih i bulh khit ciangin tua ganhing a buppi-in i hei thei hi.
Ahi kei leh tembawpi gentehna in nei ni. Tuate lian mahmah a huih khauh mah mah in a mut hangin a hawlpa in a pai nopna peuhpeuh ah a heina neuno-in a hei hi.
Tua mah tawh kibangin leii pen pumpi na a neuno khat ahi hangin nakpitakin a kisial hi. Mei-ekno khat in gamsung lianpipi a katsak na ngaihsun in.
Leii zong mei khat mah hi-a, pumpi nate lakah gitlohna lompi ahi hi. A mihinna pumpi siasaka, a nuntak sung bup kangsakin, amah le amah zong meilipi in a kihal kuang ahi hi.
Mihing in ganhing nam khempeuh, vasate, a bokvak ganhingte zualsak zo-a, a khawi uh hi.
Ahi hangin kuamah in leii a zualsak zo kei hi. Leii pen a om mawkmawk thei lo, a gilo, sihtheihna gu tawh a dim khat ahi hi.
Tua leii-in i Topa le i Pa i phat a, tua mah-in Pasian a suna kibawl mihingte i hamsiat hi.
Tua kam khat mah panin phatna le hamsiatna pusuakkhia khawm hi. Ka sanggamte aw, hih bang ding hi lo hi.
Tuinak khat panin tuisiang le citui luangkhia khawm thei ahi hiam?
Ka sanggamte aw, theikung in olive gah, gah thei ahi hiam, ahikeh lenggui in theigah, gah thei ahi hiam? Citui nak ah tuisiang a luangkhia thei tuan kei hi.
Note lakah kua pil a, kua in theitel ahi hiam? Ama nuntak hoihna le a pilna pana hong piangkhia kiniamkhiatna sungah a gamtatna-in lak ta hen.
Ahi hangin note lungtang sungah enna khaa le huaiham tupna na selsiah uh leh tua hangin kisialh ding hi lo a, thutak a nial na hizaw uh hi.
Tua bang “pilna” vantung pana hong paisuk hi loin leitung pilna, khamilohna le gilopa aa hizaw hi.
Ahang in, enna le huaiham tupna a omna peuhah kilemlohna le gitloh gamtatna vive a om hi.
Ahi hangin vantung pana pilna ahileh a masa penin siangtho a, lemna deih in, midangte khual a, kiniamkhiat in, lainatna le gah hoih tawh dima, khentuam nei loin citak hi.
Lemna a vawh lemgente in thumaanna a at uh hi.
Note lakah kitotna le kidona bang in piangsak ahi hiam? Nomau sunga kido den lunggulhna pana piang hi lo ahi hiam?

Na khatpeuh na deih uh a, ahi hangin na ngah kei uh hi. Tual na that uh a, na deihgawh uh a, ahi hangin na deih uh na ngah tuan kei uh hi. Na kitawng uh a, na kilai uh hi. Pasian tungah ngen lo na hi manun na deih uh na ngah tuan kei uh hi.
Na nget uh ciangin na ngah kei uh hi, bang hang hiam cih leh na ngahte uh nomau nopsak nadinga na zat theih nading uh tupna man lo tawh na ngen uh hi.
No angkawm hat mite aw, leitung tawh kilawmtakna in Pasian lama muhdahna ahilam thei lo na hi uh hiam? A lawm dinga leitung a teelte peuhmah Pasian gal a suak hi.
Ahi kei leh Laisiangtho in, eite sungah a nuntaksak kha in eng hi, a cih a thu om lopi-a a cih in ngaihsun na hi uh hiam?
Ahi hangin amah in eite hehpihna a tamzaw hong pia hi. Tua hangin Laisiangtho in: “Pasian in a kisatheite do a, a kiniamkhiatte a hehpih hi,” ci hi.
Tua ahi ciangin Pasian tungah no le no kipia un. Dawimangpa do un, amah taimang ding hi.
Pasian naih un; amah in zong hong naih ding hi. No mawhneite aw, na khut uh sil un; no lungkate aw, na lungtang uh hahsiang un.
Lunggimin, thumin, kapkap un. Na nuihna uh thumna suaksak unla, na nuamna uh maigumna suaksak un.
Topa mai-ah no le no kiniamkhiat un; amah in hong lamto ding hi.

Sanggamte aw, khat le khat ki gensia kei un. Ama sanggampa a langgena, a tunga thu a khen peuhmah, thukham langgen-a, thukham tunga thukhen ahi hi. Thukham thu na khen ciangin thukham thu a mang lo na hi-a, thukham tunga thukhena a tutu na hi hi.
Thukham a pia pa le Thukhen pa khat bek om-a, a honkhia thei le a susia thei pa ahi hi. Ahi hangin na vengte thu a khen vial pa nang kua na hi hiam?
"Tuni hiam zingciang hiam in hih khuapi, tua khuapi-ah pai-in tua lai-ah kum khat taamin sum bawlin sum va zong ning,” a ci note aw, tu-in ngai un.
Zingciangin bang piang ding cih nangawn na thei kei uh hi. Na nuntakna uh bang ahi hiam? Note, tomcik sung a kilat khit ciangin a mangthang pah tuikhu na hi uh hi.
Tua sangsik in, “Pasian deihna ahileh i ci dam dinga, hihte, huate i sem ding hi,” na cih zawk ding uh ahi hi.
Note tua bangin kihisakin kisialhna kam na pau uh hi. Tua bang kisialhnate khempeuh gitlohna ahi hi.
Tua ahi ciangin ama sep dinga kilawm a hoih thei napi, a sem lo mi peuhmah a mawh ahi hi. Ph 39:5; Lk 12:47
No a hau mite aw, tu-in ngai un, no tungah gentheihna hong tung ding ahi manin kap unla kapkap un.
Na hauhna uh muat khina, na puante uh nget in gai khin hi.
Na ngun na khamte uh kekseu hi. Tuate kekseuna in note langah teci pang dinga, mei bangin na sa uh a ne ding hi. A beisa hun sung teng hauhna na khol zo ta uh hi.
En sin! A thaman na piak loh, na lo uh hong khawhsakte no langah kiko uh hi. An late kikona, a Thahatpen Topa bilah a tung zo hi.
Note, leitung ah noptatna zulhzauna-in na nungta uh hi. Hong kigawh ni-a dingin na kithausak uh hi.
No hong langbawl lo mawhpeng mite na mawhpaih uh a, na that zo uh hi.
Tua ciangin sanggamte aw, Topa hong pai mateng na thuak keeikai un. Lokhopa in sikhiau guah le tuk guahte ngak a, leitung in a manpha gah a gah ding lungduaitaka a ngak thei ta un.
Note zong lungduai in, kiptakin ding un. Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa hong pai ding nai ta hi.
Sanggamte aw, khat le khat na kiphunsan kei un, na kiphunsan uh leh thukhenna na thuak ding uh hi. Thukhenpa kongkhakah ding hi!
Sanggamte aw, gimna na thuak uh ciangin Topa mina thugen kamsangte lungduaina ettehin na nei un.
Na theihsa bangun a sikdote thupha ngahin ka ngaihsun uh hi. Job sikdona na za zo uh a, a tawpna-ah Topa in a piakte na mu zo uh hi. Khuatuahna le lainatna tawh Topa a dim hi.

Ka sanggamte aw, hih teng khempeuh banah vantung tawh ahi zongin, leitung tawh ahi zongin, na khat peuh peuh tawh ahi zongin na tomlo kei un. Hi na cih pen “Hi,” hi henla, hilo na cih pen “Hilo,” hi hen; tua hi kei leh nang hong kimawhpaih ding hi.
Note khatpeuh a lungmang a om hiam? Amah in thu ngen ta hen. A lungdam khatpeuh a om hiam? Phatna-late sa ta hen.
Note a cina khatpeuh na om uh hiam? Pawlpi upate samin amaute in thu ngetsak uh henla, ama tungah Topa minin sathau zut uh hen.
Upna tawh thungetna in cina mi damsak dinga, Topa in amah a phongto ding hi. Amah in mawhna a neih leh ama mawhna kimaisak ding hi.
Tua ahi manin na ci uh a dam theih nadingin na mawhnate uh kipulak tuahin thu na kingetsak ciat un. A thumaan mi thungetna vanglian in deihna a ngah hi.
Elijah zong eite mah bangin mihing khat mah hi lel hi. Amah in guah a zuk loh nadingin citakin a ngen hi. Tua ciangin kum thum le alang sung tua leitang tungah guah a zu kei hi.
Thu ngen kik a, vantungte in guah zusakin leitung in a gahte gahsak hi.
Ka sanggamte aw, note khatpeuh thutak panin piala, mi khatpeuh in a kiheikiksak leh,
