hih thu phawk un: Mawhnei khat ama lampialna pan a kiheisak peuhpeuh in, amah sihna panin a honkhia hi-a, mawhna tampite a khuhsak ahi hi.
Jesu Khrist Sawltakpi Peter in, Pontus, Galatia, Cappadocia, Asia le Bithynia gamte khempeuh a ki thenthanga hih leitunga mikhual-a om Pasian teelte,
Jesu Khrist thumang ding le a sisan thehna ngah dingin Pa Pasian theihkholhna tawh kizui-a Kha in a siansak nasepna hanga a kiteelsa mite tungah: Hehpihna le lemna note aa hi ta hen.
Eite Topa Jesu Khrist Pasian le Pa kiphat ta hen! Amah in hong lainatna lianpi-in misi pana Jesu thawhkikna tungtawnin ahing lametna,
note adinga vantunga kikoihkhol, a sia ngei lo, a nin baang lo, a tul thei lo gouluahna sungah eite suahthakna hong pia zo a,
hun beina-a hong kilang ding a baihsa-a om tua hotkhiatna hong tun mateng Pasian vangliatna tawh upna tungtawnin note hong kiliah ahi hi.
Tu laitak hun tomcik sung zia-etna namkim thuakin na lungkham uh zongin hih thu ah nakpitakin na lungnuam uh hi.

Mei-a a kihalsiang khit ciang nangawna a kisia thei kham sangin note upna a manphazaw ahina, a maanna a kiciat theih nadingin hihte hong piang hi; tuate in Jesu Khrist hong kilaak ciangin phatna minthanna le pahtawina a suah theih nading ahi hi.
Amah mu ngei lo napi na it uh hi; tu-in amah mu lo napi na um uh a, a kigenkhia thei lo a minthang lungnopna tawh na kidim uh hi.
Ahang in, na upna un a tup note kihotkhiatna a ngah na hi uh hi.
Hih hotkhiatna tawh kisai-in note tunga hong tung ding hehpihna thu a gen kamsangte in, ngenteltakin a theih tawpun zongin
amaute sunga a om Khrist Kha in Khrist thuaknate le tua nunga a zui ding minthannate tawh kisai a genkholh lai-in, a hun le a pianzia ding bangci banga gen hiam, cih muhkhiat ding a hanciam uh hi.

Vantung pana kisawl Khasiangtho tawh note tunga lungdamna-thu hong hilhte in, tu-a no tunga hong kigensate hong gen lai-un, amaute na a sem hi loin no na a sem uh ahilam amaute tungah a kilaak hi. Vansawltakte nangawn in tua nate a encian nuam uh hi.
Tua ahi manin a gamtang dingin na lungsim uh kisakhol un; na pumpi uh ki-uk zo un; Jesu a kilat cianga note hong kipia ding hehpihna tungah na lametna khempeuh uh nga un.
A thumang tate bangin bangmah thei lo-a na nuntak lai-ua na neih uh lunggulhna gilote deihna zui-in gamta kei un.
Note hong sampa a siantho mah bangin na hihna khempeuh uhah na siangtho un;
ahang in, “Kei siangtho ka hi manin siangtho un,” ci-in kigelh zo hi.
Mikim nasepna tungah guptuam nei lo-a thukhenpa, Pa khat min a lo khawm na hi nungsangun kihtakna siangtho tawh hih lai-ah mikhualte bangin nungta un.
Ahang in, na pate uh pana na luahsuk uh a mawkna nuntakna pana a kisia thei na: ngun ahikeh kham tawh hong kitan hi loin,
kawkbaanna le melhemna om lo tuuno – Khrist sisan manpha tawh note hong kitan ahilam na thei uh hi.
Leitung kipiansak ma-in amah kiteel zo a, ahi hangin note khualna-in hih hun nunungte a hong kilaaksak pan ahi hi.
Ama tungtawnin misi panin amah thosaka, a minthangsak pa Pasian na um uh a, tua na up uh le na lamet uh Pasian ahi hi.
Tu-in na sanggamte uh itna takpi na neih nading uh le khat le khat na lungsim tawng uh tawh na ki-it tek nadingun thutak thu mangin no le no na kisiansuah khin zo uh hi.
Ahang in, a sia thei khaici pan hi lo, a sia thei lo khaici – a nungta a om tawntung Pasian thu tungtawnin note a suak kik na hi uh hi.
Ahang in, “Mite khempeuh lopa bang hi-a, amaute minthanna khempeuh gamlaka pakte bang ahi hi; lopa vulin, pakte pulh a,
ahi hangin Topa kammal kip tawntung hi,” Note tunga hong kihilh thu, hih ahi hi.
Tua ahi manin etsatna khempeuh, khemna khempeuh, kineih-siamna, enna le mindaisakna namkimte na paikhia un.
Note hotkhiatna ah na khantoh theih nadingun naungek suak tungte bangin khalam nawizu siangtho na lunggulh un;
tu-in Pasian hoihna na ciam khin zo uh hi.
Mite in a nial, ahi hanga Pasian in a teelsa, ama adingin a manpha a nungta Suang kiangah nong pai bangun,
note zong Pasian san theih dingin Jesu Khrist tungtawna khalam biakpiakna a bawl siampi siangtho dingin khalam inn-a kilam a nungta suangte bang na hi uh hi.
Ahang in, Laisiangtho in: “En in, a kiteeltuam a manpha innkiubul suang khat Zion ah ka koih zo hi; amah a muang mi, a zahlak ngei kei ding hi,” ci hi.
Tu-in a um note adingin hih suang a manpha hi, ahi hangin a um lote adingin, “Inn lamte nilkhiat tua suang inntungkhum suang a suak zo hi,” ci a,
tua ciangin, “Mite a kimuktusak ding suang le, amaute puk nading suangpi,” ci hi. Amaute in thupuak mang lo uh ahi manin a kimuktu uh hi – tua zong amaute a tuaci ding mah a laitansa ahi hi.

Ahi hangin note na hi uh leh khuamial sung pan hong samkhia-a, ama khuavak lamdang sunga hong tunpa phatna na tangko theih nadingun hong teeltuam mi pawl, kumpi nam, siampi, minam siangtho, Pasian mite na hi uh hi.
Khatvei lai-in minam na hi lo uh hangin tu-in Pasian mite na hi uh hi; khatvei lai-in lainatna na ngah loh uh hangin, tu-in lainatna na ngah uh hi.
Kong it lawmte aw, na kha uh hong do den, mawhdim lunggulhnate pana kidek dingin leitung ah gamdang mite le mikhualte bangin kong kun hi.
Lawkite lakah tua bang nuntakna hoih na nungta un. Amaute in a khiala hong ngawh uh hangin, na gamtatna hoihte uh mu thei ding uh a, Pasian in eite hong veh ni ciangin amah a minthangsak ding uh hi.
Mite lakah a kiguang thuneihna khempeuh: thuneipipen kumpipa ahi zongin,
a khialte gawtna a pia ding le a maana gamtate a phat dinga a sawl ukpite thu khempeuh Topa hangin na mang un.
Ahang in, a hoih na sep uh hanga mihaite haipaunate na daihsak ding uh Pasian deihna ahi hi.
A suakta mi bangin na nungta un; ahi hangin na suahtakna uh gitlohna khuhna-in na zang kei unla, Pasian nasemte bangin na nungta un.
Mi khempeuh a kilawmin na zahtak un. Thu-um te unau khat suahna na it unla, Pasian kihta in kumpipa na pahtawi un.
Silate aw, no hong khuala no tunga hong migite bek hi lo, no tunga hong gamhtat na pute uh tungah zong zahtakna kim tawh na kiniamkhiat un.
Ahang in, mi khat in Pasian a phawk manin a man lopi in natna a thuaka a thuak zawh leh a phattak ahi hi.

Ahi hangin a man lo nasepna hangin satna na thuak uh a, na thuak zawh uh hangin a hoih bang lawhtak na hi uh hiam? Ahi hangin na hoih na sepna uh hangin na thuak uh a, na thuak zawh uh leh Pasian mai-ah a phattak na hi uh hi.
Hih ding mah a note hong kisam ahi hi, bang hang hiam cih leh Khrist in note adingin thuak khin zo a, ama khekhap na zuih dingun etteh dingin hong nusiat hi.
"Amah in mawhna bawl lo a, ama kam sungah zong khemna a kimu kei hi,”
Amaute in amah a zahko uh ciangin thukkik lo a, a thuak laitakin a tawng thuk kei hi. Tua sangsikin tangtaka thukhenpa tungah amah le amah a ki-ap zaw hi.
Mawhnate i sihsan theih nading le thumaanna i nuntakpih theih nadingin ama pumpi mahmah in i mawhnate sing tungah pua zo hi. Ama liammate hangin note hong kidamsak zo hi.
Ahang in, note a pialmang tuu tawh na kibang uh a, ahi hangin tu-in na khate uh a Cingpa le a Kempa kiangah na ciah kik zo uh hi.
Tua mah bangin zite aw, na pasalte uh tungah kiniamkhiat un. Tua hileh amaute khatpeuh thu um lo a om leh, pau kul loin a zite uh gamtatzia,
a nuntakna siangtho le a zahtakbaanna uh a muh uh ciangin kizo thei ding hi.
Na mel kilawmna uh pualam kizepna: samphekte le ngun le kham le puan hoihte tawh kizepna pan hi kei hen.
Tua sangsikin, Pasian muhna ah nakpitaka a manphazaw, a tul thei lo hoihna, sunglam hinna, lungnemna le cinghkamna tawh na kizem zaw un.
Ahang in, tang lai-a Pasian sunga lametna a nei numei siangthote hih bangin amau le amau a kilawmin om uh hi.
Sara in Abraham thu mangin “topa” a na cih bangin amaute a pasalte uh tungah kiniamkhiat uh hi. Note zong lau loin amaana na gamtat uh leh ama tanute na hi uh hi.

Tua mah bangin pasalte aw na thungetnate uh bangmah in hong dal loh nadingin na zite uh tawh na nuntak khawmna uhah no sanga a thahat lo zaw pankhawmpih ahilam phawk kawmin zahtak unla, hehpihna letsong ahi, nuntakna a luahpihte bangin amaute na khual un.
A tawpna-ah note khempeuh, khat le khat kithuhual un; kithuakpih un, sanggam bangin ki-it unla, kikhuatuah in, kiniamkhiat tuah ciat un.
Gitlohna, gitlohna in na thuk kei un; hong engkote engko thuk loin thupha na pia zaw un. Bang hang hiam cih leh thupha khat na luah theih nadingun hih thu dinga note hong kisam ahi hi.
Ahang in, “Nuntakna it a, ni hoihte a mu nuam peuhmah in gitlohna pan a leii le zuauphuahna pan a mukte kem pelmawh ding hi.
Gitlohna pan kihei-in a hoih gamta pelmawh ding hi; lemna zongin delh pelmawh ding hi.
Ahang in, Topa mit in mithumaante mitsuan-a, a bil in amaute thungetna ngai hi; ahi hangin gitlohna a hihte Topa in a lang-et hi.”
A hoih sep ding lawp peuh lecin kua in nang hong nasak ding ahi hiam?
Ahi hangin thumaan khatpeuh hanga na thuak leh zong thupha ngah na hi hi. “Amau kihtakte na kihta kei un, linthawn zawhin na om kei un,”
Ahi hangin note lungsungah Khrist Topa-in tuam koih un. Tua na neih uh lametna ahang hong dong peuhpeuh tungah migitna le zahtakna tawh na hilh theih dingin kigingsa in om gige un.
Khrist sunga om na gamtatna hoih uh langpang a, a simmawhte in a gensiatna uh a maizumpih theih nadingun na lungsim kitheihna uh siangthotakin kem un.
Pasian deihna ahi nak leh a sia bawla thuakna sangin hoihzaw hi.

Ahang in, Pasian kiangah note hong tut theih nadingin Khrist – tua mi thumaan, mi thumaan lote ading khatvei-a cinkim dingin a si zo hi. A pumpi-in sihna kithuaksak a, ahi hangin Kha-in kinung tasak hi.
Tua Kha mah tungtawnin thong-a khate kiangah pai-in thu va hilh hi.

Tua khate pen nidang lai pek, Noah hunlai-a Pasian in thuak keeikai-in a ngak, Noah in gunkuangpi a bawl lai-a thumang lote ahi uh hi. Tua gunkuangpi sungah mi tawmcik bek, a vekun giat, tui tungtawnin kihonkhia hi.

Hih tui in tu huna note zong hong honkhia baptise na a lak hi; pumpi tung ninte sawpkhiatna hi loin Pasian lamah lungsim kitheihna hoih-a kiciamna ahi hi. Tua in Jesu thawhkikna hangin note hong honkhia hi.
Amah vantungah kahto khina tu-in Pasian taklamah om-a, vansawltakte, thuneihna le vangliatnate ama khutnuai-ah a om hi.
Tua ahi ciangin Khrist in ama pumpi-in a thuak khit zawh nungsang no le no zong tua bang lungsim tawh na kigalging un. Bang hang hiam cih leh a pumpi-a a thuakpa mawhna tawh kikhen khia zo hi.
Tua hangin ama leitung nuntakna a om laiteng mihing lunggulhna gilote ah nungta nawn loin Pasian deihna ah a nungta zaw hi.

Ahi hangin, lawkite in hih dinga a teel uh hukna lanna ah note nungta-in, kilunggulhna, zukhamna, zu-uangdawnna, zu-nopdawnna le a kihhuai milim biaknate hihin hun beisa, a hunkhop na zang khin uh hi.
Amaute tawh kibanga uangtat-luatna sunga na va kihel nawn loh uh ciangin lamdang sa-in hong siat gen uh hi.
Ahi hangin a si mite le a hing mite thukhen dinga kigingsa pa mai-ah amaute thu amau mah in a gen ding uh hi.

Ahang in, tu huna a sisate tung nangawnah lungdamna-thu a kigenna hih thu hang ahi hi. Tua in amaute pumpi-a om mihing hihna tawh kizui-in thu a kikhen theih nading le kha tawh kisai-a Pasian deih banga a nuntak theih nading uh ahi hi.
Na khempeuh a beina nai ta hi. Tua ahi manin thu na nget theih nadingun lungsim siangtho le no le no ki-uk zoin om un.
Tuate khempeuh banah, itna thukpi-in khat le khat na ki-it un, bang hang hiam cih leh itna in mawhna tampitak a khuh hi.
Phun loin khat le khat zin na kido un.
Mikim in midangte na a sep nadinga a ngah letsong peuhmah, Pasian hehpihna a nam tuamtuam ah, muanhuaitakin zang ding hi.

Mi khatpeuh in thu a gen leh Pasian kammalte mahmah a gen bangin gen ta hen. Mi khatpeuh in mi na a sep leh, na khempeuh ah Jesu Khrist tungtawna Pasian a kiphat theih nadingin Pasian piak thahatna tawh sem ta hen. Ama tungah minthanna le vangliatna a tawntungin om den ta hen. Amen.
Kong it lawmte aw, na thuak uh gentheihbawlnate no tungah a lamdang pi-a tung bangin lamdang sa kei un.
Ahi hangin ama minthanna hong kilaak ciangin na lungnopna uh a dimlet theih nadingin Khrist thuaknate a thuakpih na hina uh hangin na lungdam un.
Pasian le a minthanna Kha note tungah om ahi manin, Jesu min hangin note hong ki-engko leh thupha ngah na hi uh hi.
Na thuak uh leh zong tualthat hiam, guta hiam, mawhna lian khatpeuh ahikeh mi thusia va kum kha-a thuak bang nangawn hi kei hen.
Ahi ta zongin Khristian hina hanga na thuak uh leh maizum loin, tua min na puakna uh hangin Pasian na phat zaw un.
Ahang in, Pasian innkuan sungah thukhenna a kipat hun ahi hi. Eite tungah hong kipan ahileh Pasian lungdamna-thu a mang lote bang suak tazen ding uh ahi hiam?
Tua hi a, “Midikte adingin kihotkhiat nading haksa ahileh, a pasian-milo le mawhnei mi bang suak tazen ding hiam?”
Tua ahi tak ciangin, Pasian deihna zui-a a thuakte, a muanhuai amaute a bawlpa tungah amau le amau kipia-in, a hoih a bawl uh zom suak uh hen.
No laka upate tungah, na upatpih uh Khrist thuakna a theihpih khat le hong kilang ding minthanna zong a tang ding pa khat bangin kong thum nopinah:

Saptuam kemte nasep bangin note kep dinga hong kipia Pasian tuuhonte, a kemte na hi un – na hih pelmawh ding uh cihna hi lo Pasian in note hong deih bangin utna tawh, sum deihluatna hang hi lo sep ding lawpna hangin na cing un;
note hong kikemsakte tungah kiliansak kei un; tuuhonte etteh na hi uh hi.
Tua hileh Tuucing Lianpenpa hong kilat ciangin a tul ngei lo minthanna lukhu na ngah ding uh hi.

Tua mah bangin khangnote aw, na uzawte uh tungah kiniamkhiat un. Note khempeuh, nomau le nomau in kiniam khiatna na kisilh thuk un, bang hang hiam cih leh, “Pasian in a kisatheite do a, a kiniamkhiatte a hehpih hi,”
A hun a tun ciangin amah in note hong tawisang theih nadingin a thahat Pasian khutnuai-ah no le no na kiniamkhiat un.
Amah in note hong lunghimawh ahi manin na lunghimawhnate khempeuh uh ama tungah suan un.
No le no ki-uk zo unla pilvang un. Na gal uh – dawimangpa, a nawmvalh ding zong humpinelkai bangin humhamin thamvak kawikawi hi.
Leitung bupa na sanggamte un zong no thuak banga a thuak lam uh thei na hi manun, amah do unla upna-ah kip un.

Khrist sunga a tawntung minthanna ngah dinga hong sampa, hehpihna khempeuh Pasian in, tomcik sung na thuak khit uh ciangin amahmah in na ngei uh hong bangsak dinga, hong hatsak in, hong kipsak hong khosak ding hi.
Ama tungah a tawntungin vangliatna om den ta hen. Amen.
Sanggam muanhuai banga ka neih Silas huhna tawh lai tawmno kong gelh a, note hong hanthawnin, hih in Pasian hehpihna taktak ahina teci ka pang hi. Hih thu ah kip un.
Note tawh kiteel khawm Babylon a om nu in, note hong hopih hi; ka tapa Mark in zong hong hopih hi.
Khat le khat itna tawh kinamin na kihopih un. Khrist sunga om note khempeuh tungah lemna om ta hen.
Jesu Khrist nasem le sawltakpi Simon Peter in, Eite Pasian le i Honpa Jesu Khrist thumaanna tungtawnin kote aa banga a manpha upna a ngahte tungah:
Pasian le i Topa Jesu theihna tungtawnin hehpihna le lemna adimin note aa hi ta hen.
Ama minthanna le a hoihna tawh hong sampa, amah i theihna tungtawnin nuntak nading le i pasianmi theih nadinga kisam khempeuh ama Pasian vangliatna in hong pia zo hi.

Hihte tungtawnin pasian pianngei ah tanh na neih theih nading uh leh lunggulhna gilo in a piansak leitung siatna pan note na suahtak theih nadingun amah in tuate tungtawnin alian pha mahmah le a manpha a kamciamte eite hong pia zo hi.
Hih thu hang mahmah in, na theih tawpun na upna uh tungah hoihna, hoihna tungah theihna;
theihna tungah pumpi ki-ukzawhna; pumpi ki-ukzawhna tungah sikdona; sikdona tungah pasian-mina
le pasian-mina tungah sanggam kikhualna le sanggam kikhualna tungah itna na behlap un.
Ahang in, hih hoihnate ah na khan semsem uh leh i Topa Jesu Khrist na theihna uhah muibut lohna le gahsuah lohna panin hong hu ding hi.
Ahi hangin mi khatpeuh in tuate a neih kei leh muhna tom le mittaw hi-a, ama mawh nasate a kisiansak khit lam a mangngilh zo ahi hi.
Tua ahi manin sanggamte aw, note hong kisapna le hong kiteelna a ki ciansak dingin na lawp semsem un. Ahang in, hih nate na hih uh leh na puk ngei kei ding uh a,
eite Topa le Honpa Jesu Khrist tawntung kumpi-gamah note thupitakin hong kimuak ding hi.
Tua ahi ciangin tu laitaka na theih uh thutak ah, a kipsa a khosa le tuate a theisa na hi uh zongin hih nate kong phawksak kik tawntung ding hi.
Hih pumpi puanbuk sunga ka ten laiteng na theihtheihna uh kong thaksuaksak ding amaan hi, ci-in ka ngaihsun hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh i Topa Jesu Khrist in teltaka kei hong theihsak bangin hih puanbuk ka koihkhiat pah ding ka thei hi.
Kong paisan khit ciangin hih nate phawk den thei na nuteh cih thei-in ka hih theih tawpin ka hih ding hi.
Note tungah i Topa Jesu Khrist vangliatna le hong pai kik nading thu kong hilh lai-un, piltaka kiphuak tawm tangthute peuh zui hi loin ama thupina mita a mute ka hi zaw uh hi.
Ahang in, a Thupi Minthanna pana aw in ama kiangah, “Hih in ka lung hong kimsak mahmah ka it ka Tapa ahi hi,” ci-a a gen lai-in, Pa Pasian tung pana pahtawina le minthanna a ngah hi.
Tua mual siangtho tunga amah tawh ka om laitakun kote mahmah in vantung pana hong ging hih aw ka za uh hi.

Khuamialna mun khatah khuavak a tan bangin note lungsungah phalvak tung zingsol a suah mateng in, eite in a kicianzaw kamsangte thugen i nei hi; note in, tuate na thusim uh leh na hoih sem na hi ding uh hi.
Tuate khempeuh banah, Laisiangtho sunga genkholhna peuhmah kamsangpa in a khiatna a gentawm mawk ahi loh lam na theitel pelmawh un.
Ahang in, genkholhna peuhmah mihing deihna pan hi ngei lo-a, Khasiangtho hihsakna bangbangin mite in Pasian tung pana a gen uh hizaw hi.

Ahi hangin mihingte lakah kamsang zuaute a na om bang tektek in note lakah zong sia zuau a om ding hi. Amaute in siatna a piangsak thei thu-upna maan lote a simthamin hong lutpihin amaute a lei – thuneipipa Topa nangawn nial ding uh a, amau le amau siatna a kitun pah ding uh hi.
Mi tampi in a zumhuai amau makaihna lam zui ding uh a, thutak lampi minsiasak ding uh hi.
Hih siate in huaihamin ama phuahtawm tangthute tawh note sumzonna in hong nei ding uh hi. Amaute a kimawhpaihna sawtvei zo a, amau kisiatna a ihsip kei hi.
Ahang in, vantung mite a mawh uh ciangin Pasian in zah lo a, hell ah khia in thukhenna thuak dingin kawhawm mialpi sungah koih ahileh;
amah in tanglai leitung zah tuan loin a pasian-milote tungah tuicin tungsak a, ahi hangin thumaan a hilh Noah le adang sagihte hu ahileh;
Sodom le Gomorah khuapite mawhpaih in vut a suah dong haltum a, a pasian-milote tungah a piang dingte lahna suaksak ahileh;
thukham nei lo-a, a nin mahmah mite nuntakna in a lungdonsak a thumaan Lot a suaktasak ding le;
(ahang in, tua a thumaan mipa amaute lakah nisimin om a, thukham nei lote gamtatna a muh le a zakte in a thumaan ama lungsim a gimsak mahmah hi) –
hih bang teng hi ahileh Topa in a pasian-mite, zia-etna pan a suahtaksak nading ahi zongin a thumaan lote thukhen ni adingin a gawt kawmkawma, a koih nading zia a thei hi.
A diakdiakin a mawhdim pianngei lunggulhna in a siatsakna a zuite le thuneihna a sim mawhte tungah amaan phadiak hi. Hih mite mawk hansanin ki-uangsak uh a, van mite nangawn gensia ngam uh hi.
Tua hi napi vansawltakte nangawn in, hatzaw in vanglianzaw ta le uh, tua bang mite langpangin Topa mai-ah kosiatna mawhsaknate a tun kei uh hi.

Ahi hangin hih mite in a theihtel loh uh thute tawh a daisak uh hi. Amaute, man-a siatsak ding bek-a, suak a ngongtat gamsate bangin ganhing lungsim neite hi uh a, gamsate mah bang in amaute zong a mangthang ding uh hi.

Amaute hihsa siatna hangin tua siatna mahin amaute kithukkik ding hi. Amaute ngaihsut nopsakna ahileh suntangpipi-a uangtat ahi hi. Note tawh an na nek khawm laitakun nop a sak luatna uh hangin melhemna le nitna a suak uh hi.
Angkawm nopna mit bekbek tawh kidim uh a, mawhna a bawl den uh hi; a kip lo mite mawhna bawl dingin a zol uh hi; huaihamna lamah siam mahmah uh a, hamsiatna suante hi tazen uh hi!
Amaute in atang lampi nusia in pial uh a, gitlohna thaman a deih Beor tapa Balaam lampi a zui uh hi.
Ahi hangin pau a nei lo laa khat mihing aw in pau-a, ama gamtat khialhna tai-in tua kamsangpa haina a khokhaam hi.
Hih mite, a kangsa tuinak le huihpi mutleng meiilum bang ahi uh hi. Amaute ading amial pha pen khuamial a kikoih khol zo hi.
Ahang in, amaute in kisaktheihna mawkna kamte zangin, khialhna tawh a nungta mite lak pana a suakta lai liailiaite, pianpih mawhdim kilunggulhna-in a zol uh hi.
Amaute mahmah zong siatna sila-in om lai napi, amaute suahtakna a kamciam tazen uh hi – mi khatpeuh amah a kizosak zo na khatpeuh sila ahi hi.
Eite Topa le Honpa Jesu Khrist a theihna uh hangin leitung siatna pan suakta khin napi, tua lai mah ah awk kikin a pianzia nunung, a masa sangin a sia zawtham hi.
Thumaan lampi thei khin a, amau tunga kipiasawn thupiak siangtho a nungngatsan kik uh sangin a theikha vet lo uh hileh amau adingin hoihzaw ding hi.
Amau tungah, “Ui in a luak ne kik,” cih le, “A kisil khinsa vokpi buan lakah bual kik,” cih paunak a man hi.
Kong it lawmte aw, tu-in hih kong laikhak a nihveina ahi hi. A nih in ngaihsutna siangthotak tawh hong lawpsak kik dingin kong phawksakna ahi hi.
A beisa huna kamsang siangthote thugente le na sawltakpite uh tungtawna, i Honpa le Topa in a thupiakte na phawk kik ding uh ka deih hi.
A masa penin ni nunungte ah mi zahpihhatte hong pai dinga, mite zahpih in amau gilo lunggulhnate zui ding uh hi, cih na theitel pelmawh un.
Amaute in, “Hong pai kik nading ama hong kamciam koi-ah om hiam? I pate sih a kipan na khempeuh lah a kipiansak tunga bangbangin hi toto lai hi,” ci ding uh hi.
Ahi hangin tanglai pekin Pasian thuin vantungte om a, tui panin tui tawh leitung kibawl ahilam thei napi, a kitheihmawhbawl uh hi.
Tua tuite mah tawh tua hun lai-a leitung, tuicin tungsakin kisusia hi.
Tua thu mahin thukhen ni le a pasian-milote kisiat ni cianga mei-a hal dingin tu-a vantungte le leitung a kisit lai ahi hi.
Ahi hangin kong it lawmte aw, hih thu khat na mangngilh kei un. Topa aa in ni khat pen kum tulkhat bang a, kum tulkhat pen ni khat bang hi.
Mi pawlkhatte in a ziakaina a theih uh bangin a thuciamna ah Topa a ziakai kei hi. Amah in kuama kisiat ding deih lo a, mi khempeuh a kisik ding uh a deih manin note hong thuak keeikai hi.
Ahi hangin Topa ni, guta bangin hong tung ding hi. Aw ngaihpi tawh vantungte mangin, a bulpite mei-in kisiasak dinga, leitung le a sunga om na khempeuh kitol mangsak ding hi.
Hih bang zia in na khempeuh kisusia ding ahi khit nung sang, bangci mi na hi ding uh kilawm ahi hiam?
Pasian ni hong tunpah ding na ngaklah kawmun a siangtho le a pasianmi-a na nuntak ding uh kilawm hi. Tua ni in vantungte mei-a halsiatna tun dinga, a satna sungah a bulpite a tuisuak ding hi.
Ahi hangin a thuciam bangin thumaanna inn omna van thak le lei thak ngakin i om hi.
Tua ahi tak ciangin kong it lawmte aw, hih a ngak na hi nungsangun a nin baang lo, kawkbanna om lo le amah tawh kilema hong muh theih nadingin na hih theih tawpun hahkatin hih un.
I sang gam it Paul in zong Pasian in amah a piak pilna tawh note kianga hong gelhsa bang tektek in, i Topa lungduaina – hotkhiatna ahilam note lungsim sungah phawk gige un.

A laikhak khempeuh ah a kibangmah gelhin hih thute mah a gen hi. A laikhakte sungah a theihhak pawlkhat om-a, a thei lote le a kip lo mite in amau mah siat nadingin Laisiangtho dangte a hih bangun tuate a lehkaih uh hi.
Tua ahi manin kong it lawmte aw, hih thu na theih khit nungsangun thukham a zui lo mite khialhna in hong manthanpih a, note bitna mun pan na puk khak loh nadingun kikem un.
Ahi hangin i Topa le Honpa Jesu Khrist hehpihna le theihna-ah na khangto un. Ama tungah tu le a tawntungin minthanna om ta hen! Amen.
A tunga omsa, kote in ka zaksa uh, ka mit uh tawh ka muhsa uh, en-a ka khut uh tawh ka lawnsa uh, hih nuntakna Thu tawh kisai kong tangko uh hi.
Tua nuntakna hong kilang zo a, kote in mu khinin teci ka pang uh a, Pa tawh a om khawm ko kianga hong kilak tua nuntak tawntungna no tungah kong tangko uh hi.
Note zong kote tawh na kipawl theih nadingun, ka muhsa uh le ka zaksate uh no tungah kong tangko uh hi. Kote kipawlna ahileh Pa le ama Tapa Jesu Khrist tawh kipawlna ahi hi.
Ka lungnopna uh a kicin nadingin hih lai kong gelh uh hi.
Ama tung panin za-a, no tungah kote hong pulak thupuak in: Pasian, khuavak hi-a; ama sungah khuamial a om peuhmah kei hi.
Eite amah tawh i kipawl hi, ci napi in khuamial sungah i kalsuan lai leh zuauphuak i suaka, thutaka nungta lo i hi hi.
Ahi hangin khuavak sungah i kalsuan leh amah khuavak ahi mah bangin eite khat le khat i kipawla, ama Tapa Jesu sisan in i mawhna khempeuh panin hong siansuah hi.
Mawhna ka nei kei hi, i kicih leh ei le ei kikhem i hi a, eite sungah thutak a om kei hi.
Eite in i mawhnate i pulak leh i mawhnate hong maisakin i thumaanlohna khempeuh hong siangsak dingin amah muanhuai-in a thutang hi.
Eite in mawhna ka bawl kei hi, i cihleh amah zuauphuak i suaksak a, i nuntakna sungah ama thu a om kei hi.
Kong it ka tate aw, na mawh loh nadingun hih thu kong gelh hi. Ahi hangin mi khatpeuh in mawhna a bawl khak leh eite hong guma Pa kiangah hong gensak ding mi khat – Thumaan Pa Jesu Khrist i nei hi.
Amah, eite mawhnate thoihdamna dingin biakpiakna hi-a, eite ading bek hi lo leitung buppi mawhnate thoihdam nadinga biakpiakna zong ahi hi.
Ama thupiakte i zuih leh amah i thei zo cih i thei hi.
"Amah ka thei hi,” a ci mi in ama thupiakte a zuih kei leh zuauphuak hi-a, ama sungah thutak a om kei hi.
Ahi hangin mi khatpeuh in ama thu a mang leh Pasian itna ama sungah a kicing takpi hi. Hih in ama sunga i om lam a kitheihna ahi hi:
‘Ama sungah ka nungta hi,’ a ci peuhmah, Jesu gamtat bangin a gamta pelmawh ding hi.
Kong it lawmte aw, note kiangah thupiak thak kong gelh kei-a, a cil pana na neihsa uh a lui pen mah ahi hi. Hih thupiak lui, na zaksa uh thupuak mah ahi hi.
Tua hi napi thupiak thak khat hong gelh ka hi hi; khuamial bei zo a, thumaan khuavak tang khin zo ahi manin amah le note sungah a thutak kimu zo hi.
Mi khatpeuh in khuavak sungah ka om hi, ci napi in a sanggampa a muhdah leh khuamial sunga om lai ahi hi.
Ama sanggampa a it mi peuhmah khuavak sunga a nungta hi a, ama sungah a muktusak ding bangmah a om kei hi.
Ahi hangin a sanggampa a mudah peuhmah khuamial sunga om hi-a khuamial sunga vak kawikawi ahi hi. Khuamial in a mit tawsak ahi manin a pai nading mel a thei kei hi.
Kong it tate aw, ama min hangin na mawhnate uh kimaisak khin zo ahi manin note lai kong khak hi.

Pate aw, a tunga kipan a omsa pa, thei zo na hi manun note lai kong khak hi. Khangnote aw, a gilopa zo khin zo na hi manun note lai kong khak hi. Kong it tate aw, Pa thei khin na hi manun note lai kong khak hi.
Pate aw, a tunga kipan a omdensa pa thei zo na hi manun, note lai kong khak hi. Khangnote aw, note thakhauhin note sungah Pasian thu teng a, a gilopa zo khin na hi manin note lai kong khak hi.
Leitung ahikeh a sunga om nate khatpeuh it kei un. Mi khatpeuh in leitung a it leh ama sungah Pa itna a om kei hi.
Ahang in, leitunga om na khempeuh: mawhdim mi lunggulh-luatnate, mittang etlahnate, neihsa le sepsa kisialhpihnate, Pa tung pana hong pai hi loin leitung pan ahi hi.
Leitung le ama deihna mangthang lel a, ahi hangin Pasian deihna bangin a gamta mi a nungta tawntung hi.
Kong it tate aw, hih hun, hun nunung ahi hi. Hong pai ding ci-a na zaksa uh antichrist bangin tu nangawnin antichrist tampi hong pai zo uh hi. Hih bangin hun nunung ahilam i thei hi.

Amaute, eite lak pana paikhia ahi uh hi. Ahi hangin eite aa taktak ahi kei uh hi. Ahang in, eite aa taktak hi uh hileh eite lak mah ah omden ding uh hi. Ahi hangin amaute paikhiatna in, amaute khat beek eite aa ahi lohna uh hong lak hi.
Ahi hangin note, Siangtho Pa sathau nilhsa na hi uh a, na vekun thutak na thei uh hi.
Thutak na theih loh manun note lai hong khak ka hi kei a, thutak na theih hang uh le tua thutak pana zuauthu a pian loh hanga hong khak ka hizaw hi.
A zuaupa kua ahi hiam? Jesu in Khrist ahi hi, cih thu a nial mi a zuaupa ahi hi. Tua bang mi antichrist hi-a, amah in Pa le Tapa a nial hi.
Tapa a nial peuhmah in Pa a nei kei hi. Tapa a sang peuhmah in Pa zong a nei hi.
A tunga na zaksa mah uh note sungah omden hiam, cih na ki-entel un. A om leh Tapa sung le Pa sungah note zong na omden ding uh hi.
Amah in eite hong kamciam, hih nuntak tawntungna mah ahi hi.
Note lam pialsak hong sawmte tawh kisai-in hih thute kong gelh hi.

Note na hi uh leh ama sathau nilhna na ngah uh, no sungah omden a, note hong hilh ding kuamah na kisam kei uh hi. Ahi hangin ama hong sathau nilhna in na khempeuh thu hong hilh bangin tua sathau nilhna a lim bek hi lo hi, a taktak ahi hi, note hong hilhsa bang tektekin ama sungah na omden un.
Tu-in kong it tate aw, amah hong pai-a hong kilat ciangin ama mai-ah maizumna om lo-a, kimuangtaka i om theih nadingin ama sungah omden un.
Amah a thumaan hi, cih na theih uh leh thumaan a hih peuhmah ama sunga suak ahi hi, cih na thei uh hi.
Eite, Pasian tate cih-a i om nadingin Pa in eite tunga hong sunleet itna lian mahmah si! Ei lah tua mah i hi hi! Leitung in eite hong theih lohna amah a theih loh hang ahi hi.

Kong it lawmte aw, tu-in eite, Pasian tate i hi a, mailamah bang i hi lai ding hiam, hong kitheisak nai lo hi. Ahi hangin amah hong kilat ciangin amah ahi banga mu ding i hi manin amah i bang ding hi cih i thei hi.
Ama sunga hih lametna a nei peuhmah, amah a siantho bang tektekin amah le amah a kisiangthosak hi.
A mawh peuhmah thukham palsat ahi hi; a taktakin mawhna pen thukham palsatna ahi hi.
Ahi hangin i mawhnate a lakmang theih nadingin amah hong kilang ahilam na thei uh hi. Ama sungah ahileh mawhna a om kei hi.
Ama sunga nungta mi khatpeuh, mawhna a zongsang kei hi. Mawhna a zongsang mi peuhmah amah a mu nai lo, a thei nai lo ahi hi.
Kong it tate aw, mi khatpeuh na kipimangsak kei un. Amah a thumaan bang tektekin amaana gamta mi peuh mah a thumaan ahi hi.
A kipatcil-a kipan dawimangpa a mawhden ahi manin mawhna a bawl mi peuhmah dawimangpa pana piang ahi hi. Pasian Tapa hong kilatna ahang pen dawimangpa nasepna a susia ding ahi hi.
Pasian pana piang peuhmah, Pasian cii ama sungah omden ahi manin mawhna a zongsang kei ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amah Pasian pana piang ahi manin mawhna a zong sang kei hi.
Hih in Pasian tate le dawimangpa tate i theihkak theih nading ahi hi. Mi khatpeuh amaana a gamtat kei a, ama sanggampa a it kei leh Pasian ta ahi kei hi.
A cil-a kipan na zak uh thupuak in: Eite khat le khat i ki-it ding ahi hi.
Gilopa aa ahi, a sanggampa a that pa Cain na bang kei un. Tua ahileh bang hangin amah that ahi hiam? Bang hang hiam cih leh ama gamtatnate gilo-a, a sanggampa gamtatnate amaan hang ahi hi.
Ka sanggamte aw, leitung mite in note hong muhdah leh lamdang sa kei un.
Eite in i sanggamte i it manin sihna pan paikhia-in nuntakna sungah i lut zo cih i thei hi. A it lo mi peuhmah sihna sungah a om lai hi.
A sanggam a it lo mi peuhmah tualthat hi-a, tualthat kuamah in ama sungah nuntak tawntungna a neih loh lam na thei uh hi.
Itna bang ahi hiam cih i theihna hih ahi hi: Jesu Khrist in eite adingin a nuntakna hong khaam hi. Tua bangin eite in i sanggamte adingin i nuntakna i khaam ding kul hi.
Mi khatpeuh in neih le lam nei-in a sanggampa kisap lam thei napi amah a hehpih kei leh bangci bangin ama sungah Pasian itna om thei ding ahi hiam?
Kong it tate aw, a thu le kamsiam bek tawh ki-it loin gamtatna le thutakin ki-it ni.
Tua in, thutak aa i hina i theihna le eite i lungtang in hong mawhpaih peuhpeuh ciangin ama mai-ah i lungsim tawlngakna i theihna ahi hi.
Ahang in, i lungtang sangin Pasian lianzaw a, na khempeuh a thei hi.
Kong it lawmte aw, i lungtang in eite hong mawhpaih kei leh Pasian mai-ah kimuanna nei-in,
ama thupiakte manga, amah lungkimsak i hi manin ama tungah i nget khatpeuh i ngah thei hi.
Ama thupiak hih ahi hi: Ama Tapa Jesu Khrist min up ding le amah in eite hong thupiak bangin khat le khat i ki-it ding ahi hi.
Ama thupiakte a mangte ama sungah nungta a, amaute sungah amah a nungta hi. Hih in amah eite sungah a nuntak lam i theihna ahi hi: Eite in ama hong piak Kha-in tua i thei hi.
Kong it lawmte aw, kha khatpeuh um kei un; ahi hangin leitung ah kamsang zuau tampi paikhia khin ahi manin amaute kha Pasian pan hi hiam, hi lo hiam cih sittel un.
Pasian Kha na khentel theih nading uh hih bang ahi hi: Jesu Khrist mihingin hong pai hi, ci-a a sang kha peuhmah Pasian pan hi-a,
ahi hangin tua banga Jesu a sang lo kha peuhmah Pasian pan hi lo hi. Hih in antichrist kha hi-a, hong pai ding ci-a na zaksa uh, tu nangawnin leitunga a om khin zo ahi hi.
No, kong it ka tate Pasian pan na hi uh a, leitunga om pa sangin no sunga om pa lianzaw ahi manin amaute na zawhsa uh ahi hi.
Amaute leitung pan hi uh a, tua ahi manin leitung ngaihsutna tawh thu genin leitung in amau thu a ngai hi.
Eite Pasian pan i hi-a, Pasian a thei peuhmah in i thu a ngai uh hi. Ahi hangin Pasian pan ahi lo peuhmah in i thu a ngai kei uh hi. Thutak Kha le zuauna kha i khentel theihna hih bang ahi hi.
Kong it lawmte aw, Pasian pana itna hong pai ahi manin eite khat le khat ki-it ni. A it thei mi peuhpeuh, Pasian pana suak hi-a Pasian a thei hi.
A it thei lo mi peuhmah in Pasian a thei kei hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian in itna ahi hi.
Pasian in ama itna eite lakah hong lahna hih bang ahi hi: Ama tungtawna eite i nuntak theih nadingin amah in a Tapa neihsun leitungah hong sawl hi.
Itna hih ahi hi: Eite in Pasian i it cihna hi lo, amah in eite hong it-a, i mawhnate thoihdamna dingin biakna-in a Tapa hong sawlna ahi hi.
Kong it lawmte aw, Pasian in eite hi zaha hong it khit nungsangin eite zong khat le khat i ki-it ding kisam hi.
Mi khat beek in Pasian a mu ngei kei hi; ahi hangin eite khat le khat i ki-it leh, Pasian eite sungah hong tengin i sungah a itna kicingsak hi.
Amah in eite ama Kha hong pia khin ahi manin eite ama sungah i nungta a, amah eite sungah a nungta cih i thei hi.
Tua hi-a Pa in leitung Honpa dingin ama Tapa hong sawl zo hi, cih eite in i mu khin a, teci i pang hi.
Mi khatpeuh in, Jesu, Pasian Tapa hi, ci-a a san leh ama sungah Pasian tenga, Pasian sungah amah a teng hi.
Tuaci bangin Pasian in eite hong it lam i thei a, tua itna tungah i kinga hi. Pasian in itna ahi hi. Itna sungah a nungta mi peuhmah Pasian sunga nungta hi-a, ama sungah zong Pasian a nungta hi.
Thukhen ni cianga muang taka i om nadingin hih bangin eite lakah itna hong kicingsak hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh hih leitung ah amah tawh i kibang hi.
Itna sungah launa a om kei hi. Ahi hangin a kicing itna in launa a hawlkhia hi; bang hang hiam cih leh launa pen gawt ding kihtakna ahi hi. A lau mite, itna sungah kicinsak nai loh ahi hi.
Amah in eite hong it masa ahi manin eite in i it hi.
Mi khatpeuh in, “Pasian ka it hi,” ci napi a sanggampa a muhdah lai leh zuauphuak pa ahi hi. Ahang in, a muh gige a sanggampa a it lo mi in, a muh nai loh Pasian a it thei kei hi.
Amah in eite hih thupiak hong pia zo hi. Pasian a it peuhmah in pel loin a sanggampa zong it hen.
Jesu in Khrist ahi hi, ci-a a umte peuhmah Pasian pana suak hi-a a pa a it peuhmah in a ta zong a it hi.
Pasian tate i it lam i theihna in: Pasian itna le ama thupiakte sepkhiatna ahi hi.
Pasian i itna in: ama thupiakte manna ahi hi. Ama thupiakte lah a haksa lua kei hi;
ahang in, Pasian pana piang peuhmah in leitung a zawhsa ahi hi. Leitung a zo gualzawhna zong tua eite upna mah ahi hi.
Kuate in leitung zo uh ahi hiam? Jesu, Pasian Tapa hi, ci-a umte bek ahi hi.
Tui le sisana hong pai pa, Jesu Khrist ahi hi. Amah tui bekin hong pai lo a, tui le sisanin hong pai hi. Tua thu teci pangpa Kha ahi hi; bang hang hiam cih leh tua Kha, thutak ahi hi.
Ahang in, tua thu teci a pang thum om a:
Kha, tui le sisan ahi hi; tua thumte a kithutuak uh hi.
Eite in mihing teci panna i sang hi. Ahi hangin Pasian in ama Tapa thu teci a panna ahi manin Pasian teci panna a lianzaw hi.
Pasian Tapa a um mi peuhmah in a lungtang sungah hih teci panna a nei hi. Pasian a um lo mi peuhmah in Pasian in a Tapa thu teci a panna um lo ahi manin amah zuauphuak a suaksak hi.
Tua hi-a hih in teci panna ahi hi: Pasian in eite nuntak tawntungna hong pia a, tua nuntakna Tapa sungah a om hi.
Tapa a nei mi in nuntakna a nei hi; Pasian Tapa a nei lo mi in nuntakna a nei kei hi.
Pasian Tapa min a um note in nuntak tawntungna na neih lam uh na theih nadingun no tungah hihte kong gelh hi.
Pasian i zuat cianga i kimuanna in: ama deihna tawh kituak a na khatpeuh i nget leh amah in hong za hi.
Amah in i ngetna hong za hi, ci-a i theih leh ama kianga i nget peuhpeuh i ngah hi, cih i theihna ahi hi.

Mi khatpeuh in, a sanggampa in sihna a tun lo mawhna khatpeuh a bawl a muh leh thu ngen ta hen; Pasian in amah nuntakna pia ding hi. Sihna a tun lo mawhna a hihte gen ka hi hi. Sihna a tun mawhna khat a om hi. Tua thu-a thu ngetsak ding ka ci kei hi.
Gamtat khialhna khempeuh mawhna hi-a ahi hangin sihna a tun lo mawhna a om hi.
Pasian pana suak mi khatpeuh mawhna ah a zongsang kei cih i thei a, Pasian pana suakpa amah bittakin kikemcing a, gilopa in amah a lawng thei kei hi.
Eite Pasian tate i hilam le leitung buppi gilopa ukna nuai-a om ahilam i thei hi.

Amah a thumaanpa a hina i theih nadingin Pasian Tapa hong pai zo cihleh theihtelna hong pia hi cih zong i thei hi. Eite tua ama Tapa Jesu Khrist thu maanna sungah i om hi. Amah a thumaan Pasian le nuntak tawntungna ahi hi.
Kong it tate aw, milimte panin no le no na kikem un.
Upapa in, Thutak sunga ka it, kei bek hi lo thutak a theite khempeuh in zong a it uh –
kote sunga om, kote tawh a omkhawm tawntung ding tua thutak hanga teelsa upanu le a tate tungah:
Pa Pasian le Pa’ Tapa Jesu Khrist tung panin hehpihna, lainatna le lemna in thutakna le itna tawh eite hong ompih ding hi.
Pa in eite hong thupiak bang tektek in, na tate uh pawlkhat thutakin a kalsuan uh ka muh in nakpi-in hong nuamsak hi.
Kong it upanu aw, tu-in thupiak a thak kong gelh kei-a, a kipatcil-a i neihsa pen mah ahi hi. Eite khat le khat i ki-it thuk ding kong thum hi.
Ama thupiak manga kalsuanna in: itna ahi hi. A cil-a kipan na zaksa bangun ama thupiak in: itna sungah na gamta un, ci hi.
Jesu Khrist ci-le-sa in hong pai hi, ci-a a sang lo, mikhem tampi leitung ah paikhia khin zo uh hi. Tua bang mi peuhmah mikhem le antichrist ahi hi.
Ngah sawma na sep uh pahtakman, mansuah loin a kima na ngah nadingun kigalging un.
Mi khatpeuh a khengvalin pai a, Khrist thuhilhna-a a om den lo pa in Pasian a nei kei hi; tua hilhna-a a om den peuhmah in Pa le Tapa a nei khawm hi.
Mi khatpeuh no kiangah hong pai a, hih thuhilhna mah a hilh kei leh na muak kei unla, na inn uah zong na tungsak kei un.
Amah a muak peuhmah ama gilo nasepna ah a kihel ahi hi.
Note tungah kong gelh nop a tam mahmah hangin laidal le laitui ka zang nuam kei hi. Tua sangsik in, i lungnopna a kim theih nadingin hong hawh a, maitang kituah in, thu i kikup ding ka lamen hi.
A kiteel na sanggamnu uh tate in hong hopih nate uh hong khak uh hi.
Upapa in, Thutak sunga ka it ka lawm ngaih Gaius tungah:
Kong it lawm aw, na kha a cidam bangin na pumpi zong cidama, na khempeuh ah na lawhcin nadingin thu ka ngen hi.
Sanggamte pawlkhat hong pai-in, thutaka na muanhuaina thu le tua thutaka na kalsuan, na zopsuakna thu hong ko uh a, ka lungdam mahmah hi.
Thutaka ka tate a kalsuan ka zaka ka lungdamna sangin lungdamna lianzaw ka nei kei hi.
Kong it lawm aw, sanggamte na theih ngei loh mi hi napi, amaute tunga na gamtatna ah na muanhuai hi.
Amaute in na itna thu pawlpi tungah ko uh hi. Pasian tunga gamtat dinga kilawm zahin a lampi-uah amaute na kha lecin na hoih sem na hi ding hi.
Amaute in lawkite tung panin huhna ngah lo uh a, tua Min hang bekin a kuankhia uh ahi hi.
Tua ahi manin thutak na i sepkhawm theih nadingin tua mite tungah zindo i siamna i lah ding kisam hi.
Pawlpi tungah lai ka khaka, ahi hangin tungnuntuhpa Diotrephes in kote hong thudon nuam lo hi.

Tua ahi ciangin kong pai leh ama gamtatna le kote hong gensiatnate kong pholak ding hi. Amah tuate tawh lungkim zo nai loin sanggamte a na muak nuam kei hi. Tua banga a hih nuamte khamin pawlpi panin a hawlkhia hi.
Kong it lawm aw, a hoih lo lam na etteh kei inla, a hoih lam na etteh zaw in. A hoiha gamta mi peuhmah Pasian pan ahi hi. A sia-a gamta mi peuhmah in Pasian a mu nai kei hi.
Mi khempeuh in Demetrius phat uh a, thutak nangawn in amah a phat hi. Kote in zong amah ka phat uh a, kote teci panna a man ahilam na thei hi.
Nang tungah kong gelhnop tam mahmah a, ahi hangin laidal le laitui-in ka gelh nuam kei hi.

Nang tawh kimuh baih ding ka lamen hi, tua ciangin maitang kituah in i kiho ding hi. Nang tungah lemna om ta hen. Hih lai-a i lawmte in hong hopihna uh hong khak uh hi. Tua lai-a i lawmte a milipin na hopihsak in.
Jesu Khrist nasem James sanggampa Jude in, Pa Pasian in it a, Jesu Khrist in a kep a kisamsate tungah:
Lainatna, lemna le itna a dimin note aa hi ta hen.

Kong it lawmte aw, note tawh i tanh khawm hotkhiatna thu no tungah kong gelh ding lawp mahmah napi misiangte tungah khatvei-a cinkim dinga hong kikemsak tua upna na hut theih nading uh kutna lai-a gelh ding kul ka sa hi.

Ahang in, sawtpi-a amaute a kimawh paihna thu a kigelh khin zo mi bangzah hiam khat note lakah hong lutsim zo uh hi. Amaute pasian-neilo mite hi uh a, eite Pasian hehpihna, a kihhuai paktat theihna suaksakin eite in Thuneipipa le Topa a, amah bek i neih Jesu Khrist a nial uh hi.
Hihte khempeuh na theihsa uh ahi ta zongin “Topa in Egypt panin ama mite gumkhia a, ahi hangin a nunung lam ciangin a um lote a suksiatna thu kong phawkkiksak nuam hi.
Tua ciangin, a thuneihna dinmun uh kemcing lo a, a inn uh a taisan vansawltakte khuamial sungah khumcipin ni thupi Ni-a thukhen dingin tawntung sikkhainiang tawh a khih hi.
Tua bang zia in Sodom le Gomorrah le a kima khuapite in numei-pasal paktatna le lehtatna ah amau le amau kipia uh hi. Amaute, tawntung meikuang sunga gawtna thuak dingte etsakna a suak uh hi.
Tua tawh kibang tektek in, hih bang hih dinga a ngaihsunte in amau pumpi ninsak uh a, thuneihna nialin van mite a gensia uh hi.
Ahi hangin vansawltak a lianpen Michael nangawn, dawimangpa tawh Moses luang a kituh lai-un kosia in mawhsak ngam loin, “Topa in nang hong tai hen,” ci bek hi.
Tua hi napi hih mite in a theihtel loh peuhpeuh uh gensia-in, a theihtelsate uah lah, a ngaihsun thei lo gamsate bangin hih uh a, hih nate mahmah in amaute a susia hi.
Amaute in gimna nak thuak na un cia! Cain lampi zui uh a, Balaam khialhna sungah a met delh in, Korah lehdona ah a kisia zo uh hi.

Hih mite in na itna pawite uh melhemsak in, zumna nei loin no tawh an ne uh a – amau kia bek a kivakkhop tuucingte ahi uh hi. Amaute huih in a mutleng kawikawi guah a paii lo meii; gah a gah lo, a kibulkalh – nihvei a si sikhiau singkung ahi uh hi;
a zumhuaina uh a phuankhiasak zuahzuah tuipihual huai siate, a leng kawikawi aksite, amau adingin a mial pen khuamial, a tawntung a kisitsakte ahi uh hi.
Hih mite thu, Adam pana a sagihna pa Enoch in a na genkholhna-ah: “En un Topa, a misiangthote tul mun tul tampi tawh hong pai in,
mi khempeuh tungah thu khen dinga, amaute in a pasian-milohna uh a, a hihsa uh pasian-milohna khempeuh le a pasian-milo mawhneite in amah langpanga a gensa uh kam khaate-in a mawhsak ding hi,” ci hi.
Hih mite, phunhatte le mi ngawhhatte ahi uh hi; amaute, amau gitloh lunggulhna bangin gamta uh a, amau le amau kisialin, amau hamphat nadingin mi dangte a maitang phat uh hi.
Ahi hangin kong it lawmte aw, i Topa Jesu Khrist sawltakpite in a gen kholhsa phawk gige un.
Amaute in note tungah, “Hun nunung ciangin amau pasian-milo deihna a zui zahkohatte hong om ding uh hi,” ci uh hi.
Tua mite in Kha nei lo uh a, pumpi deihna bek zui-in note hong khenkhamte ahi uh hi.
Ahi hangin no kong it lawmte aw, a siangtho pen note upna ah no le no kilam unla Khasiangtho-in thu na ngen un.
Nuntak tawntungna ah note hong tun dingin i Topa Jesu Khrist lainatna na ngak kawmun Pasian itna sungah no le no na kikem un.
A lunghei neite na lainat un
mei sung pan midangte bawhkhia unla, honkhia un; adangte tungah a sa thanghuai banna puansilh nangawn kihin lau kawmin lainat siamna na nei un.
A puk lo dinga note hong kem thei, khialhna om lo-a, lungnopna lianpi tawh a minthanna ama om na-a note hong puak theipa –
eite Honpa Pasian khat bek tungah i Topa Jesu Khrist tungtawnin minthanna, thupina, vangliatna le thuneihna, khang hun khempeuh ma, tu laitak le a tawntung in om ta hen! Amen.
Pasian in a sawt lo-a tung pah dingte a nasemte tungah lak dingin amah a piak Jesu Khrist kilaakna ahi hi. Amah in ama vansawltakte sawlin ama nasem John tungah theisak a,
John in Pasian thu le Jesu Khrist thu teci panna a muh khempeuh teci a pang hi.
Hih genkholhna thute a sim mi thupha ngah hi-a, a sunga kigelhte za-a, a lungtanga a kemte thupha ngah ahi hi; bang hang hiam cih leh a hun hong nai ta hi.
John in, Asia gama pawlpi sagihte tungah: Tu laitaka om, a omsa le hong pai ding pa le ama kumpi tokhom mai-a kha sagihte pan,

le a muanhuai teci pa, misi pana a suak masa pen, le leitung kumpite a ukpa, Jesu Khrist tung panin hehpihna le lemna no tungah om ta hen. Eite hong it a, ama sisan hanga i mawhnate pan hong suaktasak,
ama Pasian le Pa nasem dinga kumpi-gam le siampi hong hisak ama tungah minthanna le vangliatna a tawntungin om den ta hen! Amen.
En un, meiipi tawh amah hong pai hi, mit khempeuh in amah mu dinga amah a sunlette nangawn in a mu ding uh hi; leitung a mite khempeuh ama hangin thum ding uh hi. Tua bang hi takpi ding hi! Amen.
Topa Pasian in, “Keimah, Alpha le Omega, tu laitak a om, a omsa le hong pai ding pa, Thahatpen ka hi hi,” a ci hi.
Jesu sunga eite tanh thuakna, kumpi-gam le sikdotaka na thuakpih pa uh, na sanggampa uh le na pawlpa uh keimah John, Pasian thu hang le Jesu thu teci panna hangin Patmos tuikulh ah ka om hi.
Topa’ Ni-in Kha sungah ka om hi, ka nunglam ah pengkul bangin aw ngaih mahmah khat ka za a:
"Na muh teng laizial tung khatah gelh inla pawlpi sagih: Ephesus, Smyrna, Pergamum, Thyatira, Sardis, Philadelphia le Laodicea-te tungah khak in,” hong ci hi.
Tua kei hong hopih aw en dingin ka kihei hi. Ka kihei khit ciangin kham meivak tunna sagihte ka mu-a,
tua meivak tunnate lakah “mihing tapa tawh kibang khat” a khepek ciang a bansuk puantualpi khat silhin a awm ah kham awmgak a gak mi khat ka mu hi.
A lu le a samte samul bangin ngo in, vuk bangin pak a, a mitte meikuanglai bang hi.
A khepekte pummei sunga sumsan hal-am tawh kibang a, a aw tuizeupi ging tawh kibang hi.
A taklam khutah aksi sagihte tawi-a, a kam panin a langniha hiam tuak namsau khat hong dawkkhia hi. A maitang, ni a tan pen laitak tawh kibang hi.
Amah ka muh ciangin a khephung ah a si bangin ka puk hi. Tua ciangin aman a taklam khut ka tungah nga a: “Lau kei in, keimah, a Masa pen le a Nunung pen ka hi hi.
Keimah a Nungta Pa ka hi hi. Ka si zo a, en in a tawntungin ka nungta den hi! Keimah in sihna leh Gawtmun tawhtangte zong ka tawi hi.
"Tua ahi manin na muhsate, tu laitak a om le tu nung cianga hong om dingte gelh in.
Ka taklam a na muh aksi sagihte le kham meivak sagihte’ thuthuk hih ahi hi: Aksi sagihte pen pawlpi sagihte’ a kem vansawltakte hi-a, meivak tunna sagihte pen pawlpi sagihte ahi hi.
"Ephesus a pawlpi vansawltak tungah gelh in: Hihte in a khut taklam-a aksi sagihte tawi-a, kham meivak tunna sagih laka a vakpa kammal ahi hi:
Na nasepte na hahkatna le na sikdonate ka thei hi. A tatkhel mite na thuak thei kei-a a hi lopi sawltakpi banga kibawlte na sittel a, amaute a zuau ahilam na mu cih ka thei hi.
Na sikdo a, ka min hangin haksatna na thuaka na cimtak kei hi.
Tua hi napi kong mawhsakna om veve hi: Na itna masa pen na nusia hi.
Na kiatna a sannazia phawk in! Kisik inla na hih masak nate hih kik in. Na kisik kei leh na kiangah kong pai dinga, na meivak tunna a omna pan ka khinkhia ding hi.
Ahi hangin na pahtakhuaina khat a om hi: Kei zong ka muhdah Nicolas pawlte gamtatna, na mudah hi.
Pawlpite tunga Kha thugen bil nei peuh in za ta hen. A gualzo pa tungah Pasian paradise-a om nuntakna singkung pan a nek theih nading thu ka pia ding hi.
"Smyrna a pawlpi vansawltak tungah gelh in: Hihte, a Masa pen le a Nunung pen, si-a a nungta kik pa kammalte ahi hi.
Na zawnna le na thuaksiat nate ka thei hi; tua hi napi na hau hi! Hi lo napi Jew mi a kici mi gensiate ahi hanga lah Satan synagogue a hite ka thei hi.

Na thuak dingte kihta kei in. Nang hong zia-et dingin dawimangpa in kimkhat thong sungah hong khum dinga, ni sawm sung bawlsiatna na thuak ding uh kong hilh hi. Sih dongin muanhuai un, tua hileh nuntakna lukhu kong pia ding hi.
Pawlpite tunga Kha thugen bil nei peuh in za ta hen. A gualzo mi, a nihna sihna in a nasak kei ding hi.
"Pergamum a pawlpi vansawltak tungah gelh in: Hihte in a langnih-a, hiam tuak namsau nei pa kammalte ahi hi:

Satan in a tokhom a koihna mun – na tenna mun ka thei hi. Tua hi napi ka min tungah na muanhuai lai hi. Satan tenna mun na khuapi sunga ka teci muanhuai a kithatpa Antipas nite nangawnin kei nong upna na tawpsan kei hi.

Ahi hangin kong mawhsakna tawm no a om hi: Milim thoihna ante nek ding ahi zongin numei-pasal paktat ding ahi zongin, a hih dinga Israel-te khem dingin Balak in a hilh Balaam thuhilhna a zui mi pawlkhat na nei hi.
Tua mah tawh kibangin Nicolas pawlte thuhilhna a zuite zong na nei hi.
Tua ahi manin kisik in! Ahi kei leh nang kiangah kong paipah dinga, ka kama namsau tawh amaute ka do ding hi.

Pawlpite tunga Kha thugen bil nei peuh in za ta hen. A gualzopa tungah a kisel manna pawlkhat ka pia ding hi. Amah a tunga minthak om suangkang khat zong ka pia ding a, tua min a ngah pa bekin a thei ding hi.
"Thyatira a pawlpi vansawltak tungah gelh in: Hihte, a mitte meikuanglai a bang, a khepekte sumngo nawtngilsa a bang, Pasian Tapa kammalte ahi hi:
Na nasepte, na itna le na upna, na nasepnate le na sikdonate ka thei-a na sep masa sangin tam na semzaw hi.

Ahi zongin nang tungah hih mawh sakna kong nei hi: Amah le amah kamsang a kici numei Jezebel na thuak zo uh hi. Ama hilhna in ka nasemte, numei-pasal paktatna le milim thoihna anneknate ah a makaih khial hi.
Tuanu a paktatna pan a kisik nading hun ka piak hangin a ut kei hi.
Tua ahi ciangin amaute tuanu gamtatnate pan a kisik kei uh leh gimthuakna lupna tungah amah lawnin ama angkawmpihte nakpitakin ka thuaksak ding hi.
A tate ka satlum ding hi. Tua ciangin pawlpi khempeuh in lungtang le lungsim zong a phelekpa ka hilam hong thei ding uh a, note khempeuh na gamtatna bangun kong thuk ding hi.
Tu-in Thyatira a tuanu hilhna a zui lote le thuthuk kici Satan thusimte a sin lote tungah: (vangik dang peuhmah kong suan kei ding hi.)
Kong pai matengin na neihsa uh lenkip den un kong ci hi.
A tawp donga ka deihna ahi gualzo pa tungah minamte tunga thuneihna ka pia dinga,–
“‘Amah in amaute tungah sikciang tawh uk dinga; leibeel bangin amaute a satzan ding hi’ – tua in ka Pa tung pana thuneihna ka ngah bang tektek ahi hi.
Tua zingsol zong amah ka pia ding hi.
Pawlpite tunga Kha thugen bil nei peuh in za ta hen.
"Sardis a pawlpi vansawltak tungah gelh in: Hihte, Pasian kha sagihte le aksi sagihte a tawipa kammalte ahi hi: Na nasepte ka thei-a, a nungta-a na than hangin a sisa na hi hi.
Ka Pasian mitmuh ah na nasepte a mansiangin mu nai lo ka hi manin, khanglo in! A om lai a si dekdekte thahatsak in.
Tua ahi manin na ngahsa le na zaksate ciamteh in; a thu mang inla kisik in. Ahi hangin na khanlawh kei leh guta bangin kong pai dinga, nang kianga kong pai ding a hun na thei kei ding hi.
A puansilh uh a buahsak lo, Sardis ah mi tawm no na nei lai hi. Amaute santham ahi manin puanpak silhin kei tawh a tonkhawm ding uh hi.
A gualzopa in amaute tawh kibangin puanpak a silh ding hi. Nuntakna laibu panin a min ka phiat ngei kei dinga, ka Pa le ama vansawltakte mai-ah a min ka pulak zaw ding hi.
Pawlpite tungah Kha thugen bil nei peuh in za ta hen.

"Philadelphia a pawlpi vansawltak tungah gelh in: Hihte, a siangtho le a thumaan-pa, David tawhtang tawipa kammalte ahi hi. Ama honsa kuamah in khak thei lo a, ama khaksa kuamah in a hong thei kei hi.
Na nasepte ka thei hi. En in, na mai ah kuama khak theih loh kong honsa khat ka koih hi. Thahatna tawmkha bek na neih lam ka thei hi. Tua hi napi ka thu na kembita ka min na nial kei hi.
Satan synagogue ahite, Jew mi hi lo napi Jew mi a kici, ahi hanga zuauphuakte, hong paisakin na khephungah ka puksak dinga nang kong it lam ka theisak ding hi.
Lungduaitaka thuak dingin kong thupiak na man nungsangin, leitang tunga tengte zia-et nadingin leitung bupa hong tung ding bawlsiatna hun panin, ken zong nang kong peng khiasak ding hi.
Kong paipah ding hi. Na kumpi lukhu kuamah in hong suh loh nadingin na neihsa lenkip den in.

A gualzopa, ka Pasian biakinnpi sungah khuampi ka suaksak ding hi. Amah in tua a nusia ngei nawn kei ding hi. Ama tungah ka Pasian min le ka Pasian pana vantung a hong kumsuk ka Pasian khuapi, tua Jerusalem thak min ka gelh ding hi. Ama tungah ka min thak zong ka gelh ding hi.
Pawlpite tunga Kha thugen bil nei peuh in za ta hen.
"Laodicea a pawlpi vansawltak tungah gelh in: Hihte, Pasian piansakte a ukpa, a muanhuai le a thutak Amen kam malte ahi hi.
Na nasepte ka thei hi, vot lah vot loin sa lah na sa kei hi. Khat zawsang na hi ding kong deih hi!
Tua ahi ciangin vot lah vot lo, sa lah sa loin lum milmial na hi manin ka kam panin kong siakhia dektak hi.
‘Ka hau a, neih le lam ka cin hi, khat beek ka sam kei hi,’ na ci hi. Ahi hangin a genthei, a hehpihhuai, azawng, a mittaw le guaktang na hilam a phawk lo na hi hi.
Na hauh theih nadingin kei kiang panin mei-a halsiangsa kham; guaktang zumhuaina na sel nadingin na silh ding puanpak; khua na muh theih nadingin na nuh ding mitza, na lei ding kong thuhilh hi.
Ka it mite tai-in ka sek hi. Tua ahi ciangin citak inla kisik in.
Hih lai-ah ka om hi! Kongkhak ah dingin ka kiu hi. Mi khatpeuh in ka aw za a, kongkhak hong hon leh ka lut dinga, amah tawh an nekhawm in, amah in kei tawh a nekhawm ding hi.
Kei gualzo-in ka Pa tawh ama kumpi tokhom tungah ka tut bang tektek in, a gualzopa, kei tawh ka kumpi tokhom tungah a tut theih na ding thu ka pia ding hi.
Pawlpite tunga Kha thugen bil nei peuh in za ta hen,” a ci hi.

Hih teng khit ciangin ka et leh vantung ah kong kihongsa khat ka mai-ah ka mu hi. Ka aw zak masak pen in pengkul bangin kei tungah, “Hih lai-ah hong paito in, hih khit cianga a tung pelmawh ding kong lak ding hi,” hong ci hi.
Thakhatin Kha-in ka om pah a, ka mai-ah a tunga kua hiam khat a tu kumpi tokhom khat vantung a om ka mu hi.
Tua lai-a tupa in jaspar le carnelian mel a sun hi. Emeral mel tawh a kibang sakhituihup khat in kumpi tokhom a kualkhum hi.
Tua kumpi tokhom, a dang kumpi tokhom sawmnih le li in umcih a, tuate tungah upate sawmnih le li a tu uh hi. Amaute a pakin kizem uh a, amau lutung ah kham kumpi lukhu a khu ciat uh hi.
Tua kumpi tokhom panin khua phia zalzal a, kek kia daldal in van a ging damdam hi. Tua kumpi tokhom mai-ah meivak sagih a kuang hi. Hihte Pasian kha sagihte ahi hi.
Kumpi tokhom mai-ah crystal banga siang, limlang tuipi tawh a kibang khat zong a om hi. A laizang takah kumpi tokhom kimkotin a nung le a mai-ah mitin a tuam, a nungta ganhing lite a om uh hi.
A nungta ganhing masa pen humpinelkai tawh kibanga, a nihna bawngtal tawh kibangin, a thumna in mi bangin maitang nei-a, a lina, muvanlai lenglai a bang hi.

Tua a nungta ganhing lite in kha guk nei ciat uh a, a pumtangun a kha nuai nangawn mit-in a tuam hi. Amaute in sun le zan khawl loin: “A omdensa, tu laitaka om le hong pai ding, Thahatpen Topa Pasian, Siangtho, Siangtho, Siangtho hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua a nungta ganhingte in tua kumpi tokhom-a tu, a tawntung a nungta den pa tungah minthanna, pahtawina le lungdam thu a puak peuhpeuh uh ciangin
tua upa sawmnih le lite, kumpi tokhom tunga tupa mai-ah bok uh a, a tawntunga nungta den pa a bia uh hi. Tua kumpi tokhom mai-ah a kumpi lukhute uh nga uh a:
"Kote Topa le Pasian aw, nangin na khempeuh na piangsak-a nangma deih bangin amaute kipiangsakin nungta uh ahi manin, minthanna, pahtawina le vangliatnate a ngah dingin na kilawm hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin kumpi tokhom tunga tupa taklam ah a langniha kigelh ciamtehna sagiha kiciamteh laizial khat ka mu hi.
Tuateh a thahat vansawltak khat in, “Ciamtehna phela, laizial zal dingin kua cing ahi hiam?” ci-a ngaihtaka kitangko ka mu hi.
Ahi hangin vantung ahi zongin, leitung ahi zongin, leinuai ahi zongin, laizial a zal gen loh a sung nangawn a en thei kuamah a om kei hi.
Laizial a zal ding ahikeh a sung en dinga a cing nangawn kuamah a kimuh loh manin kah cihtakin ka kap hi.
Tua ciangin tua upate khat in kei kiangah, “Kap kei in! En in, Judah beh a Humpinelkai, David Zungpi gualzo ta hi. Amah in tua laizial le a ciamtehna sagihte a hong thei hi,” hong ci hi.

Tua ciangin a kigosa hileh kilawm Tuuno khat, tua kumpi tokhom laizangah dinga, a nungta ganhing lite le upate in a kualkhum uh ka mu hi. Amah in ki sagih le mit sagih nei a, tuate, leitung khempeuh a kisawlkhia Pasian kha sagihte ahi hi.
Amah pai-in kumpi tokhom tunga tupa taklama laizial a la hi.

A lak khit ciangin tua a nungta ganhing lite le upa sawmnih le lite, Tuuno mai-ah a boksuk uh hi. Amaute in harp khat ciat nei uh a, misiangte thungetna ahi, gimnamtui tawh a dim kham kuangkumte a tawi uh hi.
Amaute in lathak khat, “Nang hong kigo zo a, na sisan tawh Pasian ading mi, beh kim, pau kim, mi kim, nam kim pan lei khin zo na hi manin tua laizial la a, a ciamtehna phel dingin na kilawm hi.
Nangmah in amaute kumpi-gam khat le kote Pasian nasem ding siampi-in na bawl khin zo a, amaute in leitung a uk ding uh hi,” ci-in a sa uh hi.
Tua ciangin ka en a, vansawltak tampi, tul mun tul tampi le tulsawm mun tulsawm tampite aw ka za hi. Amaute in tua kumpi tokhom le a nungta ganhingte le upate a umcih uh hi.
Amaute in, “A kigosa Tuuno, vangliatna, hauhna, pilna, hatna, pahtawina, minthanna le phatna ngah dingin kilawm hi,” ci-in ngaihtakin a sa uh hi.

Tua ciangin vantung, leitung, leinuai, tuipi tung le tuate sunga om a kipiang sakte khempeuh in: “Kumpi tokhom tunga tupa le Tuuno tungah phatna, pahtawina, minthanna le vangliatna a tawntungin om den ta hen!” ci-in la a sak uh ka za hi.
A nungta ganhing lite in, “Amen,” ci uh a upate in bokin a bia uh hi.
Tuuno in ciamtehna sagihte a masa pen a hon laitak ka en hi. Tua ciangin a nungta ganhing lite khat in kek kia ging bangin, “Hong pai in!” a cih ka za hi.
Ka en-a, ka mai-ah sakol kang khat a na om hi! A tunga tuangpa in thal khat tawi a, amah kumpi lukhu khat kipia in, gual zawh a sawm gualzopa bangin a kuan khia hi.
Tuuno in ciamtehna nihna a hon ciangin a nungta ganhing nihna in, “Hong pai in!” a cih uh ka za hi.

Tua ciangin meikuang banga san sakol khat hong pusuakkhia hi. A tunga tuangpa, leitung pan lemna lakkhiat theihna le mite khat le khat kithahsak theihna vang kipia hi. Amah namsau lianpi khat kipia hi.

Tuuno in ciamtehna a thumna a hon ciangin, a nungta ganhing a thumna in, “Hong pai in!” a cih ka za hi. Ka en a, ka mai-ah sakol vom khat a na om hi! A tunga tuangpa in, tawi tehna kop khat a khutah a tawi hi.

Tua ciangin a nungta ganhing lite lakah aw khat tawh a kibang khat in, “Ni khat thaman dingin mangbuh quart khat le ni khat thaman dingin mangbuh-ham quart thum hi; ahi zongin lenggahzu le sathau siasak kei in!” a cih ka za hi.
Tuuno in ciamtehna lina a hon ciangin a nungta ganhing a lina in, “Hong pai in!” a cih aw ka za hi.

Ka en a, ka mai-ah sakol daang khat a na om hi! A tunga tuangpa min Sihna kici hi-a, Gawtmun in a nung mahmah ah a zui hi. Amaute in leitung seh li suah seh khat, namsau, kialpi, pulpi le leitung gamsate-a a thah theih nadingin vang liatna kipia hi.
Amah in ciamtehna ngana a hon ciangin, Pasian thu hang le citaka teci a pannasate uh hanga kithatte khate biakna-tau nuai-ah ka mu hi.
Amaute in, “A siangtho le a thumaan Thuneipipen Topa aw, leitunga tengte thu na khen ding le kote sisan phu na lak ma bang tan sawt lai ding hiam?” ci-in nakpi in a kiko uh hi.
Tua ciangin amaute puantual pak khat ciat kipia-a, amaute in a naseppih a sanggamte uh a kithat lai dingte a kim masiah a na ngak lai zek dingun kigen hi.
Amah in ciamtehna a gukna a hon laitak ka en hi. Tua laitak, nakpitakin zin a ling hi. Ni, kelmul kigan ippi vom bangin vom a, khapi a bupin sisan bangin san hi.
Thei a gah nunungte huihkhauh in a mutpulh bangin vana aksite lei-ah a kia hi.
Laizial zial bangin vanpi kizial a, mualpi le tuikulh khempeuh a omna mun pan kikhinkhia uh hi.
Tua ciangin leitunga kumpite, kumpi tapate, galkap mangte, mihaute, thahatte, sila le sila lote khempeuh leihawm sung le mualtung suangpi lakah a bu uh hi.
Amaute in mualpi le suangpite kiangah, “Hong vuknelh unla, kumpi tokhom tunga tupa maitang pan le Tuuno thangpaihna panin hong sel un!
Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute thangpaihna ni thupi hong tung hi, kua in thuak zo ding hiam?” ci-in a sam uh hi.

Hih teng khit ciangin lei kiu li-a ding vansawltak li ka mu a, amaute in leitung ahi zongin, tuipi tung ahi zongin, singkung khatpeuh tung ahi zongin a nung lo dingin leitung huih lite a lencip uh hi.
Tua ciangin a nungta Pasian ciamtehna a nei vansawltak adang khat nisuahna lam pan a paito ka mu hi. Amah in leitung le tuipi a suksiat theih nading vangliatna a kipiasa vansawltak lite tungah:
"Kote Pasian’ na a semte taltang tungah ciamtehna ka koih khit matengun, leitung ahi zongin, tuipi ahi zongin, singkungte ahi zongin susia kei un,” ci-in nakpi-in a kikokhia hi.
Tua ciangin a ciamtehsate a phazah ka za a Israel behte khempeuh panin 144,000 ahi hi.
Judah beh panin 12,000, Reuben beh panin 12,000, Gad beh panin 12,000,
Asher beh panin 12,000, Naphtali beh panin 12,000, Manasseh beh panin 12,000,
Simeon beh panin 12,000, Levi beh panin 12,000, Issachar beh panin 12,000,
Zebulun beh panin 12,000, Joseph beh panin 12,000, Benjamin beh panin 12,000, ciamtehsa ahi hi.

Hih teng khit ciangin ka en a, ka mai-ah kuama sim theih loh minam khempeuh pan, beh khempeuh pan, micih pan le pau khempeuh panin mihon tampitak, kumpi tokhom le Tuuno mai-ah a om uh hi. Amaute in puantual pak silh uh a, a khutuah nisuh hiangte a tawi uh hi.
Amaute nakpi in awng uh a, “Hotkhiatna, kumpi tokhom tunga tupa I Pasian le Tuuno pan ahi hi,” a ci uh hi.
Vansawltak khempeuh, kumpi tokhom le upate, a nungta ganhing lite kimkotah ding uh hi. Kumpi tokhom mai-ah kunsuk uh a, Pasian bia-in:
"Amen! I Pasian tungah phatna, minthanna, pilna, lungdamna, pahtawina, vangliatna le hatna a tawntungin om den ta hen. Amen!” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin upate khat in kei kiangah, “Hih puantual pak silhte kua hi-a, koi pana hong pai uh ahi hiam!” ci-in hong dong hi.
"Pu aw, nang na thei hi,” ci-in ka dawng hi. Tua ciangin amah in, “Hihte gimna lianpi pana hong pusuakkhiate ahi uh hi. Amaute in a puantualte uh Tuuno sisan ah sawpin a paksakte ahi uh hi.
Tua ahi manin, “Amaute Pasian kumpi tokhom mai-ah omin sun le zanin ama biakinnpi sungah ama na a sem uh hi; tua hi-a, kumpi tokhom tunga tupa in, amau tungah a puanbuk a zak ding hi.
Amaute gilkial kik ngei nawn lo ding uh a, a dangtak kik ngei nawn kei ding uh hi. Amaute nisa in sal kha nawn lo dinga, nisapi in zong a kangkha kei ding hi.

Ahang in, kumpi tokhom laizanga Tuuno, amaute cingpa hi ding hi; amah in amaute a nungta tuinakte ah paipih ding hi. Tua ciangin Pasian in amaute mit pan, khitui khempeuh a nulkeu ding hi,”hong ci hi.
Amah in ciamtehna sagihna a hon laitakin nai lang sung ding khawng vantung a sip dide hi.
Tua ciangin Pasian mai-a ding van sawltak sagihte ka mu-a, amaute pengkul sagih kipia hi.

Gimnamtui halna kham kuang tawi vansawltak dang khat hong pai-in biakna-tau ah a ding hi. Misiangte khempeuh thungetna tawh kumpi tokhom mai-a kham biakna-tau tunga piak dingin gimnamtui tampitak kipia hi.
Vansawltak khut panin misiangte thungetna tawh gimnamtui khu Pasian mai-ah a tungto hi.
Tua ciangin vansawltak in gimnamtui kuang la a, biakna-tau pana mei-am tawh a dip khit ciangin leitung a denna suk leh khua phia zalzalin, kek kia-a van ging damdam in zin a ling hi.
Tua ciangin pengkul sagih tawi vansawltak sagihte pengkul mut dingin a kithawi uh hi.

Vansawltak a khatna in a pengkul mut a, sisan tawh kihel gial le mei hong omin leitung ah kibuasuk hi. Leitung seh thum suah seh khat kangtum a, sing kungte seh thum suah seh khat kang tumin lopa hing khempeuh a kangtum hi.
Vansawltak a nihna in a pengkul mut a, a nak liat mahmah a pumkuan zuaizuai mualpi bang khat tuipi sungah kilawnsuk hi. Tuipi seh thum suah seh khat sisan suak-a,
tuipi sunga a nungta ganhingte seh thum suah seh khat si-in, tembawpite seh thum suah seh khat a kisia hi.
Vansawltak a thumna in a pengkul mut a, meilah kuanglai tawh kibang aski lianpi khat van panin kiasuk-a, gunte, tuinakte, seh thum suah seh khat tungah a tu hi.
Tua aksi min Gamsaia ahi hi. Tuite seh thum suah seh khat tuikha suak-a, tua tuikhaa hangin mi tampi a si uh hi.

Vansawltak a lina in a pengkul mut a, ni seh thum suah seh khat, kha seh thum suah seh khat le aksi seh thum suah seh khat tuate seh thum suah seh khat a mial tek nadingin a satkhia hi. Sun seh thum suah seh khat le zan seh thum suah seh khat khua a vak kei hi.
Ka et laitakin vankimlai-a leng muvanlai khat in: “Adang vansawltak thumte mut ding pelkul gingte hangin: leitung a tengte tungah Gimna! Gimna! Gimna!” ci-a nakpi-a a ham ka za hi.
Vansawltak a ngana in a pengkul mut-a, van pan leitung ah a kia aksi khat ka mu hi. Tua aksi Kawhawmpi vang honna tawhtang kipia hi.
Amah in Kawhawmpi a hon ciangin tua sung panin pummei phualpi khu bangin meikhu a suakkhia hi. Tua Kawhawmpi pana meikhu in ni le van a mialsak hi.
Tua ciangin meikhu lak panin kauphete leitung ah tuaksuk uh a, leitunga aikam vangliatna bang vangliatna amaute kipia hi.
Tuate tungah, leitunga lopate, ankung khatpeuh ahikeh singkung susia loin, a taltang tunga Pasian ciamtehna a nei lote bek a suksiat dingun kihilh hi.
Amaute in a thah nading uh vangliatna kipia lo-a, ahi hangin kha nga sung gawt thei bek ding uh hi. Tua a thuak uh gimna in, aikam in mi a deh cianga a nat bang ahi hi.
Tua hun laitakin mite in sihna zong ding uh a, ahi hangin a mu kei ding uh hi; amaute a si nuam ding uh a, ahi hangin sihna in amaute a pel ding hi.
Tua kauphete, galsim dinga kithawi sa sakolte tawh kibang hi. Amaute lutungah kham kumpi lukhu tawh kibang khu uh a, a maitang un mihing maitang a sun hi.
A sam uh numeite sam banga, a hate uh humpinelkai ha a bang hi.
Sik awmdal bang awmdal nei uh a, a kha ging uh, galsimna-a sakolleng tampi tai henhan ging a bang hi.
Mei nei uh a, aikam bangin a deh uh hi. A mei-uah mite kha nga sung a thuaksiatsak theih nading uh vangliatna a nei uh hi.
Amaute in Kawhawmpi vansawltak, kumpi-in a nei uh hi. Ama min Hebrew pau in Abaddon hi a, Greek pau in Apollyon ahi hi.
A masa pen gimna bei zo a, gimna adang nih tung lai ding hi.
Vansawltak a gukna in a pengkul mut a, Pasian mai-a kham biakna-tau kite panin awging khat ka za hi.
Tua in pengkul tawi vansawltak a gukna kiang ah, “Euphrates gunpi-a kihen vansawltak lite khahkhia un,” a ci hi.
Hih nai, hih ni, hih kha, hih kum lian adingin a kigingsa-a kikoih tua vansawltak lite, leitung mi seh thum suah seh khat a that dingin kikhahkhia hi.
Sakol tungtuang galkapte awn zanih a pha hi. Amaute a phazah ka za hi.

Ka mangmuhna-a ka muh sakolte le a tuangte hih bang ahi hi: A awmdalte uh meikung bangin a san, a ciipdum le kaat banga eng tawh ahi hi. Sakolte lutangte humpinelkai lutang tawh kibang a, a kam panun mei, meikhu le kaat a suakkhia hi.
Amaute kam pana suak khia mei, meikhu le kaat gimna nam thumte in, mihingte seh thum suah seh khat a thatlum hi.
Tua sakolte a kam sung uh le a mei uhah vangliatna a om hi; a meite uh gul bang, lutang nei-in tua tawh mi a liamsuah uh hi.

Hih pulpite in a thah baang a om lai leitung mite, a khut uh tawh a sep uh nate panin a kisik nai kei uh hi; amaute in dawite, kham, ngun, sumngo, sing le suang milimte – khua mu thei lo, khua za thei lo, lam pai thei lo milimte a biak uh a tawp tuan kei uh hi.
Amaute in tualthahnate, aisannate, numei-pasal paktatnate le a guktaknate uh zong a kisik tuan beek kei uh hi.

Tua ciangin a thahat vansawltak dang khat vantung pan a kumsuk ka mu hi. Meiipi, puantualin silh-a, a lutung san ah sakhituihup khat a om hi; a maitang ni tawh kibanga, a khete meikuang khuampi a bang hi.
Amah in a khut sunga kizalsa laizial neu khat a tawi hi. A taklam khe-in tuipi tung sik-a, a veilam khe-in leitung a sik hi.
Humpi nelkai hawk bangin ngaihtakin a kiko hi. Amah a kiko ciangin kek kia ging sagihte in thu a gen uh hi.
Kek kia ging sagihte in thu a gen uh ciangin a gelh dingin ka kithawi hi; ahi hangin vantung panin aw khat in, “Kek kia ging sagihte thugen gelh kei inla imcip in,” hong cih ka za hi.
Tua ciangin ka muhsa tuipi tung le leitunga ding vansawltak in a taklam khut vantung lamah a lamto hi.
Amah a tawntung a nungta den pa, vantungte le a sunga omte khempeuh lei le a tunga omte khempeuh le tuipi le a sunga omte khempeuh a piangsakpa lo-in kiciam a, “A ziakai nawn kei ding hi!
Ahi hangin vansawltak a sagihna in a pengkul a mut kuan laitakin, ama nasemte ahi kamsangte tunga a zaksak bang tektek in, Pasian thuthukte a tungkim ta ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin vantung pan a ka zak tua aw in khat vei hong genbeh lai a: “Pai inla, tuipi tung le leitung ading vansawltak khut sunga zalsa a om laizial la in,” hong ci hi.
Tua ciangin vansawltak kiangah pai-in tua laizial neu hong piak dingin ka ngen hi. Amah in, “La inla ne in. Na gilpi thuksak dinga, ahi hangin na kam ah khuaizu bangin a khum ding hi,” hong ci hi.
Vansawltak khut panin tua laizial neu la in ka ne hi. Ka kam sungah khuaizu khum bangin khuma, ahi hangin ka nek khit ciangin ka gilpi a thuksak hi.
Tua ciangin kei tungah, “Nang in mi tampite, minamte, pau tuamtuamte le kumpite tawh kisai, genkholhnate na gen kik pelmawh ding hi,” hong kici hi.
Tehna ciang tawh kibang pumpeng khat kei hong kipia a, “Pai inla Pasian biakinnpi le biakna-tau tehin, tua lai-a om a biate sim in.
Ahi hangin a tual puanung pen Gentile-te tunga kipiasa ahi manin teh lohin nusia in. Amaute in tua khuapi siangtho kha 42 sung a tuancil ding uh hi.
Ka teci nihte vangliatna ka pia dinga, amaute in ippi puan silhin, ni 1,260 sung gen kholhna a gen ding uh hi,” ci-in hong kigen hi.
Hihte, leitung Topa mai-a a ding olive kung nihte le meivak tunna nihte ahi hi.
Mi khatpeuh in tuate natsak a sawm leh amaute kam panun meikuang pusuakkhia-in a galte uh valhtum hi. Hih in amaute a nasak nuam peuhpeuh sih pelmawh nading zia ahi hi.

Hih mite in amaute thugenkholh hun sung teng guah a zuk loh nadingin van khakcip theih nading vangliatna a nei uh hi. Tua banah amaute in tui sisan suaksak theihna le amaute deih hunhun-a pulpi tawh leitung a thuaksak theih nading uh vangliatna a nei uh hi.
Amaute in a teci panna uh a man khit uh ciangin Kawhawmpi pana hong paito gamsa in amaute do ding a, zo-in a that ding hi.
Amaute luang, a Topa uh zong a kilhlupna mun Sodom le Egypt ci-a tehpih a kinei khuapi lian sung, lam lian lai-ah a lum ding hi.
Ni thum le alang sung mite, beh, pau le minam khempeuh pana mite in tua misi luangte vuisak loin a enen ding uh hi.
Hih kamsang nihte in leitunga teng mite thuaksiasak ngei zo uh ahi manin leitung a teng mite kigual zosakin ai ding uh a, khat le khat letsong a kipia ding uh hi.
Ahi hangin ni thum le ni lang sungin amaute sungah Pasian tung pana nuntakna huu lutin, a khe un ding ding uh a, amaute lau mahmah ding uh hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in vantung panin, “Hih lai ah hong paito un,” a ci aw khat a za uh hi. A galte un amaute a et zuizui lai mah un meii kawm lakah a paito uh hi.
Tua laitak tektekin zin nakpi-in linga, khuapi seh sawm suah seh khat a kicim hi. Tua zinling ah mi tul sagih si-a, a nungta lai mite lau lua mahmah in van a Pasian a minthangsak uh hi.
Gimna a nihna bei khin zo-a, gimna thumna a tung pah ding hi.
Vansawltak a sagihna in a pengkul muta, vantung ah aw ngaih mahmah in: “Leitung gam teng i Topa gam le ama Khrist gam suak zo a, amah in a tawntung in uk den ding hi,”a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Pasian mai-a amau kumpi tokhoma tu upa sawmnih le lite in bokin bia uh a:
"A om densa, tu laitaka om, Thahatpen Topa Pasian aw, a lian mahmah na vangliatna na la zo a, gam uk dingin kipan khin na himanin nang tungah lungdamna kong puak uh hi.

Minamte heh uh a; Misite tunga thukhen ding hun le na nasem kamsangte, na min a zahtak na misiangte aneu alian - in pahtakman piak ding hun le leitung a susiate suksiat ding hun, hong tung zo hi,”a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin vantunga Pasian biakinnpi kihong a, ama biakinnpi sungah ama thukhun singkuangpi kimu hi. Tua mun ah kek kia in khua phia zalzala, van ging damdam in zin linga, gialpi a kia hi.
Vantungah a lian a lamdang limte kilang a: numei khat in ni silhin a khepek nuai-ah khapi sik-a, aksi sawm le nih lukhu in a nei hi.
Amah a gai hi-a, nau suak dektak bangin nasa-in a kiko hi.
Tua ciangin vantung ah lim lamdang khat kilang a: agol pha mahmah gulpi-sikhiam san khat in, lutang sagih nei-a, ki sawm nei-in, a lutungah kumpi lukhu sagih a khu hi.
A mei in aksite seh thum suah seh khat van pan vatkhia a, tuate lei ah a kia hi. A suak dektak numei mai-ah a suah pheta, a ta a nawmvalh theih pah nadingin gulpi-sikhiam a ding hi.
Numei in minam khempeuh sikciang tawh a uk ding tapa pasalno khat a nei hi. A ta kibawhpah in Pasian kianga kumpi tokhom ah kikoihto pah hi.
A numei pen Pasian in ama adinga a bawlsaksa gamlak ah ni 1,260 kikem dingin a tai hi.
Tua ciangin vantung ah gal kidona a om hi. Michael le a vansawltakte in tua gulpi-sikhiam do uh a, gulpi-sikhiam le a vansawltakte in a do thuk uh hi.
Ahi hangin a do zo dingin thakhauh lo ahi manin vantunga a mun uh a tan uh hi.
Gulpi-sikhiam kilawmsuk a – tua dawimangpa ahikeh Satan kici leitung buppi lampialsakpa tua tanglai gulpi ahi hi. Amah ama vansawltakte tawh lei-ah kilawnkhia suk hi.

Tua ciangin vantung ah aw ngaih taka kiko khat ka za a: “Tu-in eite Pasian hotkhiatna, a vangliatna, a gam le ama Khrist thuneihna hong tung zo hi. Ahang in, eite Pasian mai-ah sun le zanin i sanggamte ngawhin a mawhsakpa kilawnkhia zo hi.
Amaute in, Tuuno sisan hang le amaute teci panna thu hangin amah a zo uh hi; amaute in sihna thuak ngam zahin a nuntakna uh a it kei uh hi.

Tua ahi manin no vantungte le tuate sunga tengte khempeuh aw, nuam un! Ahi hangin leitung le tuipi aw, nang tungah dawimangpa hong tuaksuk zo ahi manin gimna nak thuak na nicia! Amah in ama hun a tom lam thei ahi manin, lungsona tawh kidim hi,”a ci hi.
Gulpi-sikhiam in amah leitung ah kilawnkhia ahilam a theih ciangin, tua tapa nei numei a delh hi.
Tua numei gulpi phak zawh lohna gam ah, hun khat, hunte le hun khat lang a kikep nadinga kibawlsa mun ah a len theih nadingin a lian mahmah muvanlai kha nihte kipia hi.
Tua ciangin gulpi in, tua numei pha-a tuizeupi taisak dingin a kam panin gun bangin tui a phitkhia hi.
Ahi hangin leitung in tua numei huh a, gulpi-sikhiam in a kam pana a phitkhiat gun, a kamka in a na valhtum hi.
Tua ciangin tua numei tungah gulpi-sikhiam thangpai a, Pasian thupiak mangin, Jesu teci panna a len a om lai tua numei tate sim dingin a kuankhia hi.

Tua ciangin gulpi-sikhiam tuipi gei sehtak tungah a ding hi. Tua ciangin tuipi pana pusuakkhia gamsa khat ka mu hi. Amah in ki sawm, lutang sagih, a ki tungah kumpi lukhu sawm, a lutunga Pasian gendaina min a tuang ciat a nei hi.

Ka muh gamsa pen kamkei tawh kisun-a, ahi hangin a khepekte vompi aa tawh kibangin, a kam, humpinelkai kam a bang hi. Gulpi-sikhiam in ama vang liatna, a kumpi tokhom le a lian a thuneihna tua gamsa a pia hi.
Tua gamsate lutangte khat ah sihna khop zah liamma nei a, ahi hangin tua liamma a dam ta hi. Leitung bup in lamdang sa in tua gamsa a zui uh hi.

Gulpi-sikhiam in tua gamsa tungah thu-neihna pia ahi manin mite in gulpi-sikhiam a bia uh hi. Amaute in tua gamsa zong bia uh a, “Tua gamsa bang kua om hiam? Amah kua in langdo thei ding hiam?” a ci uh hi.
Tua gamsa tungah a kiphatsakna kam pau nading le gendai nading kam khat kipia-a, a thuneihna a zat hun ding kha sawmli le nih sung kipia hi.
Amah in Pasian gendai ding, a min, a tenna mun le vantung a tengte gendaina-in a kam a ka hi.
Amah in, misiangte doin a zawh nading vangliatna kipia hi. Ama tungah beh peuhmah, mite, paute le minamte tunga thuneihna kipia lai hi.
Leitung kipiansaka kipan a kigosa Tuuno nuntakna laibu sunga a min a kigelh lote khempeuh – leitunga a tengte khempeuh in tua gamsa bia ding uh hi.
Bil nei peuh in za ta hen.
Mi khatpeuh saltaang ding ahileh sal taang ding hi. Mi khatpeuh namsau a thah ding ahileh namsau in kithat ding hi. Hih in misiangte lungduai-a thuakna le muanhuaina a kal hi.
Tua ciangin lei pana pusuakkhia gamsa adang khat ka mu hi. Tua in tuuno bangin ki nih nei-a, ahi hangin gulpi-sikhiam bangin a pau hi.
Amah in a masa gamsa tangin ama thuneihna khempeuh zanga, leitung le a sunga tengte, tua sihna khopa liamma a nei a damsa gamsa masa pen a biasak hi.
Amah in alian a lamdang limte bawla, mi khempeuh muhin vantung pan lei-ah mei nangawn a kiasak hi.

Tua limte hangin a masa gamsa tangin vangliatna kipia-a, leitunga tengte a khem hi. Amah in amaute tungah namsau ma tawh liam napi-a, a nungta lai gamsa pahtawina milim khat a bawl ding uh thu a pia hi.
Tua a masa gamsa lim tungah huu kipia a, pau thei-in tua milim a bia nuam lote a thah theih nadingin ama tungah vang liatna kipia hi.
Amah in mi khempeuh, aneu alian, azawng ahau, sila le sila lote in a taklam khut ahikeh a taltang ah thatang hatthu-in ciamtehna a neisak hi.
Tua ciamtehna, gamsa min ahikeh a min nambat ahi ciamtehna a nei lote in lei thei loin, zuak thei lo ding uh hi.
Hih in pilna a kal hi. Tua in mihing nambat ahi manin, theihna a nei peuh in tua gamsa nambat tuat ta hen. Ama nambat 666 ahi hi.
Tua ciangin ka et leh ka mai ah a taltang tung-ua ama min le a Pa min a kigelhsa 144,000-te tawh Zion Vum tunga ding Tuuno a na om hi.
Tua ciangin vantung pan a ngaih mahmah kekbaak kia ging le tuizeu hawk tawh a kibang aw khat ka za hi. Ka zak aw pen harp tumte tumging tawh kibang hi.
Amaute in kumpi tokhom mai le a nungta ganhing lite le upate mai-ah lathak khat a sa uh hi. Lei pana kitankhiasa tua 144,000-te longal kuamah in tua la a sin thei kei hi.

Hihte in amau le amau a sianga a kikep manun, amau le amau numei tawh a kibuahsak lote ahi uh hi. Amaute in Tuuno paina peuhpeuh ah a zui uh hi. Amaute, mite lak pana kileisa hi uh a, Pasian le Tuuno tungah gahmasa banga piakte ahi uh hi.
Amaute kam panin zuauthu kimu loin kawk baang lo uh hi.
Tua khit ciangin vansawltak dang khat van kimlai-a leng ka mu-a amah in, minam khempeuh, beh khempeuh, pau khempeuh le mi khempeuh tunga tangko ding, tawntung lungdamna-thu a nei hi.
Amah in, “Ama thukhen ding hun hong tung zo ahi manin Pasian kihta unla, amah minthanna pia ta un. Vantungte, leitung, tuipi le tuinakte a bawlpa amah bia un,” ci-in aw ngaihtakin a gen hi.
Vansawltak a nihna in a nung zui-a, “A angkawmnate, a haisakna leng gahzu minamte khempeuh a dawnsaknu puk ta! A Lian Babylon puk ta!” a ci hi.
Vansawltak a thumna in amaute nung zui-a, aw ngaihtakin, “Mi khatpeuh in gamsa le ama lim bia a, ama ciam tehna a taltang tung ahikeh a khut tungah a ngah leh
amah in zong Pasian thangpaihna hai sunga kisungsa a lungsona a khauh mahmah lenggahzu a dawn ding hi. Amah a siangtho van sawltakte le Tuuno mai-ah kaat kuang tawh kigawt ding hi.
Amaute kigawtna meikhu a tawntungin khu den hi. Tua lai-ah gamsa le a lim a biate, ahikeh ama min ciamtehna a ngah peuhmah asun azan tawlngak hun a om kei hi,” a ci hi.
Hih in Pasian thupiakte a mangte le Jesu tunga a muanhuai lai misiangte lungduai-a thuakna a kal hi.

Tua ciangin vantung panin aw, khat in, “Gelh in: Tu-a kipan Topa sunga site thupha ngah ahi hi,” a ci hi. Kha in, “Hihi, a sepnate un, amaute zui ding ahi manin, amau nasep gimna pan a tawlnga ta ding uh hi,” a cih ka za hi.
Ka et leh ka mai-ah meiipi kang khat na kaii-a, meiipi tunga tupa “mihing tapa banga” a lutung ah kham lukhu khat khu-in a khut ah phiaukawi hiam khat a tawi hi.

Tua ciangin biakinnpi sung pan vansawltak dang khat hong paikhia in, meiipi tunga tupa nakpi in sama, “Leitunga ante min khin ta ahi manin, an lak hun tung zo hi, na phiaukawi la inla at in,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin tua meiipi tunga tupa in, a phiaukawi leitung ah van kawikawi a, leitung an laksa a suak hi.
