Vantung a biakinnpi sung pan vansawltak adang khat hong paikhia a, amah in zong phiaukawi hiam khat mah a tawi hi.

Mei a uk vansawltak dang khat biakna-tau panin hong paikhia lai-a, phiaukawi hiam tawipa nakpi in sama, “Lenggahte min khin ahi manin na phiaukawi hiam la inla, leitung lenggah gui panin lenggah bawkte khawm in,” a ci hi.
Tua vansawltak in leitung ah phiaukawi van kawikawi-a, lenggahte khawmin Pasian thangpaihna lenggah suknapi sungah a lawn hi.
Amaute khuapi pua-a lenggah-sukna sungah kicil-a, tua lenggah-sukna pan sisan luangin stadia 1,600 gamla dong sakol kamkaih ciang banin a luangkhia hi.
Vantung ah alian a piandang lim khat ka mu a: vansawltak sagih in a nunung gimna sagihte a tawi uh hi – a nunung ahi hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian thangpaihna a kimna hi ta hi.
Limlang tuipi le mei kigawm tawh kibang khat le gamsa le ama min le ama min nambat tunga gualzote, tuipi kianga ding ka mu hi. Amaute in Pasian piak harpte tawi uh a,
Tuuno la le Pasian nasem Moses la sa in: “Thahatpen Topa Pasian, nangma nasepte lian in, piandang hi. Khanghunte kumpipa aw, na lampite thumaanin thutang hi.

Topa aw, kua’n nang hong kihta loin, na min thangsak lo ding hiam? Ahang in, nangmah bek na siangtho hi. Amaan nangma sepnate, kilaak khin zo ahi manin, minam khempeuh hong pai-in, na mai-ah hong bia ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Hih teng khit ciangin ka et leh, vantungah teci panna biakbuk ahi, biakinnpi honsa in a om hi.
Vansawltak sagihte biakinnpi pua-ah gimna sagih tawh hong paikhia uh hi. Amaute in puansiang le a tang saihadial puan silh uh a, a awm uhah kham dialpek a baat uh hi.
Tua ciangin a nungta ganhing lite khat in, vansawltak sagihte tungah a tawntunga nungta den pa, Pasian thangpaihna tawh a dim kham kuangkum sagih a pia hi.
Tua ciangin Pasian minthanna le ama vangliatna pana meikhu, biakinnpi sung tengah dim a, gimna sagihte a kim khit matengin vansawltak sagihte tua biakinnpi ah khatbeek a lut thei kei uh hi.
Tua ciangin biakinnpi pan vansawltak sagihte tungah, “Pai unla Pasian thangpaihna kuangkum sagihte leitung ah sung ta un,” a ci aw ngaih khat ka za hi.
A masa pen vansawltak pai-in leitang tungah a kuangkum sunga, gamsa ciamtehna a nei le ama lim a bia mite tungah a cikziathuai a na mahmah meimate a tung hi.
Vansawltak a nihna in tuipi tungah a kuangkum sunga, misite’ sisan tawh kibangin, tuipi sunga nuntakna a nei na khempeuh a si hi.
Vansawltak a thumna in, gunte le tuinakte tungah a kuangkum sunga, tuate sisan a suak hi.
Tua ciangin tuite a uk vansawltak in: “Nang, tu laitaka om, a om densa, a Siangtho Pa aw, hih banga thu khen na hi manin na thukhennate ah na thutang hi;
Ahang in, amaute in na misiangte le na kamsangte sisan luangsak zo uh a, amaute thuak dinga kilawm bangin amau dawn ding sisan na pia zo hi,” a ci hi.
Tuateh biakna-tau in na dawnga: “Hihi, a Thahatpen Topa Pasian aw, na thukhennate thumaanin thutang hi,” a cih ka za hi.
Vansawltak a lina in ni tungah a kuangkum sunga, mite mei tawh haldulh nading, ni tungah vangliatna kipia hi.
Amaute a sa mahmahin kihal-a, amaute in hih gimnate a uk Pasian min samsia uh a, ahi hangin kisik nuam loin amah a minthansak ding a nial uh hi.
Vansawltak a ngana in gamsa kumpi tokhom tungah a kuangkum sunga, ama gam teng khuamial in a tuamcip hi. Mite in na sa lua-in a leii uh cip tentan uh a,
a meimate uh na a sak manun vantunga Pasian a hamsiat uh hi; ahi hangin a hihnasate uh hangin a kisik nuam kei uh hi.
Vansawltak a gukna in, Euphrates gun lianpi tungah a kuangkum sung a, Nisuahna pana kumpite lampi sial dingin tua tui a kang hi.
Tua ciangin ukeng tawh a kibang kha gilo thum ka mu hi. Amaute, gulpi-sikhiam kam pan, gamsa kam pan le kamsang-zuau kam sung pana pusuakkhiate ahi uh hi.
Amaute, a lamdang limte a lak thei dawite kha hi uh a, leitung bupa kumpite kiangah pai-in, Thahatpen Pasian ni lian ni-a galdo dingin amaute a kaikhawm dinga kuan khia uh ahi hi.
"Ngai in, guta bangin kong pai hi! Amah guaktang le zumhuaitakin pholaka a om loh theih nadingin hak gige sa-in puansilh-a om pa thupha ngah ahi hi.”
Tua ciangin amaute in Hebrew pau a Armageddon a cihna munah kumpite a khawm uh hi.
Vansawltak a sagihna in huih lakah a kuangkum sunga, kumpi tokhom panin, aw ngaih mahmah khat in biakinnpi pualam ah, “Kizo ta hi!” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin tua munah kek kia in, khua phia zalzal a, van ging damdam in nakpi-in zin a ling hi. Tua zinling nasia lua mahmah a, leitung a mi a om nungsang tua banga zinling a om ngei nai kei hi.
Tua khuapi lian phel thumin kiphelkhap a, minamte khuapite a kicim hi. Pasian in a Lian Babylon phawk gige a, ama lungsona lenggahzu tawh a dim ama thangpaihna hai a pia hi.
Tuikulh peuhmah mangthang a mualpite a kimu zo nawn kei hi.
Van panin mite tungah a lian mahmah gialtangte, tang khat pound za khat bang a gik a kia hi. Tua ciangin tua gimna lauhuai lua mahmah ahi manin gial gimna hangin amaute in Pasian a samsia uh hi.
Kuangkum sagih a tawi vansawltak sagihte laka khat hong pai-in ka kiangah, “Hong pai in, tui tampi tunga tu a lian numei kizuaknu gawtna kong lak ding hi.
Leitung kumpite in amah tawh angkawm uh a, leitunga tengte in ama angkawmna zu a kham uh hi,” hong ci hi.
Tua khit ciangin vansawltak in Kha-in kei gamlakah hong puamang hi. Tua lai-ah lu sagih le ki sawm nei a, gendaina minte in a pumtuam a dupsan gamsa tungah numei khat a tu ka mu hi.

Tua numei in adupsan le a-ausan puante silh-a kham, suang manpha, le kep manphate tawh kizemin a tee siasua hi. Tuanu in a kihhuai nate le a angkawmna nin tawh a kidim kham hai khat a khut sungah a tawi hi.
A taltang ah: THUTHUK ALIAN BABYLON NUMEI KIZUAKTE LE LEITUNG KIHHUAINATE' NU ci-in a min kigelh hi.
Tua numei in, misiangte le Jesu thu teci a pang mite sisan khamgawp-a om ka mu hi. Tuanu ka muh ciangin lamdang ka sa lua mahmah hi.
Tua ciangin tua vansawltak in ka kiangah, “Bang dinga lamdang sa lua na hiam? Tua numei le lu sagih le ki sawm a nei ama tuanna gamsa, a thuthuk kong hilhcian ding hi.

Khat vei lai-a na muhsa tua gamsa, tu-in a om nawn kei hi. Kawhawmpi sung pan hong pusuakkhia-in ama kisiatna ah a pai ding hi. Lei kipiansak cila kipan, nuntakna laibu sunga a min kigelh nai lo leitunga teng mi khempeuh in, tua gamsa a muh uh ciangin, khat vei a om khin, tu-in om nawn lo napi hong pai ding ahi manin lamdang a sa mahmah ding uh hi.
"Hih thu in lungsim pilna a kal hi. Lutang sagihte in numeinu tutna mual sagihte ahi hi. Amaute kumpi sagihte zong ahi uh hi.
Nga puk zo a, khat a om laitak hi-in, adang khat a om nai kei hi; ahi hangin hong pai ciangin tawm vei sung bek a om ding hi.
Khat vei a omsa tu-a om lo gamsa pen, kumpi a giatna ahi hi. Amah tua sagihte aa ahi manin a kisia ding hi.
"Na muh ki sawmte, kumpi gam a ngah nai lo kumpi sawmte hi-a, ahi hangin amaute tua gamsa tawh nai khat sung kumpi banga thuneihna a ngah dingte ahi uh hi.
Amaute in ngimnasa khat nei uh a, a vangliatna uh le a thuneihnate uh gamsa tungah a pia ding uh hi.
Amaute in Tuuno va do ding uh hi, ahi hangin kumpite’ Kumpipa le tote’ Topa tua Tuuno in amaute zo dinga, a sapsa a teelsa le a muanhuai ama nungzuite tawh a omkhawm ding uh hi,” hong ci hi.
Tua ciangin vansawltak in, “Tua na muh numei kizuaknu tutna tui pen, mite, mihonpite, minamte le kampaute ahi hi.
Tua na muh gamsa le ki sawmte in tua numei kizuaknu a mudah ding uh hi. Amaute in tuanu a siatsak khit uh ciangin, a guaktangin nusia ding uh a, a sa ne in mei-in a hal ding uh hi.
Ahang in, Pasian kammalte a tangtun masiah amaute vangliatna tua gamsa tungah a uk dingin a piak ding uh thukimna tawh Pasian in ama ngimna a zawhsiang nading amau lungtang sungah koih khin zo hi.
Tua na muh numei in leitunga kumpite a uk khuapi lian ahi hi,” ci-in hong gen hi.
Hih teng khit ciangin vansawltak adang khat, vantung pan hong paisuk ka mu hi. Amah in thuneihna lianpi nei-a, a thupina in leitung a tangsak hi.
Amah in nakpi takin: “Puk ta! A Lian Babylon puk ta! Tuanu dawite kua suaka, kha gilote le a nin, a huathuai vasate zualna mun, suak zo hi.
Ahang in, minamte khempeuh in a angkawmnate-a mi a haisak zu dawnin kham ta uh hi. Leitung kumpite in amah tawh angkawm uh a, leitung sumbawlte in ama noptatluatna a hauhlawh uh hi,”a ci hi.
Tua ciangin vantung panin aw dang khat in: “Ka mite aw, ama mawhnate ah na kihel khak loh nadingun, ama gimnate na thuak khak loh nadingun tuanu sung pan hong paikhia un;
ahang in, a mawhnate, van banin kicianga, Pasian in a gamtat khialhnate ciamteh zo hi,
Ama piaksa bangin amah pia kik un; ama hihsa zah nih amah pia kik un. Ama hai pan mah in a zah nih leihbeh un.
Noptatna le minthanna amah le amah a kipiak zahzah, gawtna le dahna amah pia un. A lungtang ah amah kisathei a, ‘Kumpinu-in ka tu hi; meigong ka hi kei a, ka thum ngei kei ding hi,’ ci hi.
Tua ahi manin ni khat sungin ama gimnate ahi: sihna, thumna le kialpi-te in tuanu a khuplet ding hi. Ama tunga thukhen Topa Pasian thahat ahi manin tuanu, mei-ah kikhultum ding hi.
"Amah tawh angkawm-a, ama nop tatna a zangkhawm leitung kumpite in tuanu kihalna meikhu a muh uh ciangin amah kah in a thum ding uh hi.
Ama thuaksiatna kihta in a gamlapi ah ding ding uh a: “‘Gimna! Gimna! O khuapi lian, O vangliatna khuapi Babylon! Nai khat sungin na siatna hong tung veh!’ci-in kap ding uh hi.
"Leitung sumbawlte kapin a thum ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amau sumbuk van:
kham, ngun, suang manpha le kep manphate; saihadial hoih, a-ausan, nai le a dupsan puante, sing namtui namkim le saiha tawh kibawl na namkim, sing manpha, sumngo, sik le suangngo;

sumbuk van, singzungthak, masala, gim namtui paknamtui kha le sathau namtui, lenggahzu le olive thau, annel limci le mangbuh; ganhon le tuuhon; sakolte le lengte le mihingte pumpite le khate, kuamah in a lei nawn kei hi.
"Amaute in, ‘Na lunggulh mahmah gah in nang hong nusia ta hi. Na hauhna le na thupina khempeuh in mual khum-a, a kimu kik nawn kei ding hi,’ ci ding uh hi.
Tuanu tungah hih nate zuaka, a hauhna uh a ngah sumbawlte, ama thuaksiatna kihta in a gamla pekah a ding ding uh hi. Amaute thumin kap ding uh a:
"‘Gimna! Gimna, O khuapi lian, saihadial hoih, a-ausan le adupsan tawh kizem a, kham, suang manpha le kep manpha tawh a tee siasua!

Nai khat sungin tua bang hauhna lianpi kisia tazen maw!’ ci-in a kapkhia ding uh hi. “Tembaw ukte khempeuh, tembaw-a khualzinte khempeuh, tembaw nasemte le tuipi pana kivak nading a zongte khempeuh a gamlapi pekah a ding ding uh hi.
Tuanu a katna meikhu a muh uh ciangin amaute in, ‘Hih khuapi lian bang, khuapi om ngei hiam?’ cikhia ding uh hi.
Amaute in a lutung uhah leivui lawn ding uh a, thumin kapin: “‘Gimna! Gimna, O khuapi lian, tuipi tunga tembaw nei khempeuh in a hauh lawh! Tuanu hauhna nai khat sungin kisia zo tah!
Vantung aw, ama hangin nuam in! Misiangte, sawltakpite le kamsangte aw, nuam un! Amah in note hong bawlsiatna hangin Pasian in ama tungah thu khen zo hi,’ ci ding uh hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin a thahat vansawltak khat in an gawina suang lian cia a pha suangmai khat tawma tuipi sungah lawn in: “Babylon khuapi lian hih bangin ngong bawlin kisusia dinga, a kimu kik nawn kei ding hi.

Harp tumte le lasiamte, tamngai mutte le pengkul mutte awging nang sungah kiza kik ngei nawn lo ding hi. Nang sungah khutsiam kuamah kimu kik ngei nawn lo ding hi. Nang sungah angawina suang ging a kiza kik ngei nawn kei ding hi.

Nang sungah meivak khat zong kivak kik ngei nawn lo ding hi. Nang sungah mopipa le mo aw kiza kik ngei nawn lo ding hi. Na sumbawlte, leitung miliante vive ahi hi. Nang bumna in leitung minam khempeuh lam pialsak khin hi
Ama sungah kamsangte, misiangte le leitang tunga kithatsate khempeuh sisan kimu zo hi,” a ci hi.
Hih teng khit ciangin vantungah mihon tampi awng tawh kibang aw khat in: “Hallelujah! Hotkhiatna, minthanna le vangliatna eite Pasian aa ahi hi,
ahang in, a thukhenna thumaanin thutang hi. Amah in angkawmna tawh leitung a siasak numei kizuaknu, mawhpaih zo hi. Ama nasemte sisan phu tuanu tungah la zo hi,” ci-in a kiko hi.
Tua khit teh: “Hallelujah! Tuanu kangkhu a tawntungin a khuto den hi,” ci-in a awng kik leuleu uh hi.
Tua upa sawmnih le lite le a nungta ganhing lite in bokin tokhom tunga tu Pasian a bia uh hi. Amaute in: “Amen, Hallelujah!” ci-in a awng uh hi.
Tua ciangin kumpi tokhom pan: “No ama nasem khempeuh, no amah a kihtate aw, aneu alian in, i Pasian phat un!” ci-in aw khat hong ging hi.
Tua khit ciangin mihonpite in, tuizeu ging le angaih mahmah kek kia ging tawh kibangin: “Hallelujah! A Thahatpen i Topa Pasian in uk ta hi.
Eite nuamin, lungdamin, ama min thangsak ni! Ahang in, Tuuno mopi hun tung zo a, a lawmnu kigingsa-in om zo hi.
Ama silh dingin saihadial puan hoih asiang apak mahmah kipia hi,”ci-in a awng uh hi. (Saihadial puan hoih pen a thumaan misiangte gamtatna tang ahi hi.)
Tua ciangin vansawltak in kei kiang ah, “Gelh in: ‘Tuuno mopawi sim dinga kisamte thupha ngah ahi hi!’ hong ci a, “Hihte amaan Pasian kammalte ahi hi,” hong cih beh lai hi.

Hih thu ah amah bia dingin a khe phungah ka bok hi. Ahi hangin amah in, “Hih kei in! Kei zong Jesu ading teci a pang, nang le na sanggamte tawh nasem khawm khat mah ka hi hi. Pasian bia in! Ahang in, Jesu teci panna in kamsanna kha ahi hi,” hong ci hi.
Van kihonga om ka mu-a, ka mai-ah sakol kang khat a na om hi. A tunga tuangpa, Muanhuai le Thumaan kici hi. Amah in thutangin thukhena gal a do hi.
Ama mitte meikuanglai tawh kibanga, a lutung ah kumpi lukhu tampi a khu hi. Tuate tungah kuama theihpih theih loh amah bek in a theih min kigelh hi.
Sisan sunga kidiahsa puantual khatin kizem a, ama min, Pasian Thu ahi hi.
Vantung galkapte sakol kang tungah tuangin, asiang apak mahmah saihadial puan hoih silh uh a, amah a zui kawikawi uh hi.
A kam panin minamte sattuk nading namsau hiam khat hong dawkkhia hi. “Amah in amaute sikciang tawh a uk ding hi.” Amah in a Thahatpa Pasian thangpai-a, a lungsona lenggah sukna a tuancil hi.
Ama puantual tung le a phei tungah: KUMPITE’ KUMPIPA, TOTE’ TOPA ci-in hih min kigelh hi.
Tua ciangin ni sunga ding van sawltak khat ka mu hi. Vankimlai-a leng vasa khempeuh kiangah amah ngaihtakin kiko a “Hong pai un, Pasian nitak-an thupi ne dingin hong kikhawm un.
Note in kumpite, galkap mangpite, mi thahatte, sakol le a tunga tuangte, le sila le sila lote, aneu alian, mi khempeuh sa na ne thei ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin tua sakol tunga tuang pa le a galkapte do dingin tua gamsa le leitung kumpite le a galkap honte uh hong kikaikhawm ka mu hi.

Ahi hangin tua gamsa kiman ta a, amah tawh ama tunga lim lamdang a bawl zuau kam sangpa kiman hi. Amah in hih limte tawh gamsa ciamtehna ngahsate le a lim a biate a khem hi. Amaute lakah tua nihte a hingtangin a kihtakhuai kaat kuanglai lipi sungah kipai hi.
A om lai teng, sakol tunga tuang pa kam pana pusuakkhia namsau tawh kithat a, vasa khempeuh in amaute sa a ne phiauphiau uh hi.
Tua ciangin vansawltak khat vantung pana hong paikhiasuk ka mu a, amah in Kawhawmpi honna tawhtang nei-in, a khut ah sikkhainiang lianpi khat a tawi hi.
Amah in tua tanglai gulpi, Satan ahikeh dawimangpa, gulpi-sikhiam mana, kum tulkhat sung a khih hi.

Amah in Kawhawmpi sungah lawn a, minamte a khem nawn loh nadingin kum tulkhat a bei mateng, tawh kalh khuma, a tungah seal in a ciamteh hi. Tua hun khit ciangin amah tomkha sung a kikhahkhia pelmawh ding hi.

Thukhen za a kipiasate tutna, kumpi tokhomte ka mu hi. Tua ciangin Jesu adinga teci pangte le Pasian thu teci a panna uh hanga a ngawng uh a kitante kha ka mu hi. Amaute in gamsa ahikeh a lim bia loin ama ciamtehna a tal tung ahikeh a khut tunguah a ngah kei uh hi. Amaute nungta uh a, Khrist tawh kum tulkhat sung a uk uh hi.
(Kum tulkhat a bei mateng a om lai mi sisate a nungta nai kei hi.) Hih in a masa thawhkikna ahi hi.

A masa thawhkikna sunga kihelte a siangtho le thupha ngahte ahi uh hi. Amaute tungah sihna nihna in vangliatna a nei nawn kei hi. Ahi hangin amaute, Pasian le Khrist siampite hi ding uh a, kum tulkhat sung amah tawh a uk khawm ding uh hi.
Kum tulkhat a bei khit ciangin, Satan a thongkiatna pan kikhahkhia-in,
leitung kiuli-a minamte khem dingin kuankhia dinga Gog le Magog kidona adingin amaute a kaikhawm ding hi. Amaute tuipi gei-a sehnel zah pha uh hi.
Amaute leitung maitang dimin pai uh a, Pasian mite giahphual, a it a khuapi a umcih uh hi. Ahi hangin van panin meikuang hong tuaksuk a, amaute kangtummang hi.
Amaute a khem tua dawimangpa gamsa le kamsang zuaute a kipaihna kaat kuang lipi sungah a kilawn hi. Amaute sun le zanin a tawntung gawtna kithuaksak den ding hi.
Tua ciangin alian akang kumpi tokhom le a tunga tupa ka mu hi. Ama mai-ah van le lei om nading mun om lo ahi manin a taimang hi.

Tua ciangin misite, aneu alianin kumpi tokhom mai-a ding le laibute kilem ka mu hi. Nuntakna laibu ahi laibu dang khat a kilem hi. Misite tungah a hihsate uh laibute sunga kigelhsa tawh kizui-in thu kikhen hi.
Tuipi in a sunga om misite puakkhia a, sihna le Gawtmun in amau sunga om misite puakkhia-in, mi khempeuh amau nasepna tawh kizui-in thu kikhen ciat hi.
Tua ciangin meili sungah sihna le Gawtmun kipai hi. Tua meili sihna nihna ahi hi.
Nuntakna laibu sunga a min kigelh lo peuhmah meili sungah kipai hi.
Tua ciangin a masa van le a masa lei mangthang a, tuipi lah om nawn lo ahi manin van thak le lei thak ka mu hi.
Pasian kiang vantung panin Jerusalem thak, Khuapi Siangtho, a pasal kianga mothak ding, kilawm taka kizem mo bangin hong paisuk ka mu hi.

Kumpi tokhom panin aw ngaih mahmah khat ka za a, “Tu-in Pasian tenna mite tawh om khawm ta dinga, amah amaute tawh a teng khawm ding hi. Amaute ama mi hi ding uh a, Pasian mahmah amau tawh om khawmin, amaute Pasian hi ding hi.
Amah in amaute mit-a khitui khempeuh a nulsak ding hi. Alui nate paizia mangthang zo ahi manin tua lai-ah natna, sihna, thumna, kahnate a om nawn kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Kumpi tokhom tunga tupa in, “Na khempeuh athakin ka bawl hi!” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amah in, “Hih thute muan takin thumaan ahi manin gelh in,” hong ci hi.
Amah in kei kiangah, “Kizo ta hi! Keimah Alpha le Omega, a Patna le a Tawpna ka hi hi. A dangtak mi tungah man nei loin nuntakna tuinak panin tui ka pia ding hi.
A gualzo mi in hihte khempeuh luahin, ama Pasian ka hi dinga, amah ka tapa ahi ding hi.

Ahi hangin a meidawite, a umlote, a tatsiate, tualthatte, numei le pasal paktatte, mi bumte, milim biate le zuauphuakte khempeuh – amaute mun ding, kaat kuang meilipi sung hi ding hi. Hih pen sihna nihna ahi hi,” hong ci hi.
A nunung gimna sagihte tawh ki dim kuangkum sagihte a tawi vansawltak sagihte lakah khat ka kiangah hong pai-a, “Hong pai in, Tuuno zi ahi, mo, kong lak ding hi,” hong ci hi.
Amah in Kha-in hong puamangin alian asang mualtungah hong tuna, Pasian kiang vantung pan hong paisuk, Khuapi Siangtho, Jerusalem hong lak hi.
Pasian minthanna in tua khuapi tana, a tanphatna, a manpha mahmah suang le jaspar tawh kibangin crystal bangin a siang hi.
Kulh lianpi sangpitak nei a, kongpi sawm le nih nei in, a kongpite ah vansawltak sawm le nih mah a om hi. A kongpite tungah, Israel beh sawm le nihte min kigelh hi.
Nisuahna lamah kongpi thum, leilu lamah thum, leitaw lamah thum le nitumna lamah thum a om hi.
Khuapi kulh in bulkip sawm le nih nei-a, tuate tungah Tuuno sawltakpi sawm le nihte’ min a tuang hi.
Kei hong hopih vansawltak in tua khuapi, a kongpite le a kulhte teh nading kham kibawl tehna ciang khat a tawi hi.
Tua khuapi pen kiu li nei, adung avai kikima kilam ahi hi. Amah in tua ciang tawh khuapi teh a, adung, avai le a sanna stadia 12,000 a pha kim hi.
Amah in a kulh teh a, tua vansawltak in, mihing tehna banga a teh hi-a, tong 144 a sah hi.
A kulh jaspar kiciang hi-a, a khuapi limlang siang tawh kibang kham citak ahi hi.
Khuapi kulh bulkipte, suang man pha namkim tawh kizem hi. A khatna bulkip jaspar hi-a a nihna saphire, a thumna chalcedony, a lina emerald,
a ngana sardonyx, a gukna carnelian, a sagihna chrysolite, a giatna beryal, a kuana topaz, a sawmna chrysophrace, a sawm le khatna Jacinth, le a sawm le nihna amethyst ahi hi.
Kongpi sawm le nihte kep manpha sawm le nih hi-a, kongpi khat kep manpha khata kibawl ahi hi. Tua khuapi kongzingpite kham citak hi-a, limlang paisuak a bang hi.
Khuapi sungah biakinnpi ka mu kei hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Thahat pen Topa Pasian le Tuuno, a khuapi biakinnpi ahi hi.
Pasian minthanna in tua khuapi taana, a meivak Tuuno ahi manin ni ahi a, khapi ahi zongin a taan ding kisam lo hi.
Minamte, tua khuavak ah lam pai ding uh a, leitung kumpite in a thupinate uh a sungah a puak ding uh hi.
Tua lai-ah zan hun om ngei nawn lo ding ahi manin a kongpite kikhak ni a om ngei kei ding hi.
Minamte minthanna le pahtawinate a sungah kipuak ding hi.
Tua sungah a siang lo bangmah lut thei lo dinga, a zumhuai, zuauphuakte khatpeuh zong a lut ngei kei ding hi; ahi hangin Tuuno nuntakna laibu sunga min kigelhsate bek a lut thei ding hi.
Tua ciangin vansawltak in nuntakna guntui hong laka, crystal bangin cim sitset a, Pasian le Tuuno tokhom pan luangkhia-in,
khuapi kongzing lian laizangah a luangsuk hi. Tua gunpang tuakah nuntakna singkung po-in, kha simin gah a, kum khatin sawm le nih vei a gah hi. Tua singkung a tehte minamte damsak nading ahi hi.
Kihamsiatna a om nawn kei ding hi. Tua khuapi sungah Pasian le Tuuno tokhom om dinga, a nasemte in ama na a sem ding uh hi.
Amaute in ama maitang mu ding uh a, amaute taltangah ama min a tuang ding hi.
Tua mun ah zan a om nawn kei ding hi. Topa Pasian vang in amaute taan ding ahi manin meivak tang le ni tang a kisam nawn kei ding hi. Amaute in a tawntung in uk den ding uh hi.
Tua vansawltak in, “Hih thute muan takin thutak ahi hi. Topa kamsangte khate’ Pasian in a pel lo-a, hong tungpah ding nate a nasemte a lak dingin ama vansawltak hong sawl ahi hi,” hong ci hi.
"Ngai in, kong paipah ding hi! Hih laibu sunga genkholhna thute a kem cingte thupha ngah ahi hi.”
Keimah John in hih nate mu-a, a za pa ka hi hi. Hihte mu-a ka zak khit ciangin hih thute hong lak vansawltak khe phungah a bia dingin ka boksuk hi.
Ahi hangin amah in kei kiangah, “Hih kei in! Kei zong nang le na sanggam kamsangte le hih laibu sunga thute a kemcingte khempeuh tawh nasem khawm khat mah ka hi hi. Pasian bia in!” hong ci hi.
Tua ciangin ka kiangah “Ahun nai ta ahi manin hih laibu-a genkholhna thute bilhcip kei in,
mawh bawlte in bawl lailai henla, a tatsiate tatsia lailai uh hen la, amaana gamtate gamta lailai hen; a siangthote siangtho lailai ta hen,” ci-in hong gen hi.
"Ngai in, kong pai pah ding hi! Ka pahtakman ka kiangah om hi; mi khempeuh tungah ama hihsa tawh kizui-in ka pia ding hi.
Keimah, Alpha le Omega, a Masapen le a Nunungpen, a Patna le a Tawpna ka hi hi.
"Nuntakna singkung neih theih nading le kongpite tawna khuapi sunga lut nading thu neih theih nadinga a puantual uh a sawpsiangte thupha ngah ahi uh hi.
A pualam ah ahileh, uite, dawi-ai tawite, numei le pasal paktatte, tualthatte, milim biate, le zuauphuah nuamsa-a, zuauthu gente peuhmah a om ding uh hi.
"Keimah Jesu in, pawlpite ading in hih teci panna nang tunga gen dingin ka vansawltak kong sawl zo hi. Kei in David Zungpi le ama Suan le a tangpha Zingsol ka hi hi.”
Tua Kha le tua mo in, “Hong pai in!” ci uh hi. A za peuh in, “Hong pai in!” ci ta hen. A dangtak peuhmah hong pai ta hen. A ut peuhmah in letsonga kipia nuntakna tui sang ta hen.
Hih laibu sunga genkholhna thute a za peuhmah ka vauhilh hi: Mi khatpeuh in tuate banah bang khatpeuh a behlap leh Pasian in ama tungah hih laibu sunga kigentel gimnate a behlap ding hi.
Mi khatpeuh in hih genkholhna laibu sung pana thute a paihkhiat leh Pasian in ama tung panin hih laibu sunga kigentel nuntakna singkung pan le khuapi siangtho pana a tanh ding a lakkhiatsak ding hi.
Hih nate teci a pangpa in, “Hihi, kong paipah ding hi,” a ci hi. Amen. Topa Jesu aw, hong pai ta in.
Topa Jesu hehpihna Pasian mite tawh omkhawm ta hen. Amen.
